44007054	Etiên tueé gi ndɔ. Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ yeé nde ŋgweé njií ménâ, temé yulá bɔ́ lè, bɔ́ né nyie yieé.
44007055	Etiên mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né yoòr ŋgulí, kɔ lom né njolo ké te vulúu ke njiî. À ŋene njií sùsùm Càŋ, mé Yeésò ké te be gaâ Càŋe, à né ter njebá den.
44007056	Etiên tueé njií bɔ̀ nùàr ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí kè! Vulú gulu baá kèn! Mè ŋene njií aá Huaán Nùàr ké te be gaâ Càŋe, à né ter njebá den.»
44007057	Bɔ́ bɔm bú, bɔ́ bɔm lɔgɔ njií ké ter, bɔ́ faga tie bɔɔ̀n ndɔ. Jomo sâ bɔ́ kem sue bú yoòr dɔɔ́ŋ,
44007058	bɔ́ tulu yuo kela mé bú ké jomo lɔɔ̂. Bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀ hèllè huaré haá njií cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n beè nuaré déì, yilí nùà sâ né Sɔ̂l, bɔ́ duɔɔ̂m Etiên tɔbê.
44007059	Bɔ́ yeé baá bú tɔbé, à né Càŋ sònò dua, ye: «Fehtoò mò Yeésò, wèh kéh yɔ̀ŋ mò.»
44007060	Jomo sâ, à cemmé nde doó, à lɔgɔ njií ké ter ye: «Fehtoò mò, té veên hên mé bɔ́ bíé.» À yeé tueé gi aá ménâ, à kuú.
44008001	Temé Sɔ̂l lé naâ nɔré mé cio sâ ndɔ. Etiên yeé kuú aá, bɔ̀ dùlà-Càŋ bɔ̀ nde jɔgɔ furu bú. Bɔ́ yueé ŋellé mbà seèn doó dɔɔ́ŋ. Sâ né loù mé bùnò ké Jerusalem lé duɔɔ́m naâ teèn. Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ durá ŋellé yila nde lè lò Judê mé lò Samarî dɔɔ́ŋ. Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê le lom ké Jerusalem kɔɔ́.
44008003	Sâ Sɔ̂l yuo die lom aá dé seèn bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yoòr, te bɔ́ ŋeéŋellè. À né bɔ́ gùgwò yilá sie weh, véh mé siíb mene, à yií njií bɔ́ lè gwà cibì.
44008004	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ bèh dɔɔ́ŋ dula ŋellé ndeé, wa toò, bɔ́ yila ŋgòr Càŋ tueê ndɔ.
44008005	Filîp dé seèn nde lè lɔɔ́ déì te tàbe Samarî, à né bɔ́ ŋgòr felè Kristò tueé.
44008006	Bɔ̀ nùàr né ŋgweé, à né fém bɔɔ́, bɔ̀ nùàr né mé njolo ŋené, bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá kwaá njií gi tie teèn ndɔ.
44008007	Tándulu keéŋ durá yuo lè bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún, bɔ̀ gule-kuû bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ tácɔgɔ́ taré yuo gi ndɔ.
44008008	Bɔ̀ nùàr lɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ samé lom mé njéh dé gècên.
44008009	Sâ nùà táhunò déì lé naá baá lɔ sâ táhuno lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr bɔɔ́ den, ye nyí né nùà koô; yilí nùà sâ lé naâ Simɔ̂ŋ. Bɔ̀ Samarî bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá giì ŋené ye seé seèn né mé fém teèn,
44008010	bɔ́ né tie teèn felá njií, bɔ̀ kàm bɔ̀ mé ndà mene né gi tueé ye: Nùà hên né mé terreb Càŋ yoòr, né lom meì bɔ̀ terreb sâ.
44008011	Lòù sam, dàb baá teèn mé à né lètenè bɔɔ̀n ménâ bɔɔ́.
44008012	Filîp yeé baá Njàgà Bagaà se, à baá dene Lò Càŋ se, à né ŋgòr felè Yeésò Kristò tueé, bɔ́ kwaá njií temé teèn; siíb mene, véh mene weh gi nòmò Càŋ.
44008013	Simɔ̂ŋ mé feh seèn kweéh seér temé, bɔ́ kou bú ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé kou sɔm aá bú, à den le kwarè Filîp. Bɔ̀ fém gèh hihiné mé Filîp né bɔɔ́ bele dɔɔ́ŋ lé naâ njolò seèn, né bú mbaá geí yɔgɔ́.
44008014	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê ŋgweé njií ké Jerusalem ye, bɔ̀ Samarî bɔ̀ baá ŋgòr Càŋ gwaán. Bɔ́ tema njií Piêr bɔ̂ Jâŋ ké teèn.
44008015	Bɔ́ yeé wa baá, bɔ́ dua Càŋ felè bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ te bɔ́ kwa Cúcuí Ŋagâ.
44008016	Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé bɔ́ kou kwaá loóm naâ mé yilí Yeésò Fehtoò beèh, bɔ́ lé née Cúcuí Ŋagâ kwà ŋgwéeh ye.
44008017	Bɔ́ yeé dua gi aá Càŋ, bɔ́ ba bɔ́ be felè ndɔ, bɔ́ kwa baá-re Cúcuí Ŋagâ.
44008018	Simɔ̂ŋ yeé ŋene bɔ̀ nùàr né Cúcuí Ŋagâ mé njéh kwa, à haá Piêr bɔ̂ Jâŋ kàgàlɔ̀ŋ,
44008019	ye bɔ́ a: «Bí há mè gèh terrèb bú sâ teèn ndɔ, te mè ba bɔ̀ nùàr be felè mé njéh, bɔ́ kwa Cúcuí Ŋagâ.»
44008020	Piêr deên ndɔ, ye bú a: «Bî kàgàlɔ̀ŋ yeè a, cálé gí fà dɔɔ́ŋ, te wò kɔ ye, njií mé Càŋ haá né dé lòù, nùàr lòù ŋgè bèh!
44008021	Mè tueé wò, ndɔ́g gà dé yeè lè seé hên sam, temé yeè né lom beè Càŋ veénsé mân.
44008022	Kwéh sér temé yeè, wò kwɔbé leba, wò dua lom Nùà Dueè, te à kulu sɔm wò veên sâ yoòr,
44008023	wanɔɔ́ŋ temé yeè né lè jelásé, wò né kwer veên ndɔ.»
44008024	Simɔ̂ŋ ye Piêr a: «Mɔ né mân, bí dùà Fehtoò beèh felè mò teèn, te njeré déì mè faá bí tueé naâ sâ kwà cú.»
44008025	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê fà doô yeé se gi aá sòn Fehtoò beèh, bɔ́ tueé gi aá ŋgòr Càŋ, bɔ́ cu cu ké Jerusalem ndɔ. Bɔ́ né gɔ, bɔ́ né mé Njàgà Bagaà lè lɔɔ́ hihiné te tàbè Samarî tueé ndeé.
44008026	Jomo sâ cìlì Càŋ déì ye Filîp a: «Wùò ter, ndé sér kèb túnò, te ceér ya dueè mé suagà né ké Jerusalem nde Gàsà doô.»
44008027	Filîp wuo ter ndɔ, à nde, à wa ceér dueè, à ŋene nùà Etiopî déì teèn. À né nùà seê dé koô beè Kàndâse. Kàndâse né mgbè dé vêh felè bɔ̀ Etiopî bɔ̀. Bɔ̀ ŋgùlù lɔɔ̂ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè nùà koô sâ. À naâ ké Jerusalem bèh Càŋ duaà,
44008028	à nde cu aá lɔ. À né te màtúâ déì den den, à né mvù Esáyà sòn-Càŋ jaŋé den.
44008029	Cúcuí Ŋagâ ye Filîp a: «Ŋgòrò ndé yí kwarè màtúâ sâ.»
44008030	Filîp dula nde yí teèn ndɔ, à ŋgweé nùà doô né njeré déì lè mvù Esáyà jaŋé den. Filîp bie njií, ye bú a: «Wò né njií sâ ŋgweé kɔɔ́ wa?»
44008031	Nùà hèllè ye bú a: «Mɔ nuaré déì mè lòù sè ŋgwéh, mè ŋgweé komo nde né naàn wa?» Jomo sâ, ye Filîp a: «Ndê ŋá dèn ká kwarè mò.» Filîp den nde ndɔ.
44008032	Sâ nùà hèllè lé jaŋé deén naâ bèh mé bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né teèn ye: «À lé deén naâ faá sòrŋgaŋ mé bɔ́ derré njií né bèh ŋɔɔ̂b nɔ. Mé sòn kúb faá huaán sòrŋgaàŋ den né toò nuaá mé né bú hobó nɔ, à lé sòn kòmò nyì ná ŋgwêh.
44008033	Bɔ́ lé naâ ju nyeên felè seèn tená, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ gulí bú. Dene seèn ká lè wɔ́ŋe ceré baá kèn; gèh seèn ceré le aá mé bú ndɔ.» Sâ nùà hèllè lé jaŋé deén naâ bèh sâ.
44008034	Jomo sâ, ye Filîp a: «Kúkùr yeè, sè yeè mè teèn. Sòn-Càŋ hên tueé njií né felè neì wa? À tueé den né felè seèn nùà njèh wa, né felè nuaré déì wa?»
44008035	Filîp kwa baá-re ceér ndɔ. À yeé baá bú se, à tueé keéh bú Njàgà Bagaà felè Yeésò teèn.
44008036	Bɔ́ bú né ka ndeé, bɔ́ wa beré déì, bɔ́ kwa nòmò. Nùà koô doô ye Filîp a: «Kè nòmò hên. Kei yiín né mè kou sɔɔ̀m kɔɔ́ wa?» [
44008037	Filîp ye bú a: «Mɔ wò kwaá njií aá temé cén yoòr Yeésò Kristò, mè kou wò mà.» Nùà hèllè ye bú a: «Mè kwaá njií aá temé mò yoòr Yeésò Kristò, ye à né Ŋunà Càŋ.»]
44008038	À yeé tueé gi aá ménâ, ye bɔ́ sìè njébá màtúâ njebà. Bɔ̂ Filîp suaga nde ké dùà fà dɔɔ́ŋ. Filîp kou sɔm bú ndɔ.
44008039	Bɔ́ yeé yuo kela baá yí dùà, Cúcuí Fehtoò beèh nyue leér sɔm Filîp. Nùà koô doô yeé Filîp ŋéné cú, à fɔɔ́n gò seèn mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene ndɔ.
44008040	Filîp nde yuo kela dé seèn ké Asótà. Jomo sâ, à tueé bele ŋgòr Càŋ te lɔɔ́ hihinê, à né bɔ̀ nùàr Njàgà Bagaà se, à mé njéh tɔ́g se yuo kela ké Sesarê.
44009001	Sâ Sɔ̂l née dé seèn mé bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ Fehtoò beèh bunó ndeé ye, à bɔ́ bunó lom né dé cioò. À nde kwa ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô,
44009002	ye bú a: Nyàgà jègè há nyí mvù beè, te nyí nde mé njéh ké Damâs lè gwà sóù, bɔ́ haá nyí lɔ́ŋ, mɔ nyí kwa baá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ceér Yeésò ké teèn bele, siíb mé véh mene dɔɔ́ŋ, te nyí sie nde giì mé bɔ́ ká Jerusalem ma.
44009003	Bɔ́ yeé jege haá baá bú, à fɔɔ́n gò Damâs ndɔ. À yeé baá kwarè lɔɔ̂, ŋagâ déì ba suagà ter, ka sie bú beè.
44009004	À jege die doó. À ŋgweé njií hueh déì né ŋgulí den, ye bú a: «Sɔ̂l, Sɔ̂l, wò mè ménâ bunó né mé ŋgei wa?»
44009005	Sɔ̂l ye bú a: «Né wò neì wa, Nùà Dueè?» Hueh doô ye bú a: «Né mè Yeésò mé wò né bunó den sâ.
44009006	Mé njéh mene, kòmò wùò yeè ter, wò yila nde ké lɔ. Mɔ wò baá ké lɔ, njií mé wò nde né bɔɔ́, bɔ́ nde né wò feh.»
44009007	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá giì jomo Sɔ̂l dɔɔ́ŋ, njebá ndegé le gi, yɔgɔ́ bɔ́ dé tueê; bɔ́ né hueh ŋgweé, bɔ́ nùàr teèn ŋéné ŋgwéh.
44009008	Jomo sâ Sɔ̂l komo wuo ter ndɔ. À yeé wa njolo, njolo njeré déì ŋéné cú. Bɔ́ mé bú ké Damâs derré wa baá lòù.
44009009	À cugó sɔɔ́ cieé tagár. À yáb mé nòmò sònò yí ŋgwéh.
44009010	Sâ mbɔ̀ŋ Yeésò cén déì né ké Damâs sâ teèn, yilí seèn lé naâ Ananíà. Fehtoò beèh lé naâ njolò seèn ŋené yuo kelá, ye bú a: «Ananíà!» À gwaán ye bú a: «Mè hên nɔ, Fehtoò mò.»
44009011	Fehtoò beèh ye bú a: «Wùò ter, ndé ké te ceér mé bɔ́ yilá né Ceér Dilî doô, wò nde ké gwò Júdàs, wò bie nùà Târse déì ké teèn, yilí seèn né Sɔ̂l. À né mè kènê sònò dua den.
44009012	Wò Ananíà naâ njolò seèn ŋené yuo kelá, wò naâ bú be felè baá, te à ŋene cu njolo.»
44009013	À yeé tueé gi aá Ananíà ménâ, Ananíà ye bú a: «Fehtoò mò, bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá ye mè a, nùà sâ né lom nùà veên. Njií mé à né yeé bɔ̀ nùàr yeè ké Jerusalem bɔɔ́, mè ŋgweé gi aá kèn.
44009014	À ká lɔ hên nde kuû né felè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né wò dua, ye te nyí kagá njií bɔ́ ké Jerusalem. Bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô jege haá gi aá bú terreb ké jomo kèn.»
44009015	Fehtoò beèh ye Ananíà a: «Ndé yeè ndeè! Mè bú balé weh né kɔɔ́, kènê à baá seér nùà seê mò, à nde né mé yilí mò lò nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ tueé ndeé, à tueé bilí mé bɔ̀ mgbè bɔɔ̀n mene. À nde né bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ ŋgòr mò se ndɔ.
44009016	Mè bú feh nde né mé feh mò ye bú a, gèr né teèn, à nde né gèr mé yilí mò fî ŋené ma.»
44009017	Yeé baá ménâ, Ananíà fɔɔ́n gò ndɔ. À wa ké gwò, à ba Sɔ̂l be felè, ye bú a: «Sɔ̂l nùàr mò, Yeésò Fehtoò beèh mé lé naâ ké ceér dueè yoòr yeè ŋagá yuo kelá, tema njiî né mè kɔɔ́, te wò ŋene cu njolo, wò kwa Cúcuí Ŋagâ ndɔ.»
44009018	Ananíà yeé tueé sɔm aá mân, bɔ̀ njeré déì kebá yuo bele Sɔ̂l njolò faá werrè mân, dielé nde doó, à ŋene cu njolo, à komo wuo ter. Bɔ́ nde kou bú nòmò Càŋ.
44009019	À yieé cu yáb, à kwa cu terreb faá bèh jomò nɔ. Sɔ̂l bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ dé ké Damâs sâ cer weh cegé ŋgɔ́b.
44009020	À ŋar yila lom aá ŋgòr Càŋ te gwà sóù tueé beleè, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, Ŋunà Càŋ né Yeésò ma.
44009021	Bɔ̀ nùàr yeé ŋgweé cu aá sònò seèn ménâ, geí seér bɔ́ lòù; bɔ́ ye: «Ŋgweéh hên né nuaá mé lé bunó lom beéh bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò ké Jerusalem dé kùm doô wa? Ŋgweéh à hên nde kuú naâ ye te nyí sie njií cu bɔ́ ké toò bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô wa?»
44009022	Mé njéh mene, Sɔ̂l ŋgòr Càŋ tueé seér cu mé terreb, à né lom bɔ̀ Jûf dé ké Damâs sâ tueé, ye bɔ́ a, Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ né Yeésò ma. Bɔ́ bèh tueê kwà cú ndɔ.
44009023	Cèr dè ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ Jûf nyɔgɔ sòn, ye bɔ́ nde né Sɔ̂l wulá sɔm.
44009024	Nyɔ̀gɔ̀ sòn sâ nde ŋgulí kwa Sɔ̂l. Bɔ́ kwaá tena bele nùàr ké tùtúlù bɔ̀gɔ̀ lɔɔ̂ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né bú teèn cíbí mé suútenè mene mɔɔ́m den, te bɔ́ wula bú wulà.
44009025	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ Sɔ̂l yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ nde cíbítenè, bɔ́ jɔgɔ yií bú te sɔgɔ̂, bɔ́ segé sɔm keéh te kùm bɔ̀gɔ̀, bɔ́ kwaá njií bú ké doó, à yuo.
44009026	Sɔ̂l cu cu ké Jerusalem. À wa ké teèn, ye te bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ déì den bilí. Bɔ́ yeé ŋene njií bú, veéh sie yɔgɔ́ bɔ́ mé bú. Sâ bɔ́ née kɔ́ nyégé ŋgwéeh ye Sɔ̂l baá mbɔ̀ŋ Yeésò.
44009027	Bàrnàbâs yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à weh njií bú ké toò bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê, à nde se ŋagá nyegé bɔ́ naàn mé Sɔ̂l lé naâ Fehtoò beèh ké ceér dueè ŋené, à se bɔ́ njií mé Fehtoò beèh lé naâ bú tueé ndɔ. À tueé cu bɔ́ gèh dé mé Sɔ̂l lé naâ ŋgòr Càŋ mé yilí Yeésò ké Damâs se, ye bɔ́ a, à lé vèh ná ŋgwêh ma.
44009028	Doó sâ Sɔ̂l yila nde lètenè bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ doô ndɔ, à né ndeé, à né cuú, à né ŋgòr Càŋ lètenè lɔɔ́ Jerusalem mé yilí Yeésò se bele, à njeba lom teèn tég.
44009029	Bɔ̀ Jûf mé né ju Greêk ŋgweé, à né mé bɔ́ tueé njií, bɔ́ bɔ́ né saán kuú. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ nyɔgɔ cu sòn, te bɔ́ wula bú wulà.
44009030	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ weh njií bú ké Sesarê, à nde cu Târse.
44009031	Jomo sâ, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lè tàbè Judê mé Galilê bɔ̂ Samarî dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgweé fu ndɔ, bɔ́ né mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ yaám ndeé den, bɔ́ né taré ndeé, bɔ́ né Fehtoò beèh teèn mé temé cén dula.
44009032	Piêr lé naâ lò beè yɔŋ sie, à lé naâ ké Lídà yoòr bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé ké doó sâ ndeé,
44009033	à nde kwa nùà gule-kuû déì ké teèn, yilí seèn né Enê, baá nyèmà téndelé à né lè ndagâ cer den.
44009034	Piêr ye bú a: «Enê, Yeésò Kristò né wò taré sɔm! Wùò ter, nyégé ndagá yeè nyegè.» Enê komo wuo ter ndɔ.
44009035	Bɔ̀ Lídà bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ nùàr ké te bela Sàrɔ̂ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ kweéh seér gi temé, bɔ́ bele ceér Fehtoò beèh.
44009036	Sâ mbɔ̀ŋ dé vêh déì lé naâ ké Jopê teèn, yilí seèn lé naâ Tàbítà. Yilí sâ lè ju Greêk né Dɔrékà. Sâ tueé né ye: mbélêm. Cu dɔɔ́ŋ à lé naá beéh bɔ̀ saâm bɔ̀ njolo yoòr ke njií, à né bɔ́ gam.
44009037	Cu sâ Dɔrékà nde die beén teèn, à kuú. Bɔ́ ye kou sɔm aá bú, bɔ́ jɔgɔ njií komó seèn lè gwà dé ké teèr, bɔ́ yií njií ké mí.
44009038	Sâ bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ dé ké Jopê lé ŋgweé naâ ye Piêr né ké Lídà, kwarè Jopê doó sâ. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ tema njií nùà fà ké yoòr seèn, ye bú a: Kúkùr yeè, jɔ̀gɔ̀ ndê béh kán ye, gɔ̀ ká gɔɔ̀ ma.
44009039	Piêr komo wuo ter ndɔ, bɔ́ bɔ́ fɔɔ́n gò. Bɔ́ yeé wa baá, bɔ́ weh njií bú ké mí, lè gwà dé ké teèr sâ. Bɔ̀ ma kû mé lé naâ teèn kem nde gi ké yoòr seèn, bɔ́ né yueé, bɔ́ né bú bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ hihiné feh keéh bele, bɔ́ ye bú a: «Hên Dɔrékà lé saà naâ kɔɔ́, sâ à née mé njolo ye.»
44009040	Piêr sɔm keéh gi nùàr cie, à cemmé nde doó, à dua Càŋ. Jomo sâ, à bele seér, à ke njií komó, à ye: «Tàbítà, wùò ter!» À wa njolo ndɔ, à ŋene Piêr, à komo den ter.
44009041	Piêr sie gam bú be, à komo njebá cu ter. Piêr yilá njiî bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ mé bɔ̀ ma kû doô, à haá njií cu bɔ́ nùàr bɔɔ̀n, sâ à taré yuo aá.
44009042	Ŋgɔ́g sâ ŋgulí yɔŋ Jopê dɔɔ́ŋ. Bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ kwaá njií ye temé bɔɔ̀n yoòr Fehtoò beèh.
44009043	Piêr cer yií ké Jopê sâ kɔ́beè; lé naâ ké lɔ Simɔ̂ŋ nùà sá-paàr.
44010001	Nuaré déì lé naâ ké Sesarê teèn, yilí seèn né Kɔ̀rnê, à lé naâ kwaá-taâb te bɔ̀ŋ taâb bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀ mé bɔ́ yilá yeé bɔ̀ŋ Italî doô.
44010002	À né yeé Càŋ dula; mé mbàgà seèn mene, bɔ́ né bú cu dɔɔ́ŋ dua; à né bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf kókoó mbaá gam ndɔ.
44010003	Cieé déì lou yeé geér aá, mé lɔ̀ŋ tagár, kulu bú faá vuú nɔ; à ŋene cìlì Càŋ déì yila kweêh ká gwò seèn, ye bú a: «Kɔ̀rnê!»
44010004	À ke njií bú mé veéh mene, ye bú a: «Né naàn wa, Nùà dueè?» Cìlì Càŋ ye bú a: «Càŋ ŋgweé aá duaà yeè kèn, à ŋene baá gàm mé wò gam yeé bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ kèn ndɔ. Lan à munó baá wò.
44010005	Témá njí nùàr kènê ké Jopê yoòr nuaré déì, yilí seèn né Simɔ̂ŋ, yilí seèn déì né cu Piêr, te bɔ́ yilá ndeè mé bú.
44010006	À cer né ké gwò nuaré déì, yilí seèn né Simɔ̂ŋ ndɔ; né nùà mé sa yeé par. Gwà seèn né ké sòn nòmò koô mân.»
44010007	Cìlì Càŋ yeé tueé gi aá bú ménâ, à yuo ndɔ. Jomo sâ Kɔ̀rnê yilá njiî bɔ̀ seê bɔ̀ seèn déì fà, mé sɔ́jì seèn déì; sɔ́jì sâ né taré nùà dùlà-Càŋ ndɔ.
44010008	À se gi bɔ́ njií mé kelà naâ dɔɔ́ŋ, à tema njií baá-re bɔ́ ké Jopê.
44010009	Cieé ŋaga, bɔ́ né ka ndeé. Bɔ́ yeé nde aá Jopê waá, lou dilí. Sâ Piêr la ŋaá baá ké ter felè gwà bèh Càŋ duaà.
44010010	Cùè baá lom bú sie ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé baá yáb neé, kulu bú faá vuú nɔ.
44010011	À ŋene njií vulú gulu lɔgɔ́ baá, tàmbàŋ njeré déì faá cɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ yuo kelà ké teèn, bɔ́ sie né bèh nèà te gou te gou; né ka felè seèn segé suagâ, waà, bɔ́ kwaá njií doó.
44010012	Lè teèn lé naâ bɔ̀ nyam mé bɔ̀ sàb, bɔ́ bɔ̀ non feh hihiné.
44010013	Hueh déì deên ye bú a: «Wùò ter Piêr, wúlá yíé bɔ̀ njií sâ wulà.»
44010014	Piêr berɔ́ŋ ye bú a: «Hɔ̂s Nùà Dueè! Mè gèh dé sâ yíé bèh, né yilísé, mè nde né mbaá fulá.»
44010015	Hueh doô tueé ferré cu, ye bú a: «Té njií mé Càŋ ye né ŋagásé jìnè, té túé ye nyí nde né mé njéh fulá.»
44010016	Yeé wa baá mbei tagár, cɔ̀gɔ̀ hèllè ŋaá yuo cu ké te vulúu.
44010017	Piêr yila baá-re kwɔ̀m vuú sâ munô. Cu mé à né ménâ munó den, sâ bɔ̀ tebé bɔ̀ Kɔ̀rnê bie ŋene baá gwà Simɔ̂ŋ kèn ndɔ, bɔ́ né ké tùtúlù njebá den.
44010018	Bɔ́ né yilá bieé den ye: «Simɔ̂ŋ cer yeé hên wa? Yilí seèn déì né cu Piêr.»
44010019	Sâ Piêr née ka dé seèn kwɔ̀m vuú hèllè munó den ye. Cúcuí Ŋagâ tueé njií bú ndɔ, ye bú a: «Ŋgwé, bɔ̀ nuaré déì tagár né wò hên fɔɔ́n den.
44010020	Wùò ter, súágá ké doó, bí bɔ́ nde, té njeré déì mùnò, mè tema njií naâ bɔ́ mân kɔɔ́.»
44010021	Piêr wuo ter ndɔ, à suaga nde ké yoòr bɔɔ̀n, ye bɔ́ a: «Nuaá mé bí fɔɔ́n den né sâ né mè. Bí ndeè bèh keì wa?»
44010022	Bɔ́ ye bú a: «Kɔ̀rnê kwaá-taâb temà naâ béh kɔɔ́. Né nùà dilî, à né yeé Càŋ dula. Bɔ̀ Jûf dɔɔ́ŋ né gi bú keí. Cìlì Càŋ déì lé naâ bú feh, ye bú a: Ndê, yílá njî wò ké lɔ seèn, te à ŋgweé njií mé wò nde né bú tueé ma.»
44010023	Bɔ́ yeé tueé gi aá ménâ, Piêr weh yií njií bɔ́ gwò, à feh bɔ́ bèh cèrrè. Cieé yeé ŋaga baá, bɔ́ bɔ̀ Piêr yuo bele ceér. Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì lètenè bɔ̀ Jopê bɔ̀ njií lɔ bɔ́ ndɔ.
44010024	Cieé ŋaga cu bɔ́ wa Sesarê, sâ Kɔ̀rnê né bɔ́ kela. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn, mé bɔ̀ mbeí seèn mé à yilá njií belé naâ dɔɔ́ŋ, né kɔɔ́.
44010025	Te Piêr yeé nde aá lɔ Kɔ̀rnê yilá ndeé mân, Kɔ̀rnê ndeè ka gule seèn cemmé ndeé ndɔ.
44010026	Piêr yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à sie sɔm bú ter, ye bú a: «Wùò ter, mè né ka nùàr faá wò nɔ.»
44010027	Bɔ́ bú yila bieê. Jomo sâ bɔ́ yila nde gwò ndɔ. Sâ bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún né gwò bilí den.
44010028	Piêr ye bɔ́ a: «Bí né gi mé feh biì kɔɔ́ ye, né jolo, nùà Jûf bɔ́ bɔ̀ kìn bècénè dèn bílí bèh. Béh gwò bɔ̀ kìn yílá bèh ndɔ. Dé mò, cieé fà hên Càŋ mè feh seér naâ kɔɔ́, ye mè a: té nuaré déì kurú yílá.
44010029	Bí yeé tema njiî, ye mè a, ndê, mè táŋ sɔ́ cú dé cî. Á, bí mè yilá naâ mé ŋgei wa?»
44010030	Kɔ̀rnê ye bú a: «Lé naá kaà faá cu kènê nɔ, lan baá cieé nèà, mè lé naâ Càŋ ká gwò mò dua den, sâ baá lou lɔ̀ŋ tagár. Mè yeé ke, nuaré déì baá toò mò njebá den. À né mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ wulésé mân yoòr.
44010031	Ye mè a: Kɔ̀rnê, Càŋ ŋgweé aá duaà yeè kèn, à ŋene aá gàm mé wò gam yeé bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ ndɔ. Lan à munó baá wò.
44010032	Kènê témá njí nùàr ké Jopê yoòr Simɔ̂ŋ, yilí seèn déì né cu Piêr, te bɔ́ yilá njiî bú ká yoòr yeè. À cer né ké gwò nuaré déì, yilí seèn né cu Simɔ̂ŋ ndɔ. Né nùà mé sa yeé par; gwà seèn né ké sòn nòmò koô mân.
44010033	Mè yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, mè tema njií baá-re, ye bɔ́ ndé yílá wèh wò ma. Wò waà baá ndɔ, wò bɔɔ́ huɔm aá dé gècên. Kènê béh dɔɔ́ŋ, béh baá gi ká toò Càŋ, te béh ŋgweé njií mé à nde né béh sònò yeè tueé keéh.»
44010034	Kɔ̀rnê yeé tueé gi aá mân, Piêr deên ye bú a: «Kènê mè kɔ baá ye né gècên, Càŋ nùàr lòù gèì bèh.
44010035	Sâ tueé né ye, nùà gècên mé né Càŋ dula, né mene lè lò dé heè dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi beè Càŋ dilí huɔɔ́m.
44010036	Tebé mé Càŋ lé tema njií naâ mé bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà, bí né gi kɔɔ́. Né Njàgà Bagaà, né béh dɔlê beè Yeésò Kristò haá keéh. Nùà Dueè felè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né lom bú.
44010037	«Njií mé lé bɔɔ́ giì naâ lè tàbè Judê dɔɔ́ŋ bí né gi kɔɔ́, lé duɔɔ́m naâ ké Galilê, sâ Jâŋ tueé gi aá bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr Càŋ kèn, à bɔ́ nòmò Càŋ kou gi aá ndɔ.
44010038	Gèh dé mé Càŋ lé fam njií naâ Cúcuí Ŋagâ felè Yeésò Nùà Najarêt, bí kɔ gi aá kèn. Yeésò lé naâ lò dɔɔ́ŋ beè yɔŋ sie, à né bagaà bɔɔ́ bele. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé baá giì ka Sátàn dɔɔ́ŋ, à né bɔ́ taré sɔm bele. Càŋ lé naâ mé bú, à lé naâ bú terreb haá, bí né gi ménâ kɔɔ́.
44010039	«Mè tueé bí, béh né sòn seèn; njií mé à lé bɔɔ́ naâ ké Jerusalem mé lè tàbè bɔ̀ Jûf mene dɔɔ́ŋ, béh lé naá giì mé njolo ŋené. Bɔ́ lé naâ bú te toû fagá wulá.
44010040	Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam. Yeé baá cieé tagár, à komo sɔm cuù bú lè cio, à ŋené sɔm keéh bú toò bɔ̀ nùàr.
44010041	Dèn cú toò nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ ndɔ, à bú ŋené sɔm keéh lom aá toò beèh. Lòù sam, à lé naá giì béh balé kwaá, ye béh né bɔ̀ sòn nyî. Béh bɔ́ yieé bilí cu, béh ŋueé cu bècénè faá bèh jomò nɔ.
44010042	«À béh hên temà naâ kɔɔ́, ye béh ndé ŋgòr nyî bèh dɔɔ́ŋ tueé, béh té càm, béh júée bɔ̀ nùàr a: Càŋ sie kwaá baá nyí nùà téná-juù felè bɔ̀ làŋ bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ komó mene ma.
44010043	Bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá giì felè seèn ménâ tueé ndɔ, ye nuaá mé né temé cén mé bú kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde né nùà sâ veên yoòr mé yilí seèn kulú sɔm ma.»
44010044	Piêr yeé baá sònò ménâ tueé, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ŋgòr seèn ŋgweé dɔɔ́ŋ, Cúcuí Ŋagâ ka suagà felè bɔɔ̀n.
44010045	Sâ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé njií lɔɔ̀ naâ Piêr né bɔ̀ Jûf, bɔ́ né gi doó. Bɔ́ yeé ŋene bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam kwa gi aá Cúcuí Ŋagâ ndɔ, geí yɔgɔ́ bɔ́ dé tueê.
44010046	Lòù sam, Càŋ lé naâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam doô leba bele seér. Bɔ̀ Jûf yeé ŋgweé, bɔ́ baá ju hihiné tueé, bɔ́ né terreb Càŋ mé njéh seén. Piêr yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à ye bɔ́ a:
44010047	«Kènê bɔ̀ nùàr hên Cúcuí Ŋagâ faá béh nɔ kwa gi aá kèn. Neì bɔ́ nòmò Càŋ koù yiín né kɔɔ́ wa?»
44010048	Jomo sâ ye, bɔ́ ndé kòù bɔ́ mé yilí Yeésò Kristò koù. Yeé gi aá, bɔ́ ye Piêr a, sâ kɔ bɔ́ bɔ́ cer weh teèn ndɔ.
44011001	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì ké Judê ŋgweé njií ndɔ, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam baá ŋgòr Càŋ gwaán.
44011002	Piêr yeé cu cuù aá ké Jerusalem, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ nde bú. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé naâ bɔ̀ Jûf.
44011003	Bɔ́ ye bú a: «Lé seèn bɔɔ́ naâ naàn mé wò nde ké lètenè bɔ̀ kurû, bí bɔ́ yieé bilí wa!»
44011004	Piêr se bele bɔ́ kwɔ̀m ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a:
44011005	«Sâ mè né ké Jopê Càŋ dua den, kulu mè faá vuú nɔ, mè ŋene tàmbàŋ njeré déì faá cɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ, baá ter segé suagâ, bɔ́ sie né bèh nèà te gou te gou. Yeé waà, njebá le.
44011006	Mè ke nyegé yí lè, né bɔ̀ nyam feh hihiné, mé bɔ̀ sàb bɔ́ bɔ̀ non.
44011007	Hueh déì né tueé ye mè a: Wùò ter Piêr, wúlá yíé bɔ́ wulà ma.
44011008	Mè ye bú a: Sam, Nùà Dueè! Mè gèh dé sâ yíé bèh, né yilísé, mè nde né mé njéh fulá.
44011009	Hueh doô tueé cu ké te vulúu, ye mè a: Té njií mé Càŋ ye né ŋagásé jìnè; té túé ye nyí nde né mé njéh fulá.
44011010	Yeé waà baá mbei tagár, cɔ̀gɔ̀ hèllè ŋaá yuo cu ké te vulúu.
44011011	«Sâ nùà tagár la baá mè tùtúlù gwà njebá den ndɔ, bɔ́ yuoó naâ ké Sesarê, bɔ́ tema njií naâ bɔ́ yoòr mò, bɔ́ ndeè mè yilá weh.
44011012	Cúcuí Ŋagâ tueé naâ kɔɔ́, ye mè a: Béh bɔ́ ndé beèh ndeè, té njeré déì mùnò ma. Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ténjén hên njií lɔ mè ndɔ. Béh bɔ́ wa ké teèn, béh yila nde gi gwò Kɔ̀rnê ndɔ.
44011013	À se bele béh dé mé cìlì Càŋ lé naâ bú gwò yilá kwa, ye bú a: Témá njí nùàr ké Jopê yoòr Simɔ̂ŋ, yilí seèn déì né cu Piêr, te bɔ́ yilá njiî bú ká yoòr yeè.
44011014	À tueé nde né wò ŋgòr mé nde né wò yili sɔm, te yili sɔm mé mbàgà yeè mene dɔɔ́ŋ ma.
44011015	«Mè yeé ŋgweé aá sònò Kɔ̀rnê ménâ, mè yila ŋgòr Càŋ tueê ndɔ. Tètèì sam Cúcuí Ŋagâ ka suagà felè bɔɔ̀n, faá lé ka suagà naâ felè beèh ké bèh duɔɔ̂m nɔ.
44011016	Mè munó kɔ cu baá-re dé mé Fehtoò beèh lé ye: Jâŋ lé bɔ̀ nùàr kou kwaá naâ mé nòmò; dé biì, bɔ́ bí kou seér nde né mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ.»
44011017	Piêr den cuù, ye bɔ́ a: «Mè yeé ŋene Càŋ bɔ́ Cúcuí seèn haá né mé temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh kwaá njiî faá à lé naâ béh haá nɔ, sâ mè né neì, mé nde né sòn Càŋ ŋgeén wa?»
44011018	Bɔ́ yeé ŋgweé aá mân, temé bɔɔ̀n die lè ndɔ, bɔ́ yila Càŋ seên, ye: «Càŋ haá taré baá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam terreb ndɔ, te bɔ́ kweéh seér temé, bɔ́ kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà.»
44011019	Bùnò mé lé yuoó naâ lè cu mé bɔ́ lé wulà naâ Etiên teèn hèllè lé naâ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bɔɔ́ ŋellé sɔm. Bɔ̀ déì dula nde Fenisî, bɔ̀ déì nde Sîpre, bɔ̀ déì nde ké Antiôs. Bɔ́ ŋgòr Càŋ tueé njií lom aá mé bɔ̀ Jûf.
44011020	Lè cu sâ ndɔ, bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ dé Sîpre mé bɔ̀ dé Sirên nde ké Antiôs, bɔ́ né mé bɔ̀ Greêk tueé njií ndɔ, bɔ́ né bɔ́ Njàgà Bagaà felè Yeésò Fehtoò beèh tueé.
44011021	Càŋ lé naâ be teèn mé terreb mene kwaá njií, nùàr ŋgún kweéh seér gi, bɔ́ kwaá njií temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh.
44011022	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Jerusalem yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ tema njií Bàrnàbâs ké Antiôs ndɔ.
44011023	À wa ké teèn, à ŋene gèh dé mé Càŋ né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ kulú, temé samé lom bú lè dé gècên, à toó nyegé cu bɔ́, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí dèn lòm beè Fehtoò beèh nɔɔ́ŋ, bí dèn táré tég.»
44011024	Sâ Bàrnàbâs toò naá giì nùà húɔ́m-temé ndɔ, temé seèn dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr Yeésò, Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bú yoòr ŋgulí faá cí nɔ. À né ŋgòr Càŋ se. Yeé baá ménâ, nùàr ŋgún sagá yila cu lè mɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀.
44011025	Jomo sâ Bàrnàbâs nde ké Târse, à nde Sɔ̂l fɔɔ́n.
44011026	À yeé ŋene aá bú, à weh njií bú ké Antiôs. Bɔ́ bú fà dɔɔ́ŋ cer ké teèn gùm nyèmà. Bɔ́ né seé te mbàgà Càŋe bɔɔ́, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún njèh feh bele. Bɔ̀ nùàr lé bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ Yeésò «bɔ̀ Kristò bɔ̀” yilá lɔgɔ́ naâ ké Antiôs sâ.
44011027	Cu sâ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ déì lé naâ ké Jerusalem yuo, bɔ́ nde ké Antiôs.
44011028	Yilí cén déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n lé naâ Àgàbùs. Cúcuí Ŋagâ kema bú, à wuo ter, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: «Cùè nde né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ die ma.» Cùè sâ lé naâ môn die ndɔ. Lé naâ te nàm mgbè Klôdè.
44011029	Àgàbùs yeé tueé aá ménâ, bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ bilí sòn lètenè bɔɔ̀n, ye njií mé nùà kàn né beè kwa keéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, há njiî, te bɔ́ gam njií bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé ké Judê mé njéh ma.
44011030	Bɔ́ lé naá giì ménâ bɔɔ́ ndɔ, bɔ́ tema keéh baá-re beè Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Sɔ̂l, bɔ́ nde bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ te mbàgà Càŋe ké Judê haá njií.
44012001	Lè cu sâ, mgbè Herôde yuo die bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì yoòr mé bùnò.
44012002	À wula sɔm Jâk bei Jâŋ mé bòù.
44012003	À yeé ke, né bɔ̀ Jûf yoòr huɔɔ́m ménâ, à sie cu Piêr. Lé naâ lè cu Páskà mé bɔ́ yieé yeé breêd, bɔ́ kulu teèn kwá ŋgwéh.
44012004	Herôde yeé sie aá bú ménâ, à yií bú lè gwà cibì, à weh kaŋ kwaá bú sɔ́jì bɔ̀ŋ nèà kwarè; bɔ̀ŋ cén sɔ́jì né teèn nèà. Bɔ́ né bú mɔɔ́m; ye mɔ Páskà kela baá, te nyí weh njií ye bú ké toò bɔ̀ nùàr.
44012005	Cu mé Piêr lé naâ ké gwà cibì sâ, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lé Càŋ dua loóm naâ mé terreb mene.
44012006	Cieé mé Herôde njií nde aá bú ké toò bɔ̀ nùàr yeé baá faá kwéh nɔ, cíbíteèn sâ, cìlì Fehtoò beèh kar waà ké mí yoòr seèn, ŋagá sie gwà beè. Sâ Piêr baá lɔ́m, à né lètenè bɔ̀ sɔ́jì fà cer den. Bɔ́ kaga né bú be lòù. Sâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé mɔm yeé gwà cibì né gi tùtúlù ndɔ. Cìlì Càŋ doô yeé waà baá, à kema Piêr kwar, à nyimé sɔm bú, ye bú a: «Wùò ter kwar.» Lɔ̀ŋ tené yuo bú be ndɔ.
44012008	Ye Piêr a: «Cóló njí kàndá yeè teneè, yí njí débágá gulè.» Piêr bɔɔ́ ménâ. Ye Piêr a: «Sù cɔ̀gɔ̀ dùlù yeè, béh nde, bèlè mè.»
44012009	Piêr ndaŋ bele bú, à kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye né dé gècên, ye merré déì vuú kulu né nyí kɔɔ́.
44012010	Bɔ́ kela keéh kɔ̀ŋ fà, mé bɔ̀ sɔ́jì né gi tùtúlù, bɔ́ wa lè hin déì, à sòn keéh njií né ké lɔ, né hin lɔ̀ŋ. Dé sâ komo weh ké toò bɔɔ̀n mé be seèn mbaá, bɔ́ yuo kela nde yí ceér dueè. Cìlì Càŋ kwaá lɔ bú ndɔ.
44012011	Njolo yeé ŋagá baá bú, à ye: «Kènê mè ŋene kɔ baá ye né bɔ̀n, Fehtoò beèh naâ cìlì seèn ká yoòr mò temá njiî, à bú tema njií naâ, te à ndeè mè beè Herôde se sɔm, te bɔ̀ Jûf kwè mò sén kwà cú.»
44012012	À yeé ŋgweé nyegé aá ménâ, à nde ké gwò Marî meì Jâŋ. Jâŋ sâ, yilí seèn déì né cu Mârk. Sâ, bɔ̀ nùàr né ké teèn ŋgún bilí den, bɔ́ né Càŋ dua.
44012013	Piêr waà, à gɔ hin ndɔ. Nùà seê dé vêh déì né teèn, yilí seèn né Rôdè, à nde yí tùtúlù gwà bèh hin guluù.
44012014	À yeé nde ŋgweé kèb cieè né hueh Piêr mân, vràb sela seér bú lòù, à lɔɔ̀ Piêr hin gulu keêh, à cu cu seér yí jomo bɔ̀ nùàr gwà dɔɔ́ŋ tueé wellê, ye bɔ́ a: «Piêr baá gè cie ma.»
44012015	Bɔ́ su bú sòn yoòr, bɔ́ ye bú a: «Wò né nùà kùlù wee!» À né teèn ŋgelá, ye bɔ́ a: «Né ka bú.» Bɔ́ den cuù, ye bú a: «Sâ né càŋ seèn.»
44012016	Cu sâ hin née ka gɔɔ́ den ye. Bɔ́ gulu hin ndɔ, bɔ́ ŋene né ka Piêr bɔ̀n, geí laré bɔ́ gwà dɔɔ́ŋ.
44012017	À me njií bɔ́ mé be, ye bɔ́ a, bí húné nɔɔ́ŋ. À se bɔ́ gèh dé mé Fehtoò beèh la naâ bú lè gwà cibì sɔm keéh. Jomo sâ, ye bɔ́ a, bɔ́ túé kéh Jâk mé bɔ̀ déì ménâ ma. À yuo kela ndɔ, à nde ser toò.
44012018	Cieé yeé ŋaga baá, bèmè tarê mân kɔ die lètenè bɔ̀ sɔ́jì, bɔ́ munó kuú njií mé Piêr la naâ ŋaá seér, bɔ́ kwà ŋgwéh.
44012019	Herôde ye, bɔ́ fɔ́n bú fɔɔ̀n. Bɔ́ fɔɔ́n kuú mene, bɔ́ bú kwà ŋgwéh ndɔ. À ye, bɔ́ bíé bɔ̀ sɔ́jì cécéné cécéné ma. À bie le mé bɔ́, ye wúlá bɔ́ wulà. Jomo sâ, à yuo ké Judê, à fɔɔ́n gò Sesarê ndɔ, à nde cer den ŋgɔgɔ́ ké sâ.
44012020	Herôde bar lom bɔ̀ Tîr bɔ̀, mé bɔ̀ Sídɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ dé ndùàn. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ kwaá sòn, bɔ́ nde sie gule nuaá mé ke yeé gwà cèrrè Herôde. Yilí nùà sâ né Blasta. Bɔ́ ye te bɔ́ bɔ́ nde ké yoòr Herôde, bɔ́ dua bú dɔlê lètenè bɔɔ̀n bɔ́bɔ̂ ma. Lòù sam, yáb bɔɔ̀n yuo yeé te tàbè seèn.
44012021	Cieé mé bɔ́ lé sie kwaá naâ sâ yeé waà baá, Herôde su cɔ̀gɔ̀ mgbè seèn, à ŋaá den te kɔgɔ, à yila bɔ́ ndeè, à nde bɔ́ faá nùà koô nde yeé nɔ.
44012022	Bɔ́ bɔm bú ye: «Dé hên hueh nùàr sam cuú, né hueh Càŋ.»
44012023	Tètèì sam, cìlì Càŋ Dueè suagà ter, si bú ŋgwagán, sòn mé à la meé naâ Càŋ doô, à kuú ndɔ.
44012024	Ŋgòr Càŋ dé seén kɔ lom né bèh dɔɔ́ŋ yaám ndeê.
44012025	Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Sɔ̂l yeé bɔɔ́ sɔm aá seé bɔɔ̀n ké Jerusalem, bɔ́ fɔɔ́n gò, bɔ́ cu cu jomo, bɔ́ weh sie Jâŋ mé bɔ́ yilá cu né Mârk beè.
44013001	Bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ fèh-njèh bɔ̀ lé naâ lè bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Antiôs teèn. Lé naâ bɔ̀ Bàrnàbâs mé Simeɔ̂ŋ; bɔ́ bú yilá né Nùà Yilî. Lùsiûs nùà Sirên lé naâ teèn ndɔ, bɔ̂ Manahên. Dé seèn, bɔ̂ mgbè Herôde lé kulà naâ bècénè. Sɔ̂l lé naâ teèn ndɔ.
44013002	Cieé déì, bɔ́ yeé baá Càŋ dua, bɔ́ né yáb jolo, Cúcuí Ŋagâ ye bɔ́ a: «Bí sɔ̀m kwá Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Sɔ̂l hiín, mè né bɔ́ mé seé déì yilá.»
44013003	Bɔ́ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ jolo cu yáb, bɔ́ dua Càŋ, bɔ́ ba bɔ́ be felè, bɔ́ yi njií bɔ́.
44013004	Cúcuí Ŋagâ yeé tema njií aá Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Sɔ̂l ménâ, bɔ́ nde baá-re ké Selusî. Bɔ́ weh sie Jáŋ-Mârk jomò, te à nde gam bɔ́. Bɔ́ wa ké teèn, bɔ́ yila bàtô, bɔ́ nde lè tàbè Sîpre; tàbè sâ tena le né yí lètenè nòmò. Bɔ́ wa lè lɔɔ́ déì, yilí seèn né Sàlàmínà, bɔ́ yila ŋgòr Càŋ te gwà sóù bɔ̀ Jûf seè.
44013006	Jomo sâ bɔ́ kela keéh lɔɔ́ sâ, bɔ́ yuo kela ké Pafôs. Bɔ́ wa teèn, bɔ́ kwa nùà táhunò déì, yilí seèn né Bar-Yeésò, né nùà Jûf, à né bɔ̀ nùàr bele den, wa nyí né sòn-Càŋ.
44013007	Dene seèn lé naá loôm kwarè ŋgɔ́mnà Serjíù Polûs. Ŋgɔ́mnà sâ lé naâ mé feh teèn. À yeé ŋgweé aá njàgà Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Sɔ̂l, à yilá njiî bɔ́ ká toò seèn bèh ŋgòr Càŋ ŋgweê ndɔ.
44013008	Nùà táhunò hèllè, yilí seèn lè ju lɔɔ̂ bɔɔ̀n né Elímà, à yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à furú kuú mé sà, à né kèkènè déì bɔɔ́, te ŋgɔ́mnà temé te ŋgòr Càŋe kwá njí cú.
44013009	Sâ Sɔ̂l mé yilí déì né cu Pɔ̂l, lé naâ mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ yoòr, à yila nùà doô njolò ke njegeè,
44013010	ye bú a: «Mè jue né wò ŋunà Sátàn, wò bɔ̀ nùàr bele wula gi né kɔɔ́, nùà bùnò bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ né wò, nùàr veên. Wò nde né mé bɔ̀ njèh Fehtoò beèh ménâ bɔɔ́ gobó ndeé den wa?
44013011	Mè tueé wò, kènê Fehtoò beèh nde né wò lobo cugó sɔm, wò njolo loù ŋéné ndé cú, kɔ ndeè baá cu déì.» Njolo Elímà nyimé yuo ndɔ. À duɔɔ̂m lòù bobô, à né nùàr fɔɔ́n te derré bú be.
44013012	Ŋgɔ́mnà yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à kwaá njií temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh. Lòù sam, njií mé bɔ́ la naá giì bú mé yilí Fehtoò beèh tueé dɔɔ́ŋ naâ bú hiím yɔgɔ́.
44013013	Pɔ̂l bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbaábɔn yila cu bàtô, bɔ́ yuo Pafôs, bɔ́ nde ké Pêrgè te tàbè Pamfilî. Bɔ́ wa ké teèn, Jáŋ-Mârk si lɔ bɔ́ ké sâ, à cu cu dé seèn ké Jerusalem.
44013014	Bɔ́ yuo cu Pêrgè, bɔ́ nde Antiôs lè tàbè Pisidî. Yeé baá mé cieé sóù, bɔ́ yila nde ké gwà sóù, bɔ́ den nde doó nɔɔ́ŋ.
44013015	Bɔ̀ nùàr né mvù sóú Músì jaŋé, bɔ́ né dé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ jaŋé. Bɔ́ yeé jaŋé weh aá, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ gwà sóù bie njií, ye bɔ̀ Pɔ̂l a: «Beè biì njèh tueê né teèn wa, bí gàm bɔ̀ nùàr mé njéh teèn, te yo taré bɔ́ tarè.»
44013016	Pɔ̂l komo wuo ter ndɔ, à fɔ njií be ter, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀, mé bɔ̀ dùlà-Càŋ bɔ̀ déì dɔɔ́ŋ, bí ndɔ̀gɔ̀ tie.
44013017	Béh bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, Tele beèh Càŋ lé naâ bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ beèh balé sɔm, à bɔɔ́ yam bɔ́ ké Ejíptò, sâ bɔ́ ké sâ né kìn. Nde nde, à sɔm cu bɔ́ ké teèn mé be terrèb seèn.
44013018	Mé njéh mene, à nde yolo sɔɔ́ bɔ́ ké ya dueè nyèmà yulà nèà.
44013019	«Jomo sâ à kum sɔm ndugo téhbeh te tàbè Kanahân felè bɔɔ̀n, te bɔ́ cer keéh.
44013020	Bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naâ nyèmà yuií nèà mé yulà tîn bɔɔ́, te jomo sâ à sie sɔm ye bɔ́ bɔ̀ téná-juù bɔ̀ teèn. Bɔ́ bɔɔ́ nde den ka mé njéh ménâ, tɔ́g nde yuo kela lè nàm Samuel sòn-Càŋ.
44013021	«Yeé wa baá te nàm Samuel, bɔ́ ye Càŋ a, há sér bɔ́ mgbè. Càŋ haá bɔ́ Sàwúlù ŋunà Kîs ndɔ; né bɔ̀ gèh Benjamên. Sàwúlù bɔɔ́ te kɔgɔ nyèmà yulà nèà.
44013022	Càŋ yeé sɔm si njií aá bú doó, à haá keéh cu kɔgɔ mé Davîd. À tueé kwaá bɔ̀ nùàr dene Davîd tieè ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a: Nyí ŋene Davîd ŋunà Jésè né nyí yoòr yilá, à nde né sòn nyî ŋgweé ma.»
44013023	Pɔ̂l den cuù, ye bɔ́ a: «Mè tueé bí, ndùté ndùtù Davîd déì né Yeésò. Càŋ lé naâ bú Nùà dueè bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ sie kwaá, te à yili sɔm bɔ́. Né faá à lé naá giì bɔ́ tueé kwaá nɔ.
44013024	Mé Yeésò ndeè waà, sâ Jâŋ baá bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà dɔɔ́ŋ tueé ye bɔ́ a, kwéh sér temé kweèh, te bɔ́ weh nòmò Càŋ ma.
44013025	Jâŋ yeé nde aá seé bɔɔ́ gií, à ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: Bí ye nyí né neì wa? Nyí tueé bí, nyí nuaá mé bí né kela den doô sam. À dé seèn baá jomo nyî ndeê, à né nyí mé terreb yɔgɔ́. Nyí wúlú ŋgwéh nuaá mé nde né bú débágá gulè sɔm.»
44013026	Pɔ̂l yeé tueé sɔm aá dé sâ, à den cuù ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, né mene bí bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm, né mene bí bɔ̀ dùlà-Càŋ bɔ̀ déì, bɔ́ ŋgòr hên tema njií kuú né felè beèh dɔɔ́ŋ, te yili sɔm béh.
44013027	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ Jerusalem bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n mene lé ndègè Yeésò ŋéné kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh. Mé cieé sóù dé kàn bɔ́ né mene felè seèn lè mvù bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ jaŋé, dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè bɔɔ̀n ndúg. Mé njéh mene, bɔ́ yeé sií njií aá bú ju yoòr, mboón ye faá bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ lé naá giì tueé nɔ.
44013028	Bɔ́ mene bú mé kwɔ̀m cioò yoòr ŋéné ŋgwéh, bɔ́ ye Pilátò a, wúlá lòm bú wulà.
44013029	Bɔ̀ njií mé ŋgòr Càŋ tueé gi né felè seèn yeé mboón gi aá, bɔ́ mvualé sɔm ye bú te toú fagâ, bɔ́ nde jɔgɔ furu sɔm bú ndɔ.
44013030	Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam, à yeé kuú aá, Càŋ komo sɔm cu bú lè cio.
44013031	À bɔɔ́ cu ká lè wɔ́ŋe cieé kɔ́beè, à dé sâ ŋené yuo kela lom aá njolò bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ seèn. Bɔ̀ sòn seèn kènê né bɔ́. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé yuoó naâ Galilê kɔɔ́, bɔ́ njií lɔ bú ké Jerusalem.
44013032	«Béh hên nde kuú naâ bí Njàgà Bagaà sâ tueé ndɔ. Béh tueé bí, ndéb mé Càŋ lé tueé lɔɔ̀ naâ mé bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ beèh dɔɔ́ŋ
44013033	kènê mboón aá ká lètenè beèh, béh bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù bɔɔ̀n. Càŋ lé naâ Yeésò te cio komo sɔm cu, faá bɔ́ lé nyagá kwaá naâ lè mvù bene Davîd kɔ̀b fà nɔ, ye: Wò né Huaán mò, lan mè baá Tele yeè.»
44013034	Pɔ̂l den cuù ye bɔ́ a: «Càŋ lé ye, nyí nde né bú dé seèn te cio komo sɔm, te à dé seèn tàbè ŋá cú. À lé naá giì ménâ tueé ye: Njií mé nyí lé naá mé Davîd tueé kwaá, nyí nde né bí mé njéh kulú ŋagá nyegé.
44013035	Davîd beré déì tueé cu né ménâ ndɔ, ye: Wò ndeè yeè gwàn ndé ŋgwéh dé nùàr yeè fɔ le dòù.
44013036	Á sâ, Davîd lé bɔɔ́ naá kaà te nàm dé seèn sâ faá Càŋ gwaán nê ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, à kuú, bɔ́ furu yií bú lè sà mé bɔ́ lé furú naâ bɔ̀ tele seèn léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ teèn, à ŋa dé seèn tàbè.
44013037	Dé nuaá mé Càŋ lé naâ lè cio komo sɔm, môn sam, à lé dé seèn lòù fɔ̀ ná ŋgwêh.
44013038	«Sâ bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ bí veên yoòr kulu sɔm lom nde né mé yilí nùà bú sâ. Né Yeésò.
44013039	Bí kɔ́ cú kɔɔ̀ ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ yili yuo nde né mé bú, dèn ŋgwéh mé sóú Músì. Lòù sam, sóú Músì dé seèn nùàr yìlì kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.
44013040	Sâ bí bɔ̀ŋ feh biì. Mɔ sam, njií mé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ lé naâ toò nyagá kwaá doô nde né bí kwa; bɔ́ lé ye:
44013041	Ménâ, bí kè fàŋ dèn mé njolo, bí bɔ̀ sèb-nùàr bɔ̀. Bú a, hím lɔ́ bí lòù, bí ŋéllé yùò ŋellè ndɔ! Te cafanê nyí Càŋ bɔɔ́ mboón seé nyî, seé mé bɔ́ sé tueé kuú mene bí, bí sé biì gwàn ná ŋgwêh doô.»
44013042	Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs tueé gi ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé baá cie yuo kelá, bɔ̀ gwà-sóù bɔ̀ bɔŋ bɔ́, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí cú cû mé sóú dé toò hên, te bí tueé ferré cu béh.»
44013043	Jomo bilî sâ, bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ŋa né Jûf lòù kókoó mbaá bele gi Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs. Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs né bɔ̀ nùàr tueé nyegé, te bɔ́ kuú nde den mé fùgò beè Càŋ tetoò.
44013044	Sóú sâ yeé waà baá, nùàr lɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ kem waà ndɔ, bɔ́ bilí ndeè ŋgòr Càŋ ŋgweé.
44013045	Bɔ̀ Jûf yeé nde ŋene njií cìlì nùàr ménâ, sà ŋaâ bɔ́ lè. Bɔ́ duɔɔ́m bɔ̀ njèh sònò Pɔ̂l tueé vurú beleè, bɔ́ né bú selé.
44013046	Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs né lom tég te ŋgòr Càŋe njebá taré, bɔ́ ye bɔ̀ Jûf a: «Njua mé béh lé ŋgòr Càŋ duɔɔ́m naâ ká lètenè biì, te bí ŋgweé lɔgɔ̂ kɔɔ́. Mɔ bí né lòù berɔ́ŋ seér, ye bí yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà beè Càŋ gwàn ŋgwéh, wa bí wúlú ŋgwéh, sâ béh mé njéh nde ser nde aá yoòr bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam,
44013047	te den faá Nùà Dueè naá giì béh tueé nɔ, à lé ye: Nyí lé naâ wò toò bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam sie kwaá, te wò den faá ŋagâ nɔ, wò ŋagá nde mé njéh bèh dɔɔ́ŋ, te bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ yili yuo.»
44013048	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, bɔ́ samé ŋellé doó dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh seén. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lé naâ dé yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà balé kwaá dɔɔ́ŋ kwaá njií gi temé mé Yeésò.
44013049	Ŋgòr Càŋ né ka yaám ndeé. Nde nde, laré sie lò sâ beè dɔɔ́ŋ.
44013050	Bɔ̀ Jûf yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ soób bɔ̀ dùlà-Càŋ bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ véh dé kokoô, mé bɔ̀ njonjolo bɔ̀ lɔ sâ, te bɔ́ bunó Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs. Bɔ́ kwɔgɔ sɔm bɔ́ te tàbè sâ ndɔ.
44013051	Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs yeé baá mé gò, bɔ́ karé sɔm fùfú gulè, bɔ́ fulú njií bɔ́ yoòr, bɔ́ fɔɔ́n gò Ikoniûm.
44013052	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ le ké Antiôs ndɔ. Sâ bɔ́ baá gi mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ yoòr ŋgulí den, temé lé naâ bɔ́ mé gècên mene vɔgɔ́.
44014001	Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs wa ké Ikoniûm, bɔ́ yila nde lè gwà sóù bɔ̀ Jûf, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr Càŋ tueé. Bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam kókoó mbaá kwaá njií gi temé yoòr Yeésò.
44014002	Bɔ̀ dúágá-tie bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ suií njií bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam yoòr Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs.
44014003	Yeé baá ménâ, Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs cer ŋeí seér cu ké Ikoniûm lòù, bɔ́ né te ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh tég njebá taré, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, Càŋ bɔ̀ nùàr yili sɔm yeé dé lòù. Fehtoò beèh lé naâ bɔ́ terreb haá, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ fém mé cìè teèn bɔɔ́ yií, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ mé njéh ye né ŋgòr gècên.
44014004	Yeé baá ménâ, lɔɔ́ ker fà: bɔ̀ déì bele bɔ̀ Jûf, bɔ̀ déì jomo bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê.
44014005	Jomo sâ, bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam bɔ́ bɔ̀ mgbè bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ kaga taáb, te bɔ́ nde Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs tɔbé wulá.
44014006	Bɔ́ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ dula leér nde ser te tàbè Likonî, lè lɔɔ́ Lîstrè mé Dérbè. Bɔ́ né kè kèbè ndeé bele,
44014007	bɔ́ se Njàgà Bagaà teèn.
44014008	Ké Lîstrè sâ, nuaré déì lé naâ teèn, gule né kuú, à lé mé njéh yuoó naâ lè, à gò gɔ̀ ŋgúŋgwéh.
44014009	Nùà hèllè yeé ŋene Pɔ̂l baá njèh tueé, à felá njií tie teèn. Pɔ̂l né ka bú njolò ke njege den, à ŋene kɔ ye, nùà hên né temé te ŋgòr nyî kwaá njií te taré sɔm bú.
44014010	À tueé njií mé bú ndɔ, ye bú a: «Kòmò wùò ter, njébá mé gule yeè!» Nùà hèllè lɔ wuo ter kwar, gɔ keéh lom dé gɔɔ̀.
44014011	Te bɔ̀ nùàr yeé nde ŋene njií mé Pɔ̂l bɔɔ́ naâ sâ, bɔ́ si gɔ̀gɔ̀ mé ju lɔɔ̂ bɔɔ̀n Likonî, bɔ́ ye: «Né bɔ̀ càŋ ŋa né nùàr kɔɔ́, bɔ́ suagà ká yoòr beèh.»
44014012	Bɔ́ yilá kwaá bɔ́ yilí bɔ̀ càŋ bɔɔ̀n yoòr. Dé Bàrnàbâs, bɔ́ yilá bú Jeûs; bɔ́ yilá Pɔ̂l Hermês, ye nùà njèh tueê né bú.
44014013	Ŋgàŋ Jeûs lé naâ teèn ndɔ. À yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à sie ndeè mé bɔ̀ tela nàgà mé njèh yàgà yoòr, à waà mé njéh ké tùtúlù bɔ̀gɔ̀ bâŋ, ye te bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr ŋɔb haá Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Pɔ̂l njèh sèmè. Sâ mɔ̀ Jeûs hèllè né ké jomo lɔɔ̂ mân.
44014014	Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Pɔ̂l yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, temé yulá bɔ́ mé njéh, bɔ́ sie ŋaré bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ ŋar nde ké lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr, bɔ́ né ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a:
44014015	«Bí béh mân bɔɔ́ né dé keì wa? Ŋgweéh béh né gi bɔ̀ nùàr faá bí nɔ wa? Béh ndeè naâ bí Njàgà Bagaà tueé, ye bí kwéh sér temé, bí sɔm be yoòr bɔ̀ cècàŋ mân, bí dua seér Càŋ dueè. À dé seèn né làŋ, vulú bɔ̂ tàbè lɔ sií naâ bú; nòmò mé bɔ̀ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ si giì naâ bú ndɔ.
44014016	Léí toò, à lé bɔ̀ nùàr mé gèh hihiné kwaá lɔɔ̀ naâ mé feh bɔɔ̀n, gèh dé kàn né càŋ seèn dua.
44014017	Mé njéh mene, à né béh feh den, ye nyí né teèn: nyí béh bagaà bɔɔ́ den né kɔɔ́ ma. À né bí nu yi keêh, yab né yaám, dé kàn mé cu seèn, dé kân mé cu seèn, yab né bí beè merré den, bí né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene samé, bí ménâ ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh wa?»
44014018	Pɔ̂l né mene ménâ tueé, njií ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, há lòm bɔ́ sèmè haà. Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs nde bɔ́ lege yiín weéh baá lòù.
44014019	Jomo sâ, bɔ̀ Jûf kem yuoô ké Antiôs mé Ikoniûm, bɔ́ waà doó sâ, bɔ́ tueé seér maŋgo, bɔ̀ nùàr gwaán seér cu ŋgòr bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ tɔbé si Pɔ̂l doó, bɔ́ tulu si njií bú ké jomo bâŋ, ye merré déì kuú baá kèn.
44014020	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yuo bele jomo ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé baá ké kwarè seèn kaáŋ den, à komo wuo ter, à yila nde cu ké lètenè lɔɔ̂. Cieé ŋaga, bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs fɔɔ́n gò, bɔ́ nde ké Dérbè.
44014021	Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs wa ké Dérbè, bɔ́ yila cu Njàgà Bagaà seè. Bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá ŋa gi bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ ké doó sâ. Jomo sâ, bɔ̀ Pɔ̂l cu cu ké Lîstrè, bɔ́ cu cu ké Ikoniûm, mé Antiôs dé Pisidî,
44014022	bɔ́ né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yo bɔɔ́ taré, bɔ́ né bɔ́ toó nyegé, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí dèn lòm te ŋgòr Càŋe tég; gèr né teèn. Béh gèr ŋene nde né feh hihiné, te béh nde ye Lò Càŋ yilá.»
44014023	Bɔ́ wa mene te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé kàn, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr teèn balé kwaá, te bɔ́ den bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀; bɔ́ bɔ́ jolo weh yáb, bɔ́ né Càŋ felè bɔɔ̀n dua, te bɔ́ kwaá lɔ bɔ́ beè Càŋ. Bɔ́ ndèm kwaá lom mé bú.
44014024	Bɔ́ lé naâ te lɔɔ́ hihiné te tàbè Pisidî kelá bele, bɔ́ yuo kela te tàbè Pamfilî. Bɔ́ yeé wa baá ké teèn,
44014025	bɔ́ duɔɔ́m cu ŋgòr Càŋ ké Pêrgè tueê. Jomo sâ, bɔ́ nde ké Atalî.
44014026	Bɔ́ yila cu bàtô doó sâ, bɔ́ nde Antiôs. Sâ né bèh mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lé naâ bɔ́ teèn nyeén, bɔ́ kwaá lɔ bɔ́ beè Càŋ, Nùà húɔ́m-temê, te bɔ́ nde bèh seé seèn mé né kènê mboón hên.
44014027	Bɔ́ yeé wa baá ké Antiôs, bɔ́ yilá bilí cu bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, bɔ́ se bɔ́ njií mé Càŋ lé naâ beè bɔɔ̀n bɔɔ́ keéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ se bɔ́ gèh dé mé à lé naâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ceér gulu keéh ndɔ, bɔ́ ye bɔ́ a, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam lé naâ temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií ma.
44014028	Bɔ́ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ cer yií cu ké sâ kɔ́beè.
44015001	Bɔ̀ nuaré déì yuoô ké Judê, bɔ́ waà ké Antiôs, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ njèh feh, ye bɔ́ a: «Mɔ bí ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh, faá sóú Músì tueé nê nɔ, bí yìlì yùò ndé ŋgwéh.»
44015002	Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs yeé nde ŋgweé njií ménâ, bɔ́ bɔm bɔ́, bɔ́ bɔ́ kwaá njií saân tarê mân doó felè ŋgòr sâ. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ kaga ndòn ye, Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs mé bɔ̀ mbeí déì nde né ké Jerusalem yoòr bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ŋaá ndeé ma, te bɔ́ nde nyegé ju sâ.
44015003	Bɔ́ sɔm njií bɔ́ ndɔ. Bɔ́ né te tàbè Fenisî mé Samarî kelá, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr saán gɔ, ye bɔ́ a, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam kènê baá ceér Càŋ bele ma. Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, nɔré lom bɔ́ yoòr dé gècên.
44015004	Bɔ́ wa Jerusalem. Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ vra weh bɔ́ ndɔ. Jomo sâ, bɔ̀ Pɔ̂l se bele bɔ́ bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lé naâ mé bɔ́ bɔɔ́ keéh dɔɔ́ŋ.
44015005	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì lètenè bɔ̀ Farisiên yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ komo wuo seér cu ter, bɔ́ ye: Ndɔ́g, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, kɔ bɔ́ ŋɔb bɔ́ ŋgór ŋɔɔ̀b, bɔ́ taga cu bɔ́ sóú Músì ndɔ.
44015006	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ bilí, te bɔ́ taáŋ nyegé ŋgòr sâ.
44015007	Bɔ́ yeé baá saán taré, Piêr komo wuo ter, ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, Càŋ lé naâ mè ká lètenè biì balé sɔm, baá dàb ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, à lé ye te mè nde bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam Njàgà Bagaà nyî se, te bɔ́ kwaá njií temé teèn.
44015008	Càŋ mé né temé nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ ŋené laré lé béh Cúcuí Ŋagâ temá njií naâ kɔɔ́, à lé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam Cúcuí Ŋagâ cén sâ tema njií naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Sâ ye nyí né bɔ́ gwaán faá nyí gwaán né béh nɔ.
44015009	À gwèn lètenè beèh mé bɔ́ kwá nyì ŋgwéh. À bɔ́ temé bɔɔ́ ŋagá lom né mé temé yoòr seèn kwaá njiî.
44015010	Mɔ né mân, bí né Càŋ teèn me ke, wanɔɔ́ŋ bí bɔ̀ nùàr seèn seé felè mbiín kwaá né dé keì? Ŋgweéh né seé mé lé naâ bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ yɔgɔ́, lé naâ béh ménâ yɔgɔ́ ndɔ wa? Mɔ né mân, béh mé bɔ̀ déì mbin haá seér né dé keì wa?
44015011	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, Yeésò Fehtoò beèh lé béh yili sɔɔ́m naâ dé lòù. À bɔ́ yili sɔm né kèì cén ménâ ndɔ.»
44015012	Piêr tueé sɔm. Sâ bɔ̀ nùàr né lom nɔɔ́ŋ huné den. Jomo sâ bɔ́ ŋgweé Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Pɔ̂l baá tueé ndɔ. Bɔ́ tueé bele bɔ́ bɔ̀ fém bɔ́ bɔ̀ cìè mé Càŋ lé naâ beè bɔɔ̀n lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam bɔɔ́ keéh.
44015013	Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Pɔ̂l yeé tueé gi aá ménâ, Jâk komo wuo ter, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: «Bí ŋgwé, bɔ̀ nùàr mò.
44015014	Simɔ̂ŋ hên debbé kuú né felè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, ye Càŋ lé duɔɔ́m naâ bɔ́ kwɔmê, ye te bɔ́ den bɔ̀ nùàr nyî, sâ bɔ̀ŋ beèh duɔɔ́m née lòù ye.
44015015	Ŋgòr bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ die yila cu né ka teèn ménâ nág ndɔ, né lè mvù nyagá den ye:
44015016	Né mè Càŋ Dueè. Gwà Davîd mé lé naâ die, mè nde cu né bú ter komo sie kwaá, mvùr seèn nde cu né yilá gií, mè bɔɔ́ nyegé bú,
44015017	te bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù seèn ŋene ménâ, bɔ́ fɔɔ́n ceér mò. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé mè né lò nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ yilá, nde gi né ceér mò Càŋ Dueè fɔɔ́n ndɔ.
44015018	Né Càŋ Dueè mân tueé né kɔɔ́, à lé naá giì bɔ̀ nùàr tueé, baá dàb ndɔ.»
44015019	Jâk den cuù ye bɔ́ a: «Mɔ né beè mò, béh té bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam mbaá kì cú, bɔ́ kweéh seér gi aá temé kèn.
44015020	Béh bɔ́ nyàgà tágá njí lòm bɔ̀ njèh dé cècàŋ, bɔ́ té yàgà yɔ̀ŋ ndɔ, núɔ́gɔ́ nyaàm mé bɔ́ naâ lòù nei wulá, bɔ́ té yíé. Né mene húɔ́m dé heè, bɔ́ té sònò nágá njí.
44015021	Lòù sam, dàb baá teèn mé bɔ́ né bɔ̀ sóú dé jomò lè gwà sóù dé kàn feh sɔɔ́, bɔ́ né lè gwà sóù dé kân mé cieé sóù dɔɔ́ŋ jaŋé ndɔ.»
44015022	Yeé gi aá, bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ kaga ndòn, ye bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ nuaré déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n sɔm, bɔ́ kwaá bɔ́ jomo Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs, bɔ́ tema njií bɔ́ ké Antiôs ma. Bɔ́ balé weh baá-re Jûde, yilí seèn déì né cu Barsabâs, bɔ́ balé weh Silâs ndɔ. Bɔ́ fà dɔɔ́ŋ né gi bɔ̀ njonjolo bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ mbeî.
44015023	Bɔ́ nyagá haá bɔ́ mvù beè, bɔ́ ye: «Bɔ̀ mbeí beèh, béh bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ mbeí biì dɔɔ́ŋ né bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam bieé. Bí né mene ké Antiôs, né mene ké Sirî, né mene ké Silisî dɔɔ́ŋ, béh né bí bieé.
44015024	«Béh lé naâ ŋgweé ye, bɔ̀ nuaré déì lé naâ kán yuo, bɔ́ nde bí feh ter ŋellé kwaá sé wa? Bí té mùnò ye béh lé temà naâ bɔ́ kɔɔ́.
44015025	Béh né seér ká lètenè beèh bilí taáŋ nyegé, te béh balé tema njií bí bɔ̀ nuaré déì teèn, te bɔ́ njií lɔ bɔ̀ mbeí beèh Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Pɔ̂l.
44015026	Béh tueé bí, Bàrnàbâs bɔ̂ Pɔ̂l lé naâ cio lè seé Yeésò Kristò liím.
44015027	Béh bɔ̀ tebé bɔ̀ sâ balé sɔm né Jûde bɔ̂ Silâs. Mvù mé béh nyagá né hên, bɔ́ nde né mé sòn bɔɔ̀n tueé ndɔ.
44015028	Béh bɔ̀ Cúcuí Ŋagâ naâ ndòn kaga, ye bɔ́ té bí seé déì felè mbaá mbín kwá, béh tágá lòm bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né teèn yilá hên:
44015029	Bí té sèmè dé cècàŋ yíé, bí té húɔ́m sònò nágá kéh, núɔ́gɔ́ nyaàm mé bɔ́ naâ lòù nei wulá, bí té yíé, bí té yàgà yɔ̀ŋ ndɔ. Mɔ bí né bɔ̀ njèh hên jolo, bí nde né bagasé den. Sâ bí dèn bá-re.»
44015030	Bɔ́ yeé nyagá sɔm aá, bɔ̀ tebé bɔ̀ fɔɔ́n gò Antiôs ndɔ. Bɔ́ wa ké teèn, bɔ́ yilá bilí bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ haá bɔ́ mvù hèllè,
44015031	bɔ́ jaŋé baá-re toò bɔ̀ nùàr. Bɔ̀ nùàr yeé ŋgweé aá, temé vɔgɔ́ bɔ́ lè, yo taré cu bɔ́ ndɔ.
44015032	Sâ Jûde bɔ̂ Silâs fà dɔɔ́ŋ toò naá giì bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀. Bɔ́ yila cu teèn tètèì tueé den, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr toó nyegé, bɔ́ né bɔ́ yo bɔɔ́ taré.
44015033	Bɔ́ bɔ́ cer weh ké doó sâ teèn. Jomo sâ bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr bie gò, bɔ́ yuo, te bɔ́ cu cu ké yoòr bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé temà naâ bɔ̂. [
44015034	Te Silâs nde ye tueé, ye nyí nde né ké sâ den le.]
44015035	Sâ Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Bàrnàbâs né yeé ké Antiôs sâ ndɔ, bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí déì kókoó mbaá né bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh feh, bɔ́ né bɔ́ se.
44015036	Nde nde, Pɔ̂l ye Bàrnàbâs a: «Ndê, béh nde bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yɔŋ ke, kɔ ŋgweéh bèh mé béh lé naâ mé ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh te lɔɔ́ hihiné tueé kelá dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né gi taré wa?»
44015037	Bàrnàbâs ye te bɔ́ weh sie Jâŋ, mé bɔ́ yilá cu né Mârk beè.
44015038	Pɔ̂l berɔ́ŋ ye bú a: «À lé naâ béh ké Pamfilî si lɔɔ́, ye nyí bèh seê déì ndé cú.»
44015039	Teèn sâ tɔgɔ kɔ die lètenè bɔɔ̀n, bɔgɔ́ ŋaá ter, bɔ́ geé le doó sâ. Bàrnàbâs weh Mârk, bɔ́ bú yila bàtô, bɔ́ nde ké Sîpre.
44015040	Pɔ̂l balé weh dé seèn Silâs. Bɔ́ bú yeé baá mé gò, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dua Càŋ felè bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ kwaá lɔ bɔ́ beè Fehtoò beèh, te à gam bɔ́ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn.
44015041	Bɔ́ yuo ndɔ, bɔ́ nde yɔŋ laré tàbè Sirî mé Silisî mene, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bèh dɔɔ́ŋ yo bɔɔ́ taré bele.
44016001	Pɔ̂l wa ké Dérbè, à nde ké Lîstrè ndɔ. Sâ mbɔ̀ŋ déì lé naâ ké sâ teèn, yilí seèn né Timotê. Meí seèn né Jûf mé gwaán né ceér Yeésò. Tele dé seèn né nùà Greêk.
44016002	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Lîstrè mé Ikoniûm mene né gi dene seèn keí.
44016003	Yeé baá ménâ, Pɔ̂l ye nyí nde né bú jomo nyî weh sie; à weh bú ndɔ, à nde ŋɔb bú ŋgór. Lé naâ felè bɔ̀ Jûf. Sâ bɔ̀ Jûf te tàbè sâ né gi kɔɔ́ ye, tele Timotê né nùà Greêk.
44016004	Jomo sâ bɔ́ yuo, bɔ́ nde te lɔɔ́ hihinê kelá bele. Ndéb mé bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lé naâ ké Jerusalem sagá doô, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò tagá bele.
44016005	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ né cu terreb te ceér Càŋe kwa ŋeí; cieé dɔɔ́ŋ nùàr kɔ lom baá-re te mbeî sagá yilâ.
44016006	Cúcuí Ŋagâ yiín bɔ́ ŋgòr Càŋ lè tàbè Asíà tueê. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ kela keéh tàbè Frijî mé Galatî,
44016007	bɔ́ wa ké kwarè Misî, ye te bɔ́ yuo kela Bitinî. Lɔ́ŋ sam, Cúcuí Yeésò yiín cu bɔ́.
44016008	Bɔ́ kela keéh Misî, bɔ́ suaga nde ké Troâs.
44016009	Yeé baá cíbíteèn, kulu Pɔ̂l faá vuú nɔ; à ŋene nùà Masedínà déì waà baá, né ter njebá den, ye bú a: «Kúkùr yeè, ŋá kélâ yeè ká Masedínà yoòr beèh, te wò gam béh teèn!»
44016010	Vuú yeé kulu aá Pɔ̂l mân, béh yila ceér Masedínà fɔɔ̂n ndɔ. Sâ béh naâ mé njéh kɔɔ́ gií, ye Càŋ béh yilá njií né ké sâ, te béh nde Njàgà Bagaà ké lètenè bɔɔ̀n se.
44016011	Jomo sâ, béh yila bàtô, béh yuo Troâs, béh lemé nde Samoterâ; tàbè sâ né yí lètenè nòmò mân. Cieé ŋaga béh fɔɔ́n cu gò, béh nde Nìàpòlî.
44016012	Béh yuo cu sâ, béh nde Filîp; lè tàbè Masedínà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgɔ́mnà lé den lɔgɔ́ naâ teèn. Kɔ̀b tàbè sâ né dé seèn beè bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀. Béh cer yií lɔ sâ kɔ́beè.
44016013	Mé cieé sóù, béh yuo ká lɔ, béh nde ké sòn nòmò, ye merré déì béh kwa nde né bèh mé bɔ̀ Jûf dua yeé Càŋ teèn ké sâ. Béh wa ké teèn, béh den nde doó, béh bɔ̀ véh mé lé bilí deén naâ ké sâ né sòn tueé den.
44016014	Ma déì naâ lètenè bɔɔ̀n teèn, yilí seèn né Lídià; à lé yuoó naâ Tiatîr, à né yeé cɔ̀gɔ̀ nyàgàm go. Ma bú séná né nùà dùlà-Càŋ. Béh yeé baá tueé, Fehtoò beèh gulu lɔgɔ́ bú temé te à felá njií tie teèn.
44016015	Jomo sâ bɔ́ kou bú nòmò Càŋ mé mbàgà seèn mene ndɔ. À ye béh a: «Ŋgweéh bí né kɔɔ́ ye, mè baá nùà Fehtoò beèh mà. Sâ bí ndê cèr wèh ké lɔ mò teèn.» À yeé baá béh ménâ ŋeí, béh bɔ́ nde ndɔ.
44016016	Cieé déì béh lé naâ bèh Càŋ duaà ndeé, béh bɔ̀ huaán vêh déì kwaré ceér dueè. À lé naâ mé tándulu yoòr. Mɔ baá bú ŋaâ, bɔ̀ njií mé nde né bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, à né yeé cie tueé kwaá, à né kàgàlɔ̀ŋ teèn kókoó mbaá kwa, à né bɔ̀ tele seê seèn haá.
44016017	À yeé ŋene aá béh, à yuo bele béh, à né ké ter yie njií, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: «Bɔ̀ nùà hên dé bɔɔ̀n bɔɔ́ né seé dé Càŋ terrèb. Bɔ́ ndeè naâ bí ceér feh keéh, te bí yili yuo mé njéh.»
44016018	À yie sɔɔ́ méménâ cieé kókoó mbaá. Yeé yɔgɔ́ baá, temé ŋaâ Pɔ̂l mé càŋ tándulu yoòr huaán doô, à bele seér, ye bú a: «Mé yilí Yeésò Kristò, yùò kélâ yoòr huaán hên, mè tueé wò!» Tándulu hèllè yuo kela lè sòn seèn nɔɔ́ŋ ménâ ndɔ.
44016019	Bɔ̀ tele seê huaán doô yeé ŋene ye ceér kàgàlɔ̀ŋ bɔɔ̀n beè huaán doô surí baá kèn, bɔ́ sie mgbɔmé njií Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs ké cie yoòr bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ dé lɔɔ̂.
44016020	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ weh njií ser cu bɔ́ ké toò bɔ̀ dé ŋgɔ́mnà, bɔ́ ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ̀ fà bɔ̀ hên né lɔɔ́ beéh. Bɔ́ né Jûf,
44016021	béh né bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀; bɔ́ béh feh seér né sóú bɔɔ̀n, ye béh bele cí. Ŋgweéh beè beèh né jolo mà.»
44016022	Te bɔ̀ nùàr yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, bɔ́ jeré ŋellé doó dɔɔ́ŋ. Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ sie ŋaré sɔm Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs cɔ̀gɔ̀ yoòr, ye te bɔ̀ nùàr tegé nyegé ye bɔ́ núr.
44016023	Bɔ́ yeé duún aá bɔ́ ménâ, bɔ́ nde si yií bɔ́ gwà cibì, bɔ́ taga lɔ kè-nùàr ndɔ.
44016024	Te kè-nùàr yeé ŋgweé njií ménâ, à nde weh ferá kwaá bɔ́ ké lè kɔ̀ŋ dé ké jomò, à yií bɔ́ fɔ̀gɔ̀ gulè ndɔ.
44016025	Yeé baá lɔgɔ̀teèn, sâ Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs né Càŋ dua, bɔ́ né bú mé bené seén njií. Sâ bɔ̀ gwà cibì bɔ̀ né ŋgweé ndɔ.
44016026	Bɔ́ yeé ŋgweé, tàbè baá jilí taré, né gwà cibì hèllè mé maàŋ mene teèn jilí keéh. Bɔ̀ hin né mé be bɔɔ̀n komó ndeé, fɔ̀gɔ̀ né bɔ̀ gwà cibì bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ gulè koló yuo gií, né doó sue ndeé.
44016027	Kè-nùàr nyimé yuoô, sâ bɔ̀ hin gwà cibì dɔɔ́ŋ baá gi lelɔŋ. Feh ŋellé bú ter, ye merré déì bɔ̀ gwà cibì bɔ̀ durá yuo gi aá. À sua bòù, ye te nyí nde aá yo nyî sieé wulá.
44016028	Pɔ̂l pam njií ké ter, ye bú a: «Té feh yeè mbaá wúlá kú, béh né gi hên dɔɔ́ŋ ye!»
44016029	Kè-nùàr bie we ndɔ, à mɔgɔ dula yila nde ké gwà cibì, à ndelé cemmé nde doó gulè Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs mé veéh mene.
44016030	Jomo sâ à sɔm keéh bɔ́, ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mò, mè bɔɔ́ nde né naàn, te mè yili yuo wa?»
44016031	Bɔ́ ye bú a: «Kwá njí lòm temé mé Yeésò Fehtoò beèh, wò nde né yili yuo, mé mbàgà yeè mene.»
44016032	Bɔ́ tueé kwaá bú mé mbàgà seèn mene ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh ndɔ.
44016033	Cíbítenè doó sâ kè-nùàr weh bɔ́, à nde bɔ́ nyer yaga nyegé. Bɔ́ kou sɔm bɔ́ nòmò Càŋ gwà dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
44016034	À ŋaá kwaá njií bɔ́ ké gwò seèn, à haá bɔ́ yáb. Yo nɔré bú mé mbàgà seèn mene. Lòù sam, à lé naá loôm mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé, ye nyí temé kwaá njií aá yoòr Càŋ.
44016035	Cieé yeé ŋaga baá, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ dé ŋgɔ́mnà tema njií ye kè-nùàr a, yì njí bɔ̀ nùà sâ ma.
44016036	Kè-nùàr nde ké yoòr Pɔ̂l, ye bú a: «Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ tema njií naâ ye, yì njí bí yiì. Sâ bí ndé bá-re baga.»
44016037	Pɔ̂l deên ndɔ, ye bɔ̀ tebé bɔ̀ a: «Béh né bɔ̀ huaán Rɔ̂m; bɔ́ lé ju felè beèh túé ná ŋgwêh, bɔ́ ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, kɔ́ lòm béh núr duûn, bɔ́ ndé béh ká gwà cibì yií njií. Lé naâ njolò bɔ̀ nùàr. Yeé baá dé sɔɔ̀m, te bɔ́ sɔm leér béh lòù wa? Ndɔ́g ndɔ. Mɔ né ménâ, sâ bɔ́ ndê yì ká béh mé be bɔɔ̀n.»
44016038	Bɔ̀ tebé bɔ̀ nde cu bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ménâ tueé. Bɔ́ yeé nde ŋgweé njií ye Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs né bɔ̀ huaán Rɔ̂m mân, veéh bɔɔ́ bɔ́ njèh.
44016039	Bɔ́ nde bɔ́ be kobó. Jomo sâ, bɔ́ sɔm bɔ́ gwà cibì, bɔ́ ye bɔ́ a: «Kúkùr, bí yùò lɔ hên yuoò.»
44016040	Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs yeé yuo kelà baá gwà cibì, bɔ́ nde ké gwò Lídià. Bɔ́ yeé ŋene aá bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, bɔ́ toó nyegé cu bɔ́, jomo sâ bɔ́ fɔɔ́n gò ndɔ.
44017001	Bɔ́ kela keéh Amfipolî mé Àpòlònî, bɔ́ wa ké Tesalonîk. Ké sâ gwà sóù bɔ̀ Jûf né teèn.
44017002	Yeé baá mé cieé sóù, Pɔ̂l yila nde cu teèn, faá à né yeé mé bɔ̀ gwà sóù déì bɔɔ́ nɔ. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr né felè ŋgòr Càŋ tueé kuú. À bɔɔ́ ké teèn sɔ́ndè tagár.
44017003	À né bɔ́ se, ye bɔ́ a: «Lé naá giì tueé ye, Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ sé naá kaà gèr ŋené, te à nde ye lè cio komo yuo. Sâ jue né Yeésò mé mè né bí se hên, Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ né bú.»
44017004	Bɔ̀ déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n kwaá njií temé teèn, bɔ́ yuo bele Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs. Bɔ̀ dùlà-Càŋ bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ Greêk, mé bɔ̀ véh dé kokoô ŋgún mbaá bɔɔ́ gi ménâ ndɔ.
44017005	Bɔ̀ Jûf yeé ŋene aá ménâ, sà ŋgwa ŋaá cuù bɔ́ lè, bɔ́ nde bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ ceceér domó fɔɔ́n, te bɔ́ nde kɔ si bèmè lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr. Lɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ jilí gi. Bɔ́ ŋar wa ké gwò Jásɔ̀ŋ, te bɔ́ sie njií Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs ké cie toò bɔ̀ nùàr.
44017006	Bɔ́ wa ké teèn, bɔ́ Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs kwà ŋgwéh, bɔ́ sie le mé Jásɔ̀ŋ bɔ́ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì, bɔ́ tulu nde mé bɔ́ ké toò bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀, bɔ́ né sònò bɔm ye: «Wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ beéh gi né bɔ̀ nùàr hên, bɔ́ mé njéh ká lètenè beèh waà kèn!
44017007	Jásɔ̀ŋ bɔ́ ké gwò seèn weh kwaá né dé keì wa? Bɔ́ bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi bɔ̀ táré-feh bɔ̀, bɔ́ sóú Mgbè Rɔ̂m dùlà cú, bɔ́ ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, mgbè dueè déì né teèn, wa yilí seèn né Yeésò sé wa!»
44017008	Bɔ̀ nùàr bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, bɔ́ cer gi seé.
44017009	Bɔ́ ye Jásɔ̀ŋ bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbaábɔn a: «Kɔ bí gwɔ̀m sòn sâ lòù.» Bɔ́ yeé gwɔm aá, bɔ́ yi ye bɔ́ ndɔ.
44017010	Cibí yeé yili baá, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ sɔm njií ser Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silâs ké Bèrê. Bɔ́ yeé wa baá ké teèn, bɔ́ yila cu gwà sóù bɔ̀ Jûf.
44017011	Bɔ̀ Jûf dé sâ lé huɔm kelà naâ kɔɔ́ mé bɔ̀ dé ké Tesalonîk. Ŋgòr Càŋ mé Pɔ̂l lé naâ bɔ́ tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lé naâ tie teèn felá njií, bɔ́ né mvù Càŋ cieé dɔɔ́ŋ ke sɔɔ́, te bɔ́ ŋene, njií mé Pɔ̂l né tueé doô kɔ ŋgweéh né teèn yilá wa?
44017012	Bɔ́ yeé ŋene nyegé aá, bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá kwaá njií gi temé teèn ndɔ. Lètenè bɔ̀ Greêk, bɔ̀ véh dé kokoô mé bɔ̀ siíb ŋgún mbaá kwaá njií gi temé lè ŋgòr Càŋe.
44017013	Bɔ̀ Jûf dé ké Tesalonîk ŋgweé njií cu, ye Pɔ̂l né ŋgòr Càŋ ké Bèrê tueé, bɔ́ kem fulu nde ké teèn, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr soób, bɔ̀ nùàr duɔɔ́m furû.
44017014	Doó sâ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ sɔm Pɔ̂l ndɔ, bɔ́ lemé njií bú ké sòn nòmò koô. Silâs bɔ̂ Timotê den le dé bɔɔ̀n ké Bèrê.
44017015	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé njií lɔɔ̀ naâ Pɔ̂l wa ké Àtên, bɔ́ kwaá lɔ bú teèn, bɔ́ cu cu ké Bèrê, te bɔ́ tueé cu Silâs bɔ̂ Timotê tebé Pɔ̂l, ye bɔ́ a: «Pɔ̂l ye, júée bí a, bí yùò bèlè nyí, bí té ŋgágá sɔ́ ma.»
44017016	Pɔ̂l yeé wa baá ké Àtên, à kela den Silâs bɔ̂ Timotê ké teèn. À ŋene bɔ̀ Àtên bɔ̀ né càŋ gènnè hihiné dua, mɔ̀ né lom lɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ merré ndeé. Pɔ̂l yieé kuú cu mé nyie.
44017017	Yeé baá ménâ, à nde ké gwà sóù bɔ̀ Jûf. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ dùlà-Càŋ bɔ̀ déì né njèh tueé. Cieé dɔɔ́ŋ à né ké mbartɔgɔ lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr ndeé, bɔ́ bɔ́ né njèh tueé ndɔ.
44017018	Bɔ̀ nùà-tòù bɔ̀ déì lé naâ teèn; bɔ̀ déì lé naâ bɔ̀ Èpìkuriên, bɔ̀ déì Sitoyisiên. Bɔ́ yeé baá njèh sònò Pɔ̂l ŋgweé, bɔ̀ déì ye, à sâ tueé cugó den né kei wa? Bɔ̀ déì tueé seér ye, den né faá à tueé den né felè bɔ̀ càŋ dé hiîn nɔ. Sâ Pɔ̂l lé tueé deén naâ felè Yeésò, mé lé naâ lè cio komo yuo.
44017019	Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ weh njií bú ké te mɔ̀gɔ̀. Yilí mɔ̀gɔ̀ sâ né Areopáje, bɔ́ ye bú a: «Njèh feê mé wò né feh doô yuoô he wa?
44017020	Béh sònò yeè ŋgweé né njèh kèkènè. Béh gwaán né ŋgweé nyegê.»
44017021	Sâ bɔ̀ Àtên bɔ̀ bɔ́ bɔ̀ kìn mé né lètenè bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ né yeé doó sâ sɔɔ́, bɔ́ kɔ lom njèh fefeê lètenè bɔɔ̀n tueé kuû.
44017022	Yeé baá ménâ, Pɔ̂l komo wuo ter ké lètenè Areopáje ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a: «Mè né ŋené ye, mé gècên mene bí bɔ̀ Àtên bɔ̀ né mé temé bɔ̀ càŋ duaà lè.
44017023	Mè naâ lɔɔ́ biì beè yɔŋ sie, mè naâ bɔ̀ mɔ̀ càŋ biì hihinê ŋené. Mè nde kwa mɔ̀ déì teèn, à dé seèn née lòù ye. Bɔ́ teèn nyagá kwaá né ye: Càŋ dé hên, béh née bú dé seèn kɔ́ ŋgwéeh ye. Bí ŋgwé-re! Njií mé bí né bú mbaá dua den, mé bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh sâ, mè tétég hên ndeè naâ bí felè seèn tueé nyegé.
44017024	Càŋ bú sâ lé wɔ́ŋ sií naâ kɔɔ́, bɔ̀ njèh teèn dɔɔ́ŋ lé si giì naâ bú. Né Nùà Dueè, à vulú bɔ̂ tàbè bɔɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́. Mɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ nùàr me né mé be, à dé seèn teèn cèr bèh.
44017025	À túé ŋgwéh ye nuaré déì a, há nyí njeré déì, à bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ koó seér né kɔɔ́. À bɔ́ yɔ̀ŋ mé cúcuí mé njèh dɔɔ́ŋ haá gi né kɔɔ́.
44017026	«À lé bɔɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́, te gèh nùà cên nde ye wɔ́ŋ beè yaám sie, à bɔ́ kerré kwaá bele mé lò hihiné, nàm hihiné ndɔ.
44017027	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te bɔ́ fɔɔ́n ceér nyî fɔɔ̀n; ye merré déì bɔ́ nde né nyí beré déì bobó kwa. Bɔ́ né kàn mé kán bobó ndeé, sâ Càŋ nùà njèh né gi kwarè beèh ndɔ.
44017028	«Mè tueé bí, den né faá bɔ̀ gɔ-njɔŋ lètenè biì lé naá giì tueé nɔ, bɔ́ lé ye: béh yɔŋ né mé bú, béh yieé yili né mé bú, béh den né mé bú. Bɔ́ lé naá cuù tueé ye, béh né bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ ndɔ.
44017029	«Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, hên mɔ béh kɔ gi aá mân kèn, ye béh né bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn, sâ béh munó seér den né kei, ye kɔ Càŋ sé la den seér cu faá ŋgùlàmúr nɔ wa? Sâ tueé né ye, nùàr den cuù nde né mé lo seèn nùà njèh, à bɔré cu toú, à me lɔ̀ŋ, à gɔré taá, te ŋa Càŋ terrèb wa? Bɔ̀ nùàr bɔɔ́ yeé ménâ.
44017030	Mé njéh mene, Càŋ dé sâ táŋ cú, à tueé seér né ye, sâ dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ lé ndugó seér naâ lòù. Kènê à né mé nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ tueé njií ye bɔ́ a, kwéh sér temé kweèh.
44017031	Lòù sam, Càŋ cieé ju tenâ ter sie kwaá gi aá kèn; nde né felè wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ̂ŋ. Nùà gècên ju sâ tena nde né kɔɔ́. À tena yií nde né teèn. Càŋ lé naá giì nùà sâ balé kwaá, à lé naâ nùà sâ te cio komo sɔm, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ teèn.»
44017032	Bɔ̀ nùàr yeé nde ŋgweé njií dé mé Pɔ̂l ye: nùàr lé naâ lè cio komo yuo mân, bɔ̀ déì tɔbé bú séb; bɔ̀ déì ye bú a: «Béh nde cu née ŋgòr hên sònò yeè cieé déì ŋgweé nyegé ye.»
44017033	Yeé baá mân, Pɔ̂l kwaá lɔ bɔ́ ndɔ.
44017034	Sâ bɔ̀ déì ŋgòr seèn gwaán gi aá kèn, bɔ́ yuo bele bú. Ké lètenè bɔɔ̀n sâ lé naâ Denîs, nùà Areopáje, mé ma déì, yilí seèn né Damarîs, bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbaábɔn.
44018001	Jomo sâ, Pɔ̂l yuo ké Àtên ndɔ, à nde ké Kɔrênt.
44018002	Wa ké teèn, à kwa nùà Jûf déì, yilí seèn né Akilâ, né bɔ̀ huaán lɔɔ́ Pɔ̂ŋ. Bɔ̂ veèh seèn Prisîl lé yuoô lè lɔɔ́ Rɔ̂m lè tàbè Italî, bɔ́ waà née ké Kɔrênt waà ye. Lòù sam, mgbè Klôdè lé ye bɔ̀ Jûf a, yùò gí ká Rɔ̂m dɔɔ́ŋ yuoò. Pɔ̂l ye wa baá, à yila kwa bɔ́.
44018003	Sâ bɔ̂ Akilâ né mé seé cên ndɔ. Seé bɔɔ̀n né gi gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀ saâ. Pɔ̂l den baá-re ké lɔ bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ bú né gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀ saá.
44018004	Mé cieé sóù dé kàn, Pɔ̂l né ké gwà sóù bɔ̀ Jûf ndeé, à né ŋgòr Càŋ teèn tueé, à né bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ Greêk teèn dɔr kwa keéh.
44018005	Jomo sâ Silâs bɔ̂ Timotê mé lé naâ ké Masedínà waà ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé waà baá, Pɔ̂l kɔ lom aá dé seèn ŋgòr Càŋ tueê, à né bɔ̀ Jûf tueé yɔŋ, ye bɔ́ a: «Yeésò né Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ.»
44018006	Bɔ̀ Jûf berɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ kem sue bú yoòr mé séb. À yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à ka cɔ̀gɔ̀ seèn, te fùfú lɔɔ́ bɔɔ̀n mvugo cu cu yoòr bɔɔ̀n; à ye bɔ́ a: «Mɔ bí leér le mene, né beè biì; bɔ́ mé mè bíé ndé cú. Kènê, mè nde seér nde aá yoòr bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, mè feh bɔ́.»
44018007	À fɔɔ́n gò ndɔ, à nde ké lɔ nùà dùlà-Càŋ déì, yilí seèn né Títiùs Jústùs. Gwà seèn né kwarè gwà sóù hèllè.
44018008	Sâ Krispûs, nùà koô gwà sóù sâ dé seèn Fehtoò beèh gwaán gi aá kèn; bú mé mbàgà seèn mene. Bɔ̀ Kɔrênt bɔ̀ kókoó mbaá lé naâ ŋgòr Pɔ̂l ŋgweé, bɔ́ kwaá njií temé teèn ndɔ. Bɔ́ weh nòmò Càŋ.
44018009	Cíbíteèn déì, kulu Pɔ̂l faá vuú nɔ, Fehtoò beèh ye bú a: «Té vèh, kɔ́ lòm tueê, té húné.
44018010	Mè né teèn; nuaré déì wò be veên yoòr kèmà njí ndé ŋgwéh. Bɔ̀ nùàr mò né lɔ hên ŋgún.»
44018011	Pɔ̂l bɔɔ́ ké Kɔrênt gùm nyèmà mé kwèh ndɔ, à né ŋgòr Càŋ tueé.
44018012	Cu mé Gàliɔ̂ŋ, nùà Rɔ̂m, lé naâ ŋgɔ́mnà te tàbè Akayî, bɔ̀ Jûf lé naâ Pɔ̂l ké te mbàgà juù bilí sie njií.
44018013	Bɔ́ wa, bɔ́ ye: «Nùà hên né bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́r, te bɔ́ dua seér Càŋ faá sóú beèh né yiín nɔ.»
44018014	Pɔ̂l yeé nde aá sòn komo, Gàliɔ̂ŋ ye bɔ̀ Jûf a: «Hên, mɔ sé né-re ŋgòr dùkàŋ déì, mè sé naá-re sòn biì ŋgweé.
44018015	Á, gèh bɔ̀ saân dé mbembaâ hên seèn né felè bɔ̀ ŋgòr, mé bɔ̀ yilí nùàr, mé bɔ̀ sóú biì. Ŋgweéh dé sâ né ju biì wa? Mè teèn sam.»
44018016	À sɔm keéh bɔ́ cie.
44018017	Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ ŋar sie Sostên nùà koô ké gwà sóù bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ duún lɔ bú núr ké cie sâ; Gàliɔ̂ŋ sòn teèn yí ŋgwéh ménâ ndɔ.
44018018	Pɔ̂l cer yií cu ké Kɔrênt kɔ́beè. Jomo sâ, à kwaá lɔ bɔ̀ mbaábɔn, à yila bàtô, te à nde Sirî. Lé naâ bɔ́ bɔ̀ Prisîl mé Akilâ. Bɔ́ yeé baá mé gò, à bele sɔm feh ké Sênkrè, te à jolo tou.
44018019	Jomo sâ bɔ́ fɔɔ́n gò Efêse ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé baá ké sâ, Pɔ̂l kwaá lɔ Akilâ bɔ̂ Prisîl, à nde dé seèn ké gwà sóù, bɔ́ bɔ̀ Jûf yila njèh teèn tueê ndɔ.
44018020	Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ bɔŋ bú, te bɔ́ bɔ́ cer weh teèn. Pɔ̂l berɔ́ŋ,
44018021	ye bɔ́ a, mɔ Càŋ gwaán aá, nyí ndeè né cuû ma. Bɔ́ bɔ́ bie. À yila cu bàtô ké Efêse sâ, à fɔɔ́n gò.
44018022	À nde doó suaga ké Sesarê, à nde cu ké Jerusalem bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bie weh, te à nde cu ké Antiôs.
44018023	À cer weh ké Antiôs sâ teèn, te à yuo cu ye ké sâ, à nde cu lè tàbè Galatî mé Frijî, à né cu bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ yo bɔɔ́ taré.
44018024	Nùà Jûf déì lé waà naâ ké Efêse, yilí seèn né Apɔlɔ̂s. À né bɔ̀ huaán Alesandrî. Nùà hèllè lé naâ njèh sònò tueé ŋgulí, à né mvù Càŋ kɔɔ́ nyegé ndɔ.
44018025	Bɔ́ lé naâ bú ceér Fehtoò beèh Yeésò feh. À teèn tegé yila lom mé feh mene, à né bɔ̀ déì jéjég ménâ feh keéh. Njèh cén, à lé kɔ loóm naâ nòmò Càŋ dé Jâŋ.
44018026	À yeé wa baá, à yila keéh lom njèh te gwà sóù feèh, à njeré déì vèh ŋgwéh. Prisîl bɔ̂ Akilâ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ weh njií bú ké jomo, bɔ́ se nyegé bú ceér Càŋ.
44018027	Jomo sâ à ye, nyí nde né te tàbè Akayî ndeé. Bɔ̀ mbeí yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ gwaán, bɔ́ nyagá haá bú mvù beè te bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ te tàbè Akayî ŋene ménâ, bɔ́ sie nyegé bú. À yeé baá ké teèn, Càŋ bɔɔ́ bú baga ndɔ, à gam lom bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé tueê sam.
44018028	Bɔ̀ Jûf sòn toò seèn túé kwà cú. À né bɔ́ cie toò bɔ̀ nùàr tueé sɔm, ye bɔ́ né feh sabé; à né bɔ́ te mvù Càŋe lemé njií, te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ teèn, ye Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ né Yeésò.
44019001	Te cu mé Apɔlɔ̂s né ké Kɔrênt sâ, Pɔ̂l lé naâ dé seèn te bɔ̀ lò tòre ŋaá kelá bele, à suaga nde ké Efêse. Wa ké teèn, à kwa bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ déì,
44019002	ye bɔ́ a: «Cu mé bí lé naâ temé mé Càŋ kwaá njií, bí lé naâ Cúcuí Ŋagâ kwa wa?» Bɔ́ ye bú a: «Ndɔ́g, nuaré déì béh túé ŋgúŋgwéh ye Cúcuí Ŋagâ né teèn.»
44019003	Pɔ̂l ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ́ lé bí koú naâ mé nòmò Càŋ dé heè wa?» Bɔ́ ye bú a: «Lé naâ mé nòmò Càŋ dé Jâŋ.»
44019004	Pɔ̂l ye bɔ́ a: «Jâŋ lé bɔ̀ nùàr kou belé naâ, te feh keéh ye bɔ́ kweéh seér aá temé. À lé naá giì bɔ́ tueé ye bɔ́ a, nuaré déì baá jomo nyî ndeê, bɔ́ kwá njí temé yoòr seèn ma. À lé sâ jueè naâ Yeésò.»
44019005	Bɔ́ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ weh nòmò Càŋ mé yilí Yeésò ndɔ.
44019006	Pɔ̂l ba bɔ́ be felè, Cúcuí Ŋagâ waà felè bɔɔ̀n, kema bɔ́, bele seér bɔ́ leba, bɔ́ né ju bɔ̀ nùàr hihiné tueé, bɔ́ né sòn-Càŋ tueé bele ndɔ.
44019007	Bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ lé waà naâ yulà cùɔ̀b fà.
44019008	Pɔ̂l bɔɔ́ ké doó sâ weéh tagár, à né ŋgòr te gwà sóù tueé, à njeré déì vèh ŋgwéh, à né bɔ́ felè Lò Càŋ tueé, à né ceér fɔɔ́n, ye te nyí dɔr keéh bɔ̀ nùàr teèn.
44019009	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ nuaré déì lé naâ berɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ duagá seér cu tie lòù, bɔ́ né ceér Fehtoò beèh toò bɔ̀ nùàr tueé beéh. Pɔ̂l yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à weh bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ, bɔ́ bɔ́ yuo nde ser lè gwà jaŋendè Tiranûs, à né ŋgòr Càŋ teèn cieé dɔɔ́ŋ feh den.
44019010	Bɔ́ bɔɔ́ teèn nyèmà fà. Bɔ́ yeé bɔɔ́ baá ménâ, bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam te tàbè Asíà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgweé laré gi ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh.
44019011	Càŋ lé naâ bɔ̀ kèkènè fêm beè Pɔ̂l bɔɔ́ keéh.
44019012	Bɔ̀ nùàr né bɔ̀ fùlù cɔ̀gɔ̀ beè seèn mé yoòr seèn weh bele, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ beên bɔ̀ mé njéh kemá bele, bɔ́ né taré yuo, bɔ̀ tándulu né bɔ́ yoòr durá yuo bele ndɔ.
44019013	Bɔ̀ Jûf mé né yeé teter yɔŋ gɔ lé naâ doó sâ teèn, bɔ́ né yeé tándulu kwɔgɔ́ ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ yegé weh yilí Yeésò Fehtoò beèh, bɔ́ nde tándulu mé njéh kwɔgɔ́ ndɔ. Dé kàn ye bɔ̀ tándulu a: Yeésò mé Pɔ̂l né tueé doô, nyí wò kwɔgɔ né mé yilí seèn ma.
44019014	Sâ lètenè bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀, bɔ̀ huaán déì naâ teèn téhbeh. Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ ŋunà ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô déì. Yilí ŋgàŋ sèmè sâ né Seévà. Bɔ́ né yeé ménâ bɔɔ́ taré ndɔ.
44019015	Bɔ́ yeé baá ménâ bɔɔ́, tándulu ye bɔ́ a: «Mè né Yeésò kɔɔ́, mè né Pɔ̂l kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Á, dé biì nɔ? Bí né bɔ̀ neì wa?»
44019016	Nùà mé tándulu yoòr hèllè toró ŋgumó yila bɔ́ yoòr ndɔ, à né bɔ́ téhbeh dɔɔ́ŋ taré yɔgɔ́, à né bɔ́ nu, bɔ́ né cie luŋturu mé nyer yoyoòr durá yuo kelá.
44019017	Bɔ̀ Efêse bɔ̀ mé né Jûf mé bɔ̀ Greêk mene dɔɔ́ŋ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, veéh yila bɔ́ lè, bɔ́ yila yilí Yeésò Fehtoò beèh seên.
44019018	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé baá temé mé Yeésò kwaá njií, né ká toò Pɔ̂l kem ndeê, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ veên bɔɔ̀n cie tueé sɔm.
44019019	Bɔ̀ táhuno bɔ̀ kókoó mbaá domó wa giì mé bɔ̀ mvù táhunò bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ né toò bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgie sɔm. Mɔ bɔ́ sé naâ kàgàlɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ mvù sâ dɔɔ́ŋ mberé, sé lé naâ kám yulà tîn waá.
44019020	Yeé baá ménâ, ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh sɔm keéh terreb seèn cie; né lom tetoò yaám ndeé.
44019021	Jomo bɔ̀ njèh sâ, Pɔ̂l kaga ndòn, ye nyí nde né ké Masedínà mé Akayî kelá, te nyí nde cu ké Jerusalem. Ye, mɔ nyí baá ké sâ, kɔ nyí wa Rɔ̂m ndɔ.
44019022	Yeé baá ménâ, à tema keéh bɔ̀ gàm bɔ̀ toò fà, lé naâ Timotê bɔ̂ Herástà, ye bɔ́ a, bí ndé ké Masedínà ma. À dé seèn le ŋgɔgɔ̂ lè tàbè Asíà.
44019023	Cu sâ bèmè tarê lé naâ kɔ die, lé naâ felè ceér Fehtoò beèh.
44019024	Yìè lé naâ mé nùà lè déì, yilí seèn né Dèmeteriyû. Sâ ké Efêse mɔ̀ cècàŋ déì lé naâ teèn. Yilí cècàŋ hèllè né Aretémì. Dèmeteriyû né yeé mɔ̀ sâ mé lɔ̀ŋ si seér, à nde go, bɔ́ bɔ̀ seê bɔ̀ seèn kwa nòmò teèn.
44019025	Ŋgòr Càŋ yeé baá tetoò yaám ndeé, à yilá bilí bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ seèn, mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ́ bɔ́ né mé seé cên ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a: «Belà, bí né kɔɔ́ ye, béh yieé yeé mé seé hên, béh ŋueé mé njéh.
44019026	Ŋgweéh bí né Pɔ̂l ŋené wa? À né cie tueé sɔm, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, bɔ̀ càŋ mé bɔ́ bɔɔ́ né mé be dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ gècên déì sam. À né ménâ tueé, à né bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́r weh. Kènê bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá yuo bele gi aá bú. Ká Efêse hên gí lòm cú, nde aá mé tàbè Asíà mene dɔɔ́ŋ beè laré sie.
44019027	Nde né seé beèh nyimé sɔm. Mɔ̀ Aretémì, càŋ beèh dé koô, nde né mé njéh calé yuo, te bɔ̀ nùàr ke njií terreb seèn faá njèh mbaâ nɔ. Bí ŋéné ŋgwéh ye bɔ̀ Asíà bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ dua gi né bú wa?»
44019028	Te bɔ̀ nùàr yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, temé ŋaâ bɔ́ lè doó dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ sɔm gi hueh ye: «Hê ceè, Aretémì bɔ̀ Efêse bɔ̀ kela né kɔɔ́.»
44019029	Lɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ salé gi mé njéh. Bɔ́ sie kwa bɔ̀ mbeí seê Pɔ̂l déì fà. Né bɔ̀ Masedínà bɔ̀. Yilí bɔɔ̀n né Gayûs bɔ̂ Aristârk. Bɔ́ mgbɔmé nde mé bɔ́ ké gwà sɔ̀ŋ.
44019030	Pɔ̂l yeé nde aá teèn ndeé, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yiín bú.
44019031	Bɔ̀ mbeí seèn mé né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ dé ŋgɔ́mnà lè tàbè Asíà, tema njií ye bú a, kúkùr seèn, à té ké gwà sɔ̀ŋ ndé ma.
44019032	Ké gwò bèmè lé dé tueê ná cû. Dé kàn né tueé, dé kân né tueé. Nùà ŋgún né lom mbaá ŋgaré njií, bɔ́ kwɔ̀m juù hèllè kɔ́ ŋgwéh.
44019033	Bɔ̀ nuaré déì yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ se Alesándà dɔ̀gɔ̀tì. Sâ bɔ̀ Jûf lé bú toò lu keéh naâ kɔɔ́. Alesándà yeé ŋgweé nyegé aá dɔ̀gɔ̀tì, à me njií bɔ̀ nùàr mé be ndɔ, ye te nyí se bɔ́.
44019034	Bɔ̀ nùàr yeé nde ŋene kɔ ye, à né nùà Jûf mân, bɔ́ bɔm njií cu ké ter mé sòn cên ye: «Hê ceè! Aretémì bɔ̀ Efêse bɔ̀ kela né kɔɔ́!» Bɔ́ mé njéh tum nde den ka tɔ́g gùm yɔ̀ŋ loù fà, bɔ́ né tum den.
44019035	Jomo sâ te nuaá mé nyagá yeé njèh lɔ sâ bɔɔ́ cemé ye bɔ́, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí bɔ̀ Efêse bɔ̀! Mɔ̀ Aretémì dé koô den né ká Efêse. Ŋgùlàmúr seèn lé naâ ké te vulúu die suagâ. Nuaá mé ménâ kɔ́ ŋgwéh, né neì wa?
44019036	Nuaré déì nde né saán ndɔ wa? Mɔ né ménâ, bí sé la née mbaá mbóró wèh ŋgwéeh ye. Bí sé la naâ nɔɔ́ŋ den.
44019037	Bí mé bɔ̀ nùà hên weh nde kuû né mbaá, bɔ́ njeré déì ké lè mɔ̀ beèh ŋúɔ́b ŋgwéh; bɔ́ càŋ beèh sèb ŋgwéh ndɔ.
44019038	Mɔ Dèmeteriyû bɔ́ bɔ̀ seê bɔ̀ seèn gwaán né nuaré déì mé ju, bèh ju tueê né teèn, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ né teèn ndɔ. Mɔ né ménâ, kɔ bɔ́ nde lòù sií.
44019039	Mɔ bí né cu mé ju déì teèn, bɔ́ nde né ju sâ faá né yeé nɔ tená.
44019040	Mè tueé bí, njií mé né kelá hên, béh nde né njìè teèn jɔgɔ́. Lòù sam, bɔ́ sé ye «túé bá kùɔ̀m”, béh sè kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.»
44019041	À yeé tueé gi aá ménâ, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí ŋéŋellè!» ndɔ.
44020001	Jomo sâ, bèmè hèllè huné ndɔ. Pɔ̂l yilá bilí cu bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, à toó nyegé bɔ́, te yo taré bɔ́ tarè. À yeé toó gi aá bɔ́, à bie bɔ́, à fɔɔ́n gò Masedínà ndɔ.
44020002	À wa ké teèn, à né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé ŋgòr Càŋ toó ndeé den, te bɔ́ kwa bele terreb mé njéh. Jomo sâ à kela nde ser te tàbè Akayî.
44020003	À cer ké sâ weéh tagár, à ye nyí nde né bàtô yilá, te nyí nde cu ké Sirî ma. Sâ bɔ̀ Jûf lé baá cuù sòn felè seèn nyɔgɔ, te bɔ́ wula bú. À yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, à kaga baá-re ndòn, ye nyí kela seér cu nde né Masedínà. À lé naâ ménâ bɔɔ́ ndɔ.
44020004	Bɔ̀ nuaré déì lé naâ bú njií lɔɔ́. Lé naâ Sopátà ŋunà Pirûs nùà Bèrê, mé bɔ̀ Tesalonîk bɔ̀ déì fà, yilí bɔɔ̀n né Aristârk bɔ̂ Sekúndù. Déì naá cuù Gayûs nùà Dérbè bɔ̂ Timotê. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ Asíà bɔ̀ déì fà lé naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ, yilí bɔɔ̀n né Tisîk bɔ̂ Trofîm.
44020005	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé naâ toò kelá, bɔ́ nde kela den béh ké Troâs.
44020006	Cieé koô mé bɔ̀ Jûf yieé yeé breêd mé kulu teèn sam, yeé kela baá, béh nde ye dé beèh bàtô ké Filîp yilá, béh bɔɔ́ ceér dueè cieé tîn, béh nde ye bɔ́ ké Troâs kwa. Béh bɔ́ bɔɔ́ ké teèn cieé téhbeh.
44020007	Mé samedî liyilì, béh yeé nde aá yáb Càŋ yieé, béh bilí den bècénè. Pɔ̂l né bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr Càŋ tueé, sâ cieé ŋaga, à baá mé gò. À né tueé, à tueé den ka méménâ tɔ́g lɔgɔ̀teèn.
44020008	Béh lé deén naâ ké gwò lè jèh gwà dé ké teèr, lâm lé naâ gwò kókoó mbaá.
44020009	Pɔ̂l né ka mé ŋgòr Càŋ tueé ndeé, sâ huaán ndà déì né lɔ́m yi den; à né yí kwarè kùm. Yilí seèn né Etikù. À yeé baá ménâ yi den, à yi yuo kela mé njéh toò, à die suagà, à kela keéh jèh gwà fà, à tɔb die doó, bɔ́ bú ter jɔgɔ sɔm baá komó.
44020010	Pɔ̂l suagà ndɔ, geér nde doó felè seèn, jɔgɔ sie bú beè, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: «Bí té nyàmè, à né làŋ!»
44020011	Te Pɔ̂l ŋaá cu ye ké ter, kɔlé yieé breêd, tueé ŋaga cu mé ŋgòr. Cieé yeé ŋaga baá, à fɔɔ́n ye gò.
44020012	Sâ bɔ́ la naâ mé huaán ndà hèllè weh yuo ndɔ. À la baá cu làŋ. Temé die cu bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ lè.
44020013	Béh yuo gò, béh kela dé beèh toò. Béh weh bàtô, ye te béh ŋaá weh keéh Pɔ̂l ké Asô faá à lé tueé naâ nɔ. À lé dé seèn gɔɔ́ naâ mé gule.
