44020014	Béh bɔ́ yeé kwaré baá ké Asô, béh weh bú ndɔ, béh bɔ́ nde Mitilên.
44020015	Béh yuo cu doó sâ mé bàtô. Cieé ŋaga béh wa kwarè Siô. Cieé ŋaga cu, béh yila Samósà. Cieé yeé ŋaga cu aá déì, béh wa ké Milê ndɔ.
44020016	Sâ béh lé naâ Efêse kelá keéh. Lòù sam, Pɔ̂l lé ye nyí ké teèn njébá ndé ŋgwéh, mɔ sam nyí nde né te tàbè Asíà ŋgagá kelá. À lé ye, mɔ nde né bɔɔ́, te nyí ké Jerusalem wa loù Pàntèkɔ̂t.
44020017	Pɔ̂l tema njií ké Efêse, ye bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ a, bɔ́ ndê kwà nyí ká Milê ma.
44020018	Bɔ́ waà ndɔ. Pɔ̂l ye bɔ́ a: «Bí né gi dene mò ké lètenè biì kɔɔ́, yuoô loù mé mè lé naâ ká te tàbè Asíà waâ, nde mé ké toò mene.
44020019	Mè seé Fehtoò beèh bɔɔ́ lom né mé temé dɔlê, mé yímé njolò ndɔ. Bɔ̀ Jûf lé naâ sòn felè mò nyɔgɔ, mè gèr beè bɔɔ̀n ŋene lom dé fî.
44020020	Mé njéh mene, mè bí njeré déì lòù túé gúgó lɔ́ ŋgwéh, sâ mè ye te gam bí. Mè bí ŋgòr Càŋ feh gi aá kèn. Né mene cie, né mene gwò, mè lé naá giì bí feh.
44020021	Mè lé naá giì bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ yilá, te bɔ́ kweéh seér temé, bɔ́ bele ceér Càŋ, bɔ́ kwaá njií temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
44020022	«Mè kènê baá mé gò Jerusalem. Cúcuí Ŋagâ mè ké sâ ba njií né lòù. Njií mé nde né mè ké teèn kwa, mè kɔ́ ŋgwéh.
44020023	Mè kɔ cegé né njèh cén, ye lè lɔɔ́ dé kàn dɔɔ́ŋ Cúcuí Ŋagâ né mè tueé ye mè a, gwà cibì né mè kela mé gèr mene.
44020024	Mè nde né mene kuú, mè mé nyàmè sam, mè kɔ lom né ké sònòbɔ̀ dula yuo kelâ, te seé mé Fehtoò mò Yeésò né beè mò haá kwaá hên mboón. À lé beè mò haá kwaá naâ Njàgà Bagaà, ye mè a, ndé bɔ̀ nùàr húɔ́m-temé Càŋ tueé ma.
44020025	Mè bí njèh felè Lò Càŋe feh laré gi aá. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, kènê bí mè ŋéné ndé cú.
44020026	Mè bí hên tueé komo né lan dé cî, ye bí a, mɔ nuaré déì baá mene lètenè biì leér, be mò teèn sam.
44020027	Lòù sam, njií mé Càŋ lé naá giì nyegé kwaá dɔɔ́ŋ, mè bí feh gi aá, mè déì toò kwá lɔ́ ŋgwéh.
44020028	Bí bɔ̀ŋ feh biì. Bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ nùàr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né beè biì kurú kwaá doô, bí gó lɔ́m teèn, bí né bɔ́ ke nyegé. Né mbàgà Càŋ, à lé naâ bú mé húɔ́m Ŋuna seèn ŋaá weh.
44020029	«Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, mɔ mè doó sam cuú, bɔ̀ ŋgùì nde né lètenè biì yilá, bɔ́ ŋellé sɔm mɔ̀gɔ̀ biì.
44020030	Né mene lètenè biì, bɔ̀ nuaré déì ndeè né teèn yuo kelâ, bɔ́ né bèh hiîn tueé fɔɔ́ njií, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ Yeésò mé njéh boú.
44020031	Bí dèn làŋ dé cî, bí té nyèn ye, lè nyèmà tagâr, mè lé sòn dù ná ŋgwêh, mè lé njèh ké lètenè biì feéh naâ cíbíteèn mé suútenè mene, mè né bí mé yímé njolò mene luɔm ndɔ.
44020032	Mè bí kènê kwaá lɔ né beè Càŋ. Ŋgòr húɔ́m-temê seèn a, ká sìè bí beè. À nde né bí terreb haá te bí temé kwaá yam njií gi mé bú, à haá bí ŋgúlú mé à lé naá giì dé bɔ̀ nùàr seèn dɔɔ́ŋ nyegé kwaá doô ndɔ.
44020033	«Mè lé mé tuaá kàgàlɔ̀ŋ bɔ̂ cɔ̀gɔ̀ nuaré déì ná ŋgwêh.
44020034	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, mè seé tema yeé mé be mò, mè né teèn kwa, mè koó bɔ̀ mbeí seê mò mé njéh.
44020035	Mè lé dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ giì naâ ye te bí ŋene weh teèn, bí seé tema mé be biì, bí né bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ gam. Bí té ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò nyèn. À lé ye: Ŋgulí kela né dé haâ mé dé weèh ma.»
44020036	Pɔ̂l yeé tueé gi aá, bɔ́ bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ cemmé nde gi doó, à dua Càŋ.
44020037	Bɔ́ si lɔ yúé teèn, bɔ́ né bú kumó sie, bɔ́ né bú gò bieé.
44020038	Bɔ́ doó sâ curú yuo baá mé kuún. Lòù sam, Pɔ̂l la naâ bɔ́ tueé ye bɔ́ a, bɔ́ nyí ŋéné ŋgwé ndé cú ma. Bɔ́ njií lɔ bú ké sòn nòmò te à yila bàtô.
44021001	Bɔ́ bɔ́ yeé geé aá, béh bɔ́ yila bàtô ndɔ, béh lemé nde ké Kɔ̂s. Cieé ŋaga béh wa Ródè; béh den cuù ké sâ, béh nde ké Pàtárà.
44021002	Béh wa ké teèn, béh kwa bàtô mé nde né Fenisî, béh yila nde teèn ndɔ, béh fɔɔ́n cu gò.
44021003	Béh wa kwarè Sîpre, béh wɔɔ́ŋ kela kèb túnò, te béh nde lè tàbè Sirî. Béh wa ké Tîr, béh suaga doó, te bàtô sɔm su seé.
44021004	Ké doó sâ, béh fɔɔ́n kwa bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì teèn, béh bɔ́ cer weh cieé téhbeh. Bɔ́ né Pɔ̂l tueé ye bú a: «Té ké Jerusalem ndé.» Sâ Cúcuí Ŋagâ lé naá giì bɔ́ tueé ye bɔ́ a, Pɔ̂l nde né gèr ké teèn ŋené ma.
44021005	Mé njéh mene, sɔ́ndè sâ yeé gi aá, béh fɔɔ́n cu gò. Bɔ́ njií lɔ béh ké jomo lɔɔ̂. Lé naâ bɔ́ bɔ̀ véh bɔɔ̀n, mé bɔ̀ huaán bɔɔ̀n mene. Béh bɔ́ yeé wa baá ké sòn nòmò, béh cemmé nde gi doó dɔɔ́ŋ, béh dua Càŋ.
44021006	Béh bɔ́ bie gò ndɔ. Béh yila cu bàtô, béh fɔɔ́n gò; bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n cu cu lɔ.
44021007	Béh yuo ké Tîr sâ, béh nde ké Tolemayîs; gò dé dùdùà ceré le ké sâ. Béh suaga doó, béh nde bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé ké sâ bieé weh, béh bɔ́ cer cieé cén.
44021008	Cieé ŋaga, béh fɔɔ́n cu gò Sesarê. Béh wa ké teèn, béh kela nde ké lɔ Filîp. À né nùà ŋgòr Càŋ se yɔɔ̀ŋ. Béh cer ké lɔ seèn. Lètenè bɔ̀ téhbeh bɔ̀ mé bɔ́ lé naâ ké Jerusalem balé sɔm doô, cén déì lé naâ bú.
44021009	À né mé bɔ̀ huaán dé vêh nèà, bɔ́ né gi bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀.
44021010	Ké lɔ seèn sâ béh lé naâ teèn cer weh. Cieé déì sòn-Càŋ déì waà, yilí seèn né Àgàbùs, à lé yuoó naâ ké Judê,
44021011	à waà ká yoòr beèh, à dɔm weh kàndá Pɔ̂l, à né bɔ̀ gule bɔ̂ be mé njéh kaga bele, ye béh a: «Cúcuí Ŋagâ né tueé ye: Nuaá mé kàndá hên né dé seèn wa, bɔ̀ Jûf nde né bú ké Jerusalem mân kaga ma; wa bɔ́ nde né bú mé bɔ̀ kìn haá njií.»
44021012	Béh yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, mé béh mene, mé bɔ̀ dé ké Sesarê mene dɔɔ́ŋ, béh bɔŋ gi Pɔ̂l, ye bú a: «Kúkùr yeè, té ké Jerusalem ndé.»
44021013	Pɔ̂l den seér cuù, ye béh a: «Sâ né kei wa? Hên bí fɔɔ́n né ceér, te bí yueé tur sɔm mè temé lè! Mè tueé bí, mè baá hên. Ké Jerusalem né mene dé kagaà, né mene cio, mɔ né felè Yeésò Fehtoò mò, mè hên nɔ.»
44021014	Béh yeé ŋene, yíé ŋgwéh ménâ, béh kwaá lɔ ménâ ndɔ, béh tueé lom aá ye, Fehtoò beèh a, bɔ́ bá njií mé à gwaán nê ma.
44021015	Béh yeé cer weh cu aá, jomo sâ béh nyegé njèh, béh fɔɔ́n gò Jerusalem ndɔ.
44021016	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ ké Sesarê déì njií lɔ béh, bɔ́ weh njií béh ké lɔ Násɔ̀ŋ, nùà Sîpre, béh cer ké teèn. Né nùàr Yeésò baá dàb.
44021017	Béh yeé wa baá ké Jerusalem, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ samé weh lom béh mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene.
44021018	Cieé ŋaga, béh bɔ̀ Pɔ̂l nde ké lɔ Jâk, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ te mbàgà Càŋe bilí gi ké teèn ndɔ.
44021019	Pɔ̂l yeé bie aá bɔ́, à se bele bɔ́ dèbbè seê seèn mé Càŋ lé bɔɔ́ keéh naâ beè seèn lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ.
44021020	Bɔ́ yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, bɔ́ yila Càŋ teèn seên. Bɔ́ den cuù ye Pɔ̂l a: «Wò ŋéné ŋgwéh bɔ̀ Jûf ŋgún baá gi bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ndɔ wa? Bɔ́ né lom te sóú joloò tétég.
44021021	Bɔ́ lé naá giì ŋgweé, ye wò né yeé bɔ̀ Jûf mé tàbè hihiné feh, ye bɔ́ a, té sóú Músì jòlò, bɔ́ té bɔ̀ huaán ŋgór ŋɔ́b cú, bɔ́ té gènnè bɔ̀ Jûf bèlè ndɔ ma.
44021022	Á hên, te béh bɔɔ́ nde né naàn? Béh kɔ né ye, bɔ́ nde né ŋgweé gií, ye wò waà baá kèn.
44021023	Mɔ né mân, kɔ wò kènê bɔɔ́ faá béh nde né wò tueé nɔ. Béh né mé bɔ̀ nùà nèà teèn, bɔ́ né yáb jolo.
44021024	Wèh sìè bɔ́ beè, bí bɔ́ nde te bɔ́ sené bí, wò gwɔm sòn bɔɔ̀n, te bɔ́ bele sɔm tou yoòr. Mɔ baá mân, bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ́ né wò felè tueé kwaá dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ̀ nùàr nde né faá njèh mbaâ nɔ ke njií, bɔ́ tueé seér ye, wò né sóú Músì jolo ndɔ ma.
44021025	Dé ju bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé Jûf sam, béh lé naá giì bɔ́ kàgà-ndòn beèh nyagá njií, ye bɔ́ a: bɔ́ té sèmè dé cècàŋ yíé, bɔ́ té húɔ́m sònò nágá kéh; núɔ́gɔ́ nyaàm mé bɔ́ nei wulà naâ lòù, bɔ́ té yíé, bɔ́ té yàgà yɔ̀ŋ ndɔ.»
44021026	Pɔ̂l weh bɔ̀ nùà nèà sâ ndɔ. Cieé ŋaga, bɔ́ bɔ́ nde ké bèh sènè sâ, bɔ́ kou bɔ́. Jomo sâ à nde ké gwà Càŋ koô, à tueé kwaá bɔ́ cieé mé bɔ́ nde né teèn kou ceré, mé bɔ́ nde né sèmè dé nùà kàn haá ndɔ.
44021027	Mé bɔ̀ cieé téhbeh hèllè nde gií, sâ bɔ̀ Jûf mé lé yuoó naâ te tàbè Asíà ŋene gi aá Pɔ̂l ké gwà Càŋ koô kèn. Bɔ́ soób su Pɔ̂l dàm nùàr yoòr, bɔ́ sie bú.
44021028	Kéŋ die, bɔ́ ye: «Bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀, bí ndê, bí yí be teèn! Nùà hên maŋgo felè dàm bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ tueé seér yeé kɔɔ́. À felè sóú Músì bɔ̂ gwà Càŋ koô hên tueé gi né ménâ ndɔ. Hên ká gwà Càŋ à yií keéh bilí cu aá mé bɔ̀ kurú mene, à gwà Càŋ mé njéh bɔɔ́ yilí sɔm aá kèn.»
44021029	Sâ bɔ́ lé ŋenè naâ Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Trofîm nùà Efêse, bɔ́ lé naâ ké lètenè lɔɔ̂, bɔ́ ye merré déì Pɔ̂l lé naâ bú ké gwà Càŋ yií keéh.
44021030	Yeé baá ménâ, bèmè ka salé yɔŋ lɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ. Bɔ̀ nùàr né kàn mé kán durá yuoô, bɔ́ né teèn ndeé. Bɔ́ né mé Pɔ̂l cie tulu yuo kelá, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ hin gwà Càŋ jomo coló njií.
44021031	Bɔ́ né ceér fɔɔ́n ye te bɔ́ wula Pɔ̂l wulà. Njàgà nde tɔb kwa kwaá-taâb bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀, ye bú a: Jerusalem baá jilí ma.
44021032	À yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, à yilá weh bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ sɔ́jì, mé bɔ̀ sɔ́jì déì, bɔ́ bɔ́ dula suaga ké teèn. Bɔ̀ nùàr yeé ŋene njií aá kwaá-taâb bɔ́ bɔ̀ sɔ́jì seèn baá ndeê, bɔ́ vu lɔ Pɔ̂l núr loboò ndɔ.
44021033	Kwaá-taâb doô waà njebá nde yí kwarè Pɔ̂l, ye bɔ́ cáb sìè bú sieè, bɔ́ yí bú fɔ̀gɔ̀ lɔ̀ŋ beè. Jomo sâ ye bɔ́ a: Pɔ̂l né neì wa? À bɔɔ́ naâ kei ndɔ wa?
44021034	À né mene ménâ bieé, bɔ̀ nùàr kɔ lom né ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií. Dé kàn ye mbeî kàn, dé kân ye kelà kán. Bɔ́ yeé baá tieè kwaá-taâb ménâ tueé vurú den, ye bɔ́ wèh njí bú ké te mbàn bɔ̀ sɔ́jì.
44021035	Mé bɔ́ nde ké ka cébbê waá, sâ Pɔ̂l nde aá mé núr beè bɔ̀ nùàr kuú dɔlé, bɔ̀ sɔ́jì ŋgaá jɔgɔ weéh baá bú lòù.
44021036	Bɔ̀ nùàr né lom jomo kem bele. Dé kàn ye wúlá bú wulà, dé kân ye wúlá bú wulà ma.
44021037	Bɔ́ yeé nde aá mé Pɔ̂l ké te mbàne komo yuo kelá, à tueé njií kwaá-taâb mé ju Greêk, ye bú a: «Mè nde né lɔ́ŋ kwa, te mè tueé wò njeré déì wa?» Kwaá-taâb doô ye bú a: «Wò la né ju Greêk tueé nɔɔ́?
44021038	Wò nùà Ejíptò loù doô sam wa? Nùà hèllè lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr soób, lɔɔ́ jilí gi mé njéh, à lé naâ mé bɔ̀ wúlá-feh bɔ̀ kám nèà ké ya dueè ker yilá. Wò bú sam wa?»
44021039	Pɔ̂l ye bú a: «Mè né dé mò nùà Jûf, bɔ́ lé ŋaár naâ mè ké Târse te tàbè Silisî. Né lɔɔ́ koô; mè teèn né huaán. Kúkùr yeè, kwá mè tueé weh mé bɔ̀ nùàr teèn.»
44021040	Kwaá-taâb ye bú a: «Túé yeè tueè.» Pɔ̂l wuo njebá ter ké te cébbée, me fɔ njií bɔ̀ nùàr mé be. Bɔ̀ nùàr nɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ. Pɔ̂l duɔɔ́m bɔ́ njèh mé ju hebreêh tueé njiî, ye bɔ́ a:
44022001	«Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bɔ̀ tele mò, bí ŋgwé! Mè nde aá sòn mò tueé.»
44022002	Te bɔ́ yeé nde ŋgweé njií bú mé ju hebreêh sònò mân, bɔ́ huné ŋeí cu baá ye-re nɔɔ́ŋ. À deén baá-re ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a:
44022003	«Mè né nùà Jûf; bɔ́ lé mè ŋaár naâ ké Târse te tàbè Silisî. Mè lé kulà naâ ká Jerusalem. Jéjég sóù bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀, Gamaliêl lé mè feéh naâ kɔɔ́. Mè lé toò Càŋ bɔgɔ́ naâ faá bí né lan bɔgɔ́ sâ.
44022004	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ceér Yeésò bele dɔɔ́ŋ, mè lé naâ bɔ́ bunó, mè né bɔ́ wulá sɔm bele, mè né siíb mé véh mene gwà cibì sie yií.
44022005	Ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ sòn mò tueé nde né kɔɔ́. Bɔ́ lé mè mvù beè nyagá haá naâ kɔɔ́, te mè nde ye terreb njolò bɔ̀ Jûf dé ké Damâs kwa. Mè lé naâ ké teèn ndeé ndɔ, ye mɔ mè wa baá ké teèn, mè ndeè né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ká Jerusalem sie turú ndeê, te bɔ́ ŋene gèr ma.»
44022006	Pɔ̂l den cuù, ye bɔ́ a: «Mè fɔɔ́n gò Damâs ndɔ. Mè né ka ndeé, mè wa kwarè lɔɔ̂, sâ lou nde aá dilí. Te mè yeé ke, ŋagâ déì ba suagà ter, né kwarè mò wula njerré yɔŋ.
44022007	Mè jege die doó, mè né hueh déì ŋgweé njií, ye mè a: Sɔ̂l, Sɔ̂l, wò mè ménâ bunó né mé ŋgei wa?
44022008	Mè bie njií ye bú a: Né wò neì wa, Nùà dueè? Ye mè a: Né nyí Yeésò nùà Najarêt mé mè né bunó den sâ ma.
44022009	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá giì jomo mò ŋene cegé ŋagâ, bɔ́ lé dé bɔɔ̀n hueh sâ ŋgwé ná ŋgwêh.
44022010	Mè ye: á hên, mè bɔɔ́ nde aá naàn wa, Nùà dueè? Nùà Dueè doô ye mè a: Kòmò wùò ter, ndé ké Damâs; ké teèn sâ, njií mé nyí ye wò a, bébɔɔ̀, bɔ́ nde né wò tueé.
44022011	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ jomo mò doô mé mè ké Damâs derré wa baá lòù. Sâ ŋagâ mè njolo cugó sɔm aá kèn.
44022012	«Sâ nùà dùlà-Càŋ déì né lɔ sâ teèn, yilí seèn né Ananíà, à né sóú beèh bagasé jolo nyegé. Né nùà gècên beè bɔ̀ Jûf ké sâ ndɔ.
44022013	Nùà sâ waà njebá ndeè kwarè mò, ye mè a: Sɔ̂l, nùàr nyî, njolo yeè a, kòmò cú wò mé njéh komò ma! À yeé cib sòn, njolo mò kwɔgɔ ŋagá ndɔ, mè ŋene njií bú.
44022014	Ye mè a: Càŋ mé né felè bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ lé wò balé sɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́, ye te wò ŋene kɔ njií mé nyí gwaán nê. À lé naâ wò Nùà dilî njolò feh gií, wò lé naâ bú ŋené, wò ŋgweé hueh seèn.
44022015	Wò nde né sòn seèn toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ ŋaá. Njií mé wò lé naâ ŋené dɔɔ́ŋ, wò nde né bɔ́ feh, wò feh bɔ́ njií mé wò lé naâ ŋgweé ndɔ.
44022016	À deén baá-re ye mè a: Sâ mè kela cu né kei wa? Wùò ter, bɔ́ kou sɔm wò nòmò Càŋ, te veên yeè yaga yuo mé yilí Fehtoò beèh ma.»
44022017	«Jomo sâ mè cu cuù ká Jerusalem. Mè yeé baá Càŋ ké gwà Càŋ koô dua den, kulu mè faá vuú nɔ.
44022018	Mè ŋene Nùà Dueè ye mè a: Wùò ter kwar, yùò ká Jerusalem nɔɔ́ŋ. Njií mé wò né felè mò tueé den hên, bɔ̀ nùàr gwàn ndé ŋgwéh.
44022019	Mè ye bú a: Nùà Dueè, ŋgweéh bɔ́ né gi kɔɔ́ ye, mè lé naâ te bɔ̀ gwà sóù ndeé bele, mè sie bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr yeè kwaá njií, mè nde bɔ́ gwà cibì yií njií, bɔ́ duún bɔ́ núr wa?
44022020	Ŋgweéh loù mé bɔ́ lé wulà naâ sòn yeè Etiên, mè lé naâ teèn ndɔ wa? Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé wulà naâ bú, mè lé naâ bɔ́ seén, bɔ́ lé cɔ̀gɔ̀ huaré kwaá lɔɔ̀ naâ beè mò.
44022021	Nùà Dueè tueé baá-re mè ndɔ, ye mè a: Ndé yeè ndeè, mè wò tema njií nde né ké bèh dàb, ké yoòr bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ma.»
44022022	Pɔ̂l yeé baá dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam teèn tueé kwaá, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá giì ŋgweé dɔɔ́ŋ keéŋ njií ké ter, ye bɔ́ nyòlò sɔ̀m nùà hèllè mé cio; Càŋ a bɔ́ à hue cu ma.
44022023	Bɔ́ né ké ter geba njií, bɔ́ né cɔ̀gɔ̀ yoòr salé, bɔ́ né fùfú ter ŋuaán vuú njií.
44022024	Kwaá-taâb bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀ doô yeé ŋene aá ménâ, ye bɔ́ yí njí Pɔ̂l yí te mbàn bɔ̀ sɔ́jì, bɔ́ dún bú núr ma. Sâ ye, mɔ núr baá bú yoòr yilá, à nde né cie tueé sɔm, te nyí kɔ kwɔ̀m teèn, nyí kɔ njií mé bɔ́ nùàr né mé njéh ŋaáŋ doô.
44022025	Bɔ́ yeé kaga si aá Pɔ̂l doó, faá bɔ́ nde aá bú lobo nɔ, à deên ndɔ, ye nùà koô lètenè bɔ̀ sɔ́jì a: «Mɔ nùàr né bɔ̀ huaán Rɔ̂m, bɔ́ née ju túé ŋgwéeh ye, sóú biì ye lòbò kéh bú mbaá wa?»
44022026	Nùà koô hèllè yeé nde ŋgweé njií ménâ, à nde mé kwaá-taâb tueé njií ndɔ, ye bú a: «Wò jue te nyí bɔɔ́ naàn á? Nùà hên né bɔ̀ huaán Rɔ̂m.»
44022027	Kwaá-taâb yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, à ndeè ká teèn mé be seèn, ye Pɔ̂l a: «Júe mè a, nyí né bɔ̀ huaán Rɔ̂m?» Pɔ̂l ye bú a: «Nyea!»
44022028	Kwaá-taâb hèllè den cuù ye: «Mè lɔ nde nùà Rɔ̂m ŋaá, mè lɔ gwɔɔ́m naâ kàgàlɔ̀ŋ kókoó.» Pɔ̂l deên ndɔ, ye bú a: «Dé mò, mè né huaán, bɔ́ lé mè ŋaár naâ ké teèn.»
44022029	Te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé la ye bɔ́ nde aá bú lobo doô yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, bɔ́ ŋellé nde gi gè jomo. Kwaá-taâb mé feh seèn yeé ŋgweé, wa nyí mé yuií kagá naâ bɔ̀ huaán Rɔ̂m mân, veéh bɔɔ́ bú njèh.
44022030	Cieé ŋaga, kwaá-taâb kaga ndòn, ye njií mé bɔ̀ Jûf ye kɔ bɔ́ wúlá sɔ̀m Pɔ̂l mé njéh doô, kɔ nyí ŋgweé nyegé baá kwɔ̀m sâ. Yeé baá ménâ, à ye bɔ́ sè sɔ̀m bú seè. À yilá bilí bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô mé gùm mbàgà juù sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, à weh suaga mé Pɔ̂l ké toò juù ndɔ.
44023001	Wa ké teèn, Pɔ̂l ke dilí njií lom bɔ̀ túé-ju bɔ̀ njolo, ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bèh mé lé naâ-naà, mè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ká lè mò bɔɔ́ gi né njolò Càŋ mé húɔ́m-temé mene; wa hên né den ka cí ye.»
44023002	Te Ananíà ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô yeé nde ŋgweé njií ménâ, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé den né yí kwarè Pɔ̂l a, bɔ́ fágá yí Pɔ̂l be sònò.
44023003	Pɔ̂l ye bú a: «Wò nùà sòn fà, Càŋ lobo seér nde né wò! Wò te kɔgɔ den nyegé né, ye te nyí tena ju mò faá sóú tueé nê nɔ, kàmbér wò sóú kwa seér cu nde né lòù, wanɔɔ́ŋ keí bɔɔ́ mé wò ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, lòbò mè lobò wa?»
44023004	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé naá giì kwarè dɔɔ́ŋ su gi sòn, ye bú a: «Wò hên seí né ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô!»
44023005	Pɔ̂l ye bɔ́ a: «Mè kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh ye, né ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô, wanɔɔ́ŋ né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: Té veên felè nùà dueè túé njí.»
44023006	Sâ Pɔ̂l naá giì kɔɔ́ ye bɔ̀ téná-juù bɔ̀ kèb déì né bɔ̀ Sadusiên, kèb déì bɔ̀ Farisiên ndɔ. Yeé baá ménâ, à lɔgɔ́ njií ké ter ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè né Farisiên, ŋunà Farisiên. Mè né ndèm kwaá, ye bɔ̀ komó nde cu né lè cio komo yuo. Mè ju hên yila kuú né dé cî.»
44023007	Pɔ̂l yeé nde tueé sɔm faá bèh mân, tɔgɔ kɔ die lètenè bɔ̀ Farisiên bɔ́ bɔ̀ Sadusiên, bɔ́ ker fà.
44023008	Lòù sam, bɔ̀ Sadusiên ye bɔ̀ komó lè cio kòmò yùò ndé cú, wa cìlì Càŋ teèn sam, càŋ déì teèn sam ndɔ ma. Sâ dé bɔ̀ Farisiên dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né gi temé teèn kwaá njií.
44023009	Yeé baá ménâ, bèmè ŋaáŋ seér cu lòù. Bɔ̀ njí-sóù déì mé né jomo bɔ̀ Farisiên doô, wuo ter, ye: «Ndɔ́g, béh njèh veên déì beè nùà hên kwà ŋgwéh. Sâ merré déì càŋ déì naâ bú njeré déì tueé, mɔ sam né cìlì Càŋ.»
44023010	Yeé baá ménâ, tɔgɔ bɔgɔ́ ŋeí cu baá-re faá we nɔ. Kwaá-taâb veéh lom aá ye bɔ́ nde né Pɔ̂l sie ŋaré. À yilá njií baá-re bɔ̀ sɔ́jì seèn, te bɔ́ nde Pɔ̂l beè bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgaá weh, bɔ́ nde bú ké te mbàn bɔɔ̀n yií njií.
44023011	Cíbíteèn sâ, Fehtoò beèh ŋené yuo kelà toò Pɔ̂l, ye bú a: «Môn, fágá feh! Wò sòn mò ká Jerusalem tueé sɔm aá kèn, kɔ wò nde cu sòn mò ké Rɔ̂m mân tueé ndɔ.»
44023012	Cieé yeé ŋaga baá, bɔ̀ Jûf déì nyɔgɔ sòn, bɔ́ jege ye, bɔ́ njeré déì sònò nágá ndé ŋgwéh, kɔ bɔ́ wula sɔm aá bú, sâ ye.
44023013	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé naâ yulà nèà yɔgɔ́ keéh.
44023014	Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ nde kwa bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ déì, bɔ́ ye bɔ́ a: «Kènê béh jege baá, ye béh nde né yáb felè Pɔ̂l jolo. Kɔ béh wula sɔm aá bú, sâ ye.
44023015	Mɔ né mân, bí bɔ̀ mbàgà juù bɔ̀ ndé júée kwaá-taâb a, sɔ̀m kêh bí Pɔ̂l, faá bí nde cu née ju seèn taáŋ ye. Béh nde né beré déì njebá tená, béh wula lɔ bú, sâ à née ké te mbàgà juù wá ŋgwéeh ye.»
44023016	Kàmbér ŋunà tie Pɔ̂l déì né ŋgweé, à nde ké te mbàn bɔ̀ sɔ́jì, à tueé kwaá Pɔ̂l toò ndɔ.
44023017	Pɔ̂l yilá njiî nùà koô bɔ̀ sɔ́jì déì, ye bú a: «Wèh njí mbò ndà hên ké yoòr kwaá-taâb, à nde né bú njeré déì tueé.»
44023018	Nùà koô doô weh njií huaán sâ ké yoòr kwaá-taâb ndɔ. Wa ké teèn, ye bú a: «Pɔ̂l nùà gwà cibì ye mè a, njí lɔ̂ huaán ndà hên ká yoòr yeè, à nde né wò njeré déì tueé sé wa.»
44023019	Kwaá-taâb sie weh mbò ndà doô be ndɔ, bɔ́ bú nde ké bèh ndɔ́ŋ-ndɔ̀ŋ, ye bú a: «Wò ye naàn wa?»
44023020	Ye kwaá-taâb a: «Bɔ̀ Jûf wɔŋ kwaá gi aá kèn, ye bɔ́ nde né wò tueé ye wò a, kwéh, wèh ndé cû mé Pɔ̂l ké bèh juù, bɔ́ nde cu né ju seèn taáŋ nyegé ma.
44023021	Mè tueé wò, ndɔ́g té lòm gwàn. Bɔ́ né njèh yulà nèà yɔgɔ́ keéh, bɔ́ wɔŋ kwaá gi aá kèn, ye bɔ́ nde né beré déì leér den, te bɔ́ mɔm bú. Bɔ́ jege kwaá gi aá, ye bɔ́ nde né yáb felè seèn jolo, bɔ́ njeré déì sònò nágá kéh ndé ŋgwéh, kɔ bɔ́ wula sɔm aá bú, sâ ye. Bɔ́ kènê tab den né mân, bɔ́ kela lom aá te wò komo njií bɔ́ sòn.»
44023022	Kwaá-taâb yeé ŋgweé gi aá mân, à luɔm mbò ndà doô, ye bú a: «Té nuaré déì mân túé nyì wâ? Sâ ndé bá-re.»
44023023	Yeé baá ménâ, kwaá-taâb yilá njiî bɔ̀ sɔ́jì dé kokoô fà, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí bílí bɔ̀ sɔ́jì yuií fà, bɔ̀ ŋá-nyam bɔ̀ yulà téhbeh mé bɔ̀ gwaga bɔ̀ yuií fà ndɔ, bí nyegé kwaá gò. Liyilì mé lou lɔ̀ŋ tárènèà bí nde né Sesarê ndeé.
44023024	Bí kàgà kwá gí bɔ̀ nyam mé Pɔ̂l nde né teèn ŋaá, te bí lɔgɔ weh bú lɔ̂ŋ, bí njií lɔ ké beè ŋgɔ́mnà Felísì.»
44023025	À nyagá kwaá tebé teèn ndɔ, ye:
44023026	«Né mè Klôdè Lisiâs nyagá njií né nùà koô seèn ŋgɔ́mnà Felísì mvù hên kɔɔ́, ye bú a:
44023027	bɔ̀ Jûf lé naâ nùà hên beè ceéhr keéh, le man bɔ́ wula yili bú. Mè yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, mè dula nde teèn mé bɔ̀ sɔ́jì beè, mè nde bú ŋgaá weh. Sâ mè naâ ŋgweé ye, né bɔ̀ huaán Rɔ̂m.
44023028	Yeé baá ménâ, mè yilá bilí mbàgà juù bɔ̀ Jûf ndɔ, te mè kɔ kwɔ̀m mé bɔ́ né bú teèn bunó.
44023029	Mè ke njií dɔ̀gɔ̀tì juù hèllè né lom felè sóú bɔɔ̀n. Gèh dé sâ seèn dé cioò mé dé gwà cibì sam bèh.
44023030	Á, nùàr lé naâ waâ, ye mè a: bɔ̀ Jûf wɔŋ kwaá gi aá nɔ. Mè yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, mè bɔɔ́ lom wúwágá, ye kɔ mè bú haá njií mé wò. Jomo sâ, mè tueé njií mé bɔ̀ Jûf ndɔ, mè ye bɔ́ a: bɔ́ ndé sí sèr bú ké toò yeè.»
44023031	Jomo sâ bɔ̀ sɔ́jì bɔɔ́ faá bɔ́ ŋgweé naâ nɔ: bɔ́ weh Pɔ̂l cíbíteèn sâ, bɔ́ njií lɔ bú tɔ́g ké Àntìpàtrîs.
44023032	Cieé ŋaga bɔ̀ sɔ́jì mé lé gɔɔ́ naâ mé gule cu cuù dé bɔɔ̀n ká te mbàne; bɔ̀ nyam bɔ̀ njií lom aá Pɔ̂l ké Sesarê kɔɔ́.
44023033	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ wa teèn, bɔ́ haá njií ŋgɔ́mnà mvù hèllè, bɔ́ haá njií bú Pɔ̂l ndɔ.
44023034	Ŋgɔ́mnà yeé jaŋé gi aá, ye Pɔ̂l a: «Wò né te kɔ̀b tàbè dé heè wa?» Pɔ̂l ye bú á, nyí né te kɔ̀b tàbè Silisî ma.
44023035	À den cuù ye Pɔ̂l a: «Kɔ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ wò sií baá doó, mè bie ye wò njèh». Ye bɔ́ ndé kwá ŋgɔ́gɔ̂ bú ké lè bɔ̀gɔ̀ Herôde ndɔ.
44024001	Jomo sâ kela cieé tîn, Ananíà ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ déì mé nùà kélá-gàm bɔɔ̀n, wa ké Sesarê. Nùà kélá-gàm sâ, yilí seèn lé naâ Tèrtúlù. Bɔ́ yeé wa baá, bɔ́ nde ké toò ŋgɔ́mnà Felísì mé ju Pɔ̂l hèllè.
44024002	Bɔ́ yilá njiî Pɔ̂l ndɔ. Tèrtúlù duɔɔ́m Pɔ̂l siî; à ye ŋgɔ́mnà a: «Dé koô, béh pɔ́ŋ den né mé wò. Wò te kɔgɔ den né mé lo ndɔ. Wò né seér tàbè beèh bɔɔ́ nyegé, te den bagasé.
44024003	Né mene he, dé koô, béh bɔ́-bagaà yeè weh né mé be fà.
44024004	Mè sé ki né wò ndɔ, kúkùr yeè, gér njí tie te ŋgòr beèh teèn:
44024005	Beè beèh dɔɔ́ŋ, meì bɔ̀ kì-nùàr faá nùà hên nɔ sam. Lètenè bɔ̀ Najarêt bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ feh né bú. Bèh mé à né lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf kelá dɔɔ́ŋ bèmè né die.
44024006	À nde teèn kema bilí baá mé gwà Càŋ koô mene; béh lé bú sieé naâ ké teèn. [Béh ye te béh tena ju seèn faá sóú beèh tueé nê nɔ.
44024007	Kwaá-taâb Lisiâs bɔ́ bɔ̀ sɔ́jì seèn nde ta tena toò, bɔ́ ŋgaá weh bú beè beèh mé terreb,
44024008	à tueé njií mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bú sií doô, ye bɔ́ a, bɔ́ ndé túé sèr ju seèn ká toò yeè ma.] Mɔ sam, bíé kú yeè bú, wò nde né gècên beèh ŋené kɔɔ́, te wò kɔ ye béh bú sií yií né teèn.»
44024009	À yeé nde cib sòn mân, bɔ̀ Jûf gwaán yií teèn, te den ka faá né ménâ nɔ.
44024010	Jomo sâ ŋgɔ́mnà me njií Pɔ̂l mé be, te à tueé dé seèn ndɔ. Pɔ̂l ye bú a: «Mè kɔ né ye, baá nyèmà kɔ́beè nùà téná-juù felè bɔ̀ nùàr beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né wò. Mè sòn mò toò yeè tueé sɔm nde né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene.
44024011	Mè tueé wò, mè lé naá cuù ké Jerusalem bèh Càŋ duaà ndeé, lan née cieé yulà cùɔ̀b fà yɔ́gɔ́ kéh ŋgwéeh ye. Mɔ wò né gwaán, bíé kú yeè.
44024012	Né mene ké gwà Càŋ koô, né mene ké gwà sóù, bêh nuaré déì lé sàn kú ná ŋgwêh. Né mene ké lètenè lɔɔ̂, mè cìlì nùàr sób ŋgwéh. Ndɔ́g, nuaré déì lé mè teèn kwà ná ŋgwêh.
44024013	Bɔ̀ nùàr hên tueé né mbaá, njií mé bɔ́ né mè teèn sií, bɔ́ wò cí fèh kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.
44024014	«Mè dé mò toò yeè kɔ cegé né njèh cén, ye mè seé Càŋ bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ́ né mé ceér dé feê. Bɔ́ den seér cu né kɔɔ́, ye né nyeén. Sâ, né mene te mvù sóù, né mene te mvù bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀, njií mé né gi teèn nyagá den dɔɔ́ŋ, mè temé kwaá njií né teèn ndɔ.
44024015	Mè ndèm mé Càŋ kwaá njií né faá bɔ́ né mé bú kwaá njií nɔ. Béh bɔ́ né gi kɔɔ́, ye bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ nde gi né lè cio komo yuo ma.
44024016	Mè tég lege lom né dé cî, ye te ká lè mò, né mene njolò Càŋ, né mene njolò bɔ̀ nùàr, mè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi né mé húɔ́m-temé.
44024017	«Mè lé naâ cie nyèmà ŋgún bɔɔ́, mè lé ké Jerusalem cu cuù lòù. Mè ndeè kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé bɔ̀ nùàr beèh haá njií, te gam bɔ́. Mè ndeè sèmè dé mò ké toò Càŋ haá ndɔ.
44024018	Bɔ́ lé mè ké gwà Càŋ koô ŋenè naâ, sâ mè né mé tou yoòr. Bêh cìlì nùàr lé kɔɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, bèmè lé teèn ná ŋgwêh ndɔ.
44024019	Doó lé naâ bɔ̀ Jûf mé lé yuoó naâ lè tàbè Asíà. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ sé la ká toò yeè waà né kɔɔ́. Mɔ béh bɔ́ né mé njeré déì, bɔ́ tueé.
44024020	Mɔ sam, bɔ̀ hên bɔ̀ a, túé kwɔ̀m veên mò sâ. Loù mé bɔ́ lé naâ mè ké te mbàgà juù njií, mè lé saàb naâ kei wa? Bɔ́ túé sɔ̀m cie.
44024021	Mè dé mò kɔ cegé né njèh cén, ye mè lé naâ ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií, ye mè né ndèm kwaá, ye bɔ̀ komó nde cu né lè cio komo yuo. Mè ju hên yila kuú né dé cî.»
44024022	Sâ Felísì né ceér bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ kɔɔ́. À yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, ye bɔ́ a: Ju kuún aá kèn; kɔ Lisiâs kwaá-taâb waà baá, nyí tena ye ju biì sâ ma.
44024023	Jomo sâ ye nùà koô bɔ̀ sɔ́jì a: «Wèh njí cú Pɔ̂l ké gwà cibì, wò yi kwaá bú lòù, te bɔ̀ mbeí yɔŋ nde beh yoòr seèn, bɔ́ gam bú.»
44024024	Yeé cer weh baá, Felísì bɔ̂ veèh seèn Drusílà waà. Veèh dé seèn né nùà Jûf. Bɔ́ yeé waà baá, bɔ́ tema yilá njiî Pɔ̂l. Pɔ̂l waà ndɔ, à yila tueê, bɔ́ né felá. À tueé bɔ́ felè temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njiî.
44024025	À tueé bɔ́ gèh dé dene dilî, à tueé bɔ́ gèh dé yo sieè ndɔ. À yeé baá bú dé ju beè Càŋ dieè tueé, veéh bɔɔ́ bú njèh, ye Pɔ̂l a: «Ndé cú ké gwò ye. Mɔ mè kwa cu aá lɔ́ŋ, mè yilá ye wò.»
44024026	À lé beè Pɔ̂l kèb déì gwaán naâ kàgàlɔ̀ŋ ndɔ. À lé bú ká yoòr seèn yilá njií beéh dé cî. Bɔ́ bú né sòn tueé.
44024027	Ka méménâ nyèmà fà yeé kela baá, Pɔrsiû Fésetù waà kweéh ŋgɔ́mnà Felísì. Sâ Pɔ̂l lé née gwà cibì ménâ den den ye. Lòù sam, Felísì lé gwàn ná ŋgwêh njolo mé bɔ̀ Jûf veê.
44025001	Fésetù waà te tàbè sâ ndɔ. À yeé cer aá ké Sesarê cieé tagár, à nde ké Jerusalem.
44025002	Wa ké teèn, bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô, mé bɔ̀ Jûf dé njonjolò bilí nde cuù ju Pɔ̂l toò seèn sií, bɔ́ ye bú a:
44025003	«Há njí cû yeè béh Pɔ̂l ká Jerusalem teèn». Sâ bɔ́ lé naá giì wɔŋ kwaá, ye bɔ́ wula lɔ nde né bú ceér dueè, te à wa ye ké Jerusalem.
44025004	Bɔ́ yeé dua baá Fésetù ménâ, à tueé seér ye bɔ́ a: «Pɔ̂l née ké Sesarê gwà cibì ye, mè nde né ké teèn cuú cuú ndɔ.
44025005	Mɔ mè baá mé gò, kɔ béh bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ biì nde bilí. Mɔ nùà hèllè lé naâ veên bɔɔ́, bɔ́ nde sií bú ké sâ.»
44025006	Fésetù cer ké lètenè bɔɔ̀n sâ nde njèh cieé yulà, à cu cu ké Sesarê ndɔ. Cieé ŋaga à ŋaá yila te kɔgɔ ju tueê, ye bɔ́ yílá njî Pɔ̂l.
44025007	Pɔ̂l yeé waà baá, bɔ̀ Jûf mé lé yuoó naâ ké Jerusalem hèllè kaŋ bú, bɔ́ né bú sií, bɔ́ né bú ŋgòr dùkàŋ yoòr cɔré su.
44025008	Mé njéh mene, Pɔ̂l kɔ lom né sòn seèn cie tueé kwaâ, ye bɔ́ a: «Ndɔ́g, mè sóú bɔ̀ Jûf déì kwá ŋgwéh, mè gwà Càŋ koô sèb ŋgwéh, mè sóú mgbè Rɔ̂m kwá ŋgwéh ndɔ. Ndɔ́g be mò teèn sam.»
44025009	Fésetù gwaán né bɔ̀ Jûf temé lè bɔɔ́ nɔrê. Yeé baá ménâ, à bie njií seér mé Pɔ̂l, ye bú a: «Wò gwaán né ké Jerusalem ndeê, te béh tena ju hên ké teèn wa?»
44025010	Pɔ̂l ye bú a: «Mè kènê baá gi ká te mbàgà juù dé mgbè Rɔ̂m; mè njebá né teèn. Sâ né bèh mé bɔ́ tena nde né ju mò teèn. Ŋgweéh wò né gi mé feh yeè kɔɔ́, ye mè bɔ̀ Jûf veên déì bɔ́ nyì ná ŋgwêh mà.
44025011	Mè naâ mene sóú kwaá, né mene njií mé bɔ́ wula yeé nùàr teèn dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ mè naâ kema, mè cio bèrɔ̀ŋ ndé ŋgwéh. Mɔ bɔ́ mè sar kuú né sòn fuû ndɔ, sâ nùàr a, té mè beè bɔɔ̀n mbaá jɔ́gɔ́ yí.» À den cuù ye bɔ́ a: «Mè ju mò hên njií seér nde aá ké toò mgbè Rɔ̂m.»
44025012	Yeé baá ménâ, Fésetù bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ nde kwaá sòn. Jomo sâ ye Pɔ̂l a: «Wò la ye nyí ju nyî njií seér nde aá ké toò mgbè Rɔ̂m. Sâ mgbè Rɔ̂m ju yeè tena nde aá kɔɔ́.»
44025013	Yeé cer weh aá, mgbè Agrípà bɔ̂ Berenîk ndeè ké Sesarê Fésetù bieé weh.
44025014	Bɔ́ cer weh cu ké sâ teèn. Yeé baá cieé déì, Fésetù tueé Agrípà ju Pɔ̂l doô, ye bú a: «Felísì lé naâ nuaré déì te gwà cibì kwaá lɔɔ́.
44025015	Cieé déì mè yeé baá ké Jerusalem, bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf lé naâ ké toò mò ndeê, bɔ́ sií bú teèn, bɔ́ ye mè a: túé sìè bú mé ju.
44025016	Mè ye bɔ́ a: mɔ bɔ́ naâ nuaré déì sií, béh bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀ ju kèb cén téná bèh. Kɔ bɔ́ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé naâ bú sií baá gi doó dɔɔ́ŋ, à tueé gi aá sòn seèn, ju tena ye.
44025017	Yeé baá ménâ, béh bɔ́ ndeè kán ndɔ. Cieé ŋaga mè nde te kɔgɔ juù ŋaá yilá, mè ye, bɔ́ ndé yílá njî nùà hèllè.
44025018	Bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ seèn yeé salé gi aá bɔ̀ njií sâ, mè ŋgòr veên déì teèn faá mè naâ munó nɔ ŋéné ŋgwéh.
44025019	Lé naá cegê bɔ̀ wèllè saân déì felè gènnè bɔɔ̀n, mé felè nuaré déì, yilí seèn né Yeésò. Nùà hèllè lé kuú baá ndɔ. Bɔ́ ye, Pɔ̂l lé ye, nùà sâ lé naâ lè cio komo yuo ma.
44025020	Gèh bɔ̀ njèh dé sâ né mè dé piì yɔgɔ́. Mè lé bú bieè naâ dé cî, ye bú a: Wò gwaán né ké Jerusalem ndeê, te béh nde ju yeè tená ké sâ wa?
44025021	Ye mè a: bɔ́ yí kwá ŋgɔ́gɔ̀ nyí ké gwà cibì ye; wa mgbè Rɔ̂m ndeè ju nyî tena nde né kɔɔ́ ma. Jomo sâ mè ye: bɔ́ njí cú bú ké gwà cibì ndɔ, à den ŋgɔgɔ̂ teèn, te bɔ́ ndeè njií ye bú ké toò mgbè dé koô.»
44025022	Agrípà yeé ŋgweé gi aá ménâ, ye Fésetù a: «Mè gwaán né sònò nùà sâ mé tie mò ŋgweê ndɔ.» Fésetù ye bú a: «Kwéh wò nde né bú ŋené.»
44025023	Cieé ŋaga ndɔ Agrípà bɔ̂ Berenîk waà. Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lɔ sâ, mé bɔ̀ kwaá-taâb, bilí cɔ njií bɔ́, bɔ́ yila nde ké gwò bèh ju tueê. Jomo sâ Fésetù ye: bɔ́ ndé yílá ndê mé Pɔ̂l. À waà ndɔ.
44025024	Fésetù deên ye: «Mgbè Agrípà mé bɔ̀ nùàr doó dɔɔ́ŋ, bí né nùà hên ŋené. Lé naâ mene ké Jerusalem, né mene kán, dàm bɔ̀ Jûf lé naâ bú toò mò sií, bɔ́ lé naâ ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií, ye mè a: wúlá bú wulà.
44025025	Sâ bèh saâb mé bɔ́ nde né bú teèn wulá, mè dé mò ŋéné ŋgwéh. Bú nùà njèh yeé ŋene aá ménâ, ye ju nyî kènê nde aá ké toò mgbè Rɔ̂m ma. Mè nde né bú ménâ tema njií ndɔ.
44025026	Njèh cén, kwɔ̀m teèn sam. Mè mé nùà dueè mò nyagá njií nde né kei? Mè bú ká toò biì hên yilá kwaá né dé cî, due né toò yeè mgbè Agrípà; te béh kwa kwɔ̀m, mè nyagá njií ye mé mgbè.
44025027	Lòù sam, njií mé bɔ́ lé naâ nùà gwà cibì teèn sií, mɔ mè kwɔ̀m hèllè sè kɔ́ ŋgwéh, mè njií weh bú mbaá, sâ seé kùlù sam wa?»
44026001	Jomo sâ Agrípà ye Pɔ̂l a: «Baá toò yeè.» Pɔ̂l me fɔ njií bɔ́ mé be ndɔ, à tueé sòn seèn, ye:
44026002	«Mgbè Agrípà, lan temé mò die baá lè, ye mè sòn mò tueé nde né toò yeè, te kwɔ̀m mé bɔ̀ Jûf né mè teèn sií dɔɔ́ŋ, wò ŋgweé mé tie yeè.
44026003	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, wò né gi tòù bɔ̀ Jûf kɔɔ́, wò né gi bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ́ kuú yeé saân teèn dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Kúkùr yeè, kwá sèŋ, te wò ŋgweé gi bɔ̀ ŋgòr mò.
44026004	«Dàm bɔ̀ Jûf né gi dene mò kɔɔ́. Mè lé naâ ké lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr mò kulá, mè nde kula weéh ké Jerusalem.
44026005	Bɔ́ né mè kɔɔ́ dàb baá teèn. Mɔ bɔ́ né gwaán, bɔ́ nde gi né mé sòn bɔɔ̀n tueé, ye mè lé naâ te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Farisiên teèn ma. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé tòù bɔ̀ Jûf jolo lom né mé terreb lé naâ béh. Kɔ bɔ́ gwàn ŋgwéh gècên tueê, wanɔɔ́ŋ né ménâ.
44026006	«Kènê ndéb mé Càŋ lɔ naâ mé bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ kwaá kwaá sâ, mè yeé baá ndèm teèn kwaá den, mè ju hên yila kuú né mé njéh.
44026007	Gèh bɔ̀ nùàr beèh yulà cùɔ̀b fà hên dɔɔ́ŋ ndèm mé ndéb Càŋ cên sâ kwá njí táré ŋgwéh ndɔ wa? Ŋgweéh bɔ́ Càŋ cibi mé suútenè mene dua den né dé cî mà. Mè tueé wò mgbè, bɔ̀ Jûf mè hên bunó seér cu né mé ndèm cên sâ.
44026008	Kei bɔɔ́ né bí kɔɔ́? Bí gwàn ŋgwéh ye, Càŋ né nùàr lè cio komo sɔm dé keì?
44026009	«Mè lɔ naá giì tég lege lom ndɔ, ye te nùàr yilí Yeésò nùà Najarêt sònò fèlà cú.
44026010	Seé mò ké Jerusalem lé naâ cí. Mè lé naâ ké yoòr bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô ndeé, mè jege weh terreb teèn, mè nde bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé njéh te gwà cibì ŋuaán yií. Bɔ́ yeé nde aá bɔ́ wulá, mè lé naâ be ter sɔm njií taré ndɔ.
44026011	Mè lé naâ te bɔ̀ gwà sóù ndeé bele; mè feh keéh bɔ́ gèr teèn, te bɔ́ selé seér yilí Yeésò lòù. Mè nde mé njéh jeré yuo kela bilí ké cie te tàbè bɔ̀ nùàr mene.»
44026012	«Né ka ndeé, loù sâ mè nde bie cu terreb déì mé bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô. Bɔ́ yeé jege haá baá mè, mè nde ké Damâs.
44026013	Wa ceér dueè beré déì, sâ lou baá dilí. Mè tueé wò mgbè, te mè yeé ke, ŋagâ déì ba suagà ter, né lou njerré yɔgɔ́, né kwarè mò njerré yɔŋ, né béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé njií lɔ né mè beè kaáŋ sie.
44026014	Béh né gi doó jege dielé ndeé. Mè ŋgweé hueh déì né mé ju hebreêh tueé, ye mè a: Sɔ̂l, Sɔ̂l, wò nyí ménâ bunó né mé ŋgei wa? Wò feh yeè lè gèr-e yií né mé be yeè. Den né faá nàgà teé yila né lè cùgò beè tele seèn nɔ.
44026015	Mè bie njií ye: Né wò neì wa, Nùà Dueè? Nùà Dueè ye mè a: né nyí Yeésò nuaá mé wò né bunó den sâ.
44026016	Ye mè a: Wùò njébá cú ter. Nyí njolò yeè mân ŋagá yuo kelà né te nyí sie seér wò nùà seê nyî. Wò nde né sòn nyî toò bɔ̀ nùàr den; gèh dé mé wò né nyí lan ŋené hên, te wò tueé bɔ́. Nyí nde né wò bɔ̀ njeré déì feh keéh cuú, te wò tueé cu bɔ́.
44026017	Ye mè a, né mene beè bɔ̀ Jûf, né mene beè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nyí nde né mè teèn temá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, nyí nde né mè yili sɔm ma.
44026018	«Nùà Dueè den cuù ye mè a, nyí nde né mè yoòr bɔɔ̀n tema njií, te mè nde bɔ́ njolo komo lɔgɔ́, mè sɔm keêh bɔ́ te cibi, bɔ́ den bèh ŋagâ; mè sɔm keêh bɔ́ beè Sátàn, bɔ́ den beè Càŋ, bɔ́ kwaá njií temé yoòr nyî, nyí kulu sɔm bɔ́ veên yoòr, te bɔ́ kwa ye bèh dene lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr nyî ma.»
44026019	«Mè tueé wò, mgbè Agrípà, njií sâ yeé ŋené aá toò mò faá bèh mân, mè nde cu né sòn seèn ŋgeén wa?
44026020	Mè ŋar yila baá-re seé seèn ndɔ, mè ŋgòr Càŋ tueé duɔɔ̂m ké Damâs sâ, mè nde ye ké Jerusalem, mè né mé njéh kukwarè te tàbè Judê dɔɔ́ŋ tueé ndeé. Jomo sâ mè tueé nde mé njéh lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ndɔ, mè ye bɔ́ a, bɔ́ yúé fɔ́n feh bɔɔ̀n yueè, bɔ́ bèlè ceér Càŋ, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ seé mé nde né feh keéh ye, bɔ́ kweéh seér aá temé kèn.
44026021	«Bɔ̀ Jûf lé mè sieé naâ dé cî, sâ mè né ké gwà Càŋ koô, bɔ́ ye, kɔ bɔ́ wula sɔm mè wulà.
44026022	Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam, wa hên à née mè beè bɔɔ̀n yili sɔm den, te mè sòn seèn den toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ, huaán maân mé kàm bɔ̀ mene, mè né bɔ́ tueé. Mè hên tueé den cu né ka nág faá bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ mé Músì lɔ tueé naâ nɔ, bɔ́ lɔ ye nde né bɔɔ́;
44026023	wa Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ nde né gèr ŋené, à nde né lè cio komo yuo ma; wa te cio komo yuo lɔgɔ́ nde né bú ndɔ. Mè tueé bí, ceér mé bɔ̀ nùàr nde né mé njéh yili yuo, ŋené ŋagá baá mé bú. À nde né dàm bɔ̀ nùàr beèh cí tueé, à né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam tueé ndɔ.»
44026024	Sâ Pɔ̂l née sòn seèn tueé den ye, Fésetù tueé njií ké ter ndɔ, ye bú a: «Wò né kùlù wa, Pɔ̂l! Wò maán kela baá njèh, feh yeè ŋellé né ter lòù.»
44026025	Pɔ̂l ye bú a: «Mè kùlù sam dé koô, mè dɔɔ́ŋ tueé gi né ŋgòr gècên mé né teèn yilá.
44026026	Mgbe Agrípà lɔ baá giì mé njéh tieè, mè ká toò seèn hueh lèr cú dé cî. Bɔ̀ njií mé lé naá giì felè Yeésò kelá dɔɔ́ŋ, mè né kɔɔ́ ye, mgbè lé naá giì ŋgweé. Lòù sam, bɔ̀ njií sâ lé bɔɔ́ deén naâ bèsɔ́nè.»
44026027	Pɔ̂l den cuù ye: «Mgbè Agrípà, wò nɔ, wò né temé yoòr bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ kwaá njií wa? Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, wò né temé yoòr bɔɔ̀n kwaá njií.»
44026028	Agrípà deên ndɔ, ye Pɔ̂l a: «Wò ye te nyí mè nùà Kristò sie seér wúwágá mân wa?»
44026029	Pɔ̂l ye bú a: «Né mene wúwágá, né mene jomo dɔɔ́ŋ, mè né Càŋ dua, te wò den faá mè nɔ. Wò mé huún gí lòm ŋgwéh ndɔ, te bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né lan felá dɔɔ́ŋ, den gi faá mè nɔ. Njèh cén, dé biì, fɔ̀gɔ̀ lɔ̀ŋ a, té bí kèmà.»
44026030	Mgbè bɔ̂ ŋgɔ́mnà mé Berenîk, mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé naâ kwarè bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ komo wuo gi ter, bɔ́ nde ké bèh ndɔ́ŋ-ndɔ̀ŋ,
44026031	bɔ́ né lètenè bɔɔ̀n tueé kuú, ye: «Nùà hên njeré déì sáb nyì ŋgwéh. Né mene dé wulâ, né mene dé gwà cibì yilâ dɔɔ́ŋ, dé seèn hên cí sam.»
44026032	Agrípà deén baá-re ye Fésetù a: «Mɔ nùà hên sé ju seèn ké toò mgbè dé koô njí ná ŋgwêh, kènê bɔ́ sé la naâ bú yi njií.»
44027001	Yeé baá môn, bɔ́ kaga ndòn ye, béh nde né bàtô yilá, béh nde te tàbè Italî ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé nyegé gi aá gò, bɔ́ weh haá kwaá Pɔ̂l bɔ́ bɔ̀ gwà cibì bɔ̀ déì beè kwaá-taâb déì, yilí seèn né Julíù. À né kwaá-taâb te bɔ̀ŋ taâb mé bɔ́ yilá né bɔ̀ŋ dé mgbè koô. Bɔ́ yeé baá beè seèn,
44027002	béh yila bàtô ndɔ, béh yuo gò. Bàtô sâ lé yuoó naâ Aderàmî, nde né lè bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ hihiné ké te tàbè Asíà kelá bele. Béh bɔ̀ nùà Masedínà déì lé naâ kɔɔ́, à lé yuoó naâ ké Tesalonîk, yilí seèn né Aristârk. Béh bɔ́ né ndeé.
44027003	Cieé ŋaga, béh wa ké Sídɔ̀ŋ. Julíù feh keéh lom Pɔ̂l húɔ́m-temé seèn mé gècên mene, à kwaá lɔ bú te à nde bɔ̀ mbeí dé ké sâ yɔŋ ke, à kwa bɔ̀ njií mé né bú saám beè bɔɔ̀n.
44027004	Jomo sâ béh yila cu bàtô, béh fɔɔ́n gò. Béh bɔ̀ fu tarê nde kwaré, béh cií kela seér tàbè Sîpre kèb jomò,
44027005	béh wa kwarè tàbè Silisî mé Pamfilî, te béh nde ye ké Mírà te tàbè Lisî yuo kelá.
44027006	Ké teèn sâ, kwaá-taâb kwa cu bàtô déì; dé sâ lé yuoó naâ ké Alesandrî, à baá mé gò Italî, à yií cu béh teèn, béh bɔ́ fɔɔ́n gò.
44027007	Cieé mé cieé béh né dùà lè ndèndèŋ nòmò lege den, fu tarê né béh seé weh. Béh nde ké kwarè lɔɔ́ Senidò lege yuo kela baá lòù. Béh yeé bèh toò ndeê kwà cú, béh nde seér cu kèb Salmɔnê, te béh cií kela seér tàbè Kreétà kèb jomò.
44027008	Cieé mé cieé béh dùà lege nde den né lòù. Béh nde lege yuo kela ké kwarè Lasê bèh mé mgbáŋ né teèn. Bɔ́ mgbáŋ sâ yilá né Mgbáŋ Bagaà.
44027009	Béh lé naâ cieé kókoó mbaá ceér dueè bɔɔ́. Dé toò ndeê sé bɔ́ ná cû. Lòù sam, cieé yáb joloò lé naâ kelá, bɔ́ lé naâ mé njéh ŋené kɔɔ́, ye cu dùà gɔɔ̀ kela baá, dé dùà gɔɔ̀ nde né yɔgɔ́. Pɔ̂l yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à tueé kwaá bɔ́ toò ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a:
44027010	«Belà, mè né kɔɔ́ ye, béh nde né mé gèr te gò hên kwaré. Mɔ wulu, bàtô bɔ̂ seé seèn mene nde gi né dùà kum le, te béh liím nyegé ye dé beèh cio.»
44027011	Pɔ̂l né mene mân tueé, kwaá-taâb dé sâ táŋ ŋgwéh, à temé kwaá njií seér né te ŋgòr nùà fár-bàtô, bɔ̂ nùà bàtô.
44027012	Nùàr ŋgún gwaán kela dé toò ndeê ndɔ. Lòù sam, cu veên baá ndeê, mɔ kwa lɔ bɔ́ ké te mgbáŋ sâ, bɔ́ nde né gèr ŋené. Bɔ́ ye, mɔ nde né bɔɔ́, te bɔ́ lege wa ké Fenîs te mgbáŋ bɔ̀ Kreétà bɔ̀ déì, te cu veên hèllè nde bɔ́ kwa seér ké teèn. Mgbáŋ sâ né seér kèb nyiìb mân.
44027013	Fu dɔlê yuoô kèb túnò ndɔ, yila kobô. Bɔ́ né mé njéh taáŋ ye, gò bɔɔ̀n nde né huɔɔ́m. Bɔ́ sɔm kùn ndɔ, bàtô yuo gò. Bɔ́ né Kreétà ke njií.
44027014	Tètèì sam, fu tarê kobo yuoô kèb bà, tulu suagà yí te tòre,
44027015	vela far seér bàtô, né béh dé lege keè taré yɔgɔ́, lu yuo mé béh.
44027016	Béh nde kela seér aá tàbè Kódà kèb túnò, te cií weh béh teèn. Sâ né bèh mé béh lé naâ mé gècên mene lege, te béh nde ye kɔm dé gàm mvelé sɔm.
44027017	Bɔ́ tulu kaga kwaá njií ké ter sònò bàtô ndɔ. Bɔ́ né bàtô kaga nyegé, te ŋèrrè cú. Bɔ́ se si kwaá kùn dùà, te bàtô gɔ lie lòù, bɔ́ ye, mɔ sam, nde né te mbésebé ké kwarè Libî cu yilá ma. Fu mé béh kobo nde den baá-re méménâ.
44027018	Fu dé tarê hèllè béh yoòr ŋar yila cu ye baá-re dé gècên. Cieé yeé ŋaga baá, bɔ́ duɔɔ́m bɔ̀ seé dùà sɔm silí njiî.
44027019	Cieé ŋaga cu, bɔ́ yila njèh bàtô dùà mé be bɔɔ̀n sɔm su njiî.
44027020	Fu doô ye júée nyí ndɔ. Béh sɔɔ́ ké kunduŋ, béh cer; cieé mé cieé, lou bá ŋgwéh, nuaré déì mbentò mé njolo ŋéné cú ndɔ, dɔɔ́ŋ béh munó lom aá ye, béh kuú gi aá kèn.
44027021	Cieé kókoó mbaá, nuaá mé yieé sɔm yáb te bàtô teèn sam. Yeé baá ménâ, Pɔ̂l komo wuo ter toò bɔ̀ nùàr, ye bɔ́ a: «Belà, mɔ bí sé naâ sòn mò ŋgweé, béh sé naâ ké Kreétà den ŋgɔgɔ̂, béh sé gèr mé bɔ̀ njèh mân kùm lɔ́ ná ŋgwêh.
44027022	Mé njéh mene, mè né bí kènê tueé, bí táré sér yo. Lètenè beèh dɔɔ́ŋ nuaré déì kú ndé ŋgwéh, ŋerré lom nde né bàtô.
44027023	Cìlì Càŋ naâ mè cíbíteèn tueé; mè né beè Càŋ, mè hên bɔɔ́ yeé seé seèn ndɔ. Cìlì Càŋ naâ ká kwarè mò njebá ndeê,
44027024	ye mè a: Pɔ̂l, té vèh, kɔ wò wa ké toò mgbè Rɔ̂m waà. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né lè bàtô hên dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn nde né bɔ́ jomo yeè yili sɔm keéh ndɔ.»
44027025	Pɔ̂l den cuù ye bɔ́ a: «Bí táré temé tarè belà! Mè né gi Càŋ mò kɔɔ́; à bɔɔ́ nde né faá à la naâ mè tueé nɔ.
44027026	Njèh cén, mɔ béh baá kwarè ten tàbè déì, béh nde né sòn nòmò karé sue le.»
44027027	Sâ béh ké dùà sâ bɔɔ́ baá cieé yulà cùɔ̀b nèà, fu né mé béh ké te ndèndèŋ nòmò faár ndeé den. Nòmò sâ bɔ́ yilá né Mediteranê. Te cieé yulà cùɔ̀b nèà sâ, yeé baá lɔgɔ̀teèn, bɔ̀ fár-bàtô bɔ̀ ŋgweé kɔ ndɔ, ye tàbè déì baá dìdì.
44027028	Bɔ́ si yií mòù dùà, nde cor tàbè, sâ baá métà yulà tagár cùɔ̀b téhbeh. Bɔ́ né ka ndeé, wa berré déì, bɔ́ si yií cu mòù doô dùà, sâ yila le aá métà ndètoón cùɔ̀b téndelé.
44027029	Bɔ́ yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ se silí njií kùn dùà nèà, ye te gɔ den lilieé, wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ nde né te kweéh déì ceén. Bɔ́ né cieé teèn lulú kela den ndɔ.
44027030	Sâ né cu mé bɔ̀ fár-bàtô bɔ̀ lé fɔɔ́n naâ ceér teèn, ye te bɔ́ dula si lɔ bàtô. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ se kwaá njií kɔm dé gàm dùà ndɔ, bɔ́ né bɔɔ́ faá bɔ́ nde né kùn ké te feh bàtô bɔɔ́ nyegé nɔ.
44027031	Pɔ̂l yeé ŋene aá ménâ, ye kwaá-taâb mé bɔ̀ sɔ́jì a: «Mɔ bɔ̀ fár-bàtô bɔ̀ hên lè bàtô dèn lè ŋgwéh, bí nde gi né dùà kum le.»
44027032	Bɔ̀ sɔ́jì nde kɔ tena sɔm yuií kɔɔ̀m ndɔ, kɔm hèllè kwar yuo.
44027033	Cieé yeé nde aá ŋagá, Pɔ̂l bɔŋ bɔ́, te bɔ́ yieé yáb, ye bɔ́ a: «Lan dɔɔ́ŋ baá cieé yulà cùɔ̀b nèà bí né mé lèì cùè den den.
44027034	Bí yíé bá yáb yieè, te gam bí. Mè tueé bí, né mene yúlí feèh nuaré déì lèr nyì ndé ŋgwéh.»
44027035	Pɔ̂l yeé tueé gi aá ménâ, à weh breêd ndɔ, à vra Càŋ teèn, à yila kɔlé yieê.
44027036	Yo taré cu ye bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ yila baá-re yieê ndɔ.
44027037	Béh lé naâ te bàtô nùà yuií fà mé yulà téhbeh cùɔ̀b ténjén.
44027038	Dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ yieé fulu gi, bɔ́ ŋuaán su njií yab dé jomò dùà, te bàtô líé cú.
44027039	Cieé ŋaga, bɔ́ ŋene tàbè ndɔ. Njèh cén, bɔ́ tàbè sâ ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh. Bɔ́ ŋene njií mgbáŋ déì mé mbésebé mene, bɔ́ kaga lom aá ndòn ye, mɔ nde né bɔɔ́, bɔ́ lemé njií lom nde aá bàtô ké teèn ma.
44027040	Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ kɔré tená sɔm yuií, bɔ̀ kùn sue le dùà, bɔ́ se yi pìlì ndɔ. Jomo sâ, bɔ́ daá kwaá cɔ̀gɔ̀ ké toò bàtô, te fu yila teèn, lu bàtô, bɔ́ lemé njií bú ké te mbésebê hèllè.
44027041	Bɔ́ né ka ndeé, bɔ́ wa berré déì, mbésebé ŋgimé geé baá nòmò kpɔŋ fà, nòmò né bèh sâ kwar taré, kwar dɔm weh bàtô hèllè, feh nde cor nyue yila te mbésebê tég, gurú ŋgela le teèn, nòmò tulu ŋerré sɔm tií ké jomo ndɔ.
44027042	Bɔ̀ sɔ́jì dé bɔɔ̀n ye, bɔ́ nde aá bɔ̀ gwà cibì bɔ̀ wulá sɔm, te bɔ́ gwágá dùlà yùò cú.
44027043	Kwaá-taâb yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à yiín bɔ́, ye te nyí yili sɔm Pɔ̂l. Jomo sâ ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né nòmò gwagá kɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ a, lɔ́lé dìè gí dùà, bɔ́ gwagá kela toò ma.
44027044	Bɔ̀ déì a, wèh béh-toû, bɔ́ gwagá mé njéh, bɔ̀ déì weh ten bàtô. Bɔ́ lé bɔɔ́ naâ ménâ, te béh nde ye dɔɔ́ŋ yili yuo.
44028001	Béh yeé yili yuo gi aá, te béh ŋgweé den ye yilí ten tàbè sâ, ye né Máltà.
44028002	Bɔ̀ lɔɔ̂ bɔ̀ sâ weh lom béh mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene. Bɔ́ yeé ke, nu baá neé, dùlù baá dɔlé, bɔ́ fu kwaá béh we, bɔ́ bilí kwaá béh teèn, béh né ŋuagá den.
44028003	Pɔ̂l nde kabe weh keém jaâr, à né tuar kwaá den. We yeé baá bɔgɔ́, ŋgòbò yuo kelà lè jaâr, à gwa sege le Pɔ̂l beè.
44028004	Bɔ̀ lɔɔ̂ bɔ̀ yeé nde ŋene njií ménâ, bɔ́ duɔɔ̂m lètenè bɔɔ̀n tueé kuû, ye: «Nùà hên né lom nùà wúlá-feèh. À naá menè yí dùà mvelé yuo, à nde né kuú faá ndùàn Càŋ né bú yoòr nɔ.»
44028005	Mé njéh mene, Pɔ̂l mele kaga si njií ŋgòbò hèllè tuar, njeré déì bú beè ŋgwèrrè nyì ŋgwéh.
44028006	Sâ bɔ̀ lɔɔ̂ bɔ̀ dé bɔɔ̀n né lom kela, ye nde aá fulu; mɔ sam, Pɔ̂l nde aá mé njéh die kuú. Bɔ́ né ka ke den, bɔ́ ke ke, njeré déì Pɔ̂l bɔ́ ŋgwéh. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ den cuù mé feh bɔɔ̀n, ye: «Nùà hên né càŋ.»
44028007	Ké bèh sâ, lé naâ kwarè lɔɔ́ nùà koô te tàbè sâ, yilí seèn lé naâ Publiyûs. Nùà sâ feh béh bèh cèrrè ndɔ, béh cer ké teèn cieé tagár, à ke lom béh dé gècên.
44028008	Sâ tele seèn lé naâ baán ndɔ, à lé naâ mé dùlù yoòr, à lé naâ mbo sura ndɔ. Pɔ̂l yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, à yɔŋ nde teèn, à dua Càŋ, à ba bú be felè, à taré sɔm bú.
44028009	Jomo sâ bɔ̀ beên bɔ̀ te ten tàbè sâ wa belê ndɔ, bɔ́ taré yuo gi.
44028010	Béh cer ké sâ weéh tagár. Bɔ̀ lɔɔ̂ bɔ̀ né béh húɔ́m-temé bɔɔ̀n feh keéh. Béh yeé baá mé gò, bɔ́ bie béh gò mé njèh beè ŋgún. Jomo sâ béh yila cu bàtô déì, béh fɔɔ́n gò. Bàtô sâ lé yuoó naâ ké Alesandrî. Bɔ́ teèn nyagá kwaá né «Bɔ̀ càŋ huaán feèh”. À lé ké doó sâ du deén naâ, te cu dùlù gi.
44028012	Béh né ka ndeé, béh wa Sirakû, béh bɔɔ́ ké sâ cieé tagár.
44028013	Béh yuo cu ké sâ, béh nde Regiô. Cieé ŋaga fu déì kobo yuoô kèb túnò, weh sie béh beè; béh bɔɔ́ cegé cieé fà, béh yila Pùjɔ̂l.
44028014	Béh wa te lɔɔ́ sâ, béh kwa bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì teèn, bɔ́ yilá njií béh ké yoòr bɔɔ̀n, béh bɔ́ cer ké sâ cieé téhbeh. Jomo sâ béh fɔɔ́n gò Rɔ̂m.
44028015	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé ké Rɔ̂m yeé ŋgweé aá njàgà beèh, bɔ́ ndeè béh ceér dueè kwa weh. Bɔ̀ déì kela le béh ké bèh mé bɔ́ yilá né Gwà-mbè-tagár. Bɔ̀ déì ndeè kela béh ké tan Apiyû. Te Pɔ̂l yeé nde ŋene njií bɔ́ mân, à Càŋ vra lom mé be fà, yo taré cu bú ndɔ.
44028016	Béh yeé wa baá ké Rɔ̂m, bɔ́ ye Pɔ̂l a, ndé dèn bá dé seèn hiín, bɔ́ bú jomo kwaá lom aá sɔ́jì cén.
44028017	Pɔ̂l cer cieé tagár, à yilá njií bɔ̀ Jûf dé kokoô ké lɔ seèn. Bɔ́ yeé waà baá, ye bɔ́ a: «Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè ye te bí kɔ ye, bɔ́ lé mè ké Jerusalem sie kuú naâ dé lòù, bɔ́ haá njií mè beè bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀. Mè lé veên déì mé bɔ̀ nùàr beèh bɔ́ njí ná ŋgwêh, mè lé tòù bɔ̀ tele beèh kwá ná ŋgwêh ndɔ.
44028018	Bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀ lé naá menè kwɔ̀m bieé, bèh saáb mé bɔ́ nde né mè teèn wulá, bɔ́ lé kwà ná ŋgwêh. Bɔ́ yeé nde aá mè yi njií,
44028019	bɔ̀ Jûf ye, ndɔ́g ménâ bɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ. Mè yeé ŋene aá ménâ, mè ye, mè ju mò njií seér nde né ké toò mgbè Rɔ̂m ma. Dèn ŋgwéh ye mè lé sâ sií naâ bɔ̀ nùàr beèh ndɔ.
44028020	Yeé baá mân, mè ye, kɔ mè yilá njiî bí ká toò, te bí kɔ ye, nùà mé dàm bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi ndèm yoòr seèn kwaá njií doô, mè lè fɔ̀gɔ̀ lɔ̀ŋ hên cer kuú né felè seèn.»
44028021	Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ hèllè ye bú a: «Bɔ̀ Judê bɔ̀ lé béh njeré déì felè yeè nyàgà njí ná ŋgwêh. Nuaré déì lé ké sâ yùò ná ŋgwêh, à ndeè béh ŋgòr veên déì felè yeè tueé ndɔ.
44028022	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh gwaán né sònò yeè mé tie beèh ŋgweê. Lòù sam, béh né kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ŋ dé mé wò né teèn sâ, bèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ né yeé bú bunó.»
44028023	Bɔ́ bɔ̀ Pɔ̂l tena kwaá cieé ndɔ. Yeé baá loù sâ, bɔ́ komo waà ké gwò seèn kókoó mbaá, Pɔ̂l né bɔ́ njèh se, à se sɔɔ́ mé njéh tɔ́g wa liyilì. À né bɔ́ felè Lò Càŋ tueé. Njií mé sóú Músì tueé né felè Yeésò, à né bɔ́ se. Njií mé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ tueé né felè Yeésò, à né bɔ́ se ndɔ. À né ceér fɔɔ́n ye te nyí dɔr weh bɔ́ mé njéh.
44028024	À yeé tueé gi aá, bɔ̀ déì kwaá njií temé teèn, bɔ̀ déì berɔ́ŋ seér lòù.
44028025	Bɔ́ yeé baá lòù saán yuo ménâ, Pɔ̂l deên ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a: «Cúcuí Ŋagâ lɔ jue bɔ̀n. Cu mé à lé naâ bɔ̀ tele biì njèh sònò Esáyà sòn-Càŋ tueé keéh,
44028026	à lé ye: Ndé yoòr bɔ̀ nùà hên, júée bɔ́ a: Dé felâ, bí nde gi né bagasé felá nyegé, bí seér ŋgwé ndé ŋgwéh lòù. Bí nde gi né bagasé ke den, ndɔ́g bí seér ŋéné kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.
44028027	Lòù sam, temé bɔ̀ nùà hên baá gi lè maŋgwan, te bɔ́ mùnò kòmò cú. Bɔ́ duagá baá tie kèn, te bɔ́ mé tie ŋgwé cú. Bɔ́ lier aá njolo, te bɔ́ mé njolo ŋéné cú. Te bɔ́ ká yoòr mò ndé sér cû, te mè bɔ́ táré sɔ̀m cú ndɔ, jue mè Càŋ Dueè.»
44028028	Pɔ̂l den cuù, ye bɔ́ a: «Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ lé naâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ceér seèn feh keéh, te bɔ́ yili yuo. Dé bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ nde né ŋgweé.» [
44028029	Te Pɔ̂l yeé nde tueé sɔm mân, bɔ̀ Jûf kem yuo, bɔ́ né lom mé njéh lètenè bɔɔ̀n ŋaáŋ ndeé.]
44028030	Pɔ̂l cer ké sâ nyèmà fà. À lé gwà sâ gwɔm beéh lòù ndɔ. Bɔ̀ nùàr lé naâ yoòr seèn ndeé, à né bɔ́ weh nyegé,
44028031	à né bɔ́ felè Lò Càŋ se, à né bɔ́ ŋgòr felè Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh feh. À bɔ́ njèh tueé ŋagá lom gùm dɔɔ́ŋ, à njeré déì vèh ŋgwéh.
45001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, nùà seê Yeésò Kristò; mè né cu nuaá mé Càŋ lé balé weéh naâ ye te mè ŋa mbɔ̀ŋ tebê nyî, à jege haá mè Njàgà Bagaà seèn beè, ye mè a, ndé sè yɔ̀ŋ seè ndɔ.
45001002	Càŋ lɔ naâ ndéb ter kwa kwaá, à tueé keéh sònò bɔ̀ sòn-seèn bɔ̀ ye nyí nde né Njàgà Bagaà sâ cie sɔm keéh; bɔ́ lé naâ te mvù nyagá kwaá ndɔ.
45001003	Né Njàgà Bagaà felè Ŋuna seèn, Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò. À né ndùté ndùtù Davîd kèb dé nùàr.
45001004	Kèb dé Cúcuî, à né Ŋunà Càŋ. Càŋ lé bú sie kwaá naâ kɔɔ́; à lé naâ bú te cio komo sɔm te feh keéh mé terreb mene ye, né Ŋuna nyî.
45001005	Mè fùgò beè Càŋ hên kuú né mé yilí seèn; mè mbɔ̀ŋ tebê seèn ŋa né mé njéh ndɔ. Càŋ ye mè a: ndé ju seèn ké lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr mé gèh hihiné tueé bele, te bɔ́ kwaá njií lom temé cén yoòr seèn, bɔ́ ŋgweé sòn seèn, yilí seèn ŋgulí mé njéh.
45001006	À jue né mé bí bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀ mene, Càŋ lé naâ bí yilá, te bí ŋa bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò Kristò mân.
45001007	Mè hên nyagá njií né mé bí bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé temé Càŋ né yoòr bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ, à lé naâ bí yilá, te bí den bɔ̀ nùàr seèn. Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
45001008	Mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ felè bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ vra lɔgɔ́ née Càŋ ye; mè né bú jomo Yeésò Kristò vra keéh. Lòù sam, bí né temé yoòr Yeésò Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ kwaá njií, ŋgɔ́g bi`i né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgulí ndeé.
45001009	Bú Càŋ mé feh seèn né gi kɔɔ́, ye mè tueé né gècên, bú mé mè né seé seèn mé temé mò mene bɔɔ́, mè né Njàgà Bagaà felè Ŋuna seèn se doô: à né kɔɔ́ ye mè né yeé nyí felè bi`i cu dɔɔ́ŋ dua den.
45001010	Mè né bú dua, ye bú a, mé húɔ́m-temé seèn, à há mè lɔ́ŋ mé be seèn, te mè ndeè ké yoòr bi`i ma.
45001011	Wanɔɔ́ŋ mè né mé tuaá bi`i kela, mè ndeè né bí gà seé Cúcuí Càŋ feh, te bí kwa nyegé terreb mé njéh.
45001012	Mè tétég gwaán né ké lètenè bi`i deèn, te yo taré mè, taré bí, te yo taré gi béh bí felè temé cên mé béh né yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií hên dɔɔ́ŋ.
45001013	Belà, mè ye te bí kɔ ye, cu dɔɔ́ŋ mè né gò ké yoòr bi`i gwaán sɔɔ́, mè lɔ́ŋ kwà ŋgwéh lòù. Mè ye te seé mò wa tàb ké lètenè bi`i, faá né lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr lè tàbè dé`i waá ndeé nɔ.
45001014	Kɔ mè né ménâ bèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ ndeé; seé mò né cí. Né mene lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé cer yeé lɔ, mé ya dueè mene; lètenè bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ cùr mene, kɔ mè né ménâ bɔɔ́.
45001015	Mè gwaán né mé Njàgà Bagaà ké Rɔ̂m lètenè bi`i se waâ dé cî.
45001016	Mè tueé bí, Njàgà Bagaà né mè yoòr sagár: à né mé terreb Càŋ yoòr, te à yili sɔm bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií; duɔɔ̂m né mé bɔ̀ Jûf, nde mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam.
45001017	Mɔ né mân, sâ Njàgà Bagaà né seé Càŋ cie feh kwaá; à feh kwaá né nùàr gèh dé mé Càŋ nde né bú nùà dilî teèn yilá keéh. Gèh dé sâ né lom temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njiî, ceér dé`i toò sam cuú. Né te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Nuaá mé ŋa né nùà dilî beè Càŋ mé temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njiî dɔɔ́ŋ, kwa nde né yɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ́.»
45001018	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ ké te vulúu baá bèsɔ́nè feh kwaá, ye nyí né mé yúlá-temé felè veên hihiné mé bɔ̀ nùàr né bɔɔ́ doô; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ seé vevenê bɔɔ̀n hèllè bɔɔ́, bɔ́ né gècên nyî mé njéh doó dobó baré njií, bɔ́ nyí vèh cú.
45001019	Kèkènè seé Càŋ mé bɔ́ sé naâ Càŋ mé njéh ŋené kɔɔ́, Càŋ né mene bɔ́ bèsɔ́nè mé feh seèn feh keéh, mé njéh mene bɔ́ ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh.
45001020	Á sâ, bèh lɔ mé Càŋ lɔ sií naâ wɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ mene bú mé njolo ŋéné ŋgwéh, kèkènè seé seèn né yeé cie ŋené ŋagá, ye né Càŋ terrèb, Càŋ ndeèr ma. Mɔ bɔ́ mân gwàn ŋgwéh, sâ bɔ́ mé sòn toò seèn sam ndɔ.
45001021	Bɔ́ né mene Càŋ ŋené kɔɔ́, bɔ́ bú sén ŋgwéh, bɔ́ bú vrà ŋgwéh faá bɔ́ sé naâ bú vra ye à né Càŋ. Yeé baá môn, bɔ́ duɔɔ́m baá-re lòù munó ndegé seêr, bɔ́ né te cibi ndugó faáŋ ndeé.
45001022	Wa bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kɔ́-njèh bɔ̀ sé wa, sâ kùlù mé bɔ́ lɔ jueè ceré né bɔ́.
45001023	Bɔ́ lɔɔ̀ né gùm Càŋ Ndeèr Nùà sùsùm duaà, bɔ́ nde cècàŋ bɔɔ́ kwaá, bɔ́ dua seér cí; bɔ̀ dé`i fela né nùàr, mé né ká lè wɔ́ŋe wàn mbaá; bɔ̀ dé`i fela né non, bɔ̀ dé`i fela nyam, bɔ̀ dé`i sàb; dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ né gi bɔ́ dua ndualé gɔ.
45001024	Yeé baá mân, Càŋ sɔm be seèn yoòr bɔɔ̀n ndɔ, te bɔ́ teré yila kɔ te núlu, faá bɔ́ né gwaán sâ nɔ, te bɔ̀ dé kàn mé dé kân loró den mé fegùl`i yoòr ndɔ.
45001025	Bɔ́ bɔɔ̀n naâ gècên Càŋ kwaá lɔɔ́, bɔ́ gwaán seér nyeén. Càŋ mé lɔ sií naâ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né bú kwaá lɔɔ́, bɔ́ né njií mé à lɔ sií naâ lòù dua seér. Ŋgweéh bɔ́ sé la dua seér né bú wa? È môn.
45001026	Càŋ yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à sɔm be yoòr bɔɔ̀n ndɔ, te bɔ́ loró kwaá nyegé bɔ̀ njèh fegùl`i sâ mé njéh yoòr bagasé. Bɔ̀ véh bɔɔ̀n nde né mé feh bɔɔ̀n kweéh seér: bɔ́ bɔ̀ siíb kɔɔ́ cèr ndé cú, bɔ̀ véh cer seér nde aá bɔ̀ mbaábɔn kɔɔ́.
45001027	Bɔ̀ siíb gwàn ndé cú bɔ̀ véh ceèr ndɔ, tuaá sie seér nde aá bɔ́ mé bɔ̀ siíb mbaábɔn ceèr. Bɔ̀ nùàr mân bɔɔ́ sabé gɔ né te bɔ̀ dé kàn mé dé kân loró le gi léláŋ fegùl`i, bɔ́ tulu su dùkàŋ yoòr mé be bɔɔ̀n; né sòn veên mé bɔ́ né bɔɔ́ gɔ sâ.
45001028	Bɔ́ yeé berɔ́ŋ baá Càŋ ménâ, Càŋ sɔm be yoòr bɔɔ̀n ndɔ, à kwaá lɔ bɔ́ mé lo mapelîm bɔɔ̀n sâ, te bɔ́ bɔɔ́ seér njií mé bɔ́ sé lé bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh.
45001029	Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ gela den baá-re mé gèh veên hihiné lè dedeí ndɔ: dene gogobô o, temé te njèh nùàre kwaá njiî o, jéré-temé o, huer o, wúlá-feh o, jɔ́gɔ́ o, tánágá o, jélá-temé o, dɔɔ́ŋ né seé bɔɔ̀n. Bɔ́ né sòn tuagá sar gɔ,
45001030	bɔ́ né bɔ̀ njèh vevenê lètenè bɔɔ̀n yoòr tueé su kuú, bɔ́ né Càŋ bunó, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ mbaábɔn selé, bɔ́ né feh ham, bɔ́ né punó, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ veên dé fefeê munó fɔɔ́n gɔ, bɔ́ sòn bɔ̀ tele mé bɔ̀ meí ŋgwé cú ndɔ.
45001031	Bɔ́ baá gi mé ndòn kukuû mân, bɔ́ faá bɔ́ tueé kwaá yeé nɔ bɔ́ wá cú, bɔ́ baá gi bɔ̀ maŋgwan, bɔ́ jere bɔ̀ mbaábɔn kɔ́ cú.
45001032	Bɔ́ né gi ndéb Càŋ kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi gèh bɔ̀ njií hên bɔɔ́ wa, sàgà bɔɔ̀n né yeé cio ma. Bɔ́ né mene mân kɔɔ́, mé njéh mene bɔ́ né cu bɔɔ́ ŋeí. Nuaá mé né lòù bɔɔ́ sabé seér dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ vela seér cu bú be lòù.
45002001	Mɔ né mân, sâ wò nuaá mé né ju felè bɔ̀ mbeî tená gɔ doô, wò né mene ne`i, wò né beè ndɔ. Wò yeè ju felè bɔ̀ mbeî tena né kɔɔ́. Wò yeé tena gi aá, wò né cu ménâ bɔɔ́ taré, sâ ju wò s`iè ndé ŋgwéh wa?
45002002	Béh né kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né veên faá bèh ménâ bɔɔ́, Càŋ ju felè bɔɔ̀n tena lom yeé jéjég.
45002003	Sâ, wò nuaá mé né ju felè bɔ̀ dé`i tená sâ, wò né munó ye nyí nde né ju beè Càŋ mvelé wa? Ŋgweéh seé yeè né taré cí mà.
45002004	Mè tueé wò, wò né sèŋ mé bɔ́-bagaà Càŋ seb, wò né húɔ́m-temé seèn seb ndɔ. Wò kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye Càŋ nyí bagaà ménâ bɔɔ́ den né, te cieé dé`i nyí kweéh seér dene nyî wa?
45002005	Kɔ̀cɔ̀, taŋgwan temê mé kwéh sér bèh. Wò me`i bɔ̀ gèr felè yeè mé be yeè nyegé kwaá baá kèn. Loù mé ŋá-temé Càŋ nde né bèsɔ́nè yuo kelá, à nde né ju jéjêg tená, ju nde né wò sie.
45002006	À sàgà nùà kàn mé nùà kân loù sâ gwɔm nde né mé seé seèn.
45002007	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né be mé seé bagaà kwaá njií, ye bɔ́ né ŋgùlù Càŋ kela, wa bɔ́ gwaán né nùàr beè Càŋ ŋaâ, te bɔ́ kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà doô, yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà loù sâ kwa nde né bɔ́.
45002008	Dé bɔ̀ taáb bɔ̀ seèn, à yúlá-temé seèn tieé su njií nde né yoòr bɔɔ̀n. Né bɔ̀ dúágá-tie bɔ̀ mé né ceér gècên kwaá lɔɔ́, bɔ́ sabé bele seér bɔ̀ njèh vevenê doô.
45002009	Mé bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ me`i bɔ̀ gèr loù sâ ŋene nde né fî. Duɔɔ́m nde né yoòr bɔ̀ Jûf, jomo sâ yoòr bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam.
45002010	Dé bɔ̀ bebagaà bɔ̀, Càŋ nde né bɔ́ faá nùàr nɔ weh kwaá, à yií njií bɔ́ te ŋgùlù seène, à haá bɔ́ dɔlê. Duɔɔ́m nde né yoòr bɔ̀ Jûf, jomo sâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ndɔ.
45002011	Lòù sam, Càŋ dé seèn nùàr lòù gè`i bèh.
45002012	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá gi`i veên bɔɔ́, mé sóú Mús`i kɔ́ ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ ju bɔɔ̀n mé sóú Mús`i téná ndé ŋgwéh; dé bɔɔ̀n veên bɔɔ̀n sie nde né bɔ́ kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ veên mé sóú Mús`i lè bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ ju bɔɔ̀n tena nde né mé sóú Mús`i ndɔ.
45002013	Lòù sam, mɔ nùàr nde né nùà dilî beè Càŋ ŋaá, kɔ à sóú jolo komo mé gùm mene, dèn ŋgwéh mé sóú mbaá ŋgweé faáŋ njiî.
45002014	Mɔ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam né sóú mbaá jolo weh, bɔ́ kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye né sóú Mús`i, sâ bɔ́ né gi feh keéh ye sóú sâ né bɔ́ lè húɔ́me.
45002015	Sâ bɔ́ teèn ménâ feh keéh né ye, njií mé sóú né taga doô né lè bɔɔ̀n nyagá den ndɔ ma. Ndòn bɔɔ̀n tueé den baá-re bɔ́ ménâ ndɔ; cu dé`i né bɔ́ lòù ki seér, cu dé`i à den seèn nɔɔ́ŋ.
45002016	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, loù mé Càŋ kwaá lɔ nde né ju beè Yeésò Kristò teèn, bɔ̀ njií hên dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi`i né cie ŋené yuo kelâ, ŋené yuo kela nde né faá Njàgà Bagaà sònò mò hên tueé den nê nɔ. Loù sâ Càŋ ju tena nde né mé felè bɔ̀ njií mé né lè nùàr leér den mene.
45002017	Wò nùà Jûf dé yeè, yilí yeè né Jûf, wò né gi sóú kɔɔ́, wò yieé né mé njéh, wò ŋueé mé njéh, yo yeè né gi mé yilí Càŋ sagár.
45002018	Njií mé Càŋ gwaán nê dɔɔ́ŋ, wò né gi kɔɔ́, sóú né gi wò feh, te wò ŋene kɔ njèh bebagaà.
45002019	Wò ye, wò né bɔ̀ tácugó ceér feh, wa wò né ŋagâ toò bɔ̀ cibi bɔ̀ ndɔ;
45002020	wò ye nyí bɔɔ́ dilí né bɔ̀ cùr ceér kɔɔ́, wa nyí né bɔ̀ huaán tetɔɔ̂r njèh feh, te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ ceér Càŋ. Ŋgweéh wò ye mé sóú sâ nyí kɔgɔ́n gi aá, nyí baá gi mé gècên teèn wa?
45002021	Sâ kè cú-re! Wò nuaá mé né bɔ̀ dé`i feh hèllè, kei mé bɔɔ́ wò yeè gùm yeè nùà njèh teèn fèh kéh ŋgwéh wa? Wò ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: té yíb ŋúɔ́b; wò dé yeè ŋuɔb né dé ke`i wa?
45002022	Wò ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: té yàgà ndé; wò dé yeè yàgà nde né dé ke`i wa? Wò ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: cècàŋ duaà né lom ve. Bɔɔ́ né naàn mé wò né lè mɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n yilá ndeé, wò né njèh teèn kema wa?
45002023	Wò né sagár nyegé ye nyí né mé sóú Càŋ lè, wò kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye, nyí né bú lòù kwaá seér wa? Wò sé yeé baá méménâ bɔɔ́, ŋgweéh sâ wò bɔɔ́ gulí né Càŋ nùà njèh wa?
45002024	Né te mvù Càŋe môn nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Bɔ̀ nùàr yilí Càŋ hên dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ beéh keéh né mé y`iè bi`i bɔ̀ Jûf.»
45002025	Bí ŋgwé mè tueé bí felè ŋgór ŋɔɔ̂b. Mɔ bí né sóú jolo komo, sâ ŋgór ŋɔɔ̂b né njèh gàm. Mɔ bí né sóú kwaá, sâ mɔ bí ŋɔb mene ŋgór, bí née den ka faá kurú nɔ.
45002026	Cu sâ ndɔ, mɔ kurú dé`i né dé seèn sóú jolo kɔɔ́, sâ Càŋ bú faá nuaá mé ŋɔb aá ŋgór nɔ yílá ndé ŋgwéh wa?
45002027	Mè tueé bí, nuaá mé né sóú jolo kɔɔ́, bɔ́ mene bú ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh, nde né wò mé ju sie, wò nuaá mé sóú jòlò kòmò ŋgwéh hèllè. Wò né mene mé sóú yeè sâ beè, bɔ́ ŋɔb mene wò ŋgór, ju nde né wò sie den.
45002028	Mè tueé wò, nùà Jûf dé gècên, bɔ́ bú te léláŋ mvum njolò ŋéné lòm ŋgwéh. Ŋgór ŋɔɔ̂b gí cégé ŋgwéh mé ŋgàŋ yoòr mbaá ŋɔɔ́b kuû ndɔ.
45002029	Nùà Jûf dé gècên né seér nuaá mé né Jûf yí lè, à dé seèn ŋgór ŋɔb seér né temé seèn. Gèh ŋgór dé sâ Cúcuí Càŋ ŋɔb né bú kɔɔ́, dèn ŋgwéh sóú mé bɔ́ nyagá né lòù. Nùà Jûf dé gècên sâ, Càŋ seén nde né bú kɔɔ́ ndɔ, dèn ŋgwéh nùàr.
45003001	Á sâ, mè né mene Jûf, né cu gam wa? Ŋgór ŋɔɔ̂b né cu njeré dé`i gam ndɔ wa?
45003002	Gàm né lom ŋgún mbaá. Lòù sam, Càŋ lé ŋgòr seèn haá kwaá naâ beè bɔ̀ Jûf.
45003003	Á, mɔ lètenè bɔɔ̀n bɔ̀ dé`i teèn d`il`i ŋgwéh nɔ, sâ béh tueé nde né naàn? Sâ Càŋ dé seèn dilísé dèn ndé cú wa?
45003004	Ndɔ́g, dé sâ seèn môn bɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh! Dé Càŋ, à njebá taré lom nde né te gècên seèn-e tég, gwaán bɔ̀ nùàr a dèn gí léláŋ bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀. Né faá bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né te mvù Càŋe nɔ, ye: «Gwàn dé mé wò den nùà njêŋ faá wò tueé nê nɔ; mɔ bɔ̀ nùàr ye te ju sie wò, te wò yɔgɔ́ bɔ́.»
45003005	Mɔ veên mé béh né bɔɔ́ hên feh seér cu né kɔɔ́, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: Càŋ né dé seèn Nùà gècên, sâ béh sònò tueé cu nde né kei wa? Mɔ béh né veên bɔɔ́, Càŋ béh gèr feh keéh né mé njéh, sâ bí ye Càŋ teèn bɔ́ yí ŋgwéh wa? Bɔ̀ nùàr né ye mân bie seér; mè jue né cí.
45003006	Mè tueé bí, Càŋ bɔɔ́ yií né teèn. Mɔ sam, à sé la ju felè wɔ̂ŋ tena né naàn wa?
45003007	Mɔ nyeén beèh hèllè feh den né ka gècên Càŋ kɔɔ́, te gam bɔ̀ nùàr, bɔ́ seén nyegé Càŋ mé njéh, sâ Càŋ seèn béh mé ju sie cu nde né dé ke`i?
45003008	Á sâ, kei mé yiín cu nde né béh veên bɔɔ̂ kɔɔ́ ndɔ wa? Sâ béh júée ye: béh bɔ́ lòm veên bɔɔ̀, nde né dé bagaà sâ ŋaá seér. Bɔ̀ dé`i né mè yoòr tueé kwaá, ye mè né yeé môn tueé sé wa. Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde né bɔ́ gèr feh keéh, à bɔ́ feh keéh nde né faá seé bɔɔ̀n tueé nê nɔ.
45003009	Mɔ né mân, béh bɔ̀ Jûf, béh né cu bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i yɔgɔ́ wa? Ndɔ́g! Mè la naá gi`i tueé ŋagá ye: né mene Jûf, mene Jûf sam, dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ né gi kwer veên ma.
45003010	Né te mvù Càŋe môn nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Nuaá mé né sɔm nùà dilî, ndɔ́g teèn sam.
45003011	Nuaá mé né ŋgweé kɔɔ́, teèn sam. Nuaá mé né Càŋ fɔɔ́n, teèn sam ndɔ.
45003012	Bɔ́ sabé nde gi aá bèh dàbe, bɔ́ toò leér le gi aá kèn. Ndɔ́g nuaá mé né seé bagaà bɔɔ́, né mene cén tà cén, teèn yùò kélá ŋgwêh.
45003013	Bɔ́ né gi mé tɔgɔ lɔŋ faá sà lɔɔ̀ŋ nɔ; bɔ́ né mé leba fèfà; ŋgòr né lom bɔ́ sònò faá nd`ièm sàb nɔ faám yuo ndɔ.
45003014	Sòn den né bɔ́ beè faá nó nɔ, né lom léláŋ njèh duagâ.
45003015	Tètè`i sam, bɔ́ baá feh wulá.
45003016	Bèh mé bɔ́ né kelá dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né dùkàŋ bɔ̂ gèr teèn we su lɔɔ́.
45003017	Bɔ́ ceér dɔlê ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh.
45003018	Bɔ́ Càŋ vèh bèh ndɔ.»
45003019	Béh né kɔɔ́ ye njií mé mvù sóù né tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, à tueé njií né mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ka sóù. Mɔ né ménâ, sâ nuaá mé nde né Càŋ tueé ye bú a, nyí ceér kɔ́ ŋgwéh teèn sam; te dàm bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ die gi ju beè seèn ndɔ.
45003020	Nùàr a, jòlò kɔ́ mene sóú gèh dé heè, Càŋ bú nùà dilî ké toò seèn mé njéh yílá ndé ŋgwéh. Sóú feh lom né dé seèn dé feèh, ye nùàr a: wò né mé veên yoòr ma.
45003021	Kènê ceér dé feê ŋené yuo kelà baá cie kèn; né ceér mé béh ŋa gi nde né bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ beè Càŋ mé njéh. Ceér bú sâ dé seèn jomo sóù kélá sér ŋgwéh. Mvù sóù bɔ́ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ lé naâ toò mân tueé taré ndɔ, ye:
45003022	Càŋ bɔ̀ nùàr ké toò seèn bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ yilá lom né mé temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njiî. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, à né gi bɔ́ yilá, à dé seèn mé gwèn sam, nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn kè`i cén.
45003023	Nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ naá gi`i veên bɔɔ́. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ kwarè Càŋ sùsùm dèn cú.
45003024	Càŋ yeé ŋene cu aá môn, à yili sɔm bɔ́ mé Yeésò Kristò, à sie seér bɔ́ bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn, dé lòù ndɔ.
45003025	Càŋ lé sɔm kwaá naâ Yeésò faá njèh sèmè nɔ, te à kuú sòn beèh, te à yaga sɔm béh veên yoòr mé húɔ́m seèn. Càŋ ceér bú hên feh keéh né mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ, ye nyí né Càŋ mé né dilísé. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ veên léí toò bɔɔ́, à lé bɔ́ gèr mé njéh fèh kéh ná ŋgwêh,
45003026	à lé yolo seér naâ dé yolô. Dé kènê à feh keéh né bèsɔ́nè ye: nyí né Càŋ mé né dilísé ma, te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, nyí né bɔ́ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ sie seér ndɔ ma.
45003027	Sâ kènê bɔ̀ nùàr né cu mé ceér púnò dé`i toò teèn wa? Dé sâ ndɔ́g! Càŋ béh bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ yilá né felè temé cén mé béh né yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií doô; dèn ŋgwéh mé sóú beleè.
45003028	Béh kɔ né ye Càŋ nùàr nùà dilî ké toò seèn yilá lom né mé temé seèn yoòr Yeésò kwaá njiî, dèn ŋgwéh mé sóú bele komoò;
45003029	wanɔɔ́ŋ sâ Càŋ sé la gi lom né dé bɔ̀ Jûf, à sé la dé bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i ná cû. Mè tueé bí, Càŋ né Càŋ, à né dé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ,
45003030	Càŋ Dueè né lom cén, sâ gi aá. Mɔ bɔ̀ Jûf né temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií, sâ à nde né bɔ́ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ ké toò seèn yilá. Nde cu né mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ménâ ndɔ; mɔ bɔ́ né gi temé kwaá njií taré, à nde né bɔ́ bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ ké toò seèn yilá ndɔ.
45003031	Á sâ, sóú nɔ? Mɔ béh baá temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií, sâ béh ye, sóú njeré dé`i gàm cú wa? Môn sam; béh né kɔɔ́ ye, sóú né mé bèh seê dé seèn teèn.
45004001	Béh felè Abrahâm tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ tueé nde né naàn wa? À lé beè Càŋ kwaá naâ kei wa?
45004002	Mɔ Abrahâm sé beè Càŋ nùà dilî ŋaà naâ mé seé seèn, à sé naâ mé lɔ́ŋ toò Càŋ punô teèn. Á, lé seèn môn ná ŋgwêh, sâ à mé lɔ́ŋ toò Càŋ punô sam gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
45004003	Te mvù Càŋe né bèsɔ́nè nyagá den ye: «Abrahâm lé naâ temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií; Càŋ lé bú nùà dilî yilá naâ mé njéh.»
45004004	Béh né kɔɔ́ ye nùà seê nde né sàgà seé seèn kwa; dé sâ dé lòù sam, né ka sàgà seê.
45004005	Dé nuaá mé né ndèm mé Càŋ kwaá njií, ye Càŋ né ju felè bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ mé jere mene tená, à seé bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde né temé mé à né yoòr seèn kwaá njií doô ŋené, à bú nùà dilî yilá nde né mé njéh.
45004006	Davîd lé tueé naâ felè gèh nùà bú sâ, ye:
45004007	«Samésé né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ kulu sɔm gi aá bɔ́ veên yoòr kèn! Bɔ́ lé naá menè sóú kwaá, à lé naâ dèh doó kulú njií.
45004008	Samésé né nuaá mé Nùà Dueè veên seèn lè s`iè kwá ŋgwéh ndɔ!»
45004009	Á sâ, gèh samésê bú hên gi lom né dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé naâ ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b wa? À dé bɔ̀ kurû sam wa? Mè tueé bí, né mé bɔ̀ kurú mene. Béh la naâ jɔ̀gɔ̀ tueé ye, Càŋ lɔ Abrahâm nùà dilî yilá naâ mé temé yoòr seèn kwaá njiî.
45004010	Á sâ, lɔ naâ heèh wa? Lɔ naâ sâ bɔ́ ŋɔb gi aá Abrahâm ŋgór wa, sâ bɔ́ née bú ŋɔ́b ŋgwéeh ye wa? Mè tueé bí, lɔ naâ sâ bɔ́ née bú ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéeh ye, te jomo sâ bɔ́ nde ye bú ŋɔɔ́b den.
45004011	Bɔ́ lɔ ndeè Abrahâm ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b, sâ baá gi ká jomo mbaá, te feh keéh lòù, ye Càŋ lɔ bú nùà dilî yilá naâ mé temé seèn yoòr seèn kwaá njiî, sâ bɔ́ née bú ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéeh ye ma. Yeé baá ménâ, Abrahâm ŋa tele bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií ndɔ, bɔ́ mene bɔ́ ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh; Càŋ ye bɔ́ né gi bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ beè nyî ma.
45004012	Abrahâm né cu tele bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ŋɔb gi aá ŋgór kèn ménâ ndɔ. Njèh cén, kɔ bɔ́ né temé cén yoòr Càŋ faá Abrahâm nɔ kwaá njií. Lòù sam, tele beèh Abrahâm lé naâ temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií, te bɔ́ nde ye bú ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b.
45004013	Càŋ lɔ kwa kwaá naâ Abrahâm bɔ́ bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù seèn ndéb tieè, ye bɔ́ a: ŋgúlú bɔɔ̀n nde né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ma. Càŋ lɔ ndéb sâ kwá ná ŋgwêh ye Abrahâm né sóú bele komo. À lé ndéb kwa njií seér naâ felè temé mé Abrahâm lé kwaá njií naâ yoòr seèn, à ŋa nùà dilî mé njéh doô.
45004014	Mɔ ŋgúlú sé kwa cegé né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né sóú jolo kɔɔ́, ŋgweéh sâ temé mé béh né yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií hên sé né dé lòù, ndéb Càŋ sé né njèh mbaâ ndɔ mà.
45004015	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, sóú bɔɔ́ yeé kɔɔ́, te temé ŋaá Càŋ lè, ye bɔ̀ nùàr jéjég faá sóú tueé nê nɔ, bèlè bèh. Á sâ, mɔ sóú teèn sam, bɔ́ nde né sóú kwaá wa?
45004016	Càŋ lé ndéb kwa kwaá naâ felè temé yoòr seèn kwaá njiî, te ŋgúlú sâ ŋa njií mé nyí haá né dé lòù, te den njèh gàm dé bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm dɔɔ́ŋ; dèn cégé ŋgwéh dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né sóú bele kɔɔ̂, te ŋa dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé kwaá njií né temé yoòr Càŋ faá Abrahâm nɔ. Lòù sam, Abrahâm né tele beèh, béh dɔɔ́ŋ,
45004017	faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den nɔ, ye: «Mè sie kwaá baá wò tele c`il`i nùàr ŋgûn.» À né tele beèh ké toò Càŋ, Nuaá mé à lé kwaá njií naâ temé yoòr seèn doô; né Càŋ mé komo sɔm yeé bɔ̀ komó te cio kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ njií mé lé teèn ná ŋgwêh dɔɔ́ŋ à lé si gi`i naâ bɔ́ kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
45004018	Mɔ lɔ den mene beè Abrahâm faá à ndéb Càŋ kwà ndé cú, mé njéh mene à lé naá loôm temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií. Yeé baá mân, à ŋa baá-re tele c`il`i nùàr ŋgûn faá Càŋ lé tueé naâ nɔ; sâ Càŋ lé ye bú a: «Bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù yeè maga nde né mân.»
45004019	Abrahâm lé baá gi mene nyèmà yuií, à né mene ŋené kɔɔ́ ye yo nyî baá gi faá komó nɔ, à né mene kɔɔ́ ye Sará né ŋgiín, mé njéh mene à lé yúá ná ŋgwêh,
45004020	à lé temé yoòr Càŋ sɔ̀m ny`i ná ŋgwêh gùm dɔɔ́ŋ, à ndéb mé Càŋ lé kwa kwaá naâ bú tieè doô sàn ŋgwéh ndɔ; à kwaá njií ŋeí seér cu temé yoòr Càŋ dé kwaâ, à né bú teèn seén yií.
45004021	À lé naá gi`i kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye Càŋ né lom mé terreb teèn, à nde né faá à lé tueé naâ nɔ bɔɔ́ komo.
45004022	Càŋ lé bú nùà dilî beè seèn yilá kuú naâ dé cî.
45004023	Njií mé bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né ye: Càŋ yilá baá bú nùà dilî beè seèn hên, bɔ́ dé seèn nyàgà lòm ŋgwéh.
45004024	Bɔ́ nyagá kuú né dé beèh, te béh kɔ ye, Càŋ nde né béh bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ yilá ndɔ. Kɔ béh né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií, ye à lé naâ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò lè cio komo sɔm, sâ ye.
45004025	À lé te cio yila kuú naâ felè veên beèh. À yeé kuú aá, à komo yuo cuù lè cio, ye te béh ŋa gi bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ ké toò Càŋ mé nyí ma.
45005001	Sâ tueé né ye, béh lé bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ beè Càŋ ŋaà naâ mé temé beèh yoòr seèn kwaá njiî. Yeé baá ménâ, kènê lètenè beèh, béh bɔ̀ Càŋ, baá lom aá cɔ̀ŋ felè Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
45005002	Yeésò mé béh né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií hên feh keéh né béh ceér kɔɔ́, te béh nde ye te fùgò Càŋ den yilá. Kènê béh njebá taré lom né teèn mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene tég, ndèm beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi sâ, ye béh nde né ŋgúlú Càŋ yieé.
45005003	Dé koô baá cu ye-re dé hên: sâ temé béh sagár gi cu né mé dàm gèr mene ndɔ. Lòù sam, béh né kɔɔ́ ye gèr ŋenê né yeé béh njèh yolô maán feh.
45005004	Dé yolô, ŋar né dé jolô; dé jolô ŋar dé seèn ndèm.
45005005	Ndèm sâ béh mbaá pɔ́ lɔ́ bèh. Lòù sam, Càŋ lè beèh kulu yií kwaá gi né dàm bɔ̀ gwaân seèn dɔɔ́ŋ; à béh kulu né mé seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ seèn yoòr beèh.
45005006	Né môn, cu sâ béh lé mé terreb yoòr ná ŋgwêh, Kristò lé kuú naâ sòn bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ kɔɔ́, à lé kuú naâ te cu mé Càŋ lé nyegé kwaá naâ sâ ndɔ.
45005007	Sâ, sé né mene nùà dilî dé heè, nuaré dé`i sé cio seèn ŋá wèh ná ŋgwêh. Kɔ ŋgweéh nuaré dé`i nde né-re dé seèn temé sie, à ŋa weh cio nùà bagaà dé`i wa?
45005008	Mè tueé bí, hên baá bèh mé Càŋ feh keéh né gèh dé mé à né lom béh gwaán teèn: béh né mene léláŋ veên, Kristò né lom cio beèh ménâ ŋaá weh.
45005009	Béh bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ ké toò Càŋ ŋa né mé húɔ́m seèn. Yeé baá mân, béh kɔ nyegé baá ndɔ, ye béh nde né mé bú yili yuo, te ju béh beè Càŋ s`iè cú.
45005010	Wanɔɔ́ŋ béh lé naá gi`i bɔ̀ bùnò Càŋ bɔ̀. Mé njéh mene, à béh weh nyɔgɔ́ njií cu aá yoòr seèn mé cio Ŋuna seèn. Sé tagá kènê mé béh bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ seèn sam cuú wa? Ŋuna seèn mé baá cu làŋ béh y`il`i sɔ̀m ndé ŋgwéh wa?
45005011	Te dé koô dé`i cu ye-re ndɔ: vɔ́gɔ́-temé dé koô sagár njií né béh mé Càŋ nùà njèh. Sâ né gi felè Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò, bú nuaá mé lé nyɔgɔ́ bilí naâ béh bɔ̀ Càŋ.
45005012	Veên lé ndeè naâ ká te wɔ́ŋe yilá dɔɔ́ŋ, y`iè lé naâ mé nùà cén, Ádàm; yeé baá môn, veên sâ ŋar cio ndɔ. Cio yila baá-re bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ sie keêh. Lòù sam, bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá gi`i veên bɔɔ́.
45005013	Né môn; mé Càŋ lɔ nde Mús`i sóú beè haá kwaá, sâ veên lé baá gi`i ká te wɔ́ŋe kaá den. Njèh cén, sóú lé teèn ná ŋgwêh. Bɔ́ né mene veên bɔɔ́, sóú mé Càŋ nde né bɔ́ mé njéh sie lé teèn ná ŋgwêh.
45005014	Mé njéh mene, cio lé naâ felè bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgumó. Yuoô lè nàm Ádàm, nde ba mé nàm Mús`i, cio lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr seé weh. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lɔ mene sòn Càŋ faá Ádàm nɔ ŋgén ná ŋgwêh dɔɔ́ŋ, cio lɔ naá gi`i bɔ́ teèn kumó keéh. Ádàm lé sâ deén naâ faá nuaá mé ndeè né waâ nɔ.
45005015	Njèh cén, seé bɔɔ̀n lé kè`i cén ná ŋgwêh. Béh fùgò Càŋ mé veên Ádàm mè ndé ŋgwéh. Nùàr ŋgún lé naá gi`i mé y`iè veên nùà cén hèllè kuú. Dé fùgò Càŋ môn sam, à gam seér né béh dé seèn lòù. Nùà ŋgún kuú gi né mé fùgò felè nùà cên ndɔ. Nùà cên sâ né lom Yeésò Kristò.
45005016	Sàgà mé Càŋ haá yeé dé lòù né dé seèn hiín, dèn ŋgwéh faá sàgà veên nùà cén-tà-cén hèllè nɔ. Veên mé nùà cén sâ lé naâ bɔɔ́ doô sɔm aá sàgà kèn: nùàr kókoó mbaá yila gi aá ju beè Càŋ mé njéh. Sàgà dé fùgò Càŋ môn sam; bɔ̀ nùàr lé né mene dàm bɔ̀ veên toò Càŋ ménâ bɔɔ́ seér, mé njéh mene Càŋ né bɔ́ teèn dé lòù huaár sɔm seér.
45005017	Mé gècên mene, cio lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr felè ŋgumó. Mé y`iè veên nùà cén hèllè, dàm bɔ̀ nùàr lé naá gi`i be te cio yií keéh. Mé Yeésò Kristò cén mé huún seèn né ménâ ndɔ: dàm beèh mé né fùgò beè Càŋ kuú, mé Càŋ né béh bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè seèn yilá dɔɔ́ŋ, béh nde gi né yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà felè Yeésò Kristò kwa, te béh ŋa gi bɔ̀ huaán.
45005018	Gèh dé mé veên nùà cên Ádàm hèllè né nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ te ju tulu yií hên, seé gècên mé Yeésò Kristò mé huún seèn lé naâ toò Càŋ bɔɔ́ dilí dɔɔ́ŋ, nde né bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún ju yoòr ménâ huaár sɔm gií, te bɔ́ kwa yɔ̀ŋ.
45005019	Gèh dé mé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ ŋa gi né bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ felè nùà dúágá-tieè cén doô, nùàr ŋgún ŋa gi nde né bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ ké toò Càŋ felè nùà ŋgwé-tieè cén ménâ ndɔ.
45005020	Dé sóù, à kar yilà né dé te veên bɔ̀ nùàr maga seér dé magaà. Njèh cén, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bèh mé veên né teèn silí, sâ húɔ́m-temé Càŋ teèn maga kela seér cu kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
45005021	Mè tueé bí: gèh dé mé veên lé naâ felè bɔ̀ nùàr cer, tulu yií bɔ́ lè cio doô, fùgò Càŋ cer né felè beèh ménâ, te béh den bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè Càŋ, béh kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà beè seèn. Dé sâ né mé njua Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
45006001	Á hên, béh ye naàn wa? Sâ béh bɔ́ ndé dèn ká mé veên bɔɔ̀, huɔm kela né cí, te béh kuú ye mé fùgò Càŋ wa?
45006002	Dé sâ tí ndɔ̂g! Beè veên béh teèn sam, béh baá nɔɔ́ŋ faá komó nɔ; béh lɔ nyimé naâ heèh, te béh yila cu veên wa?
45006003	Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye, béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá gi`i nòmò Càŋ te yilí Yeésò kou, béh lé sâ kou bilí naâ mé cio seèn mene wa?
45006004	Te nòmò Càŋ sâ, béh bɔ́ lé kuú bilí naâ teèn dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lé bú furú bilí naâ mé béh mene ndɔ, te Tele beèh Càŋ komo sɔm cuù béh te cio, faá à lé komo sɔɔ́m naâ Kristò mé terreb seèn nɔ, te kènê béh kwa seér yɔ̀ŋ dé feê, béh teèn njebá lom aá tég.
45006005	Lòù sam, béh bɔ́ lé kuú bilí naâ kɔɔ́. Mɔ né mân, sâ Càŋ nde né béh te cio faá bú nɔ komo sɔm ndɔ.
