45006006	Béh kɔ́ nyégé dé hên kɔɔ̀, ye: mé bɔ́ lé ndeè bú ké te toû fagá, sâ bɔ́ lé faga bilí naâ mé béh mene; mè jue né gùm beèh dé cuûm, te gùm beèh dé veên sâ vuaán yuo dé seèn, béh kwer veên dèn cú.
45006007	Lòù sam, mɔ nùàr kuú baá, sâ veên felè seèn ŋgúmó ndé cú.
45006008	Mɔ béh bɔ̀ Kristò lé naâ kɔɔ́ kuú bilí, sâ béh né kɔɔ́ ye, béh bɔ́ nde cu né làŋ yili den.
45006009	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, bèh lɔ mé Kristò lɔ komo yuoó naâ te cio, à ndeè cio dé`i kú ŋgwé ndé cú; cio mé terreb felè seèn sam cuú ndɔ.
45006010	À lé mbei cén sâ kuú naâ sòn veên bɔ̀ nùàr, te veên terreb kwà cú. Yeé baá ménâ, à mé yɔ̀ŋ den lom aá dé Càŋ.
45006011	Bí né faá bèh ménâ ndɔ: bí kɔ́ɔ ye, beè veên, bí baá nɔɔ́ŋ faá komó nɔ; bí baá seér bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ yoòr Yeésò Kristò, te bí den lom dé Càŋ.
45006012	Mɔ né mân, sâ veên a, té felè bi`i ŋgúmó cú, wanɔɔ́ŋ sâ yo bi`i dé wàn hên nde né bí te veéne tuan yií.
45006013	Gà dé`i yoòr bi`i a, té veên kèmà, wanɔɔ́ŋ sâ nde né njèh seê seèn ŋaá. Mɔ ye te huɔm, bí kwá lɔ́ gùm bi`i beè Càŋ; ŋgweéh à lé naâ bí te cio komo sɔm mà. Bí bɔ́ bílí seé seèn mé gùm bi`i mene dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ; te bí den gi bɔ̀ njèh seê dé didilî beè seèn.
45006014	Bí té gwàn mé veên cer felè bi`i kɔɔ́. Bí ka sóù sam cuú, bí baá dé bi`i beè Càŋ, bí ka seèn kuú seér né fùgò.
45006015	Sâ baá cu-re kei wa? Kènê, mɔ béh ka sóù sam cuú, béh baá beè Càŋ fùgò kuú seér, sâ béh bɔ́ bá veên mbaá wa? Dé sâ tí ndɔ̂g!
45006016	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ nyegé ye, mɔ bí né ka nuaré dé`i seé seèn bɔɔ́, bí né sòn seèn ŋgweé, sâ bí né bɔ̀ kwer nùà sâ. Né fà: cén né dé kwer veên ŋaâ te bí yila te cio; dé`i né dé tie ŋgweê, te bí ŋa bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ toò Càŋ.
45006017	Ŋgweéh né mân wa: léí toò bí lé naá gi`i kwer veên; kènê bí lè baá seér mé ndéb Càŋ, faá bɔ́ lé naâ bí feh nɔ. Béh né Càŋ mé njéh vra dé gècên.
45006018	Bí te yuií veên huar yuo aá kèn, bí kènê baá seér te ceér gècéne.
45006019	Mè bí mé kwer ká lè wɔ́ŋe me njií né, te bí ŋgweé komo, wanɔɔ́ŋ bí né bɔ̀ yuyuaâ bɔ̀ kela. Léí toò bí lé naá gi`i seé vevenê bɔɔ́, bí né lom te núlu teré ndeé. Kènê bí té ménâ gwàn cú, bí bɔ́ sér á seé didilî te bí ŋa bɔ̀ ŋeŋagâ bɔ̀ mé gùm mene.
45006020	Léí mé bí lé naâ kwer veên sâ, gècên lé mé terreb felè bi`i ná ŋgwêh, bí lé naá seêr mé feh bi`i.
45006021	Bí lé naâ njeré dé`i te seé fúárè hèllè kwa wa? Ŋgweéh kènê bí baá mé njéh lòù gulí seér wa? Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye, né lom seé cioò wa?
45006022	Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam. Yeé baá kènê, à huar sɔm bí yuií veên sâ yoòr, te bí seé bɔɔ́ seér dé seèn. Gam kela né cí, te bí den ŋagásé, bí kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà beè seèn ndɔ.
45006023	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, sàgà veên né cio; njií mé Càŋ haá né mé húɔ́m-temé seèn né yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà, dé lòù ndɔ. À béh mân haá kuú né felè Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
45007001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí né gi sóú kɔɔ́. Sâ njií mé mè nde né bí tueé hên, bí nde gi né kɔɔ́ ye sóú né lom mé terreb felè nùàr, cu mé nùà sâ né làŋ.
45007002	Né faá dene gwà ndɔ nɔ: ma vêh gwɔ̀m jolo lom né cu mé si née mé njolo ye. Mɔ si kuú baá, sâ à baá mé feh lɔŋ, sóú gwɔ̀m bɔɔ̀n doô gi aá ndɔ.
45007003	Mɔ ma sâ nde jɔgɔ ser siíb dé`i mé si née ká jomo mé njolo, sâ ma sâ cum aá gwɔ̀m. Á, mɔ si kuú né lòù, sâ à baá mé feh lɔŋ; mɔ à jɔgɔ cu mene siíb dé`i, sâ à gwɔ̀m cùm ŋgwéh.
45007004	Né felè bi`i faá bèh ménâ ndɔ, bɔ̀ nùàr mò. Bí né kènê toò sóù faá komó nɔ, sóú mé terreb felè bi`i sam cuú. Yeésò Kristò lé naâ bí yoòr seèn nùà njèh nyɔgɔ́ njií. Bí kènê baá gi beè seèn, bú nuaá mé lé naâ te cio komo yuo. À lé sâ ye te béh bí wa gi tàb ké toò Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
45007005	Léí toò, cu mé béh lé belé naâ ceér dé beèh nùà njèh, tuaá lé seé lè beèh bɔɔ́ loóm naâ kɔɔ́; né-re béh ŋaáŋ, né tàb waá, né béh te cio kulu su yií. Sâ sóú soób né béh kɔɔ́.
45007006	Dé kènê môn sam cuú; sóú mé lé naâ béh sie lɔɔ́ sâ, béh ka seèn mvelé yuo aá kèn, béh baá gi komó toò seèn. Kènê béh bɔɔ́ seér nde aá seé dé feê mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ feh né béh kɔɔ́, te béh den lom bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ. Sóú dé lɔ toò mé bɔ́ lé nyagá naâ mé be hèllè, béh ka seèn sam cuú.
45007007	Á sâ, kènê béh tueé nde aá naàn wa? Sóú né njèh veên wa? Tí ndɔ̂g! Mé njéh mene, sóú feh keéh né mè veên mò kɔɔ́. Mɔ sóú sé túé ná ŋgwêh ye: té temé te njèh nùàr kwá njí, mè sé ŋéné kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh ye, temé te njèh nùàr kwaá njiî né jolo.
45007008	Sóú yeé baá mân tueé, veên kwa keéh baá-re ceér teèn ndɔ: à ŋgela lom né te bèh joloò doô tég, te à kulu su keéh mè tuaá hihiné yoòr teèn. Sâ tueé né ye, mɔ sóú sé teèn ná ŋgwêh, veên sé né komó mbaá ndɔ.
45007009	Léí toò mè lé sóú kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, mè lé naá beéh njií mò làŋ. Sóú yeé waà baá, veên ŋené yuo kelà cie ndɔ, à ŋgumo yila mè yoòr.
45007010	Yeé baá ménâ, mè cúg ndɔ. Sóú mé sé la naâ mè lòù yili sɔm hèllè mè y`il`i sɔ̀m cú, derré yií seér aá mè lè cio.
45007011	Lòù sam, veên kwa baá ceér, à né lom te sóu tétég ŋgelá yilá, à né mè bele, à mè wula seér né mé sóú.
45007012	Mɔ né mân, sâ sóú mé feh seèn né ŋagásé, sâ bèh joloò né ŋagá dilí huɔɔ́m ndɔ.
45007013	Á sâ, dé bagaà jɔ̀gɔ̀ baá cu aá y`iè cioò mò kɔɔ́ wa, né kei? Dé sâ, tí ndɔ̂g! Veên né lom ka y`iè cioò mò kɔɔ́. À ŋené ŋagá lom aá yoòr mò mé terreb veên seèn doô mene; à mè wula sɔm cu né mé njèh bagaà jɔ̀gɔ̀ hèllè, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ teèn, ye veên né núlú. Mɔ né mân, sâ njua sóù ndɔ.
45007014	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye sóú lé yuoó naâ beè Càŋ, à né ŋagásé tâŋ. Dé mò, môn sam, mè né lom nùàr mbaá, mè né kwer veên ndɔ.
45007015	Mè né njeré dé`i bɔɔ́, mè be seê mò ŋgwé kòmò bèh: mè njèh bagaà faá mè né gwaán nɔ, bɔ́ kòmò ŋgwéh, mè bɔɔ́ seér cu né njií mé temé mò né yeé bar.
45007016	Njií mé temé mò né yeé bar hèllè, mɔ mè baá cí bɔɔ́, mè né teèn ŋené kɔɔ́ ye sóú né njèh bagaà bɔ̀n.
45007017	Mɔ né mân, sâ mè seé veên doô mé be mò bɔ́ ŋgwéh, né veên mé né yoòr mò bɔɔ́ den né mè ménâ kɔɔ́.
45007018	Lòù sam, mè né ŋené kɔɔ́, ye mè mé bagaà yoòr sam; mè jue né yo mò dé mé húɔ́m né teèn hên. Wanɔɔ́ŋ mè né gi mene seé bagaà gwaán, mè bɔ́ kòmò ŋgwéh nɔ.
45007019	Mè njèh bagaà faá mè né gwaán nɔ, bɔ́ kòmò ŋgwéh. Veên mé mè né bar hèllè, mè né seér cí bɔɔ́.
45007020	Mɔ mè bɔɔ́ seér né veên mé mè kɔɔ́ gwàn ŋgwéh ménâ, sâ mè sam, né veên mé né yoòr mò hèllè bɔɔ́ den né mè ménâ kɔɔ́.
45007021	Á sâ môn ndɔ, kènê mè ŋene kɔ baá kèkènè bú sâ kèn. Né faá bèh mân: mɔ mè nde aá bagaà bɔɔ́, mè bɔɔ́ komo seér veên.
45007022	Temé mò né lom mé sóú Càŋ sagár dé gècên.
45007023	Mé njéh mene, sóú dé hiîn née cu ka seé ká yoòr mò bɔɔ́ ye. À né sóú dé Càŋ seé ká lè mò weh den. À né-re ménâ bɔɔ́, à né mè te veéne sie kwaá den.
45007024	Mè jamé aá kèn! Yo hên né mè te cio tulu njií. Te ne`i mè teèn tulu sɔm nde né kɔɔ́?
45007025	Môn, Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam ndɔ, mè nde né mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò yili yuo. Yeé baá mé sóú veên hèllè ménâ bɔɔ́, ŋgàŋ yoòr mò gwaán lom baá-re dé seèn mé njéh bɔɔ́ ndeê ndɔ. Né mene môn, temé mò gwaán seér né sóú dé Càŋ.
45008001	Sâ mɔ né mân, sâ kènê, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr Yeésò Kristò, dé bɔɔ̀n mé ju felè sam cuú.
45008002	Lòù sam, Cúcuí Càŋ mé né yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà haá, né mè nùà Yeésò Kristò beè yaám sie, à huar sɔm aá mè yuií veên mé yuií cioò yoòr kèn.
45008003	Càŋ hên bɔɔ́ né njií mé sé bɔɔ́ mene naàn, sóú Mús`i sé lé bɔ́ kòmò ná ŋgwêh. Lòù sam, nùàr léláŋ seèn sóú jòlò kòmò bèh. Né dé cî mé Càŋ lé tema njií naâ Ŋuna seèn nùà njèh ká lè wɔ́ŋe mé yo dé nùàr yoòr faá nùà veên nɔ, te à kuú weh cio beèh, ju tené.
45008004	Càŋ lé ménâ bɔɔ́ naâ, ye te béh den lom dilísé, faá sóú nyî tueé nê nɔ. Mɔ né mân, sâ béh mé terreb dé ŋgàŋ yoòr dèn cú, béh yoòr baá seér mé terreb dé Cúcuí Ŋagâ.
45008005	Lòù sam, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé den né dene dé ŋgàŋ yoòr, taáŋ lom né njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr gwaán nê. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé den né dene dé Cúcuí Ŋagâ dé bɔɔ̀n taáŋ né njií mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ gwaán nê ndɔ.
45008006	Nuaá mé né dé ŋgàŋ yoòr taáŋ, bele né ceér cioò; dé mé taáŋ né dé Cúcuí Ŋagâ, bele né dé seèn ceér dé yɔ̀ŋ, à né pɔ́ŋ.
45008007	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé taáŋ lom né dé bɔɔ̀n bɔ̀ njèh dé ŋgàŋ yoòr sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi bɔ̀ bùnò Càŋ bɔ̀; bɔ́ sóú Càŋ bèlè ŋgwéh. Dé sâ bɔɔ́ mene seèn naàn, bɔ́ bɔɔ̀n môn bèlè kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
45008008	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé den né dene dé ŋgàŋ yoòr sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, ceér mé bɔ́ nde né Càŋ yoòr yilá nyi teèn sam.
45008009	Dé bi`i môn sam, bí te ceér dé ŋgàŋ yoòr bi`i sam; bí dé bi`i bele né ceér Cúcuí Càŋ. Ŋgweéh à baá gi bí yoòr mà. Nuaá mé Cúcuí Kristò bú yoòr sam, nùà Kristò sam ndɔ.
45008010	Mɔ Kristò né yoòr bi`i teèn bɔ̀n, yo bi`i la né gi mene komó mé y`iè veên, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Cúcuí né dé seèn yoòr bi`i làŋ njua mé Càŋ lé naá gi`i bí bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ toò seèn sie kwaá.
45008011	Mɔ Cúcuí Càŋ né yoòr bi`i teèn, bú Càŋ mé lé naâ Yeésò te cio komo sɔm, nde né bɔ̀ komó bi`i te cio ménâ komo sɔm gií ndɔ; à ménâ dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi né mé Cúcuí seèn mé né yoòr bi`i doô.
45008012	Mɔ né mân, sâ bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh bí né mé hùà yoòr. Gèh hùà dé sâ né ye: kɔ béh gɔ faá Cúcuí Ŋagâ tueé nê nɔ, dèn ŋgwéh faá ŋgàŋ yoòr beèh tueé né kɔɔ́.
45008013	Mɔ bí né faá ŋgàŋ yoòr bi`i gwaán nê nɔ bɔɔ́, sâ bí nde né te cio yilá kuú ndɔ. Á, mɔ bí gùm bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ kwaá lɔ né beè Cúcuí Ŋagâ, te à nyimé sɔm bí veên yoòr, sâ bí nde né làŋ yili den.
45008014	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Cúcuí Càŋ feh né bɔ́ ceér kɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ.
45008015	Lòù sam, Cúcuí mé né yoòr bi`i doô bí kwer s`iè kwá cú, à bí veéh lè yí ndé cú ndɔ; à dé seèn né Cúcuí mé bɔɔ́ né te bí ŋa seér bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ dé ŋaâ, à béh terreb haá né kɔɔ́, te béh nde ye Càŋ fela, ye bú a: «Tele mò eè!»
45008016	Cúcuí Càŋ mé feh seèn né lè beèh tueé den, ye béh né gi bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ.
45008017	Béh baá gi bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ sâ bɔ̀n. Mɔ né mân, béh nde né ŋgúlú Càŋ yieé. Béh bɔ̀ Kristò ŋgúlú sâ yieé nde né kɔɔ́. Lòù sam, béh bɔ́ gèr ŋene né dɔɔ́ŋ; mɔ né mân, sâ béh bɔ́ te ŋgùlù seèn yila gi nde né dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
45008018	Mè né bagasé kɔɔ́ nyegé ye, béh nde né tàŋɔ̀r ŋgùlù Càŋ loù sâ mé njolo ŋené ŋagá, sâ béh né mene gèr cafanê ŋené dɔɔ́ŋ, béh mé njéh táŋ ndé ŋgwéh, béh njolo ke lom né mé ŋgùlù Càŋ.
45008019	Cieé mé Càŋ nde né bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn cie teèn ŋené sɔm keéh sâ, wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ né lom cieé bú sâ gaán.
45008020	Wɔ́ŋ hèllè lɔ baá wèllè kela ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, à lɔ kɔɔ́ gwàn ná ŋgwêh, né seé Càŋ. À lɔ kwaá lɔɔ̀ naâ bú teèn lòù. Mé njéh mene, ndèm né lom cu dɔɔ́ŋ kwaá den ye:
45008021	cieé dé`i wɔ́ŋ gùm dɔɔ́ŋ nde né ka cioò te yuií kwer-e huaár yuo, à kwa terreb dé koô beè Càŋ faá bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ nɔ.
45008022	Béh né kɔɔ́ ye, wa hên, wɔ́ŋ gùm dɔɔ́ŋ née den ka gèr ŋené ye, à né lom faá ma nyeèr nɔ cuané den.
45008023	Mè tueé bí ndɔ, wɔ́ŋ mé huún gí lòm ŋgwéh; né mé béh mene. Càŋ lé béh Cúcuí Ŋagâ haá lɔgɔ́ naâ faá jèrè nɔ; béh né kukuŋ lè beèh cuané kela den, ye te Càŋ kweéh seér lom béh gùm dɔɔ́ŋ, béh ŋa gi bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn, à horó sɔm béh gèr yoòr dé kè`i cên ndɔ.
45008024	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye béh yili yuo gi aá kèn; mé njéh mene, née te ndèm ye. Njií mé nùàr né ndèm teèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ à baá gi mé njolo ŋené, à ndèm sâ mbaá kwá dèn ndé cú. Á sâ, nuaá mé naá gi`i njeré dé`i ŋené, nde cu né ndèm kwaá den wa?
45008025	Béh dé beèh ndèm kwaá njií né te njií mé béh née mé njolo ŋéné ŋgwéeh ye. Mɔ béh baá ménâ kwaá njií ndɔ, sâ béh seŋ kela den né lòù.
45008026	Yeé baá ménâ, Cúcuí Ŋagâ waà, à né béh gam; wanɔɔ́ŋ béh né bɔ̀ yuyuaâ bɔ̀ kela, béh Càŋ teèn dùà yí bèh. Né Cúcuí Ŋagâ mé feh seèn dua den né Càŋ sòn beèh kɔɔ́, à Càŋ bɔŋ lom né dé tueé komoò sam.
45008027	Càŋ dé seèn né gi temé ŋené; njií mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bú dua sâ, à né ŋgweé kɔɔ́. Lòù sam, Cúcuí Ŋagâ Càŋ felè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dua lom né faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ.
45008028	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né Càŋ gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, à njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi né te gam seér bɔ́ lòù. Né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé à lé yilá kwaá naâ beè seèn, faá à lɔ nyegé kwaá naâ nɔ.
45008029	À lɔ naá gi`i bɔ́ jɔ̀gɔ̀ balé kwaá, lɔ naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn ndɔ, ye te bɔ́ we Huaán nyî, te Huaán nyî den bei dàm bɔ̀ d`im seèn dɔɔ́ŋ ma.
45008030	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lé naâ ndòn felè bɔɔ̀n kagá sâ, à bɔ́ yilá bilí gi aá kèn; à bɔ́ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ ké toò seèn sie seér gi aá kèn ndɔ. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ baá gi dé bɔɔ̀n ké toò Càŋ tàbè dobo.
45008031	Sâ béh nde né mân tueé yɔgɔ́ keéh cuú wa? Mɔ Càŋ né jomo beèh, ne`i bunó cu nde né béh kɔɔ́ wa?
45008032	Mɔ Càŋ Ŋuna seèn lòù gágá ŋgwéh, à né seér bú felè beèh lòù semé, sé tagá bɔ̀ njèh dé jomò wa? Mè tueé bí, à nde né béh njèh dɔɔ́ŋ mé Ŋuna seèn mene haá bilí.
45008033	Á sâ, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lé naâ balé sɔm sâ, ne`i bɔ́ toò juù sií komo nde né kɔɔ́ wa? Ndɔ́g nuaré dé`i mé terreb teèn sam. Càŋ nùà njèh tueé naâ kɔɔ́, ye bɔ́ né beè nyî dilísé ma.
45008034	Á sâ, ne`i bɔ́ mé ju si nde né kɔɔ́? Ndɔ́g, nuaré dé`i mé terreb teèn sam. Yeésò Kristò lé naâ kuú, à lé naâ te cio komo yuo, kènê à baá ké te be gaâ Càŋe; à né Càŋ felè beèh dua den.
45008035	Á sâ, nuaré dé`i nde né béh bɔ̀ Kristò geé sɔm, te Kristò béh gwàn cú wa? Nde né gèr feh hihiné wa? Nde né bùnò wa? Nde né cùè mé saám wa? Nde né dùkàŋ mé cio wa?
45008036	Mè tueé bí, né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, ye: «Béh cio cieé dɔɔ́ŋ hên liím sɔɔ́ né felè yeè. Béh den né beè bɔ̀ nùàr faá mbieè mé bɔ́ nde né ŋɔɔ́b nɔ.»
45008037	Mé njéh mene, béh né gi bɔ̀ gèr sâ dɔɔ́ŋ mé terreb Yeésò Kristò yɔgɔ́, njua mé temé seèn né yoòr beèh.
45008038	Sâ mè né lom kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye njeré dé`i Yeésò yín kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ye bú a: té béh gwàn. Né mene cio, né mene yɔ̀ŋ, né mene bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ, né mene bɔ̀ njèh tetarê ké te vulúu, bɔ́ bú yín kòmò ndé ŋgwéh. Né mene kènê, né mene loró dé`i,
45008039	né mene bɔ̀ terreb dé ké teèr, né mene bɔ̀ terreb dé ká doô, bɔ́ bú yín kòmò ndé ŋgwéh. Né mene lètenè bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ si gi`i naâ dɔɔ́ŋ, njeré dé`i béh bɔ̀ Càŋ gè kòmò ndé cú, ye bú a, té béh gwàn. Càŋ béh gwaân seèn yoòr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò feh keéh gi aá kèn.
45009001	Mè tueé bí, mè nùà Yeésò Kristò, mè nyeén túé ŋgwéh: temé mò ká lè yili gi aá kèn, né lom mè yulá faá cí nɔ. Ndòn mò né ménâ tueé, Cúcuí Ŋagâ né mè ménâ tueé ndɔ, ye mè a, nyeén sam.
45009003	Sâ tueé né ye, mɔ ceér sé né teèn, huɔm kela né mé Càŋ sé duagá kɔɔ̀ naâ mè lòù, mè geé kɔ mé ceér Kristò, te gèh bɔ̀ nùàr mò yili yuo seér kɔɔ́.
45009004	Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Iserálà; Càŋ ye, né bɔ̀ ŋuna nyî, wa terreb nyî ŋené yuo kela ndeè né lètenè bɔɔ̀n ma; à lé naâ ŋgɔ̀ŋ hihiné mé bɔ́ kɔ, à sou kwaá bɔ́ sóú seèn tieè, à feh bɔ́ ceér mé bɔ́ nde né bú teèn dua, à kwa kwaá bɔ́ ndéb tieè ndɔ.
45009005	Abrahâm bɔ́ bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn né bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n. Cu mé Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ lé naâ nùàr mé húɔ́m yoòr ŋaá, bɔ́ lé bú ŋaár naâ lè gèh bɔɔ̀n sâ ndɔ. Felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ né cegé bú Càŋ Nùà njèh. Kùsèm bú a, líé dèn ménâ cu dɔɔ́ŋ. Môn.
45009006	Mè túé ŋgwéh ndɔ, ye ndéb Càŋ tueé keéh né doó. Môn sam, à tueé yií né teèn; wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né te gèh bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, kèb cén né cegé bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ kɔɔ́.
45009007	Sâ tueé né ye, te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm bɔ̀ huaán seèn dé gècên né cegé kèb cén ndɔ. Càŋ lé naá gi`i tueé ye Abrahâm a: beè nyî bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù seèn gi cegé nde né te gèh Isâk ma.
45009008	Sâ tueé né ye, bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ bɔ̀ huaán mé bɔ́ né mbembaá ŋar gɔ doô, sam; bɔ̀ ŋunà seèn gi cegé né bɔ̀ huaán nùà njèh mé ndéb Càŋ né teèn yilá.
45009009	Càŋ lé ndéb sâ kwa kwaá naâ ye, mɔ cu wulu baá, nyí ndeè né cuû, te Sará ŋar kwa huaán ma.
45009010	Cí gí lòm ŋgwéh ndɔ: Rèbékà, veèh Isâk tele beèh dé koô, lé naâ feh ŋar kwa.
45009011	Sâ Càŋ nyegé kwaá gi aá felè bɔ̀ huaán fà sâ kèn, ye Rèbékà a: Bei nde né ka d`im den seér ma. Càŋ lɔ nde ménâ nyegé kwaá, sâ bɔ́ fà dɔɔ́ŋ, dé`i née veên bɔ́ ŋgwéeh ye, sâ bɔ́ lɔ née bɔ́ ŋàr ŋgwéeh ye ndɔ. À lé ménâ bɔɔ́ seér naâ, ye te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ teèn, ye nyí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ né mé kàgà-ndòn nyî ma. Nyí nùàr balé weh lom né faá nyí gwaán nê nɔ, nyí mé seé seèn táŋ sɔ́ bèh.
45009013	Den né faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den nɔ, ye: «Mè geí weh né Jakɔ̂b, mè si lɔ Esayû.»
45009014	Á sâ, kènê béh tueé nde né naàn? Sâ Càŋ bɔɔ́ gobó seér cu né lòù wa? Dé sâ tí ndɔ̂g!
45009015	Bí né kɔɔ́ ye, Càŋ lé tueé naâ mé Mús`i, ye bú a: Mɔ nyí gwaán né nuaré dé`i jere kɔɔ̂, nyí nde né bú jere kɔɔ́ ma. Mɔ nyí nde né nuaré dé`i bagaà bɔɔ́, nyí nde né bú bɔɔ́ ndɔ.
45009016	Mɔ né mân, dé sâ beè nuaré dé`i sam, dé lòù legeè sam ndɔ; né lom beè Càŋ kɔ́-jerè nùàr njèh.
45009017	Né cu te mvù Càŋe nyagá den faá Càŋ lé tueé njií naâ mé mgbè Ejíptò nɔ, ye bú a: Nyí wò mgbè sie kwaá né ye te be terrèb nyî ŋené yuo kelà yoòr yeè, te yilí nyî ŋgulí nde wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ.
45009018	Sâ tueé né ye, mɔ Càŋ né gwaán, à kɔ nùàr jere; mɔ à né gwaán, à ŋgwan sɔm bú temé lè ndɔ.
45009019	Merré dé`i nuaré dé`i nde né bieé ye mè a: mɔ né mân, sâ Càŋ mé bɔ̀ nùàr bie le cu né dé ke`i wa? Mɔ Càŋ baá njèh mé temé seèn bɔɔ́, ne`i taré komo nde né kɔɔ́ wa?
45009020	Mɔ né mân ndɔ, sâ nùàr mò, wò né ne`i, mé né Càŋ ndugó wa? Sɔɔ̀ né yeé mé nùà mé-sɔɔ̀ bieé njií ye bú a: wò nyí mân me kwaá naâ dé ke`i wa?
45009021	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ nùà mé-sɔɔ̀ tie gi aá màr kèn, à nde né màr sâ faá à gwaán nê nɔ kɔb geé, à mé dé`i me sɔɔ̀ dé nyàgàm, à mé kèb dé`i me lom sɔɔ̀.
45009022	Mɔ né mân, sâ nuaré dé`i nde né sòn mé Càŋ komo nyi wa? À gwaán né bɔ̀ nùàr yúlá-temé seèn feh keéh, à feh keéh bɔ́ be terrèb seèn ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé à sé naâ bɔ́ mé yúlá-temé sâ wulá sɔm gií, à bɔ́ yolo seér cu né lòù.
45009023	À lé sâ gwaán naâ, ye te be terrèb nyî ŋené yuo kelà cie lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nyí lé naá gi`i jɔ̀gɔ̀ nyegé kwaá, ye nyí nde né bɔ́ jere kɔɔ́, te bɔ́ yila te ŋgùlù nyî.
45009024	Né béh. À lé naâ béh bɔ̀ dé seèn yilá kwaá. Lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf gí lòm ŋgwéh, né cu mé bɔ̀ dé`i lètenè gèh bɔ̀ nùàr hihiné mene.
45009025	À te mvù Hosê tueé ŋagá né môn ndɔ, ye: «Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé bɔ̀ nùàr nyî ná ŋgwêh, nyí bɔ̀ nùàr nyî yilá nde né bɔ́; lò nùàr mé nyí lé naâ bunó, nyí bɔ̀ yíé-temé bɔ̀ nyî yilá nde né bɔ́ ndɔ.
45009026	Bèh mé nyí lé ye bɔ́ nùàr nyî sam dɔɔ́ŋ, nyí yilá nde né bɔ́ bɔ̀ ŋuna nyî kɔ́ bèh sâ, jue nyí Càŋ làŋ.»
45009027	Kèb dé`i, Esáyà lé naâ ké ter felè bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ môn lɔgɔ́ njií ndɔ, ye: «Gwaán dàm bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ a: màgà yɔ́gɔ́ mbésebé nòmò koô, ŋgɔ́b yili yuo lom nde né lètenè bɔɔ̀n kɔɔ́.
45009028	Lòù sam, Nùà Dueè gwaán lom aá ju dé kè`i cên felè wɔ̂ŋ tenâ.»
45009029	Esáyà lé naá cuù dé`i ménâ tueé kwaá ndɔ, ye: «Mɔ Càŋ terrèb sé ndùté ndùtù kèb dé`i mé be téná lɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, mè tueé bí, béh sé naá gi`i faá Sɔ́dɔ̀m nɔ tɔb yuo, béh bɔ̀ Gɔmɔ̂r sé baá kè`i cén ndɔ.»
45009030	Sâ ye naàn wee? Sâ ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, mé lé ceér fɔ́n ná ŋgwêh te bɔ́ ŋa bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ ké toò seèn yilá seér cu aá bɔ́. À bɔ́ ménâ yilá né felè temé mé bɔ́ né yoòr seèn kwaá njií doô.
45009031	Dé dàm bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ môn sam. Bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n bele né sóú te bɔ́ ŋa bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè Càŋ mé njéh, bɔ́ née dé bɔɔ̀n bèh sâ wá ŋgwéeh ye.
45009032	Bɔ́ teèn wá ŋgwéh dé ke`i wa? Mè tueé bí, bɔ́ temé mé Càŋ kwá njí ŋgwéh, ye te bɔ́ ŋa bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ toò seèn mé njéh, bɔ́ ndèm kwaá seér né mé seé bɔɔ̀n, ye bɔ́ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ toò Càŋ ŋa nde né mé njéh. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ ceén baá-re te taá cén-gulè ndɔ.
45009033	Te mvù Càŋe né môn nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Mè komo kwaá tena baá taá cén-gulè ké Siyɔ̂ŋ, né kweéh d`ièb. Nuaá mé né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, à bú dé seèn pɔ́ lɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh.»
45010001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè né lom Càŋ felè bɔ̀ Jûf dua, ye te bɔ́ yili yuo. Né lom mè yoòr yilá dé gècên.
45010002	Mè ŋene bɔ́ né lom te seé Càŋe faá cí nɔ bɔgɔ́. Njèh cén, bɔ́ seér ŋgwé kòmò ŋgwéh;
45010003	wanɔɔ́ŋ ceér mé Càŋ yilá né bɔ̀ nùàr bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ mé njéh, bɔ́ bɔɔ̀n ŋgwé kɔ́ ŋgwéh nɔ. Bɔ́ yeé ŋgwé kɔ́ cú ménâ, bɔ́ yila baá-re ceér mé feh bɔɔ̀n fɔɔ́n gɔɔ̀, ye te bɔ́ den beè Càŋ dilísé mé njéh. Yeé baá ménâ, ceér mé Càŋ sé né bɔ́ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ mé njéh yilá, bɔ́ teèn ŋgwan seér cu baá-re lòù ndɔ.
45010004	Á sâ, Kristò lé sóú Mús`i te bèh denè seèn ŋgoró kwaá gi aá kèn ndɔ, ye te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé kwaá njií seér né temé yoòr nyî dɔɔ́ŋ, ŋa seér bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè Càŋ kɔɔ́.
45010005	Ceér sóú joloò mé nùàr sé naâ nùà dilî beè Càŋ mé njéh ŋaá, Mús`i nùà njèh lé naá gi`i ter nyagá kwaá, ye: Nuaá mé né sóú mé gùm mene jolo komo dɔɔ́ŋ, yɔ̀ŋ kwa nde né kɔɔ́ ma.
45010006	Sâ, ceér dé temé kwaá njiî, te nùàr ŋa nùà dilî beè Càŋ mé njéh né seér hiín ndɔ, à dé seèn ye: «Té mé feh yeè túé ye: Ne`i ŋaá nde né ké te vulúu kɔɔ́ wa?» Sâ tueé né ye: Ne`i ŋaá nde né ké te vulúu kɔɔ́, te à yila njiî Kristò ká doó wa?
45010007	Té túé ndɔ, ye: «Ne`i suaga nde né ké dòù ka tàbè kɔɔ́ wa?» Sâ tueé né ye: Ne`i suaga nde né ké dòù kɔɔ́, te yilá wellê bú ndɔ wa? Té ménâ túé ndɔ́g.
45010008	Càŋ né seér tueé ye, ŋgòr nyî né kwarè yeè sâ, né sònò yeè, né te temé yeè ndɔ. Ŋgòr sâ né felè temé kwaá njiî. Béh bɔ̀ nùàr hên tueé yeé cí.
45010009	Mɔ wò né toò bɔ̀ nùàr mé sòn yeè tueé, ye Yeésò né Nùà Dueè kɔɔ́, wò kwaá njií temé teèn ye Càŋ lé naâ bú te cio komo sɔm ndɔ, sâ wò yili yuo aá kèn.
45010010	Mɔ béh baá temé yoòr Yeésò ménâ kwaá njií, Càŋ nde né béh bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè seèn yilá. Mɔ béh né mé sòn beèh gwaán, ye Yeésò né Nùà Dueè kɔɔ́, sâ Càŋ nde né béh yili sɔm.
45010011	Ŋgòr Càŋ né môn tueé ndɔ, ye: «Nuaá mé né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ lòù pɔ́ lè ndé ŋgwéh.»
45010012	Mɔ né mân, sâ lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, gwèn teèn sam cuú; bɔ́ baá lom dɔɔ́ŋ mé Nùà Dueè cên. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bú yueé fɔɔ́n dɔɔ́ŋ, à né gi bɔ́ bagaà bɔɔ́ laré.
45010013	Né te mvù Càŋe môn nyagá den, ye: «Nuaá mé nde né Nùà Dueè yueé fɔɔ́n dɔɔ́ŋ nde né yili yuo.»
45010014	Á, bɔ̀ nùàr bú yueé yilá keéh nde né he, mɔ bɔ́ temé yoòr seèn kwá njí ŋgwéh wa? Bɔ́ temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií keéh nde né naàn, mɔ bɔ́ née ŋgúŋgwéeh ye wa? Bɔ́ ŋgweé keéh nde né he, mɔ nuaré dé`i seèn ndé ŋgwéh bɔ́ tueé wa?
45010015	Á, ne`i tueé nde né bɔ́ kɔɔ́, mɔ bɔ́ nuaré dé`i ké teèn témá njí ŋgwéh wa? Né cu te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: «Bɔ́ baá mé gò Njàgà Bagaà! Keé bèh huɔm nê!»
45010016	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ nùàr Njàgà Bagaà sâ dɔɔ́ŋ gwàn làrè ŋgwéh. Esáyà sòn-Càŋ lɔ naâ mân tueé ndɔ, ye: «Nùà Dueè, ne`i seèn kwaá njií né-re temé te ŋgòr beèh kɔɔ́?»
45010017	Mɔ né mân, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, kɔ bɔ́ ŋgweé lɔgɔ́ ŋgòr, te bɔ́ gwaán ye. Mè ŋgòr sâ jue né kùr Kristò.
45010018	Njií ye mè a, bíé bí lòù: Hên bɔ́ née ka ŋgòr sâ ŋgúŋgwéeh á? Hêceè, bɔ́ ŋgweé gi aá kèn! Te mvù Càŋe né bèsɔ́nè nyagá den, ye: «Hueh bɔ̀ tebê bɔ̀ ŋgulí sie aá wɔ́ŋ beè; bɔ̀ ŋgòr bɔɔ̀n ŋgulí nde gi aá bèh mé tàbè bɔ̂ vulú né teèn kwaré dɔɔ́ŋ.»
45010019	Mɔ né ménâ, kwá mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ bie cu dé`i ye: Hên bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ lé kaà ŋgwé kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh á? Mè tueé bí, Mús`i lɔ naá gi`i bɔ́ tueé, ye: «Càŋ ye: nyí bɔɔ́ nde né mé be, te bí bar seér bɔ̀ kurú lòù. Nyí nde né bí soób, te temé ŋaâ bí mé bɔ̀ kùlù bɔ̀ ŋaà.»
45010020	Esáyà salé sɔm cuù dé seèn ndɔ, ye: «Càŋ ye: Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lɔ ceér nyî fɔ́n ná ŋgwêh dɔɔ́ŋ ŋene seér cu né nyí kɔɔ́. Nyí ŋené yuo kela seér cuù né toò bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nyí bíé bèh.»
45010021	Dé bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀, Càŋ den cuù ye: «Cieé dɔɔ́ŋ nyí né bɔ́ mé be ci yilá kuú, kàmbér la né bɔ̀ dúágá-tie bɔ̀, mé bɔ̀ taâb bɔ̀ nyî.»
45011001	Kwá mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ bie ke ndɔ ye: sâ Càŋ sɔm si njií aá bɔ̀ nùàr seèn Iserálà doó wa? Dé sâ, tí ndɔ̂g! Mè mé feh mò, mè né nùà Iserálà sâ, mè né te gèh Benjamên, ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm.
45011002	Càŋ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn sɔ̀m s`i ŋgwéh, à lé ké bèh duɔɔ̂m ŋene kɔ lɔgɔ́ naâ bɔ́, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ dé seèn. Ŋgweéh njií mé bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né felè Elî te mvù Càŋe doô, bí né gi kɔɔ́ wa? À lé naâ ju bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ toò Càŋ nde, ye Càŋ a:
45011003	«Nùà Dueè, bɔ́ wula sɔm gi aá bɔ̀ sòn yeè, bɔ́ tulú komó sɔm gi aá bɔ̀ kɔ sèmè yeè kèn, mè tene le aá mé huún; bɔ́ né cu ceér fɔɔ́n, te bɔ́ wula cu mè ndɔ.»
45011004	À yeé tueé gi aá mân, Càŋ lé ye bú a naàn wa? Ŋgweéh Càŋ lé ye bú a: «Wò mé huún sam mà.» Ye bú a, bɔ̀ nùàr nyî kám téhbeh né teèn, bɔ́ toò Bahâl cècàŋ mbaâ cémmé bèh ma.
45011005	Mè tueé bí, kènê né cu faá bèh ménâ; bɔ̀ŋ dé Càŋ lètenè bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ née le ye; Càŋ lé bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ balé kwaá naâ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn;
45011006	lé naâ dé lòù, dèn ŋgwéh mé seé bɔɔ̀n. Mɔ sé né mé seé bɔɔ̀n, sâ húɔ́m-temé Càŋ doô sé húɔ́m-temé dé gècên ŋá ná cû.
45011007	Sâ ye naàn wee? Sâ ye, njií mé bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà lé naâ fɔɔ́n sâ, bɔ́ lé kwà ná ŋgwêh, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lé balé sɔɔ́m naâ lètenè bɔɔ̀n sâ lé kwa cegé naâ kɔɔ́; bɔ̀ dé`i dé bɔɔ̀n lé taré seér naâ feh lòù.
45011008	Né te mvù Càŋe môn nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Càŋ lé naâ bɔ́ temé lè bɔɔ́ kuú sɔm, te wa mene hên, bɔ́ mé njolo ŋéné cú, bɔ́ mé tie ŋgwé cú ndɔ.»
45011009	Davîd né cu felè bɔɔ̀n ménâ tueé ye: «Bɔ̀ kùrmò bɔɔ̀n a, bíé cú bɔ́ kɔɔ́; bú a, s`iè bɔ́ tuagà, te bɔ́ ŋene gèr beè Càŋ mé njéh fî.
45011010	Njolo bɔɔ̀n a, yílí sér lòù, te bɔ́ njèh ŋéné cú. Càŋ a, s`iè gú kwá dèn bɔ́ ŋgɔ̀gɔ̀ beè môn; bú a, té be dù.»
45011011	Kwá mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ bie cuù bieè ndɔ, ye: Bɔ̀ Jûf yeé ceén aá môn, bɔ́ lé naâ toò die nyoló kelá ndeé á? Môn sam ndɔ! Bɔ́ yeé ceén aá ménâ, Càŋ nde seér bɔ̀ hiîn bɔ̀ yili sɔm, te furú seér bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lòù.
45011012	Mɔ hên bɔ̀ Jûf lé ceén naâ, te Càŋ bɔɔ́ seér bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ bagaà mé njéh, bɔ́ yeé die, Càŋ dàm nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ kulu gi mé njéh, sâ mɔ dàm bɔ̀ Jûf cu cu gi`i te ceér Càŋe, dé sâ den weéh nde né naàn wa? Mè tueé bí, Càŋ nde né dàm gèh nùàr kulú samé gií mé njéh.
45011013	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, mè kènê tueé njií né mé bí, ye bí a: mè né mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Càŋ; à mè dé mò tema njií né ké lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam. Yeé baá ménâ, mè sie nyegé seé mò mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene ndɔ!
45011014	Mè né ndèm kwaá ye mè nde né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé béh bɔ́ né mé gèh cên jilí; mɔ huer baá bɔ́ mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ŋgwa, te Càŋ yili sɔm bɔ̀ dé`i lètenè bɔɔ̀n;
45011015	wanɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ yeé sɔm si njií aá bɔ̀ Jûf gè jomo, bɔ̂ wɔ́ŋ nde ye huɔɔ́m doô nɔ. Á sâ, mɔ Càŋ ndeè weh gi cu aá bɔ́, dé sâ ndeè den weéh nde né naàn wa? Mè tueé bí, sâ baá cu ye-re dé mé bɔ̀ komó teèn kwa bilí cu nde né mé yɔ̀ŋ mene.
45011016	Mɔ jèrè baá gi beè Càŋ, sâ bí kɔ́ɔ ye, kukuŋ né dé seèn ndɔ. Mɔ jɔgɔb toû né gi beè Càŋ, sâ mé béh mene dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn ndɔ.
45011017	Bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà den né faá toú mé fei yeé kómó, mé bɔ́ dobo kwaá né ká lɔ nɔ. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dé bɔɔ̀n né faá toú kómô dé ké ya dueè. Bɔ́ yeé dobo gi aá dé lɔɔ̂ kèn, bɔ́ ŋɔb sɔm béh dé`i teèn, bɔ́ ŋɔb wellê dé ké ya dueè, bɔ́ nyɔgɔ́ yií keéh te bèh sâ. Né kè`i cén mé wò ndɔ. Wò mene nùà Jûf sam, wò njua dɔm keéh né felè nùà mé né Jûf. Jɔgɔb yeé baá toú hèllè koó, à koó bilí baá-re mé wò mene.
45011018	Mɔ né mân, sâ wò té béh toû mé bɔ́ lé naâ ŋɔɔ́b sɔm doô sèb ndɔ. Té mbaá púnó kú, wò jɔgɔb kɔɔ́ kwá ŋgwéh, jɔgɔb kwaá seér né wò kɔɔ́.
45011019	Merré dé`i wò nde né tueé ye: bɔ́ lé naâ béh dé`i ŋɔɔ́b sɔm, bɔ́ nyɔgɔ́ keéh nyí.
45011020	Né gi môn dág; njèh cén, bɔ́ lé seér temé mé Càŋ kwá njí ná ŋgwêh, Càŋ lé bɔ́ werré sɔɔ́m naâ dé cî. Wò yeé baá dé yeè temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií, bɔ́ wò te bèh denè bɔɔ̀ne nyɔgɔ́ yií keéh né dé cî. Mɔ né mân, sâ té feh mbaá hàm kú! Léb sér lòù.
45011021	Wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ Jûf mé né bɔ̀ béh toû dé jéjêg kɔɔ́, mɔ wò ke, Càŋ bɔ́ kwá lɔ́ ŋgwéh. Sâ júée, mɔ né nyí, à tàŋ sɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
45011022	Mè tueé wò, yíé kwàgà mé húɔ́m-temé Càŋ, wò yieé cu kwàgà mé jélá-temé seèn ndɔ: mɔ ŋaá baá bú felè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né tie te ceér seène duagá, à né yeé bɔ́ seé faá cí nɔ weh. Dé yeè môn sam; à né seér felè yeè nùà húɔ́m-temê. Njèh cén, kɔ wò né beè seèn pɔ́ŋ ndɔ, sâ ye; wanɔɔ́ŋ à wò ŋɔb sɔm cu aá kèn.
45011023	Mɔ bɔ̀ Jûf mé lé naâ temé duagá doô kweéh seér cu temé, sâ Càŋ nde né bɔ́ te ndilî nyɔgɔ́ njií cuú. Mè tueé wò, à né mé terreb mé à nde né bɔ́ te ndilî nyɔgɔ́ gií cuú.
45011024	Wò dé yeè nùà Jûf sam, wò né seér béh dé ya dueè, bɔ́ lé wò ŋɔb tena weéh naâ lòù, bɔ́ nyɔgɔ́ njií te ndilí dé ká lɔɔ̂. Mɔ né mân, sé tagá bɔ̀ Jûf mé né béh nùà njèh wa? Mè tueé wò, dé bɔɔ̀n dé nyɔgɔ́ sɔɔ̂ sam nde cuú, bɔ́ tɔɔ́ lom nde aá lòù.
45011025	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè bí hên feh keéh né njií mé lé leér deén naâ lòù, te bí feh bi`i faá bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ nɔ wèh kwá cú. Sâ tueé né ye: bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà kèb dé`i mene temé yoòr Càŋ kwá njí ŋgwéh, bɔ́ né mene tie duagá, mé njéh mene, bɔ́ nde né temé kweéh seér. Kɔ bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ndeè kweéh seér gi aá temé, te bɔ̀ Jûf kweéh seér ye ndɔ.
45011026	Mɔ gi aá, te dàm bɔ̀ Jûf yili yuo ye, faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den nɔ, ye: «Nuaá mé nde né bɔ̀ nùàr yili sɔm, ndeè yuo nde né ké Siyɔ̂ŋ, à fɔ sɔm bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Jakɔ̂b veên yoòr.
45011027	«Cu mé nyí nde né bɔ́ veên yoòr kulú sɔm, ŋgɔ̀ŋ nyî nde né cí.»
45011028	Lòù sam, Càŋ lɔ naâ bɔ́ balé weh. Bɔ́ né mene taáŋ, Càŋ bɔ́ gwaán keéh né felè bɔ̀ tele bɔɔ̀n léí jɔ̀gɔ̀. Wanɔɔ́ŋ te Njàgà Bagaà bɔ́ né bɔ̀ bùnò Càŋ bɔ̀ kela. Mɔ né ménâ, te gam seér bí ndɔ.
45011029	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ Càŋ balé weh baá nuaré dé`i, à kulu bú, sâ gi aá kèn, Càŋ sòn kwéh sér ndé cú.
45011030	Léí toò bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá gi`i sòn Càŋ ŋgeén. Kènê bɔ̀ Jûf yeé baá sòn seèn ménâ ŋgeén, à jere kɔ seér cu aá bí.
45011031	Né cu mé bɔ́ ménâ ndɔ; bɔ́ yeé ŋgeén aá sòn Càŋ, à bí bagaà hên bɔɔ́ seér né lè sòn bɔɔ̀ne, te bɔ́ ŋene ménâ, bɔ́ kweéh seér temé, à kɔ cu bɔ́ jere môn ndɔ.
45011032	Sâ tueé né ye, bí bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ naá gi`i sòn Càŋ ŋgeén, te seé bi`i sie nyegé bí be bagasé, à kɔ ye bí jere.
45011033	Njua Càŋ né felè beèh yaámsé mân! Kɔ́gɔ̀n seèn dé tueê sam, à né gi njèh dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́ laré! Ne`i se komo nde né kàgà-ndòn Càŋ kɔɔ́ wa? Njií mé Càŋ nyegé kwaá né ter, ne`i ŋgweé komo nde né kɔɔ́ ndɔ wa?
45011034	Né te mvù Càŋe môn nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Ne`i kɔ né mùnò Nùà Dueè kɔɔ́ wa? Ne`i leéb komo nde né bú ndéb kɔɔ́ ndɔ wa?
45011035	Ne`i lé Càŋ njèh haá lɔgɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́, te Càŋ nde ye bú sòn sâ haá cuú wa?»
45011036	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, njèh dɔɔ́ŋ naá gi`i beè Càŋ, à bɔ́ koó gi né kɔɔ́, dɔɔ́ŋ né gi dé seèn. Kùsèm, terreb Càŋ a, sùmù yùò kélà cie dé kè`i cên. È môn!
45012001	Mɔ Càŋ né béh jere faá bèh mân kɔɔ́, sâ kúkùr bi`i bɔ̀ nùàr mò, keí mé bí née mé njolo hên, bí mé Càŋ há njí gí gùm bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ faá njèh sèmè toò seèn nɔ. Ceér Càŋ duaà dé bagaà né cí, né bú yoòr huɔɔ́m.
45012002	Bí té gule wɔ̂ŋ bèlè, bí bèlè sér gule dé Càŋ, te à kweéh seér gùm bi`i, mé lo bi`i mene, bí ŋgweé komo ye njií mé à né gwaán ndɔ! Sâ tueé né ye, à gwaán né bɔ̀ njèh dé bebagaà mé né ŋagásé tâŋ, mé né lom bú yoòr huɔɔ́m dé gècên.
45012003	Mè baá te fùgò Càŋe, mè bí dɔɔ́ŋ hên tueé keéh né dé cî, ye bí a, té mé feh bi`i púnó kélá. Sòn sâ, bí ŋéné kɔ́ sér bèh denè bi`i dé jéjêg. Temé mé nùà kàn né yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, ŋéné kɔ́ terreb sâ ŋenè.
45012004	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, nùàr né mé gà yoòr hihiné mé seé teèn hihiné ndɔ.
45012005	Né cu mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ménâ: béh maga mene naàn, béh né lom gùm nùàr cén, béh nyɔgɔ́ bilí né yoòr Kristò. Sâ béh bɔ̀ mbeí beèh nyɔgɔ́ bilí né dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ, béh den né faá bɔ̀ gà hihiné nyɔgɔ́ bilí né yoòr nɔ, te bɔ́ me sɔm gùm nùàr cén.
45012006	Béh né gi mé gà seê hihiné yoòr; Càŋ nùà kàn haá né dé lòù ndɔ. Mɔ lètenè beèh Càŋ nuaré dé`i haá né sòn seèn tueê, bú a, ŋéné kɔ́ temé mé à né yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií, à yila tueê.
45012007	Mɔ Càŋ haá né wò lo dé bɔ̀ dé`i gaàm, sâ gàm bɔ́ gaàm, né seé yeè. Mɔ dé nuaré dé`i né njèh feèh, bú a, fèfeèh, né seé seèn.
45012008	Nuaá mé Càŋ dé seèn haá né bú lo dé nùàr sɔgɔ̂, bú a, fágá feh, né seé seèn. Mɔ dé yeè né be haâ, sâ há lòm bú mé be fà. Mɔ dé yeé né dé nùàr sie nyegê, s`iè nyégé bɔ́ mé temé yeè mene. Mɔ dé yeè né dé bɔ̀ jámè bɔ̀ gaàm, gàm lòm bɔ́ mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene.
45012009	Bí gwàn lòm nùàr mé temé cén, bí nyénné veên nyennè, bí gwàn sér bagaà.
45012010	Bí gwàn kú lètenè bi`i, bí né lètenè bi`i veéh kuú ndɔ.
45012011	Bí dèn lòm bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀, bí té fùɔ̀b gwàn. Bí bɔ́ lòm seé Nùà Dueè mé terreb mene,
45012012	bí né ndèm mé bú kwaá njií, bí né mé bú samé. Bí né gèr yoló, bí né Càŋ cu dɔɔ́ŋ dua ndɔ.
45012013	Mɔ njeré dé`i né nuaré dé`i lètenè bi`i saám, bí há bú teèn. Mɔ nuaré dé`i waà lɔ bi`i, bí té njolo mé bú c`i.
45012014	Mɔ bɔ́ né bí bunó, bí dùà sér Càŋ felè bɔɔ̀n lòù; bí júée Càŋ a, kúlú sér bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ bi`i dé kulû ma, à té bɔ́ lòù dúágá.
45012015	Mɔ bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i baá samé, bí bɔ́ sàmè gí dɔɔ́ŋ. Nuaá mé né yueé, bí bɔ́ yúé gí dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
45012016	Bí dèn lòm lètenè bi`i mé sòn cên, bí té lòù ŋgúgó sér. Nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ a, yú njolo bi`i yuù; bí té dèn faá bí kɔgɔ́n yɔgɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ nɔ.
45012017	Nùàr a, té veên mé veên cú. Bí fɔ́n sér ceér, te bí bɔɔ́ laré nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ bagaà.
45012018	Mɔ lɔ́ŋ né teèn, bí lègè lòm faá bí né lege nɔ, te bí bɔ̀ nùàr den gi mé sòn cên.
45012019	Bí té mé njùŋ kɔɔ́ ndé sér, bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bí kwá lɔ́ Càŋ nùà njèh sɔm njùŋ mé feh seèn, faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den nɔ, ye: «Mè njùŋ sɔm nde né kɔɔ́. Mɔ nuaré dé`i né wò veên bɔɔ́, mè bú sòn sâ bɔɔ́ sɔm cu nde né kɔɔ́ ndɔ, jueè mè Càŋ Dueè.»
45012020	Né cu te mvù Càŋe beré dé`i nyagá den, ye: «Mɔ cùè né nùà bùnò yeè sie, há bú yáb teèn; mɔ à né mé nyúá, há bú njèh ŋueê teèn ndɔ; te à ŋene ménâ, fegùl`i bɔgɔ́ bú faá we nɔ, à kweéh seér temé.»
45012021	Té gwàn mé veên yɔgɔ́ wò, yɔ́gɔ́ sér veên kɔɔ́, bɔ́ yɔ́gɔ́ bú mé bagaà.
45013001	Nùàr kàn a, ŋgwé sòn bɔ̀ ŋgɔ́mnà ŋgweè; bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né gi beè Càŋ, à bɔ́ terreb haá né kɔɔ́, bɔ́ mé feh bɔɔ̀n cèr ŋgwéh.
45013002	Sâ mɔ wò né feh mé bɔ́ taré, sâ wò ŋgen né sòn Càŋ nùà njèh. Lòù sam, à lé naá gi`i bɔ́ nyegé kwaá. Mɔ né mân, sâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né feh toò bɔ̀ ŋgɔ́mnà taré dɔɔ́ŋ né ju yoòr bɔɔ̀n mé be bɔɔ̀n turú su.
45013003	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, nuaá mé né gècên bɔɔ́, dé seèn ŋgɔ́mnà lòù vèh bèh; nùà veên bú veéh yeé kɔɔ́. Mɔ wò ye te nyí bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ dùlà cú, sâ bɔ́ lòm bɔ̀ njèh bebagaà, te bɔ́ seén wò mé njéh.
45013004	Seé mé bɔ́ né bɔɔ́ sâ, Càŋ bɔ́ haá naâ kɔɔ́, te bɔ́ gam wò, wò bɔɔ́ komo bagaà. Á, mɔ wò né yeé veên bɔɔ́, sâ vèh bɔ́ veèh bɔ̀n! Mɔ sam, bɔ́ nde né wò gèr feh keéh, terreb né beè bɔɔ̀n. Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ. Mɔ nuaré dé`i bɔɔ́ veên, bɔ́ nde né bú gèr fî feh keéh. Càŋ ye te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ yúlá-temé nyî teèn.
45013005	Sâ tueé né ye, mɔ wò né toò bɔ̀ ŋgɔ́mnà leéb, né njèh bagaà dé gècên. Dé yúlá-temé Càŋ gí lòm ŋgwéh ndɔ; né cu te ndòn bí lè sé cú.
45013006	Bí làmpɔ̂ŋ gwɔm yeé dé cî. Bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ mé né làmpɔ̂ŋ weh sâ, né gi bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ ndɔ, à ye te bɔ́ bɔɔ́ dilí nyegé lòù.
45013007	Njií mé nùà kàn né bí bieé dɔɔ́ŋ, bí gwɔ̀m gí bɔ́ faá bí sé naá kaà gwɔm nɔ; bí gwɔ̀m njí làmpɔ̂ŋ mé bɔ̀ làmpɔ̂ŋ bɔ̀, dé kɔ́stɔ̀ŋ mé bɔ̀ kɔ́stɔ̀ŋ ndɔ. Nuaá mé bí sé naâ bú veéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bí vèh bú veèh; bí sumú nuaá mé bí sé naâ bú sumú ndɔ.
45013008	Bí té mé hùà nùàr yoòr ŋgágá dèn; yoòr bi`i a, ŋgágá dèn sér hùà lètenè bi`i gwaán kuû. Nuaá mé né mbeí mé temé cén gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔɔ́ komo né dé seèn njií mé sóú Càŋ tueé nê.
45013009	Mè tueé bí, bèh joloò Càŋ mé né tueé ye: té yàgà ndé, té feh wúlá, té yíb ŋúɔ́b, té temé te njèh nùàre kwá njí, mé bɔ̀ sóú dé jomò mene dɔɔ́ŋ, yila gi né te meí bɔɔ̀n cén hên, à tueé lom né dé seèn ye: gwàn mbeí yeè faá wò gwaán né ŋgàŋ yoòr yeè nɔ.
45013010	Mɔ nùàr né mé gwaân lè, à veên mé mbeí bɔ́ njí ndé ŋgwéh. Mɔ wò né bɔ̀ mbaábi mé temé yeè mene gwaán, sâ wò bele lom né dé yeè sóú gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
45013011	Bí né kɔɔ́ ye, baá cu. Mɔ né mân, bí ny`imè dèn làŋ, hên baá gi`i cu mé Càŋ nde né béh teèn yili sɔm. Dè wá ndé cú faá dé léí toò mé béh lé temé kwaá lɔgɔ́ naâ yoòr Yeésò Kristò nɔ.
45013012	Cibí geé baá kèn, cieé baá gè jomo kɔ ŋagá ndɔ. Béh kwá lɔ́ seé cíbítenè ménâ, béh yí wèh sér bɔ̀ njèh taâb mé béh nde né taáb mé njéh suútenè lieé.
45013013	Béh gɔ̀ d`il`i lòm faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gɔ né bèh ŋagâ nɔ. Béh té wɔ́ŋ sèlà, béh té mbè sèlà, béh té sár gwá, béh té ndíéŋ, béh té tɔgɔ ndè, béh té huer ŋgwà ndɔ.
45013014	Bí yoòr sù sér á yɔ̀ŋ dé feê mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò. Njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr bi`i né gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, bí té teèn téré yílá cú.
45014001	Mɔ nuaré dé`i né te ceér Càŋe yuaá, bí tá bú taà, bí té bú lòù bɔ̀ sér.
45014002	Sâ tueé né ye: mɔ nuaré dé`i né mé terreb njèh dɔɔ́ŋ yieé larê teèn, mbeí né dé seèn te ceér Càŋe yuaá, à dé seèn yieé lom né yùè,
45014003	sâ nuaá mé yieé laré né dɔɔ́ŋ a, té mbeí mé yieé geí né lòù doô sèb. Dé mé yieé geí né lòù a, té dé mé yieé njií né mbaá doô ndúgó ndɔ; à né beè Càŋ.
45014004	Wò né ne`i, mé né ju felè nùà seê nùàr tená gɔ wa? À bɔɔ́ mene bagaà, né mene veên, dɔɔ́ŋ né lom ju tele seê seèn. Mè tueé wò, nùà hèllè nde né bagaà bɔɔ́ komo; Nùà Dueè né mé terreb teèn, à nde né bú taá.
45014005	Bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i ye: bɔ̀ cieé dé`i né bɔ̀ mbeí yɔgɔ́. Sâ bɔ̀ dé`i né dé bɔɔ̀n tueé ye: cieé dɔɔ́ŋ né gi kè`i cén. Mɔ né mân, sâ nùà kàn a, njébá nyégé te mùnò seèn bagasé.
45014006	Nuaá mé ye cieé dé`i né bɔ̀ mbeí yɔgɔ́ doô, cieé sâ jolo né ye te seén Nùà Dueè. Nuaá mé né njèh dɔɔ́ŋ yieé laré doô, mé njéh seén taré né Nùà Dueè ndɔ. Mɔ à nde aá yieé, à né yeé Càŋ vra, faá dé mé yieé geí né lòù vra yeé Càŋ, à né Càŋ seén ndɔ nɔ.
45014007	Á sâ, nuaré dé`i den lom né dene dé seèn nùà njèh wa? À cio kuú lom né dé seèn nùà njèh ndɔ wa?
45014008	Mè tueé bí, mɔ béh né yɔŋ, béh yɔŋ né dé Nùà Dueè; mɔ béh né kuú, béh kuú né dé Nùà Dueè ndɔ. Mɔ né mân, sâ béh yili mene lòù, béh kuú mene, dɔɔ́ŋ béh né gi beè Nùà Dueè.
45014009	Kristò lé kuú naâ dé cî, à komo yuo cu lè cio, ye te nyí den Nùà Dueè bɔ̀ komô mé bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀.
45014010	Sâ, mɔ né mân, wò mbeí yeè jue né dé ke`i wa? Á, wò ndɔ nɔ, wò nùàr seb né dé ke`i ndɔ wa? Ŋgweéh béh nde gi né ké toò Càŋ waá, à tena ju felè beèh dɔɔ́ŋ mà.
45014011	Né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, ye: «Càŋ Dueè ye: Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ Càŋ gècên né lom nyí, nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né toò nyî cemmé. Nùà kàn nde né loù sâ ké ter mé sòn seèn lɔgɔ́ njií, ye nyí Càŋ né lom Nùà terrèb kɔɔ́.»
45014012	Á sâ, nùà kàn a, njébá tég, à nde né sòn seèn mé be seèn toò Càŋ tueé.
45014013	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh gè mé nùàr jueê lètenè beèh geè, béh gwàn sér bɔ̀ mbeí beèh lòù. Njií mé nde né mbeí beèh te veên luú njií, béh té gwàn.
45014014	Bêh Yeésò Fehtoò beèh nyɔgɔ́ bilí baá kèn. Kènê mè baá gi kɔɔ́, ye yáb nùàr kɔɔ́ bɔ́ yílí bèh. Á, mɔ nuaré dé`i né munó ye, nyí nde né mé njéh fulá kuú, sâ né ka beè seèn fulásé ménâ ndɔ.
45014015	Mɔ wò né mbeí yeè temé mé yáb dé`i yieé yulá, sâ kɔ́ɔ ye nyí bú lòù gwàn sér ŋgwéh. Té bú teèn bɔ́ lèr kéh, né lom yáb mbaá; Kristò lé naá gi`i felè mbeí yeè sâ kuú!
45014016	Bí té gwàn dé njií mé né beè bi`i huɔɔ́m, ŋa seér njèh júêb beè bɔ̀ dé`i.
45014017	Lò Càŋ dé seèn mé yáb bɔ̂ mbè dɔ̀gɔ̀ dèn ŋgwéh; né seér mé dene didilî bɔ̂ pɔ́ŋ mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé, faá Cúcuí Ŋagâ haá nê nɔ.
45014018	Nuaá mé né seé Kristò gèh dé hên bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, né lom nùà bagaà beè Càŋ mé njolò bɔ̀ nùàr mene.
45014019	Mɔ né mân ndɔ, sâ béh fɔ́n nyégé ceér mé cɔ̀ŋ nde né teèn yuo, te béh bɔ̀ mbeí beèh ta kuú te ceér Càŋe.
45014020	Nùàr a, té seé Càŋ mé yáb túlú ŋèrrè sɔ̀m. Dé yáb dɔɔ́ŋ yieé larê né gi môn dág. Njèh cén, njií mé nde né mbeí te veéne luú njií, húɔ́m ŋgwéh mé nùàr yieé njií sâ.
45014021	Huɔm kela né mé nùàr núɔ́gɔ́ yíé ŋgwéh, à mbè ŋúé ŋgwéh. Bú a, bèrɔ̀ŋ gí bɔ̀ njií mé nde né mbeí te veéne luú njií dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
45014022	Sâ njií mé wò naâ lè yeè ŋgweé nyegé doô, kwá lɔ́ lè yeè bî Càŋ fà. Mè tueé bí, nuaá mé né kɔɔ́ ye nyí bɔɔ́ yií né teèn, samésé nde né bú.
45014023	Nuaá mé né njeré dé`i lòù yieé kiné, baá te ju beè Càŋ ndɔ. Lòù sam, ndòn seèn né mene bú tueé, à teèn jéjég njébá d`il`i ŋgwéh. Mè tueé bí, mɔ nuaré dé`i né njií sâ kɔɔ́, mé njéh mene à né ka teèn ŋeí den, sâ né veên.
45015001	Béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé baá gi te ceér Càŋ tarésé dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ béh ye te huɔm, béh gàm sér bɔ̀ yuyuaâ bɔ̀ lòù. Béh té faá béh né gwaán nɔ bɔ́.
45015002	Nùà kàn a, bɔ́ sér njií mé nde né mbeí yoòr huɔɔ́m, te gam mbeí, mbeí bele ceér Càŋ mé temé seèn mene.
45015003	Te den faá Yeésò Kristò lé bɔɔ́ naâ nɔ; à lé dé seèn dé mé à gwaán né kɔɔ́ bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh. À lé bɔɔ́ seér naâ faá né felè seèn te mvù Càŋe nyagá den nɔ, ye: «Séb mé bɔ́ lé selé naâ wò doô, sue le seér aá felè mò.»
45015004	Bɔ̀ njií mé né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lé nyagá kwaá naâ léí toò, ye te béh ndeè maán weh njèh teèn, yo taré béh tarè, béh kwaá sèŋ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te béh ndèm kwaá njií gi mé Càŋ.
45015005	Bú Càŋ nuaá mé sèŋ bɔ̂ táré-yo yuo gi`i né beè seèn doô, bú a, há bí terreb, te bí bele gule Yeésò Kristò, bí den lètenè bi`i mé sòn cên,
45015006	te bí seén gi Càŋ Tele Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò mé sòn cên dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
45015007	Mɔ né mân, sâ bí bɔ̀ mbeí bi`i kè nyégé kú yo bi`i lètenè bi`i faá Yeésò Kristò lé ke nyegé naâ bí nɔ, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene ménâ, bɔ́ seén Càŋ mé njéh.
45015008	Mè tueé bí, Yeésò Kristò lé nùà seê bɔ̀ Jûf ŋa kuú naâ, ye te yuo faá Càŋ lé tueé kwaá naâ mé bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ, te nyí feh keéh béh teèn, ye béh a, Càŋ nyeén túé bèh ma.
45015009	À lé dé`i nde cuù naâ, ye te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ŋene kɔ́-jere Càŋ felè bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ seén bú mé njéh. Né te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den, ye: «Mè wò lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam hên seén gɔ nde né dé cî; mè nde né yilí yeè mé bené seén.»
45015010	Te mvù Càŋe né cu nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ sàmè gí ménâ ndɔ, bí yílá ndé gí te mbàgà Càŋe.»
45015011	Né cu beré dé`i tueé ye: «Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ, bí sén làrè Càŋ Dueè seèn. Dàm nùàr a, sén làrè bú lò nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ!»
45015012	Esáyà sòn-Càŋ tueé né môn ndɔ, ye: «Ndùté ndùtù Jésè baá ndeê, à Nùà Dueè felè lò nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ den nde né kɔɔ́, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ndèm kwaá njií gi nde né yoòr seèn.»
45015013	Càŋ mé haá yeé ndèm a, há bí dàm vɔ́gɔ́-temé mé dɔlê, njua mé bí né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií, te bí kwaá ŋeí cu ndèm mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ lòù.
45015014	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè né bagasé kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye bí né gi bɔ̀ húɔ́m-temé bɔ̀, bí né ceér gècên ŋené kɔɔ́, bí né gi mé terreb ndéb lètenè bi`i leéb kuû teèn.
45015015	Mé njéh mene, te bɔ̀ beré dé`i lè mvù hên mè la naâ bí lòù nyagá turú, te bí nyèn cú. Lòù sam, mè né mé fùgò beè Càŋ kuú,
45015016	à lé ye mè a, mè né nùà seê Yeésò Kristò ké lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ma. À lé naâ mè Njàgà Bagaà seèn beè jege haá, ye mè a, ndé ké lètenè bɔɔ̀n tueé den, te bɔ́ ŋa gi njèh sèmè mé né nyí yoòr huɔɔ́m, te Cúcuí Ŋagâ haá bɔ́ terreb, bɔ́ den lom beè nyî jolosé ma.
45015017	Yeé baá mân, njií ye mè a, sàgàr kú lòm mé seé Càŋ dé sagâr ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé njua Yeésò Kristò.
45015018	Mɔ mè nde né sòn komo, sâ kɔ mè jue cegé né seé mé Kristò né beè mò bɔɔ́ keéh hên: mè né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ceér Càŋ feh, te bɔ́ ŋgweé sòn seèn. Kristò né ŋgòr sònò mò tueé keéh, à né seé beè mò bɔɔ́ keéh:
45015019	bɔ̀ fém, mé bɔ̀ c`iè hihiné mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ mene né gi teèn ŋené yuo kelá. Mè lé terreb kwaá naâ faá bèh sâ, te mè nde ye mé Njàgà Bagaà felè Kristò bèh dɔɔ́ŋ tueé ndeé. Mè lé tueé duɔɔ́m naâ ké Jerúsalem, nde wa mé lò Ilírî.
45015020	Mè Njàgà Bagaà sâ tueé lom yeé bèh mé yilí Yeésò Kristò née teèn ŋgúlí wá ŋgwéeh ye, mè ye te mè gwà dé`i felè maàŋ nuaré dé`i mé yí cú.
45015021	Te den faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ndɔ nɔ, ye: «Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ́ née bɔ́ njeré dé`i túé ŋgwéeh ye nde né bú ŋené; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé née ju seèn ŋgúŋgwéeh ye nde né ŋgweé gií ndɔ.»
45015022	Sâ né njií mé lé naâ mè cu dɔɔ́ŋ yiín; mè gwaán né mene ké yoòr bi`i ndeê, mè wá kòmò ŋgwéh.
45015023	Kènê mè seé te tàbè hên bɔɔ́ gi aá kèn; mè nde né bí yɔŋ ke. Baá nyèmà kɔ́beè mè né gò sâ kaga den.
45015024	Kɔ mè baá mé gò Espânye, mè kela ye ké yoòr bi`i ndɔ. Mè gwaán né bí ŋenê, te béh bí cer weh ndɔ, mè kwa gàm beè bi`i, mè kela nde ye ké Espânye sâ.
45015025	Njèh cén, mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ nde née ké Jerúsalem ye, te mè haá njií bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké sâ gàm.
45015026	Lòù sam, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Masedínà mé Akayî bilí gi aá kàgàlɔ̀ŋ kèn; né lom bɔ́ yoòr huɔɔ́m dé gècên, bɔ́ ye, há njí mé bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ ké Jerúsalem lètenè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀.
45015027	Lé naâ mé kàgà-ndòn bɔɔ̀n ndɔ; sé né ka môn bɔ̀n. Ŋgweéh bɔ̀ Jûf mé né ceér Yeésò ké Jerúsalem bele dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá gi`i Njàgà Bagaà mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam se wa? Sâ kènê kɔ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam yií be teèn, te gam bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ njèh dé ŋgàŋ yoòr ndɔ.
45015028	Mɔ seé hèllè ndeè gi baá, mè haá lɔ aá bɔ́ kàgàlɔ̀ŋ sâ, mè wa ye ké yoòr bi`i, te mè nde ye Espânye kelá ndeé.
45015029	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye: mɔ mè ndeè waà baá ké yoòr bi`i, Yeésò Kristò nde né béh bí kulú nyegé.
45015030	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mé yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò bɔ̂ Cúcuí Ŋagâ mé né gwaân lètenè beèh kaá kwaá, mè né bí bɔŋ, ye bí dùà gàm mè Càŋ teèn, bí dua lom bú felà mò tég,
45015031	te mè beè bɔ̀ dúágá-tie bɔ̀ ké Judê yílá cú, te mè wa nyegé mé gàm bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Jerúsalem bagasé, bɔ́ weh nyegé mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene ndɔ.
45015032	Mɔ bí né ménâ dua, mè ndeè né ké yoòr bi`i mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene waâ. Mɔ Càŋ né gwaán, sâ mè nde né ké lètenè bi`i du weh ndɔ.
45015033	Á sâ, Càŋ mé haá yeé nùàr dɔlê a, kúrú nyégé bí dɔɔ́ŋ. È môn.
45016001	Bí kè nyégé tie beèh Fébè baga, à né nùà seé Càŋ te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Káŋkrè.
45016002	Mɔ à waà, bí wèh lòm bú mé yilí Fehtoò beèh lè; seé bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ né ménâ. Njií mé né bú yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí gàm bú gaàm. À né lom nùà gàm nùàr dé gècên, à lé naâ mè gam.
45016003	Bí bíé kéh Prisîl bɔ̂ Akilâ baga; né bɔ̀ mbeí seê mò te seé Yeésò Kristò.
45016004	Bɔ́ lé naâ cio felè mò liím, te bɔ́ yili sɔm ye mè. Mè né lom bɔ́ vra dé gècên; bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ né taré bɔ́ môn vra ndɔ.
45016005	Bí bíé kéh mè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bilí dua yeé Càŋ ké gwò bɔɔ̀n ndɔ. Bí bie keéh mbeí mò Efanête. Ké te tàbè Asíà dɔɔ́ŋ, nuaá mé lé kwaá njií lɔgɔ́ naâ temé yoòr Kristò lé naâ bú.
45016006	Bí bíé kéh mè Marî, à né lom seé felè bi`i mé terreb mene bɔɔ́.
45016007	Bí bíé Androníkù bɔ̂ Juniâ, né bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh bɔ́ lé ké gwà cib`i naâ kɔɔ́. Ké lètenè bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ̀ nùàr né lom bɔ́ vra dé gècên. Bɔ́ lé bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ Yeésò ŋa lɔgɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́ mé mè.
45016008	Bí bíé kéh mè Àmpliátù, né mbeí mò te yilí Fehtoò beèh.
45016009	Bí bie keéh mè Hùrbên, né mbeí seê beèh te seé Kristò. Bí bie keéh mbeí mò Seták`i ndɔ.
45016010	Bí bíé kéh mè Àpelê baga; à lé naâ feh keéh ye né mene te gèr-e, nyí né temé yoòr Kristò kwaá njií. Bí bie keéh mè mbàgà Aristobûl ndɔ.
45016011	Bí bíé kéh mè nùàr mò Herodiɔ̂ŋ baga. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh te mbàgà Nárs`i kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bíé kéh mè bɔ́ teèn.
45016012	Bí bie keéh Trifénà bɔ̂ Tripósà mé né seé Fehtoò beèh temá. Bí bie keéh mbeí beèh Pèrsídà, nuaá mé né seé seèn faá cí nɔ bɔɔ́.
45016013	Bí bíé kéh mè Rúfùs; à né lom te ceér Càŋ mé gècên mene njebá taré. Bí bie keéh meí seèn mé né meí mò ndɔ.
45016014	Bí bíé kéh bɔ̀ Asenkretà bɔ̂ Felegɔ̂ŋ mé Hermê baga; bí bie keéh Pàtróbà bɔ̂ Harmâ mé bɔ̀ mbeí bɔɔ̀n ké yoòr bɔɔ̀n baga ndɔ.
45016015	Bí bíé kéh mè Filológà bɔ̂ Júl`i mé Néré bɔ̂ tie seèn baga. Bí bie keéh Holimpâ mé bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ ké sâ dɔɔ́ŋ.
45016016	Bí bíé kú lètenè bi`i mé temé cén. Bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Kristò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ ye: bíé kéh bí baga dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
45016017	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, kúkùr bi`i, bí kè kɔ́gɔ́n nyégé bagasé, wanɔɔ́ŋ njií mé béh lé feéh naâ bí dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i né lom teèn feré ndugó gɔ, ye te bɔ́ yií kèrrè lètenè bi`i, bí sab ceér, bí temé te ŋgòr beèh kwá njí cú. Mɔ né mân, bí gè lòm mé ceér bɔɔ̀n nɔɔ́ŋ.
45016018	Gèh bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ seé Fehtoò beèh Kristò bɔ́ ŋgwéh, bɔ́ lege seér né dé ŋgàŋ lè`i bɔɔ̀n! Seé bɔɔ̀n né lom ŋgòr bebagaà sònò tueé nagâ; bɔ́ né-re ménâ bɔɔ́, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bèh njèh kɔ́ ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ bele gɔ.
45016019	Dé bi`i môn sam, bɔ̀ nùàr né gi kɔɔ́ ye, bí né dé bi`i sòn Nùà Dueè ŋgweé. Môn, mè né lom mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé felè bi`i dé gècên. Njèh cén, mè né gwaán ye bí den lom bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ mé né baga bɔɔ́, te bí nyenné komo veên.
45016020	Mè tueé bí, Càŋ mé haá yeé dɔlê, nde né toò hên Sátàn gulè bi`i njalé kwaá. Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò a, ká s`iè bí beè!
45016021	Mbeí seê mò Timotê ye bíé kéh bí; bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr mò Lùsiûs bɔ̂ Jásɔ̀ŋ mé Sosipátà ye bíé bí ndɔ.
45016022	Né mè Tèrtíù, mè mvù hên nyagá né kɔɔ́, mè né bí lè yilí Fehtoò beèh bieé.
45016023	Gayûs ye bíé bí; mè cer né ká lɔ seèn. Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ bilí yila yeé ká lɔ seèn ndɔ. Herástà mé fer kàgàlɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ né beè seèn ye bíé bí. D`im beèh Kwártù ye bíé bí ndɔ. [
45016024	Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, ká s`iè gí bí beè dɔɔ́ŋ. È môn!]
45016025	Béh sén Càŋ seèn! Terreb né beè seèn, à nde né bí te ceér seèn bɔɔ́ taré. Njàgà Bagaà seèn felè Yeésò Kristò mé mè né yeé se hên né ménâ tueé ndɔ. Càŋ béh ménâ feh keéh né kɔɔ́. À lɔ Njàgà Bagaà sâ munó nab kwaá naâ ter. Lɔ naâ sâ wɔ́ŋ née teèn sam ye.
45016026	Kènê, cu yeé wulu baá, à ŋené sɔm keéh ye bú bèsɔ́nè mé mvù bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀, te dàm bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgweé laré, faá Càŋ ndeèr lé tueé naâ nɔ, te bɔ́ kwaá njií temé teèn, bɔ́ ŋgweé tie.
45016027	Béh sén Càŋ seèn. Kɔ́gɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ ceré le né mé bú. Terreb seèn a, sùmù yùò kélà cie dé kè`i cên mé Yeésò Kristò. È môn.
46001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mé Càŋ lé naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn balé weh, te mè ŋa mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò. Bêh mbeí beèh Sostên nyagá né kɔɔ́,
46001002	béh nyagá njií né mé bɔ̀ŋ bi`i, bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ ké Kɔrênt. Càŋ bí yilá kwaá né beè seèn, te bí ŋa bɔ̀ nùàr seèn mé yilí Yeésò Kristò. Mé bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i mene, bɔ́ né mene he, mɔ bɔ́ né yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò dua, Càŋ né bɔ́ ménâ yilá ndɔ. À né Fehtoò bɔɔ̀n faá à né Fehtoò beèh nɔ.
46001003	Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
46001004	Mè né Càŋ felè bi`i cu dɔɔ́ŋ vra. Lòù sam, bí né lom mé fùgò seèn beè Yeésò Kristò kuú den.
46001005	Né bɔ̀n: sòn cên mé bí bɔ̀ Kristò né coór bilí hên bɔɔ́ né kɔɔ́, te bí nde ye mé gà fùgò hihiné beè Càŋ kuú. Tétég bí kɔ gi aá ceér gècên kèn, bí né gi gècên sâ tueé kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
46001006	Né môn, cu mé béh lé tueé naâ ŋgòr Càŋ ké lètenè bi`i, bí lé naá gi`i temé teèn nɔɔ́ŋ kwaá njií,
46001007	bí né Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh kela den, ye cieé dé`i à nde cuù né ŋené yuo kelâ. Yeé baá ménâ, lo dé kàn mé Càŋ haá yeé bɔ̀ nùàr seèn doô bí sám cú ndɔ.
46001008	Bú Yeésò Kristò nùà njèh nyeén nyegé nde né bí kɔɔ́, te bí taré wa loù mé à nde né ju teèn tená ŋagá, te nuaré dé`i bí bɔ̀ ny`i cú.
46001009	Càŋ né Càŋ húɔ́m-temê felè bɔ̀ njií mé à tueé gi né dɔɔ́ŋ, à bí kwarè Ŋuna seèn Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh yilá njií né kɔɔ́, te béh bɔ́ te bilí cén.
46001010	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè né bí mé yilí Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh dua: bí dèn mé sòn cên; kèrrè a, té lètenè bi`i yílá; bí dèn lòm mé temé cên, bí mùnò gí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ mé sòn cên ndɔ;
46001011	wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé yuoó naâ ké yoòr Kòlòwê lé waà naâ, ye mè a: jɔ́g baá ké lètenè bi`i teèn ma.
46001012	Sâ tueé né ye, nùà kàn né tueé ye nyí né hiín. Dé kân ye nyí né dé nyî nùàr Pɔ̂l, dé kàn ye: nyí né nùàr Apɔlɔ̂s; dé`i den cuù ye: nyí né dé nyî nùàr Piêr; dé`i ye: nyí né nùàr Kristò ndɔ.
46001013	Hên bí né munó ye Kristò kerré den né hihiné ménâ wa? Bɔ́ lé ké te toû sòn bi`i fagà naâ mè Pɔ̂l wa? Bɔ́ lé nòmò Càŋ koú naâ bí mé yilí mò Pɔ̂l ndɔ wa?
46001014	Mè né Càŋ vra dé mé lètenè bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ mè lé nuaré dé`i nòmò Càŋ kɔɔ́ kòù ná ŋgwêh, gi cegé né Krispûs bɔ̂ Gayûs doô.
46001015	Sâ nuaré dé`i seèn mbaá gwàn wèh ndé ŋgwéh, ye bɔ́ lé bí nòmò Càŋ koú naâ mé yilí mò ndɔ.
46001016	È heè, mè lé naá cuù bɔ̀ nùàr te mbàgà Setéfánàs kou ndɔ. Kɔ ŋgweé mè lé naá cuù-re nuaré dé`i kou wa, mè dé sâ kɔ́ cú.
46001017	Kristò lé mè bèh nùàr koù témá njí ná ŋgwêh, à lé tema njií seér naâ mè bèh Njàgà Bagaà seè, ye mè a, té leba kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ nùàr teèn yí kéh, wanɔɔ́ŋ cio mé nyí Kristò lé kuú naâ ké te toú fagâ doô nde né njèh mbaâ njolò bɔ̀ nùàr ŋaá le.
46001018	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, kùr cio mé Kristò lé kuú naâ ké te toû doô, né seér ŋgòr kùlù beè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né tuar yilá. Dé beèh môn sam; dé beèh, béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ né yili sɔm hên, kùr cio seèn né lom ŋgòr gècên mé sɔm keéh né terreb Càŋ cie kɔɔ́.
46001019	Né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: «Mè nde né kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ kékɔgɔn bɔ̀ beéh sɔm, mè vurú sɔm ndòn bɔ̀ kɔ́-njèh bɔ̀ ndɔ.»
46001020	Á sâ, bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ hèllè baá gi he? Bɔ̀ njí-sóù baá gi he ndɔ? Bɔ̀ sàn gɔ̀ njèh bɔ̀ nɔ? Mè tueé bí: Càŋ dé seèn feh keéh né ye: dàm bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔɔ̀n ká lè wɔ́ŋe sâ dɔɔ́ŋ beè nyî né gi kùlù dé tùàr.
46001021	Bɔ̀ nùàr mé be kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔɔ̀n sâ mene dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ Càŋ ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh, bɔ́ kɔ́gɔ̀n seèn ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ. Yeé baá mân, Càŋ kaga baá-re ndòn, ye nyí yili sɔm seér nde né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr nyî kwaá njií ma. À si baá-re kòù. Lé naâ mé ŋgòr kùlù seèn hèllè ndɔ; béh hên se yɔŋ yeé cí.
46001022	Bɔ̀ Jûf ye, kɔ né fém, te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ mé njéh; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dé bɔɔ̀n ye kɔ né kɔ́gɔ̀n te bɔ́ gwaán ye.
46001023	Mé njéh mene, béh kɔ lom né dé beèh kùr cio Kristò ké te toû doô tueé deèn. Béh né kɔɔ́ ye ŋgòr hên né lom beè bɔ̀ Jûf duduané; beè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam né ŋgòr kùlù ndɔ.
46001024	Dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ balé sɔm aá dɔɔ́ŋ, né mene bɔ̀ Jûf, mene bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, beè bɔɔ̀n Kristò sɔm keéh né terreb Càŋ mé kɔ́gɔ̀n Càŋ cie kɔɔ́.
46001025	Te bɔ̀ nùàr nde bɔɔ̀n munó den ye Càŋ hên bɔɔ́ den né seé kùlù. Mɔ sé la né mene seé kùlù sâ, bɔ̀ nùàr a, kɔ́ɔ ye: bɔ́ kɔgɔ́n mene gèh dé heè wa, bɔ́ ké bèh kùlù Càŋ doô kɔ́gɔ́n wá ŋgwéh ma. Njií mé bɔ́ ye né yuaâ Càŋ sé wa, bɔ́ a, kɔ́ɔ ye, dàm terrèb bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ ké teèn táré wá ny`i ŋgwéh ma.
46001026	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, sâ Càŋ te bɔ̀ŋ bi`i hên yilá bilí kwaá né bɔ̀ ne`i wee? Mɔ ye tútueè, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, beè bɔ̀ nùàr bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ lètenè bi`i màgà ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ terreb bɔ̀ né ŋgɔ́b, bɔ̀ njonjolo bɔ̀ màgà ŋgwéh ndɔ.
46001027	Càŋ balé weh seér né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ̀ nùàr ká lè wɔ́ŋe ye bɔ́ né duaàn sâ, te bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ gulí; à balé weh seér cu né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ̀ nùàr né bɔ́ bɔ̀ yuyuaâ bɔ̀ yilá, te fegùl`i sie nyegé bɔ̀ terreb bɔ̀ mé njéh.
46001028	À balé weh seér né bɔ̀ mbaá bɔ̀ njolò bɔ̀ nùàr, bɔ̀ lólôb bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ kòn, te bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ ŋellé sɔm bɔ̀ terreb bɔ̀ doô.
46001029	À mé njéh ye te nuaré dé`i toò nyî mbaá púnó kú cú.
46001030	Bí kékɔɔ̀ ye Càŋ bí yoòr Yeésò Kristò bilí yií gi né kɔɔ́, te béh bí ŋene weh kɔ́gɔ̀n beè seèn. Mé yilí Kristò cên sâ kènê, béh bí baá gi bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ njolò Càŋ, te béh den lom aá dene Kristò, à lé béh ŋa weéh naâ kɔɔ́.
46001031	Te yuo faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den nɔ, ye: «Nuaá mé nde né punó, bú a, púnó lòm mé yilí Nùà Dueè ma.»
46002001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè lé naâ ké lètenè bi`i waá, mè tueé bí kùr gècên mé Càŋ lɔ naâ ter leér kwaá, mè lé bí te hueh mé nde né bí yɔgɔ́, túé ná ŋgwêh ndɔ; lé mé lo mò ná ŋgwêh.
46002002	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ mè lé ye te mè njeré dé`i ké lètenè bi`i kɔ́ cú, mè kɔ lom ka Yeésò Kristò, mè tétég kɔ lom bú Yeésò Kristò mé bɔ́ lé naâ ké te toû fagá njií doô.
46002003	Yeé baá ménâ, mè ké yoòr bi`i yua ndelé yuo kelà baá-re lòù.
46002004	Mè né mene njèh feh, mè né mene ŋgòr Càŋ tueé, mè lé mé kɔ́gɔ̀n dé nùàr túé ná ŋgwêh ye te mè bou bí lòù. Cúcuí Càŋ mé terreb seèn lé bí feh keéh naâ kɔɔ́, ye né ŋgòr gècên.
46002005	Te kènê temé bi`i te kɔ́gɔ̀n dé nùàr njébá dèn cú, te bí ŋene kɔ seér terreb Càŋ, bí kwaá njií temé teèn.
46002006	Á sâ, mè tueé den né ŋgòr kɔ́gɔ̀n ndɔ, mè ŋgòr kɔ́gɔ̀n sâ tueé njií né mé bɔ̀ jojolô bɔ̀ te ceér Càŋe. Gèh kɔ́gɔ̀n bú sâ dé wɔ̂ŋ sam, dé bɔ̀ tetarê bɔ̀ mé nde né dé bɔɔ̀n mbaá vu le sam ndɔ.
46002007	Hɔ̂s, dé hên né kɔ́gɔ̀n mé Càŋ lé leér kwaá naâ lòù, ye nyí kwaá né dé beèh, te béh den kwarè nyî liesé. À lɔ bɔɔ́ naâ ménâ sâ wɔ́ŋ née dùɔ̀m ŋgwéeh ye.
46002008	Gèh kɔ́gɔ̀n bú sâ, bɔ̀ tetarê bɔ̀ ká lè wɔ́ŋe bú kɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ́g. Mɔ bɔ́ sé naâ bú ŋgweé kɔɔ́, bɔ́ sé lé Nùà Njèh te toû fágá njí ná ŋgwêh; bɔ́ sé la kɔ ye, terreb njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn.
46002009	Mé njéh mene, yuo né faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den nɔ, ye: «Ŋgúlú mé nùàr mé njolo ŋéné bèh, à mé tie ŋgwé bèh, dé mé sé bɔɔ́ mene naàn temé mùnò kɔ́ bèh, Càŋ ŋgúlú sâ nyegé kwaá seér né dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bú gwaán.»
46002010	Mè tueé bí, Càŋ bɔ̀ njií hên feh keéh lom né mé béh; à béh feh keéh né mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ. Cúcuí Ŋagâ né gi dé seèn njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ŋené kɔɔ́; Càŋ nyegé kwaá né mene njeré dé`i ké lè seèn lòù, Cúcuí Ŋagâ né gi dé seèn ŋené kɔɔ́.
46002011	Né faá mé nùàr nɔ, càŋ mé né lè seèn kɔ lom né njèh mé né lè seèn kɔɔ́. Né ménâ mé Càŋ Dueè ndɔ, Cúcuí Càŋ kɔ lom né njií mé né lè Càŋ kɔɔ́.
46002012	Dé beèh, béh lé cúcuí dé wɔ̂ŋ kwà ná ŋgwêh, béh kwa seér né Cúcuí mé yuo né beè Càŋ, te béh ŋene kɔ gèh ŋgúlù mé Càŋ né béh mé húɔ́m-temé seèn haá.
46002013	Mɔ béh baá dé beèh bɔ̀ njèh sâ tueé, béh ŋgòr mé bɔ̀ nùàr munó yeé mé feh bɔɔ̀n kèmà bèh, béh tueé yeé dé mé Cúcuí Càŋ feh né béh kɔɔ́. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bɔ́ lè ŋgulí, béh seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ sâ se ŋagá nyegé baá-re mé bɔ́.
46002014	Nuaá mé Cúcuí Càŋ bú lè sam, à bɔ̀ njèh gècên mé né beè Cúcuí sâ felè wèh kwá ndé ŋgwéh: beè seèn bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né seér bɔ̀ njèh kùlù, à bɔ́ ŋgwé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ. Lòù sam, Cúcuí Ŋagâ seèn nùàr njèh se yeé kɔɔ́.
46002015	Nuaá mé Cúcuí Càŋ né bú lè ŋgulí, nde né ju felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ tená kɔɔ́. Dé seèn nùàr bèh ju tenâ felè seèn kwà ndé ŋgwéh.
46002016	Te ŋgòr Càŋe né mân nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Ne`i kɔ né mùnò Nùà Dueè kɔɔ́ wa? Ne`i bú njèh feh komo nde né kɔɔ́ ndɔ wa?» Béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Cúcuí Càŋ né béh lè ŋgulí dɔɔ́ŋ, béh né gi gèh mùnò dé Kristò kɔɔ́.
46003001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ ye tútueè, mè lé mé bí faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Cúcuí Càŋ né bɔ́ yoòr nɔ, túé ná ŋgwêh: mè lé tueé loóm naá kaà mé bí faá bɔ̀ nùàr ká lè wɔ́ŋe nɔ, faá bɔ̀ huaán memanè mé baá ye ceér Yeésò Kristò bele ndɔ.
46003002	Mè lé haá naâ bí mbán, dèn ŋgwéh sér. Mɔ sé naâ sér, bí sé yíé kòmò ná ŋgwêh. Né mene hên, bí yíé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
46003003	Lòù sam, bí née ka faá bɔ̀ nùàr ká lè wɔ́ŋ ye nɔ. Mɔ huer bɔ̂ jɔ́gɔ́ né ké lètenè bi`i ter saá ŋaá mân, sâ fèh kéh ŋgwéh ye bí né faá bɔ̀ nùàr ká le wɔ́ŋe wa? Sâ bí túé ŋgwéh ye dene bi`i né faá dene bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ nɔ wa?
46003004	Mé nùà kàn ye: nyí né dé nyî nùàr Pɔ̂l, nùà kân ye: nyí né dé nyî nùàr Apɔlɔ̂s doô, sâ bí faá bɔ̀ lòù bɔ̀ nɔ bɔ́ ŋgwéh wa?
46003005	Apɔlɔ̂s né ne`i? Mè Pɔ̂l, mè né ne`i? Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, béh né lom ka bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ mé lé naâ bí ceér feh, te bí nde ye temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií. Béh fà dɔɔ́ŋ, nùà kàn ndeè lom né bèh seé seèn mé Càŋ lé haá kwaá naâ beè seèn.
46003006	Mè né nùà doboò, Apɔlɔ̂s nùà nòmò berrê; Càŋ nùà njèh bɔɔ́ né kɔɔ́, te ba yuo ye.
46003007	Sâ tueé né ye, nùà doboò bɔ̂ nùà berrê fà dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mbaá; Càŋ né lom nùà njèh teèn mé huún, à bɔɔ́ né kɔɔ́, te ba yuo ye.
46003008	Nùà doboò bɔ̂ nùà nòmò berrê né gi fà dɔɔ́ŋ kè`i cén; Càŋ haá keéh nde né bɔ́ sàgà seê bɔɔ̀n faá nùà kàn bɔɔ́ keéh nê nɔ.
46003009	Béh né dé beèh bɔ̀ mbeí seê, béh seé bɔɔ́ né dé Càŋ. Bí né dé bi`i ŋueèh Càŋ. Bí né cu gwà mé Càŋ me kwaá nê ndɔ.
46003010	Mè dé mò teèn si nyegé né maàŋ, ka nág faá njí mé-gwà nɔ. Sâ né seé mé Càŋ haá né beè mò mé húɔ́m-temé seèn. Nuaré dé`i dé seèn me né tùàgà felèbɔ̀. Sâ mɔ nùà kàn nde né be teèn yií, bú a, kè nyégé gî seé seèn hèllè bagasé, te à cor njií ye be teèn.
46003011	Wanɔɔ́ŋ maàŋ den nyegé gi aá kèn; maàŋ sâ né Yeésò Kristò nùà njèh. Nuaré dé`i maàŋ dé`i sòn maàŋ sâ s`i kòmò ndé cú.
46003012	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bɔ̀ dé`i nde né felèbɔ̀ mé goó meé kwaá, bɔ̀ dé`i me nde né mé lɔ̀ŋ, bɔ̀ dé`i nde né mé bɔ̀ taá bebagaà; bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i sie nde né dé bɔɔ̀n toú, bɔ̀ dé`i ŋgaà ŋgwàgàm, bɔ̀ dé`i waga kwaá nde né nyure.
46003013	Mè tueé bí, kɔ baá loù ju tenâ, te gèh seé nùà kàn ŋené yuo kela ye cie. Loù sâ lèh bɔɔ̀n nde né we; we nde né gèh seê nùà kàn loù sâ cie sie sɔm keêh.
46003014	Nuaá mé seé seèn tuar ŋg`iè lè ndé ŋgwéh, nde né sàgà kwa.
46003015	Nuaá mé seé seèn ŋgie le aá tuar, dé seèn sàgà kwà ndé ŋgwéh. Dé yili`i, à nde né yili yuo; njèh cén, den nde né faá à dula taré yuoó naâ tuar nɔ.
46003016	Bí né gi bagasé kɔɔ́ nyegé ye, bí né gwà Càŋ kɔɔ́, wa Cúcuí Càŋ cer yeé lè bi`i ma.
46003017	Nuaá mé beéh sɔm gwà Càŋ sâ, Càŋ nde né bú beéh sɔm ndɔ. Lòù sam, gwà Càŋ koô né bèh joloò. Mè tueé bí: bí né gwà Càŋ sâ.
46003018	Nùàr a, té feh seèn mbaá bèlè kú. Mɔ nuaré dé`i né lètenè bi`i munó, ye nyí né ká te wɔ́ŋe kɔgɔ́n, bú a, ŋá sér nùà kùlù, te à den ye nùà kɔ́gɔ̀n dé gècên;
46003019	wanɔɔ́ŋ kɔ́gɔ̀n dé ká te wɔ́ŋe né seér kɔ́gɔ̀n dé kùlù njolò Càŋ. Mvù Càŋ tueé né cí ndɔ, ye: «Kɔ́gɔ̀n bi`i sie cu nde né bí be toò Càŋ kɔɔ́.»
46003020	Né cu beré dé`i nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Càŋ Dueè né mùnò bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ kɔɔ́, ye né njèh mbaâ ma.»
46003021	Mɔ né mân, sâ nùàr a, té mé yilí mbeî mbaá púnó kú, njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi dé bi`i:
46003022	né mene Pɔ̂l, né mene Apɔlɔ̂s, né mene Piêr, né mene wɔ́ŋ, né mene yɔ̀ŋ, né mene cio, né mene kènê, né mene cieé dé`i, dɔɔ́ŋ né gi dé bi`i.
46003023	Bí né dé bi`i dé Yeésò Kristò. Bú, à né dé Càŋ.
46004001	Sâ bɔ̀ nùàr a, kékɔɔ̀ ye, béh né dé beèh bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Yeésò Kristò ma. Ŋgòr Càŋ mé lé naâ léí toò bèh nâb doô, Càŋ haá kwaá gi aá beè beèh, te béh feh bɔ̀ nùàr.
46004002	Mè tueé bí, mɔ nùàr haá kwaá baá mbeí njèh beè, sâ à ye bú a, bɔ́ lòm seé sâ mé temé cén.
46004003	Dé mò, bí né mene njeré dé`i felè mò tueé, bɔ́ sií mene mè toò juù, mè dé sâ táŋ ŋgwéh; mè ju felè mò mé be mò téná ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
46004004	Càŋ mene mè lè sé ŋgwéh, sâ túé ŋgwéh ye mè né nùà gècên, Càŋ Dueè tueé nde né ju felè mò kɔɔ́.
46004005	Mɔ né mân, bí tée ju felè nuaré dé`i mbaá téná wèh; kɔ baá loù sâ. Fehtoò beèh ndeè né cuû; loù sâ, bɔ̀ njií mé né te cibi dɔɔ́ŋ, à nde né cie ŋalé sɔm gií, à nde né mùnò bɔ̀ nùàr bèsɔ́nè salé kwaá gií ndɔ. Sâ né loù mé Càŋ nde né nùà kàn mé seé seèn teèn seén.
46004006	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè hên me njií né bí yoòr Apɔlɔ̂s mé yoòr mò, te bí ŋgweé kwa bɔ̀ njèh gàm teèn; te bí bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ́ lé nyagá naâ lè mvù Càŋe kélá kéh cú. Nuaré dé`i a, té lètenè bi`i mé yilí Apɔlɔ̂s bɔ̂ Pɔ̂l mbaá púnó kú. Mɔ sam, nde né dé`i seén, nde né dé`i seb ndɔ.
46004007	Ne`i lé wò nùà koô bɔ̀ dé`i sie kwaá naâ kɔɔ́ wa? Càŋ lé wò bɔ̀ njèh yeè dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́ há gí ná ŋgwêh wa? Á, mɔ Càŋ lé wò haá gi`i naâ kɔɔ́ bɔ̀n, wò mé njéh faá à wò lòù há ná ŋgwêh nɔ, punó caá né dé ke`i wa?
46004008	Bí ye, bí kwa gi aá bɔ̀ njií mé bí né gwaán kèn sé wa? Wa bí lie gi aá kèn! Bí baá gi bɔ̀ mgbè, wa béh dé beèh mgbè sam sé wa? Mè gwaán né môn ndɔ: bí bɔ̀ mgbè sâ dèn lòm dé gècên, te béh bí ndeè ŋa gi bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè dɔɔ́ŋ;
46004009	wanɔɔ́ŋ den né faá béh bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê, Càŋ béh dé beèh weh kwaá njií né ké jomo nɔ, béh den né faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ́ nde né ké mbartɔgɔ̂ wulá lɔɔ́, te bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ wɔgɔ nde gi ké teèn, te ke bilí béh mé bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ mene.
46004010	Ŋgweéh béh felè Kristò ŋa baá bɔ̀ kùlù bɔ̀; bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ beè seèn né bí wa? Béh né bɔ̀ yuaâ bɔ̀; bɔ̀ tetarê bɔ̀ né bí wa? Béh né njolò bɔ̀ nùàr faá njèh mbaâ nɔ; bí né mé yilí kɔɔ́ wa?
46004011	Ŋgweéh, wa mene hên, béh né cùè mé nyúá nòmò homó, béh mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ sam, béh né núr kuú, béh né kàn mé kán ndeé bele,
46004012	béh né seé temá, te béh yili sɔm ye yɔ̀ŋ beèh mé be beèh. Á, bí nɔ? Mɔ bɔ́ baá béh selé, béh vra seér cu bɔ́ lòù; bɔ́ né béh bunó, béh né dé yolô yoló;
46004013	bɔ́ né béh veên felè tueé kwaá, béh tueé seér dé beèh bɔ̀ ŋgòr dé bebagaà. Wa hên béh né lom gáb mbaá. S`iàgà beè bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ né cu béh ndɔ.
46004014	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ mè né mene bí mân nyagá njií, mè nyàgà ŋgwéh ye te bí gulí mé njéh, mè nyagá né ye te bí kɔgɔ́n seér mé njéh lòù; bɔ̀ huaán mò né bí, temé mò né gi yoòr bi`i.
46004015	Bí sé né mene mé bɔ̀ gàm bɔ̀ beè kám yulà mé né bí ceér Yeésò Kristò feh, tele bi`i sé né cegé ka cén, sâ gi aá. Dé ceér Yeésò Kristò feèh, tele bi`i sâ né mè. Lòù sam, mè lé bí Njàgà Bagaà se lɔgɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́.
46004016	Á sâ, mè né bí bɔŋ, bí bèlè lòm gule mò jéjég.
46004017	Mè bí Timotê huaán yíé-temê mò hên tema njií kuú né dé cî, à né nùà gècên te ceér Fehtoò beèh ndɔ, à nde cu né bí dene mò te ceér Yeésò Kristò feh ferré faá mè né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bèh dɔɔ́ŋ feh gɔ nɔ.
46004018	Bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i baá ké lètenè bi`i punó gɔ, ye mè ndeè bí yɔ̀ŋ kè ndé cú sé wa?
46004019	Môn sam, mè tueé bí, mɔ Càŋ né gwaán, toò hên mè baá cuù ké lètenè bi`i ndeê, te mè ŋene bɔ̀ hàm feh bɔ̀ sâ, kɔ ŋgweé seé bɔɔ̀n hèllè né-re mé terreb faá bɔ́ tueé né sâ wa?
46004020	Mè tueé bí, béh Lò Càŋ ŋene kɔ né mé seé, dèn ŋgwéh mé par sòn.
46004021	Bí ye naàn? Mɔ mè baá ké yoòr bi`i ndeê, mè wèh s`iè ŋgágá beè wa, mè ndê mé temé dɔlê, te bí ŋene kɔ ye mè né bí gwaán wa?
46005001	Mè né ŋgweé, bɔ́ ye gwárè baá ké lètenè bi`i teèn; ye gèh sár bú sâ, né mene bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ dùlà bèh, bɔ́ ménâ tóbó cá ŋgwéh: wa nuaré dé`i lètenè bi`i né veèh teleè weh sé wa?
46005002	Ye mé njéh mene, né seér cu beè bi`i njèh hàm feèh ma. Kɔ̀cɔ̀, bí sé lé yueé seér naâ mé njéh lòù. Bí kwɔ́gɔ́ sɔ̀m nùà hèllè te mɔ̀gɔ̀ bi`i.
46005003	Mè ju felè seèn tena gi aá, faá mè sé né lètenè bi`i nɔ. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, mè ké kwarè bi`i sam; mé njéh mene temé mò né ké yoòr bi`i.
46005004	Mè ju seèn mé yilí Yeésò Fehtoò beèh tena gi aá kèn. Mè né bí bɔŋ, bí bílí dèn bècénè, temé mò né ké lètenè bi`i, terreb Fehtoò beèh Yeésò né ké lètenè bi`i ndɔ.
46005005	Mɔ bí bilí gi aá, bí sɔ̀m kwá kéh nùà bú séná yí bèh Sátàn, te gèr weh bú seé, ŋgàŋ yoòr seèn ŋerré yuo. Te loù mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò ndeè cuù teèn, Càŋ yili sɔm ye yɔ̀ŋ seèn.
46005006	Bí té teèn mbaá púnó dèn. Mè tueé bí, kulu maànjé né yeé gùm tàgà dɔɔ́ŋ ter fulú komo njií.
46005007	Mɔ né mân, bí lùàgà sɔ̀m kulu veên sâ yoòr bi`i luagà, te bí den ŋagásé, bí den seér faá nyàb nɔ. Sâ mé gècên mene, bí né gi nyàb sâ ndɔ. Lòù sam, cieé koô beèh Páskà duɔɔ́m gi aá: Yeésò Kristò mbieè sèmè dé Páskà yili sɔm gi aá béh mé húɔ́m seèn.
46005008	Kènê, béh kɔ́ lòm á Páskà yieê; béh yieé lom nde aá breêd ciî, béh kulu faá léí toò nɔ kwá ndé cú. Béh té bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ dèn cú, béh sɔ̀m gí be te veéne. Né kulu sèlà nùàr.
46005009	Mè lé bí mvù dé`i nyagá tema kuú naâ, te mè tueé teèn ye bí a: bí bɔ̀ gwárè bɔ̀ té bècénè dèn bílí ma.
46005010	Mè lé dé sâ felè bɔ̀ lòù bɔ̀ túé ná ŋgwêh. Lòù sam, né bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀; sár gwaâ né bɔ́, temé te njèh nùàre kwaá njiî né bɔ́, yíb ŋuɔɔ̂b né bɔ́, cècàŋ duaà né bɔ́. Bí mé bɔ́ gè kòmò ndé ŋgwéh. Mɔ bí ye te bí geé mé bɔ́, sâ kɔ bí kwaá lɔ wɔ́ŋ, wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ né ŋgún kela.
46005011	Mè lé jue seér naâ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀. Mɔ nùàr ye nyí né nùà Yeésò, à né cu sár gwaá, à né temé te njèh bɔ̀ nùàr jɔgɔ́ kwaá, à né cècàŋ dua, à né nùàr selé, à né mbè sela gɔ, à né yíb ŋuɔɔ́b, sâ bí bɔ́ té bècénè dèn. Né mene yáb, bí bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ té mé ŋgàb cên yíé bílí ndɔ́g.
46005012	Dé bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ hèllè, mè ju felè bɔɔ̀n kɔɔ́ téná ndé ŋgwéh, Càŋ ju bɔɔ̀n tena nde né kɔɔ́. Dé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, bí téná bi`i ju felè bɔɔ̀n tenà. Te den faá né te mvù Càŋe nyagá kwaá nɔ, ye: «Bí kwɔ́gɔ́ sɔ̀m nùà veên lètenè bi`i kwɔgɔ̀.»
46006001	Mɔ nuaré dé`i né mbeí ju lè mɔ̀gɔ̀ bi`i bele, kei bɔɔ́ mé à toò bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ túé ŋgwéh, à nde seér mé njéh toò bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ kɔ́ bèh wa?
46006002	Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tena nde né ju felè wɔ̂ŋ kɔɔ́ wa? Mɔ ju felè wɔ̂ŋ tena nde né bí, sâ ju dé maàn lètenè bi`i tenâ né bí yɔgɔ́ wa?
46006003	Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye béh ju tena bilí nde né mé felè bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ mene wa? Mɔ béh ju tena nde né felè bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀, sé tagá bɔ̀ ju dene wɔ̂ŋ wa?
46006004	Mɔ né mân, mɔ ju dé`i die lètenè bi`i, bí toò bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ké cie njií yeé dé ke`i wa?
46006005	Fegùl`i bí mé njéh s`iè ŋgwéh wa? Hên lètenè bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ, nùà kɔ́gɔ̀n cén ka teèn yùò kélá ny`i ŋgwêh, te tena ju felè bɔ̀ mbaábɔɔ̀n wa?
46006006	Mè tueé bí: húɔ́m ŋgwéh mé bí sií kuú mé ju lètenè bi`i, bí yuo kela mé njéh ké cie toò bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Yeésò kɔ́ bèh, te bɔ́ nyegé seér bí mé njéh kɔɔ́.
46006007	Mè tueé bí, mé ju né lètenè bi`i lané den, tueé né ye, bí die gi aá kèn. Bí njèh lòù yóló sér bèh dé ke`i wa? Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bí yíb ŋuɔɔ́b, bí bɔ́ kwá lɔ́ bèh mé ŋgei wa?
46006008	Dé sâ né lom beè bi`i yɔgɔ́; bí dé yolô yóló bèh, bí bɔɔ́ gobó seér cu né dé gobô, bí né njèh bɔ̀ nùàr ŋuɔɔ́b, né mene lètenè bi`i, bí né ménâ bɔɔ́.
46006009	Mè né tueé ye bí a ye, bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ Lò Càŋ yílá ndé ŋgwéh. Bí té feh bi`i mbaá bèlè kú: bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né yàgà tobó gɔ o, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né cècàŋ dua o, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gwɔ̀m cum o, bɔ̀ siíb mé cer yeé bɔ̀ mbeí o,
46006010	bɔ̀ yíb bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ tuaá bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ sèlà mbè bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ sélé nùàr bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ yíb wúlá feèh bɔ̀ o, dɔɔ́ŋ Lò Càŋ yílá ndé ŋgwéh.
46006011	Bɔ̀ dé`i lé naâ lètenè bi`i ménâ. Mé njéh mene, Càŋ yaga sɔm aá bí veên sâ yoòr kèn, à sɔm kwaá bí hiín, te bí den bɔ̀ dé seèn, bí ŋa bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ beè Càŋ mé njua yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò bɔ̂ Cúcuí Càŋ.
46006012	Bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i lètenè bi`i ye bɔ́ né gi mé ceér njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ̂. Né gi môn dág; njèh cén, bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ húɔ́m gí ŋgwéh. Mɔ sam, mè sé lé naâ ménâ tueé ndɔ ye: mè nde né njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gií. Á sâ, né mene dé heè, mè teèn faá kwer nɔ ndáré lè ndé ŋgwéh wa?
46006013	Bí né cu yeé dé`i tueé ye: yáb né dé lè`i, lè`i né dé yâb. Né gi môn ndɔ; njèh cén, bí kɔ́ɔ ye Càŋ nde né bɔ́ fà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋerré sɔm gií. Dé yàgà yɔɔ̀ŋ, Càŋ yo beèh dé cî mé kwá ŋgwéh, à me kwaá seér né yo beèh dé Fehtoò beèh, te Fehtoò beèh gam yo beèh ndɔ.
46006014	Càŋ lé naâ Fehtoò beèh lè cio komo sɔm, à nde né béh lè cio mé terreb seèn ménâ komo sɔm ndɔ.
46006015	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, yo bi`i né gi bɔ̀ gà yoòr Yeésò Kristò. Á sâ, mè nde né gà dé`i yoòr Kristò weh, te mè bɔɔ́ yàgà mé njéh wa? Ndɔ́g, môn sam gùm dɔɔ́ŋ!
46006016	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, nuaá mé cer sɔrmbe dé`i, sâ bɔ́ bú fà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋa baá cén. Mvù Càŋ tueé né môn ndɔ, ye: bɔ́ fà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋa nde né nùà cén ma.
46006017	Dé nuaá mé né yoòr Fehtoò beèh teé ndeé, bɔ́ bú baá mé temé cên.
46006018	Sâ tueé lom né ye, bí dùlà sár gwaâ dulà. Bɔ̀ veên dé mé nùàr né jomo sâ bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi yo kèb cieè. Sár gwaâ né dé seèn veên mé nùàr bɔɔ́ njií seér né yoòr seèn nùà njèh.
46006019	Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye: yo bi`i né gwà Càŋ koô mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ den yeé teèn wa? Cúcuí sâ, Càŋ lé haá naâ bí kɔɔ́. Yo bi`i dé bi`i sam cuú, baá seér dé Càŋ.
46006020	Càŋ ŋge weh gi aá bí kèn, à lé bí ŋgeé naâ mé keh tarê. Mɔ né ménâ, bí s`iè nyégé lòm yo bi`i bagasé, te yilí Càŋ lie mé njéh.
46007001	Bí lé naâ mè bɔ̀ njèh nyagá bieé njií. Dé véh jɔgɔ̂, huɔm kela né mé nùàr véh jɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéh.
46007002	Á hên, yàgà yɔɔ̀ŋ seèn né-re teèn ndɔ. Sâ mɔ né ménâ, nùà kàn a, jɔ́gɔ́ véh, jɔ́gɔ́ siíb ndɔ.
46007003	Lètenè bɔɔ̀n, dé`i a, té mbeí mé ŋgɔ̀gɔ̀ bèlè sér.
46007004	Ma vêh a, té mé yo seèn faá à gwaán keéh nê nɔ bɔ́, yo seèn né dé si seèn. Né cu mé huaán siîb môn ndɔ: à té mé yo seèn faá à gwaán keéh nê nɔ bɔ́, yo seèn né dé veèh seèn.
46007005	Sâ si bɔ̂ veèh a, té mé yo bɔɔ̀n nómó kú. Merré dé`i, kɔ né cu tou joloò mé bí né Càŋ teèn dua, sâ ye. Jomo sâ bí weh cu dene bi`i cuûm. Mɔ sam, bí yóló kòmò ndé ŋgwéh; bí sé yeé yóló kòmò cú, Sátàn yií keéh be teèn.
46007006	Mè bí lòù tágá ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mè leéb né bí lòù.
46007007	Mɔ ye te huɔm, nùà kàn sé la naâ faá mè nɔ den. Á hên, nùà kàn seèn yoòr né mé seé seèn hiín faá Càŋ haá né bú nɔ; mɔ seé dé hên sam, sâ né dé yíê. Dé sâ, kɔ né beè Càŋ.
