46007008	Mè hên tueé njií né mé bɔ̀ kòù bɔ̀, bɔ́ bɔ̀ ma kû, ye bɔ́ a: huɔm kela né mé huún faá mè nɔ deèn.
46007009	Á, mɔ bɔ́ ke, bɔ́ yóló kòmò ndé ŋgwéh, sâ bɔ́ jéjɔgɔ̀ ndɔ: huɔm kela né dé jɔgɔ̂ mé bɔ́gɔ́-temé.
46007010	Mè hên tueé njií né mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé jɔgɔ baá véh mé siíb kèn; mè mé feh mò túé ŋgwéh, Fehtoò beèh tueé né kɔɔ́, ye ma vêh a, té gwà siîb yùò.
46007011	Á, mɔ à yuo, sâ bú a, te siíb dé`i jɔ́gɔ́ cú. Mɔ né naàn wa, bɔ̂ si túé kúlú cú lòù, te à cu cu gwò si`i. Huaán siîb a, té veèh sɔ̀m ndɔ.
46007012	Kènê baá dé bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀, mè tueé né dé hên kɔɔ́, Fehtoò beèh sam, mè ye bɔ́ a: mɔ nùà Yeésò dé`i né mé véh gwò, mé ma sâ dé seèn ceér Yeésò bèlè bèh, mɔ ma sâ gwaán lom né dene siîb, sâ bú a, té ma sâ sɔ̀m.
46007013	Né cu ménâ ndɔ, mɔ ma Yeésò dé`i jɔgɔ kwa siíb mé dé seèn Yeésò dùà bèh, à gwaán lom né dene ma gwà, sâ ma doô a, té bú ŋgɔ́n ndɔ.
46007014	Mè tueé bí, Càŋ nde né huaán siîb mé Càŋ dùà bèh doô kulú, à kulu keéh nde né bú felè veèh seèn mé né yeé Càŋ dua doô. Càŋ nde né ma mé Càŋ dùà bèh doô felè si`i mé né yeé Càŋ dua doô kulú keéh ndɔ. Mɔ sam, bɔ̀ huaán bɔɔ̀n nde né faá ŋunà bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ̂ nɔ den. Á sâ, bɔ́ né gi bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ ndɔ.
46007015	Mɔ kènê dé mé Càŋ dùà bèh ŋgɔn mbeí, ye nyí nde aá, sâ bɔ́ kwá lɔ́ bú, à nde. Mɔ à yuo aá, dé mé né yeé Càŋ dua doô, la né mene si, né mene veèh, sâ à baá mé feh seèn. Dé Càŋ, à gwaán lom né dɔlê, à bí yilá bilí naâ dé cî.
46007016	Wò ma dùà-Càŋ, wò né ka jéjég kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye nyí nde né si nyî yili sɔm wa? Wò si mé né Càŋ dua, wò kɔ nyegé nde né jéjég mé ŋgei, ye nyí nde né veèh nyî yili sɔm ndɔ wa?
46007017	Mé njéh mene, nùà kàn a, njébá táré lòm te dene seèn nùà njèh mé Càŋ lé haá naâ bú tég. Càŋ lé bú yilá naâ, sâ à baá gi teèn. Hên né njií mé mè né te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ tagá bele.
46007018	Mɔ Càŋ lé yilá naâ nuaré dé`i, sâ bɔ́ ŋɔb gi aá bú ŋgór, bú a, té mbaá lèr kú cú. Mɔ Càŋ lé yilá naâ nuaré dé`i, sâ bɔ́ née bú ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéeh ye, bú a, té ŋgór mbaá ŋɔ́b kú cú ndɔ.
46007019	Bɔ́ ŋɔb mene wò ŋgór, bɔ́ mene ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh, fà dɔɔ́ŋ njeré dé`i gàm ŋgwéh; njèh gàm né cegé sóú Càŋ joloò.
46007020	Nùà kàn a, dèn lè ká te dene seèn mé à lé naâ teèn te Càŋ yilá ye bú doô.
46007021	Càŋ lé yilá naâ wò, sâ wò né kwer wa? Té nyàmè. Mé njéh mene, mɔ ceér dé`i né toò yeè teèn ŋené te wò den mé feh yeè, sâ léí be fà!
46007022	Mɔ wò né mene kwer, kɔ́ɔ ye kwer dé mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò né bú yilá, baá dé seèn mé feh seèn beè Fehtoò beèh. Dé nuaá mé Yeésò Kristò lé yilá naâ bú, sâ à né mé feh seèn, baá dé seèn kwer Kristò.
46007023	Càŋ ŋge weh gi aá bí mé keh tarê kèn, bí té kwer nuaré dé`i mbaá ŋá kú.
46007024	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò: nùà kàn a, dèn lè ká toò Càŋ te gèh denè seèn mé à lé naá kaà teèn, te Càŋ yilá ye bú doô.
46007025	Kènê mè tueé nde aá bí felè bɔ̀ kòù bɔ̀. Dé sâ ndéb Fehtoò beèh sam, mè tueé né kɔɔ́; mè né nùà gècên, mè nùà gècên ŋa né mé njua Fehtoò beèh.
46007026	Mè tétég jue né felè cu mé baá kènê taré hên, ye bí a: huɔm kela né mé nùàr den le te dene seèn.
46007027	Wò né mé véh wa? Sâ té ceér mé bí bú geé nde né teèn fɔ́n. Wò née véh jɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéeh ye wa? Sâ té véh fɔ́n.
46007028	Mè né mene mân tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ wò jɔgɔ véh, wò veên bɔ́ ŋgwéh; mɔ mbò yàgà dé`i jɔgɔ siíb, à veên bɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ. Njèh cén, mɔ bí né jɔgɔ́ kuú, bí kékɔɔ̀ ye, bí nde né mé gèr lè dene bi`i cafanê kwaré. Mè bí hên tueé kuú né dé cî, te gam bí.
46007029	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè ye bí a, cu nde aá wulú. Kènê bɔ̀ véh bɔ̀ a, dèn lòm faá bɔ́ mé véh sam nɔ;
46007030	bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né yueé a, dèn lòm faá temé bɔ́ yúlá ŋgwéh nɔ; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ja wa, faá temé bɔ́ lè vɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né njèh ŋge, faá bɔ́ mé njéh beè sam nɔ;
46007031	bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ̀ njèh wɔ̂ŋ né bɔ́ gam, faá bɔ̀ njií sâ bɔ́ njeré dé`i gàm ŋgwéh nɔ. Lòù sam, gèh wɔ́ŋ bú hên ŋgágá ndé cú.
46007032	Mè gwaán né ye te bí njeré dé`i mùnò gɔ̀ cú. Nuaá mé née véh jɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéeh ye dé seèn faga lom né feh mé seé Fehtoò beèh tég, ye te huɔm Fehtoò beèh yoòr.
46007033	Nuaá mé jɔgɔ aá véh, dé seèn faga seér né feh mé bɔ̀ njèh wɔ̂ŋ, te huɔm veèh yoòr.
46007034	Yeé baá môn, geé yií baá-re bú seé bèh fà. Mé bɔ̀ véh né gi ménâ ndɔ; né mene ma kòù, né mene huaán vêh, à nde né feh te seé Fehtoò beèh fagá nyegé, ye te nyí den nde lom yí ka seèn mé gùm mene. Dé mé jɔgɔ baá dé seèn siíb, faga seér nde né feh mé bɔ̀ njèh wɔ̂ŋ, te huɔm si yoòr ndɔ.
46007035	Mè hên tueé kuú né ye te gam seér bí lòù, mè bí dé baâ bá ŋgwéh, mè gwaán né ye te bí gɔ dilí nyegé, bí den mban nde yoòr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò mé seé seèn beè tég.
46007036	Kènê baá dé bɔ̀ ndà mé baá véh gɔ: mɔ huaán ndà bɔ̂ gwɔ̀m seèn kaga ndòn, ye bɔ́ jɔ́gɔ́ ndé cú, nde nde si munó cu, ye mɔ né môn, sâ nyí bɔɔ́ né gwɔ̀m doô veên, temé bú lè d`iè cú, à yóló kɔ́ cú ndɔ, mɔ à munó cu aá ye nyí nde cu né bú jɔgɔ́, sâ bú a, jɔ́gɔ́ bú jɔgɔ̀; dé sâ veên sam.
46007037	Á, mɔ huaán ndà doô kaga lom né kàgà-ndòn seèn, nuaré dé`i sòn teèn kɔɔ́ yí ŋgwéh, ye nyí ka huaán vêh doô jɔ́gɔ́ cú, à né ka ménâ yoló ndɔ, sâ à bɔɔ́ né bagaà mé à huaán vêh doô jɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéh.
46007038	Sâ mɔ né ménâ, nuaá mé sua kwaá né huaán vêh gwò, bɔɔ́ né bagaà; nuaá mé véh jɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéh bɔɔ́ huɔm kela né kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
46007039	Ma vêh mé bɔ́ jɔgɔ kwaá baá gwò, mɔ si née mé njolo ye, à mé feh seèn sam. Kɔ si kuú né lòù, sâ ma sâ baá ye mé feh seèn, à gwaán né mene siíb dé kàn, à jɔgɔ mé be seèn. Njèh cén, kɔ né siíb mé né ceér Yeésò Kristò bele ndɔ.
46007040	Dé mò, mɔ ma sâ ye nyí nde né mé huún den, yoòr huɔm kela nde né bú cí. Mè lòù túé ŋgwéh; mè ká yoòr né mé Cúcuí Càŋ.
46008001	Kènê mè tueé nde aá felè njeba mé bɔ́ semé naâ te gènnè. Bí tueé né gècên, ye béh né gi bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀. Njèh cén, kɔ́gɔ̀n sâ sela seér cu né nùàr lòù, né bú hàm feh haá. Á sâ, njií mé gam nde né béh te ceér Càŋe né lom gwaân ndɔ.
46008002	Mè tueé bí, nuaá mé né punó gɔ, wa nyí né njeré dé`i kɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, tueé seér né ye, nyí njií sâ kɔ́ ŋgwéh. Mɔ sam, kɔ à kɔ faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ, sâ ye.
46008003	Nuaá mé dé seèn gwaán seér né Càŋ, Càŋ ye, nùàr nyî né bú.
46008004	Mɔ né ménâ, sâ béh yíé núɔ́gɔ́ sèmè mé yuoó naâ te gènnè yieè wa? Mé béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye cècàŋ né njèh mbaâ, à mé yɔ̀ŋ sam doô. Ŋgweéh béh né gi kɔɔ́ ndɔ ye, nùà yɔ̀ŋ né lom Càŋ Dueè wa?
46008005	Mɔ bɔ̀ càŋ né mene ké ter ka vulúu ŋgún, bɔ́ né mene ká doó ŋgún mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ŋgún ndɔ,
46008006	mé njéh mene béh né gi dé beèh kɔɔ́, ye Càŋ terrèb né lom cén mé huún, Tele beèh né cegé bú mé njèh dɔɔ́ŋ yuo gi`i beè seèn; béh hên den lom né dene seèn. Béh né cegé ka mé Fehtoò beèh cén-tà-cén ndɔ: né Yeésò Kristò. Njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn, béh yɔ̀ŋ kwa né mé bú.
46008007	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ nùàr gècên sâ dɔɔ́ŋ kɔ́ làrè ŋgwéh. Beè bɔɔ̀n den né faá cècàŋ hèllè née den ka mé terreb ye nɔ. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé meh seér naâ mé bɔ̀ càŋ gènnè. Bɔ́ te ceér Yeésò táré kòmò ŋgwéh. Yeé baá ménâ, mɔ bɔ́ baá núɔ́gɔ́ sèmè hèllè yieé, temé bɔɔ̀n lè d`iè cú ndɔ.
46008008	Mè tueé bí, yáb béh ké kwarè Càŋ kɔɔ́ njí ndé ŋgwéh; béh yieé mene yáb hèllè, béh mene yíé ŋgwéh, dɔɔ́ŋ ju sam, njèh gàm dé`i sam.
46008009	Mɔ né ménâ, sâ bí kè nyégé-re bagasé, wanɔɔ́ŋ bí sé dé bi`i yieé njií né mbaá, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé te ceér Càŋe táré ŋgwéh yeé ŋene ménâ, bɔ́ sue yila keéh te veéne teèn.
46008010	Lòù sam, mɔ nùà yuaâ ŋene njií wò yí te mɔ̀ mé yáb hèllè sònò, wò nùà kɔ́-gècên jɔ̀gɔ̀, sâ wò bú teèn mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene lú njí ŋgwéh wa?
46008011	Ŋgweéh sâ nùà yuaâ doô nde né dé seèn mé kɔ́gɔ̀n yeè hèllè leér le mà. Njèh cén, kékɔɔ̀ ye né nuaá mé Yeésò Kristò lé naâ felè seèn kuú ma.
46008012	Mɔ bí veên felè bɔ̀ mbeí bi`i sela weh né faá bèh mân, bí né bɔ́ temé lè bɔɔ́ yuaá, sâ bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bí veên sâ bɔɔ́ njií né mé Yeésò Kristò nùà njèh.
46008013	Kènê mɔ mbeí mò te veên hên die yila nde né felè yâb, sâ bɔɔ́ mene naàn, mè yáb hèllè sònò nágá kéh ndé cú, te mbeí mò teèn mbaá d`iè kéh cú.
46009001	Mè mé feh mò sam wa? Mè mbɔ̀ŋ tebê sam ndɔ wa? Mè lé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò mé njolo ŋéné ná ŋgwêh wa? Te seê Fehtoò beèh, bí bɔ̀ tàb seê mò sam wa?
46009002	Mɔ bɔ̀ dé`i la mene ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye mè né mbɔ̀ŋ tebê, bí sé la né mè dé bi`i ŋené kɔɔ́. Lòù sam, bí lé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ŋa gi`i naâ mé mè; hên né njií mé tueé né ye, mè né mbɔ̀ŋ tebê sâ.
46009003	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né mè jueé, mè feh mò toò bɔɔ̀n cií tena né faá bèh mân, ye bɔ́ a:
46009004	hên, mè mé ceér yâb bɔ̂ njèh ŋueê te seé mò hên sam wa?
46009005	Mɔ mè sé né faá bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dé`i nɔ bɔɔ́, mè weh sie véh mé né te ceér Yeésò jomo, faá bɔ̀ d`im Fehtoò beèh mé Piêr né yeé weh sie nɔ, mè sé mé ceér dé sâ ná ŋgwêh wa?
46009006	Wa dé bêh Bàrnàbâs bɔɔ́ lom nde né seé kɔɔ́, te béh nde ye yáb teèn kwa wa?
46009007	Bí lɔ ŋgweé naâ he, ye mɔ sɔ́j`i baá taáb lieé, à yieé seér kàgàlɔ̀ŋ dé beè seèn wa? Wa dé bí ŋgwé bèh ye, bɔ́ né tàb toû mé bɔ́ dobo kwaá né ké ŋueh kagá yieé wa? Bí ŋgwé bèh ye, tèŋ mbán kam ŋueé yeé te bɔ̀ŋ nàgà sâ wa?
46009008	Bí té mùnò ye, mè tueé né mé kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ nùàr; sam, sóú Mús`i né ménâ tueé ndɔ.
46009009	Lè mvù Mús`i sâ bɔ́ sou nyagá kwaá né ter ye: nàgà mé né yolo dobo, té bú kagá sònò yí kwá. Sâ njeré dé`i né Càŋ mé nàgà yulá wa?
46009010	Ŋgweéh mé gècên mene, Càŋ hên tueé njií né mé béh mà. Mé gècên mene, bɔ́ ŋgòr jéjég nyagá njií né mé béh. Né mene nùà boór kieê, né mene nùà yolo loboò, bɔ́ a, kwá ndèm ye gà yâb dé bɔɔ̀n né gi teèn ma.
46009011	Mé béh, né cu ménâ ndɔ: béh lè bi`i dobo kwaá gi aá gèh Cúcuí Ŋagâ kèn. Mɔ béh sé la né mene njèh wɔ̂ŋ beè bi`i weh, sé la né njèh veên wa?
46009012	Bɔ̀ dé`i né ménâ bɔɔ́ komo, sé tagá béh wa? Mé njéh mene, béh ceér bú sâ cór kèmà ŋgwéh, béh né seér lòù yoló, te béh bɔ̀ nùàr ceér yín cú, te bɔ́ ŋgweé nyegé Njàgà Bagaà felè Kristò.
46009013	Bí né gi kɔɔ́, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né seé ké gwà Càŋ koô bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, yieé yeé beè gwà Càŋ koô sâ; ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé haá yeé sèmè ké te kɔ, gà sèmè dé bɔɔ̀n yuo yeé teèn sâ ndɔ.
46009014	Fehtoò beèh tueé né ménâ ndɔ, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né Njàgà Bagaà se a, yáb bɔɔ̀n yuo ndeè né teèn ma.
46009015	Mé njéh mene, mè dé mò ceér sâ cór kèmà bèh, mè nyàgà njí ŋgwéh ye bí a, témá njî mè njeré dé`i ndɔ. Kwá mè kuú mò! Dé mò, nuaré dé`i mè ŋgòr sàgàr yoò hên beè lùàgà sɔ̀m ndé cú.
46009016	Mè dé Njàgà Bagaà tueê púnó ŋgwéh, ba né mè lòù. Mè berɔ́ŋ, mè gwaán mene, né seé mò. Càŋ a bɔ́ mè sé ke Njàgà Bagaà sè ye, te mè ŋene gèr.
46009017	Mɔ mè sé lé gwaán weéh naâ seé hên kɔɔ́, mè sé né dàgà kela. Á seèn môn sam, mè lé seé hên mé be mò kè wèh ná ŋgwêh, Càŋ nùà njèh lé mè beè jege haá naâ kɔɔ́, ye mè a, né seé mò.
46009018	Á sâ, sàgà mò né kei ndɔ? Mè tueé bí, sàgà mò né seér mân: mè Njàgà Bagaà se né dé lòù, vɔ́gɔ́-temé mò né cí, mè njeré dé`i teèn faá mè sé la bieè naâ nɔ, bíé ŋgwéh.
46009019	Mè né mé feh mò, mè kwer nuaré dé`i sam. Mé njéh mene, mè né kwer nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ; mè gwaán né ménâ mé be mò, sâ te mè kum kwa ye nùàr ŋgún.
46009020	Mɔ mè baá seé lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf bɔɔ́, kɔ mè den seér faá nùà Jûf, te mè kum kwa ye bɔ́. Mè la mene ka sóú Mús`i sam, kɔ mè den lom faá mè né gi ka sóú sâ nɔ, te mè kum kwa ye bɔ́.
46009021	Né cu môn mé bɔ̀ dé`i ndɔ: mɔ mè baá lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé sóú Mús`i kɔ́ ŋgwéh, kɔ mè den cu faá bɔ́ ndɔ: mè den faá mè sóú Mús`i kɔ́ ŋgwéh nɔ, te mè kum kwa ye bɔ́. Dé hên túé ŋgwéh ye, mè sóú Càŋ jòlò ŋgwéh; môn sam gùm dɔɔ́ŋ, mè né sóú Càŋ jolo; ŋgweéh mè né beè Yeésò Kristò mà!
46009022	Mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né yuaá, né cu ka ménâ ndɔ, mè ké lètenè bɔɔ̀n den nde né yuaásé faá bɔ́ nɔ, te mè kum kwa ye bɔ́. Mè dɔɔ́ŋ mé bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ mân bɔɔ́ gi né, te mè kwɔmé njií bɔ̀ dé`i teèn yoòr Yeésò, te à yili sɔm bɔ́.
46009023	Sâ mè dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ kuú né felè Njàgà Bagaà, ye te mè kwa gà dé mò teèn ndɔ.
46009024	Bí né gi kɔɔ́, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé dula yeé doò dɔɔ́ŋ, doò kem yuo yeé lòù. Mé njéh mene, nuaá mé dula kela né kɔɔ́, yieé lom né sàgà kɔɔ́. Sâ bí sɔ̀m doò, bí dùlà lòm dé kɔɔ́ yieé weèh.
46009025	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né doò dula dɔɔ́ŋ né yeé doò maán, te bɔ́ memeèh. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ gi né te loù sâ bɔ́ tena feh, bɔ́ kwa ye tàm ŋgɔ̂g. Á sâ, tàm ŋgɔ̂g hèllè nde cu né mbaá ŋerré le ndɔ. Dé beèh môn sam, béh bɔɔ́ né dé beèh ménâ, te béh ndeè tàm ŋgɔ̂g kwa seér dé kè`i cên.
46009026	Mè dé mò doò mé njolo ké teèn hên tɔb lom né dé cî. Mè dèn ŋgwéh faá nuaá mé fi njií né kwàr mbaá.
46009027	Mè nuaá mé tueé yeé ŋgòr Càŋ kɔɔ́, mè yo mò tétán lobó meh né, ye te mè lòù d`iè sér cú.
46010001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè ye te bí munó kɔ cu dé mé lé naâ felè bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ́. Bɔ́ lé naâ jomo Mús`i gɔ. Càŋ lé naâ bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ jomo bègè cií kwaá; bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lé naá gi`i nòmò koô sela.
46010002	Sâ tueé né ye, bègè bɔ̂ nòmò sâ lé naâ bɔ́ nòmò Càŋ kou gií, te bɔ́ bilí den yoòr Mús`i.
46010003	Yáb mé lé suagaà naâ ké ter beè Càŋ, bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lé naá gi`i yieé,
46010004	bɔ́ ŋueé gi nòmò mé lé yuoô beè Càŋ ndɔ. Ŋgweéh bɔ́ lé sâ ŋueé naâ nòmò kweéh jeleè mé né bɔ́ ke nyegé wa? Kweéh sâ lé naâ Kristò.
46010005	Mé njéh mene, bɔ́ gàm Càŋ sâ ŋgwé kòmò ŋgwéh, nùàr kókoó mbaá lètenè bɔɔ̀n lé naâ Càŋ temé lè bɔɔ́ yulá; bɔ́ lé ké ya dueè kuú sue leé naâ dé cî.
46010006	Bɔ̀ njèh kèkènè sâ né béh njèh teèn feh den, te béh mé kàgà-ndòn veên lè faá bɔ́ nɔ dèn dèn cú.
46010007	Bɔ̀ dé`i lètenè bɔɔ̀n lé naâ cècàŋ dua. Bí té faá bɔ́ nɔ dèn. Né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: C`il`i nùàr né doó den ndeé nyegé, bɔ́ né yáb gènnè yieé, bɔ́ né mbè ŋueé; jomo sâ, bɔ́ kem wuo ter, bɔ́ yila wɔ́ŋ ŋgɔɔ̀.
46010008	Mé sár gwaâ né ménâ ndɔ. Béh té sár faá bɔ̀ dé`i lé gwaá naâ lètenè bɔɔ̀n nɔ gwá. Bɔ́ lé naâ sár ménâ gwaá, nùàr kám ndètoón cùɔ̀b tagár kuú gi mé cieé cên.
46010009	Béh té Nùà Dueè sòn félá; bɔ̀ dé`i lé naâ bú sòn lètenè bɔɔ̀n felá, sàb gwaré wula gi bɔ́ ndɔ.
46010010	Bí té Càŋ júé; bɔ̀ dé`i lé naâ Càŋ lètenè bɔɔ̀n jueé, c`il`i Càŋ mé wula yeé nùàr waà, wula gi bɔ́.
46010011	Bɔ̀ gèr hên bɔ́ kwa gi né, te feh bɔ́ njèh teèn. Bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né bɔ́ ter, te bɔ́ tueé kwaá béh ndɔ. Lòù sam, béh dé beèh baá bèh mé wɔ́ŋ nde aá gií.
46010012	Sâ nuaá mé munó né ter njebá dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, kè nyégé bagasé, mɔ sam à nde né komo die.
46010013	Bɔ̀ njií mé né bí jilí dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi njèh cên mé né bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ jilí. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ né Càŋ húɔ́m-temê felè beèh faá à lé tueé kwaá naâ béh nɔ. Sâ bɔ́ jilí mene bí naàn, à gwàn ndé ŋgwéh ye bɔ́ a: táré yɔ́gɔ́ bí. Njeré dé`i né mene bí jilí, à nde né bí terreb haá, te bí yolo komo, bí mvelé yuo teèn.
46010014	Sâ mɔ né mân, bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bí dùlà cècàŋ duaà dulà.
46010015	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, bí né bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀, mè tueé njií né mé bí, bí kè nyégé bɔ̀ njií hên mé be bi`i.
46010016	Cu mé béh baá yáb Càŋ yieé, béh né bú felè ŋgàb mbè vra, bí kɔ́ nyégé bagasé ye, sâ béh bɔ̀ húɔ́m Yeésò Kristò hualé bilí né kɔɔ́. Né faá bèh ménâ mé breêd ndɔ. Ŋgweéh breêd mé béh kɔlé yieé yeé doô, sâ béh bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ yoòr Yeésò Kristò hualé bilí né kɔɔ́ wa?
46010017	Breêd né lom yeé cén tà cén; béh kɔlé dɔɔ́ŋ. Béh né mene kókoó, béh me yuo lom né ŋgàŋ yoòr cén faá breêd cén mé béh bilí gi yeé teèn doô.
46010018	Bí kè njí ke bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà: Ŋgweéh bɔ́ nyam sèmè ŋɔbé yieé né ké toò Càŋ mà. Ŋgweéh ké te kɔ, bɔ́ bɔ̀ Càŋ bilí né kɔɔ́ wa?
46010019	Kènê te mè tueé-re ye cècàŋ mé nyam sèmè né mé terreb faá bèh ménâ teèn wa?
46010020	Ndɔ́g, mè tueé seér né dé mò ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né cècàŋ gɔ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ nyam sèmè sâ ŋɔbé haá yeé mé bɔ̀ tándulu, dèn ŋgwéh mé Càŋ Dueè. Mè tueé bí, bí té gwàn mé bí bɔ̀ tándulu den bilí bècénè.
46010021	Bí mbè dé tándulù bɔ̂ dé Càŋ Dueè fà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋúé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh; bí yáb tándulù mé yáb dé Càŋ Dueè fà dɔɔ́ŋ yíé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
46010022	Mɔ béh né ménâ bɔɔ́, temé nde né Càŋ mé béh ŋaâ. Bí né munó ye, béh taré kela né kɔɔ́ mé Càŋ wa?
46010023	Bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i lètenè bi`i ye, bɔ́ né gi mé ceér njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ̂. Nyea, né gi môn dág. Njèh cén, bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ húɔ́m gí ŋgwéh. Béh né gi mé ceér njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ̂ dág. Njèh cén, bɔ́ béh te ceér Càŋe dɔɔ́ŋ gàm làrè ndé ŋgwéh.
46010024	Nùà kàn a, té njèh dé seèn nùà njèh fɔ́n; bú a, fɔ́n sér dé bɔ̀ mbaábɔɔ̀n.
46010025	Bí nde né núɔ́gɔ́ ké tan ŋge yieé wa? Ceér né teèn, bí té k`inè.
46010026	Né gi te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den ndɔ, ye: Tàbè mé bɔ̀ njií teèn dɔɔ́ŋ né gi dé Càŋ Dueè.
46010027	Mɔ nuaá mé Càŋ kɔ́ ŋgwéh né wò bèh yâb yilá njií, mɔ wò baá ké teèn, njií mé bɔ́ geé kwaá né toò yeè dɔɔ́ŋ, kɔ́ lòm mbaá yieé njiî, té k`inè.
46010028	Njèh cén, mɔ nuaré dé`i den teèn, ye wò a: Núɔ́gɔ́ hên né núɔ́gɔ́ cècàŋ, sâ té sònò nágá kéh cú. Mɔ sam, nùà hèllè nde né yieé, nde né bú seé weh.
46010029	Mè hên tueé den né felè nùà hèllè mé nde né lòù nyamé den sâ, mè dé yeè mùnò ŋgwéh. Á sâ, nùà kàn nde né bieé ye: Naàn mé bɔ́ ye nyí a, té njií mé né te ceér-e yíé; mɔ sam, nde né mbeí nyî ki ma?
46010030	Á, mɔ nyí né dé nyî Càŋ te yáb hèllè vra nɔ, bɔ́ nyí teèn jue cu né dé ke`i wa?
46010031	Mè tueé lom né ye bí a: bí né mene yieé, bí ŋueé mene lòù, bí né mene kei bɔɔ́, bí bɔ́ gí njií mé yilí Càŋ nde né mé njéh lieé.
46010032	Bí té gwàn mé bɔ̀ Jûf ceén gule, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam be lɔ gule, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ be lɔ gule ndɔ, ye sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né mé mbòntí mbònt`i bi`i.
46010033	Bí bɔ́ sér faá mè nɔ: mè lege lom né te mè huɔm laré beè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ, te njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ; mè dé mé gam nde né mè nùà njèh fɔ́n ŋgwéh, mè lege né dé nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ, te bɔ́ yili yuo.
46011001	Mɔ né mân, bí kè wèh beè mò faá mè ke weh né beè Yeésò Kristò ndɔ nɔ.
46011002	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè vra baá bí, bí né gi mè te njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ munó den, bí né tabɔ́ ŋgweé, bí bɔɔ́ faá mè lé naâ bí tueé keéh nɔ.
46011003	Mè ye te bí kɔ cu dé hên: bí kɔ́ɔ ye, felè bɔ̀ siîb dɔɔ́ŋ né Yeésò Kristò; felè ma vêh né huaán siîb; felè Yeésò Kristò né Càŋ ma.
46011004	Sâ mɔ né mân, huaán siîb mé né Càŋ mé tàm felè dua, wa né sòn-Càŋ mé tàm felè tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, né Fehtoò seèn Yeésò Kristò seb.
46011005	Dé ma vêh, cu mé à né Càŋ dua, wa né sòn-Càŋ tueé wa, mɔ à seér cɔ̀gɔ̀ felè kàgà kwá ŋgwéh, sâ à seb né si seèn mé né felè seèn ndɔ. Mɔ né mân, sâ à né faá ma mé bele né feh lòù nɔ.
46011006	Mɔ ma vêh cɔ̀gɔ̀ felè kàgà kwá ŋgwéh, sâ bú a, dèn kɔ́ mé feh kóbò! Á sâ, feh kóbò hèllè mé feh hobô nde né ma vêh sie ndɔ wa? Njèh fegùl`i sam wa? Sâ, bú a, kàgà kwá lòm cɔ̀gɔ̀ felè nɔɔ́ŋ.
46011007	Dé huaán siîb, mɔ à nde aá Càŋ dua, bú a, té tàm felè súlí kwá. Lòù sam, à dé seèn felá né Càŋ; yoòr seèn ŋené yuo kelà né terreb Càŋ. Dé ma vêh, dé seèn feh keéh lom né terreb dé si`i.
46011008	Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé huaán siîb yoòr ma vêh mé sɔ̀m ná ŋgwêh, bɔ́ lé ma vêh me sɔm seér naâ yoòr huaán siîb.
46011009	Càŋ lé huaán siîb felè ma vêh mé ná ŋgwêh, à lé me seér naâ ma vêh felè huaán siîb.
46011010	Ma vêh cɔ̀gɔ̀ felè kaga kwaá nde né dé cî, te à feh keéh ye, nyí né ka si ma, wanɔɔ́ŋ sâ bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ nde né ŋaáŋ.
46011011	Mè né mene mân tueé, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, beè beèh bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, ma vêh mé feh seèn dèn ŋgwéh, huaán siîb mé feh seèn sam ndɔ.
46011012	Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé ma vêh me sɔɔ́m naâ yoòr huaán siîb. Bɔ́ yeé me gi aá bú, à nde ye bɔ̀ siíb dé`i ŋar keéh. Bí té nyèn ye, dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ bɔɔ́ gi`i naâ kɔɔ́ ma.
46011013	Bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ ke ke mé be bi`i ye: mɔ ma vêh né Càŋ mé feh lòù dua, né huɔɔ́m wa?
46011014	Bɔ̀ nùàr né gi bèh dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye mɔ huaán siîb den dé seèn mé feh tù, wa né njèh fegùl`i.
46011015	Feh tù né seér njèh bɔ̀ vêh, ma vêh lie huɔm seér né dé seèn mé njéh lòù. Càŋ bú yúlí feèh dèdàbè ménâ haá né kɔɔ́, te cií nyegé bú feh.
46011016	Mɔ nuaré dé`i né njeré dé`i te ŋgòr hên saán, bú a, kɔ́ cégé mân, ye né mene béh, né mene bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé kàn, béh mé tòù dé`i toò lè mɔ̀gɔ̀ beèh sam cuú ma.
46011017	Mè nde né bí njeré dé`i tueé, mè bí teèn vrà ndé ŋgwéh. Ŋgòr sâ né mân: ye mɔ bí baá lè mɔ̀gɔ̀ bi`i, bí teèn bɔɔ́ kela seér né veên mé bagaà sé wa?
46011018	Dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ́ ye, mɔ bí baá bècénè Càŋ dua wa, bí den né kekɔbé ma. Merré dé`i né bɔ̀n.
46011019	Kɔ né ménâ ndɔ, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ ye bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ lètenè bi`i teèn.
46011020	Mé njéh mene, cu mé bí bilí yeé dé yáb Càŋ yieê, bí te ceér Càŋ bɔ́ yí bèh;
46011021	wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ ye, mé bí nde yeé yáb kaáŋ gií, sâ nùà kàn baá seér mé yáb seèn beè, à né mé njéh sela den, sâ bɔ̀ mbeí kwarè seèn né mé cùè kuú.
46011022	Mɔ né ménâ, bí ké gwò bi`i yíé bèh, bí ŋueé den teèn wa? Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye bí sâ seb den né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ wa? Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ, ye bí bɔɔ́ gulí né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé yáb beè sam wa? Kɔ̀cɔ̀, bí ye, júée bí a naàn? Bí ye, kéí bí mé njéh lòù wa? Mè teèn sam, mè tueé bí, mè bí dé sâ kéí ny`i ndé ŋgwéh.
46011023	Bɔ̀ njií mé mè lé ŋgweé naâ sònò Fehtoò beèh Yeésò, mè lé bí feéh naâ cí. Lè cibî mé bɔ́ lé ndeè naâ Fehtoò beèh teèn sar, à lé naâ breêd weh,
46011024	à vra Càŋ teèn, à kɔlé, ye: Hên né ŋgàŋ yoòr nyî; nyí haá kuú né felè bi`i. Bí bɔ́ dèn ménâ, bí né nyí teèn munó ma.
46011025	À bɔɔ́ cu mé ŋgàb mbè ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé yieé gi aá, à jɔgɔ weh ŋgàb doô, ye: Mbè hên né ŋgɔ̀ŋ feê mé Càŋ kɔ né mé húɔ́m nyî; wa cu dɔɔ́ŋ mɔ bí baá ŋueé, bí bɔ́ bèh mân, bí né nyí teèn munó den ma.
46011026	Mɔ né mân, sâ yuoô hên nde wa loù mé Fehtoò beèh cu ndeè né teèn, cu dɔɔ́ŋ mɔ bí baá breêd mân yieé, bí né mân ŋueé, sâ bí teèn tueé keéh né cio seèn.
46011027	Mɔ né ménâ, sâ nuaá mé né breêd Fehtoò beèh mé yílí temé mene yieé, né mbè seèn mé yílí temé mene ŋueé dɔɔ́ŋ, né ŋgàŋ yoòr mé húɔ́m Fehtoò beèh seb. Sâ bú a, kɔ́ɔ ye nyí né mé ju felè ndɔ.
46011028	Sâ nùà kàn a, mùnò nyégé ká lè seèn bagasé, te à nde ye breêd yieé, à ŋueé ye mbè.
46011029	Nuaá mé né breêd sâ yieé, né mbè sâ ŋueé, mé ŋgàŋ yoòr Fehtoò beèh teèn ŋéné kéh ŋgwéh, né ju yoòr mé be seèn ŋuaán su.
46011030	Beén bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i lètenè bi`i tétán nu yeé mé njéh, bɔ̀ dé`i mé njéh njou den né lòù, bɔ̀ dé`i mé njéh kuú gi aá.
46011031	Mɔ béh sé né mé be beèh ke nyegé, te béh nde ye yieé, béh sé né ju beè Càŋ liím.
46011032	Sâ mɔ Nùà Dueè né kènê ju beèh tená, à né béh gèr feh, sâ à bɔɔ́ né te loù mé wɔ́ŋ nde né ju die, béh teèn yílá cú.
46011033	Sâ bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ bí nde aá yáb Càŋ bilí yieé, bí kèlà bɔ̀ mbaábi teèn.
46011034	Mɔ cùè né nuaré dé`i sie, bú a, jɔ̀gɔ̀ yíé gî ké gwò seèn ye. Mɔ sam, bí mɔ̀gɔ̀ bilí nde né dé ju yoòr bi`i tulu suù. Mè bɔ̀ ju dé jomò kwaá lɔ née ménâ ye. Kɔ mè ndeè baá ké lètenè bi`i, mè tueé ye.
46012001	Kènê mè nde né bí seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ se. Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè ye te bí kɔ nyegé gècên felè bɔ̀ seê sâ.
46012002	Bí né kɔɔ́ ye, cu mé bí lé Yeésò kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, bí lé càŋ dua beéh càŋ tándûg, bɔ́ lé bí turú gɔ beéh lòù.
46012003	Mè ye te bí ŋgweé nyegé kènê, ye môn sam cuú; te bí kɔ ye, nuaá mé tueé né mé terreb Cúcuí Càŋ, dé seèn túé ndé ŋgwéh ye Càŋ a, dúágá Yeésò duagà! Nuaré dé`i túé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ye: Yeésò né Nùà Dueè, mɔ à mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ lè sam ndɔ.
46012004	Seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ ŋené yuo kelà né yoòr nùàr mé gèh hihiné; Cúcuí cén sâ bɔɔ́ gi né ménâ dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́.
46012005	Ceér né hihiné, bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi né seé Fehtoò beèh cén sâ.
46012006	Kèkènè seé bɔɔ̂ hihiné dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ cén sâ bɔ̀ nùàr terreb haá gi né kɔɔ́.
46012007	Nùà kàn né mé seé seèn yoòr faá Cúcuí Ŋagâ haá keéh naâ bú nɔ, ye te gam nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ.
46012008	À bɔ̀ dé`i haá né terreb ŋgòr mé kɔ́gɔ̀n mene tueê; à haá bɔ̀ dé`i terreb dé kàgà-ndòn Càŋ seè.
46012009	Né bú Cúcuí cén sâ haá né bɔ̀ dé`i temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî kɔɔ́, à bɔ̀ dé`i haá né terreb dé beén hihiné taré sɔɔ̀m.
46012010	Bú Cúcuí cén sâ bɔ̀ dé`i haá né terreb dé fém bɔɔ̂, haá cu bɔ̀ dé`i terreb dé sòn-Càŋ tueê. À haá bɔ̀ dé`i terreb te bɔ́ ŋene geé kɔ bɔ̀ njèh dé tándulù mé dé Cúcuí Ŋagâ. À bɔ̀ dé`i haá né terreb dé leba juù hihiné mbaá tueê; à bɔ̀ dé`i dé bɔɔ̀n haá né terreb dé bɔ̀ leba juù sâ ŋgweê te bɔ́ se.
46012011	Né lom ka terreb Cúcuí cén sâ bɔɔ́ gi né ménâ kɔɔ́; à nùà kàn seé seèn haá né faá à gwaán keéh nê nɔ.
46012012	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, nùàr né gùm cén, mé gà teèn hihiné. Gùm nùàr sâ né mene teèn mé gà hihiné, dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yo cén. Mé Yeésò Kristò né ménâ ndɔ:
46012013	né mene bɔ̀ Jûf, mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, né mene bɔ̀ kwer, mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé kwer sam dɔɔ́ŋ, béh lé kou gi`i naâ nòmò Càŋ mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ cén, te béh ŋa yo cén. Béh dɔɔ́ŋ kwa bilí Cúcuí cén sâ ndɔ.
46012014	Bɔ́ gùm nùàr mé gà cén mé lòm ŋgwéh, né mé gà teèn hihiné.
46012015	Mɔ gule sé ye: nyí be sam, sâ nyí gà dé`i yoòr nùàr sam; mɔ à né mene ménâ tueé, sâ à gà mé né yoòr nùàr sam wa?
46012016	Mɔ tie sé ye: nyí hàm gà dé`i yoòr nùàr sam, kɔ nyí sé la né njolo; mɔ à né mene ménâ tueé, sâ à gà mé né yoòr nùàr sam wa?
46012017	Mɔ gùm nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ sé né gi léláŋ njolò, bɔ́ sé ŋgweé naâ mé kei wa? Mɔ sé né gi léláŋ tieè, bɔ́ sé njèh dulí ŋgweé naâ mé kei?
46012018	Mè tueé bí, Càŋ gà dé kàn yoòr nùàr me kwaá né te bèh seèn-e faá à gwaán nê nɔ.
46012019	Mɔ gà cén mé huún sé né gi gùm nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́, sâ yo sé teèn ná ŋgwêh!
46012020	Gà hihiné me bilí né kɔɔ́, te nde ye ŋaá gùm nùàr.
46012021	Mɔ né mân, sâ njolo a, té túé ye be a: nyí wò gwàn ŋgwéh! Feh a, té mé bɔ̀ gule túé ye bɔ́ a: nyí bí gwàn ŋgwéh ndɔ!
46012022	Háyè, bɔ̀ gà mé né beè nùàr yuyuaásé dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi mé seé bɔɔ̀n.
46012023	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé béh né munó ye bɔ́ hàm gà dé`i sam dɔɔ́ŋ, ŋgweéh béh ke nyegé kela cu né bɔ́ wa? Béh cií nyegé seér né bɔ̀ gà mé béh né mé njéh gulí.
46012024	Bɔ̀ dé mé béh mé njéh gùl`i bèh, den né dé bɔɔ̀n ménâ. Càŋ lé me sɔɔ́m naâ yo mé gùm mene, ye te béh cií kela seér bɔ̀ gà dé memanè.
46012025	Yeé baá mân, yo lòù ŋàrè dèn cú ndɔ, te bɔ̀ gà gam kuú seér lètenè bɔɔ̀n lòù.
46012026	Mɔ gà cén dé`i né yoòr yeè baán, sâ núr ŋgweé né mé bɔ̀ mbeí mene. Mɔ gà dé`i né yoòr yeè ŋgulí, sâ bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí nde né samé gií dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
46012027	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bí né gi dɔɔ́ŋ gùm yoò Yeésò Kristò; nùà kàn yoòr seèn né gà cén dé`i.
46012028	Né ménâ mé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ndɔ, Càŋ bɔ́ teèn te kwaá né lòù: toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ né bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê, jomo sâ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀; dé tagár né bɔ̀ fèh-njèh bɔ̀; te bɔ̀ fém bɔ̀ nde ye bele. Jomo sâ né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé taré sɔm yeé bɔ̀ nùàr o, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gam yeé bɔ̀ mbeí o, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né seé ke nyegé o, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé tueé né leba juù hihiné o, dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ bɔ́ te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ te kwaá né lòù.
46012029	Faá bèh mé bí né bɔ́ ŋené sâ, bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dɔɔ́ŋ sam, bɔ́ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ sam, bɔ́ bɔ̀ fèh-njèh bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ sam ndɔ. Bɔ́ gi mé terreb fém bɔɔ̂ dɔɔ́ŋ sam,
46012030	bɔ́ mé terreb beén taré sɔɔ̀m dɔɔ́ŋ sam, bɔ́ gi mé terreb leba juù hihiné tueê dɔɔ́ŋ sam, bɔ́ gi mé terreb leba juù sâ seè dɔɔ́ŋ sam ndɔ.
46012031	Mɔ né ménâ, sâ bí gwàn kélá sér bɔ̀ gà seê dé kokoô, bí gwàn lòm mé temé bi`i mene. Mé njéh mene, kwá mè feh bí dé mé né bɔ̀ mbeí dɔɔ́ŋ huɔɔ́m yɔgɔ́.
46013001	Mɔ mè sé né mene ju nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ tueé laré, mè tueé bilí mé ju bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ mene, mɔ mè mé gwaân nùàr lè sam, sâ mè né mbaá faá jùàgà nɔ ŋgulí tum den, mɔ sam faá sɔgɔ ŋgulí ndaŋ den né kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
46013002	Mè sé kwa gi mene terreb sòn-Càŋ tueê, mé bɔ̀ njèh nénâb ŋgweé komò, mé terreb njèh dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́ giî, mɔ mè mé gwaân nùàr lè sam, sâ mè né njèh mbaâ. Mè sé kwaá njií gi mene temé mò dɔɔ́ŋ yoòr Càŋ, mè né mene tueé ye tòr a: kòmò yùò doó sâ, ndé sèr toò, à né mene sòn mò ŋgweé, mɔ mè mé gwaân nùàr lè sam, sâ mè né njèh mbaâ.
46013003	Mè sé geé njií gi mene bɔ̀ njèh mò mé bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀, mè yila nde bilí tuar mé gùm mò mene, mɔ mè mé gwaân nùàr lè sam, sâ ndɔ́g kwɔ̀m sam.
46013004	Nuaá mé né nùàr gwaán, né yeé sèŋ kwaá, né yeé nùà bagaà, à huer kú bèh, à mèŋàŋ bɔ́ bèh, à feh hàm bèh.
46013005	Mɔ nùàr né nùàr gwaán, à njèh fegùl`i bɔ́ bèh, à nùà nyaâ ŋá ndé ŋgwéh, à nùà fúrú-temê dèn ndé ŋgwéh, à njùŋ kú ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
46013006	Nuaá mé né nùàr gwaán, kwè sén bèh, à gwaán seér né gècên.
46013007	Nuaá mé né nùàr gwaán, né yeé veên bɔ̀ mbeî seŋ, à kwaá njií lom temé mé Càŋ, à né ndèm kwaá, ye Càŋ nde gi né njèh dɔɔ́ŋ nyegé, à né gi dɔɔ́ŋ yoló ndɔ.
46013008	Gwaân dé seèn nde den né méménâ dé kè`i cên. Ŋgòr bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ gi nde né kɔɔ́, terreb mé béh lé kwaá naâ dé leba juù hihiné tueê gi, kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ nùàr gi yuo ndɔ.
46013009	Lòù sam, béh njèh dɔɔ́ŋ kɔ́ gí ŋgwéh, béh ŋgòr dé sòn-Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ túé làrè ŋgwéh ndɔ.
46013010	Mɔ njií mé né gùm dɔɔ́ŋ ndeè waà baá, dé mé gùm dɔɔ́ŋ sam doô nde né leér yuo.
46013011	Léí mé mè lé naâ huaán maàn, mè lé tueé beéh ŋgòr huaán maàn, mè lé munó beéh faá huaán maàn nɔ, mè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgweé kɔ lom faá huaán maàn ndɔ. Mè yeé kula baá, seé huaán maàn hèllè gi yuo mè yoòr.
46013012	Kènê béh ŋene njií den né bɔ̀ njèh cibi mbaá, faá béh ŋene yeé te nòmò nɔ. Cieé dé`i béh nde né mé njolo ŋené ŋagá. Kènê mè kɔ cegé né njèh kèb cén, loòró dé`i mè nde né dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́ gií, faá Càŋ né mè mé gùm mene kɔɔ́ gií nɔ.
46013013	Njèh tagár gí ndé ŋgwéh: temé cén mé béh né yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií doô gí ndé ŋgwéh; ndèm mé béh né mé bú kwaá, gí ndé ŋgwéh; gwaân gí ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ. Lètenè bɔ̀ njèh tagár hên, gwaân kela né kɔɔ́.
46014001	Sâ bí fágá lòm feh mé bɔ̀ mbaábi gwaân. Bí gwàn seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ yoòr bi`i gwaàn ndɔ. Bí tétég gwàn kélá sòn-Càŋ tueê.
46014002	Nuaá mé kwa né dé seèn terreb dé leba juù hihiné tueê, tueé njií lom né mé Càŋ, à mé bɔ̀ nùàr túé njí ŋgwéh, à tueé seér né bɔ̀ njèh nénâb faá Cúcuí Ŋagâ tueé né bú nɔ. Bɔ̀ nùàr bú sâ ŋgwé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.
46014003	Dé nuaá mé kwa né terreb sòn-Càŋ tueê, môn sam. À dé seèn tueé njií né mé bɔ̀ nùàr, te bɔ́ kwaá yam njií gi temé yoòr Càŋ, te toó nyegé bɔ́, temé die bɔ́ lè.
46014004	Nuaá mé kwa né dé seèn terreb leba juù hihiné tueê sâ, tueé ŋgulí nyegé lom né temé dé seèn nùà njèh. Dé nuaá mé kwa né dé seèn terreb sòn-Càŋ tueê, môn sam; à dé seèn tueé ŋgulí nyegé né temé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ.
46014005	Mè sé la ye bí dɔɔ́ŋ, túé gí leba juù hihiné; njèh cén, mè gwaán kela né ye bí tueé seér sòn-Càŋ. Mè tueé bí, nuaá mé tueé né sòn-Càŋ huɔm kela né kɔɔ́ mé nùà leba juù hihiné tueê. Mɔ sam, kɔ sè-njàb né teèn, te bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ŋgweé kwa ye, bɔ́ kwaá yam njií gi temé yoòr Càŋ. Mɔ sam, sâ sòn-Càŋ kela né kɔɔ́.
46014006	Wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ nùàr mò, hên mɔ mè waà ké yoòr bi`i, mè tueé bí mé leba juù hihiné, mɔ bí ŋgúŋgwéh, sâ nde né bí gam wa? Ŋgweéh mɔ mè waà ké yoòr bi`i, kɔ mè tueé bí te ju mé nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né ŋgweé, te bí ŋgweé ye mà. Mɔ né ménâ, bɔ̀ njií mé mè naâ ké toò Càŋ ŋené, mè nde né bí se nyegé; mè tueé mene ŋgòr kɔ́gɔ̀n, né mene ŋgòr sòn-Càŋ, né mene njèh feèh, mè tueé bí, kɔ mè bɔɔ́ ménâ, sâ gam ye bí.
46014007	Béh me njií mé kû bɔ̂ njáŋ; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ toú mbaá. Mɔ wò tuaga vurú njií né mbaá, wò lobo vurú njií njáŋ mbaá ndɔ, nde né ŋgulí cegé wa?
46014008	Hên, mɔ nùà túágá-tàŋ né gèh tàŋ dé taâb tuagá vurú den, nuaré dé`i nde né taáb mbaá nyegé kuú wa?
46014009	Né kè`i cén ménâ ndɔ: mɔ bí tueé den né tebé te leba juù hihiné, sâ bɔ̀ nùàr nde né tebé ŋgweé wa? Mè tueé bí, bí tueé den né mbaá, bɔ́ ŋgúŋgwéh, kobo kela né ter.
46014010	Bɔ̀ ju hihiné né lom ká lè wɔ́ŋe ŋgún, bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi te ceér-e ndɔ.
46014011	Mé njéh mene, mɔ mè ju mé bɔ́ né mè teèn tueé njií sâ ŋgwé kɔ́ ŋgwéh, sâ nùà hèllè né beè mò k`in, mè né taré k`in beè seèn ménâ ndɔ.
46014012	Né cu mân mé bí ndɔ, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né lom terreb seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, bí lègè lòm terreb dé kokoô kwaà; tétég sé la né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ gam, te bɔ́ kwaá yam njií lom temé yoòr Càŋ.
46014013	Teèn sâ, mɔ nuaré dé`i kwa terreb leba juù hihiné tueê, sâ bú a, dùà Càŋ, te Càŋ haá bú terreb bɔ̀ njàb teèn seè ndɔ.
46014014	Wanɔɔ́ŋ mè sé né Càŋ mé leba juù hihiné dua den, temé mò né dé seèn ŋgweé, feh mò dé seèn ŋgwé kwà ŋgwéh.
46014015	Á hên, mè bɔɔ́ sɔm nde aá naàn wee? Mɔ né ménâ, kɔ mè dua né mé ju lɔɔ̂ mò, mè né mé leba juù hihiné dua ndɔ. Mɔ né bené, mè bené de nde né mé ju lɔɔ̂ mò, mè de cu mé leba juù hihiné ménâ.
46014016	Wanɔɔ́ŋ mɔ wò vra lom né Càŋ mé leba juù hihiné, sâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né kwarè yeè lòù bilí felá den, nde né ŋgòr yeè gwaán, ye «Môn” wa? Bɔ́ gwàn ndé ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, njií mé wò né teèn tueé sâ, bɔ́ ŋgwé kɔ́ ŋgwéh.
46014017	Sâ ŋgòr yeè hèllè la huɔm mene naàn, mbeí yeè dé seèn gàm ndé ŋgwéh.
46014018	Mè né Càŋ mé gècên mene vra. Lòù sam, mè né gi bí dɔɔ́ŋ mé leba juù hihiné tueé yɔgɔ́.
46014019	Mé njéh mene, mɔ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bilí baá, mè gwaán kela né njàb tîn té tín tueê, te yila bɔ́ felè, te gam bɔ́; mè gwaán kela né cí, mé njàb kám te leba juù hihiné tueé deèn.
46014020	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí té njèh faá bɔ̀ huaán tetɔɔ̂r nɔ mùnò; bí mùnò sér faá bɔ̀ jojolô bɔ̀ nɔ. Kɔ né dé veên bɔɔ̂, sâ ye; dé sâ bí teèn dèn sér faá bɔ̀ huaán tetɔɔ̂r nɔ; bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n veên bɔ́ kɔ́ ŋgwéh.
46014021	Dé leba juù hihiné tueê, né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: «Càŋ Dueè ye: nyí nde né dàm bɔ̀ nùàr nyî njèh tueé, nyí bɔ́ tueé keéh nde né sònò bɔ̀ k`in; bɔ̀ k`in nde né bɔ́ mé ju lɔɔ̂ bɔɔ̀n k`in sâ tueé. Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ nùàr nyî sòn nyî ŋgwé ndé ŋgwéh.»
46014022	Sâ tueé né ye, Càŋ né njeré dé`i te leba juù hihiné feh kwaá; à feh kwaá né mé bɔ̀ nùàr dé ké cieè. Dé sâ dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njiî sam. Dé bɔɔ̀n né seér terreb dé sòn-Càŋ tueé beleè, te feh bɔ́ njèh, te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ teèn, ye Càŋ baá lètenè bɔɔ̀n mé terreb mene. Dé bɔ̀ ké cie bɔ̀, bɔ́ dé sâ ŋéné kɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh.
46014023	Hên mɔ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bilí baá mɔ̀gɔ̀ dé Càŋ duaà, dé kàn mé dé kân tueé lom né leba juù hihiné, mɔ bɔ̀ lòù bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ ké cie bɔ̀ né lètenè bi`i teèn, sâ bɔ́ bí bɔ̀ kùlù bɔ̀ yílá ndé ŋgwéh wa?
46014024	Mè tueé bí, mɔ bí tueé seér né sòn-Càŋ mé ju lɔɔ̂, sâ, né mene nùà lòù né mene nùà ké cie nde né teèn yilá, à ŋgweé kwa, veên seèn nde né bú be sie,
46014025	bɔ̀ mùnò lèrrèb seèn dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi`i né cie ŋené yuo kelá, à nde né toò Càŋ cemmé ndeé, à die bú, ye bí a: Né bɔ̀n, Càŋ terrèb né lètenè bi`i kɔɔ́.
46014026	Dé hên béh sònò tueé cu nde né kei, bɔ̀ mbeí mò? Mɔ bí bilí baá kèn, nuaré dé`i de bené, cén dé`i feh njèh, dé`i né bí njií mé à ŋenè naâ ké toò Càŋ se nyegé, cén dé`i tueé mé leba juù hihiné, cén dé`i se seér te ju lɔɔ̂. Te bɔ̀ njií mé bí bɔɔ́ gi né sâ dɔɔ́ŋ gam seér bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lòù, bɔ́ kwaá yam njií gi temé yoòr Càŋ.
46014027	Mɔ bí tueé né mé leba juù hihiné, sâ bí túé lòm nùà fà mé tagár, bí tueé te sòne te sòne; nuaré dé`i né bɔ̀ njií mé bí tueé né sâ se seér.
46014028	Gèh bɔ̀ ŋgòr te leba juù hihiné hên, mɔ nùà seè teèn sam, sâ nùà kàn a, té mé njéh ter te mɔ̀gɔ mbaá kòmò wùò kú; bú a, túé lòm ké lè mé Càŋ.
46014029	Mɔ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé tueé né dé bɔɔ̀n sòn-Càŋ baá tebé tueé, bɔ́ a, túé lòm nùà fà mé tagár ndɔ, te bɔ̀ mbeí felá nyegé, bɔ́ pi lòù.
46014030	Mɔ nuaré dé`i baá njèh mé njolo ké toò Càŋ ŋené njií, sâ nuaá mé né njií sònò cu sâ tueé, bú a, téná lɔ́ môn, te mbeí tueé keéh.
46014031	Bí né gi mé ceér sòn-Càŋ tueé larê dɔɔ́ŋ. Njèh cén, bí túé cécéné, sâ te bɔ̀ nùàr maán weh njèh teèn, temé taré gi`i bɔ́ lè dɔɔ́ŋ.
46014032	Lòù sam, bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ né yeé bɔ̀ s`iè-sòn bɔ̀.
46014033	Wanɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ gwàn ŋgwéh mé béh ndabé gɔ lòù, à gwaán seér né ye, béh bɔ́ njèh te ceér-e te ceér-e. Bɔ̀ véh a, té sòn lè mɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ túé, te mɔ̀gɔ̀ bi`i den faá dàm mɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ nɔ; bɔ́ mé ceér sòn tueê ké te mɔ̀gɔ̀ sam. Bɔ́ sou nyagá kwaá né te mvù Càŋe môn ndɔ, ye: Bɔ̀ véh a, léb dèn lòù.
46014035	Mɔ bɔ̀ véh gwaán né njeré dé`i ŋgweé nyegê, wa bɔ́ a, ndé bíé nyégé mé bɔ̀ si bɔɔ̀n ké gwò ma; wanɔɔ́ŋ mɔ ma vêh tueé sòn ké te mɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, húɔ́m ŋgwéh.
46014036	Môn! Merré dé`i bí munó né ye, ŋgòr Càŋ lé yuoó naâ beè bi`i; merré dé`i bí ye, ŋgòr Càŋ lé nde loóm naâ dé bi`i ndɔ?
46014037	Mɔ nuaré dé`i munó né ye, nyí né sòn-Càŋ, wa nyí né mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ, sâ à nde né kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ njií mé mè nyagá né hên yuoó naâ sònò Fehtoò beèh.
46014038	Mɔ à ménâ ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh, sâ bí té sòn seèn mbaá ŋgwé kú, bí té mé bú táŋ.
46014039	Mɔ né mân bɔ̀ mbeí mò, sâ temé bi`i a, gwàn kélá sòn-Càŋ tueê. Mé njéh mene, bí té leba juù hihiné yín ndɔ.
46014040	Bí bɔ́ nyégé gí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ, te bele ceér.
46015001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè lé naâ ké lètenè bi`i Njàgà Bagaà se, bí lé naâ temé teèn tég kwaá njií; wa hên bí née den ka teèn tég njebá taré ye. Kènê mè gwaán cu né bí se ferrê.
46015002	Càŋ bí hên yili sɔm keéh né mé Njàgà Bagaà sâ; kɔ bí né temé teèn nɔɔ́ŋ kwaá njií ndɔ, sâ ye. Mɔ sam, sâ bí lé gwaán kuú naâ dé mbaâ.
46015003	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mè lé bí sâ feh keéh naâ ŋgé`i ŋgòr mé Yeésò Kristò lé naâ mè tueé; mè lé ye bí a, Yeésò Kristò lé naâ felè veên beèh kuú ma, né ka nág faá bɔ́ lɔ nyagá kwaá naâ te mvù Càŋe nɔ;
46015004	bɔ́ furú bú; lè cieé tagáre à komo yuo te cio, faá bɔ́ lɔ naâ te mvù Càŋe nyagá kwaá ndɔ;
46015005	à ŋené yuo kelà toò Piêr; jomo sâ toò bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê yulà cùɔ̀b fà doô.
46015006	À ŋené yuo kela cuù toò bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ seèn dé`i, sâ bɔ́ né bècénè, bɔ́ lé naâ njèh yuií tîn mân yɔgɔ́, bɔ́ ŋene gi bú kè`i cén dɔɔ́ŋ. Lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ bú ŋené sâ, bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó née mé njolo ye, kuú cegé né bɔ̀ dé`i.
46015007	Jomo sâ, à nde ŋené yuo kelà toò Jâk, à ŋené yuo kela cuù toò bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
46015008	Jomo bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ, te à ŋené yuo kelà ye toò mò. Á sâ, huaán mvuɔɔ̀b te ŋàr lè faá mè nɔ sam.
46015009	Lètenè bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Fehtoò beèh dɔɔ́ŋ lólôb bɔ̀ cèrè-mbâŋ né mè ndɔ. Mè wúlú ŋgwéh nuaá mé sé la né lètenè bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê yilá. Mɔ bɔ́ ye tútueè, mè lé naâ bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ gèr mé gècên mene feh keéh.
46015010	Mé njéh mene, Càŋ kɔ́-jerè njolo yoòr mò c`i ŋgwéh; njua seèn mé kènê mè baá ye nuaá mé né mè hên. Kàmbér njua Càŋ sâ lé dé mbaâ ná ŋgwêh; mè tema yɔgɔ́ seér cu aá bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê seé mé njéh hên nɔ. Mé njéh mene, ka mè sam, né lom húɔ́m-temé Càŋ mé né yoòr mò bɔɔ́ den né mân kɔɔ́.
46015011	Sâ, mɔ mè se mene Njàgà Bagaà kɔɔ́, né mene bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dé`i, dɔɔ́ŋ ju sam, béh se gi né Njàgà Bagaà cén mé bí né gi temé teèn kwaá njií sâ.
46015012	Béh yeé baá ŋgòr Càŋ se yɔŋ, ye Yeésò Kristò komo yuo aá lè cio kèn, bɔɔ́ cu né naàn mé bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i lètenè bi`i ye, bɔ̀ komó te cio kòmò yùò bèh wa?
46015013	Ŋgweéh sâ Yeésò Kristò sé lé te cio kòmò yùò ná ŋgwêh ndɔ wa?
46015014	Mɔ Yeésò Kristò sé lé te cio kòmò yùò ná ŋgwêh, sâ béh ŋgòr Càŋ tueé kuú né dé lòù, sâ bí temé teèn kwaá njií kuú né dé lòù ndɔ.
46015015	Te jomo sâ bɔ́ sie sagá cu ye béh nyeén teèn, ye béh né bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ dé nyenyenê, kei mé bɔɔ́ béh ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, Càŋ komo sɔm aá Yeésò te cio wa? Mɔ sé né ka gècên ye bɔ̀ komó te cio kòmò yùò bèh, ŋgweéh sâ Càŋ sé lé Yeésò te cio kòmò sɔ̀m ná ŋgwêh mà.
46015016	Mɔ Càŋ bɔ̀ komó te cio kòmò sɔ̀m bèh, sâ Yeésò Kristò sé lé te cio kòmò yùò ná ŋgwêh.
46015017	Mɔ Yeésò sé lé te cio kòmò yùò ná ŋgwêh bɔ̀n, sâ bí temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií den né dé lòù. Mɔ né ménâ, sâ bí vu aá be ndɔ, veên bi`i né cu ka yoòr bi`i mbaán den.
46015018	Sâ tueé cu né ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ te ceér Yeésò kuú dɔɔ́ŋ, lòù leér le gi aá kèn ndɔ.
46015019	Mɔ ye ndèm mé béh né yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií hên gam lom né béh dé ká lè wɔ́ŋe, sâ bɔ̀ nùàr a, yúé kélá béh mé bɔ̀ dé`i.
46015020	Mè tueé bí, Kristò lé naâ te cio komo yuo, à baá cu mé njolo, te feh kwaá ye béh a, bɔ̀ komó nde né te cio môn komo yuo gií ma.
46015021	Lòù sam, cio lɔ yilà naâ ká lè wɔ́ŋe felè nùà cên, béh te cio komo yuo gi nde né felè nùà cên ndɔ.
46015022	Gèh dé mé bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Ádàm né cio felè Ádàm bilí yilá hên, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé mban bilí né yoòr Yeésò Kristò komo yuo nde né te cio felè seèn ménâ ndɔ.
46015023	Njèh cén, nùà kàn né mé lèmè seèn: toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ pêm né Kristò. Loù cuû seèn, bɔ̀ Kristò bɔ̀ bele keéh;
46015024	sâ wɔ́ŋ ceré baá ndɔ. Loù mé wɔ́ŋ ceré nde né teèn sâ, bɔ̀ tándulu bɔ́ bɔ̀ mgbè bɔɔ̀n mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé ye wɔ́ŋ né beè bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ, Kristò nde gi né bɔ́ nyoló sɔm, te à haá njií cu kɔgɔ mé Tele seèn Càŋ.
46015025	Bú Kristò te kɔgɔ den ŋgɔgɔ nde né kɔɔ́. Kɔ Càŋ domó njalé kwaá gi aá bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ ka ba gulè seèn, sâ à haá njií cu ye kɔgɔ mé Tele.
46015026	Nùà bùnò mé bɔ́ nde né nyoló ceré né Cio.
46015027	Te mvù Càŋe né gi ménâ nyagá den ndɔ ye: Càŋ ka ba gulè Kristò ba kwaá gi né njèh dɔɔ́ŋ. «Dɔɔ́ŋ” bú hên né dé seèn hiín, à Càŋ nùà njèh teèn kèmà kéh ŋgwéh. Dé seèn à njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ka ba gulè Kristò ba kwaá gi né kɔɔ́. Càŋ ka Ŋuna seèn dèn sér ndé ŋgwéh.
46015028	Mɔ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ndeè baá gi ka Ŋunà Càŋ, sâ Ŋuna mé feh seèn baá ka Teleè ndɔ. Lòù sam, Tele bú terreb felè bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ haá gi`i naâ kɔɔ́. Cu sâ, Càŋ den lom nde aá Nùà Dueè dé ndeèr felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ kɔɔ́.
46015029	Mè nde né bí njeré dé`i tueé. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé kou né nòmò Càŋ te sòn bɔ̀ nùàr bɔɔ̀n mé kuú gi aá, bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ mùnò ke felè bɔɔ̀n ye. Bɔ́ ménâ bɔɔ́ né dé ke`i? Mɔ sé la né ka bɔ̀n, ye bɔ̀ komó te cio kòmò yùò ndé ŋgwéh, sâ bɔ́ bɔɔ̀n nòmò Càŋ te sòn bɔɔ̀n kou kuú né dé ke`i wa?
46015030	Mé béh mene, sâ béh te gèr-e cu dɔɔ́ŋ ŋar yila kuú né dé ke`i?
46015031	Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè né cio cieé dɔɔ́ŋ liím sɔɔ́. Mè né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé felè bi`i, mè tueé né bí dé cî. Vɔ́gɔ́-temé sâ né ye: kènê béh bí dé beèh baá gi beè Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
46015032	Né mene ká Efêse, béh bɔ̀ nyam yaà né mé lègè kwaré. Mɔ se la né dé bɔ̀ njèh wɔ̂ŋ, ŋgweéh sâ mè sé lege kuú den né dé mbaâ mà. Mè tueé bí, mɔ Càŋ bɔ̀ komó te cio kòmò sɔ̀m bèh, sâ mè sé la tueé naâ faá kàn hên nɔ, ye: «Béh yíé yáb kókoó, béh ŋúé mbè kókoó ndɔ, kwéh béh nde né kuú gií.»
46015033	Bí té feh bi`i teèn bèlè lɔ́: nùà veên né yeé nùà bagaà jin.
46015034	Bí dèn faá nùàr nɔ, bí té veên kèmà cú. Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i lètenè bi`i Càŋ kɔ́ ŋgwéh. Fegùl`i bí mé njéh s`iè ŋgwéh wa?
46015035	Nuaré dé`i nde né bieé ye, bɔ̀ komó te cio komo yuo cu nde né naàn wa? Yo bɔɔ̀n den nde né naàn ndɔ wa?
46015036	Sâ wò né tándugó! Wanɔɔ́ŋ mɔ wò dobo yií gèh njèh dòù, à beéh dòù vùàn lè bèh, te j`il`i yuo teèn, feí ye wa?
46015037	Wò né mene ŋgwàgàm dobo, wò dobo yeé mvum, wò ŋgege dòbò bèh.
46015038	Càŋ haá keéh né mvum dé kàn j`il`i seèn faá à gwaán nê nɔ, à haá bú kèkènè dé seèn mé né ka yoòr seèn ndɔ.
46015039	Mé núɔ́gɔ́ né cu ménâ ndɔ. Núɔ́gɔ́ njèh cecemâ dɔɔ́ŋ kè`i cén sam: núɔ́gɔ́ nùàr né hiín, núɔ́gɔ́ nyaàm hiín ndɔ; núɔ́gɔ́ noòn mé núɔ́gɔ́ ŋgò né bele hihiné ménâ.
46015040	Yo né kè`i fà: dé ké te vulúu né hiín, dé ká doó hiín ndɔ. Bɔ̀ yo dé ké te vulúu huɔmé nde né dé bɔɔ̀n hiín mé bɔ̀ yo dé ká doô.
46015041	Yàgà huɔɔ̂m dé loù né hiín, dé weêh hiín, dé bɔ̀ mbentò hiín; ké lètenè bɔ̀ mbentò sâ, yàgà huɔmê bɔɔ̀n né hihiné ndɔ.
46015042	Nde né ménâ loù mé bɔ̀ komó nde né lè cio komo yuo giî. Mɔ bɔ́ furú sɔm aá nùàr, à nde né fɔ yuo. Mé yo dé feê, mɔ nùàr komo yuo aá te cio, à dé seèn fɔ̀ ndé cú.
46015043	Mɔ bɔ́ furú njií aá komó dòù, sâ à baá yuaásé, veénsé mân. Loù mé à komo yuo cu aá te cio, à nde né yàgà huɔɔ́m, à den seér tarésé.
46015044	Cu mé bɔ́ né bú ka tàbè furú njií, à né núɔ́gɔ́ mé húɔ́m. Mɔ à komo yuo aá te cio, sâ yo seèn baá seér dé feê mé Cúcuí Càŋ haá naâ bú. Lòù sam, yo dé njèh wɔ̂ŋ né teèn, sâ yo dé Cúcuî né teèn ménâ ndɔ.
46015045	Né gi te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den, ye: «Ádàm nùà toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ lé naâ mé yɔ̀ŋ.» Ádàm dé jomò né Yeésò, à dé seèn né Cúcuí mé haá né yɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ́.
46015046	Bɔ̀ nùàr yo dé Cúcuí sâ ŋéné lɔ́gɔ́ bèh, bɔ́ ŋene lɔgɔ́ yeé yo dé wɔ̂ŋ, te bɔ́ nde ye dé Cúcuî ŋené.
46015047	Bɔ́ lé Ádàm nùà toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ meè naâ mé tàbè. Ádàm dé jomo lé dé seèn yuoó naâ ké te vulúu.
46015048	Bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ felá né nuaá mé bɔ́ lé meè naâ mé tàbè hèllè; bɔ̀ dé ké te vulúu felá dé bɔɔ̀n nuaá mé yuoó naâ ké te vulúu ndɔ.
46015049	Né kè`i cén mé béh ndɔ: béh felá né dé mé bɔ́ lé meè naâ mé tàbè; béh felá cu nde né nuaá mé lé yuoó naâ ké te vulúu ménâ ndɔ.
46015050	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè bí hên tueé né te bí kɔ ye, bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ́ me gi né mé núɔ́gɔ́ bɔ̂ húɔ́m dɔɔ́ŋ, te Lò Càŋe yílá ndé ŋgwéh. Naàn mé njií mé nde né lòù fɔ bɔ̂ dé mé fɔ̀ bèh nde né bècénè den bilí wa?
46015051	Bí kwá mè feh kwaá bí njèh nâb dé`i njolò: béh ndeè lòù dɔɔ́ŋ kú gí ndé ŋgwéh, béh nde né dɔɔ́ŋ kweéh seér gií.
46015052	Loù mé tàŋ dé cèrè jomò tuaga nde né teèn, béh nde né mvúár cén faá bɔ́ ci né njolo nɔ kweéh seér. Mɔ tàŋ sâ ndeè baá tuagá, bɔ̀ komó nde gi`i né dòù mé yo dé feê komó yuo: yo dé sâ ndeè dé seèn kú ndé cú. Béh bɔ̀ làŋ bɔ̀, yo dé beèh kweéh seér nde né lòù.
46015053	Sâ tueé né ye, yo mé nde né kuú hên, ŋa seér nde aá yo mé kú ndé cú; à né yeé fɔ, à lòù fɔ̀ ndé cú.
46015054	Mɔ yo mé nde né kuú, mé nde né fɔ, ndeè ŋa seér aá dé mé kú ndé cú, fɔ̀ ndé cú, sâ baá jéjég faá bɔ́ lé nyagá kwaá naâ te mvù Càŋ nɔ, ye: «Cio nyoló yuo aá kèn; yɔgɔ́ aá bú!»
46015055	«Cècàgà Cio, terreb yeè sâ baá he? Cècàgà Cio, njòr yeè sâ baá he wee?»
46015056	Cio yùɔ̀m kwaá né mé veên, te à nde ye nùàr wulá. Veên yùɔ̀m kwaá né mé sóú te nùàr nde ye ju die ndɔ.
46015057	Kùsèm Càŋ, s`iè ŋgób! Kènê béh Cio yɔgɔ́ aá kèn. Béh Cio yɔgɔ́ né mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
46015058	Belà, mɔ né mân, sâ bí sɔ̀m njí njágá ter, bí té kèkɔ̀g dèn, bí mbán ndé lòm yoòr Fehtoò beèh tég, bí né seé seèn cu dɔɔ́ŋ tetoò temá njií. Lòù sam, bí kɔ gi aá kèn ye, seé mé bí né mé terreb Fehtoò beèh bɔɔ́ hên nde né bí nòmò kókoó haá.
46016001	Mè gwaán cu né njeré dé`i tueê; né felè kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé bɔ́ né bilí, te gam bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Jerusalem doô: bí bɔ́ ká kè`i cén faá mè lé tueé naâ mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ te tàbè Galatî nɔ.
46016002	Mé sɔ́ndè dɔɔ́ŋ, nuaá mé kwa baá kàgàlɔ̀ŋ, bú a, sɔ̀m kwá kèb dé`i yí jomo; mɔ mè ndeè waà baá ké sâ, te bɔ́ lòù bílí sɔ́ cú.
46016003	Mɔ mè ndeè waà baá, te bí balé sɔm bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i, mè tema njií bɔ́ mé njéh ké Jerusalem, mè nyagá kwaá mvù teèn.
46016004	Mɔ huɔm kela né ké toò mé feh mò ndeê, béh bɔ́ nde dɔɔ́ŋ.
46016005	Mè nde né ké yoòr bi`i ndeé. Njèh cén, mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ kela nde née Masedínà ye. Kɔ mè kela ké teèn kelà ndɔ.
46016006	Mɔ mè ndeè waà baá ké yoòr bi`i, merré dé`i mè nde né kɔ́beè cer weh; kɔ ŋgweéh cu dùlù nde né mè ké sâ kelá gií wa? Mè kɔ́ nyégé ŋgwéh. Sâ mɔ mè ndeè baá mé gò beré dé`i, bí nde né mè teèn gam.
46016007	Mè ye, mɔ mè kela ké yoòr bi`i kènê, sâ mè cèr màgà ndé ŋgwéh. Kɔ mè kela lɔgɔ́ Masedínà, te mè ndeè wa ye ké yoòr bi`i, béh bí cer weh, mɔ Càŋ gwaán.
46016008	Mè née ká Efêse ye. Kɔ Pàntèkɔ̂t ndeè waà baá, sâ ye.
46016009	Lòù sam, Càŋ haá baá mè ceér ŋgòr seèn ká teèn tueê; seé né gɔ; bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ né doó merré den ndɔ.
46016010	Mɔ Timotê waà baá ké lètenè bi`i, bí kè nyégé ká bú bagasé, te yo seèn se lètenè bi`i. À faá mè nɔ bɔɔ́ né seé Fehtoò beèh.
46016011	Nuaré dé`i a, té bú sèb. Bí gàm sér bú lòù, te gò seèn kela lè dɔlê, à wa cuù ká yoòr mò. Mè né bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí kela den.
46016012	Dé mbeí beèh Apɔlɔ̂s, mè né yeé bú cu dɔɔ́ŋ toó nyegé, te bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí ndeè waà ké yoòr bi`i ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, à gwàn ŋgwéh ké sâ kènê ndeê. Mɔ lɔ́ŋ ndeè ŋené baá, à nde ye.
46016013	Bí dèn làŋ, bí kwá njí lòm temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh nɔɔ́ŋ, bí dèn bɔ̀ fágá-feh bɔ̀, bí dèn mé terreb ndɔ.
46016014	Njií mé bí né bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí gwàn bɔ̀ mbeí bi`i teèn gwaàn.
46016015	Bí né gi Setéfánàs mé mbàgà seèn mene kɔɔ́, bí né cu kɔɔ́ ye, te tàbè Akayî bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé kweéh seér lɔgɔ́ naâ temé né bɔ́ ndɔ. Jomo sâ bɔ́ yila seé, te bɔ́ gam bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀. Sâ bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mè né bí bɔŋ,
46016016	bɔ̀ nùàr faá bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀, bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbaábɔn, bí kwá lɔ́ bɔ́ feh dilí nyegé bí ceér kɔɔ́.
46016017	Setéfánàs mé Fortunátùs bɔ̂ Àkayíkùs mé waà né hên, mè né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé felè bɔɔ̀n; bɔ́ né ka beè mò faá sòn bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ nɔ.
46016018	Temé mò né lè mé bɔ́ die, faá temé bi`i lé naâ lè mé bɔ́ die nɔ. Bí kɔ́ nyégé gèh dé mé bí vra nde né bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ teèn bagasé.
46016019	Bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ká te tàbè Asíà ye, bíé kéh bí baga. Akilâ bɔ̂ Prisîl bɔ́ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé bilí yeé ké gwò bɔɔ̀n ye, bíé kéh bí mé yilí Yeésò ndɔ.
46016020	Bɔ̀ mbeí beèh mé né gi ká kwarè mò dɔɔ́ŋ ye, bíé kéh bí baga. Bí bíé kú lètenè bi`i mé temé cén mene dɔɔ́ŋ.
46016021	Dé hên mè nyagá lom né mé be mò jéjég, ye: Pɔ̂l né bí bieé o.
46016022	Nuaá mé Fehtoò beèh gwàn ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, sísib`i! Maranátà! Fehtoò beèh, ndê!
46016023	Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò a, ká s`iè gí bí beè.
46016024	Temé mò dɔɔ́ŋ né gi ké yoòr bi`i mé yilí Yeésò Kristò.
47001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò. Càŋ lé mè sie kwaá naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn. Bêh d`im beèh Timotê nyagá njií né mé bí bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ ké Kɔrênt, mé bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò te tàbè Akayî mene dɔɔ́ŋ.
47001002	Tele beèh Càŋ bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
47001003	Kùsèm Càŋ Tele Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò. Tele kɔ́-jere né bú. Né mene gèh gèr dé heè, à né béh teèn dɔɔ́ŋ bɔŋ laré.
47001004	À béh te dàm gèr-e bɔŋ laré né kɔɔ́, ye te béh bɔŋ keéh cu bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gèr feh hihiné ŋené môn.
47001005	Yoòr beèh né gèr mé lé naâ yoòr Kristò. Càŋ béh bɔŋ né mé Kristò ndɔ.
47001006	Mɔ béh né mene dàm bɔ̀ gèr mân ŋené laré, sâ, béh mé njéh bɔŋ né bí, te yili sɔm bí. Mɔ béh baá nɔɔ́ŋ, nde né bí bɔŋ ndɔ, te bí kwa terreb, bí yolo laré ye gèr faá béh nɔ.
47001007	Béh né kwàgà bi`i yieé, béh né kɔɔ́ ye, yoòr bi`i né gèr mé né yoòr beèh. Mɔ né mân, sâ Càŋ béh bí bɔŋ nde né dɔɔ́ŋ.
47001008	Mɔ bɔ́ ye tútueè, njèh faá gèr nɔ, béh lé naâ bú ké te tàbè Asíà ŋené kum. Gèr béh nyunò dulí seér cu lòù; nuaré dé`i lé mùnò ná cû ye nyí nde né teèn yili yuo.
47001009	Á sâ, lé béh feh seér naâ lòù ndɔ, ye te béh mé terreb beèh táŋ cú, te béh temé kwaá njií seér yoòr Càŋ. À nùàr te cio komo sɔm yeé kɔɔ́.
47001010	À lé béh te gèr hèllè yili sɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́, à nde cu né béh môn yili sɔm. Béh ndèm beèh kwaá né ye, à béh méménâ yili sɔm den nde né kɔɔ́ ma.
47001011	Bí nde né béh Càŋ teèn dua gam, te Càŋ ŋgweé hueh bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó, à gam béh; te nùàr ŋgún vra gi bú felè beèh ndɔ.
47001012	Temé beèh né lè sagár. Lòù sam, ndòn beèh ye béh a: béh yoòr né mé dene bèsɔ́nè mé dene gècên, wa né toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ ŋené, tétég né njolò bi`i ma. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, béh mé kɔ́gɔ̀n dé nùàr dèn ŋgwéh, né seér húɔ́m-temé Càŋ gam né béh kɔɔ́.
47001013	Yeé baá môn, béh bí bɔ̀ njèh dé tetarê nyàgà njí cú ndɔ, béh bí nyagá njií lom aá bɔ̀ njií mé bí nde né ŋgweé komo. Mè né gwaán ye te bí ŋgweé komo.
47001014	Dé kènê mè né kɔɔ́ ye, bí ŋgweé faŋ den né lòù. Mé njéh mene, cu dé`i bí nde né ŋgweé komo, ye loù mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò cuù nde né teèn, bí sagár nde né mé béh, faá béh nde né mé bí sagár nɔ.
47001015	Teèn sâ mè lé naá gi`i gwaán ye te mè wa lɔgɔ̂ ké lɔ bi`i, mè kela nde ye Masedínà. Mɔ mè cuù baá, béh bí den weh cu ndɔ, te bí dé bi`i kwa njua mbei fà. Jomo sâ bí sé naâ mè gam, te mè nde ser ké Judê.
47001017	Njèh cén, mè lé ménâ bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh. Mè yeé ménâ bɔ́ cú, bí ye, sâ mè mé bí bɔɔ́ né ja wa? Wa bí ye, mè hên bɔɔ́ né seé ŋgàŋ yoòr, mè né mé sòn fà wa?
47001018	Càŋ né sòn mò kɔɔ́, béh mé bí tueé lom né sòn cén; mɔ béh ye: «Nyea”, sâ gi aá. Mɔ béh ye: «Hɔ̂s”, sâ gi aá ndɔ.
47001019	Lòù sam, Ŋunà Càŋ Yeésò Kristò, mé bêh Silâs mé Timotê lé naâ ké lètenè bi`i se doô né lom nùà gècên. À dé seèn nyea bɔ̂ hɔ̂s bècénè gwàn hùàlè bèh; à gi lom né «Nyea”.
47001020	À né dé seèn «nyea” mé bɔ̀ ndéb Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ mboón gi né teèn. Béh «È môn” mé yilí Yeésò Kristò tueé yeé dé cî, te Càŋ ter ŋaá lom kɔɔ́.
47001021	Càŋ béh bí hên kurú kwaá né kɔɔ́, te béh beè Kristò njebá lom tég. À béh balé kwaá né kɔɔ́, ye béh né bɔ̀ nùàr nyî.
47001022	À béh mágá seèn yoòr maga kwaá gi aá, à nyeén kwaá gi béh Cúcuí seèn te temê ndɔ, te béh ŋene kɔ mé njéh, ye nyí nde né béh njèh dɔɔ́ŋ haá gií ma.
47001023	Mè tueé bí, sòn mò né Càŋ. Mɔ né nyeén, mè kú kuù. Mɔ mè sé naâ ké lɔ bi`i waá, mè sé naâ bí seé weh. Mè lé kuún naâ dé cî.
47001024	Béh gwàn ŋgwéh felè bi`i taàb ndɔ. Lòù sam, bí ceér Yeésò Kristò sie lom né tég. Njií mé né lè beèh, béh ye te béh bí seé bɔɔ́ lom felè bi`i, te gam bí, yo sagár bí.
47002001	Mè kuún baá-re gò hèllè ndɔ, te mè bí temé lè bɔ́ yúlá cú;
47002002	wanɔɔ́ŋ sâ ne`i mè temé lè bɔɔ́ samé cu nde né kɔɔ́ wa? Ŋgweéh sé la né bí mà. Hên, mɔ temé bi`i né lè yulá, bí nde né mè temé lè bɔɔ́ samé cuú wa? Dé sâ ndɔ́g.
47002003	Mè lé bí mvù hèllè nyagá naâ dé cî, ye te mè ndeè waà, bí mè temé lè bɔ́ yúlá cú. Lòù sam, bí sé la mè temé lè bɔɔ́ samé seér naâ kɔɔ́. Dé mò, mè lé naá gi`i kɔɔ́ ye, mɔ mè né samésé, bí nde gi né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene dɔɔ́ŋ sagár ndɔ.
47002004	Mè tueé bí, mè lé bí mvù hèllè nyagá njií naâ mé yímé njolò, mé yílí temé mene dɔɔ́ŋ. Mè lé nyàgà ná ŋgwêh ye te temé yili bí mé njéh lè ndɔ, mè ye te bí ŋene kɔ seér lòù, ye mè né lom bí mé gècên mene gwaán ma.
47002005	Mɔ nuaré dé`i lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr temé lè bɔɔ́ yulá, à mé mè bɔ́ njí ŋgwéh, à bɔɔ́ njií né mé bí mene. Mɔ sam, à sâ bɔɔ́ njií né mé bɔ̀ dé`i lètenè bi`i.
47002006	Bí lé naâ bú gèr feh keéh. Kènê wulu baá kèn.
47002007	Bí kúlú sɔ̀m á yúlá-temé sâ lè bi`i, bí bɔŋ seér cu bú lòù, wanɔɔ́ŋ à nde né mé kú vuagá kuú.
47002008	Mɔ né mân, mè né bí bɔŋ, bí fèh kéh bú gwaân bi`i ndɔ.
47002009	Mè lé bí mvù sâ nyagá njií naâ ye te mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ ke ke, bí né sòn mò ŋgweé wa.
47002010	Mɔ bí kulu sɔm gi aá veên nùà hèllè lè bi`i, sâ mè nde né veên seèn lè mò kulú sɔm. Mé njéh mene, mɔ à naâ mè njeré dé`i bɔɔ́, sâ mè veên seèn lè mò kulú sɔm gi aá kèn. Mè ménâ bɔɔ́ né felè bi`i, toò Yeésò Kristò,
47002011	te Sátàn terreb felè beèh kwà cú. Lòù sam, béh né gi seé seèn kɔɔ́.
47002012	Bí né kɔɔ́ ye, mè lé naâ ké Troâs ndeé, te mè se Njàgà Bagaà felè Kristò. Wa ké teèn, mè kwa Fehtoò beèh gulu kwaá baá mè ceér seé seèn lɔŋ.
47002013	Njèh cén, mè lé d`im beèh Tîte ké teèn kwà ná ŋgwêh. Mè yeé bú ké teèn kwà cú, temé mò lè d`iè cú ndɔ. Mè bie weh bɔ̀ nùàr, mè fɔɔ́n gò, mè nde Masedínà.
47002014	S`iè ŋgɔ́b, Càŋ Dueè, béh né wò vra! Béh jomo Kristò né bɔ̀ táŋgɔ́g. Wò béh mân sie kwa naâ kɔɔ́, ye te cu dɔɔ́ŋ béh cɔ beh nyí, béh yoòr den mé múmú nyî, bèh dɔɔ́ŋ béh né nyí mé bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgɔ feh.
47002015	Mé gècên mene, béh né faá kómó múmû mé Kristò né mé Càŋ haá njií nɔ. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né yili yuo dɔɔ́ŋ nde né múmú sâ ŋgweé. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né lòù leér le, ŋgweé gi múmú sâ ndɔ.
47002016	Dé bɔɔ̀n nde né múmú cioò, bɔ́ kuú nde né mé njéh. Dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né yili yuo, múmú yɔ̀ŋ. Sâ nuaré dé`i nde né seé hên bɔɔ́ komo wa?
47002017	Mé njéh mene, béh dé beèh faá bɔ̀ dé`i nɔ sam. Dé bɔɔ̀n, ŋgòr Càŋ beè bɔɔ̀n né seé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ. Sâ béh dé beèh tueé sege lom né ŋgòr Càŋ. Càŋ lé béh temà naâ kɔɔ́, béh tueé den né toò seèn, béh tueé né mé yilí Kristò.
47003001	Sâ ŋgòr hên tueé né ye, béh punó né lòù wa, né naàn? Kɔ bɔ́ nyagá sɔɔ́ cu bí mvù, ye bí a, béh né bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ wa? Wa kɔ bí nyagá haá béh mvù beè, te béh nde ye beré dé`i ndɔ wa? Bɔ̀ dé`i dé sâ bɔɔ́ yeé kɔɔ́, dé beèh môn sam, bɔ̀ nùàr né gi béh kɔɔ́.
47003002	Mvù beèh né bí. Né gi te temé bi`i nyagá den. Bɔ̀ nùàr nde né ŋené kɔɔ́, bɔ́ jaŋé cí.
47003003	Né lom bèsɔ́nè ŋené den ye Kristò lé nyagá naâ mvù sâ kɔɔ́, à beè beèh tema keéh né lòù. À mé nòmò nyàgà ŋgwéh, à nyagá seér né mé Cúcuí Càŋ làŋ. À te taâ nyàgà kwá ŋgwéh, à nyagá kwaá seér né lè nùàr.
47003004	Né lom môn, temé beèh né gi bèh sâ. Baá gi ké toò Càŋ mé njua Kristò.
47003005	Bɔɔ́ mene naàn, gèh seé hên, béh túé ŋgwéh ye béh né bú mé feh beèh bɔɔ́ komo ndɔ. Mɔ béh né njeré dé`i bɔɔ́ komo, sâ Càŋ njií sâ bɔɔ́ né kɔɔ́.
47003006	À bɔɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́ te béh nde ye bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ dé ŋgɔ̀ŋ feê ŋaá. Ŋgɔ̀ŋ feê sâ dé seèn mé sóú táŋ ŋgwéh. Sóú né mene te mvù nyagá den, à cí táŋ ŋgwéh. Né seér Cúcuí Ŋagâ feh né béh ceér kɔɔ́. Sóú mé bɔ́ lɔ naâ nyagá kwaá sâ, nùàr kem yií seér né te cio. Cúcuí Càŋ dé seèn nùàr yili sɔm seér né lòù.
47003007	Bɔ́ lɔ naâ sóú sâ te taâ nyagá kwaá; bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ terreb Càŋ teèn; kuún Mús`i lé naâ mé njéh lòù baá seér. Bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà yeé nde aá njolo teèn ke njií, dé keè sam. Á sâ, ŋagâ hèllè nde cu né mbaá nyimé le ndɔ. Mè tueé bí, mɔ sóú mé bèh cerê seèn né cio, né bɔ̀ nùàr terreb Càŋ mân feh keéh,
47003008	sé tagá seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ nùà njèh wa?
47003009	Mɔ ŋgòr mé nde né bɔ̀ nùàr te ju sie yií, né gi mé terreb Càŋ yoòr, sé tagá ŋgòr mé nde né nùàr toò Càŋ nùà dilî yilá wa?
47003010	Njií ye béh a, júée ye terreb mé lé naâ terreb sâ ŋa baá njèh mbaâ; wanɔɔ́ŋ terreb dé kènê seèn taré kelá né kɔɔ́ nɔ.
47003011	Mɔ dé mé lé cèr màgà ná ŋgwêh doô, lé naâ ménâ lieé huɔɔ́m, sé tagá dé mé cer den nde aá kè`i cén wa?
47003012	Yeé baá mân, ndèm beèh yieé ndɔ.
47003013	Béh dé beèh faá Mús`i sam. Mús`i dé seèn lé naâ njolo vuɔb, ye te ŋagâ mé né toò kuún nyî njolò bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà nyímé dèn cú.
47003014	Bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà lé naâ lòù ndegé seér. Né mene bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù bɔɔ̀n née ŋgwé kòmò ŋgwéeh ye. Bɔ́ né mene mvù ŋgɔ̀ŋ cuûm jaŋé, bɔ́ lom njeré dé`i teèn ŋgwé kòmò ŋgwéh; den cu né ka nág faá bɔ́ née njolo vuɔb den ye nɔ. Lòù sam, kɔ nùàr né jomo Kristò, vùɔ̀b seèn huar yuo ye bú njolò.
47003015	Mé cafanê mene, bɔ́ né mene mvù Mús`i jaŋé, bɔ́ lom ŋgwé kòmò ŋgwéh; den né faá vùɔ̀b cén sâ bɔ́ lalé den né kɔɔ́ nɔ.
47003016	Kɔ nùàr ŋa seér né nùà Fehtoò beèh, vùɔ̀b huar yuo ye bú yoòr.
47003017	Lòù sam, Fehtoò beèh né Cúcuí. Bèh mé Cúcuí Fehtoò beèh né teèn dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ̀ nùàr kwer sóù sam cuú.
47003018	Béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi ka Yeésò dɔɔ́ŋ, vùɔ̀b béh njolò huar yuo aá kèn. Yoòr beèh ŋené seér aá terreb Fehtoò beèh. À né béh kweéh seér, te béh ndeè den faá bú nɔ, te terreb seèn yoòr beèh yam ŋeí cu lòù. Dé sâ Cúcuí Fehtoò beèh bɔɔ́ lom né kɔɔ́.
47004001	Càŋ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn béh seé hên beè haá kwaá né kɔɔ́, temé béh lè kú ŋgwéh dé cî.
47004002	Bɔ̀ njèh fegùl`i mé bɔ̀ nùàr né lòù bɔɔ́ naáb bele dɔɔ́ŋ, be beèh teèn sam. Béh lòù túé nágá ŋgwéh, béh ŋgòr Càŋ lòù túé kwéh sér ŋgwéh ndɔ. Béh tueé seér né ŋgòr gècên, béh né toò Càŋ bèsɔ́nè mbaá, béh ye te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ gècên beèh teèn ndɔ.
47004003	Mè tueé bí, mɔ beè bɔ̀ dé`i Njàgà Bagaà ka ŋágá ŋgwéh, sâ ŋágá ŋgwéh beè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né lòù leér le sâ.
47004004	Bɔ́ temé teèn kwá njí ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, Sátàn né wɔ́ŋ hên tuú, à bɔ́ temé beè vuɔb sie gi aá kèn, ye te bɔ́ ŋagâ Njàgà Bagaà ŋéné kòmò cú, te bɔ́ ŋéné kɔ́ cú ye yoòr Kristò ŋené né gùm Càŋ Dueè nùà njèh.
47004005	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ béh baá ŋgòr Càŋ se, béh felè beèh túé bèh, béh se lom né Yeésò Kristò, ye Fehtoò né lom bú. Béh dé beèh né bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ bi`i, felè Yeésò Kristò ma.
47004006	Càŋ mé lɔ tueé naâ ye ŋagâ a, bá lètenè cibî baà doô, béh ŋagâ seèn lè ba kwaá né kɔɔ́, te feh bɔ̀ nùàr ŋagâ seèn, bɔ́ ŋene kɔ sùsùm seèn mé né toò kuûn Kristò baá den.
47004007	Béh né faá sɔɔ̀ màr nɔ. Mé njéh mene, Càŋ bɔ̀ njèh gècên seèn yií kwaá seér né lè beèh, te feh keéh ye terreb né lom dé Càŋ, dé beèh sam ma.
47004008	Béh né mene te dàm gèr-e huná yilá, mé njéh mene, gèr hèllè béh dɔ́b ŋgwéh. Béh né mene ndio, béh ndèm sɔ̀m bèh.
47004009	Bɔ́ né mene béh bunó, mé njéh mene, Càŋ njolo mé béh c`i ŋgwéh. Bɔ́ né mene béh doó turú, mé njéh mene, béh ŋèrrè ŋgwéh.
47004010	Béh yoòr beèh cu dɔɔ́ŋ kɔ lom né núr cioò Yeésò, te yɔ̀ŋ seèn yoòr beèh ŋené seér kɔɔ́.
47004011	Béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né làŋ hên, béh né lom te cio; né felè Yeésò, te yɔ̀ŋ seèn ŋené yuo kelà yoòr beèh, béh bɔ̀ wàn bɔ̀.
47004012	Mɔ né mân, cio nde né béh seé weh, te yí yoòr bi`i ŋené seér yɔ̀ŋ.
47004013	Né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: «Mè né temé cén mé Càŋ kwaá njií, mè ŋgòr seèn se né dé cî.» Dé beèh ménâ ndɔ, béh né temé cén mé Càŋ kwaá njií, béh bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr seèn se né dé cî ndɔ.
47004014	Béh né kɔɔ́ ye, Càŋ mé lé naâ Yeésò Fehtoò beèh te cio komo sɔm, nde né béh te cio faá bú nɔ komo sɔm ndɔ, te à weh bilí njií gi béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ ké toò seèn.
47004015	Njií mé né kelá dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi né te gam bí, te nùàr ŋgún kuú fùgò beè Càŋ, nùàr ŋgún vra ŋeí bú lòù ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ te be terrèb Càŋ ŋa ter kɔɔ́.
47004016	Temé béh lè kú ŋgwéh dé cî. Yo beèh yua nde den né dé yuaâ kɔɔ́, temé beèh né dé seèn lòù taré ŋaá seér; cieé dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ né bú terreb sagá.
47004017	Gèr né mene béh kema dɔɔ́ŋ, beè beèh né njèh mbaâ, nde né gií. À béh tɔɔ́ kwaá seér né ceér kùrmò. Né me`i bɔ̀ kùrmò; à ter le nde né cu dɔɔ́ŋ.
47004018	Béh dé beèh temé kwaá njií né te njií mé bɔ́ lòù ŋéné bèh. Njií mé bɔ́ né lòù ŋené, béh temé teèn kwá njí ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, njií mé bɔ́ né lòù ŋené doô beéh ŋgágá bèh. Njií mé bɔ́ lòù ŋéné bèh ter dé kè`i cên ŋgaga le né kɔɔ́.
47005001	Béh ká cie cer ŋgɔgɔ́ née lè dûŋ ye. Sâ jue né yo beèh dé ká te wɔ́ŋe. Mɔ ŋerré baá, Càŋ nde né béh gwà nùà njèh ké te vulúu haá. Sâ baá gwà beèh dé kè`i cên, mé nùà kɔɔ́ mé ná ŋgwêh.
47005002	Mɔ béh né mene kènê cuané, béh mé njéh gaán gi né gwà feê ké te vulúu kwaà.
47005003	Béh ndeè ké sâ kwa lom nde aá yo dé tètàgà.
47005004	Dé ká te wɔ́ŋe né môn, béh lè dûŋ hèllè cuané nde né fî. Sâ túé ŋgwéh ye, béh gwaán lom aá te yo húɔ́me huaré yuoò. Béh gaán né yo dé ké te vulúu, te yo dé húɔ̂m hên ŋa seér dé Cúcuî mé dé seèn kú ndé cú.
47005005	Càŋ mé feh seèn lé ye nyí nde né béh ménâ kweéh seér. À béh Cúcuí seèn haá gi aá kèn, te béh ŋene kɔ mé njéh ye, nyí nde né béh njèh dɔɔ́ŋ haá gií ma.
47005006	Yeé baá môn, temé beèh lè kú cú ndɔ. Béh kɔ lom aá njèh cén, ye mɔ yo hên née béh yoòr ye, sâ lɔɔ́ Fehtoò beèh née dàb mé béh ye ndɔ.
47005007	Né môn, béh temé kwaá njií né te njií mé béh lòù ŋéné bèh. Béh táŋ sɔ́ ŋgwéh ye, kɔ béh ŋene baá.
47005008	Béh yeé môn táŋ cú, temé beèh lè kú cú ndɔ. Béh gwaán lom né yo dé hên kwaá lɔɔ̂, te béh nde ké kwarè Fehtoò beèh.
47005009	Sâ béh né mene mé njolo, béh kuú mene, béh gwaán lom né seé mé à gwaán nê.
47005010	Lòù sam, béh nde gi né toò Kristò njebá, te à tena ju nùà kàn. À tena nde né mé seé seèn; né mene seé bagaà, né mene dé veên, baá sàgà seèn.
47005011	Béh né gi Fehtoò beèh veéh kɔɔ́. Yeé baá mân, béh né lom tég lege, ye te bɔ̀ nùàr cer gi ménâ ndɔ. Càŋ né gi béh kɔɔ́ nyegé. Mè né munó ye, bí né gi mè kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
47005012	Béh toò bi`i lòù púnó ŋgwéh, béh ye te béh se nyegé bí dé seè, te bí sagár mé béh. Mɔ sam, bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i né lètenè bi`i punó gɔ, bɔ́ mé yɔ̀ŋ nùàr táŋ ŋgwéh, bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n punó seér mé dé ŋgàŋ yoòr. Mɔ né ménâ, te bí ke weh yoòr beèh, bí maáb tena lɔ bɔ́ toò.
47005013	Bɔ́ ye béh né kùlù sé wa? Mɔ béh né mene kùlù, sâ né felè Càŋ. Á, mɔ béh né te ceér-e, sâ né te gam bí ndɔ.
47005014	Béh dé beèh kɔ lom né ye, gwaân Kristò béh mân lu né kɔɔ́. Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, nùà cén naâ felè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ kuú. Sâ tueé né ye, nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé gà te cio sâ teèn.
47005015	À cio kuú né dé nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ, te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né mene yɔŋ, dé bɔɔ̀n yɔ̀ŋ dèn cú, bɔ́ yɔŋ seér aá dé nuaá mé lé naâ felè bɔɔ̀n kuú, mé lé naâ felè bɔɔ̀n te cio komo yuo cuú ndɔ.
47005016	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh nuaré dé`i mé njolo nùàr kè ndé cú. Béh lɔ naâ mene Kristò mé njolo nùàr ke njií, béh bú kènê ménâ wèh ndé cú.
47005017	Nuaá mé nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr Kristò baá dé seèn nùà feê. Bɔ̀ njèh dé cucuûm bú yoòr huar yuo aá kèn; yoòr seèn ŋené lom nde aá dé feê.
47005018	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ ye te mé Kristò béh bɔ́ nyɔgɔ́ bilí. Kènê, à seé sâ haá keéh né beè beèh, ye béh bílí njî bɔ̀ nùàr ká yoòr nyî te bɔ́ bɔ́ nyɔgɔ́ bilí ndɔ ma.
47005019	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ lé bɔ̀ nùàr ká yoòr seèn nyɔgɔ́ njií naâ mé Kristò, à lé mé veên bɔɔ̀n lè s`iè dèn ná ŋgwêh. À lé béh yoòr bɔɔ̀n tema njií seér naâ lòù, ye béh ndé júée bɔ́ a, bɔ́ ndê nyɔ̀gɔ̀ ndé gî ká yoòr nyî ma.
47005020	Béh kela baá-re bɔ̀ sòn Kristò, béh ŋa ndɔ. Càŋ mé feh seèn sònò beèh tueé keéh né kɔɔ́. Béh né bí mé yilí Kristò bɔŋ, kúkùr bi`i, bí dèn nyɔ̀gɔ̀ ndé gî ká yoòr Càŋ.
47005021	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Kristò lé mé ndɔ̀gɔ̀ veên dé`i yoòr ná ŋgwêh. Mé njéh mene, Càŋ lé naâ bú te núlu felè beèh loró yií. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ ye te béh mé bú toò nyî ŋa seér bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀.
47006001	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, béh bɔ̀ Càŋ seé hên bɔɔ́ yeé kɔɔ́. Bí né gi fùgò beè Càŋ kuú. Mɔ né mân, kúkùr bi`i, bí té gwàn mé fùgò sâ ŋa njèh mbaâ beè bi`i.
47006002	Né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, Càŋ ye: «Cu mé húɔ́m-temé nyî né bí beè yaám sie hên, nyí né hueh bi`i ŋgweé. Loù mé bí nde né teèn yili yuo, nyí nde né bí gam.» Mè tueé bí, hên baá cu mé nùàr gwaán nde né húɔ́m-temé Càŋ teèn sâ, à nùàr yili sɔm nde né lan lan.
47006003	Béh gwàn ŋgwéh mé nuaré dé`i ndugó seé beèh; béh né ceér fɔɔ́n, ye te nuaré dé`i béh gule beè bè lɔ́ cú.
47006004	Te ŋené den yoòr beèh cu dɔɔ́ŋ, ye béh né bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ: béh né mene dàm gèr ŋené laré, béh né yeé bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ yoló gií.
47006005	Bɔ́ lé naâ béh núr duún, bɔ́ yií béh gwà cib`i, bɔ́ né béh gèr yoòr soób su. Béh né gèr mé seé temâ ŋené, cu dé`i yɔgɔ́ bilí béh mé yáb yieê mene, béh lɔ́m cèr kwà ŋgwéh.
47006006	Mé njéh mene, béh né lom feh keéh ye béh né bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ ma: veên dé`i yoòr beèh ŋéné ny`i ŋgwéh, béh né lom ceér gècên kɔɔ́, béh né gèr yoló, béh né bɔ̀ nùàr húɔ́m-temé feh keéh, Cúcuí Ŋagâ né béh yoòr ŋené, béh né bɔ̀ mbeí beèh mé temé cén gwaán,
47006007	béh né bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr gècên tueé, yoòr beèh ŋené lom né terreb Càŋ. À béh yilá né bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀. Sâ né bɔ̀ njèh taâb beèh, béh be fà dɔɔ́ŋ weh sie né cí.
47006008	Bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i né béh seén, bɔ̀ dé`i né béh lòù bɔɔ́ gulí. Bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i né dé veên felè beèh tueé, bɔ̀ dé`i tueé dé bagaà. Béh né bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀; mé njéh mene, bɔ́ né béh bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ yilá.
47006009	Den né faá bɔ́ béh kɔ́ ŋgwéh nɔ, sâ bɔ́ né gi béh kɔɔ́. Den né faá béh né bɔ̀ komó, sâ béh né gi bɔ̀ làŋ bɔ̀. Bɔ́ né béh te gèr-e fagá yií; mé njéh mene, béh kú ŋgwéh.
47006010	Bɔ́ né mene béh temé lè bɔɔ́ yilí, béh né lòù samé seér. Béh né bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ njolò bɔ̀ nùàr, sâ bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún lie gi né mé béh ndɔ. Den né faá béh mé njeré dé`i sam, sâ dàm njèh ceré né beè beèh.
47006011	Belà, Kɔrênt bɔ̀, béh bí dàb dɔɔ́ŋ hên tueé ŋagá né njií mé né ká lè beèh.
47006012	Dé beèh, béh né bí gwaán, bí seér béh gwàn ŋgwéh kɔɔ́.
47006013	Kènê, mè nde aá mé bí faá bɔ̀ huaán mò nɔ, tueé njií: bí ŋgwé kɔ́ béh yoòr bi`i ŋgweè, te den faá béh né bí ká yoòr beèh ŋgweé njií nɔ. Bí kwá lɔ́ béh temé bi`i lɔŋ.
47006014	Bî nuaá mé Yeésò kɔ́ ŋgwéh té njèh kè`i cén mùnò, faá bɔ́ nàgà mé terreb hihiné te vún cén-e kwá bílí bèh nɔ. Naàn naàn mé njèh dilî bɔ̂ njèh gobô nde né mé sòn cên den wa? Ŋagâ bɔ̂ cibí hùàlè bèh ndɔ.
47006015	Bɔɔ́ mene naàn, Kristò bɔ̂ Sátàn bècénè té bílí ndé ŋgwéh. Nuaá mé né temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií, bɔ̂ nuaá mé temé yoòr Yeésò kwá njí ŋgwéh né yeé kè`i cén munó gií wa?
47006016	Naàn naàn mé gwà Càŋ bɔ̂ sùàgà nde né felá nyi wa? Bí kékɔɔ̀ ye, béh dé beèh né gwà Càŋ dé Càŋ làŋ. Càŋ mé sòn seèn tueé né ménâ ndɔ, ye: «Jue nyí Càŋ Dueè, nyí cer nde né ké lètenè bi`i, nyí né teèn yɔŋ den. Càŋ bi`i nde né nyí, bí nde né bɔ̀ nùàr nyî ndɔ.
47006017	Mɔ né mân, nyí tueé bí, bí gè mé wɔ́ŋ geè, bí té njií mé né dulí cór, te nyí weh kwaá ye bí kèbè nyî.
47006018	Tele bi`i nde né nyí; bɔ̀ huaán nyî dé sisiîb mé dé vévêh nde né bí ndɔ, jue nyí Càŋ terrèb.»
47007001	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, ndéb mé Càŋ kwa kwaá né béh tieè né cí. Mɔ né mân, béh yàgà sɔ̀m gí veên yoòr beèh, béh den lom njolò Càŋ ŋagásé, béh veéh lom bú mé temé beèh mene.
47007002	Bí temé bi`i kwá lɔ́ mé béh, bɔ̀ nùàr mò! Béh lé nuaré dé`i veên bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, nuaré dé`i gule beè beèh bè lɔ́ ŋgwéh, béh nuaré dé`i lòù bèlè ŋgwéh ndɔ.
47007003	Mɔ béh né mân nyagá, béh nyàgà ŋgwéh ye ju a, s`iè bí. Dé sâ ndɔ́g! Lòù sam, temé beèh né bí. Né ka faá mè lé naá gi`i bí tueé nɔ, né mene dé yili`i mé dé kuû dɔɔ́ŋ, béh bí né kɔɔ́.
47007004	Temé mò né lom ké yoòr bi`i, mè sagár né mé bí. Te dàm gèr mé né béh kwa laré dɔɔ́ŋ, temé mò lè kú ŋgwéh, mè kuú seér cu né mé vràb dé kuû.
47007005	Mè tueé bí, béh wa mene ké Masedínà, bèh dù lé teèn ná ŋgwêh. Béh lé naâ mé lègè kwaré; kèb cieè lègè o, kèb lè veéh o, lé naâ béh seé weh.
47007006	Mé njéh mene, Tîte yeé waà baá, yo taré cu béh. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ Y`il`i nùàr lé béh ter sɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́.
47007007	Gí cégé ŋgwéh dé waâ Tîte ndɔ. À lé naá cuù béh tueé ye béh a, temé nyî né lè mé bí nɔré dé gècên. Lòù sam, bí ye bí gwaán lom né mè ŋenê, wa bí né mé yímé njolò, bí né jomo mò ma. Môn, bɔ̀ nùàr mò, temé mè ká lè sagár seér aá lòù.
47007008	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, mvù mò lé naâ bí temé lè bɔɔ́ yulá. Mè lé naâ cí nyamé ndɔ, ye temé nde né bí lè mé njéh yilí weh. Mé njéh mene, mè nyàmè cú, mè né seér lòù samé.
47007009	Mè dé yúlá-temé bi`i sàmè ŋgwéh, mè samé seér aá, ye bí mé njéh kweéh seér aá temé ma. Lòù sam, mvù mò hèllè lé bí veên bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh; Càŋ mé yúlá-temé bi`i hèllè bɔɔ́ seér né seé.
47007010	Yúlá-temé dé Càŋ né yeé môn. À temé nùàr kweéh seér yeé mé njéh, te nùàr nde ye yili yuo. Sâ nùàr a, té mbaá nyàmè kú. Yúlá-temé de wɔ̂ŋ, nùàr mé njéh ku seér né cio.
47007011	Bí ŋéné ŋgwéh ye, yúlá-temé bi`i hèllè baá seér kènê njèh seê beè Càŋ wa? Yúlá-temé sâ lé naá seêr bí temé ter jɔgɔ́ kwaá, nùà kàn baá sòn seèn mé be seèn se. Veéh lé naâ bí sie, bí sɔm kwaá njií nùà veên hiín, bí gwaán seér cu ŋgòr mò, bí né teèn bɔgɔ́, ye te nùà hèllè ŋene gèr mé njéh. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí tueé ŋagá né sòn bi`i, ye be bi`i teèn sam ma.
47007012	Mè tueé bí, mè lé naá menè bí mvù dé jomò nyagá njií, lé felè nùà veên doô ná ŋgwêh; lé felè nuaá mé à naâ bú veên bɔɔ́, ná ŋgwêh ndɔ. Lé naá seêr ye te bí ŋene kɔ mé yilí Càŋ, ye bí né béh gwaán.
47007013	Bí yeé baá ŋené kɔɔ́, yo béh hên taré cu né mé njéh ndɔ. Mé dé sâ gí lòm ŋgwéh, béh tétég samé cu né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé Tîte. Lòù sam, ye bí né lom nyí yo mé gècên mene bɔɔ́ taré.
47007014	Sâ tueé né ye, púnò mé mè lé naâ toò seèn mé yilí bi`i punó doô, lé naâ teèn yilá, ye né ŋgòr gècên, wa né faá ŋgòr gècên mé béh lé tueé naâ bí ma.
47007015	Lòù sam, à lé naâ ké yoòr bi`i waá, bí bene nde bú faá nùàr nɔ kwa weh, bí né tie faá cí nɔ ŋgweé. À né cí munó njií, vɔ́gɔ́-temé bɔɔ́ bú njèh.
47007016	Mè né lom mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé dé gècên ndɔ, ye mè né kwàgà bi`i yieé.
47008001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh ye te bí ŋene kɔ húɔ́m-temé Càŋ mé né ké Masedínà lètenè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ndɔ.
47008002	Bɔ́ lé naâ gèr faá gèr nɔ ŋené; mé njéh mene, bɔ́ lé naâ yoòr yoló kwaá njií, bɔ́ mé njéh samé seér cu lòù. Bɔ́ né mene bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀, bɔ́ kàgàlɔ̀ŋ seé Càŋ haá lom mé be fà.
47008003	Mè tueé bí, njèh faá há-be nɔ, bɔ́ lé naâ mé terreb bɔɔ̀n mene haá, bɔ́ né ménâ mé kàgà-ndòn bɔɔ̀n haá yɔgɔ́ keéh.
47008004	Bɔ́ né cu béh teèn lòù bɔŋ yií, ye béh há bɔ́ ceér, te bɔ́ yií be te seé sâ ndɔ, te gam bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ ké Judê ma.
47008005	Dé sâ yɔgɔ́ keéh cu baá-re faá béh lé naâ munó nɔ: bɔ́ lé jɔ̀gɔ̀ temé kwaá njií naâ mé Fehtoò beèh, bɔ́ kwaá njií mé béh ndɔ, bɔ́ kwaá njií lom faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ.
47008006	Béh Tîte hên bɔŋ kuú né dé cî, ye bú a, kúkùr seèn, à ndé cú ké lètenè bi`i, te seé mé à lé baŋ lɔɔ̀ naâ doô, nde den méménâ; bú a, ndé bílí wèh kàgàlɔ̀ŋ dé bi`i ndɔ ma.
47008007	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, bí né gi te seé Càŋe ŋgulí, bí mé Yeésò kwaá njií né temé cén, bí né njèh kɔɔ́, bí né tueé kɔɔ́ ndɔ, bí te seé Càŋe tegé né lòù, bí né mé temé beèh lè. Sâ mɔ né mân, bí ŋgúlí yùò kélâ mé te seé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mene, bí haá lom be fà dɔɔ́ŋ.
47008008	Mè bí lòù tágá ŋgwéh ndɔ; sâ mè ye te bí ke weh yoòr bɔ̀ dé`i, bí feh keéh gèh dé mé gwaân bi`i né yieé.
