47008009	Lòù sam, bí né gi húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò kɔɔ́. Nùà sèsàm né bú. Mé njéh mene, à lé nùà saâm ŋa seér naâ felè bi`i. Njua mé à lé naâ ménâ bɔɔ́, te bí nde ye bɔ̀ sèsàm bɔ̀ mé saám seèn hèllè ŋaá.
47008010	Mɔ né mân, mè dé mò ye: seé mé bí lé baŋ lɔɔ̀ naâ nyèmà léílê hên, bí bɔ́ ndé dèn mé njéh toò. Bɔ̀ toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ te seé hên lé naâ bí; bí lé seé hên gwaán lɔgɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́.
47008011	Bí tégé cú teèn mé terreb te seé sâ mboón, faá bí lé ye bí nde né bɔɔ́ nɔ. Bí kwa mene kei, bí há cí.
47008012	Lòù sam, njií mé bí kwa keéh né beè, mɔ bí né Càŋ mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene haá, à nde né weh. Mɔ bí mé njéh beè sam, Càŋ túé ŋgwéh ye bí há nyí ndɔ.
47008013	Bí té mùnò, ye béh ba né bí lòù, te bí die saám felè bɔ̀ dé`i. Sam, mè ye te bí bɔ́ den seér kè`i cén.
47008014	Kènê bí né mé njéh beè, bí há bɔ̀ɔ́ mé njéh sam teèn. Loù mé bí mé njéh sam cuú, te bɔ́ ndeè gam bí teèn te den gi kè`i cén.
47008015	Te mvù Càŋe né ménâ nyagá den ndɔ, ye: «Nuaá mé lé naâ yáb kókoó kwa lé túnú ná ŋgwêh. Nuaá mé lé kwaá naâ ŋgɔ́b lé cùè ŋgwé ná ŋgwêh ndɔ.»
47008016	Kùsèm Càŋ Dueè. À lé bɔɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́ te Tîte nde ye bí mé temé seèn mene gam, à teèn bɔgɔ́ lom dé bɔgɔ̂ faá béh nɔ!
47008017	Béh yeé baá bú dua ye bú a, ndé ké yoòr bi`i, à gwaán ndɔ. Sâ à lé toò baá gi`i mé kàgà-ndòn sâ lè.
47008018	Béh ye te bɔ̂ nuaré dé`i nde kɔɔ́. Nùà sâ, bɔ̀ gwà Càŋ bɔ̀ né yeé bú keí, ye à né seé Njàgà Bagaà bɔɔ́ huɔɔ́m.
47008019	Béh bú mé dé cén sâ témá cégé ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ gwà Càŋ bɔ̀ lé balé sɔm cuù naâ bú kɔɔ́, ye te béh bɔ́ gɔ, à bilí gam béh kàgàlɔ̀ŋ teèn, te húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh ŋené ŋagá mé njéh, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ teèn, ye temé beèh né yoòr bɔɔ̀n ndɔ.
47008020	Kàgàlɔ̀ŋ sâ né kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé yilî, béh né lom bú ke nyegé, te nuaré dé`i béh teèn nàm cú;
47008021	te béh yuo bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ beè bɔ̀ nùàr, dèn lòm ŋgwéh beè Fehtoò beèh.
47008022	Béh né cu bɔ́ d`im beèh dé`i jomo sɔm kwaá, te bɔ́ bɔ́ nde. Béh lé naá gi`i nùà bú sâ kweé nyegé, temé seèn cu dɔɔ́ŋ né te seé Càŋe. Temé seèn kènê né cu yoòr bi`i ndɔ, à teèn tegé ŋeí seér né dé tegê.
47008023	Dé Tîte, à né mbeí seê mò, béh bú seé bɔɔ́ yeé kɔɔ́, te gam bí. Dé bɔ̀ fà bɔ̀ jomo seèn doô, bɔ̀ gwà Càŋ bɔ̀ tema né bɔ́ kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ nùàr nde né bɔ́ ŋené, bɔ́ seén Kristò.
47008024	Bí fèh kéh be gwaân felè bɔ̀ nùà hên, te bɔ̀ gwà Càŋ bɔ̀ mé lé temà naâ bɔ́ doô ŋene kɔ teèn, ye né gècên, béh felè bi`i mbaá sàgàr kú ŋgwéh.
47009001	Gàm mé béh nde né mé bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ ké Judê temá njií doô, né gi tieè bi`i, kɔ mè nyagá sɔɔ́ cu bí lòù wa?
47009002	Mè né gi kɔɔ́ ye bí lé gwaán naâ kɔɔ́, ye bí nde né bɔ́ gam. Mè mé njéh ké toò bɔ̀ Masedínà bɔ̀ punó gi aá kèn ndɔ, ye bɔ́ a, bɔ̀ mbeí beèh ké Akayî né lom te gule, wa bɔ́ lé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ sâ bilí duɔɔ́m naâ nyèmà léílê ma. Bɔ̀ Masedínà bɔ̀ yeé nde ŋgweé njií mân, bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún sagár gi ye bɔ́ nde né be teèn yií ndɔ.
47009003	Mè bí Tîte bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí hên tema njií kuú né dé cî, ye te bí nyegé kwaá gi bɔ̀ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ doó. Mɔ béh ndeè waà baá, te bɔ́ mè nyeén mé púnò mò hèllè s`iè cú. Ŋgweéh mè lé naâ tueé ye bí baá gi te gule mà.
47009004	Mɔ sam, béh bɔ̀ Masedínà bɔ̀ ndeè né waâ, kàgàlɔ̀ŋ hèllè née bílí ŋgwéeh ye, sâ mè nde né njolò bɔɔ̀n gulí. Mɔ né môn, sé tagá bí wa?
47009005	Mè yeé ŋene aá ménâ, mè ye, kɔ mè bɔŋ bɔ̀ tagár bɔ̀ hên, ye bɔ́ a, kélá toò, bɔ́ ndé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé bí lé naâ tueé sâ bilí kwaá ma. Mɔ né mân, sâ mè ndeè né waâ, mè kwa ye, bí lé naâ mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene haá, bɔ́ lé bí lòù bá ná ŋgwêh.
47009006	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye: nuaá mé dobo né ŋgɔ́b dɔɔ́ŋ kwa cu nde né ŋgɔ́b; nuaá mé dobo né ŋgún, nde né ŋgún kwaá ndɔ.
47009007	Sâ nùà kàn a, há ká mé kàgà-ndòn seèn, bɔ́ té bú lòù bá. Bú a, té lòù há nyàmè ndɔ. Lòù sam, Càŋ gwaán kela né dé nuaá mé haá ŋgulí né lòù.
47009008	Mè tueé bí, Càŋ né Càŋ ŋgùlù, à né mé terreb dé bí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ haá larê, te njeré dé`i bí sám cú, te bɔ̀ njèh fu bí beè, bí bɔɔ́ laré seé bebagaà mé njéh cu dɔɔ́ŋ.
47009009	Né te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den ye: «Nùà bagaà né yeé bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ be haá. Húɔ́m-temé seèn né dé cu dɔɔ̂ŋ.»
47009010	Càŋ nuaá mé né yeé nùà kíé-boór gèh njèh haá, né bú yáb haá, nde né bí ménâ haá ndɔ, te beè bi`i merré den lòù, né mé tàb be fà waá ndeé,
47009011	né bí wulú, bí né bɔ̀ dé`i teèn haá. Kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé bí nde né bɔ̀ nùàr beè haá keéh sâ nde né bɔ́ yoòr huɔɔ́m, te bɔ́ seén Càŋ mé njéh.
47009012	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé bí nde né haá sâ nde né bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ gam. Dèn lòm ŋgwéh bú sâ; bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún nde cu né Càŋ mé njéh seén ndɔ.
47009013	Há-beè bí sâ nde né feh keéh ye bí né bɔ̀ ŋgwé-tie bɔ̀, bí né Njàgà Bagaà Kristò mé temé cén sie ma. Mɔ baá ménâ, te bɔ̀ nùàr seén laré Càŋ, bɔ́ ye bú a, bí bɔ́ njèh haá naâ be fà, bí né bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i ménâ haá ndɔ ma. Bɔ́ nde né bú ménâ vra.
47009014	Bɔ́ nde né bú felè bi`i dua, temé bɔɔ̀n jɔgɔ le yoòr bi`i, ye lòù sam, bí lé naâ mé fùgò beè Càŋ kuú, dé tueê sam, wa bí lé naâ bɔ́ mé njéh gam ma.
47009015	Kùsèm, béh sén bílí Càŋ Dueè; be mé à lé naâ béh haá doô dé meè sam.
47010001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mè né mé bí tueé njií. Bí ye, mɔ mè né ká kwarè bi`i, mè né nùà dɔlê; mɔ mè kwarè bi`i sam cuú, mè ŋa nùà salê sé wa? Sâ kúkùr, mè bí bɔŋ né mé húɔ́m-temé Kristò nùà dɔlê.
47010002	Bí kwéh sér dene bi`i, te mè ndeè waà ké yoòr bi`i, mè ŋáŋ cú. Bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ dé`i né ké lètenè bi`i tueé gɔ, ye mè bɔɔ́ yeé seé wɔ̂ŋ sé wa! Mè tueé bí, mè nde né bɔ́ seé weh, mè né gi mé terreb ménâ bɔɔ̂ teèn.
47010003	Dé môn, né môn, béh né gi mé yo bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ yoòr dág; njèh cén, béh gèh seé dé nùà wɔ̂ŋ mé njéh bɔ́ ŋgwéh.
47010004	Bɔ̀ njèh taâb dé beèh mé béh né taáb mé njéh lieé, faá dé wɔ̂ŋ nɔ sam. Bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n né mé terreb Càŋ teèn. Né mene gbàŋ, béh nde né mé njéh ŋaré sɔm. Béh mé njéh ŋaré yeé bɔ̀ mùnò nyenyenê ndɔ.
47010005	Bɔ̀ njèh púnò mé né ceér Càŋ soló tená dɔɔ́ŋ, béh nyoló sɔm yeé mé njéh, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene keéh gècên Càŋ. Né mene mùnò bɔ̀ nùàr, béh né gi ka Kristò sie kwaá njií.
47010006	Béh baá lom kènê te gule. Mɔ bí né sòn beèh ŋgweé, béh nde né bɔ̀ dúágá-tie bɔ̀ seé weh.
47010007	Ŋgweéh bí njèh ŋene lom né kèb cieè mà. Mè tueé bí ndɔ, mɔ nuaré dé`i ye nyí né nùàr Kristò, sâ bú a, kɔ́ nyégé bagasé ye mè Pɔ̂l, mè né nùàr Kristò ndɔ.
47010008	Mɔ mè né mene bí terreb mé Fehtoò beèh haá naâ mè saán keéh, mè fegùl`i kwá ndé ŋgwéh. À lé mè haá naâ ye te gam bí; à túé ŋgwéh ye mè a, ndé bí mé njéh sie ŋaré.
47010009	Mè gwàn ŋgwéh mé veéh sie bí mé bɔ̀ mvù mò.
47010010	Wanɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né felè mò tueé ye: mɔ Pɔ̂l nyagá njiî né béh njèh lòù, à né lom njèh tueé jelá dé gècên. Á sâ, mɔ à baá ká lètenè beèh mé feh seèn, à né lom yuaásé, ŋgòr sònò seèn táré bèh ndɔ.
47010011	Mè tueé bí, nuaá mé né ménâ tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, kɔ́ nyégé bagasé ye: béh né mene ká dàb, njií mé béh né lòù nyagá dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ béh baá ké kwarè bi`i, béh bɔɔ́ nde né cí.
47010012	Lètenè bɔɔ̀n sâ, bɔ̀ dé`i né tueé gɔ ye bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀, bɔ́ né keên ŋgeré. Béh mé bɔ́ ŋgéré njí ndé ŋgwéh. Bɔ́ mòù cɔré né mé be bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ né feh bɔɔ̀n mé njéh me. Né bɔ̀ tándugó.
47010013	Dé beèh, mòù mé Càŋ ye béh wá teèn, béh kélá kéh ndé ŋgwéh, béh bɔ̀ nùàr saán keéh lom né seé mé né beè beèh. Càŋ lé béh mé njéh tema njií naâ mé ké lɔ bi`i mene.
47010014	Cu mé béh lé naâ ké lɔ bi`i mé Njàgà Bagaà felè Kristò waá, béh lé mòù Càŋ sèlà kéh ná ŋgwêh.
47010015	Béh mé seé nuaré dé`i mbaá púnó wèh ndé ŋgwéh. Béh ndèm kwaá seér né yoòr bi`i, ye bí nde né temé yoòr Kristò mé gècên mene kwaá yaám njií, te seé beèh yam ké lètenè bi`i faá Càŋ tɔr kwaá né béh nɔ.
47010016	Te jomo sâ, béh kwa ye ceér, béh se nde mé Njàgà Bagaà te bɔ̀ lò dé ké toò ndɔ. Dé beèh, te seé mé bɔ̀ dé`i bɔɔ́ kwaá né kɔɔ́, béh teèn púnó yílá ndé ŋgwéh.
47010017	Né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: «Nuaá mé gwaán né punô dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, púnó mé yilí Fehtoò beèh.»
47010018	Mɔ sam, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né seé bɔɔ̀n mé be bɔɔ̀n seén, Fehtoò beèh njolo teèn kè njí ndé ŋgwéh. À njolo ke njií seér nde né yoòr nuaá mé né bú yoòr yilá.
47011001	Bí ŋgwé-re, kènê mè nde aá ŋgòr kùlù tueé, bí yóló ká bi`i môn.
47011002	Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bele yeé bí doô, mè né huer mé bɔ́ ŋgwa, mè huer kuú né mé temé Càŋ. Mè kulu kwaá gi aá bí dé Kristò kèn, mè ye te bí den lom ŋagásé faá mbò yàgà mé né yo seèn jolo nɔ, te mè coló njií bí gwà siîb, sâ bí née ŋagásé ye.
47011003	Veéh né mè sie, ye nuaré dé`i sé waà né, bele se sɔm bí temé yoòr Kristò, faá sàb tánágà lé naâ Evà bele leér sɔm nɔ.
47011004	Mè lòù túé ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i né yeé ké lètenè bi`i waá, bɔ́ né bí Yeésò dé hiîn feh mé Yeésò dé beèh sam; bɔ́ né bí cúcuí dé hiîn feh mé bí cúcuí hèllè kɔ́ ŋgwéh; bɔ́ feh bí Njàgà Bagaà dé hiîn mé dé beèh sam; bí né tie teèn felá njií. Ŋgweéh sâ bí félá nyégé ká bagasé mà.
47011005	Bí munó né kɔɔ́, ye bɔ̀ nùà hèllè né bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dé kokoô; mè né dé mò kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ́ mè yɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéh.
47011006	Mè la mene túé nágá kɔ́ ŋgwéh, dé njèh kɔɔ̂, mè né kɔɔ́ ye mè né ŋgàŋ teèn. Ŋgweéh béh lé naá gi`i bí dé sâ feh nyegé mà.
47011007	Cu mé mè lé naâ ké lètenè bi`i Njàgà Bagaà Càŋ se, mè lé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ beè bi`i wèh bèh, mè lé leéb suagà naâ doó, ye te bí ter yuo seér kɔɔ́. Sâ mè lé bɔɔ́ saàb naâ lòù wa?
47011008	Ŋgweéh mè lé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ sieé weh seér naâ beè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ te lɔɔ́ dé hiîn, te mè nde ye bí gam mà.
47011009	Ké lètenè bi`i sâ, mè lé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ beè bi`i dùà ná ŋgwêh. Bɔ̀ njií mé lé naá gi`i mè saám, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Masedínà lé waà naâ kɔɔ́, bɔ́ haá mè. Mè lé nuaré dé`i seé beè há ná ŋgwêh, mè nuaré dé`i seé beè há ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
47011010	Felè ŋgòr hên mè né lom sagár dé gècên, ye te tàbè Akayî hên dɔɔ̂ŋ nuaré dé`i mè gèh vɔ́gɔ́-temé hên lè lùàgà sɔ̀m ndé cú, mè bí mé gècên Kristò lè tueé gi aá.
47011011	Sâ mè mân tueé né dé ke`i wa? Mè bí gwàn cú wa? Heè ceè, Càŋ né kɔɔ́ ye mè né bí gwaán!
47011012	Faá mè né mé bí bɔɔ́ hên, mè bɔɔ́ den nde né ménâ, te bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dé nyenyeên hèllè ceér punô kwà cú, te bɔ́ túé cú ye béh bɔ́ né mé seé kè`i cén ndɔ.
47011013	Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dé nyeên ceré né bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀! Bɔ́ den né mbaá, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Kristò ŋaá seér, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr mé njéh bele gɔ.
47011014	Mɔ bɔ́ né mene mân bɔɔ́ gɔ, bú a, té bí ndègè, cu dé`i Sátàn mé feh seèn né yeé faá c`il`i Càŋ dé ŋagâ nɔ ŋaá seér.
47011015	Sâ mɔ Sátàn né yeé mân bɔɔ́, sé tagá bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ seèn wa? Bɔ́ nde né faá bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ dé gècên ŋaá seér ndɔ. Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, loù ju tenâ, Càŋ bɔ́ seé weh nde né mé seé bɔɔ̀n hèllè.
47011016	Mè né cu tueé: nuaré dé`i a, té mè nùà kùlù yílá. Á, mɔ bí ye mè né nùà kùlù, sâ bí wèh mè faá nùà kùlù sâ nɔ, te mè punó weh teèn.
47011017	Fehtoò beèh mè dé hên kɔɔ́ túé ŋgwéh, seé kùlù mò sâ ye mè a, púnó ménâ punò.
47011018	Mè punó né mé njéh faá bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i punó né mé wɔ́ŋ nɔ.
47011019	Ŋgweéh bí né gi bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ mà. Bí bɔ̀ kùlù bɔ̀ yolo kɔɔ̀ naâ he?
47011020	Bɔ́ doóm seér mene bí lòù, bí ŋa mene kwer, bɔ́ né mene bí bɔ̀ njèh beè bele yieé, bí né gi yoló kɔɔ́; bɔ́ seb mene bí lòù, bɔ́ né mene bí be njolò yií, beè bi`i huɔm kela seér yeé cí.
47011021	Fegùl`i wula mè! Béh yua sela baá-re ndɔ, wanɔɔ́ŋ béh sé lé naâ mân bɔɔ́ mà! Bí kwá mè tueé bí ŋgòr kùlù: Kènê mè punó nde aá faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né punó sâ. Mɔ nuaré dé`i baá mé njeré dé`i punó, mè nde né ménâ punó taré ndɔ.
47011022	Bɔ́ ye, bɔ́ né Hebreêh. Mè tueé bí, mè né Hebreêh ndɔ. Bɔ́ né Iserálà, mè né taré Iserálà. Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm, mè né ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm ndɔ.
47011023	Bɔ́ ye, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Kristò, mè né taré nùà seê Kristò. Mɔ bɔ́ ye tútueè, mè né bɔ́ mé seé sâ bɔɔ́ yɔgɔ́. Mè tueé aá kèn, mè tueé né faá nùà kùlù sâ. Ŋgweéh seé lé tema kelà naâ mè mé bɔ́ wa? Ké gwà cib`i lé den kelà naâ mè mé bɔ́. Bɔ́ lé mé toú mbalé kelà naâ mè mé bɔ́; te cio cící lé naâ mè.
47011024	Ŋgágá yulà tagár cùɔ̀b tárènèà, beè bɔ̀ Jûf kàn mé kán, lé naâ mè kwaá. Lé kwaá naâ mè mbei tîn.
47011025	Bɔ̀ Rɔ̂m bɔ̀ lé naâ mè lobo. Bɔ́ mè lobó naâ mbei tagár. Bɔ́ lé naâ mè mbei cén tɔbé. Bàtô mè te ndèndèŋ nòmò su yií mbei tagár. Mè nde cén dé`i cer bilí mé dùà mene gùm cieê.
47011026	Mé gò dé gulè cu dɔɔ́ŋ, gèr mè lɔ́ ŋgwéh. Né mene dùdùà, gèr. Né mene ceér dueè, bɔ̀ yíb wúlá-feèh bɔ̀. Né mene beè bɔ̀ Jûf, gèr. Né mene beè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, gèr. Né mene lelɔ, né mene yeya, gèr. Né mene dùà te ndèndèŋ nòmò, gèr. Né mene beè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dé nyeên, gèr.
47011027	Njèh faá núr seê nɔ, mè lé naâ ŋgweé. Lɔ́m goô ye, júée nyí. Nyúá mé cùè né njèh bɔɔ́. Yáb joloò né sâ. Dùlù né sâ. Saám cɔ̀gɔ̀ ye, kéh nyí.
47011028	Mè kulá caá nde né mé ŋgei, cieé dɔɔ́ŋ felè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bèh kàn mé bèh kân temé mè lè d`iè ŋgwéh.
47011029	Mɔ nuaré dé`i yua te ceér Càŋe, mè yua taré ménâ. Mɔ nuaré dé`i die yila baá te veêne, né mè lè bɔgɔ́.
47011030	Mɔ sé la né mè dé punô haá, sâ mè punó nde né te njií mé né yuaâ mò tueé.
47011031	Càŋ Tele Fehtoò beèh Yeésò né kɔɔ́ ye, mè nyeén túé ŋgwéh. Kùsèm seèn.
47011032	Cu mé mè lé naâ ké Damâs, sâ Arétàs né mgbè kɔɔ́. Ŋgɔ́mnà te tàbe seèn lé naâ bɔ̀ sɔ́j`i ké sònò kágà kwaá tená, ye bɔ́ s`iè mè sieè.
47011033	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lé naâ mè lè sɔgɔ yií kwaá, bɔ́ segé sɔm keéh mè te lɔ́ŋ bɔ̀gɔ̀, bɔ́ kwaá keéh mè ké cie, te mè nde ye beè seèn mvelé yuo.
47012001	Mè nde né punó, la mene gàm ŋgwéh, mè punó nde né môn. Mè kènê punó nde aá mé vuú felè Fehtoò beèh mé lé naâ njolò mò ŋené yuo kelâ.
47012002	Mè né nùà Kristò dé`i kɔɔ́, né mè. Lan baá nyèmà yulà cùɔ̀b nèà mé Càŋ lé weh njií naâ mè ké ter te vulúu, jomo sâ, mè suaga cuù ye. Kɔ ŋgweé, mé gècên mene, mè lé naá-re ké ter sâ ŋaá wa, né-re vuú lé ŋené naâ mè njolò kɔɔ́ wa, mè kɔ́ ŋgwéh. Càŋ kɔ lom né dé sâ kɔɔ́.
47012003	Mè tueé cu né ye, mè né kɔɔ́ ye, mè hèllè lé naâ ké mbar Càŋ ŋaá waá, mè né cu tueé ndɔ ye, kɔ ŋgweé mé gècên mene, mè lé naá-re ké ter ŋaá sâ, wa né-re vuú lé ŋené naâ mè njolò kɔɔ́ wa, mè kɔ́ ŋgwéh, Càŋ kɔ lom né dé sâ kɔɔ́.
47012004	Bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé nùàr fèlà kòmò ndé ŋgwéh, mè lé naâ ké teèn ŋgweé; né jolo mé nùàr tueé ŋgòr sâ ndɔ.
47012005	Mè punó lom nde né mé mè nùà Kristò hèllè, mè mé dé felè mò púnó ndé ŋgwéh. Mɔ mè nde né mé dé felè mò punó, kɔ mè punó seér felè bèh yuyuaâ mò.
47012006	Mɔ mè tueé mene ye mè nde né punó, mè nùà kùlù sam, mè tueé yií né teèn. Mé njéh mene, mè gwàn ŋgwéh punô, te bí mè weh lom faá bí né mè ŋené, bí né mè ŋgweé nɔ, te mè beè bi`i nùà koô mé vuú mò hèllè ŋá cú.
47012007	Mè tueé bí, felè bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lé feh keéh naâ mè dɔɔ́ŋ, mè sé naâ nùà púnò teèn ŋaá. Njèh cén, Càŋ nde mè haá seér cu gèr te den yoòr mò faá ŋgwaga nɔ, njege lom mè faá seé Sátàn nɔ, te mè bèh púnò hèllè kwà kéh cú.
47012008	Mè lé naâ Fehtoò beèh teèn dua, mè dua bú mbei tagár, ye bú a, sɔ̀m mè njèh hên yoòr teèn.
47012009	Ye mè a: mè né fùgò beè nyî kuú, mè kɔ́ cégé dé mò cí, nde né mè wulú; wa kɔ nùà baá yuaá, terreb nyî ŋené ye yoòr seèn ma. Mɔ né mân, mè né lom mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé dé gècên, mè punó seér nde aá mé yuaâ mò hèllè lòù, te terreb Kristò kurú nyegé mè kɔɔ́.
47012010	Sâ kènê, mè samé seér nde aá mé yuaâ mò dé samê. Né mene séb, né mene núr, né mene bùnò, né mene dàm gèr feh hihiné, mɔ né felè Kristò, mè samé seér nde né mé njéh dé samê. Lòù sam, kɔ mè baá yuaásé, te mè den ye tarésé.
47012011	Mè né mene nùà kùlù mân ŋaá dɔɔ́ŋ, bí haá né mè sònò kɔɔ́. Ŋgweéh sòn mò sé lé tueé naâ bí mà. Mè sé né mene njèh mbaâ, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mè ka bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dudueèr bi`i hèllè sam.
47012012	Bɔ̀ seé mé né tueé ye, mè né mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dé gècên lé naá gi`i ké lètenè bi`i ŋené, mè lé naâ fém mé c`iè hihiné bɔɔ́, mè né sèŋ kwaá, mè sèŋ kwaá lom dé fî.
47012013	Mè lé naâ bí hiín weh kwaá, mè weh kwaá bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ te lɔɔ́ dé`i hiín wa? Kɔ bí jue né-re yáb, dé sâ mè lé bí dé bi`i bíé ná ŋgwêh, ye te bí k`i cú. Ŋgweéh sâ mè lé saàb naâ lòù mà, bí kúlú njí-re bi`i dèh doó, bí té ndè.
47012014	Mè baá cu gò ké yoòr bi`i kaga; sâ baá dé mbei tagâr. Mɔ mè wa cuù mene ké yoòr bi`i, mè ka bí dé yâb k`i ndé ŋgwéh. Mè gwaán kela né gùm bi`i, njèh bi`i sam. Bɔ̀ huaán njèh kɔɔ́ fɔ́n bèh, te koó bɔ̀ tele; bɔ̀ tele fɔɔ́n seér yeé njèh kɔɔ́, bɔ́ koó bɔ̀ huaán.
47012015	Ká beè mò, mɔ mè né mene bɔ̀ njèh mò felè mò sɔm gií, mè sɔm bilí mé yɔ̀ŋ mò mene te gam bí, nde né mè yoòr sagár. Mɔ mè né bí gèh dé hên gwaán, sâ bí temé yoòr mò sɔm waga seér nde né lòù wa?
47012016	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mè lé bí yáb bíé ná ŋgwêh ye te bí k`i cú. Mé njéh mene, nuaré dé`i túé ndé ŋgwéh ye mè lé bí njèh beè bele weéh naâ lòù wa?
47012017	Á sâ, mè lé naâ bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i ké yoòr bi`i temá njií; cén dé`i lé naâ bí njèh beè bele weh wa?
47012018	Mè lé ye Tîte a, kúkùr ndé ké yoòr bi`i, mè sɔm kwaá bú mbeí dé`i jomo. Sâ bí ye Tîte lé naâ bí njèh beè bele weh wa? Dé sâ ndɔ́g! Njií mé mè lé bɔɔ́ naâ, Tîte bɔɔ́ lom né cí. Te dene beèh toò bi`i, béh bú né mé temé cên.
47012019	Kɔ ŋgweéh dàb baá teèn mé bí né munó den, ye béh toò bi`i hên tena den né sòn beèh wa? Sâ mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ mbeí mò, cí sam. Béh tueé né dé beèh toò Càŋ faá Kristò gwaán nê nɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ béh ye te bí kwaá yam njií gi temé yoòr seèn.
47012020	Mè né veéh ye, mè sé ndeè wa né ké yoòr bi`i, mè bí faá mè né gwaán nɔ, kwà ŋgwéh; bí mè faá bí né gwaán nɔ kwà cú wâ? Lòù sam, mè né jɔ́gɔ́ mé huer ké lètenè bi`i veéh; mè né sà bɔ̂ kèrrè mé séb veéh; mè né júéb bɔ̂ púnò mé ŋgare veéh ndɔ.
47012021	Mè né veéh ye, mè sé ndeè wa né ké lètenè bi`i, mè gulí kuú mé bí, mè keré die toò Càŋ ndɔ. Sâ mè nde né mé yúé yueé kuú. Né felè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né lom veên bɔɔ́, bɔ́ temé kwéh sér ŋgwéh doô: bɔ́ né te veên joú yilá, bɔ́ né yàgà bɔɔ́ tobó gɔ, sár né lulí ndeé den, mè veéh né cí.
47013001	Mè nde cuù né ké yoòr bi`i ndeé, sâ baá dé mbei tagâr. Mɔ béh nde né ju dé kàn tená, kɔ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ ŋené né doó nùà fà mé tagár, faá mvù Càŋ tueé nê nɔ.
47013002	Mè lé naâ bí njeré dé`i te gò mò dé jomò tueé. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé bɔɔ́ naâ veên, mè lé naâ bɔ́ tagá, mè taga lɔ bɔ̀ dé`i ndɔ. Mè né mene ká dàb mân, mè né cu bí tueé ye bí a, mɔ mè ndeè waà baá ké yoòr bi`i, mè nde né bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ gèr feh keéh.
47013003	Bí ye te bí sònò mò ŋene kɔ ŋgòr Kristò. Bí nde né ŋené ndɔ. Mɔ Kristò baá seé seèn lètenè bi`i bɔɔ́, à lòù yúá sér bèh, à taré seér yeé dé tarê.
47013004	Né môn, bɔ́ lé naá gi`i bú te toû faá nùà yuaâ nɔ fagá njií. Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam, à baá cu làŋ. Né mé terreb Càŋ. Béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né yoòr seèn nyɔgɔ́ ndeé, béh né gi yuaásé môn ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, lètenè bi`i béh né làŋ faá bú nɔ. Né mé terreb Càŋ ndɔ.
47013005	Bí mùnò nyégé mé feh bi`i bagasé! Mɔ bí né te ceér Càŋe ŋgulísé, bí nde né ŋené kɔɔ́. Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye Yeésò Kristò né te temé bi`i wa? Sâ kɔ bí ka ŋgúlí ŋgwéh lòù, wanɔɔ́ŋ à né gi te temé bi`i.
47013006	Mè né ndèm kwaá, ye bí nde né ŋené kɔɔ́ ye béh né dé beèh ŋgulísé.
47013007	Béh né Càŋ felè bi`i dua, ye bú a, gàm bí, te bí veên dé`i mé be kèmà cú. Béh feh beèh mé njéh cí ŋgwéh ndɔ, béh mé njéh yueé seér né bí. Seé beèh la mene njolò bɔ̀ nùàr ŋéné ŋgwéh, béh dé sâ táŋ ŋgwéh.
47013008	Lòù sam, béh gwaán lom né gècên, béh bú gè jomo s`i lɔ́ bèh.
47013009	Mɔ béh né yuaásé, né béh yoòr lòù huɔɔ́m seér, te bí taré seér kɔɔ́, bí den lom ŋagásé. Béh Càŋ dua yeé ménâ.
47013010	Mè né mene ká dàb, mè bí nyagá njií né te mè ndeè waà, sâ bí kweéh seér gi aá, mè bí lòù ndè cú. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, Càŋ lé naâ mè terreb jege haá, à lé mè haá naâ, ye te gam bí, à túé ŋgwéh ye mè a, ndé bí mé njéh sie ŋaré.
47013011	Sâ bí dèn bá-re, bɔ̀ nùàr mò! Bí lègè lòm tég te bí den ŋagásé, bí né lètenè bi`i toó kuú. Bí dèn mé sòn cên, bí dèn mé dɔlê ndɔ. Te Càŋ húɔ́m-temê mé haá yeé dɔlê kurú nyegé bí.
47013012	Bí bíé kú lètenè bi`i mé húɔ́m-temé Kristò lè. Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ ye bíé kéh bí ndɔ.
47013013	Fùgò Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò mé húɔ́m-temé Càŋ a, ká s`iè bí beè. Cúcuí Ŋagâ a, kúrú bílí bí dɔɔ́ŋ.
48001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mbɔ̀ŋ tebê mé bɔ̀ nùàr mè kɔɔ́ témá ná ŋgwêh, mè jomo nuaré dé`i kélá ná ŋgwêh ndɔ. Né Yeésò Kristò bɔ̂ Càŋ Tele seèn nuaá mé lé komo sɔɔ́m naâ bú lè cio sie kwaá né mè kɔɔ́.
48001002	Béh bɔ̀ mbeí mò mé né gi ká kwarè mò dɔɔ́ŋ bí mvù hên nyagá njií né kɔɔ́, béh tema njií né mé bí bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ŋ hihiné te tàbè Galatî dɔɔ́ŋ, béh né bí bieé.
48001003	Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
48001004	Bú Yeésò Kristò mé feh seèn lé naâ te veên beèh yilá kuú, à lé ménâ bɔɔ́ naâ, ye te nyí yili sɔm béh faá Tele beèh Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ, wanɔɔ́ŋ wɔ́ŋ baá ve.
48001005	Kùsèm terreb Càŋ a, sùmù yùò kélà cie dé kè`i cên. È môn.
48001006	Né mè lòù geí lɔɔ́; wanɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ né bí yilá, te bí nde fùgò beè Kristò kuú, kwar cén bí né seér bú durá si lɔɔ́, bí nde te Njàgà Bagaà dé hiîn faár yilá nɔ.
48001007	Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ nùàr bí feh ter bɔɔ́ ŋellé né kɔɔ́, bɔ́ ye te bɔ́ kweéh seér Njàgà Bagaà felè Kristò mé dé hiîn. Mé gècên mene bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Njàgà Bagaà dé`i teèn sam gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
48001008	Mɔ nuaré dé`i waà, né mene béh, né mene c`il`i Càŋ dé`i suagà né ter kɔɔ́, à tueé seér bí Njàgà Bagaà dé hiîn, dé mé béh lé naâ bí tueé hên, à bí cí túé ŋgwéh, sâ Càŋ a, dúágá bú!
48001009	Béh lé naá gi`i bí mân tueé ndɔ, mè hên ferré cu né bí dé ferrê, ye bí a: mɔ nuaré dé`i waà, à né bí Njàgà Bagaà dé hiîn tueé seér, dé mé bí lé naá gi`i ŋgweé, à bí cí túé ŋgwéh, sâ Càŋ a, dúágá bú!
48001010	Bí ye, mè mân tueé kuú né te bɔ̀ nùàr seén mè mé njéh wa? Hɔ̂s, mè yueé lom né gàm dé beè Càŋ. Á sâ, mè ye te huɔm bɔ̀ nùàr yoòr mé mè ndɔ wa? Mɔ mè sé la ye te mè huɔm cu bɔ̀ nùàr yoòr, mè tueé bí, mè sé née nùà seê Kristò ŋá ŋgwéeh ye.
48001011	Mè tueé bí bɔ̀ nùàr mò: Njàgà Bagaà mé mè né se hên, nùàr lé bú kɔɔ́ s`i ná ŋgwêh.
48001012	Mè lé bú beè nuaré dé`i wèh ná ŋgwêh, nuaré dé`i lé mè bú kɔɔ́ fèh ná ŋgwêh ndɔ. Yeésò Kristò mé feh seèn lé mè Njàgà Bagaà hên feh loóm naâ kɔɔ́.
48001013	Bí lé naá gi`i njàgà denè mò dé léí toò ŋgweé, sâ mè née te tòù bɔ̀ Jûf ye. Bí lé naâ ŋgweé, ye mè lé naâ bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ gèr mé terreb mene feh, ye kɔ bɔ́ ŋellé yuo aá, temé mò dɔlé ye.
48001014	Bɔ̀ Jûf mé né kè`i mò dɔɔ́ŋ, mè lé naá gi`i bɔ́ mé gènnè beèh kɔɔ́ yɔgɔ́. Mè tueé bí, tòù bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ lé mè yoòr yila loóm naâ faá seé mò nùà njèh nɔ.
48001015	Kàmbér sâ Càŋ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn lɔ mè balé kwaá gi aá kèn, à lɔ mè balé kwaá naâ sâ bɔ́ née mè ŋàr ŋgwéeh ye, ye te mè ndeè ŋa nùà seê nyî ma.
48001016	Cu sâ yeé wulu baá, ye nyí nde né mè Ŋuna nyî feh ŋagá, te mè nde bú ké lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam saán yɔŋ ma. À feh ŋagá mè ndɔ. Mè tueé bí, mè lé ndé ná cû sòn nuaré dé`i bieé sɔɔ́.
48001017	Bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê mé né gi ké toò mò, mè lé ké Jerusalem yoòr bɔɔ̀n ndé ná ŋgwêh te mè bie nyegé lòù ndɔ. Mè lé nde seér naâ te tàbè Arabî; jomo sâ mè nde cu ké Damâs.
48001018	Nyèmà tagár yeé kela baá, mè nde ye ké Jerusalem yoòr Piêr, te béh bú meh. Mè yeé wa baá, mè cer ké sâ sɔ́ndè fà.
48001019	Mé njéh mene, mè lé mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dé`i ké teèn ŋéné ná ŋgwêh ndɔ, lé gi cegé naâ Jâk, d`im Fehtoò beèh.
48001020	Mè tueé bí, njií mé mè né bí nyagá hên, Càŋ né ŋené, mè nyeén túé ŋgwéh, né ka môn jég.
48001021	Te jomo sâ mè nde ye te tàbè Sirî bɔ̂ Silisî.
48001022	Bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Kristò bɔ̀ dé ké Judê lé mè kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh,
48001023	bɔ́ lé ŋgweé cegé naâ njàgà mò mé bɔ́ né tueé ye: Nuaá mé lé naâ béh seé weh, ye te nyí wula ceré sɔm béh doô, Njàgà Bagaà hên tueé den cu aá bú ma.
48001024	Yeé baá mân, bɔ́ yila baá-re Càŋ felè mò seên ndɔ.
48002001	Nyèmà yulà cùɔ̀b nèà yeé kela baá, mè cu cu ké Jerusalem, bêh Bàrnàbâs lé naâ kɔɔ́; mè weh sie Tîte beè ndɔ.
48002002	Càŋ lé tueé naâ kɔɔ́, ye mè a, ndé ké teèn ménâ. Wa ké teèn, béh bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ nde bèh ndɔ́ŋ-ndɔ̀ŋ, béh den bilí teèn, mè tueé bɔ́ gèh dé mé mè né yeé Njàgà Bagaà lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam doô se, te bɔ́ ŋgweé kɔ, wanɔɔ́ŋ seé mò dé jomò mé dé toò mene nde né lòù sibí le.
48002003	Béh bɔ̀ Tîte lé naâ kɔɔ́. À né mene nùà Greêk, à mene ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh, mé njéh mene bɔ́ lé cí táŋ sɔ́ ná ŋgwêh.
48002004	Bɔ̀ mbeí seé beèh dé nyenyenê lé né mene lètenè beèh tueé fɔré gɔ, ye ŋɔ́b bú ŋgór ŋɔɔ̀b, mé njéh mene lé yíé ná ŋgwêh. Sâ, bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ hèllè lé naâ lètenè beèh sulá yilá, bɔ́ né dene beèh te ceér Yeésò Kristò kweé, ye te bɔ́ ŋene dene mé béh né mé feh beèh den sâ. Bɔ́ lé ye, kɔ béh den den ka sóú bɔ̀ Jûf ma.
48002005	Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam, bɔ́ lɔ́ŋ beè beèh kwà ŋgwéh dé ndɔ̂g, béh ye te Njàgà Bagaà mé gècên seèn yoòr den le ter kɔɔ́, bí ŋgweé lom cí.
48002006	Dé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ njolò bɔ̀ nùàr, mè dé sâ táŋ ŋgwéh, beè Càŋ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né gi kè`i cén. Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ sâ, mè yeé se ŋagá baá seé mò toò bɔɔ̀n ménâ, bɔ́ pɔ́ŋ ndɔ, bɔ́ njeré dé`i teèn túé yí cú.
48002007	Bɔ́ ŋene kɔ seér cu lòù, ye kàmbér Càŋ lé naâ bêh Piêr Njàgà Bagaà beè jege kwaá bɔ̀n; wa Piêr nde né dé seèn ké lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf, mè nde dé mò ké lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ma.
48002008	Né bɔ̀n, Càŋ mé lé haá naâ Piêr terreb, à tema njií bú ké lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf doô, haá cu né mè terreb mân kɔɔ́, à tema njií mè dé mò ké lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam.
48002009	Bɔ̀ Jâk mé Piêr bɔ̂ Jâŋ mé né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lètenè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ yeé ŋene kɔ baá ye, mè hên bɔɔ́ lom né seé jéjêg mé yuoó naâ beè Càŋ ménâ, bɔ́ haá bêh Bàrnàbâs be, ye béh bɔ́ né mé sòn cên, wa béh dé beèh ndé cú ké lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, te bɔ́ nde dé bɔɔ̀n lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf ma.
48002010	Njèh cén, bɔ́ ye béh a: kúkùr beèh, béh té bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ te bɔ̀ŋ bɔɔ̀n nyèn, béh gàm bɔ́ gaàm ma. Sâ né njií mé mè lé naâ feh mé njéh fagá ndɔ.
48002011	Cu mé Piêr lé waà naâ ké Antiôs, mè lé naâ bú njolò bɔ̀ nùàr yaga. Lòù sam, à lé naâ bɔɔ́ saáb.
48002012	Sâ, cu mé à lé waà naâ ké teèn, bɔ́ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam lé yieé bilí beéh kɔɔ́. Jomo sâ Jâk tema njiî bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i ndɔ; bɔ́ lé naâ dé bɔɔ̀n lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ye kɔ ŋɔ́b ŋgór ŋɔɔ̀b doô. Bɔ́ yeé waà baá, veéh sie yɔgɔ́ Piêr mé bɔ́, à sɔm yo seèn ndɔ, bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí mé Jûf sam hèllè yíé bílí cú.
48002013	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé né Jûf yeé ŋene aá ménâ, bɔ́ sɔm yo bɔɔ̀n faá Piêr ndɔ. Te gùm Bàrnàbâs mé feh seèn nde cu ye-re ménâ bɔɔ́ gobó, bɔ́ bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ sɔm gi yo bɔɔ̀n.
48002014	Mè yeé ŋene, bɔ́ jéjég faá Njàgà Bagaà né tueé nɔ gɔ̀ d`il`i cú, mè tueé ŋaré njií lom Piêr cicie toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ, mè ye bú a: Wò né gi kɔɔ́ ye nyí né nùà Jûf, wa dene nyî né faá nuaá mé Jûf sam nɔ ndɔ; wò kɔ gi aá ye nyí faá nùà Jûf nɔ dèn cú. Keí mé bɔɔ́, wò ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam a, kɔ dèn gí faá bɔ̀ Jûf nɔ wa?»
48002015	Béh né gi dé beèh bɔ̀ Jûf dé ŋàr lè, béh te gèh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ceér Càŋ kɔ́ ŋgwéh yùò ná ŋgwêh.
48002016	Mé njéh mene, béh kɔ né ye, Càŋ nùàr nùà dilî yilá lom né mé temé seèn yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njiî, dèn ŋgwéh mé sóú bele komoò. Né mene béh, béh né gi temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií, te Càŋ nde ye béh bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ mé njéh yilá, dèn ŋgwéh mé sóú beleè. Lòù sam, nùàr nùà dilî ké toò Càŋ mé sóú ŋá ndé ŋgwéh.
48002017	Béh bɔ̀ Jûf ndèm mé Kristò kwaá njií kuú né, ye te béh den njolò Càŋ dilísé, béh ndèm mé sóú kwá njí cú. Sâ béh né gi ŋené kɔɔ́, ye béh né mé veên yoòr faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ndɔ. Á, sâ tueé baá-re ye Kristò né gwaán ye veên a, yám ndé sér toò wa? Dé sâ tíndɔ̂g ndɔ!
48002018	Ŋgweéh mè lɔ naâ sóú ké jomo kaáb si njií mà. Mɔ mè hên mena den cu né sóú mé mè lé naá gi`i doó kaáb si doô, sâ mè beè Càŋ kuú den cu né sóú hèllè mé be mò.
48002019	Lòù sam, sóú lé mè te cio lu yií naâ kɔɔ́, mè beè seèn baá seér faá komó nɔ, te mè làŋ den seér te ceér Càŋe. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé ké te toû faga bilí naâ bêh Kristò.
48002020	Mɔ mè kènê née mene làŋ ye, sâ mè sam cuú; yoòr mò baá seér yɔ̀ŋ dé Kristò. Dene mò ká lè wɔ́ŋ hên baá seér dene dé ndèm mé Ŋunà Càŋ kwaá njiî. À lé mè gwaán naâ kɔɔ́, à lé felè mò kuú naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
48002021	Ndɔ́g mè fùgò Càŋ faá njèh mbaâ nɔ wèh ndé ŋgwéh. Mɔ sé la ye nùàr nde né nùà dilî ké toò Càŋ mé sóú ŋaá, ŋgweéh sâ Kristò kuú vu né dé lòù mà!
48003001	Kɔ̀cɔ̀, tándugó Galatî bɔ̀! Ne`i bí mân yieé wula caá né kɔɔ́, mé bɔ́ se nyegé gi mene bí cio Yeésò Kristò ké te toû, bí né lom ndugó ŋeí doô?
48003002	Mè gwaán lom né bí njèh cén bieê, bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ túé ke mè ye: Càŋ lé bí Cúcuí seèn tema njií naâ felè sóú joloò wa, lé naâ felè temé te Njàgà Bagaà kwaá njiî wa? Mè tueé bí, lé naá seêr felè Njàgà Bagaà mé bí lé naâ ŋgweé, bí kwaá njií temé teèn doô.
48003003	Bí mân ndugó caá né dé ke`i? Bɔɔ́ né naàn mé bí lé duɔɔ́m nyegé gi`i mé Cúcuí Càŋ kpɔ́g, kènê bí lɔɔ̀ cí, bí bɔɔ́ seér cu aá mé feh bi`i wa?
48003004	Bí lé naâ gèr felè Njàgà Bagaà ŋené. Sâ tueé né ye, bí lé ŋene kuú naâ dé lòù wa? Ŋgweéh dé lòù sam ŋgweéh mà.
48003005	Mɔ Càŋ né bí Cúcuí seèn haá, à né bɔ̀ fém lètenè bi`i bɔɔ́ bele, sâ à ménâ bɔɔ́ kuú né felè sóú joloò wa? Ŋgweéh né felè Njàgà Bagaà ŋgweê mé temé teèn kwaá njiî mà.
48003006	Né te mvù Càŋe felè Abrahâm nyagá den ye: Abrahâm lé naâ temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií; Càŋ lé bú nùà dilî yilá naâ mé njéh.»
48003007	Sâ bí félá nyégé-re bagasé, ye: bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Càŋ faá Abrahâm nɔ kwaá njií, bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm dé jéjêg né bɔ́.
48003008	Càŋ lé naâ Abrahâm jɔ̀gɔ̀ tueé kwaá, ye nyí felè seèn kulu keéh gi nde né dàm nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ma. Lòù sam, à lɔ naá gi`i ménâ jɔ̀gɔ̀ nyegé kwaá, ye nyí nde né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ yilá; nyí bɔ́ ménâ yilá nde né mé temé cén yoòr nyî kwaá njií ma.
48003009	Abrahâm lé naâ temé teèn kwaá njií; Càŋ lé naâ bú ménâ kulú ndɔ. Mɔ né mân, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé temé kwaá njií né yoòr Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde né bɔ́ ménâ kulú.
48003010	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né dé bɔɔ̀n te sóù tétég ŋgelá den dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né lom duagásé. Ŋgweéh Ŋgòr Càŋ né gi ménâ tueé ndɔ wa? ye: Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé sóú Càŋ mé gùm mene faá bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né te mvù Càŋe nɔ, jòlò jégé ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ a, dèn duagásé.»
48003011	Ŋgweéh ŋgòr Càŋ né gi tueé ŋagá mà, ye: nuaré dé`i nùà dilî ké toò Càŋ mé sóú joloò ŋá wá ndé ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, né te mvù Càŋe nyagá kwaá gií, ye: nuaá mé ŋa né nùà dilî beè Càŋ mé temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njiî dɔɔ́ŋ kwa nde né yɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ́.
48003012	Ŋgweéh sâ sóú né hiín, temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî né hiín ndɔ mà. Lòù sam, né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den gií, ye: Dé sóù, nuaá mé né sóú mé gùm mene jolo komo, yɔ̀ŋ kwa nde né kɔɔ́.»
48003013	Kristò lɔ ndeè duagásé den dɔɔ́ŋ; lɔ naâ felè beèh, ye te nyí ŋa sɔm béh dúágátí yoòr, béh geé mé ceér sóù. Dé sâ né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: Nuaá mé bɔ́ segé njií né te toû dɔɔ́ŋ yoòr né mé dúágátí.»
48003014	Kristò lé mân bɔɔ́ kuú naâ ye te dèh mé Càŋ lé naâ Abrahâm mé njéh kulú doô, kema keéh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam teèn. Bɔ́ dèh sâ kwa nde né mé Kristò, te béh ndèm kwaá njií gi yoòr seèn, béh kwa Cúcuí Ŋagâ faá Càŋ lé naâ béh tueé nɔ.
48003015	Belà, mè nde né bí njeré dé`i tueé, mè me njií nde né bí mé njèh wɔ̂ŋ: mɔ nuaré dé`i naá gi`i ŋgúlú seèn taáŋ nyegé, nuaré dé`i sòn teèn yí ndé cú, ye te nyí vurú sɔm. À túé ndé ŋgwéh ye nyí nde cu né njeré dé`i felèbɔ̀ sagá ndɔ.
48003016	Beè Càŋ né môn. Càŋ lé ndéb kwa kwaá naâ mé Abrahâm bɔ̂ ndùté ndùtù seèn. Sâ tueé né ye, ŋgòr Càŋ dé bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù seèn dɔɔ́ŋ júé ŋgwéh, te nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ làgà cú. Te mvù Càŋe bɔ́ jue lom né ndùté ndùtù seèn cén tà cén. Mɔ né mân, sâ bɔ́ jue lom né Kristò.
48003017	Mè gwaán né tueé ŋagâ ndɔ, ye bí a: Càŋ lé naâ ŋgɔ̀ŋ coló, à kwa kwaá ndéb ter, ye ŋgɔ̀ŋ sâ le nde né ménâ. Mɔ à lɔ naá gi`i ménâ coló, cer ter nyèmà yuií nèà mé nyèmà yulà tagár te sóú nde ye cie yuo. Á sâ, sóú né mé terreb teèn, à nde né ŋgɔ̀ŋ sâ cum lɔ wa? Ndɔ́g! Mé ndéb mene sóú bɔ́ cálé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.
48003018	Mɔ ŋgúlú Càŋ yieê sé né mé sóú beleè, sâ ndéb dé seèn sé teèn mbaá ná kú cû. Mè tueé bí, Càŋ lɔ Abrahâm ŋgúlú seèn tieè kwa kwaá naâ mé ndéb.
48003019	Mɔ né cu mân, á sâ Càŋ lɔ dé seèn sóú sou kuú naâ dé ke`i ndɔ? Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ lɔ sóú teèn sou sagá cuù naâ, ye te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ veên mé njéh. À lɔ ménâ sou kwaá ŋgɔgɔ́ naâ, sâ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm nùà njèh lɔ née wá ŋgwéeh ye. À yeé waà baá, sóú hèllè cuaré yuo. Càŋ lɔ sóú sâ tueé keéh naâ sònò bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ. Nuaré dé`i kela lètenè bɔɔ̀n mé bɔ̀ nùàr faá nàŋ nɔ, à den, à né bɔ̀ nùàr njií mé lé yuoó naâ sònò bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ tueé keéh.
48003020	Ŋgweéh mɔ nàŋ né teèn, sâ né lètenè njèh fà: dé`i né kèb dé`i, dé`i kèb dé`i wa? Dé Càŋ, à dé seèn né cén.
48003021	Sâ tueé né ye, sóú bɔ̂ ndéb Càŋ nyuùn kwàrè bèh wa? Môn sam ndɔ! Mɔ sóú mé nde né bɔ̀ nùàr yɔ̀ŋ haá sé né teèn, à sé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr sie seér, te bɔ́ ŋa bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ mé njéh.
48003022	Á, seèn môn sam. Mvù Càŋ seèn né gi cie tueé kwaá, ye veên né lom wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ beè kebbé sie; wa dé sâ bɔɔ́ né te ndéb Càŋ mboón, faá Càŋ lé naâ tueé nɔ, ye nyí nde né bɔ̀ nùàr yili sɔm, nyí yili sɔm nde né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé bɔɔ̀n yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií ma.
48003023	Léí toò béh lé naá gi`i ka sóù faá bɔ̀ gwà cib`i bɔ̀ nɔ. Kristò yeé waà baá, te bɔ̀ nùàr nde ye temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií.
48003024	Cu sâ sóú lɔ naâ dé seèn faá dè`i beèh nɔ, ye te Kristò nde waà, béh ŋa bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ njolò Càŋ mé temé yoòr seèn kwaá njiî.
48003025	Kènê cu temé kwaá njiî sâ waà baá. Béh geé baá mé ceér sóù, béh beè dè`i hèllè yuo gi aá.
48003026	Lòù sam, béh bɔ̀ Yeésò Kristò bilí seér aá kɔɔ́; béh baá bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ. Béh bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ ŋa né mé temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njiî.
48003027	Bí lé nòmò Càŋ kou kuú naâ, ye te bí bɔ̀ Kristò nyɔgɔ́ bilí cén. Sâ kènê bí baá gi mé Kristò yoòr.
48003028	Mɔ né mân, sâ kènê lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam gwèn teèn sam cuú; lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé den né mé feh bɔɔ̀n mé bɔ̀ kwer, gwèn teèn sam cuú; lètenè bɔ̀ siíb mé bɔ̀ véh mene gwèn teèn sam cuú ndɔ; dɔɔ́ŋ bí nyɔgɔ́ bilí gi aá cén yoòr Yeésò Kristò.
48003029	Mɔ bí né bɔ̀ nùàr Kristò, sâ kènê bí baá gi bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm ndɔ; sâ bí yieé nde né ŋgúlú Càŋ faá à lé naá gi`i tueé kwaá nɔ.
48004001	Bí kwá mè tueé cu bí ndɔ: huaán mé nde né ŋgúlú teleè yieé, mɔ à née mbò ye, mé be njèh seèn sâ mene, bɔ̂ kwer né kè`i cén.
48004002	Cu sâ, à nde née sòn bɔ̀ dè`i seèn ŋgweé ye; à ŋgweé sòn bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bɔ̀ njèh seèn ke nyegé ndɔ. Kɔ cu mé tele seèn lé sie kwaá naâ ndeè wulu baá, sâ ye.
48004003	Béh né ménâ ndɔ: cu mé béh lé naâ bɔ̀ huaán tetɔɔ̂r, béh lé naá gi`i ka tòù beèh faá kwer nɔ.
48004004	Nde nde, cu mé Càŋ lé sie kwaá naâ yeé wulu baá, à tema njií Ŋuna seèn ndɔ: ma dé`i ŋar bú, à yií keéh feh te sóú bɔ̀ Jûf ménâ ndɔ.
48004005	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te nyí yili sɔm bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi ka sóù, te béh dɔɔ́ŋ ŋa gi ye bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ ma.
48004006	Càŋ tema njií baá-re Cúcuí Ŋuna seèn ká lè bi`i, te ŋené huɔm, ye béh dɔɔ́ŋ né bɔ̀ huaán nyî ma. Cúcuí sâ né mé sòn seèn yilá, ye: Tele mò!
48004007	Mɔ né mân, sâ wò kwer sam cuú, wò baá huaán. Sâ ŋgúlú mé Càŋ lé nyegé kwaá naâ mé bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn doô, à nde né wò teèn haá.
48004008	Léí toò bí lé Càŋ kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, bí lé naá seêr kwer bɔ̀ cècàŋ.
48004009	Dé kènê môn sam cuú, bí ŋene kɔ baá Càŋ gècên kèn. Dé mò, mè nde né tueé seér ye bí a, Càŋ ŋene kɔ né bí kɔɔ́. Á, mɔ baá gi mân, sâ naàn naàn mé bí nde cu né kènê bɔ̀ càŋ tándûg mbaá dua gɔ wa? Naàn naàn mé bí nde cu né kwer bɔɔ̀n ŋaá den ndɔ wa?
48004010	Bí bɔ̀ cieé mé bɔ̀ weéh dé`i jolo den né dé ke`i wa? Bí bɔ̀ kùr bené dé`i jolo yeé dé ke`i? Bí né yeé bɔ̀ nyèmà dé`i jolo. Né dé ke`i ndɔ wa?
48004011	Ŋgweéh sâ seé mò ké lètenè bi`i nde né mbaá mvuaán le mà. Mè hên veéh kuú né cí!
48004012	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, kúkùr bi`i, bí dèn gí faá mè nɔ; mè baá gi dé mò faá bí kèn. Léí toò bí lé naâ mè veên dé`i bɔɔ́ wa?
48004013	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, mè lé naâ ké lètenè bi`i mé beén yoòr waá seér, mè lé ké sâ den leé naâ dé cî, mè né bí Njàgà Bagaà teèn se keéh ndɔ.
48004014	Beén mò hèllè ye júée nyí. À kɔ ye nyí bí gèr felè mò feh kum aá. Mé njéh mene, bí lé mè s`i lɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, bí mè kwɔ́gɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ; bí lé weh kwaá njií seér naâ mè yoòr bi`i faá c`il`i Càŋ dé`i nɔ; lé den loóm naâ faá bí sie nyegé né Yeésò Kristò nùà njèh.
48004015	Mè tueé bí, mɔ ceér sé né beè bi`i teèn, bí sé naâ mè njolo bi`i luagá haá njií gií! Bí yeé bɔɔ́ kɔ gi aá mân kèn, sâ hên jég seèn kwa cu né bí kei wa?
48004016	Wanɔɔ́ŋ mè yeé tueé gi aá bí gècên kèn, mè den seér cu faá nùà bùnò beè bi`i wa?
48004017	Bɔ̀ nyenyenê bɔ̀ hèllè né ké lètenè bi`i tueé nagá gɔ, bɔ́ ye te bɔ́ bou weh gi bí beè mò mé njéh, bí bɔɔ́ seér seé bɔɔ̀n.
48004018	Mɔ né mân, sâ nùàr a, bóú yí nùàr teèn, te gam bú. Mɔ mè né mene ké lètenè bi`i, mè mene teèn sam, te den den faá béh bí né kɔɔ́ nɔ.
48004019	'Oè, bɔ̀ huaán yíé-temê mò, mè te gèr-e yila cu aá kèn, mè baá cu gèr yoló. Mè yolo den né faá ma dé`i yolo né nyer nɔ. Kɔ bí ndeè ŋa nyegé baá bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ Kristò kèn, sâ ye.
48004020	Mè tueé nde né naàn? Dene mò sé la né kènê ké yoòr bi`i; feh mò ter mé ju bi`i ŋellé gi aá kèn.
48004021	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gwaán né ka sóù deèn dɔɔ́ŋ, bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ túé ke mè ye, bí beéh sóú sâ ŋgwé bèh wa?
48004022	Ŋgweéh bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né te mvù Càŋe, ye Abrahâm lé naâ mé huaán fà wa? Dé`i né ŋunà kweèr, dé`i ŋunà veèh seèn nùà njèh.
48004023	Ŋunà dé kweèr, bɔ́ lé bú ŋaár naâ faá bɔ́ ŋar yeé bɔ̀ huaán dɔɔ́ŋ nɔ. Ŋunà dé veèh nùà njèh, Càŋ lé naá gi`i ŋaàr seèn toò tueé kwaá, te bɔ́ nde ye bú ŋar.
48004024	Béh nde né njeré dé`i teèn ŋgweé keéh: bɔ̀ véh fà sâ né sòn ŋgɔ̀ŋ fà. Cén dé`i, yilí seèn né Hàgâr; né sòn ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé`i. Dé sâ né ŋgɔ̀ŋ mé Càŋ lé tueé naâ ké felè tòr Sinayî doô. Bɔ̀ huaán mé bɔ́ lé ŋaár naâ te ŋgɔ̀ŋ bú sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá gi`i dé bɔɔ̀n te yuií kwer-e.
48004025	Hàgâr né sòn tòr Sinayî sâ te tàbè Arabî. Hàgâr cên sâ né cu sòn Jerusalem dé cafanê bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr teèn mene. Lòù sam, bɔ́ né gi bɔ̀ kwer sóù.
48004026	Jerusalem dé gècên né ké te vulúu, à dé seèn né véh dé nùà njèh, à kwer sam. Dé beèh, meí beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né bú.
48004027	Né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: Sàmè sér dé yeè lòù, ma ŋgiîn! Kwá njí lòm be mé ja kioô, nyer dé`i wò némá ŋgúŋgwéh! Si yeè lé naâ wò si lɔɔ́, wò mé huaán sam. Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ huaán yeè maga kela nde né kɔɔ́ mé dé huer yeè. Wò samé nde né dé cî.»
48004028	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí né dé bi`i bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ. Càŋ lé naâ ménâ toò tueé kwaá faá à lé naâ felè Isâk toò tueé kwaá nɔ.
48004029	Léí toò huaán mé bɔ́ lé ŋaár naâ bú mé terreb Cúcuí Càŋ sâ, bɔ́ lé naâ bú bunó; huaán mé bɔ́ lé ŋaár naâ faá bɔ́ ŋar yeé nùàr nɔ, lé bunó naâ bú kɔɔ́. Mé kènê mene, née den ka môn ye.
48004030	Yeé baá môn, ŋgòr Càŋ tueé ŋagá ndɔ, ye: Kwɔ́gɔ́ sɔ̀m ma mé né dé seèn kwer sâ kwɔgɔ̀; kwɔ́gɔ́ sɔ̀m bɔ̂ ŋuna seèn mene. Kɔ́ɔ ye, ŋgúlú teleè né dé ŋunà veèh nùà njèh; ŋunà kweèr dé seèn te gà ŋgúlu sam.»
48004031	Mɔ né mân, bɔ̀ nùàr mò, sâ béh bí dé beèh bɔ̀ ŋunà kweèr sam, béh né bɔ̀ ŋunà veèh dé nùà njèh.
48005001	Kristò béh te yuií kwer-e se sɔm aá kèn, ye te béh den lom mé feh beèh, béh ka sóù dèn cú. Sâ, bí dèn lòm mé feh bi`i nɔɔ́ŋ ménâ, bí té te yuií kwer-e yílá cú.
48005002	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mè tueé né kɔɔ́, bí félá nyégé bagasé: mɔ bí né cu ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b, sâ Kristò njèh gàm beè bi`i sam cuú.
48005003	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b dɔɔ́ŋ, sâ bɔ́ a: jòlò kòmò lòm sóú mé gùm mene ndɔ.
48005004	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né sóú jolo, ye bí bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè Càŋ ŋa nde né mé njéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bí bɔ̀ Kristò geé baá kèn; bí vu aá be mé fùgò Càŋ ndɔ.
48005005	Dé beèh môn sam; béh dé beèh ndèm kwaá njií seér né mé bú, ye loù sâ à nde né béh bɔ̀ didilî bɔ̀ beè seèn yilá. Béh hên kela den né cí, béh né temé teèn mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ kwaá njií gií ndɔ.
48005006	Béh kɔ né ye, mɔ béh nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr Yeésò Kristò, béh ŋɔb mene ŋgór, béh mene ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh, dɔɔ́ŋ ju sam. Njèh gècên né lom temé cén yoòr Kristò kwaá njiî. Bɔ́ temé cén sâ ŋene kɔ nde né mé lètenè beèh gwaán kuû.
48005007	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, hên bí lé baá gi`i ceér gècên faá nùàr nɔ bele nyegé; bɔɔ́ né naàn mé bí ceér gècên sâ bèlè cú wa? Ne`i bí yiín né kɔɔ́?
48005008	Dé mé bí né seér ŋgɔ sâ, bí kékɔɔ̀ ye, beè Càŋ mé né bí yilá doô yùò ná ŋgwêh.
48005009	Bɔ́ lɔ kɔ tueê ye: Nyure cén beéh yeé túɔ́m kɔɔ́. Hên baá-re cí sâ.
48005010	Mé njéh mene, mè né kɔɔ́ ye, béh bí baá gi dé beèh beè Fehtoò beèh, béh bí nde né mé sòn cên den ndɔ. Mè né cu kɔɔ́ ye, né mene ne`i, nuaá mé né bí feh ter ŋellé gɔ sâ, nde né ju tarê die.
48005011	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè dé mò túé ŋgwéh ye nuaré dé`i a, kɔ ŋɔ́b sɔ́ cú ŋgór, te Càŋ gam ye bú. Mɔ sé né môn, mè sé né cu gèr beè bɔ̀ Jûf ŋené den wa? Sâ cio mé Yeésò lé kuú naâ ké te toû doô sé naá cuù njèh d`ièb beè bɔɔ̀n ŋaá wa?
48005012	Mè teèn sam. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ka bí feh ter ŋellé gɔ sâ, bɔ́ a, njí ká bɔ́ nji`i, bɔ́ teèn kà bílí mé tùlù mene!
48005013	Dé bi`i bɔ̀ nùàr mò, Càŋ bí yilá gi aá kèn, ye te bí den mé feh bi`i. Njèh cén, mé feh bi`i deèn sâ, túé ŋgwéh ye bí bɔ́ làrè njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr né gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ. Sòn sâ, bí gwàn kú sér mé njéh lètenè bi`i dé gwaân, bí né lètenè bi`i gam kuú.
48005014	Lòù sam, bɔ̀ sóú dɔɔ́ŋ yila gi né yoòr sóú bú cén mé né tueé ye: Gwàn mbeí yeè faá wò gwaán né ŋgàŋ yoòr yeè doô.
48005015	Á, mɔ bí den seér cu né faá bɔ̀ nyam ké ya dueè nɔ, bí lètenè bi`i bɔɔ́ kuú seér veên mé veên, sâ bí kè keè, mè tueé bí, bí nde né lètenè bi`i calé kuú.
48005016	Mɔ né mân, mè tueé bí, bí kwá lɔ́ yɔ̀ŋ bi`i beè Cúcuí Ŋagâ, te à feh bí ceér kɔɔ́. Njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr bi`i gwaán seér né kɔɔ́, bí té dé sâ bɔ́.
48005017	Lòù sam, bɔ̀ njií sâ bɔ́ bɔ̀ dé Cúcuí Càŋ nyuùn kwàrè bèh. Yeé baá môn, Cúcuí Càŋ bar taré bɔ́ ndɔ: dé`i bɔ̂ mbeí nyuùn kwàrè cú, te njií mé bí gwaán né bɔɔ̂ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bɔ́ kòmò cú ndɔ.
48005018	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ Cúcuí Càŋ bí ceér feh né kɔɔ́, sâ bí dé bi`i ka sóù sam cuú.
48005019	Nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né gi seé ŋgàŋ yoòr bagasé mân kɔɔ́ nyegé: ŋgàŋ yoòr gwaán né yàgà yɔŋ tobô; à gwaán né fúár, à gwaán né sár tegê.
48005020	Ŋgàŋ yoòr gwaán né cècàŋ dua gɔɔ̀; táhunó né bú. Bɔ̀ nùàr né bɔ̀ mbeí bunó gɔ; tɔgɔ bɔ̂ huer mé ŋá-temé né li; keên né bɔ́ seé weh, bɔ́ né mé sòn hihiné kerré den,
48005021	bɔ́ né njèh kàn gwaán, bɔ́ né sela gɔ, bɔ́ né soóm gɔ, bɔ́ né lom mé bɔ̀ veên dé`i faá bèh mân bɔɔ́ ndeé. Mè bí tueé kwaá cu né faá mè lé naá gi`i bí tueé nɔ, ye bí a: bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né mân bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ Lò Càŋ mé njolo ŋéné ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ́g.
48005022	Tàb dé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né seér gwaân, vɔ́gɔ́-temé, cɔ̀ŋ, sèŋ, jere kɔɔ̂, húɔ́m-temé, dene kɔ́bè sâ,
48005023	dɔlê, mé yo sieè. Bɔ̀ njií mé né bɔ̀ njèh bebagaà ménâ dɔɔ́ŋ, sóú gwaán né cí.
48005024	Bɔ̀ nùàr dé Yeésò Kristò dɔɔ́ŋ faga wula gi aá ŋgàŋ yoòr bɔɔ̀n ké te toû, bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n bɔ̀ tuaá dé vevenê sâ doó su njií gi aá kèn.
48005025	Cúcuí Ŋagâ béh yɔ̀ŋ haá né kɔɔ́. Mɔ né mân, sâ béh kwá lɔ́ gí yɔ̀ŋ beèh beè seèn, te à feh béh ceér kɔɔ́.
48005026	Béh té feh hàm, béh gè mé sà lètenè beèh fɔɔ̂n, béh té mé huer lètenè beèh ŋgéré kú cú.
48006001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ bí ŋene mbeí bi`i dé`i baá te veên yilá, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Cúcuí Càŋ né bí lè teèn, bí tùlù sɔ̀m kêh bú teèn tulù, bí feh nyegé bú ceér dé dilî, bí feh bú mé hueh dɔlê; wò né feh yeè teèn bɔŋ keéh ndɔ. Mɔ sam, wò nde né faá bú nɔ die.
48006002	Bí gàm kú lètenè bi`i gaàm, bí né mé seé lètenè bi`i jɔgɔ́ kuú. Mɔ bí né ménâ bɔɔ́, sâ bí né tòù Kristò bele huɔɔ́m.
48006003	Mɔ nuaré dé`i né lètenè bi`i munó, ye faá nyí nɔ sam, mé à hàm njeré dé`i sam ndɔ, sâ bú a, té feh seèn mbaá bèlè kú.
48006004	Nùà kàn a, kè nyégé kèkènè seèn mé be seèn. Mɔ né teèn yilá, à nde né mé seé dé seèn nùà njèh sagár, à mé seé dé bɔ̀ mbeî mè sɔ́ ndé cú.
48006005	Mè tueé bí, nùà kàn jɔgɔ nde né seé seèn nùà njèh mé feh seèn.
48006006	Nuaá mé bɔ́ né bú Njàgà Bagaà se, bú a, kɔ̀b sɔ̀m bɔ̀ njèh seèn kèb dé`i, à haá nuaá mé feh yeé bú Njàgà Bagaà sâ teèn.
48006007	Bí té feh bi`i bèlè: bɔ́ beéh Càŋ séí bèh. Nùà kàn kwa cu nde né njií mé à lé dobó naâ.
48006008	Mɔ à dobo né njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr né gwaán, sâ ŋgàŋ yoòr nde né bú cio beè kwaá haá. Á, mɔ à dobo né dé mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ gwaán né kɔɔ́, sâ Cúcuí kwa haá nde né bú dé seèn yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà.
48006009	Béh bɔ́ lòm bagaà, béh té be mé njéh dù. Mɔ béh gùr ŋgwéh, loù sâ béh nde né kwaá.
48006010	Sâ, mɔ né mân, keí mé née hên, béh bɔ́ làrè bagaà mé nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ, tétég mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né te mbàgà Càŋe faá béh nɔ, béh té bɔ́ nyèn.
48006011	Bí né gèh bɔ̀ njolo mvù dé kokoô hên ŋené wa? Mè bɔ́ nyagá né mé be mò, te mè tema njií bí.
48006012	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né seé fù ŋgàŋ bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ ŋeí né bí mé ŋgór ŋɔɔ̂b kɔɔ́. Bɔ́ ye te wɔ́ŋ seén bɔ́ mé njéh seèn. Lòù sam, bɔ́ né gèr veéh; bɔ́ ye, mɔ bɔ́ tueé lom né felè cio Kristò ké te toû wa, bɔ́ nde né bɔ́ lòù bunó seér ma.
48006013	Á sâ, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né te ŋgór ŋɔɔ̂b ŋgelá den sâ, bɔ́ sóú hèllè mé feh bɔɔ̀n jòlò kòmò bèh ndɔ. Bɔ́ gwaán lom né ye te bí ŋɔb kuú mé ŋgór, bɔ́ punó seér mé njéh lòù, ye bí baá mé mágá bɔɔ̀n yoòr ma.
48006014	Dé mò môn sam. Beè mò, mè punó seér nde né mé cio Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò ké te toû. Mè wɔ́ŋ kɔ́ cú mé njéh, wɔ́ŋ mè kɔ́ cú mé njéh ndɔ; mè baá gi te njèh wɔ́ŋe komó mbaá.
48006015	Béh né mene ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b, béh mene ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, ju sam. Njèh gècên né lom nùà feê beè Càŋ ŋaâ.
48006016	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi ceér dé sâ bele dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ a, kɔ́ bɔ́ jere, há bɔ́ dɔlê, à kulu bilí bɔ́ mé bɔ̀ dé seèn lètenè bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà mene dɔɔ́ŋ.
48006017	Duɔɔ̂m mé lan, nuaré dé`i a, té mè feh ter bɔ́ ŋéllé cú. Bɔ̀ mágá mé né yoòr mò hên tueé ŋagá gi aá kèn, ye mè baá dé mò nùàr Yeésò.
48006018	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, ká s`iè gí bí beè. È môn.
49001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò. Càŋ lé mè mân sie kwaá naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn. Mè mvù hên nyagá njií né mé bí, bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ ké Efêse mé né gi temé tég yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ.
49001002	Tele beèh Càŋ bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
49001003	Kùsèm Càŋ Tele Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò! À lɔ naá gi`i béh bɔ̀ dàm njèh bebagaà ké te vulúu kulú haá. À lɔ béh haá keéh naâ beè Kristò.
49001004	Mé à lɔ nde wɔ́ŋ si, sâ dàb mé à lɔ béh yoòr Yeésò Kristò balé yií gi aá, ye te béh ndeè den lom bɔ̀ nùàr nyî, mé ndɔ̀gɔ̀ veên dé`i yoòr beèh ŋéné sáb cú.
49001005	Càŋ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn lɔ ménâ nyegé kwaá gi`i mé kàgà-ndòn seèn, ye nyí ndeè nde né béh bɔ̀ huaán nyî mé Yeésò Kristò sie seér ma. À lé ménâ gwaán naâ kɔɔ́.
49001006	Sâ ye te tàŋɔ̀r húɔ́m-temê nyî ŋené yuo kelà cie mé njéh. Béh yila baá-re fùgò làgàt`i beè seèn kuû. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né mé Huaán yíé-temê seèn.
49001007	Mé húɔ́m Ŋunà, à lé naâ béh te veéne yili sɔm, à kulu sɔm yúlá-temé beèh lè seèn ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, ye te béh ŋene kɔ tàŋɔ̀r húɔ́m-temé nyî teèn.
49001008	Né lom felè beèh faá cí nɔ yaám ndeé, ye te kɔ́ŋkɔŋ bɔ̂ lo nyî yam sie lom béh beè mé gùm mene.
49001009	Njií mé à lɔ naâ ter nyegé naáb kwaá sâ, lɔ naá gi`i mé kàgà-ndòn seèn, ye te ndeè mboón mé Kristò ma. À béh hên feh keéh né cí,
49001010	wa loù mé wɔ́ŋ nde né teèn gií, nyí nde né njèh ké te vulúu mé ká doó mene dɔɔ́ŋ bècénè horó bilí, te Kristò den lom felè bɔɔ̀n kɔɔ́.
49001011	Mé Kristò béh baá gi mé gà teèn. Sâ tueé né ye, Càŋ lɔ béh ter ké toò balé kwaá naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn. Né ménâ, à njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi yeé jéjég faá à nyegé kwaá yeé nɔ,
49001012	te be terrèb seèn ŋené yuo kelà yoòr beèh bɔ̀ toò-jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ mé lɔ naá gi`i ndèm mé Kristò kwaá lɔgɔ́.
49001013	Mé bí mene ndɔ, cu mé Njàgà Bagaà mé né ŋgòr gècên lé waà naâ ké lètenè bi`i te yili sɔm bí, ŋgweéh bí lé naá gi`i temé yoòr Kristò kwaá njií mà! Yeé baá ménâ, Càŋ maga kwaá gi bí yilí seèn yoòr ndɔ. Mágá sâ né Cúcuí Ŋagâ. Cúcuí Ŋagâ sâ lɔ ndéb seèn jegé naâ kɔɔ́.
49001014	Béh yeé kwa baá bú, béh kɔ baá-re mé njéh ndɔ, ye ŋgúlú Càŋ né béh kela, ye loù mé Càŋ nde né béh dé kè`i cên yili sɔm wa, béh nde né ŋgúlú seèn yieé ma. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ ye te be terrèb nyî ŋené yuo kelà cie mé njéh.
49001015	Mɔ né mân, mè né lom Càŋ felè bi`i mé gècên mene vra. Lòù sam, bɔ́ ye mè a, bí né lom temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò kwaá njií, wa bí bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ gwaán né mé temé cén ndɔ ma.
49001016	Mè né Càŋ felè bi`i vra, mè sòn dù bèh. Mè né bú dua,
49001017	bú Càŋ sùsùm, Tele Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò, mè ye bú a: Há ŋéí cú bí Cúcuí seèn lòù, te bí ŋgweé komo njèh, à feh ŋagá bí gècên seèn, te bí kɔ ŋeí cu Càŋ dé ŋeî.
49001018	Bú a, kúkùr seèn, à s`i kwá lege ŋagâ seèn lè bi`i, te bí ŋene gèh ndèm mé à yilá kwaá né bí beè seèn mé njéh doô. Bú a, bɔ́ te gèh sèsàm ŋgùlù mé bɔ̀ nùàr seèn nde né kwa dɔɔ́ŋ den den njolò bi`i bèsɔ́nè.
49001019	Bú a, bɔ́ te béh bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, béh ŋene kɔ be terrèb seèn mé né lom yoòr beèh faá cí nɔ yieé. Terreb seèn bú sâ, dé seèn dé se komoò sam.
49001020	À lé Yeésò Kristò te cio komo sɔɔ́m naâ mé terreb bú sâ, à weh ŋaá mé bú ké te vulúu, à kwaá njií bú te be gaâ seèn.
49001021	Felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ né bú. Terreb wɔ̂ŋ né mene naàn, né mene gèh terrèb dé heè ké te vulúu dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi ka seèn. Gwaán yilí bɔɔ̀n a, ŋgúlí yɔ̀ŋ méné wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, gwaán bú a, ndé ŋgúlí yílá te nàm dé ké toò mene dɔɔ́ŋ, felè bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ̂ŋ né Kristò.
49001022	Càŋ lɔ ka ba gulè Kristò ba yií gi`i naâ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ; à feh te mbàgà seèn sie kwaá né bú ndɔ.
49001023	Mbàgà seèn sâ né faá kukuŋ Kristò nɔ. Kristò mé gùm mene ŋené yuo kelà né teèn, à yoòr né mé kèkènè Càŋ mé gùm mene ndɔ.
49002001	Léí toò, bí lé naâ mé gècên mene sabé, bí né te veên teré yilá, bí lé beè Càŋ naá gi`i cúg faá bɔ̀ komó nɔ.
49002002	Wɔ́ŋ lé bí yoòr yila seér naâ kɔɔ́, bí ŋgɔ seér cí. Bí lé sòn ŋgweé seér naâ dé mgbè terrèb ké ter ka vulû. Wa hên, terreb seèn hèllè ka gí ŋgwéh ndɔ, née ka mé seé yoòr bɔ̀ ŋgén-sòn bɔ̀ temá ndeé den ye.
49002003	Béh né kɔɔ́ ye, béh dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá gi`i ménâ ndɔ. Tuaá veên lé naâ béh lè salé, béh lé naá gi`i njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr beèh gwaán né kɔɔ́ bɔɔ́ seér, béh lé njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi`i naâ mé feh beèh ménâ. Béh sé naá gi`i ju mé gèh dene bú sâ die, faá bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ nɔ.
49002004	Mé njéh mene, húɔ́m-temé Càŋ né njèh yɔgɔ̂: Càŋ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn né seér cu béh jere kɔɔ́.
49002005	Béh lé né gi mene toò seèn mé veên beèh hèllè komó cúg, à lé naâ béh yɔ̀ŋ dé feê mé Kristò haá seér, à yili sɔm béh dé lòù,
49002006	à béh te cio komo sɔm keêh mé bú, à béh kwaá njií seér ké te vulúu, te béh bɔ́ den kɔɔ́.
49002007	Càŋ béh tàŋɔ̀r húɔ́m-temé seèn mé Yeésò Kristò ménâ feh keéh gi né, ye te bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ ŋene kwaá gi fùgò dueè nyî njolò.
49002008	Bí lé yili yuoó naâ mé fùgò húɔ́m-temé Càŋ sâ. Lé naâ mé temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Bú sâ lé mé kàgà-ndòn bi`i nùà njèh ná ŋgwêh. Càŋ lé bí fùgò sâ haá naâ mé lè`i seèn.
49002009	Béh lé seé bagaà dé`i bɔ́ kòmò ná ŋgwêh ndɔ; à lé béh haá naâ dé lòù, ye te nùàr mé seé dé`i mbaá púnó kú cú.
49002010	Bí kɔ́ sér ye, Càŋ lɔ béh meè naâ kɔɔ́; wa, à lɔ béh si bilí kwaá naâ yoòr Yeésò Kristò, ye te ká jomo, yoòr beèh ndeè yam lom bɔ̀ seé bebagaà mé nyí lɔ naá gi`i léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ ter nyegé kwaá doô.
49002011	Mɔ né mân, bí mùnò njí cú dene bi`i dé léí toò, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf ŋàr-lè sam, mé bɔ̀ Jûf bí yilá né kurú, wa lòù sam, bɔ́ né dé bɔɔ̀n ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b ma. Sâ né lom mágá te ŋgàŋ yoòr kèb cieè mbaá ndɔ.
49002012	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ́ né ménâ yilá sâ, bí mùnò njí cú gèh dene bi`i dé léí toò sâ ndɔ, bí bɔ̀ Kristò lé née nòmò dàb we dàb ye. Sâ bí lé beè Càŋ née k`in ndɔ. Sâ te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn Iserálà bí lé née teèn sam ye. À lɔ né mene ŋgɔ̀ŋ kɔ ye te ndéb nyî mboón, mé njéh mene à lɔ bí teèn yí kéh ná ŋgwêh. Sâ bí lɔ cu sâ née wɔ́ŋ ŋgɔ ye, bí mé ndèm lè sam, Càŋ lé mé yilí beè bi`i cu sâ ná ŋgwêh ndɔ.
49002013	Mé njéh mene, kènê Càŋ bí bɔ̀ Kristò sie bilí gi aá kèn. Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá gi`i nòmò dàb we dàb mé Càŋ léí toò sâ baá gi kènê kwarè seèn. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé njua húɔ́m Kristò.
49002014	Cɔ̀ŋ beèh né bú. Lòù sam, à lé naâ feh seèn semé, à sie bilí bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam mé njéh, à tulu sɔm kɔ̀ŋ mé lé naâ bɔ́ mé sòn hihiné kerré kwaá doô. Bùnò gi lètenè bɔɔ̀n ndɔ, bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ ŋaá bilí gèh cên.
49002015	Né mene bɔ̀ sóú Jûf dé kàn mé dé kân dɔɔ́ŋ, Kristò bɔ́ tɔr wula gi aá kèn, ye te gèh nùàr fà ŋa bilí, bɔ́ me yuo gèh dé feê cén, bɔ́ den yoòr nyî, bɔ́ ŋgweé fu ma.
49002016	Kristò yeé kuú baá ké ter te toû, à kuú nyoló lɔ kèrrè hèllè ké teèn sâ. À lɔ gèh nùàr fà sie bilí naâ mé cio bú sâ, te nde ye gèh dé feê cén ŋaá, à nyɔgɔ́ njií bú yoòr Càŋ.
49002017	Kristò lé ká te wɔ́ŋe ndeè naâ Njàgà Bagaà se ndɔ, te bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam kwa gi cɔ̀ŋ, wanɔɔ́ŋ bí bɔ̀ Càŋ lé naá gi`i nòmò dàb we dàb. Dé`i né cu, te bɔ̀ Jûf mé né dé bɔɔ̀n kwarè Càŋ kwa gi cɔ̀ŋ ménâ ndɔ.
49002018	Sâ kènê né mene Jûf mene Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ, Cúcuí Tele beèh Càŋ né gi béh yoòr, béh baá mé sòn toò Càŋ; né mé njua Kristò.
49002019	Mɔ né mân, sâ bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ, k`in beè Càŋ sam cuú. Bí bɔ́ nòmò dàb we dàb sam cuú ndɔ. Bí kènê baá gi huaán, faá bɔ̀ dé`i nɔ, bí bɔ́ kènê mbàgà Càŋ sio né dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr seèn.
49002020	Bí né gi felè maàŋ meé den. Maàŋ sâ né bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê bɔ́ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀. Taá dàn teèn né bú Yeésò Kristò nùà njèh.
49002021	Gwà sâ tarésé den né mé bú, te ham nyegé bagasé, ŋa gwà Càŋ dé koô mé bú nùà njèh ndɔ.
49002022	À gwà sâ me né mé bí, te den bèh joloò Càŋ, Cúcuí seèn cer beh teèn. Lòù sam, bí bɔ̀ Yeésò Kristò né kɔɔ́ teé bilí.
49003001	Yeé baá ménâ, mè Pɔ̂l mé né ká gwà cib`i felè Yeésò Kristò, mè né Càŋ felè bi`i bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dua.
49003002	Bí lé naá gi`i ŋgweé, ye Càŋ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn lé naâ mè seé hên jege haá, ye mè a, ndé ké lètenè bi`i seé nyî bɔɔ́ jegé.
49003003	Njií mé à lɔ naá gi`i nyegé naáb kwaá sâ, à lé naâ mè njolò ŋené feh ndɔ. Mè la naâ bɔ̀ njàb dé`i teèn nyagá weh, te mè tema njií bí.
49003004	Mɔ bí baá mvù mò hên jaŋé, bí nde né teèn ŋené kɔɔ́, ye mè né gi mé njèh nâb felè Kristò sâ ká lè ma.
49003005	Njií mé lé naâ lòù leér den sâ, Càŋ lɔ bú mé bɔ̀ léí-toò bɔ̀ ŋéné fèh ná ŋgwêh. À nde Cúcuí seèn yoòr bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê seèn mé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ tema njií seér aá kènê, te à nde ye bɔ́ ŋené feh.
49003006	Njèh lèrrèb sâ né ye: mé Njàgà Bagaà sâ, bɔ̀ Jûf mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ, nde gi né ŋgúlú Càŋ yieé, bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ baá gi yoòr yo cên, bɔ́ né gi te ndéb mé Càŋ lɔ kwa kwaá naâ mé Yeésò Kristò doô teèn ndɔ.
49003007	Mè mbɔ̀ŋ Njàgà Bagaà hên ŋa lom né mé fùgò húɔ́m-temê Càŋ felè mò, à mè terreb seèn yoòr nyeén su né kɔɔ́.
49003008	Wanɔɔ́ŋ, ŋgweéh lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, lólôb cèrè-mbáŋ bɔ̀ cèrè-mbâŋ faá mè nɔ sam mà. Mé njéh mene, Càŋ né cu mè jere lòù kɔɔ́ seér, ye mè a, ndé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam ŋgòr felè ŋgùlù mé né beè Kristò se. Mè tueé bí, ŋgùlù bú sâ dé tueê sam.
49003009	Ye mè a, sè ŋágá kwá nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ tieè ma, te bɔ́ ŋgweé kɔ gèh dé mé Càŋ né njèh nâb sâ mboón. Nùà njèh né bú Càŋ, à lɔ ménâ nyegé nab kwaá naâ kɔɔ́,
49003010	ye te ndeè ŋené yuo kelà te mbàgà nyî mân, te bɔ̀ c`il`i Càŋ bɔ́ bɔ̀ tetarê bɔ̀ ké ter ka vulû ŋene ŋagá kɔ́ŋkɔŋ nyî mé ceér hihiné teèn.
49003011	Càŋ mé Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh mân bɔɔ́ né jéjég faá à lɔ naá gi`i mé kàgà-ndòn seèn dé kè`i cên nyegé kwaá nɔ.
49003012	Kènê, béh baá mé sòn toò Càŋ teèn, béh njeré dé`i vèh cú njua mé béh né beè Kristò, mé temé beèh né gi yoòr seèn ndɔ.
49003013	Sâ kúkùr bi`i, mɔ dàm gèr né mene mè seé felè bi`i weh, bí té gùr, mè gèr ŋene né te bí yila ŋgùlù Càŋ.
49003014	Yeé baá ménâ, mè né toò Tele beèh Càŋ cemmé.
49003015	Né mene ké ter, né mene ká doó, mbàgà bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ njebá gi né mé yilí seèn.
49003016	Càŋ ŋgùrmò né lom bú. Mè né bú dua, ye bú a, s`i kwá bí lege Cúcuí seèn lè, te bí kwa beh terreb, bí né tég njebá taré.
49003017	Kristò a, cèr lòm te temé bi`i tég. Lòù sam, bí temé kwaá njií né yoòr seèn. Bú a, bɔ́ te gwaân yií lom jɔgɔb lètenè bi`i mé terreb,
49003018	te bí bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ mbaábi ŋgweé komo ye dàb bɔ̂ hàm gwaân Kristò, bí ŋgweé komo gèh dé mé gwaân Kristò teèn né yilá keéh ndɔ.
49003019	Dé sâ né môn, bí nde né gwaân seèn ŋgweé komo. Njèh cén, nùàr bú mé gùm mene ŋgwé kòmò bèh. Mé njéh mene, mɔ bí baá bú ŋgweé kɔɔ́, te bí yoòr den lom mé kèkènè Càŋ mé gùm mene.
49003020	Bú nuaá mé né seé yoòr beèh mé terreb seèn bɔɔ́, nde né faá béh dua né bú nɔ bɔɔ́ yɔgɔ́ keéh. Béh né mene njeré dé`i lòù munó lɔɔ́, à nde né béh ménâ bɔɔ́ yɔgɔ́ keéh ndɔ.
49003021	Kùsèm, ŋgɔ́g Càŋ a, ŋgúlí dèn te mbàgà seène mé Yeésò Kristò dé nyèmà mé nyèmà ménâ. È môn.
49004001	Sâ, mè nuaá mé né dé mò ká gwà cib`i felè seé Nùà Dueè hên, né bí bɔŋ, ye bí a, bí dèn lòm dene jéjêg mé Càŋ né bí mé njéh yilá sâ.
49004002	Bí dèn lòm yebbésé, dɔlésé, léláŋ sèŋ; bí né lètenè bi`i yoló kuú, bí né lètenè bi`i gwaán kuú ndɔ.
49004003	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Cúcuí Càŋ né bí bècénè teé bilí. Bí lègè lòm tég, te bí den le bɔ̀ cên bɔ̀, bí den mé cɔ̀ŋ lètenè bi`i, faá Cúcuí te bilí né bí nɔ.
49004004	Ŋgweéh yo Kristò né gùm cén, Cúcuí Ŋagâ cén ndɔ mà. Mé ndèm né ménâ ndɔ, à né lom bèh cén. Càŋ bí dɔɔ́ŋ yilá bilí gi né teèn.
49004005	Fehtoò beèh né lom cén, bèh temé kwaá njiî cén, nòmò Càŋ koù cén,
49004006	Càŋ né lom cén ndɔ, Tele beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né bú, felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ né bú, à seé bɔɔ́ laré né dɔɔ́ŋ, lè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ né gi bú ndɔ.
49004007	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, lètenè beèh nùà kàn né mé gà seé seèn yoòr faá Kristò haá keéh né bú mé húɔ́m-temé seèn nɔ.
49004008	Né faá né te mvù Càŋe felè Kristò nyagá kwaá ndɔ, ye: À yeé baá ké ter te vulúu ŋaá ndeé, à sie sie bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ beè, à seé ká doó haá lɔ mé bɔ̀ nùàr.»
49004009	À yeé ŋaá nde aá ké ter te vulúu, sâ tueé né ye naàn? Ŋgweéh sâ ye, à lɔ jɔ̀gɔ̀ kura suagà lɔgɔ́ naâ tɔ́g ká doó mà.
49004010	Nùà cên mé lé ká doó suagà naâ kɔɔ́ sâ, lé ké ter felè vulû ŋaá nde cuù naâ kɔɔ́, te à ŋené yuo kela gi`i te njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ.
49004011	À nùà kàn seé hihiné haá né kɔɔ́: à bɔ̀ dé`i haá né seé mbɔ̀ŋ tebê, bɔ̀ dé`i sòn-Càŋ, bɔ̀ dé`i ŋgòr Càŋ se yɔɔ̀ŋ, bɔ̀ dé`i tèŋ bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Kristò bɔ̀, bɔ̀ dé`i nùà fèh-njèh.
49004012	À bɔ́ seé hihiné ménâ geé haá né te bɔ́ gam bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀, bɔ́ yií gi be te seé Càŋe ndɔ, te mbàgà Càŋ mé né kukuŋ Kristò kwaá yam njií gi temé yoòr seèn.
49004013	Gèh dé sâ, ndeè béh sie bilí nyegé nde né kɔɔ́, te temé mé béh né yoòr Kristò kwaá njií doô yuo gi kè`i cén, te béh dɔɔ́ŋ kɔ nyegé Ŋunà Càŋ bagasé, béh kula jolo wa ye nùàr faá bú nɔ, béh yoòr den mé kèkènè seèn mé gùm mene ndɔ.
49004014	Sâ, béh faá bɔ̀ huaán memanè dèn ndé cú. Gwaán cu sâ ndéb bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀ né mene ter lulí ŋaá, mé béh kóbó ndɔ́ré gɔ̀ ndé cú, faá fu né mé mvùɔ̀b nòmò dùà dɔɔ́ŋ kobó ndɔré gɔ nɔ.
49004015	Béh dé beèh túé ŋágá sér á gècên mé gwaân mene; béh né te njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ mé gècên mene kulá laré, te béh kula wa faá Kristò nɔ. Felè beèh né bú.
49004016	À bɔ̀ gà hihiné bècénè me jolo bilí né kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ gà sâ yo ŋa né kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Bɔ̀ gà sâ, dé kàn yoòr mbeî bagasé nyɔgɔ́ nde né mé cègè seèn faá Càŋ bɔɔ́ kwaá nê nɔ; ye mɔ gà dé kàn baá seé seèn faá tueé nê nɔ bɔɔ́, te yo somo huɔm, gwaân yam sie bú beè mé gùm mene ma.
49004017	Mè bí hên tueé njií né mé yilí Nùà Dueè: Càŋ a bɔ́ bí gɔ cu gò bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ̂ bɔ̀ dé`i. Bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n kɔ cegé né mbaá munó cur njiî,
49004018	lo bɔɔ̀n felè né cibi mbaá, bɔ́ te yɔ̀ŋ Càŋe né k`in. Lòù sam, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ cùr, bɔ̀ taŋgwan bilí né bɔ́ ndɔ.
49004019	Bɔ́ fegùl`i kɔ́ cú, bɔ́ yoòr yɔ waá seér né fúár; bɔ́ né núlú yoòr huan su, dé sie komoò sam nde cuú.
49004020	Bí gè lòm mé ceér bɔɔ̀n nɔɔ́ŋ. Kristò lé bí dé bi`i gèh dene bú sâ fèh sér ná ŋgwêh.
49004021	Ŋgweéh mé gècên mene, bí lé naá gi`i kùr Kristò ŋgweé, bɔ́ feh bí gècên mé né yoòr seèn ndɔ mà.
49004022	Sâ, bí húár yùò lòm dé bi`i te dene bú léí toò hèllè nɔɔ́ŋ, bí ŋá bɔ̀ fefeê bɔ̀, wanɔɔ́ŋ gèh dene bú léláŋ négêr hèllè lé bí bele njií seér naâ lè cio.
49004023	Kènê yoòr bi`i a, ŋéné sér á dene feê, mé mùnò feê ndɔ.
49004024	Bí yoòr sù sér á yo dé feê. Bú sâ né yo mé Càŋ lɔ sií naâ, ye te felá yo dé nyî nùà njèh; te teèn ŋené lom seé didilî, jéjég seê mé yuo yeé te gècên.
49004025	Mɔ né mân, bí máb nyeén! Nùà kàn a, túé lòm gècên mé mbeí. Lòù sam, béh dɔɔ́ŋ bilí me gi né yo cén.
49004026	Mɔ temé baá nuaré dé`i yulá, bú a, kèkeè; mɔ sam, à nde né veên mé njéh sela. Nùàr a, té mé yúlá-temé lè gùm cieê sɔ́ yílí.
49004027	Bí té gwàn mé táhòrò yií keéh be teèn.
49004028	Nuaá mé né yeé yíb ŋuɔɔ́b, bú a, sɔ̀m be teèn nɔɔ́ŋ. Bú a, té kòb bɔ́ cú, à lègè sér mé ba beè seèn te gam bú, à gam keéh bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ teèn ndɔ.
49004029	Ŋgòr a, té bí sònò yùò jélá; sònò bi`i a, yùò sér bɔ̀ ŋgòr bebagaà mé nde né bɔ̀ mbaábi te ceér Càŋe gam, te Càŋ kulu bɔ́ mé njéh.
49004030	Càŋ a bɔ́ bí bɔɔ́ yulá Cúcuí Càŋ temé; bí kɔ́ɔ ye mágá Càŋ nùà njèh yoòr bi`i né bú. Temé beèh lè die né mé bú, ye loù sâ wa, Càŋ nde né béh dé kè`i cên yili sɔm ma.
49004031	Bí káb lóú njí jélá-temé ké dàb; ŋá-temé bɔ̂ fúrú-temé ké dàb ndɔ. Tɔgɔ bɔ̂ séb a tíndɔ̂g. Bí té temé jéré, te ŋgòr veên leér yuo lètenè bi`i.
49004032	Bí dèn sér lètenè bi`i léláŋ húɔ́m-temê, bí né mé jere lètenè bi`i kɔɔ́ kuú ndɔ. Dé kàn a, kúlú sɔ̀m veên mbeí senà lè seèn, faá Càŋ né veên beèh doó mé Kristò kulú njií nɔ.
49005001	Kènê, bí baá bɔ̀ huaán yíé-temê Càŋ. Mɔ né mân, sâ dene Càŋ nùà njèh a, ŋéné lòm yoòr bi`i kɔɔ́.
49005002	Bí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ gí mé gwaân bɔ̀ mbaábi`i lè faá Kristò né mé gwaân beèh lè nɔ. À lé mé njéh kuú naâ felè beèh, à nde dé seèn Càŋ sèmè haá seér mé gùm seèn nùà njèh; te yo Càŋ nɔré mé njéh.
49005003	Kènê, bí baá bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ; Càŋ a bɔ́ bí nde yàgà; bí té négér cór, bí té temé te ŋgúlú kwá njí. Né mene dé tueê, gèh bɔ̀ njií hên a, té sònò bi`i yùò.
49005004	Bɔ̀ ŋgòr vevenê a, té sònò bi`i ndùàlè yùò. Né mene ja, bú a té bí sònò yùò jélá vé ndɔ. Bí te njèh dɔɔ́ŋe vrà sér Càŋ dé vraà.
49005005	Mè né tueé ye bí a, nuaá mé né sár gwaá, bɔ̂ tánégér mé nùà nyaâ dé bɔɔ̀n ŋgùlù Kristò bɔ̂ Càŋ yíé ndé ŋgwéh. Dé nyaâ, njií mé nùàr né mbeí nomó dɔɔ́ŋ, né cècàŋ beè nùà sâ.
49005006	Càŋ a bɔ́ nuaré dé`i waà, né bí mé bɔ̀ ŋgòr mbembaâ bele weh. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, temé né yeé Càŋ mé bɔ̀ seé vevenê hèllè ŋaá, à jeré njií bɔ̀ dúágá-tie bɔ̀ gèr yoòr.
49005007	Bí bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ té mé njeré dé`i bɔ́ kwàrè gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
49005008	Bí dé bi`i te cibi faá léí toò nɔ sam cuú, bí kènê yoòr baá gi mé ŋagâ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò. Bí gɔ̀ bá gò nuaá mé né bèh ŋagâ,
49005009	bí né tàb faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bèh ŋagâ nɔ waá ndɔ: bí dèn lòm léláŋ húɔ́m-temê, léláŋ dene dilî, mé léláŋ gècên.
49005010	Bí lègè lòm tég, te bí ŋene kɔ bɔ̀ njií mé né Fehtoò beèh yoòr huɔɔ́m, bí bɔɔ́ cí.
49005011	Bɔ̀ ŋgiín seé mé bɔ̀ macùr né bèh cib`i bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí té be teèn yí, bí sàlè sér bɔ́ mé njéh lòù.
49005012	Wanɔɔ́ŋ njií mé bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ né yeé lòù bɔɔ́ leér gɔ hèllè, dé mé nùàr nde né tueé komo mé fegùl`i sam.
49005013	Mɔ bɔ́ né njeré dé`i cie salé sɔm, kèkènè njií sâ nde né cie ŋagá le.
49005014	Lòù sam, njií mé né ye bèsɔ́nè dɔɔ́ŋ, né suútenè. Bɔ́ te mvù Càŋe tueé né dé cí, ye: Wò baá lɔ́m kpɔ́g. Ny`imè yùò lètenè bɔ̀ komô nyimè, te yoòr yeè ŋené seér ŋagâ Kristò.»
49005015	Sâ, mɔ né mân, kɔ bí bɔŋ nyegé feh mé dene bi`i bagasé ndɔ. Bí té dene macùr kèmà; yoòr bi`i a, yám sér á dene kɔ́gɔ̀n.
49005016	Lɔ́ŋ mé né toò bi`i ŋené dɔɔ́ŋ, bí té y`i kéh, wanɔɔ́ŋ cafanê veên fií né kela.
49005017	Bí té lòù bɔ́ mb`i njí, bí félá nyégé lòù, te bí ŋgweé ye njií mé Fehtoò beèh né gwaán, bí bɔɔ́ cí.
49005018	Bí té mbè sèlà. Mɔ sam, bí lòù ndabé seér aá kèn. Sòn sâ, bí sèlà sér Cúcuí Ŋagâ,
49005019	bí né ŋgòr Càŋ mé bené lètenè bi`i se kuú, bí né tòù Càŋ lòù de; bɔ̀ bené mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bele teèn dɔɔ́ŋ, bí sén gí Fehtoò beèh mé njéh seèn, bí sén lòm bú mé temé bi`i mene.
49005020	Bí vrà làrè Tele beèh Càŋ te njèh dɔɔ́ŋe, bí vra bú mé yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò, bí té sòn dù.
49005021	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né Kristò veéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bí ŋgwé kú sòn lètenè bi`i ŋgweè.
49005022	Bɔ̀ véh a, ŋgwé sòn bɔ̀ si bɔɔ̀n faá bɔ́ ŋgweé né sòn Fehtoò beèh nɔ.
49005023	Lòù sam, felè veèh né si; né faá felè mbàgà Càŋ né Kristò ndɔ nɔ. Mbàgà sâ né kukuŋ seèn, à bú yili sɔm yeé kɔɔ́.
49005024	Sâ bɔ̀ véh a, ŋgwé làrè sòn bɔ̀ si bɔɔ̀n te njèh dɔɔ́ŋe, faá mbàgà Càŋ ŋgweé né sòn Kristò nɔ.
49005025	Mé bí bɔ̀ siíb ndɔ, bí gwàn lòm bɔ̀ veèh bi`i mé temé cén faá Kristò lé naâ mbàgà Càŋ gwaán, à kuú felè seèn nɔ.
49005026	À lé teèn kuú naâ ye te mbàgà Càŋ den lom beè Càŋ ŋagásé, faá nyí lé naá gi`i bú mé nòmò bɔ̂ ŋgòr nyeén kwaá nɔ.
49005027	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, ye te mbàgà Càŋ toò nyî yuo kela lom kɔ́bè sâ, à luagár huɔm yàgà, à den pír, à dé nyî den lom mé gùm mene.
49005028	Mɔ né mân, sâ bɔ̀ siíb a, gwàn lòm bɔ̀ véh bɔɔ̀n mé temé cén faá bɔ́ gwaán né ŋgàŋ yoòr bɔɔ̀n nɔ. Nuaá mé né veèh mé temé cén ménâ gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, gwaán né ŋgàŋ yoòr seèn nùà njèh.
49005029	Á sâ, nuaré dé`i né yeé ŋgàŋ yoòr seèn kɔɔ́ bunó cuú ndɔ wa? Ŋgweéh à bú koó seér yeé mé yáb, à bɔŋ nyegé bú wa? Né faá Kristò bɔŋ yeé mbàgà Càŋ ndɔ nɔ.
49005030	Lòù sam, béh dɔɔ́ŋ, béh né gi bɔ̀ gà seèn.
49005031	Né dé cî mé nùàr nde né tele bɔ̂ meí si lɔɔ́, à nde veèh kwa, bɔ́ bú den, te bɔ́ fà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋa lom cén.» Né te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den.
49005032	Ŋgé`i ŋgòr gècên né te lèmè hên ŋené ŋagá. Mè kɔ né dé mò ye, ŋgòr hên tétég jue né Kristò bɔ̂ mbàgà Càŋ.
49005033	À jue cu ma gwà ndɔ. Nùà kàn a, gwàn lòm veèh seèn mé temé cén faá à gwaán né ŋgàŋ yoòr seèn nɔ. Ma dé kàn a, ŋgwé táré sòn si`i ndɔ.
49006001	Bí bɔ̀ huaán, seé bi`i toò Fehtoò beèh né sòn bɔ̀ tele bi`i mé meí bi`i ŋgweê, te dilí ye.
49006002	Né te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den ndɔ, ye: Ŋgwé sòn tele yeè mé meí yeè ma. Bèh joloò Càŋ dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ mé ndéb né teèn baá ye bú hên,
49006003	ye mɔ wò né mân bɔɔ́, wò nde né samésé den, cieé yeè maga ye ká te wɔ́ŋe ndɔ.
49006004	Mé bí bɔ̀ tele huaân ndɔ, bí té bɔ̀ huaán temé bɔ́ yúlá, bí léb sér bɔ́ ndéb, bí né bɔ́ mé temé Fehtoò beèh lè soró nyegé.
49006005	Bí bɔ̀ kwer, bí ŋgwé sòn bɔ̀ tele seê bi`i, bí vèh bɔ́ veèh, bí né toò bɔɔ̀n lòù ndelé seér. Bí bɔ́ lòm seé bɔɔ̀n mé temé cén faá né seé Kristò nɔ.
49006006	Bí té léláŋ njolò nùàr bɔ́ húɔ́m lòm, ye te bɔ́ keí bí, bí dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ sér faá bɔ̀ kwer Kristò nɔ. Bí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ gí mé temé cén faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ.
49006007	Bí seé bɔɔ̀n bɔ́ lòm mé kàgà-ndòn bi`i faá né seé Fehtoò beèh nɔ, bí té túé ye né lom seé dé bɔ̀ nùàr.
49006008	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, nuaá mé né seé teèn bɔɔ́ yií dɔɔ́ŋ, né mene kwer, mene kwer sam, nde né sàgà beè Nùà Dueè mé seé sâ kwa ma.
49006009	Bí bɔ̀ tele seê, bí bɔ́ yí mé bɔ̀ kwer bi`i teèn ménâ ndɔ, bí té bɔ́ lòù mgbálé. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, ké te vulúu bí bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé Tele cên, à dé seèn nùàr lòù gè`i bèh.
49006010	Mè tueé lɔ né ye bí a, bí bílí dèn gí beè Fehtoò beèh, te bí taré nyegé mé terreb dé seèn.
49006011	Bí yoòr wèh sù kwá sér bɔ̀ njèh taâb mé né beè Càŋ, te bí kwa nyegé terreb, bí njebá taáb mé táhòrò nùà kɔ́ŋkɔɔ̀ŋ, à bí bèlè cú.
49006012	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, béh taáb sâ mé nùàr líé njí ŋgwéh, béh lie njií né mé bɔ̀ càŋ tándulu ké ter ka vulû, béh lie njií mé kunduŋ wɔ́ŋ cib`i bɔ́ bɔ̀ terreb ká teèn hihiné mene.
49006013	Mɔ né mân, bí beè njébá lòm mé bɔ̀ njèh taâb dé Càŋ, te loù mé cieé veên nde jueè teèn, bí kwa terreb, bí weh Sátàn seé; bí kɔ taáb, sâ bí née ter njebá den ye.
49006014	Bí mélá dèn gí te gule; bí dèn lòm bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀, sâ né kàndá bi`i, bí teneè cám kwá cí. Dene dilî né cɔ̀gɔ̀ taâb bi`i, bí yoòr vùɔ̀b kwá cí.
49006015	Bí yílá Njàgà Bagaà mé feh mene seè, te nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ kwa dɔlê. Bí yílá ménâ, sâ né débágá bi`i, bí gulè yí kwá cí.
49006016	Bí kwá njí dèn temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh, kɔ̀ bi`i né cí, te cií nyegé bí, sàŋ bí s`iè cú. Táhòrò né mene bí sàŋ yoòr si njií, nde né mbaá nyimé le.
49006017	Bí gwàn lòm dé gwaân ye Càŋ né bí yili sɔm; tàm taâb bi`i né cí. Bòù-taâb bi`i né ŋgòr Càŋ; bí wèh s`iè beè. Cúcuí Ŋagâ haá né bí kɔɔ́.
49006018	Bí dùà dèn Càŋ cu dɔɔ́ŋ mé Cúcuí seèn lè, bí té sòn mé bú dù. Bí dèn làŋ ndɔ, bí né tég njebá taré, bí né Càŋ felè bɔ̀ nùàr seèn dɔɔ́ŋ dua laré.
49006019	Bí né bú felè mò dua ndɔ; bú a, há mè njàb ŋgòr mé né teèn yilá, mè tueé cí, te mè se ŋaré nyegé Njàgà Bagaà mé lé naâ bèh naâb leér den doô, mè njeré dé`i vèh cú.
49006020	Mè la née mene ká gwà cib`i ye, mé njéh mene, Yeésò Kristò mè sie kwaá né nùà tebê, ye mè a, sè Njàgà Bagaà seè. Bí dùà Càŋ felè mò, te mè se lom mé terreb faá gwaán nê nɔ.
49006021	Yíé-temé beèh Tisîk mé né seé Fehtoò beèh teèn bɔɔ́ yií, tueé nde né bí dene mò kɔɔ́, te bí den mé njàgà mò tieè.
49006022	Mè bú ké yoòr bi`i tétég tema njií né dé cî, te bí kɔ gèh dene beèh, temé die bí lè.
49006023	Tele beèh Càŋ bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, há làrè bɔ̀ mbaábi dɔlê dɔɔ́ŋ; bɔ́ a, bɔ́ te bí gwaán kuú lètenè bi`i, bí kwaá njií ŋeí temé yoòr bɔɔ̀n dé ŋeî.
49006024	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò dé kè`i cên gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, húɔ́m temé Càŋ a, ká s`iè gí bɔ́ beè.
50001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, bêh Timotê nyagá njií né mé bí kɔɔ́. Béh né bɔ̀ seê bɔ̀ Yeésò Kristò. Béh bie né bí bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ lè lɔɔ́ Filîp; béh né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ mabɔn lètenè bi`i dɔɔ́ŋ bieé ndɔ. Bí né gi te ceér Yeésò Kristò.
50001002	Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
50001003	Cu dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ mè baá bí munó, mè né yeé Càŋ felè bi`i vra.
50001004	Mɔ mè baá bú felè bi`i dua, mè dua lom yeé bú mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene ndɔ.
50001005	Lòù sam, bí lé naâ mè seé Càŋ gam. Bí lé duɔɔ́m naâ loù mé bí lé ŋgweé lɔgɔ́ naâ ŋgòr Càŋ teèn, tɔ́g nde waà hên, bí y`i ŋgwéh.
50001006	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, seé bagaà mé Càŋ lé baŋ lɔɔ̀ naâ ké lètenè bi`i hên, Càŋ nde né bú mboón sɔm keéh; nde né loù mé Yeésò Kristò cu ndeè né teèn.
50001007	Mè dé hên tueé yií né teèn. Lòù sam, mè né kwàgà bi`i yieé. Béh bí baá gi dé beèh kènê te fùgò Càŋe. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, bí né jomo mò ká gwà cib`i, faá bí lé naâ jomo mò te ŋgòr Càŋ nɔ. Béh bí lé Njàgà Bagaà ter lege njií naâ kɔɔ́.
50001008	Càŋ né dé seèn kɔɔ́ ye, mè gwaán né bí mé temé Yeésò Kristò mene dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
50001009	Mè né lom Càŋ cu dɔɔ́ŋ felè bi`i dua, te gwaân yam nde den lètenè bi`i ménâ, te bí den komo ye mé kékɔŋ, bí ŋene kɔ bɔ̀ njèh dé bebagaà mé dé vevenê,
50001010	bí geí weh bɔ̀ dé bebagaà. Te Kristò ndeè cuù loù sâ, à kwa gi bí ŋagásé mé veên yoòr sam.
50001011	Bí bɔɔ́ komo gi nde né bɔ̀ seé didilî mé terreb Yeésò Kristò, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene môn, bɔ́ seén Càŋ teèn, bɔ́ sumú bú ndɔ.
50001012	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bɔ̀ njií mé né gi mè kwa hên dɔɔ́ŋ né seér ŋgòr Càŋ lòù gam ma.
50001013	Bɔ̀ sɔ́j`i mé ke yeé bɔ̀gɔ̀ mgbè Rɔ̂m né gi kɔɔ́, ye mè né mbɔ̀ŋ Yeésò Kristò, wa mè gwà cib`i hên yila kuú né dé cî ma. Bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mân kɔɔ́ ndɔ;
50001014	te bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ kókoó mbaá yeé nde ŋene mè né ká gwà cib`i te ŋgòr Càŋe mân, haá bɔ́ terreb te ceér Fehtoò beèh ndɔ, bɔ́ ŋar yila lom ŋgòr Càŋ seè, bɔ́ njeré dé`i vèh cú.
50001015	Mè né gi kɔɔ́ ndɔ, ye bɔ̀ nuaré dé`i dé bɔɔ̀n ŋgòr Kristò tueé lom né mé sà mene, te bɔ́ ba njií mè doó. Mé njéh mene, ju sam, bɔ̀ dé`i né teèn, bɔ́ né ŋgòr Càŋ mé temé cén tueé.
