50001016	Temé bɔɔ̀n né gi yoòr mò, bɔ́ né kɔɔ́ ye mè né ká gwà cib`i, te gam Njàgà Bagaà ma.
50001017	Dé bɔ̀ dé hèllè, bɔ́ ŋgòr Kristò tueé né mé temé fà, bɔ́ né huer felè mò kuú, te ká gwà cib`i mè ŋene seér gèr mé njéh lòù.
50001018	Yúlá ŋgwéh ndɔ. Bɔ̀ temé fèfà bɔ̀ tueé mene kɔɔ́, né mene bɔ̀ temé cécéné bɔ̀, dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ tueé gi né ŋgòr Yeésò Kristò, temé mò né gi mé njéh vɔgɔ́; nde né ménâ vɔgɔ́ ndeé den ndɔ.
50001019	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ njií hên nde né dɔɔ́ŋ huɔɔ́m gií, te gam sɔm mè lè gwà cib`i, njua Càŋ duaà mé bí dua yeé felè mò doô; njua Cúcuí Yeésò Kristò mé né gàm mò ndɔ.
50001020	Mè tueé bí, mè fegùl`i gwàn ŋgwéh, mè gwaán seér né dene tarê lè ŋgòr Càŋe. Mè kɔ né ye nde né ménâ bɔɔ́ ndɔ, ndèm mò né gi teèn sâ. Mè née mene làŋ, mè kuú mene, mè gwaán lom né te ŋgɔ́g Yeésò ŋgulí yuo kelà yoòr mò cu dɔɔ́ŋ faá bèh mân.
50001021	Mè kɔ né ye, cu mé mè née mé njolo, yɔ̀ŋ mò né Kristò. Mɔ mè kuú, huɔm kela cu ye baá-re cí sâ.
50001022	Á hên, mɔ ye mè dèn lè ká cie, te mè bɔɔ́ nyegé seé Càŋ, sâ mè ke weh nde né dé heè?
50001023	Mè ndaŋ le aá kèn. Mè gwaán kela né yí kwarè Kristò yuo den ndeê; yí doó sâ huɔm kela né kɔɔ́.
50001024	Á, ká lè wɔ́ɔŋ kwarè bi`i mé njolo deèn, né cu njèh bagaà ndɔ, te gam bí,
50001025	mè né dé sâ ménâ kɔɔ́ nyegé. Mɔ né mân, sâ, mè né kɔɔ́ ye, mè nde née ká cie den weh ye. Béh bí den nde né kɔɔ́, te gam njií ser bí ké toò, te bí samé kwaá njií nyegé temé yoòr Càŋ bagasé.
50001026	Mè nde né te gwà cib`i yuo. Mɔ béh bí baá cu kɔɔ́, bí nde né sagár, te bí seén nyegé Yeésò Kristò felè mò, ye mè baá cu lètenè bi`i ma.
50001027	Njèh cén, bí dèn d`il`i yí teèn faá Njàgà Bagaà Kristò tueé né nɔ. Mɔ bí né teèn ménâ den yií, sâ mè né mene kwarè bi`i, mè né mene dàb, mè nde né ŋgweé njií, ye bí né lom ceér seèn tég sie huɔɔ́m, wa bí né gi mé sòn cên, bí né gi dɔɔ́ŋ mé temé cên lege, te Njàgà Bagaà yam, bɔ̀ nùàr kwaá njií temé teèn ma.
50001028	Mɔ né mân, bí té bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ bi`i vèh ny`i gùm dɔɔ́ŋ, te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ teèn, ye bɔ́ vu le aá kèn; wa bí dé bi`i yili yuo aá kèn ndɔ. Càŋ yili sɔm nde né bí kɔɔ́.
50001029	Njua mé bí né beè Kristò, bí baá gi dé bi`i mé fùgò Càŋ yoòr. Fùgò sâ né mân: dé`i né temé yoòr Kristò kwaá njiî; dé`i né gèr jomo seèn ŋenê ndɔ.
50001030	Sâ tueé né ye, bí yií aá be teèn kèn; béh bí taáb hên lieé né dɔɔ́ŋ. Mè lé naá gi`i mé njéh ké lètenè bi`i lieé yuo kelâ, lé naâ njolò bi`i ndɔ. Hên nde den née cí ye, bí bú ŋgweé gi aá kèn.
50002001	Yoòr Kristò nyɔgɔ́ deèn, né bí terreb haá wa? Gwaân mé à né bí gwaán hên, né bí yoòr taré ndɔ wa? Teèn sâ Cúcuí Ŋagâ te bilí aá bí bècénè wa? Bí né jere lètenè bi`i kɔɔ́ kuú wa? Bí né temé lètenè bi`i huɔɔ́m kuú ndɔ wa?
50002002	Mɔ né mân, sâ bí mɔ́gɔ́ dèn cu dɔɔ́ŋ mé sòn cên, mé temé cên, bí né lètenè bi`i gwaán kuú. Mɔ bí né lètenè bi`i ménâ jéjég bɔɔ́, temé mò nde né lè sagár dé gècên.
50002003	Bí té keên ŋgéré, bí té bɔ̀ mbaábi yoòr ŋgúmó. Nùà kàn a, ŋá sér nùà dɔlê toò bɔ̀ mbeî lòù. Nùà kân a, wèh mbeí faá nùà koô seèn nɔ.
50002004	Nuaré dé`i té njèh léláŋ dé seèn bɔ́ lòm; njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bí bɔ́ kwá dé bɔ̀ mbaábi`i teèn.
50002005	Bí dèn lètenè bi`i mé temé Yeésò Kristò lè.
50002006	Kèkènè Càŋ mé gùm mene né gi yoòr seèn. Mé njéh mene, à teèn ŋéí ŋgwéh.
50002007	À bèh denè seèn kwaá lɔ seér naâ mé be, à ŋa nùàr; bɔ́ ŋar bú lòù, à ŋa kwer ndɔ.
50002008	À ndabé lɔ feh seèn teèn mé sòn Càŋ ŋgweê. À yila nde weéh te cio; né mene cio te toû, à lé ŋgén ná ŋgwêh.
50002009	Yeé baá ménâ, Càŋ sumú njií bú ter ndɔ, à bú sie kwaá seér dé koô felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ, à yilá kwaá bú yilí dé koô yoòr ndɔ. Yilí bú sâ né gi yilí bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ mé terreb yɔgɔ́ keéh.
50002010	Né yilí Yeésò. Ye te wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ veéh gi cí; né mene ké ter, né mene ká doó, mé ké dòù mene dɔɔ́ŋ, te bɔ́ cemmé gi toò seèn,
50002011	bɔ́ né mé sòn bɔɔ̀n tueé ye: Yeésò Kristò né Nùà Dueè kɔɔ́; te terreb Càŋ Tele seèn ŋené yuo kelà bèsɔ́nè mé njéh.
50002012	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, sâ mɔ né mân, mè la mene kwarè bi`i sam cuú, bí ŋgwé dèn ká tie cu dɔɔ́ŋ, faá bí lé ŋgweé naâ, cu mé mè né ké yoòr bi`i nɔ; bí ŋgwé yɔ́gɔ́ kéh cú ménâ. Bí vèh Càŋ veèh, bí béné yílá gí lè seé seène, te bí yili yuo.
50002013	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ bɔɔ́ den né seé yoòr bi`i kɔɔ́ te bí gwaán ye njií mé à gwaán nê, bí bɔɔ́ ye njií mé né bú yoòr huɔɔ́m ndɔ.
50002014	Mɔ bí baá seé dé kàn bɔɔ́, bí té ndúgó, bí té lùlù ndɔ.
50002015	Bí né bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ; bí dèn mé sòn fuû, bí dèn ŋagásé; njeré dé`i a, té bí yoòr túán, wanɔɔ́ŋ bí né lètenè bɔ̀ gogobó bɔ̀ kela, bɔ́ veên dùlà bèh. Bí né ŋagâ lètenè bɔɔ̀n, bí né faá mbentò nɔ.
50002016	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bí né mé ŋgòr yɔ̀ŋ beè, te bí feh bɔ̀ nùàr. Mɔ bí bɔɔ́ né ka mân jéjég, sâ loù cuû Kristò temé mò nde né felè bi`i sagár, ye seé mò ké lètenè bi`i lé mbaá vù lè ná ŋgwêh, mè lé núr mbaá kú ná ŋgwêh ndɔ.
50002017	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mbe dé bi`i né temé mé bí né yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií sâ. Dé mò, merré dé`i bɔ́ nde né mè wulá. Mɔ mè kuú mene, sâ húɔ́m mò nde né lè mbe bi`i doô sagá yilá ndɔ. Mɔ né mân, sâ mè né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé dé gècên; bí sàmè gàm mè teèn.
50002018	Bí dèn mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé ménâ ndɔ, te mè samé gam bí teèn.
50002019	Mɔ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò né gwaán, sâ toò hên mè ndeè né Timotê ké yoòr bi`i temá njií, te mè ŋgweé nyegé njàgà bi`i sònò seèn, yo taré mè.
50002020	Nuaá mé béh bú né seé hên munó, né lom bú. À munó lom né bí dé gècên.
50002021	Bɔ̀ dé`i nyamé lom né seé bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ dé Yeésò Kristò táŋ ŋgwéh.
50002022	Dé Timotê, bí né kwàgà seèn yieé, bí né kɔɔ́ ye, à né yeé mè seé bɔɔ́ gam, béh bú seé Njàgà Bagaà bɔɔ́ lom né faá tele bɔ̂ huaán nɔ.
50002023	Kɔ mè ŋgweé ŋagá baá njií mé né felè mò ndɔ, te mè tema njií ye bú ké yoòr bi`i.
50002024	Mè né kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye Fehtoò beèh né mé terreb teèn; sâ toò hên mè mé feh mò, mè ndeè né bí yɔŋ ke ndɔ.
50002025	Mè ye te kènê Èpàfèrodî jɔ̀gɔ̀ nde cuù ké lɔ ye. Né mbeí seê mò, à mè taáb Njàgà Bagaà lie gam yeé kɔɔ́. Bí lé ye bú a, ndé gàm mè teèn; à gam aá mè kèn. Huɔm né dé kènê à cu cu ké lɔ yoòr bi`i.
50002026	Lòù sam, à lé naâ baán, bí lé naá gi`i ŋgweé. À yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, temé bú lè d`iè cú ndɔ, à né mé tuaá bi`i.
50002027	Mè tueé bí, à lé naâ beén tarê die; le man à kuú yili. Càŋ lé kɔ loóm naâ bú jere kɔɔ́. Dé sâ Càŋ lé kɔ bilí naâ teèn mé jere mò mene, wanɔɔ́ŋ mè sé naâ mé yúlá-temé te mbeî kuú ndɔ.
50002028	Mè bú ké jomo wágácén hên tema njií cuù né te yo taré bí, temé die bí lè, die mè lè ndɔ.
50002029	À baá ké yoòr bi`i ndeê. Mɔ à waà, bí s`iè nyégé bú mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé, bí sie bú mé temé Fehtoò beèh lè mene. Bí wèh kwá bú nùàr beè bi`i.
50002030	Mè tueé bí, à lé naâ cio te seé Kristò ŋgɔɔ́n; ye kɔ nyí gam aá mè sòn bi`i kèn. Le man à kuú yili teèn ndɔ.
50003001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè tueé lɔ né ye bí a: bí sàmè dèn beè Fehtoò beèh lòù. Mè né mene lòù tueé ferré, mè hómó ndé ŋgwéh, te gam bí.
50003002	Mè ye bí a, bí bɔ̀ŋ feh bi`i mé bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀; né bɔ̀ nyam; bɔ́ ŋgela seér né te ŋgór ŋɔɔ̀b tég, wa te nùàr ŋa ye nùà Càŋ.
50003003	Sâ ŋgór gècên ŋɔɔ̂b né yeé dé beèh ndɔ. Seé Càŋ mé terreb Cúcuí seèn bɔɔ́ yeé béh; béh sagár lom né mé Yeésò Kristò, béh ndèm mé tòù bɔ̀ nùàr kwá bèh.
50003004	Mɔ sam, mè sé né ndèm teèn kwaá njií ndɔ.
50003005	Lòù sam, mè lé yeé baá cieé téndelé, bɔ́ lé naâ mè ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b. Mè né bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà, bɔ́ lé mè ŋaár naâ lè gèh bɔ̀ Benjamên, mè né bɔ̀ Hebreêh bɔ̀ jéjég sâ. Mɔ bɔ́ jue né sóú beèh joloò, mè né Farisiên.
50003006	Mè lé jolo lom beéh sóú beèh faá cí nɔ, mè nde teèn wula bilí cu mé bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò Kristò mene. Mɔ bɔ́ sé ye, nùàr nde né mé sóú yili yuo, mè sé yili yuo naâ mé sòn fuû.
50003007	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ njií mé lé naá gi`i beè mò faá njèh kàm hèllè dɔɔ́ŋ kènê baá seér beè mò mb`ièrrè mbaá. Mè kɔ lom aá njií mò Kristò.
50003008	Léláŋ bɔ̀ dé hên gí lòm ŋgwéh, mè né cu mé bɔ̀ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ mene ŋgɔɔ́n bilí. Mè bɔ́ ŋgɔn né te mè kɔ lom Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò mò, tétán né cí. Mè horó sɔm aá be mò te bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ kèn. Mè su njií gi aá bɔ́ doó faá ŋgwɔɔ̀b nɔ, te Kristò den lom njèh kàm beè mò kɔɔ́,
50003009	mè nyɔgɔ́ nde yoòr seèn. Yeé baá môn, mè baá toò Càŋ dilísé ndɔ. Dé sâ dèn cú mé sóú hèllè joloò, baá seér mé temé yoòr Kristò kwaá njiî. Bú sâ né njua Càŋ. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Kristò kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, à né gi bɔ́ ménâ bɔɔ́ ndɔ.
50003010	Kènê mè gwaán lom né Kristò kɔɔ́ nyegê; mè gwaán né terreb seèn felè cioò kɔɔ́ nyegê ndɔ. Mè gwaán né gèr faá bú nɔ ŋenê, te mè kuú faá bú ndɔ.
50003011	Mè né ndèm kwaá, ye mɔ nde né yieé, mè nde né lè cio komo yuo faá bú nɔ.
50003012	Mè túé ŋgwéh ye, mè wa baá dé mò ké teèn kèn, wa mè baá dé mò ŋagásé ndɔ; môn sam. Mè née te doò ye. Yeésò Kristò ke sɔm aá mè kèn, mè bú hên ke weh né dé cî.
50003013	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mè baá lè doò. Mè mùnò ŋgwéh ye mè sie kwa baá; dé sâ ndɔ́g. Mè kɔ lom né njèh cén, ye dùlà ndé lòm tetoò, mè njolo jomo kè njí ndé cú.
50003014	Hên mè dula nde den né ké sònòbɔ̀ te mè yieé weh sàgà doò mò. Né ké te vulúu, bèh mé Càŋ né béh jomo Yeésò Kristò yilá njií.
50003015	Béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé taré gi aá lè ceér Càŋe dɔɔ́ŋ, béh mùnò gí kè`i cén ménâ ndɔ. Mɔ lètenè bi`i bɔ̀ dé`i né mene bèh hiîn munó keéh, Càŋ nde né bɔ́ feh nyegé.
50003016	Bɔɔ́ mene naàn, béh bèlè dèn ká ceér Càŋ kè`i cén faá béh lé bele duɔɔ́m naâ nɔ.
50003017	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bí bèlè lòm gule mò. Bí kè wèh yoòr bɔ̀ɔ́ mé den né faá béh ndɔ.
50003018	Mè lé bí tueé beéh cu dɔɔ́ŋ, mè bí kènê tueé né mé yímé njolò mene, ye bí a: bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá né Kristò bunó. Béh né yoòr bɔɔ̀n ŋené kɔɔ́, ye cio mé à lé kuú naâ ké te toú doô né faá njèh mbaâ beè bɔɔ̀n nɔ.
50003019	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ nde né dé bɔɔ̀n mbaá kum le. Lòù sam, bɔ́ Càŋ dùlà bèh, bɔ́ kɔ lom né lè`i bɔɔ̀n. Bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ́ nde né teèn gulí, bɔ́ né seér teèn taré kuú. Temé bɔɔ̀n gwaán kela né bɔ̀ njèh wɔ̂ŋ.
50003020	Dé beèh môn sam, béh bí né gi dé beèh bɔ̀ huaán lɔɔ̂ ké te vulúu. Hên béh kela den né Y`il`i nùàr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò mé ndeè né suagâ.
50003021	Mɔ à ndeè waà baá, à nde né yo beèh dé wàn hên kweéh seér, te den ŋagásé faá yo dé seèn nɔ. À bɔɔ́ nde né mé terreb seèn; à njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ka seèn bilí kwaá gi né mé terreb bú sâ.
50004001	Mɔ né mân bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí dèn ndé lòm dé bi`i ka Fehtoò beèh nɔɔ́ŋ. Temé mò né gi yoòr bi`i, mè né mé tuaá bi`i ndɔ. Bí sɔm keéh né be seê mò cie kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mè né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé felè bi`i dé gècên.
50004002	Mè hên tueé njií né mé Èvòd`i bɔ̂ Sèntîk; mè ye bɔ́ a: Kúkùr bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ dèn kè beè Fehtoò beèh mé sòn cên.
50004003	Mbeí mò, mè né wò bɔŋ ndɔ, bélɔ̀ né lè seé cén-e fà dɔɔ́ŋ; kúkùr yeè ndé gàm bɔ̀ véh fà hên gaàm; béh bɔ́ lé seé Njàgà Bagaà bɔɔ́ naâ dɔɔ́ŋ, béh bɔ́ lé naâ seé temá dé gècên. Bɔ̀ fà bɔ̀ hên mé Klèmâŋ bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí seê mò dé`i lé naâ kɔɔ́. Mè tueé wò, yilí bɔɔ̀n baá gi ké te mvù yɔ̀ŋ nyagá den.
50004004	Bí sàmè dèn cu dɔɔ́ŋ beè Fehtoò beèh; mè né tueé ferré, bí sàmè dèn teèn lòù.
50004005	Bí dèn dɔlésé toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ. Fehtoò beèh baá ndeê.
50004006	Bí té njeré dé`i nyàmè gùm dɔɔ́ŋ. Né mene cu dé heè, mɔ njeré dé`i né bí yɔgɔ́, bí dùà njí mé Càŋ, bí né bú kugór, bí né bú vra ndɔ.
50004007	Càŋ nde né bí dɔlê haá, te temé die bí lè, bí den lom beè Yeésò Kristò pɔ́ŋ. Gèh dɔlê bú sâ, bɔ̀ nùàr bú ŋgwé kòmò bèh.
50004008	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè tueé lɔ né ye bí a: bɔ̀ njèh dé bebagaà mé bɔ̀ nùàr nde né Càŋ teèn seén, bí s`iè nyégé bɔ́ sieè. Bɔ̀ dé gècên mé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ nde né veéh gií, bɔ̀ dé didilî, bɔ̀ dé ŋeŋagâ mé né njolò bɔ̀ nùàr lieé huɔɔ́m dɔɔ́ŋ, bí s`iè nyégé cí.
50004009	Bɔ̀ njií mé bí lé naá gi`i sònò mò ŋgweé, mé bí lé naâ gwaán, bí bɔ́ bá cí. Mè lé tueé deén naâ tieè bi`i, mè bɔɔ́ den njolò bi`i ndɔ, kènê bí bɔ́ bá mé be bi`i. Mɔ bí né ménâ bɔɔ́, bí bɔ̀ Càŋ mé haá yeé dɔlê den nde né kɔɔ́.
50004010	Mè beè Fehtoò beèh né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé dé gècên. Lòù sam, bí baá cu mè ke nyegé. Sâ bí lé naá gi`i ménâ felè mò munó ndɔ, ye te bí gam mè. Njèh cén, bí lé lɔ́ŋ kwà ná ŋgwêh lòù.
50004011	Mè túé ŋgwéh ye njeré dé`i né mè saám ndɔ. Mè den meh gi aá dé mò mé gèh dé hên kèn.
50004012	Né mene dene saâm, né mene dene sèsàm, mè né gi den kɔɔ́. Né mene he, né mene naàn, beè mò táré cú. Mè né mene fulu, mè sɔɔ́ mene cùè, njèh né mene teèn, mene teèn sam, mè maán kɔ gi aá dene bú sâ kèn.
50004013	Mè né bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ kɔɔ́ gií. Né Kristò haá né mè terreb sâ kɔɔ́.
50004014	Mé njéh mene, bí lé naâ mè lè gèr-e gam dé gècên; mè né bí vra.
50004015	Bí bɔ̀ Filîp bɔ̀, bí né gi kɔɔ́, ye cu mé mè lé ndeè naâ Njàgà Bagaà ké Tesalonîk tueé duɔɔ́m, bí lé mè njèh ké sâ tema njií beéh kɔɔ́, te gam mè. Mè kwaá lɔ mene tàbè bi`i Masedínà, béh bí lé gam kuú cegé naâ kɔɔ́, bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ dé`i lé be teèn yí ná ŋgwêh.
50004017	Mè túé ŋgwéh ye mè né njeré dé`i beè bi`i gwaán; háyè, mè gwaán seér né te bí kwa sagá cu nòmò bi`i teèn.
50004018	Bɔ̀ njií mé bí lé naá gi`i mè temá njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, mè lé naá gi`i ŋené; né kókoó. Kènê mè baá lom mé njèh beè ŋgún. Èpàfèrodî lé waà naâ mé njéh kɔɔ́, ye naâ beè bi`i ma. Kùsèm sâ né mbe dé bi`i, Càŋ né njolo teèn ke njií, né njèh bagaà beè seèn dé gècên.
50004019	Càŋ mò né Càŋ sèsàm; njií mé né bí saám dɔɔ́ŋ, à nde né bí mé be terrèb seèn haá laré; à bí haá né mé njua Yeésò Kristò.
50004020	Kùsèm Tele beèh Càŋ, be terrèb yeè a, ŋá dèn cu dɔɔ́ŋ ter dé nyèmà mé nyèmà. È môn.
50004021	Bí bíé kéh bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ mé yilí seèn. Bɔ̀ mbeí mò mé béh bɔ́ né kɔɔ́, ye bíé kéh bí ndɔ.
50004022	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ká lɔ dɔɔ́ŋ ye bíé kéh bí; tétég né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ké mbàm lè bɔ̀gɔ̀ mgbè dueè.
50004023	Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, ká s`iè gí bí beè.
51001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò. Càŋ lé mè mân sie kwaá naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn. Bêh dìm beèh Timotê nyagá njií né mé
51001002	bí bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ ké Kɔlɔ̂se. Bí bɔ̀ mbeí beèh mé né gi temé tég yoòr Kristò kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, Tele beèh Càŋ a, kúlú bí, à haá bí dɔlê.
51001003	Béh né yeé Càŋ Tele Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò felè biì dua. Cu dɔɔ́ŋ béh né bú teèn vra.
51001004	Lòù sam, béh né njàgà biì ŋgweé, ye bí né lom temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò tég kwaá njií, ye bí né lom bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé temé cén gwaán ndɔ.
51001005	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí ndèm kwaá njií gi né te njií mé Càŋ lɔ naâ bí ké te vulúu nyegé kwaá. Njií sâ, bí lé naá giì bú te Njàgà Bagaà ŋgweé, bɔ́ lé naâ bí se. Ŋgòr gècên né cí.
51001006	Lé naâ ké lètenè biì kar waá, né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ kaá ndeé, né mé tàb bèh dɔɔ́ŋ waá yaám ndeé, né bɔ̀ nùàr gam. Ké lètenè biì né ménâ ndɔ. Bèh lɔ mé bí lɔ ŋgweé naâ Njàgà Bagaà, tɔ́g nde wa hên, née den ka môn yaám ndeé ye. Bí lé naâ mé fùgò beè Càŋ kuú, bí né gècên seèn teèn ŋené kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
51001007	Epaferâs lé feéh naâ bí Njàgà Bagaà sâ kɔɔ́. Né mbeí seê beèh, temé beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr seèn, à seé Kristò bɔɔ́ yeé mé temé cén, à seé ké lètenè biì bɔɔ́ né mé sòn beèh mene.
51001008	Gèh terreb mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ lé haá naâ bí te bí gwaán bɔ̀ mbeí biì mé njéh doô, à lé naá giì béh tueé nyegé.
51001009	Béh yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, béh yila Càŋ felè biì duaà, béh sòn dù cú. Béh ye bú a, há lòm bí terreb te bí ŋgweé komo njií mé temé seèn gwaán nê; bú a, há bí kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̂ lo mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ, te bí ŋene kɔ njèh gècên.
51001010	Mɔ baá mân, te bí teèn gɔ yií lom aá faá Fehtoò beèh gwaán nê nɔ, te bí bɔɔ́ komo ye bɔ̀ njií mé né bú yoòr yilá ndɔ. Sâ te bí wa tàb mé njéh, bí bɔɔ́ seé bagaà, bí né cu Càŋ dé kɔɔ̂ kɔɔ́ ŋeí.
51001011	Béh né bú dua ye bú a: sɔ̀m njí be terrèb seèn ter, à nyén kwá bí terreb yoòr, te bí kwaá sèŋ, bí yolo komo ye njèh.
51001012	Bí kóbó Tele beèh be mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene. À lé bɔɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́, te bí nde ye ké bèh ŋagâ yilá komo, bí yieé ŋgúlú mé à lɔ nyegé kwaá naâ dé bɔ̀ nùàr seèn.
51001013	À lé naá giì béh ka cibì turú sɔm, à yií njií béh ké lè bɔ̀gɔ̀ Huaán yíé-temé seèn.
51001014	Mé Ŋuna seèn cên sâ à lé naâ béh te veéne yili sɔm, à kulu sɔm yúlá-temé beèh lè seèn ndɔ.
51001015	Béh Càŋ mé njolo ŋéné bèh, béh bú mé njolo ŋene né yoòr Kristò. Huaán né bú, Nùà Dueè felè bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lɔ si giì naâ dɔɔ́ŋ né lom bú ndɔ.
51001016	Lòù sam, Càŋ lɔ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ si giì naâ mé bú, ye te den gi dé seèn. Né mene bɔ̀ njèh dé ké te vulúu, né mene bɔ̀ dé ká doô, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé njolo né ŋené o, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé njolo ŋéné ŋgwéh o, dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ lɔ si giì naâ mé bú. Felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ né bú ndɔ. Sâ terreb wɔ̂ŋ né mene naàn, né mene gèh terrèb dé heè ké te vulúu dɔɔ́ŋ né gi ka seèn.
51001017	À lɔ teèn naá lɔgɔ̂ kɔɔ́, te wɔ́ŋ nde ye die. Njií mé né teèn dɔɔ́ŋ lané sie gi né yoòr seèn.
51001018	Felè mbàgà Càŋ né bú; à né feh, mbàgà Càŋ né kukuŋ. Yɔ̀ŋ dé feê duɔɔ́m né yoòr seèn. Te cio lé komo yuo lɔgɔ́ naâ bú. Càŋ ye te felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ den lom bú,
51001019	wa lòù sam, kèkènè nyî mé gùm mene né yoòr seèn;
51001020	nyí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ká yoòr nyî nyɔgɔ́ njií giì né mé bú ma. Bɔ́ faga njií bú ter te toû ndɔ. Húɔ́m seèn yeé ber aá, pɔ́ŋ die lètenè nùàr bɔ̂ Càŋ. À lé mân bɔɔ́ naâ, ye te bɔ́ bɔ̀ njèh dé ké te vulû mé ká doó dɔɔ́ŋ den cu mé sòn cên.
51001021	Né mé bí ménâ ndɔ: léí toò bí bɔ̀ Càŋ lé naá giì nòmò dàb we dàb. Mùnò biì mé seé biì lé naâ feh keéh ye, bí né lom bɔ̀ bùnò Càŋ bɔ̀ ma.
51001022	Mé njéh mene, kènê Càŋ bí ká yoòr seèn weh nyɔgɔ́ njií cuù aá kèn. Né mé cio Ŋuna seèn. À lé naâ faá nùàr nɔ kuú, te yaga sɔm bɔ̀ veên biì dɔɔ́ŋ. Càŋ ye te bí yuo kelà toò nyî ŋagásé, te nuaré déì bí mé ndɔ̀gɔ̀ veên déì yoòr ŋéné sáb cú.
51001023	Mɔ né mân, sâ kɔ bí den lom nɔɔ́ŋ, bí né te ŋgòr Càŋe tég njebá taré, te bí ndèm yoòr Njàgà Bagaà sɔ̀m cú. Bí lé naâ Njàgà Bagaà sâ ŋgweé, né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ beè ŋgulí sie, bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ bú ŋgweé gi aá kèn. Mè Pɔ̂l ndɔ, mè nùà seê hên ŋa keéh né felè Njàgà Bagaà sâ.
51001024	Mè né mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé, bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè la né mene dàm gèr felè biì ŋené laré, mè samé seér né mé njéh dé samê. Ŋgàŋ yoòr mò jamé né mân, te gèh gèr mò mboón faá Kristò lé ye mè nde né felè mbàgà nyî ŋené nɔ. Né kukuŋ seèn.
51001025	Càŋ mè seé hên jege haá naâ kɔɔ́, ye mè a: ŋá nùà seê mbàgà nyî, mè nde bí ŋgòr nyî mé gùm mene se ma.
51001026	Càŋ lɔ ŋgòr sâ leér nab kwaá beéh lòù. Nde nde, cu yeé wulu baá, à nde ye bú njolò bɔ̀ nùàr seèn ŋené sɔm keéh,
51001027	ye te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ njèh dueè mé nde né nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ gam laré. Né njií mé nyí lɔ nyegé leér kwaá naâ lòù. Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam, njèh dueè sâ né Kristò yoòr biì. Bí mé njéh kwaá gi aá ndèm, ye bí nde né ké mbàm Càŋ dobo yilá.
51001028	Béh bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ hên tueé den né felè Kristò sâ. Béh né nùà kàn tie ndɔgɔ́, béh né nùà kân mé lo mene feh, te bɔ́ den mé Kristò yoòr, bɔ́ ké toò Càŋ yuo lom faá nùàr nɔ.
51001029	Terreb mé Yeésò haá né mè hên, mè mé njéh lege den né cí.
51002001	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mè né mé seé felè biì kwaré. Seé sâ né felè biì bɔ̀ Kɔlɔ̂se bɔ̀, bɔ̀ Laodísè bɔ̀, mé bɔ̀ toò bɔ̀ mene. Bí mene mè kɔ́ ŋgwéh,
51002002	mè lege lom né ye te temé bí lè kú cú, te bí gwaán kuú lètenè biì, bí ŋa bilí gi dɔɔ́ŋ cén; te lo yam sie bí beè mé gùm mene, bí mé njéh den bɔ̀ sèsàm bɔ̀ te ceér Càŋe, temé die bí lè. Teèn sâ, njèh gècên mé Càŋ lé leér nab kwaá naâ doô, bí nde né ŋgweé kɔɔ́: né gùm Kristò nùà njèh.
51002003	Kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̂ lo mé gùm mene merré den né beè seèn.
51002004	Mè bí mân tueé né ye te nuaré déì bí beè Kristò bèlè nágá sɔ̀m cú.
51002005	Mɔ mè la mene ké kwarè biì sam, temé mò dɔɔ́ŋ né gi ké yoòr biì. Mè né ŋgweé ye bí né te ceér Kristò tég, bí né temé cén mé bú kwaá njií ndɔ. Mè né lom mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé biì lè dé gècên.
51002006	Ŋgweéh bí lé naá giì gwaán ye Yeésò Kristò né Fehtoò biì mà. Sâ bí ŋgɔ̀ bú.
51002007	Bí dèn lòm beè seèn nɔɔ́ŋ, bí né yoòr seèn teé ndeé, bí temé nɔɔ́ŋ kwaá njií lom mé bú faá bɔ́ lé naâ bí feh nɔ; bí né bú teèn vra yií.
51002008	Bí dèn làŋ, te nuaré déì bí kɔ́ŋkɔŋ nyeên déì lè bèlè yí cú. Gèh kɔ́ŋkɔŋ dé sâ né yeé tánágá bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ né dé bɔɔ̀n beè tándulù, bɔ́ feh yeé njií mé nùàr munó né kɔɔ́, dèn ŋgwéh mùnò dé Kristò.
51002009	Dé Kristò, yoòr seèn né gi léláŋ kèkènè Càŋ mé gùm mene.
51002010	Sâ tueé né ye, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi yoòr seèn dɔɔ́ŋ baá gi mé njéh yoòr mé gùm mene ndɔ. À dé seèn né mé terreb felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ. Né mene gèh terrèb dé heè dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi ka seèn.
51002011	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi yoòr Kristò dɔɔ́ŋ, bí baá gi mé mágá seèn yeyoòr. Né faá bɔ́ sé la naâ bí ŋgór ŋɔɔ́b nɔ. Njèh cén, bɔ́ bú mé be ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh; Kristò nùà njèh bú yoòr biì maga kwaá né kɔɔ́, ye te bí geé mé ceér veên.
51002012	Nòmò Càŋ mé bɔ́ lé koú naâ bí doô, bɔ́ lé sâ furú bilí naâ bí bɔ̀ Kristò. Càŋ lé sâ te cio komo sɔm bilí naâ bí bɔ́ ndɔ. Lòù sam, bí lé naá giì temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njií, ye Càŋ terrèb lé naâ bú lè cio komo sɔm ma.
51002013	Sâ lɔ toò, bí lɔ naá giì bɔ̀ komó làŋ, bí lé ceér Càŋ kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, bí lé sóú seèn cum seér naâ lòù. Mé njéh mene, Càŋ bɔ̀ veên beèh dɔɔ́ŋ kulu njií seér doó, à komo sɔm béh mé Kristò.
51002014	Mɔ sam, béh sé kuú seér naâ kɔɔ́. Lòù sam, béh lé naá giì ju beè Càŋ sela. Mé njéh mene, Càŋ nde hùà sâ gwɔm seér mé cio Kristò; den cu né faá à lé naâ hùà sâ ké te toû tɔɔ́r wulá ndɔ.
51002015	Mé cio cén sâ, à né bɔ̀ cècàŋ te kɔgɔ mé njéh huaré sɔm. Njií sâ né mene mé gèh terrèb dé heè dɔɔ́ŋ, à né bú toò bɔ̀ nùàr huaré; gɔ̀gɔ̀ né die ndeé.
51002016	Mɔ né mân, sâ bí té gwàn mé nuaré déì taáŋ haá seér bí njèh lòù, né mene yáb, né mene njèh ŋueê, bú a, té bí lòù táŋ há. Nuaré déì a, té bí cieé koô déì lòù táŋ há ndɔ; né mene loù weéh feê joloò, né mene loù sóù, nuaré déì té bí teèn mbaá nàm kú.
51002017	Bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lé née gi jèrè ye; kukuŋ lé naâ jomo, né Kristò nùà njèh.
51002018	Bí té gwàn mé bɔ̀ nùàr taáŋ yií bí seé bɔɔ̀n déì, wa bí kwàrè mé nɔ, bí dùà gɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ. Bɔ́ né mene ndòn se gɔ, ye né seé Càŋ, dɔɔ́ŋ bí té sòn bɔɔ̀n ŋgwé, né gi bɔ̀ hàm feh bɔ̀, bɔ́ sâ punó gɔ né dé wɔ̂ŋ.
51002019	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ dé bɔɔ̀n yoòr Fehtoò beèh sam. Fehtoò beèh dé seèn né feh; kukuŋ né bɔ̀ nùàr seèn. À bɔ́ yoòr nyɔgɔ́ bilí né faá yo nyɔgɔ́ bilí yeé bɔ̀ gà mé cègè nɔ; à né bɔ́ koó, bɔ́ né faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ kulá huɔɔ́m ndɔ.
51002020	Bí né kɔɔ́ ye, bí bɔ̀ Kristò lé naâ kɔɔ́ kuú bilí, ye bɔ̀ tándulu ká te wɔ́ŋe mé terreb felè biì sam cuú. Bí yeé kɔ gi aá ménâ, kei mé bɔɔ́ bí den cu faá bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ nɔ wa? Bí tie te bɔ̀ njií sâ felá njií né dé keì wa? Bɔ́ né bí tagá,
51002021	wa té dé kàn kèmà, té dé kân nágá, té dé kàn cór ndɔ. Bí tie teèn felá njií yeé dé keì wa?
51002022	Mè tueé bí, gèh bɔ̀ sóú bú sâ, bɔ́ tagá kuú né felè bɔ̀ njèh wàn. Bɔ̀ nùàr bɔ̀ sóú sâ si yeé kɔɔ́, bɔ́ bɔ́ feh cu né kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
51002023	Bɔ̀ sóú hèllè njolò nùàr ŋené né faá njèh kɔ́gɔ̀n nɔ. Dé kàn ye bèh joloò né mân, dé kân ye né mân; wa nùàr a, kwàrè mé nɔ. Bú a, jámé sér yo. Né gi ménâ dág. Njèh cén, nùà kàn a, kɔ́ɔ ye, ndɔ́g bɔ̀ sóú hèllè veên mé né lè nyî sɔ̀m kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ma.
51003001	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, bí bɔ̀ Kristò lé komo yuo giì naâ te cio kɔɔ́. Mɔ né mân, sâ bí fɔ́n lòm bɔ̀ njèh dé ké te vulû, bèh mé Kristò né teèn den den. À né ké te be gaâ Càŋe.
51003002	Bɔ̀ njèh dé ké te vulû a, yílá kélá bí yoòr kɔɔ́ mé bɔ̀ njèh dé ká lè wɔ́ŋe.
51003003	Lòù sam, bí bɔ̀ Kristò lé naâ kuú bilí, Càŋ né bɔ̀ yɔ̀ŋ biì ké beè seèn leér kwaá, à leér kwaá né yoòr Kristò.
51003004	Yɔ̀ŋ biì dé jéjêg né Kristò. Mɔ à ndeè cuù baá, te bí ŋené lie nyegé kwarè seèn.
51003005	Mɔ né mân, sâ bí kwɔ́bé leba mé ceér wɔ̂ŋ. Mè ye, bí kwɔ́bé leba mé yàgà yɔɔ̀ŋ, mé fúár ndɔ. Bí té njèh cì, bí té tuaá ŋgàŋ yoòr bèlè, bí té temé te njèh nùàre kwá njí. Mɔ sam, nde né cècàŋ biì ŋaá.
51003006	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ménâ bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi feh mé Càŋ taré. Temé bú lè mé bɔ́ ŋaá nde né dé cî.
51003007	Mé bí mene, bí lé naá giì veên sâ ŋgɔ; felè biì lé cer loóm naâ cí.
51003008	Kènê bí sɔ̀m á be teèn. Temé a, té bí lè ŋá, bí té fúrú, bí té temé jéré ndɔ. Séb a, té bí sònò yùò; bí té biag sònò biì gèh sɔ̀m.
51003009	Bí té mé nyeén lètenè biì cɔ̀rè kú. Lòù sam, yoòr biì yo dé cuûm sam cuú,
51003010	baá yo dé feê. Yo dé feê sâ, Càŋ mé lɔ naâ bú si, né bú beè beè nyeén, te den faá yo seèn nùà njèh nɔ, ye mɔ bí baá faá yo nyî nùà njèh, bí nde né nyí mé gùm mene kɔɔ́ nyegé.
51003011	Mɔ né mân, sâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam bɔ́ bɔ̀ Jûf né kèì cén; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ŋɔb aá ŋgór mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ŋgór ŋɔ́b ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi kèì cén ndɔ. Né mene bɔ̀ ya dueè bɔ̀, né mene bɔ̀ cùr, né mene bɔ̀ kwer, né mene bɔ̀ɔ́ mé kwer sam dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè Càŋ kèì cén. Càŋ dé seèn kɔ lom né Kristò mé né lè bɔɔ̀n.
51003012	Càŋ lé balé weéh naâ bí kɔɔ́, bí né bɔ̀ dé seèn, temé seèn né gi yoòr biì. Mɔ né mân, bí dèn mé jere bɔ̀ mbaábiì lè, bí dèn bɔ̀ húɔ́m-temé bɔ̀, bí té ŋgúmó, bí dèn sér dɔlésé, bí né temé sie,
51003013	bí né lètenè biì yoló kuú. Temé né mene nuaré déì mé mbeí yulá, bú a, kúlú sɔ̀m lè seèn kulù. Bí kúlú sɔ̀m gí veên bɔ̀ mbaábiì lè biì, faá Nùà Dueè né bɔ̀ dé biì lè seèn kulú sɔm nɔ.
51003014	Njií mé kela né kɔɔ́ né gwaân. Bú a, ká sìè lòm bí beè mé gùm mene, te bí dɔɔ́ŋ nyɔgɔ́ bilí gi cén.
51003015	Bí kwá Kristò lab bí mboó. À bí yilá kuú né mé njéh, ye te bí dɔɔ́ŋ ŋa bilí cén. Sâ bí vrà bílí bú.
51003016	Bí kwá ŋgòr Kristò si ŋgùlù lètenè biì, bí né lètenè biì feh kuú, bí né sɔgɔ́ kuú mé kɔ́gɔ̀n mene ndɔ. Bí sì bené, bí né ŋgòr Càŋ lòù de. Bɔ̀ bené mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bele teèn dɔɔ́ŋ, bí sén gí Càŋ mé njéh seèn, bí sén lòm bú mé temé biì mene, bí né bú vra ndɔ.
51003017	Bí né mene njeré déì bɔɔ́, bí tueé mene lòù, bí dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ gí mé yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò. Bí né Tele beèh Càŋ beè seèn vra keéh ndɔ.
51003018	Bí bɔ̀ véh, bí ŋgwé sòn bɔ̀ si biì ŋgweè, seé biì toò Fehtoò beèh né cí.
51003019	Bí bɔ̀ siíb, bí dèn mé gwaân bɔ̀ véh biì lè ndɔ, bí té bɔ́ lòù fúrú sér.
51003020	Bí bɔ̀ huaán, bí ŋgwé làrè sòn bɔ̀ tele biì mé meí biì te njèh dɔɔ́ŋe. Mɔ bí né ménâ bɔɔ́, nde né Càŋ yoòr huɔɔ́m.
51003021	Bí bɔ̀ tele huaân, bí té bɔ̀ huaán lòù ndè jélá sér; temé nde né bɔ́ lè gur.
51003022	Bí bɔ̀ kwer, bí ŋgwé sòn bɔ̀ tele seê biì ŋgweè, bí témá làrè seé bɔɔ̀n mé temé cén, bí té léláŋ njolò nùàr bɔ́ húɔ́m lòm, ye te bɔ́ keí bí. Bí dé biì dula né Fehtoò beèh.
51003023	Seé sâ den mene naàn, bí bɔ́ lòm bú mé temé cén faá seé Fehtoò beèh nɔ, bí té túé ye né lom seé dé bɔ̀ nùàr.
51003024	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Fehtoò beèh gwɔm nde né bí kɔɔ́. Gà ŋgúlù mé à lé naâ mé bɔ̀ nùàr seèn nyegé kwaá, bí nde né yieé ndɔ. Lòù sam, seé biì né seé Fehtoò beèh Kristò.
51003025	Nuaá mé né seé vevenê bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, Fehtoò beèh nde cu né bú mé sàgà dé veên ménâ gwɔm ndɔ; à seèn nùàr lòù gèì bèh.
51004001	Bí bɔ̀ tele seê, bí bɔ́ dìlì nyégé felè bɔ̀ kwer biì bagasé. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bí né taré ka Nùà koô biì ké te vulúu ménâ ndɔ.
51004002	Bí dùà dèn Càŋ cu dɔɔ́ŋ, bí né làŋ den, bí né bú teèn vra keéh,
51004003	bí né bú felè beèh dua ndɔ, te béh kwa ceér, béh se ŋgòr seèn, te ju Kristò mé lé naâ lòù leér den, ŋené yuo kelà bèsɔ́nè. Mè ká gwà cibì tétég hên yila kuú né mé njéh.
51004004	Sâ bí dùà Càŋ teèn, te mè se bɔ̀ nùàr faá né tueé nɔ.
51004005	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ sam, bí dèn toò bɔɔ̀n ŋgulísé. Lɔ́ŋ mé né toò biì ŋené dɔɔ́ŋ, bí té yì kéh.
51004006	Bɔ̀ ŋgòr biì a, ŋgúlí sábé lòm bɔ̀ nùàr tieè cu dɔɔ́ŋ lòù. Njií mé bɔ́ né bí bieé nyegé dɔɔ́ŋ, bí kɔ́ gèh dé mé bí nde né bɔ́ bagasé se nyegé.
51004007	Tisîk dìm yíé-temé beèh tueé nde né bí njàgà mò kɔɔ́. À né lom seé Fehtoò beèh mé temé cén bɔɔ́, béh bú seé bɔɔ́ yeé kɔɔ́.
51004008	Mè bú ké yoòr biì tétég hên tema njií kuú né, ye te bí ŋgweé kùr beèh, temé taré cu bí lè.
51004009	Bɔ̂ Onesîm dìm yíé-temé beèh déì gɔ nde né kɔɔ́. Onesîm dé seèn né nùàr biì cén déì, à seé Càŋ bɔɔ́ né mé temé cén. Njií mé né kán kelá dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ nde né bí tueé.
51004010	Aristârk ye bíé kéh bí. Béh bú né ká gwà cibì kɔɔ́. Mârk ŋunà bei Bàrnàbâs ye bíé kéh bí ndɔ. Mè lé naá giì bí tueé ye bí a, mɔ à waà baá, bí sìè nyégé bú bagasé ma.
51004011	Yeésò mé bɔ́ yilá cu né Jústùs, ye bíé kéh bí ndɔ. Lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf mé né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, seé Lò Càŋ ká lɔ bɔɔ́ lom né béh bɔ̀ tagár bɔ̀ hên. Yo mò né lom mé bɔ́ taré dé gècên.
51004012	Nùà biì Epaferâs ye bíé kéh bí. Né nùà seê Yeésò Kristò ndɔ. À né Càŋ felè biì dua, à sòn dù ŋgwéh, ye Càŋ a, há bí terreb, te bí den lom tég, bí né teèn joló huɔɔ́m; te njií mé Càŋ gwaán nê, bí njií sâ ŋene kɔ lom mé gùm mene, bí bɔɔ́ cí.
51004013	Dé hên, mè nde né sòn seèn gwaán: à né lom bí mé gècên mene munó. À né bɔ̀ nùàr Laodísè munó, à né bɔ̀ Hierapolî bɔ̀ ménâ munó ndɔ.
51004014	Lûk dɔ́ptà yíé-temé beèh bɔ̂ Demâs ye bíé kéh bí ndɔ ma.
51004015	Bí bíé kéh bɔ̀ mbeí beèh ké Laodísè dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bie keéh Nimfà mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé bilí yeé ké gwò seèn mene.
51004016	Mɔ bɔ́ jaŋé gi aá mvù hên lètenè biì, bí há njí mé bɔ̀ Laodísè bɔ̀ te bɔ́ jaŋé ké te mɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n ndɔ. Mɔ bɔ̀ Laodísè bɔ̀ tema njií aá bí mvù mò déì, bí jáŋé cú lè mɔ̀gɔ̀ biì ménâ ndɔ.
51004017	Bí júée Arsîp a, seé Fehtoò beèh mé né beè seèn doô, bú a, bɔ́ sɔ̀m bɔɔ̀ ma.
51004018	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mè bèh hên nyagá né mé be mò, mè bie aá bí. Bí té nyèn, ye mè né dé mò ká gwà cibì ndɔ. Húɔ́m-temé Càŋ a, ká sìè gí bí beè.
52001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l bɔ̂ Silvên mé Timotê nyagá né kɔɔ́. Béh nyagá njií né mé bɔ̀ŋ biì ké Tesalonîk, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né beè Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò bilí den. Bɔ́ a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
52001002	Béh né Càŋ cu dɔɔ́ŋ felè biì dɔɔ̂ŋ vra, béh né cu bú felè biì dua ndɔ, béh sòn dù bèh.
52001003	Mɔ béh baá Càŋ dua, seé mé bí né mé njéh bɔɔ́ kuú doô, béh né yeé teèn munó keéh, ye lòù sam bí né temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií, wa bí né bú gwaán ndɔ, bí seé tema kuú né dé cî ma. Béh kɔ né ye, bí né lom ndèm mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò tég kwaá njií.
52001004	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, béh né kɔɔ́ ye, Càŋ né bí gwaán, à hên balé weh né bí dé cî.
52001005	Sâ tueé baá kènê ye, Njàgà Bagaà mé béh lé ndeè naâ bí se doô lé ŋgòr ciî ná ŋgwêh, terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ lé naá giì teèn ŋgulí den; béh lé naâ kɔɔ́ ye, béh tueé yií né teèn ndɔ. Bí lé naá giì te dene beèh lètenè biì ŋené nyegé; sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naâ ye te gam bí.
52001006	Jomo sâ bí lé naâ faá béh nɔ bɔɔ́, bí né gule Fehtoò beèh bele, bí né temé te ŋgòr Càŋe kwaá njií, bí né lè gèr-e beè bɔ̀ nùàr mbiín yilá ndeé, bɔ́ né bí bunó; mé njéh mene, terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ né seér cu bí yoòr lòù ŋgulí huɔɔ́m.
52001007	Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Masedínà mé Akayî dɔɔ́ŋ ŋene weh gi beè biì ndɔ.
52001008	Njua mé bí lé naâ ménâ bɔɔ́ komo, te ŋgòr felè Fehtoò beèh ŋené yuo kelà teèn ké Masedínà mé Akayî, te ŋgɔ́g ŋgulí nde felè biì bèh dɔɔ́ŋ, ye bí dua lom né Càŋ mé temé cén ma. Kènê béh njeré déì teèn túé ságá ndé cú,
52001009	bɔ̀ nùàr né gi mé be bɔɔ̀n felè biì tueé, ye cu mé béh lé waà naâ ké yoòr biì wa, bí lé naâ béh ke nyegé ma. Bɔ́ né cu tueé, ye bí kweéh seér aá temé biì kèn, wa bí be yoòr bɔ̀ cècàŋ dɔɔ́ŋ sɔm gi aá, bí kènê dua lom né Càŋ gècên mé né Càŋ làŋ ma; ye bí né seé seèn bɔɔ́ ndɔ,
52001010	wa Ŋuna seèn Yeésò mé à lé komo sɔɔ́m naâ lè cio doô, bí né bú kela den ma. Né môn, à née ké te vulúu ye. Loù téná-juù à ndeè béh lè juù beè Càŋ yili sɔm nde né kɔɔ́.
52002001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí né gi mé feh biì kɔɔ́ ye, seé mé béh lé bɔɔ́ naâ ké lètenè biì lé mbaá mvúán lè ná ŋgwêh.
52002002	Bí kɔ gi aá kèn ndɔ, ye béh lé naâ gèr ké Filîp fî ŋené, te béh waà ye ké Tesalonîk yoòr biì. Béh yeé baá cu bí Njàgà Bagaà se nyegé, bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá yila cu béh bunô ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, Càŋ lé haá ŋeí cuù naâ béh terreb dé haâ, te béh se bí Njàgà Bagaà mé lé yuoó naâ beè seèn mé njéh.
52002003	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, ŋgòr Càŋ mé béh né tueé hên te nyeéne yùò ŋgwêh, béh kòb teèn yí ŋgwéh, béh bɔ̀ nùàr lòù bèlè nyì ŋgwéh ndɔ.
52002004	Càŋ lé naá giì béh kweé nyegé, te à nde ye béh Njàgà Bagaà beè haá kwaá, te béh nde ye bɔ̀ nùàr faá bèh mân se ndɔ. Béh túé ŋgwéh ye nuaré déì a, sén béh seèn. Béh kɔ lom né dé beèh Càŋ; à ká lè beèh ŋene gi né kɔɔ́.
52002005	Bí né gi kɔɔ́, ye bɔɔ́ mene naàn, béh ŋgòr tánágà déì fèlà nyì bèh; béh túé nágá bèh dé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ beè nuaré déì kwaà ndɔ. Mè tueé bí, Càŋ né sòn beèh kɔɔ́.
52002006	Béh túé ŋgwéh ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, sùmù béh sumù. Né mene beè biì, né mene beè bɔ̀ nùàr, béh teèn sam lág.
52002007	Mɔ sé né dé dene sùsùm deèn, béh né bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò, béh sé lé naâ bí yoòr ŋgumó. Mé njéh mene, béh seér ménâ gwàn ŋgwéh. Béh lé toò biì dɔlé seér cuù naâ lòù, béh bɔŋ seér cu bí, faá meì huaân bɔŋ yeé bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn nɔ.
52002008	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ béh lé gwaán giì naâ bí, ye te béh tueé bí Njàgà Bagaà mé lé yuoó naâ beè Càŋ. Lé gí cégé ná ŋgwêh dé ŋgòr Càŋ tueê ndɔ, béh lé felè biì ŋgɔn bilí naâ mé cio mene. Sâ ye bí né lom béh yoòr yilá faá cí nɔ.
52002009	Seé faá seé nɔ, béh lé naâ gèr mé njéh ké lètenè biì ŋené. Ŋgweéh bí né gi ménâ kɔɔ́ mà, belà. Béh lé naâ seé mé cíbíteèn mene temá bilí. Sâ ye te béh bí yáb lòù dùà kì dèn cú, te bí sònò beèh ŋgweé lom Njàgà Bagaà mé lé yuoó naâ beè Càŋ.
52002010	Dene beèh ké lètenè biì bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ lé naâ ŋagásé, dilísé ndɔ, veên déì lé teèn túán nyì ná ŋgwêh lág. Bí lé naá giì dene beèh ŋené; Càŋ lé naâ ménâ ŋené gií ndɔ.
52002011	Bí né cu kɔɔ́ gií, ye béh lé bɔɔ́ naâ mé nùà kàn ké lètenè biì faá tele bɔɔ́ yeé mé bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn nɔ.
52002012	Béh lé naâ bí seén, ye te yo taré bí tarè; béh né bí toó nyegé, béh né bí sɔgɔ́, ye bí a: bí dèn yí lòm dene biì teèn, faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ. Nùà njèh né bú. À bí yilá né kɔɔ́, ye te bí yila ŋgùlù nyî.
52002013	Béh né cu Càŋ cu dɔɔ́ŋ vra. Béh vra den né bú felè ŋgòr seèn mé béh lé naâ ké lètenè biì tueé doô. Lòù sam, bí yeé baá ŋgweé, bí lé naá giì lè sie kwaá, ye né ŋgòr gècên mé lé yuoó naâ beè Càŋ, wa lé beè nùàr yùò ná ŋgwêh ma. Á sâ, né lom môn ndɔ, né jéjég ŋgòr Càŋ. Bí bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, à né mé terreb lètenè biì teèn.
52002014	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, gèr mé kwa né bí hên né faá gèr mé lé kwaá naâ bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò Kristò ké Judê ndɔ nɔ. Sâ tueé né ye, bɔ̀ lɔɔ̂ bɔ̀ biì tulu su aá bí gèr yoòr, faá bɔ̀ Jûf lé tulu suú naâ bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ dé ké Judê nɔ.
52002015	Bɔ̀ Jûf hèllè lé naâ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò wulá sɔm, bɔ́ lɔ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ wula giì naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Béh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lé naá cuù béh bunó. Bɔ́ yeé baá ménâ bɔɔ́, bɔ́ yuo Càŋ te temê, bɔ́ ŋa bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ njolò nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ ndɔ.
52002016	Bɔ́ ye te bɔ́ yiín bilí béh mé ceér ŋgòr Càŋ seè mene, te dàm nùàr hihiné ŋgòr Càŋ ŋgwé kwà cú, te Càŋ bɔ̀ nùàr yìlì sɔ̀m cú ndɔ. Dàm veên bɔɔ̀n hèllè yeé mboón aá ménâ, Càŋ jeré njií bɔ́ yúlá-temé seèn yoòr ndɔ.
52002017	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh né mé tuaá biì ká lè beèh, béh bí njolo kwàrè ŋgwéh lòù, wanɔɔ́ŋ temé beèh jɔgɔ le lom né yoòr biì. Cu dɔɔ́ŋ béh né gi gò ké yoòr biì gwaán sɔɔ́.
52002018	Mè Pɔ̂l né mene mé feh mò lege, mé njéh mene Sátàn né lom béh yiín, wanɔɔ́ŋ béh né lom gò ké yoòr biì gwaán sɔɔ́.
52002019	Lòù sam, yìè ndèm beèh mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né bí; te béh kwa ye tàm ŋgɔ̂g, te loù mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò ndeè cuù teèn, béh dobo tàbè toò seèn.
52002020	Mè tueé bí, yo nde né béh loù sâ mé bí samé kelá.
52003001	Béh yeé ŋene dé ménâ yoló deèn nde aá yɔgɔ́, béh kaga lom aá ndòn, ye béh nde né Timotê ké yoòr biì temá njií, te béh le lom ké Àtên mé huún beèh. Timotê né dìm beèh, béh bɔ́ bɔɔ́ yeé seé Càŋ kɔɔ́, béh bɔ́ né yeé Njàgà Bagaà felè Kristò se. Béh tema njií né bú ké yoòr biì, te à nde bí seén, à toó nyegé bí te ceér Càŋe,
52003003	ye te gèr bí jìlì cú. Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye gèr ŋenê né seé beèh dɔɔ̂ŋ.
52003004	Cu mé béh lé naâ ké lètenè biì, béh lé ye bí a, gèr ŋenê né toò beèh teèn ma; hên né cí sâ, bí né gi kɔɔ́.
52003005	Mè lé Timotê hên tema njií kuú naâ dé cî. Mè yeé yolo mene, dé yolô sam cuú; mè ye te à nde jɔ̀gɔ̀ ke-ke bí née te ceér Càŋe ŋgulí den ye wa. Càŋ lé naâ mè lè tené dé gècên, mè ndio lom ye merré déì Sátàn bele weh gi aá bí kèn, te seé beèh mvuan le.
52003006	Timotê yeé nde aá, à cu cuù, à tueé lom béh ŋgòr bebagaà dé gècên, ye béh a: bí née gi ŋgulí den ye ma; wa bí né lom lètenè biì gwaán kuú ndɔ; ye béh a: bí né lom béh mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene cu dɔɔ́ŋ munó den, wa bí né taré mé tuaá beèh lè, faá béh né mé tuaá biì ndɔ nɔ.
52003007	Te Timotê yeé nde tueé gi béh mân, bɔ̀ nùàr mò, yo sagár laré béh dɔɔ́ŋ. Béh né mene mé gèr kwaré, béh dé sâ táŋ cú. Lòù sam, temé biì né lom yoòr Yeésò tég,
52003008	bí baá gi beè Fehtoò beèh, bí né lom bú tég sie. Sâ kènê temé beèh die aá lè kèn.
52003009	Mè tueé bí, gèh dàm vɔ́gɔ́-temê mé bí né béh beè Càŋ haá hên, dé tueê sam, béh bú dé sâ vrà kɔ́ cú ndɔ.
52003010	Béh né lom bú suúteèn mé cíbíteèn mene dua, ye bú a, kòmò kéh béh ceér teèn, te béh nde ŋene ŋgweé cuù bí mé njolo ye, te béh feh jege bɔ̀ njií mé né toò le dɔɔ́ŋ.
52003011	Béh né Tele beèh Càŋ nùà njèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò dua, ye bɔ́ a: há béh ceér kɔɔ́, te béh nde ké yoòr biì.
52003012	Béh ye Fehtoò beèh Yeésò a, bɔ́ yám dèn ká gwaân lètenè biì yaàm; bú a, gàm bí te bí gwaán nyegé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ faá béh né bí gwaán nɔ;
52003013	à há bí terreb te ceér seène, te loù mé bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn ndeè cuù teèn, à kwa bí beè Tele beèh Càŋ, sâ bí né gi ŋagásé tâŋ.
52004001	Sâ bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè tueé lɔ né ye bí a, bí dèn lòm beè Càŋ ŋagásé faá béh lé feéh naá bí nɔ, te huɔm Càŋ yoòr. Béh né kɔɔ́ ye, dene biì né gi ménâ dág. Mé njéh mene béh né cu bí mé terreb yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò bɔŋ: kúkùr biì, bí bɔ́ yɔ́gɔ́ kéh cú ménâ.
52004002	Bɔ̀ njií mé béh lé feh belé naâ bí mé yilí Yeésò Fehtoò beèh dɔɔ́ŋ, bí né gi kɔɔ́.
52004003	Càŋ gwaán né ye bí dèn lòm jolosé. Sâ tueé né ye: bí té yàgà ndé.
52004004	Nùà kàn a, kɔ́ lòm veèh seèn, bɔ́ bú dèn lòm beè nyî fà dɔɔ́ŋ jolosé; te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene ménâ, bɔ́ seén nyí teèn.
52004005	Bɔ́ té mé tuaá veên lè faá bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́ nɔ dèn.
52004006	Te bɔ̀ njií hên dɔɔ́ŋ, nuaré déì a, té mbeí felè kéh; nùàr té njèh mbeî kèmà ndɔ. Béh lé naá giì bí tueé kwaá, nùà kàn né mé tie cî, ye: bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né teèn die yilá, Fehtoò beèh nde né bɔ́ gèr feh keéh.
52004007	Càŋ lé béh dé yàgà ndeê yílá fɔ́n ná ŋgwêh; à lé yilá seér naâ béh, ye te béh ŋaga seér beè nyî dé ŋagâ.
52004008	Sâ kènê bí ŋgweé gi aá kèn; nuaá mé si njií ŋgòr hên doó, nùàr sì ŋgwéh, à si njií né Càŋ Nùà njèh mé haá yeé bí Cúcuí Ŋagâ kɔɔ́.
52004009	Béh né kɔɔ́ ye, bí né dé biì lètenè biì gwaán kuú, bí túé cú ye, kɔ bɔ́ nyàgà túé njí sɔ̂ bí njeré déì teèn, Càŋ lé naâ bí dé biì feh gií.
52004010	Né mene bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò Kristò ké Masedínà dɔɔ́ŋ, bí né gi yeé bɔ́ gwaán. Mé njéh mene, béh né cu bí bɔŋ: Kúkùr biì bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí bɔ́ yɔ́gɔ́ kéh cú dé jomò.
52004011	Bí fágá lòm feh te bí den nɔɔ́ŋ; nuaré déì té lè njèh mbeî lɔ́ yílá; bɔ̀ njèh biì dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bɔ́ gí mé be biì, te bí koó feh biì mé njéh, faá béh lé tueé naâ bí nɔ.
52004012	Mɔ bí né mân bɔɔ́, bí bɔ̀ nùàr kì ndé ŋgwéh, ye bɔ́ a, kó bí koò. Sâ né mene bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́, bɔ́ nde né bí teèn seén.
52004013	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh gwaán né te bí kɔ nyegé njèh felè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ kuû; te bí dèn cú faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ndèm yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwá njí ŋgwéh nɔ; wanɔɔ́ŋ mɔ cio kwa baá bɔ́, bɔ́ né yeé kú vuagá. Bí té dé biì ménâ bɔ́.
52004014	Lòù sam, béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, Yeésò lé naâ kuú, à komo yuo cu aá lè cio kèn. Mé béh né cu ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde né bɔ́ felè seèn komó sɔm keéh, à weh njií bɔ́ bɔ́ ké yoòr seèn.
52004015	Hên béh tueé nde aá bí bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé Fehtoò beèh lé feéh naâ mé sòn seèn, ye: loù mé nyí cuù nde né teèn wa, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé kuú baá, ndeè kela lɔgɔ́ nde né toò kɔɔ́; te béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé née kú ŋgwéeh ye, ndeè bele ye bɔ́ ma.
52004016	Sâ né loù mé hueh tarê Càŋ nde né teèn ŋgulí. Cìlì seèn dé koô nde né loù sâ tueé taré; tàŋ Càŋ nde né tuagá; Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh mé feh seèn ndeè né ké te vulúu suagâ; bɔ̀ nùàr mé lé naâ lè yilí seèn kuú gií dɔɔ́ŋ komo yuo lɔgɔ́ ndeè né kɔɔ́;
52004017	te Càŋ nde ye béh bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ weh, à koró bilí béh bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ te bègè. Jomo sâ béh bɔ́ nde né ké ter kem ŋaá, te béh bɔ̀ Fehtoò beèh kwaré ké sâ, béh bɔ́ den le ké yoòr seèn dé cu dɔɔ̂ŋ.
52004018	Ŋgòr hên, bí bɔ́ dɔ́lé kú bèh temé lètenè biì mé njéh.
52005001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, felè cu mé bɔ̀ njèh kèkènè sâ nde né teèn bɔɔ́ bele, bɔ́ bí dé biì lòù nyàgà sɔ́ ndé cú.
52005002	Bí né gi mé feh biì kɔɔ́ ye: Fehtoò beèh kar waà nde né lòù. Loù sâ nde né faá nùà yîb kar waà né cíbítenè nɔ.
52005003	Kɔ bɔ̀ nùàr baá yo nyen, bɔ́ baá tueé ye: wɔ́ŋ huɔm aá, wa lɔɔ́ dɔlé baá ma. Kɔ baá ménâ, te kar waà ye felè bɔɔ̀n, kum sɔm bɔ́. Mè tueé bí, dé mvelê sam ndé ŋgwéh; ceéhr keéh nde né bɔ́ faá nyer ceéhr keéh yeé ma mé lèì hueêh nɔ.
52005004	Dé biì, bí bèh cibì sam. Cieé sâ bí faá nùà yîb nɔ kár kwà ndé ŋgwéh.
52005005	Bí né gi dé biì bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gɔ né bèh ŋagâ, bí né bɔ̀ bèsɔ́nè bɔ̀. Béh bɔ̀ nuaá mé gɔ né bèh cibì sam, béh cíbíteèn gɔ̀ bèh.
52005006	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh té lɔ́m faá bɔ̀ déì nɔ cèr dèn, béh nyìmè dèn sér làŋ, béh né teèn yoló kelá den.
52005007	Bɔ́ lɔ́m cer yeé cíbítenè, bɔ́ sela cíbítenè ndɔ.
52005008	Dé beèh môn sam, béh né gi bɔ̀ suútenè bɔ̀, béh yíyolò, béh kwá njí gí temé yoòr Yeésò, béh né lètenè beèh gwaán kuú. Sâ né kɔ̀ dé beèh. Béh ndèm tég kwá njí lòm yoòr Yeésò mé nde né béh loù sâ yili sɔm. Sâ né cu tàm taâb dé beèh ndɔ.
52005009	Càŋ lé béh dé ju dieè mé ná ŋgwêh, à lé balé kwaá seér naâ béh, ye te béh yili yuo mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
52005010	Yeésò Kristò lé naâ felè beèh kuú, ye te loù sâ béh né mene làŋ, béh kuú aá mene, te béh bɔ́ ndeè den beh ma.
52005011	Á sâ, bí táré kú lètenè biì ménâ dɔɔ́ŋ; bí sén kú lètenè biì seèn, faá bí bɔɔ́ ka yeé nɔ.
52005012	Belà, béh né bí bɔŋ: bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né seé Càŋ lètenè biì temá, Fehtoò beèh bí haá kwaá né beè bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ bí ceér feh yeé kɔɔ́; bí ŋgwé sòn bɔɔ̀n ŋgweè.
52005013	Bí wèh kwá bɔ́ faá nùàr beè biì, bí gwàn bɔ́ mé temé cén ndɔ. Lòù sam, bɔ́ né mé seé Càŋ beè. Bí bɔ̀ mbaábi dèn mé sòn cên.
52005014	Belà, béh né bí dua, bí kwágá bɔ̀ fùɔ̀b bɔ̀ kwagaà ndɔ; bí tó nyégé bɔ̀ veéh bɔ̀ toò; bí gàm bɔ̀ yuyuaâ bɔ̀ gaàm; bí kwá làrè sèŋ yoòr bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ.
52005015	Bí kè nyégé keè, nuaré déì a, té veên cú, bí húɔ́m sér lètenè biì lòù; bí bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ húɔ́m gí ménâ ndɔ.
52005016	Bí sàmè dèn cu dɔɔ́ŋ lòù.
52005017	Bí dùà dèn Càŋ kèì cén.
52005018	Né mene kei, bí vrà dèn Càŋ teèn ménâ. Bí bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò Kristò, sâ né njií mé Càŋ gwaán né beè biì.
52005019	Bí té Cúcuí Ŋagâ toò cí téná.
52005020	Bí té ŋgòr bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ doó sì njí.
52005021	Njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bí kè nyégé gí bagasé, te bí weh le mé bɔ̀ dé bebagaà beè.
52005022	Bí té veên déì mé be cór nyì lág.
52005023	Càŋ mé kulu dɔlé yeé njèh kɔɔ́, bú a, sènè kwá bí beè seèn lòù, à ke nyegé yɔ̀ŋ biì mé càŋ biì mé yo biì mene, te loù mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò ndeè cuù teèn, à kwa lom bí ŋagásé tâŋ.
52005024	À lé bí yilá naâ kɔɔ́; à né nùà jéjêg, bú nùà njèh nde né bí mé feh seèn ke nyegé.
52005025	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí dùà Càŋ felè beèh duaà ndɔ.
52005026	Bí bíé kéh béh bɔ̀ mbeí biì dɔɔ́ŋ, bí jɔ́gɔ́ sìè bɔ́ beè.
52005027	Mè né bí mé yilí Fehtoò beèh bɔŋ, bí jáŋé làrè mvù hên toò bɔ̀ nùàr biì dɔɔ́ŋ.
52005028	Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, ká sìè gí bí beè.
53001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l mé Silvên bɔ̂ Timotê nyagá njií né mé bɔ̀ŋ biì ké Tesalonîk, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi beè Tele beèh Càŋ bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò dɔɔ́ŋ.
53001002	Tele beèh Càŋ bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
53001003	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh vrà lòm Càŋ felè biì, béh té sòn dù. Mɔ béh né ménâ bɔɔ́, sâ né teèn yilá. Lòù sam, bí né temé cén kwaá ŋgulí huɔɔ́m, né tetoò yaám ndeé; gwaân mé dé kàn né mbeí lètenè biì gwaán doô né naŋ ndɔ.
53001004	Béh mé yilí biì te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bèh dɔɔ́ŋ hên punó gɔ né mé njéh. Gèh sieè mé bí né lom mé temé cén sie huɔɔ́m sâ né baga dé gècên. Bɔ́ né mene bí teèn bunó, bɔ́ né mene bí gèr feh keéh, mé njéh mene bí temé teèn sɔ̀m ŋgwéh; béh hên punó gɔ né mé njéh.
53001005	Bí né ménâ yoló, te ŋené yuo kelà teèn, ye Càŋ ju tena yií né teèn, wa dé Lò Càŋ yilâ bí nde né wulú ma. Lòù sam, bí dàm gèr hên yoló laré né felè Lò Càŋ sâ.
53001006	Yila né teèn ndɔ. Càŋ bɔ̀ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi nde né te ceér-e te ceér-e. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bí gèr feh keéh hèllè, à nde né bɔ́ gèr sâ horó haá cuú,
53001007	te bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gèr ŋené, kwa seér cu dù kɔɔ́. Béh nde né ménâ kwa ndɔ. À ndeè mân bɔɔ́ nde né loù mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò cuù nde né teèn. Loù sâ à ndeè né ké te vulúu ŋené yuo kelâ, à nde né mé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ cìlì seèn dé tetarê jomo,
53001008	à wa ndeè né te leba weè, te à weh bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́ seé, à nde né bɔ̀ tàŋ-tie bɔ̀ seé ménâ weh ndɔ. Lòù sam, bɔ́ temé te Njàgà Bagaà Fehtoò beèh Yeésò kwá njí ŋgwéh.
53001009	Bɔ́ nde né te gèr dé nyèmà mé nyèmà nyoló le, bɔ́ leba den gèr ké ndɔ́ŋ-ndɔ̀ŋ, bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n sùsùm Nùà Dueè yoòr bɔɔ̀n ŋgwé ndé cú, bɔ́ te ŋgùlù seèn-e yílá nyì ndé cú ndɔ.
53001010	Mɔ à ndeè baá loù sâ cuû, bɔ̀ dé seèn nde né bú seén; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ nde né mé bú sumú kuú. Loù sâ bí dɔɔ́ŋ, bí nde gi né lètenè bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ ndɔ. Lòù sam, ŋgòr Càŋ mé béh lé naâ bí tueé doô, bí né temé teèn kwaá njií.
53001011	Béh Càŋ felè biì cu dɔɔ́ŋ hên dua den né dé cî. Béh ye Càŋ a, bɔ́ te bí den komo dene jéjêg mé à né bí mé njéh yilá doô. Béh ye bú a, kúkùr seèn à há bí terreb teèn, te bí bɔɔ́ komo bagaà mé bí né gwaán doô; bɔ̀ seé mé bí bɔɔ́ né mé yilí seèn dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, nyén ŋgúlí gí bɔ́ nyeèn ndɔ.
53001012	Mɔ né mân, sâ yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò nde né felè biì lieé ŋagá, bí nde né mé bú lieé nyegé ndɔ. Bɔ̀ njií hên dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ bɔ̂ Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh nde né mé húɔ́m-temé bɔɔ̀n dé lòù bɔɔ́ gií.
53002001	Mè dé kènê tueé nde aá felè cieé mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò ndeè né teèn cuû, mé béh nde né toò seèn bilí gií ndɔ. Béh né bí bɔŋ, kúkùr biì bɔ̀ nùàr mò,
53002002	bí té kèkɔ̀g dèn; càŋ a té bí lè mbaá téné kú. Bɔ̀ nuaré déì né mene tueé ye bí a, cúcuí ye bɔ́ a, Fehtoò beèh cu giì aá kèn, bí tée gwàn ye. Bɔ́ né mene ŋgòr Càŋ ménâ se, bɔ́ né mene mvù déì jaŋé, ye bí a, béh nyagá naâ ménâ kɔɔ́, bí té lòm gwàn; feh a, té bí ter mbaá ŋéllé kú.
53002003	Bí té gwàn mé nuaré déì bele bí felè cieé sâ lòù. Mé cieé bú sâ ndeè dé seèn waâ, kɔ veên bɔ̀ nùàr baá furú, bɔ́ baá Càŋ taáb saán; kɔ meì bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ ndeè ŋené ŋaga baá bèsɔ́nè, sâ ye. Né nùà yílá-beè bɔ̀n.
53002004	Nùà jéré-temê hèllè nde né Càŋ yoòr yuo njebá, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, té bú dùà, bɔ́ té njeré déì dùà gɔ̀. À nde né Càŋ felè njebá tená, ye nyí né bú yɔgɔ́. Dé sâ gí lòm ndé ŋgwéh, à nde cu né mé njéh ké gwà Càŋ koô lɔgɔ́ yilá bilí, à nde mela den te kɔgɔ, ye nyí né Càŋ nùà njèh sâ.
53002005	Á, ŋgweéh cu mé béh bí lé naâ kɔɔ́, mè lé naá giì bí ménâ tueé ndɔ wa? Bí dé sâ mùnò kɔ́ cú á?
53002006	Mé njéh mene, dé kènê à née mé ceér sam ye, njeré déì né bú toò lalé tená, kɔ cu mé Càŋ lé sie kwaá naâ sâ ndeè waà baá kɔɔ́, sâ ye; bí né gi ménâ kɔɔ́.
53002007	Cí gí cégé ŋgwéh ndɔ: bɔ́ née mene bú beè ménâ sie kwaá, terreb jéré-temé seèn hèllè né doó naáb ŋɔ den, né lom mé seé yieé ndeé. Njèh cén, bú nùà njèh nde née wá ŋgwéeh ye, kɔ nuaá mé sie kwaá né bú beè sâ ndeè sɔm aá yo, sâ ye.
53002008	Cu sâ meì bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ hèllè nde né cie ŋené ŋagá, te Yeésò Fehtoò beèh ndeè weh nyegé ye bú seé: à nde né bú mé ndândaà cúcuî mbaá fulú wulá sɔm, te njènjàn ŋagâ seèn nyoló sɔm weéh ye bú.
53002009	Mɔ tájéré hèllè ndeè baá cie ŋagá den, à nde né njágá mé terreb Sátàn sieé: à nde né bɔ̀ njèh kèkènè hihiné bɔɔ́ bele; bɔ̀ fém mé bɔ̀ cìè nyenyenê nde né cie bomó sue,
53002010	te à bele kwa bɔ̀ nùàr teèn. À nde né jomo veên mé nòmò hihiné kelá, te à bele kwa bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né leér le mé njéh. Lòù sam, gècên mé sé né bɔ́ yili sɔm, bɔ́ temé teèn kwá njí ŋgwéh; bɔ́ bú gwàn ŋgwéh ndɔ.
53002011	Càŋ yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à bɔ́ terreb maŋgelèŋ mbaá hên tema njií seér né mé njéh, te bɔ́ gwaán kela seér bɔ̀ njèh dé gogobô sâ ndɔ.
53002012	Sé yeé baá môn, te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gècên gwàn bèh dɔɔ́ŋ yila gi beè. Veên seèn huɔm kela né bɔ́ yoòr kɔɔ́ nɔ.
53002013	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Fehtoò beèh né bí gwaán hên, béh né lom Càŋ felè biì vra dé gècên. Yila né teèn ndɔ. Lòù sam, Càŋ lé naâ bí balé kwaá, sâ wɔ́ŋ née sam ye, ye te bí ndeè yili yuo faá bèh mân, bí ŋa bɔ̀ dé nyî. Bí bɔ̀ dé seèn ŋa né mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ bɔ̂ temé cén mé bí né te ŋgòr gècên kwaá njií doô.
53002014	Càŋ lé bí yilá naâ mé njéh; lé naâ mé Njàgà Bagaà mé béh lé seé naâ bí doô, ye te bí yila ké bèh sùsùm Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò.
53002015	Mɔ né mân bɔ̀ nùàr mò, sâ bí húné lòm nɔɔ́ŋ, bí kwaá njií temé te tabɔ́ mé béh lé naâ ŋgweé, béh feh keéh cu bí doô; bɔ̀ déì béh lé tueé naâ bí mé feh, bɔ̀ déì béh lé bí nyagá naâ lòù; bí kwá njí temé teèn nɔɔ́ŋ.
53002016	Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò mé feh seèn bɔ̂ Tele beèh Càŋ a, sìè nyégé bí. Bɔ́ gwaán né béh kɔɔ́, bɔ́ cu dɔɔ́ŋ toó nyegé né béh kɔɔ́, bɔ́ temé beèh ter jɔgɔ kwaá né kɔɔ́; dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé húɔ́m-temé bɔɔ̀n. Bɔ́ a, tó nyégé bí, bɔ́ haá bí terreb, te bí bɔɔ́ lom bɔ̀ njèh bebagaà, bí tueé nyegé ŋgòr sònò bagasé ménâ ndɔ.
53003001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mè tueé lɔ né ye bí a, bí dùà kéh béh Càŋ teèn, te ŋgòr Fehtoò beèh sela yam nde bèh dɔɔ́ŋ kukwar, te lie faá lé lie huɔɔ̀m naâ ké lètenè biì nɔ.
53003002	Bí dùà cú bú, te à mvelé sɔm béh beè bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ teèn, wanɔɔ́ŋ né bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀. Ŋgòr Càŋ mé béh né se hên, bɔ̀ nùàr bú dɔɔ́ŋ gwàn làrè ŋgwéh.
53003003	Mé njéh mene, Càŋ né den ka te be sâ. À nde né bí terreb haá, à nde né bí kurú nyegé, te veên bí kèmà cú.
53003004	Béh né kwàgà biì mé yilí Fehtoò beèh yieé, ye bí né yeé bɔɔ́, bí nde cu né mé njéh faá béh lé tueé naâ bí nɔ bɔɔ́ ndeé den.
53003005	Fehtoò beèh a, lèmè nyégé bí temé lè, te bí gwaán ŋeí cu Càŋ dé gwaân, bí yolo komo njèh faá Yeésò Kristò nɔ.
53003006	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh tueé né bí mé yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò, ye bí a: bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ mé né dene fùɔ̀b bɔɔ̀n den dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bɔ́ té bècénè dèn bílí, bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ tabɔ́ mé béh lé naâ bɔ́ feh hên bèlè ŋgwéh.
53003007	Dé biì, bí né gi gule beèh kɔɔ́, bí gɔ̀ bèlè teèn. Lòù sam, léí mé béh lé naâ lètenè biì, béh lé bɔ̀ fùɔ̀b bɔ̀ ná ŋgwêh.
53003008	Béh lé gùm beèh beè nuaré déì yì lɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, ye te à koó den béh dé lòù. Béh lé tema seér cuù naâ seé dé temâ, béh tema bilí seé mé cíbítenè mene. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ béh ye te béh nuaré déì lètenè biì seé beè há cú.
53003009	Lé túé ná ŋgwêh, ye sâ béh mé ceér yâb sam cuú; dé sâ ndɔ́g ndɔ. Béh lé ménâ tema seér naâ, ye te bí ke weh teèn, bí bele gule beèh.
53003010	Béh lé cie ké lètenè biì tueé ŋaré njií naâ dé cî, ye bí a: nuaá mé seé gwàn ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, té yáb sònò nágá kéh ndɔ;
53003011	wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ ye béh a, bɔ̀ nuaré déì né ké lètenè biì teèn, bɔ́ né léláŋ fùɔ̀b mbaá ŋgɔlé gɔ; wa seé bɔɔ̀n né lom ŋgòr bɔ̀ nùàr hua weèh sé wa.
53003012	Mé yilí Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò, béh né mé bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ tueé njií, ye bɔ́ a, bɔ́ témá lòm seé nenɔɔ́ŋ, te bɔ́ koó feh bɔɔ̀n mé be bɔɔ̀n ma.
53003013	Béh né mé bí tueé njií ndɔ, bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí té be dù, bí bɔ́ dèn bagaà cu dɔɔ́ŋ.
53003014	Ndéb mé béh né lè mvù hên leéb kwaá, mɔ nuaré déì tie teèn félá njí ŋgwéh, bí kè bú keè, sâ bí gè lòm mé ceér seèn nɔɔ́ŋ, te à gulí kɔ.
53003015	Bí té bú cu sâ faá nùà bùnò biì nɔ wèh ndɔ, bí fèh sér bú lòù, ye né nùàr biì.
53003016	Nùà Dueè mé kulu dɔlé yeé njèh kɔɔ́, bú a, kúlú dɔ́lé nyégé dèn bí mé gèh kulû hihiné cu dɔɔ́ŋ. Nùà Dueè a, dèn mé bí dɔɔ́ŋ!
53003017	Mè bie aá bí, né mè Pɔ̂l, mè bèh hên nyagá né mé be mò. Hên né be mò, te mvù mò dɔɔ́ŋ mè jege gi né mân.
53003018	Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, ká sìè gí bí beè dɔɔ́ŋ.
54001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò. Càŋ Yìlì nùàr bɔ̂ Yeésò Kristò mé ndèm beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr seèn hên lé ye mè a, dèn mân kɔɔ́.
54001002	Mè nyagá njií né mé wò Timotê. Wò né faá huaán mò ŋàr lè nɔ. Bélɔ̀ fà dɔɔ́ŋ né gi temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií. Huaán mò, Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kɔ́ wò jere, bɔ́ kúlú wò, bɔ́ haá wò dɔlê.
54001003	Cu mé mè lé nde aá ké Masedínà ndeé, mè ye wò a, dèn lè ké Efêse, te wò yiín bɔ̀ nùàr njèh nyenyenê feèh.
54001004	Júée bɔ́ a: té mé bɔ̀ dèbbè bɔ̀ tele bɔɔ̀n léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ sàn lè, bɔ́ té mé dɔ̀gɔ̀tì yilí bɔ̀ tele bɔɔ̀n sâ gènnè lè ndɔ, wanɔɔ́ŋ saân nde né mé njéh lòù yaám seér, te yiín ceér Càŋ. Júée bɔ́ a, dé ceér Càŋ môn sam; wa Càŋ dé seèn bɔ̀ nùàr yili sɔm seér né mé temé yoòr seèn kwaá njiî ma.
54001005	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né ye te bí gwaán kuú lètenè biì gwaàn. Mɔ né mân, kɔ bí lè den seér mé temé ŋagâ, ndòn biì lòù sé ŋgwéh, bí temé biì kwaá njií lom mé Càŋ ndɔ, sâ ye.
54001006	Wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ nuaré déì durá yuo gi aá te ceér gècên hên. Bɔ́ né seér lè saáne ndugó yilá.
54001007	Dé kàn ye, kɔ júée nyí ŋa nde né nùà fèh-sóú Càŋ kɔɔ́; dé kân ye, kɔ nùà fèh-njèh júée nyí ndɔ. Á sâ, bɔ́ ndègè bɔ̀ njèh hèllè ŋgwé kòmò bèh ndɔ. Né mene sònò bɔɔ̀n yuo, bɔ́ bú ŋgwé kòmò bèh lág.
54001008	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, sóú né njèh bagaà. Njèh cén, kɔ wò jolo bú faá tueé nê nɔ.
54001009	Dé nùà gècên, sóú bú kɔɔ́ tágá cú. Càŋ sóú sou njií né mé bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀, bɔ̀ kwá-sóú bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ táré-feh bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ ŋgén-sòn Càŋ bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ sèb-Càŋ bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ wúlá-feh bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ wúlá-tele bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ wúlá-meí bɔ̀ o,
54001010	bɔ̀ gwá sár bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ siíb mé cer seér né bɔ́ mbeí bɔɔ̀n o, bɔ̀ gò kwer bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ jègè kòb bɔ̀ o, dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ sóú sou njií né mé bɔ́. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gècên faá tueé nê nɔ bèlè bèh dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ sóú sou njií cu né mé bɔ́ ndɔ.
54001011	Njàgà Bagaà né gi ménâ tueé. Càŋ lé jege kwaá naâ beè mò, ye mè a, ndé ménâ feh. Né Njàgà Bagaà mé tueé né felè Càŋ Sùsùm, Nùà Ŋgùrmò.
54001012	Mè né lom Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò vra dé gècên; à mè terreb lè seé hên haá né kɔɔ́. À lé naá giì kwàgà mò yieé, te à nde ye mè nùà seê seèn mân sie kwaá.
54001013	Sâ léí toò mè lé naá beh bú bunó, mè né bú gèr feh, mè né bú teèn selé yií. Mé njéh mene, Fehtoò beèh dé sâ táŋ ŋgwéh, à né seér mè jere teèn dé kɔɔ̂ kɔɔ́ yií, ye mè née temé yoòr nyî kwá njí ŋgwéeh ye lòù, wa mè bɔɔ́ cur den né mbaá ma.
54001014	Yeé baá mân, húɔ́m-temé seèn ka sie mè beè ndɔ, à kweh seér mè, te mè sie lom bú mé temé cén, mè gwaán bɔ̀ nùàr seèn mé temé seèn lè.
54001015	Kwá mè tueé bí jéjég ŋgòr; bɔ̀ nùàr a, sìè be mé njéh tég. Jéjég ŋgòr sâ ye: Yeésò Kristò lé ndeè naâ ká te wɔ́ŋe bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ yili sɔm. Káŋkáŋ nùà veên sâ lètenè bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ né mè hên.
54001016	Mé njéh mene, mè káŋkáŋ nùà veên la jɔ̀gɔ̀ hèllè, Càŋ né cu mè bagaà lòù bɔɔ́ seér. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ sìè-temé Yeésò Kristò teèn, te haá bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀ terreb, bɔ́ kwaá njií taré temé yoòr nyî, bɔ́ ndeè kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà.
54001017	Bɔ̀ nùàr a, sén Càŋ seèn. Terreb seèn a, sùmù yùò kelà cie dé kèì cên. Nùà Dueè dé cu dɔɔ̂ŋ né bú. Nùàr bú mé njolo ŋéné bèh ndɔ. Càŋ ndeèr né lom bú. È môn.
54001018	Huaán mò Timotê, mè ŋgòr hên dɔɔ́ŋ kwaá lɔ aá beè yeè, te yuo faá bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ lé tueé naâ felè yeè nɔ. Mè ye te wò sie be mé njéh, wò lie yií taáb teèn.
54001019	Mɔ wò baá mân bɔɔ́, kwá njí lòm temé yoòr Càŋ tég, wò bɔ́ gí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ mé ŋágá-temé mene ndɔ. Bɔ̀ nuaré déì lé naâ ceér bagaà hên berɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ sɔm gi temé yoòr Càŋ. Yeé baá mân, bɔ́ lé naâ lòù leér le gií ndɔ.
54001020	Lètenè bɔɔ̀n sâ Himenê mé Alesándà né teèn. Mè lé naâ be felè bɔɔ̀n sɔm, te bɔ́ yila nde kɔ beè Sátàn, bɔ́ né njèh teèn maán, te bɔ́ Càŋ sèb cú.
54002001	Mè toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ tueé lɔgɔ́ né ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: dùà làrè Càŋ felè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ, bɔ́ kúgór bú kugòr, bɔ́ vra laré bú felè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ ndɔ ma.
54002002	Bɔ́ dùà bú felè bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mene, te bɔ́ sie dilí nyegé njèh, béh ŋgweé ye fu, temé die béh lè, béh sie lom Càŋ mé temé cén, béh den dene bɔ̀ kàm bɔ̀.
54002003	Mɔ bí né Càŋ Yìlì nùàr mân dua laré, sâ bí bɔɔ́ né njií mé né bú njolò dilí huɔɔ́m.
54002004	À gwaán né ménâ ndɔ, ye te bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ ŋene kɔ gècên nyî, bɔ́ yili yuo gi.
54002005	Lòù sam, Càŋ gi cegé né bú mé huún. Lètenè Càŋ bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr kòù né cegé cén ndɔ. Kòù sâ né lom nùà cén; nùà cén sâ né Yeésò Kristò.
54002006	À lé bɔ̀ nùàr mé húɔ́m seèn ŋge weéh naâ kɔɔ́. Lé naâ te cu mé Càŋ lé nyegé kwaá naâ ndɔ. Yeé baá môn, ŋené yuo kelà bèsɔ́nè, ye Càŋ gwaán né bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ yili sɔm ma.
54002007	Càŋ lé mè mbɔ̀ŋ tebê seèn hên sie kwaá naâ dé cî, ye mè a, ndé ŋgòr nyî lètenè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam se yɔŋ; wa fèh bɔ́ feèh, né ŋgòr gècên, te bɔ́ kwaá njií temé cén teèn ma. Né ka môn jég, mè nyeén túé ŋgwéh.
54002008	Yeé baá môn, mè né lom gwaán, ye bɔ̀ siíb a, dùà làrè bú bèh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ sɔ̀m njí be Càŋ duaà ter, bɔ́ dùà lòm bú mé temé ŋagâ. Tɔgɔ mé saân a, té lètenè bɔɔ̀n fúrú kè.
54002009	Bɔ̀ véh a, sù yí cɔ̀gɔ̀ teèn, bɔ́ fɔ́n gèh cɔ̀gɔ̀ mé né te ceér-e, bɔ́ su lom cí; bɔ́ té feh lòù nyàgà gɔ́né; bɔ́ té yíyâr mé gɔ̀m bègè yí, bɔ́ té cɔ̀gɔ̀ bègè sù ndɔ.
54002010	Bɔ́ bɔ́ sér bɔ̀ seé dé bebagaà mé né teèn yilá, te feh keéh ye bɔ́ né Càŋ veéh.
54002011	Mɔ bɔ̀ véh baá ju Càŋ maán, bɔ́ té sòn kòmò, bɔ́ léb sér teèn lòù.
54002012	Mè né ma vêh yiín; bú a, té bɔ̀ siíb njèh kɔɔ́ fèh sér, à mé sòn toò bɔ̀ siîb sam ndɔ; bú a, húné lòm nɔɔ́ŋ.
54002013	Lòù sam, Càŋ lé me lɔgɔ́ naâ Ádàm, te à nde ye Evà meé.
54002014	Sátàn lé Ádàm bèlè ná ŋgwêh, à lé belé naâ Evà. Evà lé sóú Càŋ kwaà naâ kɔɔ́.
54002015	Mé njéh mene, ma vêh nde né mé bɔ̀ huaán yili yuo; kɔ à né temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií ndɔ, à né bɔ̀ mbeí mé temé cén gwaán, à bɔ̀ nùàr doó káré sì ŋgwéh, à né veên nyenné, sâ ye.
54003001	Kwá mè tueé wò jéjég ŋgòr. Jéjég ŋgòr sâ né: nuaá mé gwaán né dé seèn seé gwà Càŋ, ye te bɔ́ haá beè nyî, fɔɔ́n kwa baá seé dé bagaà kèn.
54003002	Sâ bú a, dèn nuaá mé yilí seèn ŋgúlí vé ŋgwéh, à dèn lòm mé véh cén, à té mbè sèlà, à dèn nùà kɔ́gɔ̀n, à bɔ́ yí njèh te ceér-e. Bú a, dèn nùà wèh-kìn; bú a, dèn lòm nùà fèh-njèh dé gècên;
54003003	à té sìbì, à té sà fɔ́n, à té nùàr mgbé, à dèn sér dɔlésé, à té kàgàlɔ̀ŋ gwàn sèlà ndɔ.
54003004	Bú a, dèn nuaá mé né mbàgà seèn nyegé komo, à kɔ nyegé bagasé ye bɔ̀ huaán nyî né tie ŋgweé, bɔ́ né leéb, sâ ye.
54003005	Wanɔɔ́ŋ mɔ nùàr mbàgà seèn nùà njèh nyégé kɔ́ ŋgwéh, à mbàgà dé Càŋ nyegé komo nde né naàn wa?
54003006	Mɔ bí nde aá nùà koô sie, bí té nùà feê sìè. Mɔ sam, à nde né mé njéh lòù punó seér, te à die ju beè Càŋ, faá Sátàn lɔ dieé naâ nɔ.
54003007	Mɔ bí nde aá nùà koô sie, kɔ bú a, dèn dene bɔ̀ kàm bɔ̀, te bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ bɔ̀ veéh ye bú ndɔ. Mɔ sam, bɔ́ nde né bú seb; fegùlì sé ye baá bú sie, à sela yuií Sátàn.
54003008	Bɔ̀ mabɔn gwà Càŋ a, dèn lòm cu dɔɔ́ŋ dene bɔ̀ kàm bɔ̀ ménâ ndɔ, bɔ́ té sòn fà túé. Bɔ́ a, té mbè sìbì, bɔ́ té kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé kòb mene fɔ́n;
54003009	bɔ́ kwá njí gí temé te ŋgòr gècên mé Càŋ né béh feh hên, bɔ́ ŋaga seér temé lè.
54003010	Mɔ bí nde aá mabɔn gwà Càŋ sie, bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ kwé nyége bú bagasé ye; mɔ à kela né kelà, à yila ye seé sâ.
54003011	Bɔ̀ véh bɔɔ̀n a, dèn lòm dene bɔ̀ kàm bɔ̀ ménâ ndɔ, bɔ́ té sòn túágá sàr gɔ̀, bɔ́ té mbè sèlà, bɔ́ dèn lòm te njèh dɔɔ́ŋe kɔ́bè sâ.
54003012	Mabɔn gwà Càŋ a, dèn lòm mé véh cén; bú a, dèn nuaá mé né bɔ̀ huaán nyegé komo, à né mbàgà seèn nyegé komo ndɔ.
54003013	Bɔ̀ mabɔn gwà Càŋ mé né gi seé bɔɔ̀n faá Càŋ tueé nê nɔ bɔɔ́ komo dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né njolò bɔ̀ nùàr lieé huɔɔ́m. Bɔ́ ŋgòr Càŋ sâ tueé lom nde né mé terreb teèn, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, bɔ́ temé kwá njí gí yoòr Yeésò Kristò ma.
54003014	Mè né munó ye, mè ndeè né ké yoòr yeè ndeé. Mé njéh mene, mè ye, kwá mè nyagá njií ŋgɔgɔ̂ wò lòù ye.
54003015	Mɔ mè né mene ŋgagá, te wò ŋene mvù hên, wò kɔ gèh dé mé bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ nde né den. Bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ sâ, mè jue né mbàgà Càŋ. Càŋ mé né Càŋ làŋ lé naâ gècên seèn teèn nyeén kwaá, te kù den bú sâ, à taá kwaá gècên sâ ter kɔɔ́.
54003016	Mè tueé bí, dé saân sam, bɔ̀ njèh nâb mé Càŋ né béh te ceér seène feh hên né lom tàŋɔ̀r, ye: À lɔ naâ nùàr ŋaá. Cúcuí Ŋagâ feh keéh ye à né dilísé. Bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ lé naâ bú mé njolo ŋené. Lò nùàr ŋgweé gi ju seèn. Bèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ nùàr né temé yoòr seèn kwaá njií. À ŋaá nde cu aá ké te vulúu kèn.»
54004001	Sâ Cúcuí Ŋagâ lé naá giì bèsɔ́nè tueé kwaá, ye mɔ wɔ́ŋ nde aá gií wa, bɔ̀ nuaré déì nde né temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò sɔm, bɔ́ kwaá njií seér yoòr bɔ̀ cècàŋ mé nde né bɔ́ bele weh gií, wa bɔ́ nde né ŋgòr bɔ̀ tándulù ŋgweé seér ndɔ.
54004002	Ye bɔ́ nde né mé feh bɔɔ̀n beè bɔ̀ tánágá bɔ̀ leér le gií. Lòù sam, bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ mé ndòn lè sam cuú; ndòn bɔɔ̀n fií yuo aá kèn.
54004003	Bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ sâ nde né bɔ̀ nùàr ndéb vevenê tieè kurá kwaá; bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ nùàr tueé, ye bɔ́ a: té véh jɔ́gɔ́, bɔ́ té gèh yáb dé kàn yíé, bɔ́ té dé kân yíé ndɔ. Á sâ, Càŋ lé bɔ̀ yáb sâ dɔɔ́ŋ si giì naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ, ye te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr nyî kwaá njií, mé né gècên nyî kɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ yieé beh ménâ, bɔ́ né nyí teèn vra ma.
54004004	Mè tueé bí, sâ bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lé si giì naâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi baga. Mɔ né mân, nùàr té déì teèn mbaá jìnè kú; bú a, vrà lòm Càŋ dé vraà, à yieé njií sònò.
54004005	Ŋgòr Càŋ bɔ̂ Càŋ duaà nyegé gi aá bɔ̀ njií sâ beè Càŋ kèn.
54004006	Mɔ wò né bɔ̀ nùàr ndéb mân leéb nyegé, sâ wò né nùà seê Yeésò Kristò dé bagaà, wò né te ŋgòr Càŋe kulá ndeé. Lòù sam, wò né temé te ŋgòr gècên kwaá njií, wò né ceér Yeésò bele.
54004007	Mɔ né mân, té be yeè te dèbbè bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ yí, né gènnè tándugô, ceér Càŋ sam. Màn sér dé yeè gò nùà Càŋ.
54004008	Gò dé ká te wɔ́ŋe mé yo taré nde né mé njéh né ka teèn huɔɔ́m weh ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, gò dé beè Càŋ huɔm kela né kɔɔ́. Mɔ wò né faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ gɔ, sâ wò baá gi kènê mé yɔ̀ŋ teèn, te wò ndeé kwa cu ye yɔ̀ŋ dé tètàgà.
54004009	Bèlè môn, jéjég ŋgòr né cí; bɔ̀ nùàr a, sìè be mé njéh tég.
54004010	Béh seé hên lege kuú né dé cî. Lòù sam, ndèm beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr Càŋ; à né Càŋ làŋ, Yìlì nùàr né bú; à né dé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ. Tétég né dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé bɔɔ̀n yoòr seèn kwaá njií.
54004011	Fèh gí bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr hên dɔɔ́ŋ, ŋéí lòm bɔ́ yoòr tég.
54004012	Té gwàn mé nuaré déì seb wò, wa wò née huaán maàn ye. Mè tueé wò, dèn lòm dé yeè toò bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ faá mòù nɔ, wò gɔ feh seér bɔ́ gò bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀. Ŋgòr yeè a, dèn môn; dene yeè môn. Ŋgɔ̀ fèh bɔ́ gwaân yeè, wò ŋgɔ feh bɔ́ temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njiî, wò jolo feh bɔ́ ndɔ.
54004013	Cu mé wò née mè kela den hên, fágá lòm feh tég, wò né ŋgòr Càŋ ké ter toò bɔ̀ nùàr jaŋé njií, wò né bɔ́ se, wò né bɔ́ feh nyegé ndɔ.
54004014	Té seé yeè mé Càŋ lé haá kwaá naâ beè yeè sâ sèb. Wò lé terreb sâ kwaá naâ cu mé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ lé naâ felè yeè tueé doô, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lé naâ wò be felè baá ndɔ.
54004015	Mè tueé wò, kè nyégé seé sâ bagasé, bɔ́ lòm bú mé temé cén, te bɔ̀ nùàr ke njií njolo teèn, bɔ́ kɔ ye wò né te ceér Càŋe tetoò yaám ndeé.
54004016	Bɔ̀ŋ feh yeè mé dene yeè. Njií mé wò né bɔ̀ nùàr feh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ̀ŋ feh yeè mé njéh ndɔ. Dèn lòm teèn tég, te wò yili sɔm gùm yeè nùà njèh, wò yili sɔm keéh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né sòn yeè ŋgweé ndɔ.
54005001	Mɔ wò nde aá nùà kàm njèh tueé, té bú lòù ndè, né tele yeè, túé njí bú mé hueh dɔlê. Kè nyégé bɔ̀ ndà bagasé ndɔ, kè njí bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ faá bɔ̀ dé yeè nɔ.
54005002	Bɔ̀ véh mé né ké toò yeè, wèh kwá bɔ́ faá bɔ̀ meí yeè nɔ; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né jomo yeè faá bɔ̀ tie yeè ndɔ, jòlò lòm bɔ́ mé temé cén.
54005003	Sùmù nyégé ma kû bagasé. Mɔ né ma kû dé gècên, té njolo mé bú cì.
54005004	Á, mɔ ma kû né mé bɔ̀ huaán teèn, wa né bɔ̀ ndù seèn wa, sâ júée bɔ́ a, bɔ́ jɔ̀gɔ̀ gàm lɔ́gɔ̂ bú kɔɔ́ ye, wa seé bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ né cí ma, te bɔ́ meh mé njéh meèh. Bɔ́ a, kɔ́ɔ ye bɔ̀ tele bɔɔ̀n lé naâ bɔ́ ménâ koó ndɔ ma. Mɔ bɔ́ né ménâ bɔɔ́, nde né Càŋ njolò dilí huɔɔ́m.
54005005	Mɔ ma kû mé bɔ́ jue né ma kû sâ né lom dé seèn mé huún, nùà gàm déì toò sam, sâ ndèm seèn dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr Càŋ, à dé seèn sòn mé Càŋ duaà dù ndé ŋgwéh, à nde né bú cíbí mé lou mene dua den, ye bú a, gàm nyí teèn ma.
54005006	Dé ma kû mé né wɔ́ŋ gwaán, môn sam; à née mene làŋ, à baá gi dé seèn komó. Dé sâ né môn.
54005007	Ndɔ̀gɔ̀ nyégé bɔ́ tie mé ŋgòr hên bagasé, te yilí bɔɔ̀n ŋgúlí vé cú.
54005008	Mɔ nùàr temé yoòr bɔ̀ nùàr seèn kwá njí ŋgwéh, tétég mè jue né mbàgà seèn, mɔ à temé teèn kwá njí ŋgwéh, sâ à né ceér Yeésò Kristò seb; sâ nùà bú sénâ veên seèn né dé bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ̂ dɔɔ́ŋ dulí yɔgɔ́.
54005009	Mɔ wò nde aá yilí ma kû déì lètenè bɔ̀ mbeî nyagá yií, kɔ à yɔgɔ́ keéh baá nyèmà yulà ténjén; kɔ à gwɔ̀m cùm bèh ndɔ;
54005010	kɔ bɔ̀ nùàr né yeé seé seèn keí, ye à lé naâ bɔ̀ huaán bagasé koó nyegé, sâ ye. Kɔ bɔ́ ye à lé naá beh kìn ké lɔ seèn weh njií; à né bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ gule beè yaga kwaá, à né bɔ̀ nùàr te gèr-e gam, sâ ye; kɔ à lé naâ bɔ̀ njèh bebagaà mé temé seèn mene bɔɔ́ laré. Mɔ né gi ménâ, wò nyagá ye yilí seèn.
54005011	Mɔ ma kû né cui, té yilí seèn te mvù mbaá nyàgà kú. Lòù sam, cu mé njií sâ nde cuù né bú ŋaá, à nde né ceér Yeésò Kristò doó si njií, à nde siíb seèn jɔgɔ́.
54005012	Sé yeé baá môn, sòn mé à lé komó naâ toò bɔ̀ nùàr ye nyí siíb jɔ́gɔ́ ndé cú hèllè sie bú ndɔ.
54005013	Mɔ sam, wò sé yeé baá bú nyagá, à lɔgɔ le, à yila baá-re gùgwò mvuaán gɔɔ̀. Sé yeé yɔgɔ́ baá, à yila tuaga sar gɔɔ̀, à né ŋgòr bɔ̀ nùàr hua weh bele. Bɔ̀ njií mé à sé la sònò fèlà ná ŋgwêh, à suaré seér cí.
54005014	Mɔ né mân, sâ ma kû mé né cui a, jɔ́gɔ́ kɔ́ dé seèn siíb, à sie nyegé gwà; bɔ́ ŋar kwa huaán teèn, te bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ veên yoòr beèh túé njí cú.
54005015	Wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ ma kû déì si lɔ gi aá ceér Yeésò Kristò, bɔ́ né Sátàn ŋgɔ seér.
54005016	Mɔ ma Yeésò Kristò déì né mé ma kû déì jomo, bú a, ndé gàm sér ma kû sâ kɔɔ́, te bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ gèr mé njéh ŋéné cú; te bɔ̀ ma kû mé né bɔ̀ dé gècên le lom beè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ kɔɔ́.
54005017	Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé né seé lètenè bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ bɔɔ́ dilí huɔɔ́m dɔɔ́ŋ, bí vrà bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n te mbeí fà. Mè tétég jue né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé se yeé ŋgòr Càŋ mé temé cén, mé né ŋgòr Càŋ feh ndɔ.
54005018	Lòù sam, né te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den, ye: Nàgà mé né yolo mé gule lobo, bí té bú kagá sònò yí kwá!» Ye nùà seé a, dèn mé sàgà seê dé seèn teèn ndɔ ma.
54005019	Mɔ bɔ́ né nùà koô gwà Càŋ déì toò yeè mé ju bele, tée sòn kòmò ye, kɔ wa baá nùà fà mé tagár mé naâ njií sâ ŋené, sâ ye.
54005020	Mɔ bɔ̀ nuaré déì né veên bɔɔ́, ndè sɔ̀m bɔ́ cie toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ, te veéh sie bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀ sieè.
54005021	Mè né wò tueé; mè tueé né wò toò Càŋ mé toò Yeésò Kristò. Bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ mé à lé balé kwaá naâ, né gi ŋgweé ndɔ. Mè ye wò a, té ŋgòr hên nyèn, bɔ́ lòm ménâ, té gwèn teèn kwá. Bɔ̀ njií mé wò né bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lòm be cén.
54005022	Tée nuaré déì be felè kwar cén mbaá bá, ye bú a: ndé bèh seé Càŋ. Jɔ̀gɔ̀ kè née seé seèn keè ye. Té te veên nuaré déì dìè yílá, dèn lòm dé yeè ŋagásé.
54005023	Kènê té ndândaà nòmò ŋúé cú, ŋúé téná wèh mbè teèn ŋgɔ́b, te gam lèì mé né wò yulá doô.
54005024	Veên né hihiné. Veên bɔ̀ nuaré déì jɔ̀gɔ̀ ŋgumó yuo kela lɔgɔ̂ née cie ye, te bɔ̀ nùàr nde ye ju teèn tená; bɔ̀ déì kɔ bɔ́ tena gi aá ju, ŋené yuo kela ye cie.
54005025	Bɔ̀ seé bebagaà né gi ménâ ndɔ, bɔ́ né gi bèsɔ́nè ŋené den. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé née mene lòù leér den, nde gi né cie yuo kelá.
54006001	Júée bɔ̀ kwer a, ŋgwé nyégé sòn bɔ̀ tele seê bɔɔ̀n bagasé; bɔ́ a, sùmù húɔ́m lòm bɔ́ mé temé cén, te nuaré déì yilí Càŋ fèlà béh cú, te bɔ́ njií mé béh né feh hên bɔ́ béh cú ndɔ.
54006002	Bɔ̀ kwer mé tele seê bɔɔ̀n né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, mè ye bɔ́ a, bɔ́ té bɔ̀ tele seê bɔɔ̀n sèb, wa lòù sam, bɔ́ bɔ́ né gi kèì cén toò Yeésò Kristò ma. Mɔ sé la né bèh keì wa, bɔ́ sé la seé bɔɔ́ kela seér naâ mé bɔ́. Lòù sam, bɔ́ gam né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, bɔ́ bɔ́ né gi mé ceér cên, bɔ́ né bɔ́ gwaán ndɔ. Ndé bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr hên feh, ŋéí lòm teèn tég.
54006003	Mɔ nuaré déì né bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr dé hiîn feh seér, à ŋgòr gècên mé lé yuoó naâ sònò Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò fèh ŋgwéh, mɔ à tòù seèn mé béh né yeé feh doô fèh ŋgwéh ndɔ,
54006004	sâ nùà hèllè njeré déì kɔ́ ŋgwéh, à punó mbou gɔ né lòù. Lè seèn kurú lom né saân, à dé seèn tɔgɔ nde lom né felè bɔ̀ njàb ŋgòr ndɔ. Sé yeé baá môn, huer yuo teèn, tɔgɔ bɔ̂ séb kɔlé die teèn, júéb nde né cie bomó sue ndɔ.
54006005	Bɔ́ yeé leér lɔ aá ceér gècên, bɔ́ baá lòù gɔ cur seér, madar saân kɔ die lètenè bɔɔ̀n ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ munó gi né ye, mɔ nùàr baá tòù Càŋ feh wa, à nde né kàgàlɔ̀ŋ ŋgún teèn kwa ma. Kàmbér sâ ndɔ́g dé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ sam.
54006006	Mè gwaán aá ndɔ, tòù Càŋ né ŋgúlú dueè bɔ̀n. Njèh cén, kɔ temé nùàr né lè mé bɔ̀ njèh dé seèn nùà njèh huɔɔ́m ndɔ, sâ ye.
54006007	Béh lé ká te wɔ́ŋe waà naâ be be. Mɔ béh baá kuú, béh cu cu nde né be be ndɔ.
54006008	Mɔ waà ká toò, béh baá yáb mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ mene teèn kwa, sâ wulu né wulù mà.
54006009	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gwaán gi né njèh dɔɔ́ŋ kwa larê, Sátàn nde né bɔ́ sòn teèn felá sie, à nde né bɔ́ mé njèh hihiné nyuagá keéh, bɔ́ nde né teèn ndugó yilá, bɔ́ sela yuií seèn, bɔ́ sibí le teèn ndɔ.
54006010	Tétán né yeé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ. Dɔ̀gɔ̀tì yúlá-temê bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ bilí gi né felè kàgàlɔ̀ŋ gwaân. Bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá yuo kwaá lɔ gi aá ceér Càŋ felè kàgàlɔ̀ŋ, bɔ́ né te gèr-e sielé yilá, gèr né lom bɔ́ seé faá cí nɔ weh ndɔ.
54006011	Dé yeè, wò nùà Càŋ, beè yeè a, té ménâ dèn; sɔ̀m be yeè te bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, lègè lòm tég te wò den dilísé, màn sér dé yeè gò nùà Càŋ, kwá njí lòm temé yoòr seèn, kɔ́ lòm bɔ̀ mbeí yeè gwaân, yóló bɔ́ yolò, dèn lòm toò bɔɔ̀n yébbè yébbè mân ndɔ.
54006012	Líé lòm taáb mé temé cén faá nùà Càŋ nɔ, kúmó kwá yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà beè tég; Càŋ lé wò hên yilá kuú naâ dé cî. Wò lé naá giì toò bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgún mé gècên mene tueé, ye nyí kwaá njií aá temé teèn.
54006013	Mè nde né wò ndéb tieè kwaá kwaá. Càŋ né ŋgweé; yɔ̀ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ haá yeé bú. Yeésò Kristò né ŋgweé ndɔ; à lé naâ gècên seèn toò Pɔ́nsè Pilátò ménâ tueé. Bɔ́ né gi ŋgweé. Mè ye wò a:
54006014	jòlò nyégé sóú Càŋ bagasé, kébbé nyégé bagasé, te Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò ndeè cuù, sâ née ŋagásé tâŋ, veên déì teèn kèmà ŋgwéh.
54006015	Càŋ nùà njèh ndeè cu sâ tueé nde né kɔɔ́. Terreb dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn, bú Nùà ŋgùrmò. Mgbè bɔ̀ mgbè né lom bú. Nùà Dueè felè bɔ̀ dudueèr bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ gi lom né bú ndɔ.
54006016	Nuaá mé dé seèn kú ndé ŋgwéh gi cegé né bú. Bèh cèrè seèn né lom yí te njolo ŋagâ jéjég; nùàr a, bɔ́ mene naàn, à ké teèn wá nyì ndé ŋgwéh. Nuaá mé ŋene ŋgweé aá bú mé njolo née sam ye; ndɔ́g nuaá mé nde né bú njolò ŋené, teèn sam nde ŋgweéh ndɔ. Bɔ̀ nùàr a, sén bú seèn; terreb dé seèn né dé nyèmà mé nyèmà. È môn!
54006017	Hên né ndéb bɔ̀ sèsàm bɔ̀; júée bɔ́ a, mɔ bɔ́ baá ŋgùlù wɔ̂ŋ yieé satí, bɔ́ té ŋgàŋ fù; bɔ́ té ndèm mé ŋgúlú wɔ̂ŋ mbaá kwá njí kú, né wàn; bɔ́ ndèm kwá njí sér mé Càŋ. À béh njèh dɔɔ́ŋ haá gi né kɔɔ́, ye te béh samé huɔɔ́m mé njéh ma.
54006018	Sɔ́gɔ́ bɔ́ sɔgɔ̀, te bɔ́ bɔɔ́ komo bagaà, júée bɔ́ a, bɔ́ bɔ́ màgà kélá sér cí ma; bɔ́ dèn làgàtì, bɔ́ há njí lòm be mbaá ma.
