54006019	Mɔ bɔ́ né ménâ bɔɔ́, sâ bɔ́ né bɔ̀ ŋgúlú bɔɔ̀n ter dé cieé kwêh leér kwaá, te bɔ́ ndeè kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà teèn.
54006020	Huaán mò Timotê, seé mé Càŋ né wò beè jege kwaá hên, kébbé nyégé bú tég. Mɔ bɔ̀ nùàr baá bɔ̀ wɔb ŋgòr doô kwarè yeè tueé den, ye bɔ́ né njèh kɔɔ́ sé wa, té sòn yeè teèn yí gùm dɔɔ́ŋ; dé sâ ceér Càŋ sam;
54006021	wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ nuaré déì sɔm gi aá temé yoòr Càŋ kèn, bɔ́ né lòù tueé gobó seér, ye bɔ́ né gi kɔɔ́ sé wa. Té sòn yeè teèn yí. Húɔ́m-temé Càŋ a, ká sìè gí bí dɔɔ́ŋ beè.
55001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò. Càŋ lé mè mân sie kwaá naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn, ye mè a, ndé kùr yɔ̀ŋ se; júée bɔ̀ nùàr a: mɔ bɔ́ bilí den né beè Yeésò Kristò wa, bɔ́ nde né yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà kwa ma.
55001002	Mè nyagá njií né mé wò huaán yíé-temé mò Timotê. Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kɔ́ wò jere, bɔ́ kúlú wò, bɔ́ haá wò dɔlê.
55001003	Mè né Càŋ vra, mè né lom seé seèn mé temé ŋagâ bɔɔ́; mè bɔɔ́ né faá bɔ̀ tele mò léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ lé bɔɔ́ naâ nɔ. Cu dɔɔ́ŋ mè né Càŋ dua, mè yilí yeè suúteèn mé cíbíteèn mene nyèn bèh, mè né bú felè yeè vra.
55001004	Mè né wò munó dé gècên. Lòù sam, mè lɔ nde ké yoòr yeè yuo, wò lé naâ yúé si. Kènê mè yeé ŋene aá ménâ, mè ye sâ kɔ mè wa cuù ké yoòr yeè waà, te yo sagár cu mè.
55001005	Gèh temé yeè cén mé wò né yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá nyegé doô né ká lè mò, mè bú nyèn ŋgwéh. Sâ lé naâ seé Loyísè meí yeè dé koô, à lɔ naâ temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií. Jomo sâ meí yeè Enísè kwaá njií cu ka ménâ. Wò hên kwaá njií cu né cí, mè né kɔɔ́.
55001006	Mɔ né ménâ, huaán mò, seé mé Càŋ lé haá kwaá naâ beè yeè doô, té be mé njéh dù, wanɔɔ́ŋ nde né nyimé yuo. Càŋ lé wò haá naâ kɔɔ́; lé naâ loù mé mè lé baà naâ wò be felè doô.
55001007	Té njeré déì vèh nyì gùm dɔɔ́ŋ. Cúcuí mé Càŋ lé haá naâ béh hên nde né béh temé lòù taré seér, nde né béh gwaân haá, haá béh terreb, te béh sie komo yo mé njéh ndɔ; à béh veéh lè yí ndé ŋgwéh.
55001008	Sâ mɔ wò baá felè Fehtoò beèh tueé, té fegùlì kwá. Né mene felè mò kwer seèn, té gùlì ménâ ndɔ. Ŋéné lòm gèr te Njàgà Bagaà faá mè nɔ; kɔ́ lòm ye, terreb nyî né beè Càŋ.
55001009	À lé béh yili sɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́; à béh yilá bilí né dé cî, ye te béh ŋa bɔ̀ nùàr nyî. Lé naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn ndɔ, béh lé seé bagaà déì bɔ́ kòmò ná ŋgwêh, à lé béh yili sɔɔ́m naâ dé lòù. Béh lé njua sâ kwa keéh naâ mé Yeésò Kristò, sâ wɔ́ŋ lɔ née teèn sam ye.
55001010	Yeé baá kènê, à nde ye húɔ́m-temé sâ yoòr Yìlì nùàr Yeésò Kristò ŋené sɔm keéh. Lòù sam, Yeésò Kristò duagá sɔm aá terreb cioò kèn, à né béh Njàgà Bagaà feh, à teèn sâ ŋené sɔm keéh né béh yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà ndɔ.
55001011	Kènê à Njàgà Bagaà sâ jege haá né beè mò, ye mè a, ndé bɔ̀ nùàr bèh dɔɔ́ŋ feh bele, sè bɔ́ seè.
55001012	Mè gèr hên ŋene kuú né dé cî. Mé njéh mene, mè mé gèr táŋ cú. Lòù sam, mè né gi bèh ndèm mò kɔɔ́, mè né kɔɔ́ ye, seé seèn mé à jege kwaá né beè mò hên, à nde né kebbé nyegé, à kebbé nyegé den nde né ménâ tɔ́g kɔ ndeè wa baá cieé sâ ndɔ.
55001013	Bɔ̀ ŋgòr jéjêg mé wò lé naá giì sònò mò ŋgweé dɔɔ́ŋ, sìè kwá felè, wò bele ménâ ndɔ, wò sie lom Yeésò Kristò mé temé cén, wò né bɔ̀ nùàr mé temé Yeésò lè gwaán.
55001014	Njàgà Bagaà mé Càŋ jege kwaá né beè yeè sâ, té gwàn mé nuaré déì kweéh seér bú. Kébbé nyégé lòm bú mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ mene; à baá gi béh lè lè.
55001015	Ŋgweéh wò né gi kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ mé né te tàbè Asíà dɔɔ́ŋ durá si lɔ gi aá mè wa? Fíjèn bɔ̂ Hermɔjénè né gi lètenè sâ teèn ndɔ.
55001016	Dé Onesifôr môn sam. Càŋ a, té njolo mé mbàgà seèn cì. Lòù sam, cu dɔɔ́ŋ à lé naâ mè yo bɔɔ́ taré. À fegùlì táŋ ŋgwéh ye mè né nùà gwà cibì.
55001017	À yeé waà baá ká Rɔ̂m, gèh dé mé à lé fɔɔ́n kwaá naâ mè doô, lé dé tueê ná ŋgwêh.
55001018	Wò né cu kɔɔ́ ye, à lé mè ké Efêse gam kelà naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Nùà Dueè a, bɔ́ húɔ́m lòm bú bagaà loù téná-juù dé gècên.
55002001	Sâ huaán mò, kwá fùgò mé wò né beè Yeésò Kristò kuú hên haá wò terreb kɔɔ́.
55002002	Njií mé wò lé naá giì sònò mò ŋgweé dɔɔ́ŋ, mè lé tueé naâ toò bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgûn, wò jègè há kéh bɔ̀ njií sâ mé bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ déì ndɔ, te bɔ́ feh ser mé bɔ̀ déì ménâ.
55002003	Ŋéné táré gèr ndɔ, dèn lòm kɔ́bè sâ faá sɔ́jì Yeésò Kristò nɔ.
55002004	Mɔ sɔ́jì yila baá taáb, à dé seèn be te dene bɔ̀ lòù bɔ̀ yí ndé cú, à gwaán seér né kwaá-taâb bɔɔ̀n yoòr yilâ.
55002005	Déì né cu nùà dùlà doò ndɔ: nuaá mé né doò dula, nde né tàm ŋgɔ̂g kwa. À kwa nde né mé doò teèn dula yiî.
55002006	Déì né cu nùà kíé boôr ndɔ. Mɔ à né boór seèn kɔ́bè sâ lege kieé nyegé, à nde né yab kɔɔ́ yieé lɔgɔ́.
55002007	Mùnò nyégé bɔ̀ ŋgòr mò hên bagasé. Fehtoò beèh nde né wò terreb haá, te wò ŋgweé komo njèh dɔɔ́ŋ.
55002008	Mùnò njí cú dé Yeésò Kristò, ndùté ndùtù Davîd. Ŋgweéh à lé naâ te cio komo yuo mà. Njàgà Bagaà mé mè né yeé tueé dɔɔ́ŋ né gi ménâ tueé ndɔ.
55002009	Mè gèr hên ŋene gi né mé Njàgà Bagaà sâ; bɔ́ mè ká gwà cibì faá nùà veên nɔ yií kwaá né dé cî ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, né baga, bɔ́ te yuiî sie colo kwaá lom né mè, bɔ́ ŋgòr Càŋ sìè kwá ŋgwéh.
55002010	Mè gèr hên yolo den né dé cî, te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ né balé sɔm dɔɔ́ŋ yili yuo gi, bɔ́ yili yuo nde né mé Yeésò Kristò, te bɔ́ den ké bèh sùsùm dé nyèmà mé nyèmà.
55002011	Kwá mè tueé wò jéjég ŋgòr déì; jéjég ŋgòr sâ ye: Mɔ béh bɔ̀ Yeésò kuú né kɔɔ́, béh bɔ́ làŋ den gi nde né kɔɔ́.
55002012	Mɔ béh né nɔɔ́ŋ den, béh né gèr yoló, sâ béh bɔ́ nde né mgbè dɔɔ́ŋ cer gií. Mɔ béh ye béh bú kɔ́ ŋgwéh, sâ à nde né ménâ tueé taré, ye nyí béh kɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ.
55002013	Mɔ béh kɔ́bè sâ sam, béh kɔ́ɔ ye, à né dé seèn cu dɔɔ́ŋ kɔ́bè sâ ma; wanɔɔ́ŋ à seèn hihiné kerré den nde né naàn wa?»
55002014	Wò kèmà jìlì cú bɔ̀ nùàr kemà, te bɔ́ munó ko cu ŋgòr hên, lùɔ̀m ŋágá lòm bɔ́ mé yilí Càŋ, júée bɔ́ a: té mé tɔgɔ felè bɔ̀ wɔb ŋgòr ndè lè ma; njèh gàm déì sam. Mɔ sam, bɔ̀ déì nde né ŋgweé, bɔ́ sibí le keéh teèn.
55002015	Fágá lòm dé yeè feh, dèn lòm nùà seê mé né seé seèn teèn bɔɔ́ yií, te wò huɔm Càŋ yoòr, fegùlì wò mé seé yeè sìè cú, wò né ŋgòr gècên te ceér-e te ceér-e tueé yií.
55002016	Gè dé yeè mé bɔ̀ ceér wɔb ŋgòr faá bèh sâ nɔ; bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n te ceér Càŋe sam. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né teèn yilá dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né ndèm bɔɔ̀n teèn cuaré lɔɔ́, te bɔ́ veé ŋaá seér dé ŋaâ.
55002017	Bɔ̀ ŋgòr bɔɔ̀n hèllè ŋɔ sie lom né bɔ̀ nùàr beè faá nyer nɔ. Hemenê bɔ̂ Filétè né lètenè bɔɔ̀n ndɔ.
55002018	Bɔ́ geé lom aá dé bɔɔ̀n mé ceér gècên gùm dɔɔ́ŋ, seé bɔɔ̀n baá seér bɔ̀ nùàr bɔɔ́ siì. Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr tueé ye bɔ́ a: Càŋ lɔ nùàr te cio komo sɔm giì baá kèn sé wa. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ̀ nuaré déì yila temé yoòr Càŋ sɔm beleè ndɔ.
55002019	Mé njéh mene, Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam; à lɔ naá giì maàŋ nùà njèh si kwaá, né doó nɔɔ́ŋ den den. Bɔ́ felèbɔ̀ nyagá kwaá né ye: Nùà Dueè né gi bɔ̀ dé seèn kɔɔ́, wa nuaá mé gwaán aá ye nyí baá dé Nùà Dueè dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, nyénné veên nyennè ma.
55002020	Kɔ́ɔ ye, ké gwò nùà lieê bɔ̀ njèh gwà feh hihiné né gi teèn. Bɔ̀ déì, bɔ́ me né mé goó, bɔ̀ déì mé lɔ̀ŋ bèlè, bɔ̀ déì mé màr, bɔ̀ déì bɔ́ kwe né toú; dé kàn né mé bèh seê seèn teèn. Bɔ̀ déì né teèn, kɔ baá mé loù cieé koô, bɔ́ kema ye bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n. Dé bɔ̀ déì, bɔ́ seé mé njéh bɔɔ́ gi né cieé dɔɔ́ŋ.
55002021	Né yoòr beèh faá bèh ménâ ndɔ: nuaá mé sɔm aá be te veéne, baá dé seèn ŋagásé, nde né ménâ den; dé seèn kɔ né lom dé seé koô, sâ bɔ́ nde ye seé mé bú bɔɔ́. Tele nde né bú dé seèn lòù kwaá nebbé nyegé, ye lòù sam, à nyí gam nyegé né kɔɔ́. Mɔ seé bagaà déì ŋené yuo kelà mene beré déì, tele bèh seé sâ njií nyegé nde né bú ndɔ.
55002022	Mɔ né mân, sâ té ja mé veên faá bɔ̀ ndà nɔ wà; fɔ́n sér dé yeè ceér dé didilî; kwá njí temé yoòr Càŋ, gwàn lòm bɔ̀ mbeí yeè mé temé cén, dèn toò bɔɔ̀n dɔlésé. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né Fehtoò beèh mé temé cén yueé fɔɔ́n dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bɔ́ dèn gí ménâ.
55002023	Mɔ bɔ̀ nùàr baá saán ndualé gɔ, té sòn yeè teèn yí njí; wò né kɔɔ́ ye, gèh bɔ̀ saân kùlù bú sâ nde ké toò mboón yeé mé jɔ́g.
55002024	Kɔ́ɔ ye, nùà seê Nùà Dueè beéh dé seèn tɔgɔ ndè bèh; seé seèn né seér bagaà mé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ larê. Bú a, dèn lòm nùà fèh-njèh dé gècên, à yóló bɔ̀ nùàr yolò.
55002025	Bú a, fèh nébbé gí bɔ̀ tásaán njèh lòù, à feh lom bɔ́ mé temé dɔlê ndɔ. Merré déì Càŋ nde né bɔ́ ceér cieé déì feh, te bɔ́ yueé fɔɔ́n feh bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ bele ceér gècên.
55002026	Lòù sam, Sátàn lé naâ bɔ́ te yuiî curú kwaá, bɔ́ né sòn seèn ŋgweé. Mɔ nùà seê Càŋ né bɔ́ lòù feh nebbé seér, merré déì loù sâ bɔ́ nde né te yuiî huaré yuo, bɔ́ cu cuù ká beè Càŋ.
55003001	Kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ wɔ́ŋ nde aá gií wa, bɔ̀ cieé dé cèrè jomò ndeè den gi nde né tetaré tetaré ma.
55003002	Bɔ̀ nùàr nde gi né bɔ̀ nyaá bɔ̀ ŋaá, bɔ́ nde gi né mé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ gwaán le, bɔ́ nde né mé púnò kuú, bɔ́ nde né feh ham, bɔ́ nde né Càŋ seb, bɔ́ nde né sòn bɔ̀ tele mé bɔ̀ meí bɔɔ̀n ŋgeén; nùàr né mene bɔ́ bagaà bɔɔ́, bɔ́ vrà ndé ŋgwéh; bɔ̀ njií mé né gi beè Càŋ jolo dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ vèh ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
55003003	Bɔ́ nde né temé jeré, bɔ́ jere mé bɔ̀ mbeí kwá ndé ŋgwéh, bɔ́ nde né nùàr sar gɔ, bɔ́ yo sìè ndé ŋgwéh, bɔ́ nde né léláŋ taâb jélákág. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ njií mé né teèn yilá nyuùn kwàrè ndé ŋgwéh.
55003004	Bɔ́ nde né léláŋ súî, bɔ́ nde né fií, bɔ́ nde né mé ŋgàŋ fu sela, bɔ́ gwaán kela nde né wɔ́ŋ mé Càŋ.
55003005	Dé ŋgòr Càŋ bɔ́ né gi yoòr dág wagá kwaá; njèh cén, bɔ́ né terreb Càŋ kèb cén ŋgoró njií, ye né njèh mbaâ ma. Mè tueé wò, gè lòm mé ceér gèh bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ nɔɔ́ŋ.
55003006	Bɔ̀ déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n né gùgwò ŋgou yilá ndeé, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ véh yuyuaâ teèn tɔgɔ́ weh bele. Bɔ̀ véh hèllè né-re te veên mé ceér hihiné teré seér faá bɔ́ gwaán nê nɔ.
55003007	Bɔ́ né gi njèh maân gwaán dág; mé njéh mene, bɔ́ ceér gècên kɔ́ kòmò bèh.
55003008	Nde cu mé bɔ̀ siíb hèllè, bɔ́ né lom ŋgòr gècên saán beéh sɔm, bɔ́ saán né faá bɔ̀ Jánè bɔ̂ Jambèrè lé saán taré naâ mé Músì ndɔ nɔ. Lòù sam, lè bɔɔ̀n né seér cúcuí veên, bɔ́ né mé njéh lòù cur gɔ, ye bɔ́ né temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií sé wa?
55003009	Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam, bɔ́ mé njéh dàb ndé ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ. Lòù sam, bɔ̀ nùàr nde né ŋené kɔɔ́ gií, ye bɔ́ bɔɔ́ ndugó gɔ né lòù, bɔ́ né faá bɔ̀ Jánè bɔ̂ Jambèrè nɔ.
55003010	Dé yeè, wò kɔ gi aá bɔ̀ njií mé mè né yeé feh kèn, wò né gi gule gò mò kɔɔ́, wò né kwɔ̀m seé mò kɔɔ́ gií, wò kɔ gi aá temé mé mè né mé Càŋ kwaá njií kèn ndɔ; wò né gi sìè-temé mò kɔɔ́, wò né gwaân mò kɔɔ́; mè né yoló, wò né gi kɔɔ́;
55003011	bùnò mé bɔ̀ nùàr né mè bunó, wò né gi ŋené, bɔ̀ dàm gèr mé mè lé ŋenè naâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi lè yeè; bɔ̀ njií mé lé kwa giì naâ mè ké Antiôs dɔɔ́ŋ né gi lè yeè ndɔ. Bɔ̀ dé ké Ikoniûm o, bɔ̀ dé ké Lîstrè o, dɔɔ́ŋ njèh faá bùnò nɔ, mè lé naâ mé njéh kwaré, wò né gi kɔɔ́. Mé njéh mene, Nùà Dueè lé naá giì mè teèn mvelé sɔm.
55003012	Kɔ́ɔ ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gwaán né beè Yeésò Kristò mé temé cén deèn dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né mé bùnò ménâ kwaré ma.
55003013	Dé bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ bèlè nùàr bɔ̀, bɔ́ nde né mé seé ŋgeêr bɔɔ̀n tetoò bɔɔ́ ndeé den, bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ nùàr bele, te bɔ́ bele keéh mé gùm bɔɔ̀n mene.
55003014	Dèn lòm dé yeè nɔɔ́ŋ; bɔ̀ njií mé wò lé naá giì maán, mé wò lé naá giì mé temé yeè mene gwaán doô, dèn lòm teèn tég. Gèh bɔ̀ nùà fèh-njèh mé lé feéh naâ wò bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, wò né gi bɔ́ kɔɔ́.
55003015	Bɔ̀ njií mé né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, wò né gi bɔ́ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Wò lé bɔ́ kɔ duɔɔ́m naâ, sâ wò née huaán maàn ye. Ŋgòr Càŋ sâ nde né wò ceér feh, né ceér dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií, te Càŋ yili sɔm bɔ́.
55003016	Bɔ̀ njií mé né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den hên dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé Cúcuí Càŋ teèn, te feh dilí béh ceér gècên; à nde né béh bèh sesabê beèh njolò feh kwaá, te béh soró nyegé gi, béh bɔɔ́ seér bɔ̀ njèh dé didilî njolò Càŋ.
55003017	Sâ te nùà Càŋ den ye nùà Càŋ jéjég sâ, à bɔɔ́ komo ye seé bebagaà ndɔ.
55004001	Mè né wò tueé, mè tueé né wò toò Càŋ, mé toò Yeésò Kristò ndɔ. Kɔ́ɔ ye, à ndeè né cuû, à sɔm be terrèb seèn ter, à tena ju bɔ̀ komô mé bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀. Mè tueé né wò toò bɔɔ̀n:
55004002	túé lòm ŋgòr Càŋ teèn faá wò né tueé nɔ, sɔ́gɔ́ njébá lòm teèn tég. Bɔ́ gwaán mene, bɔ́ berɔ́ŋ mene, kɔ́ lòm tueê, wò né bɔ́ lòù bɔŋ. Ndè bɔ̀ déì lòù, wò né bɔ̀ déì lòù seén, wò né sèŋ kwaá, wò né bɔ́ feh,
55004003	wanɔɔ́ŋ cu baá ndeê, bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr gècên gwàn ndé cú, bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ nùà fèh-njèh dé nyenyenê ŋgún yilá weh seér. Lòù sam, bɔ́ gwaán né cí, né tieè bɔɔ̀n ŋgulí huɔɔ́m.
55004004	Bɔ́ tie te gècên félá njí ndé ŋgwéh dé ndɔ̂g, bɔ́ nde né lòù faár seér, bɔ́ gwaán kela bɔ̀ dèbbè nyenyenê hèllè.
55004005	Dé yeè, sìè lòm yo mé be yeè, sìè yo felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ, yóló sér gèr lòù, wò né bɔ̀ nùàr Njàgà Bagaà se. Né seé yeè. Seé mé Càŋ lé haá kwaá naâ beè yeè dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ jégé lòm bú mé gùm mene.
55004006	Dé mò, cu waà baá kèn, kènê mè nde aá feh mò semé njií; hên baá cu kuû mò waà né kɔɔ́.
55004007	Mè taáb lie huɔm gi aá kèn, mè mé doò mò ké sònòbɔ̀ dula yuo kela baá ndɔ; wa hên temé mò né gi kɔ́bè sâ.
55004008	Sâ kènê, sàgà mò baá gi ter: né tàm ŋgɔ̂g. Càŋ bú haá yeé nuaá mé né seé teèn bɔɔ́ dilí yií. Loù sâ Nùà Dueè mé né yeé ju tená dilí, nde né mè tàm sâ felè sulí kwaá. Mè gí cégé ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi gwaán ye bú a, cú cû dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né tàm ŋgɔ̂g sâ kwa ndɔ.
55004009	Fágá ká feh, cieé fà hên wò nde cuù ká yoòr mò.
55004010	Demâs mè dula si lɔ njií aá kèn. À kènê gwaán lom né wɔ́ŋ mé feh seèn vɔgɔ́ gɔɔ̀; à nde aá ké Tesalonîk ndɔ. Kèrésâŋ fɔɔ́n aá dé seèn gò Galatî; Tîte fɔɔ́n taré gò Damatî.
55004011	Kènê ká kwarè mò le lom né Lûk. Mɔ wò baá ndeê, wèh sìè Mârk beè; à né yeé mè seé gam.
55004012	Mè tema njií aá Tisîk dé seèn ké Efêse.
55004013	Mɔ wò baá ndeê, wèh sìè kéh mè cɔ̀gɔ̀ dùlù teèn; mè lé kwaá lɔɔ̀ naâ ké Troâs ké lɔ Kárpus. Wèh sìè kéh mè bɔ̀ mvù beè teèn ndɔ, mè tétég jue né bɔ̀ mvù dé paàr doô.
55004014	Alesándà nùà lè lé naâ mè veên bɔɔ́ maga sela. Ju sam, Càŋ gwɔm nde né bú kɔɔ́.
55004015	Dèn lòm dé yeè toò seèn mé kɔ́ŋkɔŋ mene, wanɔɔ́ŋ njií mé béh né yeé feh dɔɔ́ŋ, à né yeé berɔ́ŋ, ye te ŋellé yuo ŋellè.
55004016	Cu mé bɔ́ lé tueé lɔgɔ́ naâ ju mò teèn, mè né mene sòn mò se, nuaré déì lé mè gàm kélá ná ŋgwêh, bɔ́ lé si lɔ seér naâ mè lòù. Mé njéh mene Càŋ a, té bɔ́ mé njéh táŋ.
55004017	Fehtoò beèh nùà njèh lé mè mé huún kwá lɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, à haá cu ye baá-re mè terreb, mè né ŋgòr seèn mé njéh tueé jege seér. Loù sâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Jûf sam dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgweé gi ŋgòr seèn. À luaga sɔm keéh baá-re mè sònò gélɔ̂g teèn ndɔ.
55004018	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, Nùà Dueè nde né mè te veên dé kàn ménâ luaga sɔm ndɔ; à nde né mè cií nyegé, te mè ndeè ŋaá ké te vulúu, mè den ké Mbàm kwarè seèn. Kùsèm terrèb Càŋ a, sùmù yùò kélà cie dé kèì cên. È môn.
55004019	Bíé kéh mè Prisîl bɔ̂ Akilâ baga, wò bie keéh mbàgà Onesifôr ndɔ.
55004020	Herástà den le aá dé seèn ké Kɔrênt. Trofîm lé naâ dé seèn baán; mè lé kwaá lɔɔ̀ naâ bú ké Milê.
55004021	Lègè ndé kâ jɔ̀gɔ̀ te cu dùlù ndeè ye waâ. Bɔ̀ Ebúlù mé Púdèn bɔ̂ Línù mé Kelódìà bɔ́ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì dɔɔ́ŋ ye bíé kéh wò baga ma.
55004022	Fehtoò beèh a, kúrú nyégé wò. Húɔ́m-temé seèn a, ká sìè gí bí dɔɔ́ŋ beè ndɔ.
56001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, nùà seê Càŋ; mè né cu mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò ndɔ. Càŋ né mè temá, ye mè a: bɔ̀ nuaá mé nyí né yilá, ndé bɔ́ ŋgòr nyî tueé nyegé, te bɔ́ kwaá njií temé yoòr nyî, bɔ́ ŋene kɔ ŋgòr gècên, bɔ́ bele tòù nyî ma;
56001002	te bɔ́ den mé ndèm, ye bɔ́ nde né yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà faá nyí lɔ tueé naâ nɔ kwa. À nyeén túé bèh lág; à lɔ tueé naâ sâ wɔ́ŋ née ké jomo lè ndègè ye;
56001003	te cu yeé wulu baá, à nde ye yɔ̀ŋ sâ lè ŋgòr seène feh ŋagá. Jomo sâ à kwaá lɔ beè mò, ye mè a, ndé bɔ̀ nùàr ménâ se nyegé ndɔ. Nyí Càŋ Yìlì nùàr tueé naâ ménâ kɔɔ́ ma.
56001004	Mvù hên mè nyagá njií né mé wò Tîte. Wò né faá huaán mò ŋàr lè nɔ. Bélɔ̀ fà dɔɔ́ŋ kwaá njií gi né temé te ŋgòr cén-e. Huaán mò, Tele beèh Càŋ bɔ̂ Yeésò Kristò Yìlì nùàr a, kúlú wò, bɔ́ haá wò dɔlê.
56001005	Huaán mò, mè lé kwaá lɔɔ̀ naâ wò lè tàbè Kreétà, te wò bɔɔ́ cor nyegé bɔ̀ njií mé lé leé naâ toò dɔɔ́ŋ, wò sie kwaá bele bɔ̀ nùàr, bɔ́ den bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lè lɔɔ́ dé kàn mé dé kân. Mùnò dèn ká bɔ̀ ndéb mò munò; mè lé ye wò a:
56001006	nùà koô gwà Càŋ né lom nùà gècên mé bɔ̀ nùàr yilí seèn túé vé ŋgwéh ma; kɔ à né lom mé véh cén; kɔ bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn né temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií, bɔ́ né veên nyenné, bɔ́ né tie ŋgweé, bɔ̀ nùàr né ménâ ŋené kɔɔ́ ndɔ; sâ ye.
56001007	Nùà seê gwà Càŋ a, kɔ́ɔ ye nyí beè né mé seé Càŋ Dueè ma. Yilí seèn a dèn lòm ŋgulísé. À té ŋgúgó, à té nùà ŋá-temê dèn, à té mbè sèlà, à té sà fɔ́n, à té kàgàlɔ̀ŋ mé kòb mene fɔ́n.
56001008	À dèn sér cu dɔɔ́ŋ nùà wèh kìn, nùà húɔ́m-temê, nùà kɔ́gɔ̀n, nùà dilî, nùà ŋagâ, mé nùà sìè yoò ndɔ.
56001009	Bú a, njébá táré lòm te ŋgòr Càŋe tég, te den faá tueé nê nɔ; ye né ŋgòr gècên. Mɔ né mân, sâ à nde né bɔ̀ nùàr feh nyegé, à toó nyegé bɔ́ mé njéh; te sie bɔ̀ sàn-sòn bɔ̀ be.
56001010	Tétán né bɔ̀ nuaré déì lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf; bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ Càŋ dùlà bèh; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr bele gɔ, bɔ́ né bɔ́ ŋgòr kùkùlù tueé ndualé gɔ ndɔ.
56001011	Mɔ bɔ́ baá ménâ tueé, yín bɔ́ yiìn; wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ né mbàgà bɔ̀ nùàr bɔɔ́ ŋellé. Njií mé bɔ́ sé la fèh ná ŋgwêh, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr cí feh seér, bɔ́ né-re kàgàlɔ̀ŋ kòkòb teèn yieé keéh.
56001012	Nùà ndòn déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n mé feh seèn lɔ jueè bɔ̀n, wa: Cu dɔɔ́ŋ nyeén tueê né tabɔ́ bɔ̀ Kreétà bɔ̀, né bɔ̀ nyam veên, né bɔ̀ fùɔ̀b bɔ̀ mé gwaán lom né lòù yieé deèn.»
56001013	Nùà hèllè lɔ jueè bɔ̀n. Mè tueé wò, mɔ wò baá bɔ́ njèh tueé, ndè sér bɔ́ lòù, te bɔ́ taré seér lè ceér Càŋe dé tarê.
56001014	Yílá bɔ́ yilà, te bɔ́ mé dèbbè ndègè bɔ̀ Jûf kwé lè cú, bɔ́ mé ndéb bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀ ŋgwé lè cú ndɔ, wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀ hèllè ŋgòr gècên gwàn bèh.
56001015	Dé nùà ŋagâ, beè seèn njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi ŋagásé. Dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ŋágá ŋgwéh môn sam; njèh dɔɔ́ŋ beè bɔɔ̀n ŋágá bèh. Lòù sam, bɔ́ temé yoòr Càŋ kwá njí bèh, ndòn bɔɔ̀n né kuú, lè bɔɔ̀n né lom ndândaà veên.
56001016	Bɔ́ tueé né faá bɔ́ né Càŋ kɔɔ́ nɔ, sâ né lom nyeén, seé bɔɔ̀n nde seér né bèh hiîn, bɔ̀ dúágá-tie bɔ̀ mé seé dudulî yo dɔɔ́ŋ ceré né bɔ́. Ndɔ́g seé bagaà né lom bɔ́ yɔgɔ́ dé gècên.
56002001	Dé yeè, mɔ wò baá ŋgòr Càŋ feh, fèh lòm te ceér-e faá tueé nê nɔ.
56002002	Júée bɔ̀ kuúm a, bɔ́ té mbè sèlà, bɔ́ dèn dene bɔ̀ kàm bɔ̀, bɔ́ dèn bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀, bɔ́ kwá njí temé lè njèh gècên, bɔ́ dèn mé gwaân lè, bɔ́ yóló njèh yolò.
56002003	Túé cú mé bɔ̀ ma kukuûm ménâ ndɔ, júée bɔ́ a: bɔ́ dèn lòm te ceér-e, bɔ́ té sòn túágá sàr gɔ̀, bɔ́ té kwer mbè ŋá, bɔ́ fèh nyégé bɔ̀ véh dé tetɔɔ̂r njèh bagasé ma.
56002004	Sâ bɔ̀ véh dé tetɔɔ̂r nde né bɔ̀ si bɔɔ̀n mé bɔ̀ ŋuna bɔɔ̀n bagasé gwaán nyegé,
56002005	bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ kɔ́gɔ̀n bɔ̀ den, bɔ́ den ŋagásé, bɔ́ nde né njèh ké gwò bɔɔ̀n mé húɔ́m-temé mene bɔɔ́ nyégé, bɔ́ nde né sòn bɔ̀ si bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr Càŋ túé béh cú.
56002006	Túé bɔ̀ ndà ménâ ndɔ, júée bɔ́ a: bɔ́ sìè yo sieè.
56002007	Wò mé feh yeè, dèn fèh bɔ̀ nùàr dene gècên, te bɔ́ ke weh teèn. Fèh ŋgúlí nyégé njèh bagasé, né njèh kàm; fèh lòm bú faá nùà kàm nɔ.
56002008	Túé lòm bɔ̀ ŋgòr dé didilî. Mɔ wò né bɔ̀ ŋgòr ménâ tueé, bɔ̀ nùàr sàn ndé ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ nde né lòù gulí seér, te sòn nyeên duú bɔ́ ndɔ.
56002009	Júée bɔ̀ kwer a, bɔ́ ŋgwé tie ŋgweè, bɔ́ bɔ́ làrè njií mé bɔ̀ tele seê bɔɔ̀n gwaán nê dɔɔ́ŋ, te bɔ́ den beè bɔ̀ tele bɔɔ̀n huɔɔ́msé. Bɔ́ té sòn bɔɔ̀n ŋgén,
56002010	bɔ́ té bɔ́ njèh ŋúɔ́b, bɔ́ dèn lòm bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀ jéjêg sâ. Mɔ bɔ́ bɔɔ́ né ménâ, sâ bɔ̀ nùàr nde né ŋgòr Càŋ teèn seén keéh. Càŋ Yìlì nùàr né bú.
56002011	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, húɔ́m-temé Càŋ né njolò bɔ̀ nùàr ŋené laré, ye nyí gwaán né bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ yili sɔɔ̀m.
56002012	Gèh húɔ́m-temé bú hên né béh lòù tueé kwaá, te béh nyenné veên, béh sɔm temé beèh te wɔ́ŋe, te béh ŋa seér bɔ̀ lo bɔ̀, béh ká te wɔ́ŋe den dilí nyegé lòù. Béh gɔ lom gò bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀,
56002013	béh gaán cieé sèsàm mé ndèm beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi teèn doô. Loù sâ sùsùm Yeésò Kristò Yìlì nùàr ndeè né bèsɔ́nè ŋené yuo kelâ. Càŋ Dueè né bú.
56002014	À lé béh lè veên ŋa weéh naâ mé feh seèn, ye te béh den lom ŋagásé, béh ŋa bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ nùàr nyî, te béh bɔɔ́ komo bagaà, béh bɔgɔ́ lom teèn dé bɔgɔ̂.
56002015	Sâ kènê fèh lòm bɔ̀ nùàr ménâ, fèh sɔ̀m kêh be seê yeè toò bɔɔ̀n, te bɔ́ kwa ye terreb te ceér Càŋe. Ndè bílí bɔ́ teèn mé dé ndeè mene. Mè tueé wò, té gwàn mé nuaré déì seb wò ndɔ.
56003001	Túé cú ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: bɔ́ ŋgwé sòn bɔ̀ ŋgɔ́mnà ŋgweè, bɔ́ ŋgweé sòn bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ndɔ; bɔ́ léb toò bɔɔ̀n leèb, bɔ́ kɔ gi ye, seé bagaà bɔɔ́ larê né seé bɔɔ̀n ma.
56003002	Júée bɔ̀ nùàr a, bɔ́ té nùàr júé, bɔ́ té tɔgɔ ndè, bɔ́ húɔ́m temé, bɔ́ dɔ́lé sér toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ lòù ma.
56003003	Kɔ́ɔ ye béh dɔɔ́ŋ, béh lé naá giì ndugó gɔ; béh lé naâ bɔ̀ tàŋ-tie bɔ̀, béh né mbembaá bɔɔ́ sabé njií; tuaá né lom béh yoòr faá cí nɔ yilá huɔɔ́m, béh né temé jeré sɔɔ́, béh né huer kuú, béh bɔ̀ nùàr né bunó kuú ndɔ.
56003004	Mé njéh mene, Càŋ Yìlì nùàr lé naá seêr béh húɔ́m-temé seèn feh keéh, à temé yoòr beèh sɔ̀m ŋgwéh,
56003005	à lé naâ béh yili sɔm; lé naâ dé lòù ndɔ, dèn ŋgwéh mé seé bagaà bɔɔ́ komoò. À lé kɔ seér naâ béh jere lòù, à yaga sɔm béh veên yoòr, te bɔ́ ŋar seér béh dé feê; terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ kweéh seér béh ndɔ.
56003006	Kènê Càŋ fam njií aá béh Cúcuí sâ yoòr, béh baá mé njéh lè lè. À béh ménâ bɔɔ́ kuú né felè Yeésò Kristò, nuaá mé lé naâ béh yili sɔm.
56003007	À lé béh ménâ bɔɔ́ naâ mé húɔ́m-temé seèn, ye te béh ŋa bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ beè nyî, béh kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà mé béh né gi ndèm teèn kwaá njií doô.
56003008	Bɔ̀ jéjég ŋgòr né cí. Mè gwaán né ye wò tueé ŋeí den teèn lòù, te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ faga feh, bɔ́ yila lom seé gècên bɔɔ̂. Huɔm kela né cí, te gam nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ.
56003009	Njèh cén, té sòn te ŋgòr kùlù yí, gè mé ceér dèbbè ndègè bɔ̀ nùàr, té tɔgɔ ndè, té mé sóú sàn lè, gàm ŋgwéh lág, né lom wɔb ŋgòr mbaá.
56003010	Mɔ nuaré déì baá kèrrè si, túé kwá bú tueè; túé bú mbei fà, jomo sâ yùò kwarè seèn yuoò.
56003011	Kɔ́ɔ ye, kèkènè bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ jomo saàb naâ ceér gècên, bɔ́ ju die nde né mé be bɔɔ̀n ma.
56003012	Mɔ mè tema njií aá wò Artemâs, wa né Tisîk wa, lègè ndé kâ ndeè, wò ndé kwà mè ké Nìkòpòlîs; mè taáŋ gi aá, ye cu dùlù kwa nde né mè ké sâ ma.
56003013	Bɔ́ nyégé ká bagasé, te wò gam Jènâs bɔ̂ Apɔlɔ̂s mé gò bɔɔ̀n teèn ndɔ. Jènâs né dé seèn nuaá mé né gi sóú kɔɔ́. Té gwàn mé bɔ́ gɔ be be.
56003014	Bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ a, yí gí be te seê, bɔ́ mèh mé seé bagaà bɔɔ̂, te bɔ́ koó bɔ̀ɔ́ mé njèh né bɔ́ saám ndɔ, bɔ́ té mbaá dèn vù dèn.
56003015	Bɔ̀ nùàr ká kwarè mò dɔɔ́ŋ ye, bíé kéh wò baga. Bíé kéh bɔ̀ mbeí beèh mé né gi te ceér Yeésò ndɔ. Húɔ́m-temé Càŋ a, ká sìè gí bí beè dɔɔ́ŋ.
57001001	Né mè Pɔ̂l, mè né ká gwà cibì felè Yeésò Kristò; bêh dìm beèh Timotê nyagá né kɔɔ́, béh tema njií né mé wò mbeí seé beèh Filemɔ̂ŋ. Temé beèh né yoòr yeè.
57001002	Béh né bí bɔ̀ tie beèh Apiâ bieé. Arsîp mé né sɔ́jì Yeésò Kristò faá béh nɔ, béh né bú bieé ndɔ. Bíé kéh bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ mé bilí dua yeé Càŋ ké gwò yeè dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
57001003	Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
57001004	Cu dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ mè baá Càŋ dua, mè né yeé bú felè yeè dua, mè né lom bú felè yeè vra dé gècên.
57001005	Lòù sam, bɔ́ ye mè a, wò né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé temé cén gwaán, wa wò né temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò kwaá njií ndɔ ma, mè né bú vra.
57001006	Mè né Càŋ dua, te bilí mé béh bí né ka Yeésò Kristò den bilí hên, yam sɔm keéh giì húɔ́m-temé Càŋ mé né yoòr beèh dɔɔ́ŋ bèsɔ́nè.
57001007	Dìm mò, gèh dé mé wò né bɔ̀ mbaábi gwaán sâ né lom mè yoòr sagár dé gècên, né lom mè yoòr taré huɔɔ́m dé gècên ndɔ. Lòù sam, wò sâ bɔɔ́ nɔré né temé bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀.
57001008	Mè né wò bɔŋ ndɔ. Mè né mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Kristò, à mè terreb jege haá né kɔɔ́. Mè sé la ye wò a: bɔ́ lòm mân bɔɔ̀.
57001009	Mé njéh mene, dé bɔ̀ mbaábi gwaân, kɔ mè bɔŋ wò lòù. Kɔ́ɔ ye né mè Pɔ̂l, gùm tela kàm dɔɔ́ŋ. Mè né cu ká gwà cibì felè Yeésò Kristò ndɔ.
57001010	Mè wò bɔŋ né kɔɔ́. Né felè Onesîm. Onesîm né huaán mò te ceér Yeésò Kristò; mè ká gwà cibì ŋa baá tele seèn.
57001011	Léí toò, à lé njèh gàm beè yeè ná ŋgwêh, kènê njèh gàm beè beèh fà dɔɔ́ŋ faá bú nɔ sam cuú.
57001012	Mè nde né bú ké yoòr yeè temá njiî, mè bú tema njií né faá mè cua tema njií né wò temé mò ká lè nɔ.
57001013	Mè sé la ye bú a: Cu mé mè né ká gwà cibì felè Njàgà Bagaà hên, à dèn bèh kwarè mò, te à gam beh mè faá sòn yeè nɔ.
57001014	Mé njéh mene, mè ménâ bɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ mè gwàn ŋgwéh dé mé ba wò lòù, te wò bɔɔ́ ye mè bagaà; huɔm kela né mé wò gwaán seér mé be yeè.
57001015	Merré déì lé ye bú a: dùlà kwá lɔ́ wò ménâ, te à ndeè cu cuù, wò kwa ye bú dé kèì cên.
57001016	Mɔ né mân, sâ kènê à faá kwer nɔ sam cuú, à huɔm kela seér cu aá kɔɔ́ mé kwer. Né nùà yíé-temê beèh beè Yeésò Kristò. Tétég né ká beè mò, à né lom nùà yíé-temê mò dé tueê sam. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye à nde né ké beè yeè ménâ huɔɔ́m yɔgɔ́ keéh. Lòù sam, kèb déì à né kwer yeè, à baá dìm yeè te ceér Nùà Dueè ndɔ.
57001017	Sâ mɔ wò né mè faá mbeí seê yeè weh, sìè nyégé bú faá wò sé la sie nyegé naâ mè nɔ.
57001018	Mɔ à lé naâ wò njeré déì bɔɔ́ sabé, wò né bú hùà bele, túé njî kán, mè gwɔm wò.
57001019	Mè wò bèh hên nyagá lom né mé be mò Pɔ̂l, ye mè nde gi né wò bɔ̀ njií sâ gwɔm ma. Kékɔɔ̀ ye, nyí né mé hùà mò yoòr ndɔ; mè lé wò ŋgòr Càŋ feéh naâ kɔɔ́, te wò nde ye yɔ̀ŋ dé feê kwa.
57001020	Mɔ né mân, sâ kúkùr yeè dìm mò, bɔ́ sɔ̀m yeè mè seé hên mé temé Nùà Dueè lè teèn; bɔ́ nɔ́ré yeè mè temé lè faá nùà Yeésò Kristò nɔ teèn ndɔ.
57001021	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye mè baá nyagá hên, wò nde lom né mân bɔɔ́; wò nde né ménâ bɔɔ́ yɔgɔ́ keéh, mè né gi kwàgà yeè yieé.
57001022	Nyégé kwá mè bèh cèrrè déì teèn ndɔ. Mè né ndèm kwaá ye Càŋ nde né faá bí né bú dua nɔ gwaán, bí nde cu né mè ŋené.
57001023	Epaferâs mé né ká gwà cibì felè Yeésò Kristò faá mè nɔ, ye bíé kéh wò baga.
57001024	Bɔ̀ mbeí seé mò Mârk bɔ̂ Aristârk mé Demâs bɔ̂ Lûk ye bíé kéh wò baga ndɔ.
57001025	Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò a, ká sìè gí bí beè.
58001001	Lɔ jɔ̀gɔ̀ Càŋ lɔ bɔ̀ tele beèh njèh tueé keéh beéh sònò bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀; à lɔ naâ bɔ́ mé ceér hihiné mbei ŋgún tueé.
58001002	Nde nde ká jomo te nàm cèrè jomò hên, à bɔ̀ nùàr njèh tueé seér aá mé Ŋuna seèn. À lɔ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ si giì naâ mé bú, à bɔ̀ dàm njèh seèn dɔɔ́ŋ jege kwaá gi né beè seèn.
58001003	Terreb Càŋ nùà njèh ŋené né yoòr seèn; kèkènè Càŋ mé gùm mene né bú. À wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ta né kɔɔ́, à ta kwaá né mé ŋgòr terrèb seèn. À lé ndeè naâ bɔ̀ nùàr mé húɔ́m seèn sené, te veên bɔɔ̀n gi. Seé seèn yeé mboón aá, à ŋaá nde cu ké te vulúu, à né te be gaâ Càŋ terrèb den den.
58001004	Huaán né seér Nùà Dueè kɔɔ́ mé bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ. Yilí mé Càŋ yilá kwaá né bú yoòr né cu yilí dé bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ ham yɔgɔ́ ndɔ.
58001005	Bèh lɔ mé naâ-naà, lètenè bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ mé cén déì teèn túé njí ŋgwéh, ye bú a: Wò né Huaán nyî, Lan nyí ŋa baá Tele yeè.» À cu mé cìlì Càŋ déì túé njí ŋgwéh ye nyí nde né Tele seèn ŋaá, à ŋa ŋuna nyî ndɔ.
58001006	À lé ménâ jue seér naâ mé ndoón seèn. Cu mé à lé ndeè naâ bú ká te wɔ́ŋe temá njiî, à lé naâ tueé ye: Dàm bɔ̀ cìlì nyî dɔɔ́ŋ a, cémmé gí toò Huaán nyî, bɔ́ die bú.»
58001007	Dé bɔ̀ cìlì seèn, à lé felè bɔɔ̀n tueé seér naâ ye: Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ cìlì nyî; bɔ́ né faá fu nɔ; ye bɔ́ né cu bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ nyî; bɔ́ né faá leba weè ndɔ.»
58001008	Dé Ŋuna seèn, à ye: Kùsèm Càŋ, kɔgɔ dé yeè né dé ndeèr. Wò né Mgbè te Lò yeè cer dilí,
58001009	wò gwaán lom né njií mé né teèn dilí yilá, wò veên gwàn nyì bèh. Càŋ mé né Càŋ yeè lé wò hên balé weh kuú naâ dé cî. À wò dàm bɔ̀ vɔ́gɔ́-temé seèn yoòr hên kulu su gi né mé njéh ndɔ; À ye te kɔgɔ dé yeè lie kela kɔɔ́ mé kɔgɔ dé bɔ̀ mbaábiì.»
58001010	Càŋ lɔ naá cuù déì felè Ŋuna seèn tueé ye: Né wò Nùà Dueè, tàbè ké bèh duɔɔ̂m lé dieé naâ mé wò. Wò lé vulú bɔɔ́ naâ mé ba beè yeè ndɔ.
58001011	Dé bɔ̀ njií sâ, bɔ́ nde gi né nyueé leér yuo, wò cie le lom kɔɔ́. Bɔ́ nde gi né faá cɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ kulí yuo;
58001012	wò nde né bɔ́ bècénè faá cɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ gurú bilí ndɔ. Bɔ́ nde gi né kweéh seér; ndɔ́g wò dé yeè kwéh sér ndé ŋgwéh, wò kúlé nyì ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.»
58001013	Bèh lɔ mé naá kaà sâ Càŋ mé cìlì Càŋ déì túé njí ŋgúŋgwéh ye bú a: Dèn ndê ká te be gaâ nyî, kɔ nyí ba yií gi aá bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ yeè ka ba gulè yeè.» À lé ménâ jue seér naâ mé Ŋuna.
58001014	Á sâ, dé bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ nɔ, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ neì wa? Ŋgweéh bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi bɔ̀ càŋ mé bɔɔ́ yeé seé Càŋ Dueè wa? Càŋ tema yeé bɔ́, te bɔ́ nde gam bɔ̀ɔ́ mé à nde né bɔ́ yili sɔm.
58002001	Mɔ né ménâ, sâ béh mègè ŋéí cú te ŋgòr gècên mé béh lé ŋgweé naâ doô tég. Mɔ sam, béh nde né ceér leér lɔɔ́.
58002002	Béh kɔ́ɔ ye, ŋgòr Càŋ mé bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ lé tueé waà naâ mé njéh doô né gi cie mé feh seèn ŋené ŋagá, ye né lom ŋgòr gècên ma. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ ŋgòr sâ ŋgeén, mé lé naâ bú lòù seb seér dɔɔ́ŋ, lɔ naá giì gèr beè Càŋ teèn ŋené yií.
58002003	Sé tagá béh wa? Mɔ ceér koô mé nde né béh yili sɔm hên, béh né bú lòù seb seér, naàn naàn mé béh nde né ju beè Càŋ mvelé wa? Mè tueé bí, Nùà Dueè mé feh seèn lé naâ mé ŋgòr sâ tueé waâ, toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ lé naâ bú. Jomo sâ jege bele bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá giì ŋgòr hên sònò seèn ŋgweé ndɔ, bɔ́ ye béh a, né lom ŋgòr gècên ma.
58002004	Càŋ nùà njèh lé naâ be teèn mé terreb mene kwaá; à né bɔ̀ cìè mé bɔ̀ fém hihiné teèn bɔɔ́ bomó yií, à né nùà kàn seé Cúcuí Ŋagâ yoòr kwaá, à né nùà kân faá à gwaán nê nɔ kwaá ndɔ.
58002005	Né mene wɔ́ŋ dé jomò mé béh né sònò tueé hên, Càŋ túé ŋgwéh ye bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ a, né beè bɔɔ̀n.
58002006	Beré déì tueé seér né te mvù Càŋe ye: Hè, sâ nùàr né-re hàm keì mé wò nde né bú munó nyi ná Càŋ? Sâ wò te ndândaà nùàr mbaá ke nyegé kuú né kei wa?
58002007	Cu déì wò lé naâ bú ka bɔ̀ cìlì yeè maànjé sie kwaá weh. Yeé gi aá, wò bɔ bú ŋgɔg, wò sumú seér bú lòù,
58002008	wò terreb felè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ haá gi beè seèn ndɔ.» Mɔ né gi tueé ye: Càŋ terreb felè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ haá gi né beè nùàr, sâ tueé né ye, né lom ménâ, sàŋ lè ŋgwéh, njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè nùàr sâ. Mé njéh mene, wa mene hên, béh ŋéné sɔ̀m ŋgwéh bèh mé njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè nùàr sâ ndɔ.
58002009	Béh ŋene kɔ cegé né mé Yeésò. Dé seèn, cu déì Càŋ lé naâ bú ka bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ maànjé sie kwaá weh. Njua mé Càŋ lé naâ bú ménâ sie kwaá weh sâ, ye te à cio kuú seér felè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ. Yeé gi aá, Càŋ bɔ bú ŋgɔg ndɔ, à bú sumú seér cu lòù. Lé naâ mé núr cioò bú sâ.
58002010	Càŋ nùà njèh mé lɔ sií naâ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́, ye kɔ nyí Yeésò sieé seér né mé gèr bú sâ, te nùàr ŋgún ŋa keéh gi bɔ̀ huaán nyî teèn, nyí weh njií bɔ́ ká mbàm yoòr nyî ma. Lòù sam, bɔ́ né mé Yeésò yili yuo.
58002011	À bɔ̀ nùàr veên yoòr yaga sɔm gi né kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé baá gi jolosé dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ bɔ́ baá gi kènê mé Tele cên. Né dé cî mé Yeésò bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ yilá né bɔ̀ lɔb seèn, à fegùlì kwá sɔ́ cú.
58002012	À tueé seér né ye: È Càŋ, mè nde né yilí yeè lètenè bɔ̀ lɔb mɔ̀ saán, mè nde né wò mé bené seén, mè wò seén nde né toò cìlì nùàr.»
58002013	À den cuù ye: Dé mò, mè temé kwaá lɔ nde né mé Càŋ.» À den cuù ndɔ, ye: Mè hên nɔ, béh bɔ̀ huaán mé Càŋ lé naâ mè beè haá kwaá.»
58002014	Yeésò lé nùàr ŋaà naâ, ye lòù sam, bɔ̀ huaán mé nyí né bɔ́ huaán yilá sâ né gi bɔ̀ nùàr, wa kɔ nyí ŋa nùàr ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te nyí kuú cio, nyí mé njéh nyoló sɔm Sátàn mé terreb cioò né beè seèn.
58002015	Ye te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá beéh cio veéh dɔɔ́ŋ, cio vèh cú, te bɔ́ huaré den gi mé feh bɔɔ̀n. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé ka cioò naá giì bɔ̀ kwer.
58002016	Mè tueé bí, à lé ndé ná ŋgwêh ye te nyí gam bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ; à lé tétég nde kuú naâ ye te nyí gam bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm.
58002017	À lé nùàr tétég hên ŋa kuú naâ mé njéh. Kɔ à sé lé naá kaà nùàr ménâ ŋaá seér ndɔ, te à we ye bɔ̀ lɔb seèn, à den ŋgàŋ sèmè bɔɔ̀n dé koô, mé né lom beè Càŋ kɔ́bè sâ, léláŋ húɔ́m-temê ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te nyí bɔɔ́ yií seé Càŋ teèn, nyí semé sɔm feh nyî nùà njèh, te Càŋ kulu sɔm cìlì nùàr veên yoòr.
58002018	Wa mene hên, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gèr né bɔ́ jilí, veên né bɔ́ taáb dɔɔ́ŋ, à nde né bɔ́ gam den. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé naâ bú mé veên ménâ taáb ndɔ, à lé naâ mé gèr kwaré.
58003001	Mɔ né môn bɔ̀ nùàr mò te ceér Yeésò, Càŋ lé yilá naâ bí kɔɔ́ ndɔ; bí njolo kè njí lòm mé tebé Càŋ Yeésò ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô. Béh bɔ̀ nùàr saán keéh yeé bú.
58003002	Càŋ lé naâ bú nùà seê seèn sie kwaá. À seé seèn bɔɔ́ lom mé temé cén faá Músì lɔ naâ ké gwà Càŋ bɔɔ́ nɔ.
58003003	Á, ŋgweéh yilí nùà mé-gwà ŋgulí kela yeé kɔɔ́ mé gwà nùà njèh wa? Mé Yeésò bɔ̂ Músì né ménâ ndɔ. Músì dé seèn né faá gwà nɔ. Terreb dé koô wulu né mé Yeésò nùà mé-gwà, dèn ŋgwéh Músì.
58003004	Ŋgweéh gwà dé kàn né seé nùà mé-gwà wa? Né ménâ mé Càŋ, à njèh dɔɔ́ŋ si gi né kɔɔ́.
58003005	Músì dé seèn te mbàgà Càŋe né nùà seê. Càŋ lé ye bú a, ndé bɔ̀ nùàr sòn nyî toò tueé kwaá. À lé naâ ménâ mé temé cén tueé gií ndɔ.
58003006	Dé Kristò, à né Huaán. Mbàgà Càŋ né beè seèn. À bú ke den né te be sâ. Mbàgà Càŋ sâ né béh. Njèh cén, kɔ béh né bú mé temé cén sie, béh né ndèm mé bú kwaá, béh né mé njéh sagár, sâ ye.
58003007	Mɔ né mân, béh ŋgwé sòn Cúcuí Ŋagâ; à lé ye: Lan mɔ bí baá hueh Càŋ ŋgweé,
58003008	bí té temé lòù dúágá sér, bí té faá bɔ̀ tele biì léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ dèn. Wa cieé déì ké ya dueè bɔ́ lé naâ gàgà mé Càŋ saán.
58003009	Càŋ nùà njèh ye: bɔ̀ tele biì léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ lé naâ mè sòn felá. Bɔ́ né mene gèh terrèb mò ké kunduŋ te nyèmà yulà nèà ŋené, mé njéh mene bɔ́ né lom gàgà mé mè saán.
58003010	Temé lé mè lè mé bɔ́ ŋaá njií naâ dé cî, ye: bɔ̀ nùà hên ceér mò ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh, bɔ́ cu dɔɔ́ŋ munó sabé seér né lòù.
58003011	Yeé baá mân, temé ŋaá ŋeí cuù mè mé bɔ́ lòù, mè jege ye: lòlòm bɔ̀ nùà hên bèh dù ká yoòr mò ndé ndé cû ndɔ.»
58003012	Sâ belà, bí kè nyégé keè, te nuaré déì mé temé veên lètenè biì lè dúágá dèn cú, te à ceér Càŋ làŋ kwá lɔ́ cú ndɔ.
58003013	Mɔ ye te huɔm, bí fágá sér feh, bí né lètenè biì cieé dɔɔ́ŋ lòù toó kuú. Lòù sam, cieé mé yuoô bà dɔɔ́ŋ né gi lan mé Càŋ jue né sâ. Bí té gwàn mé nuaré déì sela veên, à ŋgwan le teèn.
58003014	Béh bɔ̀ Kristò gɔ né kɔɔ́. Njèh cén, kɔ béh né bú mé temé cén sie, béh bele faá béh lé naâ ké bèh duɔɔ̂m nɔ ŋgweé, tɔ́g nde wa bèh cerê ndɔ.
58003015	Né te mvù Càŋe ménâ nyagá den ye: Lan mɔ bí baá hueh Càŋ ŋgweé, bí té temé lòù dúágá sér, bí té faá bɔ̀ tele biì léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ dèn. Bɔ́ lé naâ gàgà mé Càŋ saán.»
58003016	Á sâ, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá giì hueh Càŋ ŋgweé, bɔ́ né seér gàgà mé bú saán sâ, lé naâ bɔ̀ neì wee? Ŋgweéh lé naâ dàm bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Músì lé ker yuoó naâ mé njéh ké Ejíptò doô mà.
58003017	Á, te nyèmà yulà nèà sâ, temé lé Càŋ lè ŋaá njií naâ mé bɔ̀ neì ndɔ wa? Lé naâ mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé gela kuú giì naâ mé veên ké ya dueè sâ ndɔ.
58003018	Càŋ lé naâ jege ye, bɔ̀ nùà hên bèh dù ké yoòr nyî ndé ndé cû. À lé sâ jege njií naâ mé bɔ̀ neì ndɔ wa? Ŋgweéh lé naâ mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé saán naâ bú gàgà sâ wa?
58003019	Béh ŋgweé kɔ mé njéh ye, bɔ́ lé bú mé temé cén sìè ná ŋgwêh; ye bɔ́ lé bèh dù sâ ndé ná ŋgwêh dé cî ma.
58004001	Càŋ lé naá giì béh ndéb tieè kwaá lɔɔ́, ye béh nde né bèh dù ké yoòr nyî kwa, te béh bɔ́ den ké sâ. Sâ mɔ né mân bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí kè nyégé keè, te nuaré déì lètenè biì dèn cú faá à nde né bèh sâ liím nɔ.
58004002	Lòù sam, béh baá gi mé tie Njàgà Bagaà faá bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ lɔ naá giì mé tie cî ké ya dueè nɔ. Njèh cén, bɔ́ lɔ dé bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé faŋ deén naâ lòù, bɔ́ temé teèn kwá njí ŋgwéh. Yeé baá môn, lé bɔ́ dé bɔɔ̀n gàm ná cû ndɔ.
58004003	Dé beèh mé né gi temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, béh nde né teèn yilá. Né bèh dù mé Càŋ lé ye: Yeé baá mân, temé ŋaá ŋeí cuù nyí mé bɔ́ lòù, nyí jege ye: lòlòm bɔ̀ nùà hên bèh dù ké yoòr nyî ndé ndé cû.» À lɔ né mene mân tueé, sâ dàb mé à lɔ wɔ́ŋ si gi aá kèn; sâ seé seèn lɔ gi aá ndɔ.
58004004	Nde cu beré déì te mvù Càŋe né felè cieé téhbeèh nyagá kwaá ndɔ, ye: Càŋ lé bɔɔ́ giì naâ seé. Yeé baá mé cieé téhbeh, à du sɔɔ́ lòù ma.
58004005	Bèh dù cên sâ né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, ye: Lòlòm bɔ̀ nùà hên bèh dù ké yoòr nyî ndé ndé cû.»
58004006	Bɔ̀ léí toò bɔ̀ mé lé Njàgà Bagaà ŋgweé lɔgɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́ lé bèh dù sâ yílá ná ŋgwêh ndɔ. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lɔ temé teèn kwá njí ná ŋgwêh. Mɔ né mân, sâ bèh sâ née teèn ye, né bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀ kela den.
58004007	Yeé baá mân, Càŋ sie kwaá cu cieé dé hiîn, à yilá kwaá cieé bú sâ lan”. Te nde nde, Càŋ tueé keéh ye sònò Davîd faá mè la naâ nyagá nɔ, ye: Lan mɔ bí baá hueh Càŋ ŋgweé, bí té temé lòù dúágá sér.»
58004008	Hên mɔ Josúê sé lɔ naá giì bɔ̀ tele beèh léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ bèh dù lemé yií, Càŋ sé naá cuù cieé déì sie kwaá wa?
58004009	Mè tueé bí, sâ bèh dù sâ née teèn ye, né bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ kela den. À né faá dù dé loù cieé téhbeh mé Càŋ lɔ duú naâ teèn nɔ.
58004010	Nuaá mé yila te dù sâ nde né dé kèì cên du, faá Càŋ lɔ naâ seé seèn bɔɔ́ gií, à du dé kèì cên nɔ.
58004011	Sâ belà, béh fágá lòm feh dé teèn yilâ, béh té gwàn mé cén déì lètenè beèh ŋgeén sòn Càŋ, à liím bèh dù sâ, faá bɔ̀ léí toò bɔ̀ nɔ.
58004012	Ŋgòr Càŋ né làŋ, à né léláŋ terrèb, à né bòù nulá yɔgɔ́, kèb fà dɔɔ́ŋ nulásé túéŋ. À nula yila nde né yí te njolo temê mbaá, à né mé sùàrmú bɔ̂ cègè weé ndeé; à né mé mùnò nùàr tená ndeé, à né mé tuaá lè nùàr ŋɔbé ndeé ndɔ.
58004013	Njií mé nde né njolò Càŋ lòù leér le teèn sam. Dàm bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lɔ si giì naâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi njolò seèn. Nùà kàn ŋgúlú mé be seèn sulá nde né toò seèn.
58004014	Béh né mé ŋgàŋ sèmè beèh dé koô teèn. Ŋgàŋ sèmè sâ né Yeésò Kristò Ŋunà Càŋ, à lé naâ ké ter te vulúu ŋaá ndeé, à den ké felèbɔ̀. Mɔ né mân, béh sìè lòm ŋgòr Càŋ tég, béh né mé njéh toò bɔ̀ nùàr njebá.
58004015	Ŋgàŋ sèmè beèh dé koô né béh jere kɔɔ́, à né gi yuaâ beèh kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé naâ bú te njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ ceéh, bɔ́ lé bú ceéh naâ faá béh nɔ. Njèh cén, dé seèn à lɔ veên déì cór ná ŋgwêh.
58004016	Mɔ né mân, belà, bí ndê, béh bilí nde gi ké kwarè kɔgɔ Càŋ bèh fùgò kuû, béh té njeré déì nyàmè. Ké teèn sâ, à nde né béh jere kɔɔ́, béh nde né mé fùgò beè seèn yieé kuú ndɔ. Béh hin, mɔ njeré déì né béh yɔgɔ́, te gam béh.
58005001	Ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô dɔɔ́ŋ balé yuo giì né lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr, te à ŋa nùà seê Càŋ dé bɔ̀ mbeí seèn. Seé seèn né mbe mé sèmè toò Càŋ haâ, te veên bɔ̀ nùàr gi mé njéh.
58005002	À nde né yuaâ bɔ̀ cùr ŋgweé komo, à ŋgweé komo yuaâ dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bɔɔ́ sabé gɔ ndɔ. Lòù sam, bú nùà njèh né yuaásé faá bɔ́ nɔ.
58005003	Sé yeé baá ménâ, à léláŋ veên dé bɔ̀ mbeî sèmè lòm ndé cú, à semé bilí nde aá mé dé seèn mene.
58005004	Nùàr tì felè seèn mé be seèn lòbò bèh, wa nyí baá ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô. Càŋ haá yeé nùàr bèh bú sâ kɔɔ́; à lɔ naâ Arɔ̂ŋ ménâ bɔɔ́.
58005005	Né kèì cén mé Kristò ndɔ, à lɔ yo seèn kɔɔ́ sìè hàm ná ŋgwêh, ye te nyí ŋa ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô. Càŋ lɔ bú ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô sie kwaá naâ kɔɔ́, ye: Wò né Huaán mò, lan mè ŋa baá Tele yeè.»
58005006	Wa cu beré déì ye: Wò né dé yeè ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kèì cên, wò né te gule Melkisedêg.»
58005007	Cu déì ká te wɔ́ŋe, Yeésò lé naâ Càŋ mé terreb dua, à né bú lòù bɔŋ, à teèn lɔgɔ bilí mé yúé mene, yímé lé naâ bú njolo berré ndɔ. À lé sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgweé giì naâ sòn Càŋ mé nde né bú te cio yili sɔm. Yeé baá ménâ, Càŋ ŋgweé njií mé à né dua ndɔ.
58005008	À lɔ né mene Ŋunà Càŋ kɔɔ́, mé njéh mene à lɔ naâ tie ŋgweê maán; lɔ naâ mé dàm gèr ŋené larê.
58005009	À yeé sieé yuo aá teèn, Càŋ sie kwaá bú manyor cɔ̀ŋ dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né sòn seèn ŋgweé dɔɔ́ŋ, te bɔ́ yili yuo dé kèì cên.
58005010	Lòù sam, Càŋ ye: à né dé seèn ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô, à né te gule Melkisedêg ma.
58005011	Te ju hên béh né lom mé njèh tueê teèn ŋgún. Njèh cén, né taré. Béh se mene lòù, tie biì baá lieé.
58005012	Wanɔɔ́ŋ hên né cu mé bí sé la baá giì bɔ̀ nùà fèh-njèh teèn, bí sé la né bɔ̀ déì lòù feh seér. Mé njéh mene, bí ye, ŋgòr Càŋ mé bí lé naá giì ŋgweé hên, kɔ bɔ́ fèrrè dèn cú bí cí. Sâ tueé né ye, bí sér yíé kɔ́ ŋgwéh, bí gwaán seér né mbán.
58005013	Nuaá mé né mbán ménâ ŋaám dɔɔ́ŋ né faá huaán mbɔgɔ̀ nɔ; à mé terreb sam, à ŋgòr bagaà mé dé veên gè kɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh.
58005014	Dé nùà koô, yáb tetarê né seé seèn, à mé seé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ meh gi aá, à né gi bɔ̀ njèh dé bebagaà mé dé vevenê geé kɔɔ́.
58006001	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh jóló ŋá sér ter lòù. Bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé béh lé naá giì felè Kristò ŋgweé doô baá gi béh lè faá maàŋ nɔ. Bɔ́ maàŋ lòù sì fèrrè ndé cú. Né mene dé feh yueé fɔɔ̂n, te bí kwaá lɔ ceér veên, né mene temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî, bí ŋgweé gi aá kèn.
58006002	Né mene tòù nòmò Càŋ, né mene dé nùàr be felè baâ, né mene te cio komo yuoô; né mene dé loù ju tenâ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí baá gi mé njéh lè.
58006003	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh jóló ŋá sér ter lòù! Béh nde né ménâ mé terreb Càŋ bɔɔ́ komo.
58006004	Mɔ sam, bɔ̀ déì nde né ceér Yeésò si lɔɔ́. Mɔ bɔ́ né ceér Yeésò si lɔɔ́ ndɔ, sâ bèh yili yuo bɔɔ̀n nde né taré. Á, ŋgweéh bɔ́ lé baá giì ké toò Càŋ bèh ŋagâ mà. Bɔ́ lé naá giì dàm njèh ké te vulúu kwa laré, bɔ́ kwa bilí mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ mene.
58006005	Bɔ́ ŋene nyegé, ye ŋgòr Càŋ né lom njèh gècên kɔɔ́. Terreb wɔ́ŋ mé baá ndeê hên, bɔ́ lé naá giì ŋené ndɔ.
58006006	Mɔ bɔ́ né cu lòù die seér, ŋgweéh sâ bèh yili yuo bɔɔ̀n nde né taré wa? Sɔɔ́ kuú mene, bɔ́ temé kwéh kòmò ndé cú. Lòù sam, bɔ́ né seér Ŋunà Càŋ yí ter lòù fagá njií cuú, bɔ́ sellé kwaá bú ké mbartɔgɔ̂, te séb bomo sue bú yoòr bomò.
58006007	Mè tueé bí, mɔ tàbè déì né nu kwa, né lom bú yoòr te mbeî te mbeî neé yilá, yab né teèn yuo huɔɔ́m, né nùà ŋueèh gam, sâ Càŋ né tàbè sâ kulú.
58006008	Njèh cén, mɔ teèn ba yuo seér né téker bɔ̂ njìè, sâ tàbè hèllè né cùr, Càŋ nde né bú lòù duagá seér, tàbè hèllè ŋgie yuo.
58006009	Béh la né mene sònò mân tueé, mé njéh mene bɔ̀ nùàr mò, béh né kwàgà biì yieé, bí nde né dé biì yili yuo.
58006010	Càŋ nùà tá-gobó sam. À seé biì nyèn ndé ŋgwéh; à né gwaân lètenè biì ŋené. Gàm mé bí lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn mé yilí seèn gam doô, à né ŋené. À né ŋené ye, bí née bɔ́ gam den ndɔ. À bí nyèn ndé ŋgwéh.
58006011	Mé njéh mene, belà, béh né gwaán ye nùà kàn a, fágá cú feh, te seé biì jegé, bí kwa ye njií mé bí né ndèm teèn kwaá njií sâ.
58006012	Bí té ndɔ̀m, bí bèlè sér gule bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ceér Càŋ mé temé cén sie, mé né njèh yoló komo, mé njèh dɔɔ́ŋ kwa gi né faá Càŋ lé tueé naâ nɔ.
58006013	Lɔ mé Càŋ lɔ kwa kwaá naâ Abrahâm ndéb tieè, à lɔ naâ bú teèn mé jègè mene jege bilí. Càŋ yeé ke, nùà koô mé né bú ham yɔgɔ́ teèn yùò kélá ŋgwêh, à jege seér gùm seèn nùà njèh,
58006014	ye Abrahâm a: Nyí nde né wò kulú; bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù yeè nde né mbaá yaám ndeé den ma.»
58006015	Yeé baá môn, Abrahâm yila baá-re yolô ndɔ; à né ka yoló. Nde nde, Càŋ kulu njiî bú faá à lé tueé kwaá naâ bú nɔ.
58006016	Mɔ bɔ̀ nùàr né njeré déì tueé, bɔ́ né lòù jege, sâ bɔ́ jege né mé yilí nuaá mé ham yɔgɔ́ né bɔ́ haàm. Mɔ bɔ́ jege aá ménâ, sâ la né mene gèh saân dé heè, nde né lètenè bɔɔ̀n tené, bɔ́ kɔ lom jègè doô.
58006017	Lɔ naâ mé Càŋ ménâ ndɔ, ye te nyí feh keéh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né ŋgùlù nyî yieé mé njéh, te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ teèn, ye kàgà-ndòn nyî kwéh sér ndé ŋgwéh ma. À lɔ jègè te ndéb sâ jege yií naâ dé cî.
58006018	Ndéb bɔ̂ jègè né bɔ̀ njèh fà mé beè Càŋ kèh bèh. Bɔɔ́ mene naàn, Càŋ nyeén túé bèh. Mɔ né mân, sâ béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ né gbàŋ beèh dɔɔ́ŋ, yo né gi béh mé njéh taré, ye ndèm beèh nde né yieé.
58006019	Ndèm sâ né beè beèh faá kùn nɔ. À béh pɔ́ŋ sie njebá kwaá né kɔɔ́, te temé nde ye béh lè die. Né mene kɔ̀ŋ cɔ̀gɔ̀ gwà Càŋ koô ké te vulúu, ndèm sâ teèn nyueé yilá nde né kɔɔ́, à yuo kela yí lètenè mɔ̀ yoòr Càŋ.
58006020	Ké bèh sâ lɔ yila lɔgɔ́ naâ Yeésò, à né sòn beèh ké sâ kɔɔ́. À lɔ naâ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô ŋaá, né dé kèì cên te gule Melkisedêg.
58007001	Melkisedêg sâ lɔ naâ mgbè Salêm. Ké toò Càŋ Dueè ŋgàŋ sèmè né bú. Cu mé Abrahâm lé lieè naâ taáb mé bɔ̀ mgbè, à yeé wula gi aá bɔ́, à baá cuû, nuaá mé lé ndeè naâ ké ceér dueè, bɔ̂ Abrahâm kwaré, à kulu Abrahâm, lé naâ Melkisedêg sâ.
58007002	Abrahâm lɔ naâ bú mbe haá ndɔ: njií mé lé naâ yulà dɔɔ́ŋ Abrahâm lé naâ bú cén teèn sɔm kwaá. Yilí Melkisedêg sâ tueé né ye: né mgbè mé dilí lom né dé seèn dé gècên. Mgbè Salêm tueé né ye: né mgbè mé haá yeé dɔlê ndɔ.
58007003	Nuaá mé kɔ sɔm tele Melkisedêg bɔ̂ meí, teèn sam. Né mene jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ seèn déì, nuaré déì kɔ́ sɔ̀m ŋgwéh. Nuaá mé tueé sɔm kùr ŋaàr mé kùr cioò seèn teèn sam ndɔ. À den né faá Ŋunà Càŋ nɔ: à né ŋgàŋ sèmè dé nyèmà mé nyèmà.
58007004	Melkisedêg né duesé! Bí kwàgà yíé mé Abrahâm: Abrahâm né mene tele dàm bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́, mé njéh mene bú mé feh seèn lé naâ Melkisedêg mbe haá; bɔ̀ njií mé à lé cu giì mé njéh bèh taâb dɔɔ́ŋ, te njèh yulà, à lé naâ Melkisedêg teèn cécéné sɔm haá.
58007005	Bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù Levî mé né ŋgàŋ sèmè né gi mé sóú Músì tieè, né bɔ́ sɔgɔ́ den, ye bɔ́ a: bí ndé beè bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà; njií mé baá yulà dɔɔ́ŋ, bí weh bele teèn cécéné cécéné ma. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá den cuù lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr bɔɔ̀n mé né gi ndùté ndùtù Abrahâm ndɔ.
58007006	Melkisedêg lé dé seèn jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ Levî ná ŋgwêh. Mé njéh mene, à lé naâ mbe beè Abrahâm weh; te njèh yulà dɔɔ́ŋ Abrahâm lé naâ bú teèn cécéné cécéné sɔm haá bele. Abrahâm lé né mene kɔɔ́ ye nyí né mé ndéb Càŋ yoòr dɔɔ́ŋ, mé njéh mene à lé Abrahâm kulu seér cuù naâ kɔɔ́.
58007007	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, nuaá mé kulu yeé mbeí ham kela né kɔɔ́ mé mbeí.
58007008	Wanɔɔ́ŋ ŋgweéh bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè te mbàgà Levî, mé weh yeé mbe dɔɔ́ŋ, né yeé kuú gií wa? Dé Melkisedêg môn sam; à né mbe faá bɔ́ nɔ weh, mé njéh mene à kú bèh. Mvù Càŋ tueé né ménâ.
58007009	Sâ Levî né mene mbe beè bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà weh, à mene Melkisedêg bèsɔ́nè há ŋgwéh, mé njéh mene à lé naá giì bú mbe haá ndɔ.
58007010	Lòù sam, cu mé Abrahâm tele koô seèn bɔ̂ Melkisedêg lé kwaré naâ teèn, sâ à lé baá giì yoòr Abrahâm. Njèh cén, sâ à lé née te càŋ ye.
58007011	Seé bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè te gèh Levî dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ gule dobo giì naâ mé sóú ké lètenè bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà. Mɔ seé bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè Levî sé né seé ŋgulî, sé lɔ húɔ́m ná cû mé ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô déì ŋené yuo kela cuù beré déì te gule Melkisedêg. Ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô sé lɔ yuo cegé kaà te gèh Arɔ̂ŋ ŋunà Levî.
58007012	Ŋgweéh mɔ gèh ŋgàŋ sèmè kweéh seér, sóú né yeé kweéh seér ndɔ wa?
58007013	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Fehtoò beèh mé béh né felè seèn tueé hên, dé seèn nùà Levî sam, gèh dé seèn né hiín. Te gèh seèn-e nuaré déì ŋgàŋ sèmè teèn ŋá ŋgúŋgwéh.
58007014	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, à né dé seèn te gèh bɔ̀ Júdà bɔ̀. Béh né cu kɔɔ́ ye, Músì yeé baá felè bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè tueé wa, à lɔ njeré déì te gèh bú hên túé ná ŋgwêh ma.
58007015	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, ŋgòr hên ŋené ŋagá baá kèn; ŋgàŋ sèmè déì faá Melkisedêg nɔ waà baá.
58007016	Bú sâ sóú lɔ kɔɔ́ táŋ ná ŋgwêh, te bɔ́ nde ye bú ŋgàŋ sèmè sie kwaá. À dé seèn né nùà njèh, à né ŋgàŋ sèmè mé né den cu dɔɔ́ŋ làŋ.
58007017	Te mvù Càŋe tueé taré né ménâ ndɔ, ye: Wò né dé yeè ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kèì cên, wò né te gule Melkisedêg.»
58007018	Yeé baá môn, Càŋ tɔr wula sóú dé léí toò sâ ndɔ, ye né yuaá, gàm teèn sam ma.
58007019	Mé gècên mene, sóú Músì hèllè nùàr njolò Càŋ sènè kòmò bèh. Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam; njií mé né sóú sâ huɔɔ́m yɔgɔ́, waà baá kèn. Ndèm beèh kènê dɔɔ́ŋ baá gi teèn, à béh ké yoòr Càŋ ŋgoró njií né kɔɔ́.
58007020	À dé seèn né nuaá mé Càŋ lɔ nde bú ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô sie, à lɔ teèn jege bilí naâ mé jègè mene. À lɔ dé bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè déì lòù jègè ná ŋgwêh.
58007021	Dé Yeésò à lé naâ jege, ye bú a: Jue nyí Nùà Dueè, nyí jègè kèh ndé ŋgwéh; wò dé yeè né ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kèì cên.»
58007022	Yeé baá ménâ, béh yieé kwàgà mé Yeésò ndɔ, ye ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé seèn yieé kela né kɔɔ́ mé ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé cuûm.
58007023	Njeré déì né cu teèn ndɔ. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè lé naâ ŋgún. Lòù sam, bɔ́ né yeé seé ŋgàŋ sèmè toò kuú kwaá lɔɔ́.
58007024	Dé Yeésò môn sam; à seé seèn toò kú kwá lɔ́ ŋgwéh; cu dɔɔ́ŋ à né den làŋ.
58007025	À bɔ̀ nùàr yili komo né dé cî. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi yoòr Càŋ mé bú ndeé, à né bɔ́ dé kèì cên yili sɔm. Lòù sam, cu dɔɔ́ŋ à né dé seèn làŋ, à né Càŋ felè bɔɔ̀n dua den.
58007026	Yeé baá ménâ, ŋgàŋ sèmè mé nde né béh gam, kɔ né bú. À dé seèn né jolosé, mé sòn fuû ndɔ, à veên déì cór bèh. Càŋ lɔ naâ bɔ́ bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ hiín geé kwaá, à weh njií bú dé seèn ké ter te vulúu.
58007027	À dé seèn faá bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé kokoô hèllè sam. À Càŋ sèmè felè veên dé seèn nùà njèh há ŋgúŋgwéh, à dé bɔ̀ mbaábɔn cieé dɔɔ́ŋ faá bɔ́ semé yeé sâ, sèmè bèh ndɔ. À lɔ dé seèn semé naâ mbei cén dé kèì cên. À lɔ ménâ semé naâ mé gùm seèn nùà njèh ndɔ.
58007028	Bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè mé sóú Músì lɔ sie kwaá giì naâ kɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ naá giì bɔ̀ wàn. Te jomo sóù, Càŋ nde ye lòù jege; à ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô teèn sie kwaá seér baá-re Ŋuna seèn mé né dé seèn tê dé kèì cên.
58008001	Njolo ŋgòr mé béh né tueé hên dɔɔ́ŋ né ye: ŋgàŋ sèmè beèh né gèh ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô sâ. À né ké te vulúu yoòr Càŋ terrèb mé né te kɔgɔ. À né te be gaâ seèn den den.
58008002	À seé seèn bɔɔ́ den né ké gwò lètenè mɔ̀. Gwà sâ né sòn gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀; njèh cén, à né dé seèn gwà gècên mé Càŋ nùà njèh lé sieè naâ kɔɔ́, nùàr lé bú kɔɔ́ síé ná ŋgwêh.
58008003	Bɔ́ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô dɔɔ́ŋ sie kwaá né, te à haá beh Càŋ mbe mé sèmè. Yeé baá ménâ, kɔ ŋgàŋ sèmè beèh dé koô sâ haá bú njeré déì ménâ ndɔ.
58008004	Mɔ à sé né ká te wɔ́ŋe, à sé naâ ŋgàŋ sèmè den kwa wa? Lòù sam, bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè bɔɔ̀n né ká doó teèn, bɔ́ né gi Càŋ mbe faá sóú Músì lé tueé naâ sâ haá.
58008005	Njèh cén, seé mé bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè hèllè bɔɔ́ yeé sâ, bɔ́ si weh lom né lòù, bɔ́ si weh yeé yoòr seé dé Càŋ ké te vulúu. Mé seé Músì lé naâ faá bèh ménâ ndɔ: cu mé Músì lé ndeè naâ gwà sieé, Càŋ lé ye bú a: kè nyégé bagasé, wò nde ménâ sieé ma. Síé sɔ̀m ká nág faá nyí lé naâ wò ké te tòre nɔ feh.
58008006	Kènê seé dueè baá seér beè Yeésò, né dé bɔɔ̀n hèllè yɔgɔ́ keéh, à béh yoòr Càŋ nyɔgɔ́ njií né mé ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé feê; dé sâ né ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé cuûm yɔgɔ́. Lòù sam, ŋgɔ̀ŋ bú sâ né mé ndéb dé bagaà teèn. Ndéb bú sâ kela né kɔɔ́ mé ndéb dé cuûm.
58008007	Mɔ ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ sé lɔ naâ teèn yilá, sé lɔ húɔ́m ná cû mé Càŋ kweéh seér bú mé ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé feê.
58008008	Béh kɔ baá ye, bú sâ lɔ teèn yílá ná ŋgwêh bɔ̀n. Lòù sam, Càŋ lé née bɔ̀ nùàr seèn teèn bɔ den, ye: Cu déì ndeè né waâ, nyí nde né ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé feê mé bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà kɔ. Nyí nde né mé gèh bɔ̀ huaán Júdà ménâ kɔ ndɔ, jue nyí Nùà Dueè.
58008009	Dé sâ dèn ndé cú faá dé mé nyí lé kɔɔ́ naâ mé bɔ̀ tele bɔɔ̀n léí jɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ. Nyí lɔ né mene bɔ́ te tàbè Ejíptò mé be nyî kou sɔm keéh, mé njéh mene bɔ́ lé naâ ŋgɔ̀ŋ sâ lòù cum seér. Nyí yeé ŋene aá ménâ, nyí sɔm be nyî yoòr bɔɔ̀n ndɔ; jue nyí Nùà Dueè.
58008010	Hên né ŋgɔ̀ŋ mé nyí kɔ nde né mé bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà loù sâ, jue nyí Càŋ Dueè: Nyí bɔ́ sóú nyî soú kwaá seér nde aá felè, nyí bɔ́ nyagá kwaá seér nde aá te temê ndɔ, te Càŋ bɔɔ̀n den lom nyí, bɔ́ den bɔ̀ nùàr nyî.
58008011	Cu sâ nuaré déì bɔ̀ mbaábɔn lòù fèh sɔ́ ndé cú, ye bɔ́ a: kè Nùà Dueè baá ye hên nɔ. Né mene huaán maàn, né mene nùà koô, dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né nyí ŋené kɔɔ́.
58008012	Nyí nde né yúlá-temé bɔɔ̀n lè nyî kulú sɔm; nyí veên bɔɔ̀n ká lè nyî sìè kwá ndé cú.»
58008013	Mé Càŋ nde mé ŋgɔ̀ŋ feê mân tueé, sâ à ye ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé léí toò hèllè baá dé cuûm ma. Né yeé môn ndɔ, mɔ njeré déì kulí baá, à né yeé dé cuûm ŋaá, te jomo sâ à nyoló yuo weéh lòù.
58009001	Ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé léí toò lé naá giì mé bɔ̀ sóú teèn, bɔ̀ nùàr lé Càŋ dua ŋene beéh mé njéh. Bèh Càŋ duaà lé naá giì teèn.
58009002	Bɔ́ lé naâ gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀ sieé, kɔ̀ŋ lé naâ teèn fà. Kɔ̀ŋ dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀, bɔ́ lé yilá naâ bú mɔ̀. Tàndáŋ lâm kpàcɔ̀gɔ̀ lé naâ gwò sâ; gbàgà breêd mé bɔ́ haá yeé toò Càŋ lé naâ gwò sâ ndɔ.
58009003	Tùtúlù kɔ̀ŋ dé yí jomò bɔ́ lé teèn colo tenà naâ cɔ̀gɔ̀; bɔ́ yilá mí bú sâ mɔ̀ dé joloò.
58009004	Kɔ lé naâ gwò sâ teèn, bɔ́ me né mé goó, te bɔ́ ŋgie beh bɔ̀ san teèn. Mbèŋ déì lé naâ gwò sâ teèn ndɔ, bɔ́ mban sie né bú mé goó. Né mbèŋ ŋgɔ̀ŋ. Bɔ́ me cu né ŋguú déì mé goó, bɔ́ dilí kwaá yí lè mbèŋ sâ ndɔ. Yí lè ŋguú sâ né mánà. Lè mbèŋ sâ lé naâ cùgò Arɔ̂ŋ mé lé naâ mvue faám doô. Bɔ̀ mbeh taâ déì fà lé naâ lè mbèŋ sâ ndɔ, bɔ̀ sóú ŋgɔ̀ŋ né teèn nyagá den bele.
58009005	Felè mbèŋ sâ bɔ́ lé teèn me dilí kwaá naâ bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ terrèb. Bɔ́ me ndɔgɔ́ njií né bɔ́ bà yí felè mbèŋ, bèh mé bɔ́ ber yeé húɔ́m teèn, te Càŋ kulu sɔm bɔ̀ nùàr veên yoòr. Kè, ŋgòr hên dé kènê tueé giî sam.
58009006	Bɔ́ yeé nyegé kwaá gi aá ménâ, bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè né lom cieé dɔɔ́ŋ te mí dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ sâ yilá sɔɔ́, bɔ́ né seé Càŋ teèn bɔɔ́.
58009007	Te mí dé yí jomò doô, ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô yila cegé yeé teèn kɔɔ́, à yila cegé yeé mbei cén te nyèmà ndɔ. À teèn yila yeé mé húɔ́m nyaàm beè, te à haá sèmè mé njéh, Càŋ kulu sɔm bú veên yoòr, kulu sɔm gi bɔ̀ nùàr veên mé bɔ́ né bɔɔ́ sabé doô yoòr ndɔ.
58009008	Cúcuí Ŋagâ feh kwaá baá-re béh mé bɔ̀ njèh sâ ndɔ, ye béh a: mɔ mɔ̀ bú toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ sâ née ka toò tég ŋeí tená, sâ ndɔ́g ceér mɔ̀ dé joloò née ndúg ye ma.
58009009	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né kàn mé feh kwaá né bɔ̀ njèh dé cafanê, ye béh a, bɔ́ né gi mbe mé sèmè dág haá; njèh cén, gèh Càŋ duaà bú sâ temé nùàr nyégé kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.
58009010	Né lom bɔ̀ gènnè yâb bɔ̂ gènnè mbè mé tòù nyénnè ma. Bɔ̀ njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi wàn ndɔ. Bɔ́ lɔ teèn deén naâ, ye te béh be lulú den ŋgɔgɔ̂ mé njéh. Mɔ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ndeè kweéh seér gi aá, Càŋ ye te nyí fɔ sɔm ye bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀.
58009011	Kènê Kristò waà baá ndɔ. Ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô né bú; béh bɔ̀ njèh gècên kwa gi né beè seèn. À lé naâ lè mɔ̀ dé Càŋe yilá ndeé. Bú sâ né dé Músì hèllè lieé yɔgɔ́, né bú jolo yɔgɔ́ ndɔ. Bɔ̀ nùàr lé kɔɔ́ síé ná ŋgwêh, à dé njèh wɔ̂ŋ sam ndɔ.
58009012	Kristò lɔ teèn yila ndeè naâ dé kèì cên. Lɔ mé húɔ́m mbieè ná ŋgwêh, mé húɔ́m huaán nàgà sam ndɔ. Lɔ naá seêr mé húɔ́m seèn nùà njèh. À lɔ béh yili sɔɔ́m naâ mé njéh, lɔ naâ dé kèì cên ndɔ.
58009013	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, dé tòù nùàr, bɔ́ nùàr yoòr yuɔb yeé húɔ́m mbieè mé húɔ́m tela nàgà. Bɔ́ né yeé nàgà tuar ŋgie njií; bɔ́ weh tou sâ, bɔ́ yuɔb njií bɔ̀ nùàr yoòr ndɔ, ye sâ bɔ́ sené yeé bɔ́ lòù.
58009014	Mɔ né yeé mé húɔ́m nyaàm mân, sé tagá mé dé Kristò wa? Kristò lé dé seèn semé seér naâ gùm seèn nùà njèh. Dé sâ né lom jéjég sèmè kɔɔ́, Cúcuí Càŋ ndeèr né teèn. Dé seèn húɔ́m seèn nde né temé beèh sené, te bɔ̀ seé mamvuaàn lè beèh dèn cú, te béh ŋa bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ làŋ.
58009015	Sâ tueé né ye, Kristò nyɔgɔ́ bilí aá béh bɔ̀ Càŋ kèn; à béh bɔ́ nyɔgɔ́ bilí né mé ŋgɔ̀ŋ feê, te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lé naá giì yilá dɔɔ́ŋ yila gi ŋgùlù seèn, bɔ́ den teèn dé ndeèr, faá à lé ye bɔ́ nde né teèn yilá nɔ. Lòù sam, Kristò lé naâ cio beèh ŋaá weh. Bɔ̀ nùàr te ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ hèllè lé né mene veên bɔɔ́, à lé naâ bɔ́ teèn huar sɔm.
58009016	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ nùàr lé naá giì ŋgúlú seèn lòù taáŋ kwaá, kɔ bɔ́ ndeè ŋene ye à kuú baá, bɔ́ geé ye ŋgúlú sâ.
58009017	Mɔ nùàr lé naá giì ŋgúlú seèn jege kwaá, à née mé njolo, bɔ́ ŋgúlú hèllè cu sâ gè ndé ŋgwéh.
58009018	Mé ŋgɔ̀ŋ Càŋ dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ hèllè lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ; húɔ́m lé naâ teèn yilá, te ŋgɔ̀ŋ kwa ye terreb.
58009019	Músì yeé kulá kwaá gi aá cìlì nùàr sóú Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ tieè, à weh húɔ́m huaán nàgà mé húɔ́m mbieè, à hualé bilí mé nòmò. À weh cù, à bilí mé yúlí sòrŋgaàŋ, à né te húɔ́me yií njií, à né felè mvù sóù yuɔb njií, à né cìlì nùàr yoòr yuɔb njií ndɔ.
58009020	À ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: Hên né húɔ́m mé Càŋ kɔ kuú né ŋgɔ̀ŋ mé njéh, ye te bí jolo cí.»
58009021	Músì lé naâ húɔ́m sâ te gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀ yuɔb njií, à lé naâ te njèh seé gwà Càŋe dɔɔ́ŋ yuɔb njií ndɔ;
58009022	faá sóú tueé nê nɔ, ye né mene kei wa, kɔ húɔ́m njèh dɔɔ́ŋ sené né kɔɔ́ ma. Yeé baá ménâ, kɔ húɔ́m kwar kɔɔ́, te Càŋ nde ye nùàr veên yoòr kulú sɔm ndɔ.
58009023	Bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ̀ nùàr lé naâ ké te vulúu si weh sâ, bɔ́ lé naá giì bɔ́ faá mè la naâ tueé nɔ, sené gií. Njèh cén, bɔ̀ dé ké te vulúu dé bɔɔ̀n gwaán né bɔ̀ jéjég sèmè.
58009024	Mè né tueé: Kristò lɔ te mɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ nùàr me né kɔɔ́ yílá ná ŋgwêh. Lòù sam, né lom cecemé mé bɔ́ lé si weéh naâ yoòr mɔ̀ dé ké te vulúu. À lé yila seér naâ ké te vulúu sâ. À ké teèn toò Càŋ kènê né sòn beèh.
58009025	Ké lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf nyèmà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé koô né yeé lè mɔ̀ joloò mé húɔ́m nyaàm beè yilá sɔɔ́. Dé Kristò lé môn ná ŋgwêh, à lé teèn lòù yágá dèn ná ŋgwêh, à lé feh seèn semé cegé naâ mbei cén.
58009026	Mɔ sam, sâ bèh lɔ mé wɔ́ŋ lɔ duɔɔ́m naâ, à sé naâ gèr mé gùm seèn nyèmà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋené kum. Mè tueé bí, môn sam. À lé dé seèn waà naâ te nàm bú mé wɔ́ŋ nde aá teèn ceré hên; à gùm seèn nùà njèh semé cegé mbei cén, te yaga sɔm bɔ̀ nùàr veên yoòr.
58009027	Né mene neì dɔɔ́ŋ kuú cegé yeé mbei cén. Mɔ à kuú baá, à nde ké te ju toò Càŋ.
58009028	Kristò lé kuú naâ mbei cén ndɔ; à lé feh seèn semé naâ, ye te nyí kulu sɔm nùàr ŋgún veên yoòr. À nde cuù né mbei cén dé jomò waâ; dé sâ felè veên sam cuú, nde baá dé bɔ̀ nùàr seèn yili sɔɔ̀m. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bú goó kela den dɔɔ́ŋ nde né yili yuo gií.
58010001	Mè tueé bí, sóú Músì né lom cecemé bɔ̀ njèh jéjêg. Bɔ̀ njèh jéjêg sâ née ké toò ye ndɔ. Sóú seèn hèllè mé terreb sam, à nùàr ké toò Càŋ nyégé njí ndé ŋgwéh gùm dɔɔ́ŋ; wanɔɔ́ŋ à seèn nùàr mé cící sèmè cící sèmè nyèmà dɔɔ́ŋ sené caá nde né mé ŋgei wa?
58010002	Mɔ veên sé lɔ né bɔ̀ dùà-Càŋ bɔ̀ yoòr mé gèh sèmè bú sâ gií, kènê bɔ́ sé lɔ núr veên yoòr bɔɔ̀n ŋgwé dèn ná cû; sèmè hèllè sé lɔ naâ gií ndɔ.
58010003	Mɔ wa hên bɔ́ née den núr sâ yoòr bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé, sâ sèmè hèllè né bɔ́ nyèmà dɔɔ́ŋ lòù tueé den, ye bɔ́ a: bí né bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ ma.
58010004	Lòù sam, húɔ́m nàgà mé húɔ́m mbieè dé bɔɔ̀n veên sènè kòmò bèh.
58010005	Yeé baá ménâ, cu mé Kristò lé ndeè naâ ká te wɔ́ŋe ndeê, à lé ye Càŋ a: Wò sèmè bɔ̂ mbe gwàn bèh, wò ye mè a, ŋá sér nùàr.
58010006	Bɔ́ né mene wò mbe nyaàm ké te kɔ ŋgela haá den, wò njolo teèn kè njí bèh. Né mene sèmè dé veên senê, wò njolo teèn kè nyì bèh ndɔ.
58010007	Yeé baá môn, mè ye wò a: Sâ mè hên nɔ, Càŋ mò! Mè ndeè, te mè bɔɔ́ faá wò gwaán nê nɔ; te den ka nág faá né felè mò te mvù nyagá den ndɔ.»
58010008	Sâ Kristò lé tueé lɔgɔ́ naâ faá béh la naâ ŋgweé nɔ, ye Càŋ a: Wò sèmè gwàn bèh, wò mbe gwàn bèh. Bɔ́ né mene wò nyam ké felè kɔɔ̀ ŋgela haá, wò njolo teèn kè njí bèh; né mene sèmè dé veên senê, wò njolo teèn kè nyì bèh ndɔ.» Á sâ, bɔ̀ sèmè hèllè né gi faá sóú tueé nê ndɔ.
58010009	Kristò den cuù faá béh la naâ ŋgweé nɔ, ye Càŋ a: Sâ nyí hên nɔ, Càŋ nyî! Nyí ndeè te nyí bɔɔ́ faá wò gwaán nê nɔ.» Mé Kristò lɔ nde faá bèh ménâ tueé, sâ feh keéh né ye, Càŋ bɔ̀ sèmè hèllè vurú sɔm gi aá kèn, à teèn yií keéh seér aá sèmè dé Yeésò Kristò ma.
58010010	Kristò lé naâ dé seèn faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ bɔɔ́ jege. À lé semé naâ gùm seèn nùà njèh, lé naâ mbei cén dé kèì cên ndɔ. Béh baá senésé mé njéh.
58010011	Dé bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè, né lom ka cící sâ bɔ́ baá cu teèn; bɔ́ né lom cieé dɔɔ́ŋ ter njebá sɔɔ́, bɔ́ né seé cên sâ bɔɔ́ gerá kuú, bɔ́ né-re sèmè sâ ferré den, sâ sèmè hèllè veên yoòr sɔ̀m kòmò bèh ndɔ.
58010012	Dé Kristò, à lɔ semé cegé naâ mbei cén, ye te nyí fɔ sɔm bɔ̀ nùàr veên yoòr dé kèì cên. Jomo sâ à ŋaá yuo ké ter, à nde te be gaâ Càŋe den ndeé.
58010013	À kènê né ké sâ, à kela den né cu mé Càŋ nde né bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ seèn ka ba gulè seèn baá yií.
58010014	Mé sèmè Kristò cén-tà-cén sâ, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né senésé baá gi dé bɔɔ̀n tê dé kèì cên.
58010015	Cúcuí Ŋagâ toò tueé taré né béh ménâ ndɔ, ye né lom môn jéjég, wa Càŋ ye:
58010016	Hên né ŋgɔ̀ŋ mé nyí kɔ nde né mé bɔ́ loù sâ, jue nyí Càŋ Dueè: nyí bɔ́ sóú nyî soú kwaá seér nde aá felè, nyí bɔ́ nyagá kwaá seér nde aá te temê ndɔ.»
58010017	À den cuù déì, ye: Nyí veên bɔɔ̀n ká lè nyî sìè kwá ndé cú; bɔ́ lé naá menè sóú nyî kwalé, nyí dé cuûm sâ lòù táŋ ndé cú ndɔ.»
58010018	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ Càŋ kulu sɔm gi aá veên yoòr nùàr kèn, húɔ́m cú mé nùàr haá cu sèmè.
58010019	Mɔ né mân bɔ̀ nùàr mò, sâ kènê béh njeré déì nyàmè ndé cú, béh nde né te mɔ̀ joloò yilá. Né mé njua húɔ́m Yeésò.
58010020	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Kristò béh ceér lɔŋ komo kwaá baá kèn. Né ceér feê mé béh nde né yɔ̀ŋ teèn kwa. À ŋerré sɔm aá cɔ̀gɔ̀ mé lé naâ toò cií tená doô. Sâ jue né gùm seèn nùà njèh mé lé naâ kuú doô.
58010021	Kènê béh baá mé ŋgàŋ sèmè beèh dé koô teèn; felè mbàgà Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ né bú.
58010022	Sâ béh hin lom ké yoòr Càŋ mé temé cén, mé ndèm beèh mene dɔɔ́ŋ. Yeésò yaga sɔm gi aá béh temé kèn; bɔ́ lé naâ béh mé nòmò ŋagâ kou ndɔ.
58010023	Béh kwá njí lòm ndèm te njií mé béh né bɔ̀ nùàr tueé hên tég. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ bɔɔ́ nde né nág faá à lé naâ béh tueé kwaá nɔ.
58010024	Béh kè kú lètenè beèh, te gwaân yam lètenè beèh, seé bagaà yam mé njéh ndɔ.
58010025	Béh té lè bilî bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ kún, faá bɔ̀ déì né yeé kuún nɔ. Béh fágá kú sér dé beèh mé feh. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, kwarè biì doó sâ baá giì cieé mé Nùà Dueè ndeè né teèn cuû.
58010026	Mɔ béh né gi gècên Càŋ kɔɔ́, mé njéh mene béh né cu veên mé be beèh loró ŋeí, sâ béh kɔ́ɔ ye: ndɔ́g, sèmè mé nde cu né béh veên sâ yoòr yaga sɔm teèn sam ma.
58010027	Mɔ nuaré déì né yeé ménâ bɔɔ́, sâ bú a, ndèlè kú mé veéh ndelè, à kèlà lòm á dé seèn ju mé nde né bú loù sâ kwa. We tarê nde né bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ Càŋ loù sâ mé ndègè mene ŋgie ceré.
58010028	Né gi bí tieè mé sóú Músì ménâ ndɔ, ye: mɔ nùà fà mé tagár tueé gi né mé sòn cên dɔɔ́ŋ, ye nùà mân cum aá sóú, sâ bɔ́ wúlá bú wulà, bɔ́ té jere kwá ma.
58010029	Mɔ mé sóú Músì né mân, sâ ju nuaá mé seb seér né dé seèn Ŋunà Càŋ den nde né naàn wa? Mɔ à dé seèn táŋ ŋgwéh ye húɔ́m ŋgɔ̀ŋ Càŋ lé naâ nyí sené, wa Cúcuí Càŋ né nyí bagaà dé lòù bɔɔ́, à né bú lòù selé seér, sâ ju felè seèn den nde né naàn ndɔ wa? Mè tueé bí, dé nùà sâ dé tueê sam.
58010030	Ŋgweéh béh né Càŋ kɔɔ́ wa? À lé naá giì sòn seèn cie tueé kwaá, ye: Nyí njùŋ sɔm nde né kɔɔ́. Mɔ nuaré déì né wò veên bɔɔ́, nyí bú sòn sâ bɔɔ́ sɔm cu nde né kɔɔ́ ndɔ. À né gi tueé ye: Jue mè Nùà Dueè, mè nde né ju felè bɔ̀ nùàr mò tená.»
58010031	Càŋ a bɔ́ nuaré déì die ke ju beè Càŋ làŋ loù sâ nɔ, te à ŋene bú.
58010032	Bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ mùnò njí ke ye: cu mé bí lé naâ ŋagâ ŋené lɔgɔ́, bí lé naâ dàm gèr ŋené laré; bí lé naâ yoòr nɔɔ́ŋ yoló kwaá njií ndɔ;
58010033	séb o, núr o, dɔɔ́ŋ bí lé naá giì mé njéh njolò bɔ̀ nùàr kwaré. Mé njéh mene bí lé dé sâ táŋ ná ŋgwêh, bí lé naâ bɔ̀ mbaábi mé né ménâ jamé, lòù taá seér.
58010034	Bí lé naâ bɔ̀ gwà cibì bɔ̀ jere kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ nùàr né mene bɔ̀ njèh biì ŋgaá weh, bí lé naá giì be teèn mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene sɔm, ye bí nde cu né ménâ kwa yɔgɔ́ keéh, wa dé sâ dé seèn gí ndé cú ndɔ ma.
58010035	Mɔ né mân bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí té temé ter sɔ̀m. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, sàgà biì ké beè Càŋ né duesé ma.
58010036	Huɔm kela né ménâ yolô, bí té gùr, te bí bɔɔ́ ye njií mé né Càŋ yoòr huɔɔ́m, bí kwa ye faá Càŋ lé ye nyí nde né bí haá ndɔ.
58010037	Né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: Le lom aá njɔ́, tánjɔ́ mân, sâ nuaá mé ndeè né ndeê doô waà baá kèn, à ŋgágá ndé cú.
58010038	Càŋ ye, nuaá mé ŋa né nùà dilî beè nyî mé temé cén yoòr nyî kwaá njiî dɔɔ́ŋ kwa nde né yɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ́. Mɔ à bele seér njolo, nyí sɔm temé yoòr seèn ndɔ.»
58010039	Dé beèh, mè mùnò ŋgwéh ye béh né te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né jomo cuú teèn. Ŋgweéh bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ nde né lòù leér le ma. Béh dé beèh né temé cén mé Càŋ kwaá njií, te béh yili yuo.
58011001	Mɔ nùàr né temé cén mé Càŋ kwaá njií, sâ à né ndèm mé bú kwaá, ye nyí kɔ gi aá kèn ye Càŋ nde né njií sâ ménâ bɔɔ́ ma. À mene njií sâ mé njolo ŋéné ŋgwéh, à né gi kɔɔ́ ye, né teèn.
58011002	Càŋ lɔ ye bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ né te ceér-e. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé naâ bú mé temé cén sie.
58011003	Béh lɔ temé cén kwaá njií giì naâ mé Càŋ, te béh nde ye ŋgweé kɔɔ́, ye Càŋ lɔ wɔ́ŋ sií naâ mé ŋgòr seèn. Sâ tueé né ye, njií mé nùàr mé njolo ŋéné bèh lɔ sií naâ dé mé nùàr né lòù ŋené kɔɔ́.
58011004	Mé Ábèl lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. À lɔ naâ Càŋ sèmè haá. À lɔ lòù haá ŋgulí naâ mé temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njiî. Yeé baá ménâ, sèmè seèn nde ye dé Kayîn ŋgulí yɔgɔ́. Njua mé Ábèl lɔ naâ Càŋ mé temé cén ménâ sie ndɔ, Càŋ lɔ naâ bú nùà dilî yilá; à weh sèmè dé seèn, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ mé njéh. Gwaán Ábèl a kú seèn kuù, be seê seèn kú ŋgwéh; wa hên temé cén mé à lé naâ yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií doô née ŋgulí ndeé den ye.
58011005	Mé Hénɔ̀g lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Càŋ lɔ naâ mé bú ké te vulúu làŋ weh ŋaá te à dé seèn lòù kú cú. Càŋ yeé weh ŋaá baá mé bú ménâ, bɔ́ bú mé njolo ŋéné cú ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ naá giì mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Te mvù Càŋe né nyagá den, ye: mé Càŋ lɔ nde Hénɔ̀g ménâ weh, sâ Hénɔ̀g lɔ huɔm giì naâ Càŋ yoòr lòù ma.
58011006	Á ŋgweéh sâ, bɔɔ́ mene naàn, mɔ nùàr temé cén mé Càŋ kwá njí ŋgwéh, à Càŋ yoòr húɔ́m ndé ŋgwéh mà. Sâ tueé né ye, nuaá mé nde né yoòr Càŋ den ndeé dɔɔ́ŋ, kɔ à né gi mé temé seèn bagasé ŋené njií, ye Càŋ né teèn; wa bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ceér seèn fɔɔ́n dɔɔ́ŋ, à nde né bɔ́ sàgà haá ma.
58011007	Mé Noê lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Mé gèr lɔ nde wɔ́ŋ kwa, Càŋ lɔ naá giì Noê toò tueé kwaá; Noê lɔ sòn seèn ŋgweé naâ, sâ à née bɔ̀ njií sâ mé njolo ŋéné ŋgwéeh ye. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén mé Càŋ kwaá njiî. À fagá kɔm faá Càŋ lé naâ bú tueé nɔ, à yili sɔm mbàgà seèn mé njéh. Ju sie bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀ mé njéh ndɔ. Noê lé nùà dilî beè Càŋ ŋaà naâ mé temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njiî sâ.
58011008	Mé Abrahâm lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ; à lé sòn Càŋ ŋgweé naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî; à lé naâ ter te sòn Càŋe komo wuo, à nde te tàbè mé Càŋ ndeè nde né bú haá doô. À mene tàbè sâ kɔ́ ŋgwéh, mé njéh mene à kɔ lom teèn ndeê.
58011009	Tàbè mé Càŋ lɔ ye nyí nde né bú haá sâ, à lɔ teèn cer deén naâ faá nùà kìn nɔ. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Nde nde Càŋ ye Isâk bɔ̂ Jakɔ̂b a, nyí nde né bɔ́ lò bú cén sâ haá ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, bɔ́ bɔ̀ Abrahâm dɔɔ́ŋ né ké sâ te gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀ faá bɔ̀ kìn nɔ cer den.
58011010	Lòù sam, Abrahâm lé njolo ke deén naâ mé lɔɔ́ déì; Càŋ nùà njèh lé lɔɔ́ sâ sií naâ kɔɔ́, lé naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn ndɔ; à bú kaŋ yɔŋ né mé báŋ. Abrahâm lé kela deén naâ cí.
58011011	Mé Sará lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. À lɔ baá giì mene kuúm, mé njéh mene à lé naâ huaán ŋar kwa. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî; ye nyí né gi bagasé kɔɔ́ nyegé, Càŋ bɔɔ́ nde né faá à lé naâ tueé ma.
58011012	Si seèn Abrahâm lɔ baá giì mene faá komó nɔ, mé njéh mene bɔ́ bú lé naâ huaán ŋar kwa. Dàm bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù nùà cén sâ lé naâ tetoò faá mbentò nɔ yaám ndeé, né faá mbésebé sòn nòmò koô yaám ndeé den ndɔ.
58011013	Nde nde bɔ̀ nùà hên kuú gi, sâ temé bɔɔ̀n cén né den ka yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií ye. Njèh cén, bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lé tueé naâ sâ, bɔ́ lé dé bɔɔ̀n kwà ná ŋgwêh, bɔ́ lé bɔ́ ŋene njií seér naâ lòù, bɔ́ né bɔ́ mé be yí dàb bieé njií den. Bɔ́ lé naâ ŋené kɔɔ́, ye bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kìn, lɔɔ́ bɔɔ̀n ká te wɔ́ŋe sam ma.
58011014	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né mân tueé dɔɔ́ŋ né gi bèsɔ́nè feh keéh, ye bɔ́ né lɔɔ́ feê fɔɔ́n te bɔ́ yila teèn dé kèì cên.
58011015	Mɔ bɔ́ sé né lò bɔɔ̀n ké jomo munó njií, bɔ́ sé naâ ceér fɔɔ́n, te bɔ́ cu cu gi jomo.
58011016	Njèh cén, temé bɔɔ̀n lé naá seêr te lɔɔ́ mé né dé ké jomò huɔɔ́m yɔgɔ́. À né dé seèn ké te vulúu. Càŋ ye bɔ́ júée nyí né Càŋ bɔɔ̀n dé cî, wa fegùlì nyí mé njéh sìè ndé ŋgwéh ma. Lòù sam, nyí lé naá giì bɔ́ lɔɔ́ dé feê nyegé kwaá.
58011017	Càŋ lɔ naâ Abrahâm ceéh, ye bú a, wò sèmè haá nde né nyí ŋuna yeè Isâk ma. Abrahâm lɔ naâ bú ménâ haá. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Ndéb Càŋ felè Isâk lɔ né mene Abrahâm lè, mé njéh mene à lɔ kɔ cegé naâ Càŋ feh keêh, ye bú a: sèmè mé gɔndɔŋ huaân sâ hên ma.
58011018	Sâ, mé Isâk sâ, Càŋ lé naá giì Abrahâm tieè tueé kwaá, ye bú a: bɔ̀ ndùté ndùtù yeè ndeè ŋar nde né bú ma.
58011019	Sâ Abrahâm né gi terreb Càŋ teèn ŋgweé keéh, ye Càŋ nde né Isâk te cio nyimé komo ndɔ. Abrahâm kwa cu baá-re kú-nyimé seèn Isâk faá nuaá mé yuoô dòù nɔ.
58011020	Mé Isâk lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. À lɔ naâ Jakɔ̂b bɔ̂ Esayû kulú. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
58011021	Mé Jakɔ̂b lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. À yeé nde aá kuú, à lé naâ cùgò sieé, à komo njebá teèn, à die Càŋ, à kulu bɔ̀ ŋunà Josêf. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
58011022	Mé Josêf lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Cu mé bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà lɔ nde ké Ejíptò yuo, à lɔ naá giì njolò ŋené kwaá, à tueé kwaá bɔ́ toò te à nde ye kuú. À tueé kwaá bɔ́ njií mé bɔ́ nde né mé kuú seèn bɔɔ́ ndɔ. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
58011023	Mé bɔ̀ tele Músì lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ́ yeé ŋar aá Músì, bɔ́ sie leér sɔɔ́ bú weéh tagár. Bɔ́ né sòn mgbè Ejíptò ŋgeén; veéh bɔ́ sìè ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé naâ ŋené, ye huaán né lom yàgà huɔɔ́m dé gècên. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
58011024	Mé Músì nùà njèh lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Músì yeé kula baá, à lé naâ yilí ndù Farɔ̂ŋ yoòr huar sɔm. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
58011025	À lé naâ cio ŋgɔɔ́n, ye mɔ bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ ŋene né gèr dɔɔ́ŋ, huɔm kela né cí mé wɔ́ŋ vɔgɔ̂; wa lòù sam, wɔ́ŋ vɔgɔ̂ hèllè né wàn ma.
58011026	Ye, gèr felè Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ ŋenê huɔm kela né nyí kɔɔ́ mé ŋgùlù Ejíptò yieê. Lòù sam, à lé njolo ke njií naâ mé sàgà dé ké toò.
58011027	Temé lɔ naâ mgbè Ejíptò mé bú ŋaá. Mé njéh mene, à vèh ŋgwéh, à kɔ lom te tàbè sâ yuoò. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Lòù sam, temé seèn né lom yoòr Càŋ tég; den lom beè seèn faá à né bú mé njolo ŋené njií nɔ.
58011028	À lɔ naâ bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà Páskà si kwaá, ye bɔ́ a: lóró kwá bèlè húɔ́m te hin te hin, te cìlì Càŋ mé wula yeé nùàr doô ŋene ménâ, à bɔ̀ ndoón beè bɔ̀ Iserálà bɔ̀ wúlá cú ma. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
58011029	Mé bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ́ lɔ naâ ndèndèŋ nòmò koô faá njèh mbaâ nɔ sela. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Càŋ lɔ naâ nòmò sâ kèb cén lu njií, te bɔ́ kela sa. Bɔ́ nòmò sâ yilá né nòmò bèlè. Bɔ̀ Ejíptò bɔ̀ yeé nde aá ménâ sela ke, bɔ́ kum le dé bɔɔ̀n dùà.
58011030	Mé bɔ̀gɔ̀ Jerikò lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà lɔ naâ bú cieé téhbeh jege yɔŋ, à ŋem die. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
58011031	Mé Rahâb sɔrmbe lɔ naâ ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ mbeí lɔ kèì cén kú gí ná ŋgwêh. Lɔ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Lòù sam, à lɔ naâ dé seèn bɔ̀ no Càŋ ke nyegé. Bɔ̀ mbeí ŋgeén seér sòn Càŋ lòù.
58011032	Sâ belà, mè nde né-re tueé gií à. Cu né he? Mè jɔ̀gɔ̀ tueé nde né dé Jedeɔ̂ŋ wa, dé Barâk wa, dé Saámsɔ̀ŋ wa, dé Jeftê wa, dé Davîd wa, dé Samuel wa, dé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ wa?
58011033	Bɔ́ lɔ naâ lò déì mé taáb lieé yɔgɔ́, bɔ́ lɔ bɔ́ lie yɔgɔ́ naâ mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî. Bɔ́ né njèh te ceér-e te ceér-e bɔɔ́ yií. Njií mé Càŋ lɔ ye bɔ́ nde né beè nyî kwa dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ lɔ naâ kwa gií. Bɔ́ né gélɔ̂g sòn mé be sie;
58011034	bɔ́ né we tarê mé be sie nyimé; gwaga taâb né yoòr bɔɔ̀n luaré kelá, né doó sue ndeé; bɔ́ lé naá giì bɔ̀ yuyuaâ bɔ̀, bɔ́ ŋa seér cu bɔ̀ tetaré bɔ̀; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kwaá-taâb ŋaá seér, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kìn mé taáb yieé.
58011035	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lɔ naá giì kuú, bɔ̀ déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n lɔ naâ te cio komo yuo cuú, bɔ̀ véh bɔɔ̀n lɔ naâ bɔ́ làŋ kwa cuú. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ naá giì mé temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî.
