Bɔ̀ déì lɔ naâ mé gèr teèn ŋené kuú ndɔ. Bɔ́ lɔ ye bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ a: mɔ bɔ́ Càŋ ŋgɔ́n ŋgwéh wa, bɔ́ nde né bɔ́ wulá ma. Mé njéh mene, bɔ́ lɔ Càŋ ŋgɔ́n ná ŋgwêh; ye lòù sam, bɔ́ né kɔɔ́ ye bɔ́ nde né lè cio komo yuo, bɔ́ kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà ma.
58011036	Séb né bɔ̀ déì yoòr sue, núr né bɔ́ yoòr bɔgɔ́. Bɔ̀ déì né te yuiî jaá yilá, bɔ́ né bɔ́ ké gwà cibì jɔgɔ́ silí njií.
58011037	Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ déì mé taá tɔbé wulá; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ déì mé bòù sèsèg segé tená; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ déì lòù kɔré wulá; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ déì bèh kàn mé bèh kân kwɔgɔ́ njií. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ né mé par mbieè yoòr su gɔ; saám né bɔ́ seé weh, bɔ́ né bɔ́ teèn bunó yií. Bɔ́ lɔ naâ gèr mé gècên mene ŋené.
58011038	Bɔ́ né yeya yɔŋ gɔ, bɔ́ né te tòre yɔŋ gɔ ndɔ. Bɔ̀ déì né te gbaŋe ndeé, bɔ́ cer teèn; bɔ̀ déì dòù lùgò. Mé gècên mene wɔ́ŋ sé bɔ̀ nùà hên sìè kòmò ná ŋgwêh bɔ̀n; à wúlú ŋgwéh.
58011039	Càŋ né mene tueé ye, bɔ̀ nùà hên né lom temé cén yoòr nyî kwaá njií, mé njéh mene bɔ́ lé ndéb Càŋ sâ kwà ná ŋgwêh.
58011040	À lɔ gwàn ná ŋgwêh mé ndéb seèn mboón, mé béh bɔ́ kɔɔ́ sam. Ye huɔm kela né mé ndeè mboón seér ká te nàm beèh ma.
58012001	Dé beèh né baga; dàm bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lɔ naá giì temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ né béh beè kaáŋ sie, te béh ŋene weh beè bɔɔ̀n, yo taré béh. Sâ njií mé nde né gò beèh ki, béh gè lòm mé ceér seèn nɔɔ́ŋ. Mɔ sam, veên né cící kela, à béh gá ndé ŋgwéh. Béh té doò hómó, yoòr beèh né cí.
58012002	Béh lèmè lòm mé Yeésò. Temé beèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn; toò bɔ̂ jomo gi né bú ndɔ. À lé naâ cio ké te toû yoló, à gèh cio fegùlì hèllè dùlà ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, ye vɔ́gɔ́-temé nyî né ter, wa Càŋ nde né nyí haá ma. Kènê à baá ké teèn kwarè kɔgɔ Càŋ, à né te be gaâ seèn den den.
58012003	Bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ kè njí ke bú ye. Bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ lé naâ bú gèr feh keéh; mé njéh mene à lé naâ yoló. Bí yóló ménâ ndɔ, bí té gùr.
58012004	Bèh lɔ mé bí bɔ̀ veên né lege dɔɔ́ŋ, nuaá mé lɔ naâ teèn kuú le ŋgweé teèn sam. Sâ bí té gùr.
58012005	Bí kɔ́ cú, ye Càŋ né bí ndɔgɔ́ wa? À mé bí tueé né faá tele tueé njií né mé ŋuna seèn nɔ, ye: Huaán mò, mɔ Nùà Dueè né wò njèh mé gèr mene feh, ŋgwé lòm bú be fà. À né mene wò lòù nde, té gùr ndɔ.
58012006	Né môn: Càŋ njèh mé núr mene feh yeé bɔ̀ yíé-temé bɔ̀ seèn. Nuaá mé Càŋ kɔ né ye hên baá ŋuna nyî dɔɔ́ŋ, à né yeé bú ménâ lobo.»
58012007	Bí gèr yolo né dé njèh maân. Càŋ mé njéh feh keéh né ye, bí né bɔ̀ ŋuna nyî. Huaán mé tele bú lòbò bèh né teèn wa?
58012008	Mɔ bí gèr beè Càŋ ŋéné ŋgwéh, faá huaán ŋene yeé beè teleè nɔ, sâ bí bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ sam. Sâ bí né bɔ̀ huaán kùkùn.
58012009	Wanɔɔ́ŋ béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ tele beèh dé ká doô né yeé béh seé mé gèr mene feh, béh né sòn bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé; sé tagá Tele beèh ké te vulúu wa? Mè tueé bí, béh ŋgwé kélá sòn dé seèn, te béh kwa yɔ̀ŋ.
58012010	Bɔ̀ tele beèh dé ká doô feh tena weh yeé béh gèr lòù; bɔ́ né mé béh faá bɔ́ gwaán nê nɔ bɔɔ́ keéh. Dé Càŋ, à mé gèr nyegé seér né béh lòù, ye te béh yuo ŋagásé faá nyí nɔ.
58012011	Dé yulâ, mɔ gèr kwa aá nùàr, né yeé yulá. Nùàr cu sâ túé ndé ŋgwéh ye nyegé seér né nyí lòù. Kɔ nde kela sa baá, nùàr nde ye ŋené kɔɔ́, ye kàmbér lé nyegé seér naâ nyí lòù wa. Te dene seèn nde ye kweéh seér, temé die bú lè ndɔ.
58012012	Sâ mɔ né mân, bí tòrò be torò, bí cou nyegé gule ndɔ,
58012013	bí bèlè lòm ceér dé dilî, te gule mé né sɔgɔ dɔɔ́ŋ lòù mbɔ̀gɔ̀ sér cú, à taré seér lòù.
58012014	Bí lègè lòm tég, te dɔlê cer mgbè lètenè biì mé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ. Bí den lom jolosé ndɔ. Mɔ sam, nùàr a, té ndèm mbaá kwá kú, ye nyí nde né Càŋ Dueè mé njolo ŋené.
58012015	Mɔ bí bagasé kè nyégé ŋgwéh, nuaré déì nde né fùgò beè Càŋ liím. Bí né lom bagasé ke nyegé, te cén déì lètenè biì nyure veên ŋá cú, à jin bɔ̀ mbaábɔn.
58012016	Bí té njolo cì, te nuaré déì lètenè biì yàgà ndé cú, à bɔ̀ njèh jejoloò faá Esayû nɔ sèb cú ndɔ. Esayû lɔ naâ ménâ, à lɔ naâ dene beì seèn yoòr go sɔm; lɔ naâ mé yáb;
58012017	te ká jomo à nde ye gwaán den, ye tele a, bei né nyí, kúlú nyí kulù; tele lé naâ berɔ́ŋ ndɔ. À né mene mé yímé mene yueé fɔɔ́n, ceér mé à nde cu né kweéh seér lé teèn ná cû. Ŋgweéh bí né gi ménâ kɔɔ́ mà.
58012018	Bí kwarè tòr mé bɔ́ sé naâ mé be kema sam. Bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà lɔ naâ tà-kpù weè ké te tòr Sinayî ŋené, mé mgbátág cibî teèn líér, léláŋ fu tarê.
58012019	Tàŋ lé naâ ké teèn mbamé, mé hueh nùàr mene. Mɔ bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà baá hueh doô ŋgweé, njií ye bɔ́ a, kú lòm mé veéh dé kuû. Bɔ́ né Càŋ bɔŋ, ye bú a: Té mé béh ménâ túé njí cû.»
58012020	Lòù sam, hueh doô lé naá loôm mé gècên mene tueé taré, ye bɔ́ a: Né mene nùàr, né mene nyam, njií mé cor kema tòr hên dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ tɔ̀bè wúlá sɔ̀m bú tɔbè ma.
58012021	Lé naá loôm bɔ́ taré yɔgɔ́ dé gècên. Músì mé feh seèn lé naá giì môn tueé, ye: Baá nyí yoòr hemé; veéh baá nyí lòù bené seér ma.
58012022	Dé biì môn sam, bí né dé biì te tòr dé Siyɔ̂ŋ, bèh mé lɔɔ́ Càŋ làŋ né teèn: né Jerusalem dé ké te vulúu; bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ né lom teèn mgbɔ́ŋ.
58012023	Bí bɔ̀ ndoón den bilí né kɔɔ́, bí né kùrmò juɔbé. Yilí bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ né gi ter te mvù Càŋe nyagá den. Bí baá gi dé biì ká yoòr Càŋ; ju felè nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ tena nde né bú. Bí bɔ̀ càŋ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ mé baá gi tê den né kɔɔ́.
58012024	Bí baá ká yoòr Yeésò. Càŋ lé ŋgɔ̀ŋ feê kɔɔ́ naâ mé bú. Húɔ́m seèn bí yuɔb den né kɔɔ́. Ŋgulí kela né cí mé húɔ́m Ábèl.
58012025	Sâ bí kè keè, bí té sòn nuaá mé né bí tie ndɔgɔ́ doô bèrɔ̀ŋ, wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ lɔ naâ tie duagá, bɔ́ berɔ́ŋ sòn nuaá mé né bɔ́ ká te tàbè tueé, bɔ́ ŋene gèr mé njéh. Sâ mɔ béh né sòn nuaá mé tueé né dé ké te vulúu ŋgeén, sâ béh nde né te ju mvelé yuo wa?
58012026	Lɔ sâ hueh seèn lɔ naá giì tàbè jilí. À né cu béh déì tueé kwaá ndɔ, ye nyí nde cu né tàbè mbei cén jilí, wa dé sâ tàbè kɔɔ́ jìlì lòm ndé cú, jilí bilí nde aá mé vulú mene ma.
58012027	Dé mé à tueé né ye mbei cén” hên, feh kwaá gi aá, ye bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lé si giì naâ dɔɔ́ŋ nde né loù sâ jilí nyoló gií, te bɔ̀ dé ndeèr ndeè ter le lom kɔɔ́.
58012028	Sâ béh vrà lòm Càŋ mé terreb. Lòù sam, à béh haá né lò mé dé seèn jìlì nyì ndé ŋgwéh. Béh sén yí lòm bú teèn faá à gwaán nê nɔ, béh léb toò seèn leèb, béh veéh bilí bú.
58012029	Mè tueé bí, Càŋ beèh né lom we mé ŋgie yeé njèh dé mvûŋ.
58013001	Bí gwàn kú dèn lètenè biì cu dɔɔ́ŋ lòù.
58013002	Bí kɔ gi ndɔ, ye bí nde né bɔ̀ kìn sie nyegé ma. Bɔ̀ déì lɔ bɔɔ́ naâ ménâ, bɔ́ sie nyegé keéh bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ teèn, bɔ́ kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye né bɔ́.
58013003	Bí mùnò ká bɔ̀ gwà cibì bɔ̀ munò, te den faá bí bɔ́ né ké gwà cibì sâ dɔɔ́ŋ nɔ. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ́ né bɔ́ gèr feh keéh, bí té bɔ́ nyèn, te den faá bɔ́ gèr sâ feh keéh né bí bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
58013004	Gwɔ̀m a dèn lòm jolosé beè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ. Si bɔ̂ veèh a, té gwɔ̀m cùm; dé kàn a, dèn lòm kɔ́bè sâ. Mɔ sam, Càŋ nde né ju felè bɔ̀ cùm-gwɔ̀m bɔ̀ tená, à tena ju felè bɔ̀ ndé-yàgà bɔ̀ ndɔ.
58013005	Kàgàlɔ̀ŋ a, té bí kɔgɔ kàgà. Njií mé né beè biì ŋené yuo kelâ dɔɔ́ŋ, yo a, táré sér bí mé njéh lòù. Lòù sam, Càŋ ye nyí wò mé huún kwá lɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh ma, wa nyí wò vú lɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
58013006	Mɔ né mân, béh gwaán njií nde né ké ter mé temé cén ye: Gàm mò né Nùà Dueè, mè njeré déì vèh ndé ŋgwéh. Nuaré déì mè njeré déì bɔ́ kòmò ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.»
58013007	Bí té bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ biì dé léí toò nyèn; ŋgòr Càŋ ké lètenè biì lé seé naâ bɔ́. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé kuú giì naâ te ceér Càŋe. Bí kè wèh dene bɔɔ̀n, bí kwaá njií temé cén yoòr Càŋ ménâ ndɔ.
58013008	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Yeésò Kristò né den cu dɔɔ́ŋ kèì cén: à né léílé, à né lan, à nde den nde né ménâ kèì cén ndɔ.
58013009	Bí kè nyégé bagasé, wanɔɔ́ŋ bí nde né leér le. Lòù sam, bɔ̀ nuaré déì baá bɔ̀ njèh fefeê lètenè biì feh yií. Huɔm kela né mé temé beèh sagár seér mé fùgò Càŋ, te yo taré nyegé béh tarè. Dèn ŋgwéh dé tòù yâb. Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né tòù yâb hèllè genné seér dɔɔ́ŋ né yeé lòù mvuaán yuo kelá.
58013010	Béh né mé kɔ sèmè dé beèh teèn. Bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè mé bɔɔ́ yeé seé te gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ Jûf, sèmè teèn yíé ndé ŋgwéh, bɔ́ mé ceér sam.
58013011	Ŋgàŋ sèmè bɔ̀ Jûf dé koô né yeé te mɔ̀ dé bɔɔ̀n yilá, à beè yila yeé mé húɔ́m nyaàm, à nde bɔ̀ nùàr veên yoòr mé njéh semé sɔm. Jomo sâ bɔ́ jɔgɔ weh komó nyam hèllè, bɔ́ nde ŋgie njií ké jomo lɔɔ̂.
58013012	Né dé cî mé Yeésò lé nde kuú naâ ké jomo lɔɔ̂. À lé kuú naâ ye te nyí bɔ̀ nùàr sené seér mé húɔ́m dé nyî nùà njèh.
58013013	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh hin gi ké jomo lɔɔ̂ yoòr seèn, béh bɔ́ nde gulí kuú ké sâ dɔɔ́ŋ.
58013014	Lòù sam, lɔɔ́ beèh dé kèì cên ká te wɔ̂ŋ sam, béh fɔɔ́n seér né lɔɔ́ dé ké toò.
58013015	Sâ, béh té sòn mé Càŋ seên dù. Sòn sèmè dé beèh né cí, né mé njua Yeésò. Sâ tueé né ye: béh sén bèh yilí Yeésò toò bɔ̀ nùàr mé sòn beèh nùà njèh.
58013016	Bí té bagaà bɔɔ̂ nyèn, bí gàm kú lètenè biì gaàm. Sâ né gèh sèmè mé né Càŋ yoòr huɔɔ́m dé gècên ndɔ.
58013017	Bí ŋgwé sòn bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ biì ŋgweè, bí dèn bèh ka bɔɔ̀n. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lɔ́m felè biì cèr ŋgwéh, ye Càŋ nde né mé bɔ́ bieé le. Mɔ bí né sòn bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé, sâ bɔ́ nde né seé bɔɔ̀n mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé mene bɔɔ́. Mɔ sam, bɔ́ sé bɔɔ́ né seé mé yúlá-temé mene. Á sâ, nde né bí gam cuú wa?
58013018	Bí dùà dèn Càŋ felè beèh cu dɔɔ́ŋ. Béh kɔ gi aá kèn, ye dé beèh, temé beèh né lè die. Lòù sam, béh gwaán lom né ye dene beèh a, húɔ́m gí te njèh dɔɔ́ŋ lòù.
58013019	Mè né bí dua, kúkùr biì, bí dùà lòm Càŋ kókoó, ye bú a, kwá mè cu cu ké yoòr biì wágácén ma.
58013020	Càŋ mé yuɔb yeé nùàr dɔlê komo sɔm aá Fehtoò beèh Yeésò te cio kèn. À Nùà mbieè nùà njèh yuo né mé cio bú sâ. Càŋ ŋgɔ̀ŋ dé kèì cên jegé né mé húɔ́m seèn ndɔ.
58013021	Càŋ yùɔ̀b nùàr a, nyén kwá bí ŋgulísé, te bí bɔɔ́ faá à gwaán nê nɔ. Bú a, sɔ̀m kêh be seê seèn yoòr beèh mé Yeésò Kristò, te béh bɔɔ́ njií mé né bú yoòr huɔɔ́m. Kùsèm terreb Yeésò Kristò a, sùmù yùò kélá dèn cie dé nyèmà mé nyèmà. È môn.
58013022	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí té ndè, mè bí hên nyagá kuú né ye te yo taré bí tarè; mè nyagá lom né tibísé ndɔ.
58013023	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bɔ́ sɔm aá mbeí beèh Timotê gwà cibì kèn. Mɔ à waà né jɔ̀gɔ̀, sâ mɔ mè baá ké yoòr biì ndeê, béh bú wa ndeè né kɔɔ́.
58013024	Bí bíé kéh mè bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ gwà Càŋ mé bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ ké sâ dɔɔ́ŋ. Bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ mé né bɔ̀ Italî bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ ye bíé kéh bí ndɔ.
58013025	Húɔ́m-temé Càŋ a, ká sìè gí bí beè dɔɔ́ŋ.
59001001	Né mè Jâk nyagá né kɔɔ́. Mè né nùà seê Càŋ bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò. Mè nyagá njií né mé bí bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ mé né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ŋellé ndeé, mè né bí bieé.
59001002	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ bí baá mene bɔ̀ dàm gèr feh hihiné ŋené, bí sàmè sér mé njéh lòù;
59001003	bí kɔ né ye, mɔ bí né temé yoòr Càŋ tég kwaá njií, gèr né mene bí jilí, sâ feh né bí njèh yolô.
59001004	Mɔ bí baá yoló, bí yóló ŋágá lòm njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ, te gècên biì yieé lom mé gùm mene, veên déì yoòr biì ŋéné cú, bí den lom bɔ̀ jéjég bɔ̀ sâ.
59001005	Mɔ lètenè biì lo né nuaré déì saám, bú a, yúé njí mé Càŋ, à nde né bú ceér feh; à né Càŋ kɔ́-jere felè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ, à haá yeé mé temé cén.
59001006	Njèh cén, kɔ nùà bú sâ a, dùà lòm bú mé temé seèn mene ndɔ, à té lòù sàn sér. Mɔ sam, nùà saân den né faá mvùɔ̀b nòmò nɔ; fu sé yeé baá kobó, nde né mé bú dùà dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔré yɔŋ.
59001007	Mɔ à né gèh nùà dé sâ, bú a, té ndèm mbaá kwá kú, ye nyí nde né njeré déì beè Càŋ kwa ndɔ;
59001008	bú a, kɔ́ sér lòù, ye nyí né nùà sòn fà, nyí né táfùr mbaá ma.
59001009	Nùà saâm mé né beè Yeésò Kristò a, té njeré déì nyàmè; bú a, sàmè sér lòù, ye ŋgúlú dé nyî né beè Càŋ ma.
59001010	Mé nùà lieê mene, bú a, sàmè táré mé ŋgúlú dé beè Càŋ ménâ ndɔ. Bú a, kɔ́ɔ ye, dé kènê nyí nde né lòù jieé seér, nyí nde cu né faá mvue nyurè nɔ yuaá yuo.
59001011	Mɔ lou komo yuoó aá gè bà, nde né baá taré, à bɔgɔ́ ŋema sɔm nyure dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ̀ mvue yua yuo gi, nòmò yàgà bɔɔ̀n nyimé yuo gi ndɔ. Nùà lieê né ménâ, à nde né lètenè bɔ̀ njèh seèn môn nyimé yuo.
59001012	Nuaá mé gèr jilí mene bú naàn, mɔ à né yoló, à nde né samésé den. Lòù sam, à nde né yɔ̀ŋ ndeèr jomo sâ kwa. Né sàgà mé Càŋ lé naâ tueé kwaá, ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né nyí gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, nyí nde né mé bɔ́ haá.
59001013	Mɔ veên baá nuaré déì taáb, bú a, té Càŋ yoòr kú, à té túé ye, Càŋ tab né nyí kɔɔ́. Mè tueé bí, veên Càŋ sìè kòmò bèh, Càŋ nùàr mé veên táb bèh ndɔ.
59001014	Tuaá mé né yoòr nùàr nderé né nùàr kɔɔ́, né bú soób, ye te à sela veên.
59001015	Tuaá hèllè sé yeé baá kurú, veên ŋar. Veên sé yeé baá yaám, cio ŋar ndɔ.
59001016	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, temé mò né yoòr biì, bí té feh biì mbaá bèlè kú.
59001017	Bɔ̀ njèh dé bebagaà yuo gi né ké te vulúu beè Càŋ nùà njèh. Lou bɔ̂ weéh mé bɔ̀ mbentò ké te vulúu dɔɔ́ŋ lé si giì naâ bú. À dé seèn kwéh sér bèh, à faá lou nɔ yílá lèr bèh, à béh te cibi faá lou nɔ sì lɔ́ ŋgwéh.
59001018	À béh yɔ̀ŋ haá seér yeé kɔɔ́, à béh haá lom né mé kàgà-ndòn seèn ndɔ. À lé béh yɔ̀ŋ sâ haá keéh naâ te ŋgòr gècên-e, ye te béh yuo kela lɔgɔ̂ mé yɔ̀ŋ sâ kɔɔ́, béh den felè bɔ̀ njií mé nyí lé naá giì si dɔɔ́ŋ.
59001019	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, temé mò né yoòr biì, bí mùnò dèn ŋgòr hên munò. Sâ tueé né ye: mɔ bɔ́ né tueé, nùà kàn a, félá kɔ́r gí dɔɔ́ŋ. Njèh cén, bú a, tée wúwágá túé ye; temé a, té bú wúwágá ŋá ndɔ.
59001020	Mɔ sam, nùà fúrú-temê njèh didilî beè Càŋ bɔ́ húɔ́m ndé ŋgwéh.
59001021	Bí gè mé ceér jéré-temé lè biì, bí nyénné sér veên lòù. Bí gwaán yebbé seér ŋgòr Càŋ mé Càŋ dobo kwaá né lè biì doô; dé sâ yili sɔm seér nde né bí kɔɔ́.
59001022	Bí té ŋgòr Càŋ mbaá ŋgwé fàŋ njí, kɔ bí bɔɔ́ seér faá ŋgòr Càŋ tueé nê nɔ, sâ ye. Mɔ sam, sâ bí né feh biì mé be biì bele.
59001023	Mè tueé bí, nuaá mé né ŋgòr Càŋ ŋgweé, à faá ŋgòr Càŋ tueé nê nɔ bɔ́ ŋgwéh, felá né nuaá mé la naâ daregà ke.
59001024	À yeé ŋene nyegé gi aá njolo seèn teèn bagasé, à kwaá njií doó, à fɔɔ́n gò seèn; tètèì sam à nyen njií cu aá gèh dé mé njolo seèn hèllè la naâ.
59001025	Dé nuaá mé né sóú Càŋ ŋené kɔɔ́, môn sam, à dé seèn sóú mbaá ŋgwé njí ŋgwéh, à bú nyèn ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, sóú sâ né sóú jéjêg mé né nùàr te veên huaár sɔm. À né temé teèn kwaá njií, à né faá tueé nê nɔ bɔɔ́ ndɔ. Dé seèn Càŋ nde né bú mé seé seèn kulú.
59001026	Mɔ nuaré déì né munó ye nyí né nùà Càŋ, mé à leba sìè ŋgwéh, sâ à né feh seèn bele, à Càŋ dua kuú né dé lòù.
59001027	Ceér Càŋ duaà mé né Càŋ yoòr huɔɔ́m tueé né dé seèn ye: kɔ nùàr né bɔ̀ huaán kû mé bɔ̀ ma kû te gèr-e sie nyegé, sâ ye; kɔ à né be te seé wɔ́ŋe sɔm, te veên bú yoòr jèrè ndé cú, sâ ye ndɔ. Tele beèh Càŋ gwaán kela né cí.
59002001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né dé biì temé yoòr Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò Nùà Sùsùm kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, bí té bɔ̀ nùàr lòù bàlè.
59002002	Sâ jue né, merré déì nuaré déì bɔ̂ mbeí ndeè naâ te mɔ̀gɔ̀ biì yilá ndeé, déì né nùà sèsàm, à né mé bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ sèsàm yoòr mé lɔ̀ŋ sèsàm beè ndɔ; déì né dé seèn nùà saâm, mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ tándárè mân yoòr.
59002003	Bɔ́ fà dɔɔ́ŋ yeé waà baá, bí sumú weh nùà sèsàm dé seèn lòù, bí feh bú kɔgɔ sùsùm, ye bú a: ndê dèn dé yeè ká teèn. Bí né nùà saâm dé seèn ter ŋgaáŋ kwaá den; mɔ sam bí ye bú a: dèn ndé dé seèn ka biì te bàŋ tabe.
59002004	Ŋgweéh sâ bí geí né nùàr lòù wa? Ŋgweéh sâ ndìèm veên lè biì doô tena né ju ménâ kɔɔ́ mà.
59002005	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, temé mò né yoòr biì, bí félá nyégé bagasé, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, Càŋ ká lè wɔ́ŋe balé weh seér né bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀, ye te bɔ́ kwaá yam njií gi temé yoòr nyî, bɔ́ yila Lò nyî faá nyí lé naâ tueé kwaá nɔ: sâ à lé ye bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gwaán né nyí dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né Lò nyî yilá.
59002006	Mɔ Càŋ né dé seèn ménâ tueé, bí bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ lòù seb seér né dé keì wa? Ŋgweéh bɔ̀ sèsàm bɔ̀ hèllè bí gèr feh keéh yeé kɔɔ́ wa? Ŋgweéh bɔ́ bí toò juù njií yeé kɔɔ́ wa?
59002007	Yilí nyɔ́gɔ̀r mé né yoòr biì doô, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ beéh yeé kɔɔ́ ndɔ mà.
59002008	Mɔ bí né sóú dé koô mé lé yuoó naâ sònò Nùà Dueè jolo, sâ bí bɔɔ́ yií né teèn. Te mvù Càŋe né môn nyagá den, ye: Gwàn mbeí yeè faá wò gwaán né ŋgàŋ yoòr yeè nɔ.»
59002009	Mɔ bí ménâ bɔ́ ŋgwéh, bí né seér nùàr lòù balé, sâ bí kwa né sóú, bí sela né veên; á sâ, ju nde né bí sie ndɔ.
59002010	Lòù sam, nuaá mé kwa baá njolo sóù cén kwa bilí né mé bɔ̀ dé jomò mene.
59002011	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, nuaá mé lé yiín naâ yàgà kuû doô, yiín cu né feh wulâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Mɔ né mân, nuaá mé yàgà kú ŋgwéh, wula seér né dé seèn feh, kum né sóú.
59002012	Mè tueé bí, njií mé bí né gi tueé, mé bí né bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, sóú mé nde né béh te veéne huaár sɔm doô nde gi né bí ju teèn bele laré.
59002013	Loù sâ jere Càŋ mé nuaré déì sìè ndé ŋgwéh faá jere lé nùà sâ mé mbeí sìè ná ŋgwêh nɔ. Dé bɔ̀ kɔ́-jere bɔ̀, loù sà bɔ́ nde né ju feém.
59002014	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, hên mɔ nuaré déì tueé lom né mé sòn, ye nyí né temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií, à njií mé Càŋ tueé nê bɔ́ ŋgwéh, sâ né njeré déì gam wa? Gèh temé kwaá njiî bú sâ nde né bú yili sɔm ndɔ wa?
59002015	Mè jue né merré déì cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̂ yáb né yeé mbeí saám,
59002016	bí né bú tueé seér, ye bú a: ndé bá-re baga, dùlù a, té wò dɔ́lé; cùè a, té wò sìè ndɔ. Mɔ njií mé né bú yɔgɔ́ sâ, bí bú há ŋgwéh, sâ léláŋ ŋgòr biì nde né bú gam wa?
59002017	Né kèì cén mé temé nùàr ndɔ: mɔ nuaré déì né temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií, à seé bɔ́ ŋgwéh, sâ temé kwaá njiî seèn sâ né komó temê.
59002018	Mɔ nuaré déì ye mè a: mè bɔɔ́ né dé mò seé, nyí kwaá njií né dé nyî temé yoòr Càŋ ma, mɔ à tueé né ménâ, sâ mè nde né bieé ye bú a: Jɔ̀gɔ̀ fèh ke mè ndândaà temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî, mé seé teèn yílá ŋgwéh sâ, te mè feh keéh bú temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî, mè feh keéh bú mé seé mò.
59002019	Ŋgweéh wò né gi kɔɔ́ ye, Càŋ gi cegé né cén mà. Wò kɔ yií né teèn. Bɔ̀ tándulu né taré môn kɔɔ́ ndɔ, bɔ́ toò seèn ndelé yeé dé cî!
59002020	Kɔ̀cɔ̀, tándugó! Kè, ndândaà temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî mé seé teèn yílá ŋgwéh, né temé kuû. Kɔ bɔ́ né gi fà dɔɔ́ŋ, sâ ye. Kwá mè feh wò.
59002021	Ŋgweéh Abrahâm, tele beèh dé koô, lé nùà gècên beè Càŋ ŋaà naâ mé seé wa? À lé naâ ŋuna seèn Isâk toò Càŋ semé njií.
59002022	Kènê wò ŋene kɔ baá kèn, ye temé seèn yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî, bɔ̂ seé seèn lé naá giì bècénè fà dɔɔ́ŋ, te temé seèn yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî mboón ye mé seé seèn.
59002023	Te yuo faá bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né te mvù Càŋe nɔ, ye: Abrahâm lé naâ temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií; Càŋ lé bú nùà dilî yilá naâ mé njéh.» À lé bú mbeí seèn yilá naâ dé cî ndɔ.
59002024	Sâ, bí ŋéné kɔ́ bá ŋenè, ye Càŋ nùàr nùà dilî beè seèn yilá né mé temé yoòr seèn kwaá njiî bɔ̂ seé fà dɔɔ́ŋ ma.
59002025	Lé naá cuù mé Rahâb sɔrmbe ménâ ndɔ: Càŋ lé bú nùà dilî beè seèn yilá naâ mé seé gècên seèn: bɔ̀ tebé bɔ̀ déì lé yuoó naâ lètenè bɔ̀ Jûf, bɔ́ waà, à sie nyegé bɔ́, à né bɔ́ gam. Bɔ́ yeé baá mé gò, à feh bɔ́ ceér dé hiîn, te bɔ́ beè yílá cú.
59002026	Den né faá yo nùàr nɔ; mɔ cúcuí nùàr yuo aá, yo ŋa ká jomo komó. Né mé temé yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî ménâ ndɔ, mɔ seé teèn yílá ŋgwéh, sâ né komó temê.
59003001	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí té mgbɔ́ŋ mbaá mèrrè dèn, ye bí nde gi né bɔ̀ fèh-njèh bɔ̀ ŋaá. Mè tueé bí, béh bɔ̀ fèh-njèh bɔ̀ sâ, ju nde né felè beèh teèn; ju dé beèh taré kela nde né kɔɔ́ mé ju dé bɔ̀ nùàr.
59003002	Lòù sam, béh dɔɔ́ŋ, béh né gi kèkènè bɔ̀ veên hihiné bɔɔ́ laré. Mɔ nùàr sòn mbaá túé sábé njí ŋgwéh, sâ nùà gècên jéjég né bú, à nde né gùm seèn sie kɔɔ́.
59003003	Béh nyam tébágàr lɔ̀ŋ sònò yií yeé dé cî, ye te bɔ́ ŋgweé sòn beèh ŋgweè, te béh sie komo gùm bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ mé njéh.
59003004	Déì né cu bàtô; mé hàm seèn mene dɔɔ́ŋ, támbên pìlì mân lemé gɔ né mé bú kɔɔ́. Bɔ̀ fu tetarê né mene bàtô velá mgbɔmé yɔgɔ́, mé njéh mene, mɔ nùà fár-bàtô ye nyí gwaán né kàn mé kán ndeê, à nde né tàŋèr bàtô hèllè bèh sâ mé njéh pilí lemé njií.
59003005	Mé leba né yeé ménâ ndɔ; támbên gà mé jie kela né yoòr nùàr kɔɔ́ né bú. Mé njéh mene, à bɔ̀ gègeér ŋgòr tueé yegé komo gi né kɔɔ́. Déì né cu we. Mɔ támbên bɔgɔ́ weè mân ŋaga baá, à nde né gùm ndèndèŋ hobô dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgie sɔm.
59003006	Leba né môn, à né faá we nɔ, dàm bɔ̀ veên ká lè wɔ́ŋe dɔɔ́ŋ bilí gi né teèn, à gùm nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ beéh yeé kɔɔ́. Mɔ à baá sela, à nde né gùm nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ beè ŋɔ sie, à ŋgie sɔm bú. Lòù sam, we bú sâ yuo den né tuar te cio.
59003007	Nùàr né gi bɔ̀ kèkènè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ sie komo, à tu bɔ́: bɔ̀ nyam o, bɔ̀ non o, bɔ̀ sàb mé bɔ̀ ŋgò o, dɔɔ́ŋ nùàr né gi bɔ́ sie komo.
59003008	Dé lebà môn sam: bèh lɔ mé naâ-naà, nuaá mé né leba sie komo née teèn sam ye. Leba né lom gùr veên, nùàr bú sìè kòmò bèh; teèn gɔbé den lom né léláŋ ndìèm.
59003009	Mé leba cên sâ, béh Tele beèh Càŋ seén né mé njéh; bɔ̀ nùàr mé Càŋ me kwaá né faá sòn seèn nɔ, béh bɔ́ duagá cu né mé njéh ndɔ.
59003010	Béh vra né mé sòn cên sâ, béh duagá cu mé sòn cên sâ ndɔ. Kɔ̀cɔ̀ bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí lélɔɔ̀,
59003011	wanɔɔ́ŋ manyor cén nòmò bagaà bɔ̂ nòmò veên bèh cén-e sɔ̀m bèh.
59003012	Máŋgɔ̀rè yeé màkpelâŋ féí bèh, teér máŋgɔ̀rè féí bèh ndɔ. Né kèì cén mé nòmò ménâ; ndɔ́g nòmò bagaà te nòmò jelâ yùò bèh, bɔ̀ nùàr mò.
59003013	Nùà loò déì né lètenè biì teèn wa? Nùà kɔ́gɔ̀n déì né lètenè biì teèn ndɔ wa? Bú a, bɔ́ yébbé sɔ̀m kêh te seé seèn, te bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene kɔ teèn, ye à né njèh kɔɔ́.
59003014	Á, mɔ bí jelá le né léláŋ sà bɔ̂ huer ndɔ, sâ bí té mbaá púnó kú, bí té gècên Càŋ te nyeéne nyímé lɔ́.
59003015	Gèh kɔ́gɔ̀n bú sâ beè Càŋ yùò bèh; né lo dé bɔ̀ nùàr ká lè wɔ́ŋe, dé sâ né seé táhòrò.
59003016	Lòù sam, bèh mé sà bɔ̂ huer né teèn, njèh nde né bèh sâ lòù ndabé den, veên feh hihiné nde né bèh sâ kurú ndɔ.
59003017	Kɔ́ŋkɔŋ Càŋ dé seèn môn sam, à né dé seèn ŋagásé tâŋ, dɔlésé mbɔ̂, yébbè yébbè ndɔ; à né dé seèn léláŋ húɔ́m-temê, mé kɔ́-jere, léláŋ ŋágá temê; à nùàr gèì bèh, à mé sòn fà sam ndɔ.
59003018	Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né dɔlê lètenè bɔ̀ mbaábɔɔ̀n goó su dɔɔ́ŋ, vu kwaá né gèh bèh dɔlê, te wa tàb, bɔ́ ndeè kaga nyegé bagasé. Tàb sâ né dene dé dilî.
59004001	Jɔ́gɔ́ mé kèrrè lètenè biì kelà he ndɔ wa? Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi tuaá wɔ̂ŋ mé né lè biì, ŋaáŋ né bí môn kɔɔ́.
59004002	Bí sé yeé baá njeré déì gwaán, temé biì jɔgɔ le teèn; bí sé yeé kwà cú, ŋa wúlá-feh. Tuaá sé yeé baá bí mé njeré déì sie, bí sé yeé kwà kòmò cú, lègè die lètenè biì, kèrrè kela baá-re teèn yila. Mè tueé bí, bí bɔ̀ njií sâ kwà bèh; lòù sam, bí mé Càŋ dùà njí bèh.
59004003	Bí né mene mé bú dua njií, bí kwà bèh. Lòù sam, bí teèn dùà yí ŋgwéh, bí kɔ lom né duaà, te bí bɔɔ́ mé njéh faá bí gwaán nê nɔ.
59004004	Kɔ̀cɔ̀, jue ka bí bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀! Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye, mɔ bí né bɔ̀ mbeí wɔ̂ŋ, sâ bí né bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ Càŋ wa? Né yeé môn; nuaá mé ye nyí né mbeí wɔ̂ŋ né nùà bùnò Càŋ.
59004005	Bí té mùnò, ye bɔ́ te mvù Càŋe nyagá kuú né dé lòù, ye: Yɔ̀ŋ mé Càŋ yií kwaá né yoòr beèh hên, à bú cií lom nde né mé huer mene.
59004006	Sâ kè-re ndɔ, mé njéh mene, Càŋ né cu béh húɔ́m-temé seèn lòù feh keéh ŋeí, te yuo faá bɔ́ lé nyagá kwaá naâ te mvù Càŋe nɔ, ye: Nuaá mé né lòù ŋgumó dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ bú gwàn bèh, à húɔ́m-temé seèn feh keéh seér né mé bɔ̀ dedɔlê bɔ̀.»
59004007	Mɔ bí ye te huɔm, bí léb ndé toò Càŋ, bí njébá taáb mé Sátàn, à nde né bí dula kwaá lɔɔ́.
59004008	Bí ŋgòrò ndé gí yoòr Càŋ, te Càŋ ŋgoró nde yoòr biì ndɔ. Kɔ̀cɔ̀ bɔ̀ leba bɔ̀, bí yàgà sɔ̀m gí bɔ̀ veên beè, bí yaga nyegé temé ndɔ.
59004009	Bí vúágá kú, bí sì yúé, bí né njegér. Bí lɔɔ̀ ja kioô, bí yúé sér lòù. Bí lɔɔ̀ vɔ́gɔ́-temé, bí vúágá sér kú.
59004010	Bí cémmé ndé gí toò Fehtoò beèh, à nde né bí ter sie sɔm.
59004011	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, nùàr té mbeí júé. Nuaá mé né mbeí jueé, mé né ju felè seèn tená gɔ dɔɔ́ŋ, jue né sóú, à ju tena né felè sóù ndɔ. Mɔ à né ju felè sóù ménâ tená, sâ à feh seèn weh né faá nùà téná-juù nɔ, à sóú hèllè jòlò ndé cú.
59004012	Mè né tueé ye bí a, ye sóú sou lom né Càŋ nùà njèh, à né lom nùà téná-juù teèn mé huún ndɔ. Terreb nùàr yili sɔɔ̀m mé nùàr calé sɔɔ̀m né cegé beè seèn mé huún. Wò né neì mé né ju felè mbeî tená wa?
59004013	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né tueé gɔ ye: lan wa, né kwéh wa, béh nde né te lɔɔ́ mân ndeé, béh cer teèn gùm nyèmà, béh né toón bɔɔ́, béh né kàgàlɔ̀ŋ kwa, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ménâ tueé sâ, bí ŋgwé nyégé bagasé.
59004014	Njií mé wa ndeè né felè biì kwéh, bí né kɔɔ́ wa? Bí den né faá mvulu bègè nɔ; à nde gi né bagasé sie ndɔgɔ́, tètèì sam à ŋagá yuo cu aá kèn.
59004015	Mɔ ye te huɔm, bí sé la tueé seér naâ ye: mɔ Nùà Dueè né gwaán, à nde né béh terreb haá, te béh bɔɔ́ dé kàn mé dé kân.
59004016	Bí lɔɔ̀ cí, bí né seér feh mé púnò mbaá ham gɔ. Bí kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye gèh púnò bú sâ né dé veên wa?
59004017	Sâ kènê ndɔ, nuaá mé né ceér bagaà kɔɔ́, lɔɔ̀ cí, nde bele seér ceér dé hiîn, kuú baá veên kèn.
59005001	Bí bɔ̀ lilieê bɔ̀ ŋgwé nyégé bagasé ndɔ, bí sì mbà siì, bí njègèr lòm dé njegêr, gèr baá felè biì ndeê!
59005002	Bɔ̀ ŋgúlú biì hèllè baá gi tàbè, sueé cɔ̀gɔ̀ biì yieé gi aá kèn.
59005003	Jagàb kàgàlɔ̀ŋ biì vu sɔm aá ndɔ, te bí ndeè die ju mé njéh. Mè tueé bí, gùm biì vu nde né faá we ŋgie né bú kɔɔ́ nɔ. Lòù sam, bí nde ŋgúlú biì cuan bilí, sâ wɔ́ŋ baá gi ká bèh cerê.
59005004	Bí né bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ ké ŋueh yií, bɔ́ né bí boór kieé, bɔ́ né yab kwaá, bí bɔ́ kàgàlɔ̀ŋ gwɔ̀m bèh. Bí ŋgwé njí kéŋ bɔɔ̀n kán, bɔ́ né Càŋ terrèb felè biì keéŋ yilá, à né hueh bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé ndɔ.
59005005	Bí né dé biì wɔ́ŋ samé yieé, bí né pɔ̀yɔ̀g yieé. Ŋgweéh bí né lom faá nyam cèllè mé bɔ́ nde né ŋɔɔ́b wa?
59005006	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bèh njèh kɔ́ ŋgwéh, bí ju felè bɔɔ̀n tena gi aá kèn, bí wula kuú né bɔ́ mé sòn fuû ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, bɔ́ kɔ lom né kuû, bɔ́ sòn toò biì táré bèh.
59005007	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí sìè lòm temé tég, kɔ Fehtoò beèh ndeè cuù baá kèn. Bí kè wèh beè nùà kíé-boôr: mɔ à kie gi aá boór seèn, à nde né sèŋ mé nu cên kwaá, à nde né sèŋ mé nu dé jomò kwaá, à né yab teèn yoló kela den.
59005008	Bí yóló ménâ ndɔ, bí sìè lòm temé tég, Fehtoò beèh baá ndeê.
59005009	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí té lètenè biì lòù ndúgó gɔ̀, te ju ndeè bí beè Càŋ sìè cú. Nùà téná-juù baá ndeê, à hên nɔ.
59005010	Belà, bí mùnò njí cégé mé dene bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ léí jɔ̀gɔ̀; bɔ́ lé naâ lè yilí Nùà Dueè tueé, bɔ́ né gèr teèn ŋené yií. Mé njéh mene, bɔ́ lé naâ lòù yoló seér. Bí kè wèh beè bɔɔ̀n, bí yolo lom ménâ ndɔ.
59005011	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, kènê bɔ́ né dé bɔɔ̀n dé samê samé seér. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé naâ tég sie huɔɔ́m. Bí lé naá giì sìè-temé Jôb ŋgweé. À yeé baá temé môn sie, Nùà Dueè lé naâ bú njèh ŋgún kulú haá cuú; bí né gi kɔɔ́. Lòù sam, Nùà Dueè né Càŋ kɔ́-jerè, léláŋ húɔ́m-temê ndɔ.
59005012	Tétán bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí té jègè jègè nyì. Nùàr a, té vulú jègè, à té tàbè jègè. Né mene kei, bú a, té njií sâ jègè nyì. Nùà kàn a, túé lòm sòn cén, sâ gi aá. Mɔ né nyea, sâ né lom nyea; mɔ né sam, sâ né lom ka sam, gi môn ndɔ; te ju bí beè Càŋ sìè cú.
59005013	Lètenè biì nuaré déì né gèr teèn ŋené wa? Bú a, dùà Càŋ duaà. Nuaré déì né samé wa? Bú a, sì bené.
59005014	Lètenè biì nuaré déì né teèn baán wa? Bú a, yílá bílí bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ gwà Càŋ. Mɔ bɔ́ baá gi doó, bɔ́ dua bú Càŋ felè, bɔ́ bɔ bú kómó mé yilí Nùà Dueè.
59005015	Mɔ bɔ́ dua lom né mé temé cén, sâ Nùà Dueè nde né nùà beên doô yili sɔm, à nde né bú ter sie sɔm. Mɔ à naâ veên déì bɔɔ́, Nùà Dueè nde né bú mé njéh kulú sɔm ndɔ.
59005016	Mɔ né mân, sâ bí sàlè sɔ̀m kú mé veên lètenè biì, bí né mé Càŋ dua kuú, te bí taré yuo. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ nùà dilî baá Càŋ mé temé cén dua, sòn seèn né yeé ŋgulí dé gècên ma.
59005017	Né faá Elî nɔ; à lé naâ nùàr faá béh ndɔ. À lé dua loóm naâ Càŋ mé temé seèn mene dɔɔ́ŋ, ye te nu né cú. Ŋgweéh nu ka né ŋgwéh tɔ́g nde wa nyèmà tagár mé kwèh mà.
59005018	À yeé dua cu aá Càŋ, nu ne cu ye; yab nde cu ye yuo.
59005019	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ nuaré déì né ceér gècên saáb, nuaá mé weh njií cuù bú te ceér gècéne dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ yií né teèn.
59005020	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, nuaá mé sie sɔm nùà veên déì te veéne, feh bú ceér Càŋ, yili sɔm seér né nùà sâ te cio lòù. Sâ veên seèn lé naá menè ŋgún, bɔ́ nde né bú mé njéh kulú sɔm gií.
60001001	Né mè Piêr, mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Yeésò Kristò. Mè nyagá njií né mé bí bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ mé ŋellé yila gi aá te tàbè Pɔ́ŋe, tàbè Galatî, tàbè Kapadɔ̂s, tàbè Asíà mé tàbè Bitinî. Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ké sâ cicie faá kìn nɔ cer gɔ dɔɔ́ŋ, mè nyagá njií né mé bí.
60001002	Tele beèh Càŋ lɔ naá giì bí ter ké toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ balé kwaá; lɔ naâ mé kàgà-ndòn seèn ndɔ. Bí kènê baá gi bɔ̀ nùàr seèn, né mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ; Càŋ ye te bí ŋgweé sòn Yeésò Kristò, à sené bí mé húɔ́m seèn. Kùsèm dɔlê seèn a, yám sìè bí beè!
60001003	Kùsèm Càŋ Tele Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò. À lɔ béh kɔɔ̀ naâ meì bɔ̀ jerè: à komo sɔm Yeésò Kristò lè cio, ye te béh yɔ̀ŋ dé feê kwa mé bú, bèh ndèm beèh kènê dɔɔ́ŋ né gi sâ.
60001004	Ŋgùlù Càŋ né cu béh kela. Ye nyí kwaá né mé bɔ̀ nùàr nyî. Ŋgùlù bú sâ dé seèn vù kòmò ndé cú, jéré teèn sìè kòmò ndé ŋgwéh, à nòmò kwéh sér kòmò ndé cú ndɔ. Càŋ bú dé seèn leér kwaá né ké te vulúu kwarè seèn, ye né dé biì.
60001005	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi temé cén yoòr Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ terrèb né bí beè kurú kwaá, te loù mé wɔ́ŋ ndeè gi, Yeésò Kristò yili sɔm béh, bɔ̀ nùàr ŋene mé njolo bɔɔ̀n.
60001006	Ŋgweéh sâ bí sàmè bílí cégé kɔɔ́ mà! Mɔ gèr feh hihiné ye nyí nde né mene bí teèn ceéh weh, bí dèn samésé.
60001007	Dé sâ, ye te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ teèn, ye temé cén biì né yieé. Ŋgweéh né mene goó njèh wàn, bɔ̀ nùàr bú faá njèh gècên nɔ ŋene kɔ yeé mé tuar yilá yuo kelâ wa? Sé tagá ndèm biì mé né goó te mbeî yuií huɔɔ́m yɔgɔ́ wa? Sâ, mɔ bí né mene gèr teèn ŋené dɔɔ́ŋ, né te bɔ́ ŋene kɔ mé njéh ye bí né bɔ̀ gècên bɔ̀; te loù mé Yeésò Kristò ndeè cuù, Càŋ seén nyegé ye bí, bí den gi bɔ̀ nùàr beè seèn.
60001008	Ŋgweéh bí né Yeésò gwaán mà. Bí lɔ mene bú njolò ŋéné ŋgwéh, mé njéh mene, temé cén biì dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr seèn, bí né teèn samé sɔɔ́. Gèh sèsàm bú sâ dé tueê sam.
60001009	Lòù sam, bí yili yuo aá kèn. Né mé temé cén mé bí né yoòr seèn kwaá njií doô.
60001010	Sâ lɔ baá dàb mé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ né ceér mé né nùàr yili sɔm hên kweé fɔɔ́n, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr njií sâ se nyegé, ye bɔ́ a: Càŋ lɔ naá giì ké toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ ter nyegé kwaá, ye nyí ndeè nde né bí dé lòù yili sɔm ma.
60001011	Bɔ́ mé feh bɔɔ̀n lé naá loôm mé terreb mene lege, ye te bɔ́ ŋene kwaá gi nàm mé kèkènè sâ njolò. Lòù sam, Cúcuí Ŋagâ mé né lè bɔɔ̀n doô, lé naá giì bɔ́ toò tueé kwaá, ye bɔ́ a: Kristò ndeè jɔ̀gɔ̀ ŋene lɔgɔ́ nde né gèr, te jomo sâ be terrèb seèn ŋené ŋaá ye mé njéh ter ma.
60001012	Bɔ́ né mene lege, ye te bɔ́ ŋene kwaá gi nàm bú sâ njolò, mé njéh mene Càŋ lɔ ye bɔ́ a, bɔ́ ndeè nàm sâ njolò kɔɔ́ ŋéné ndé ŋgwéh, wa bí bɔ̀ hên bɔ̀ ndeè nàm bú sâ njolò ŋene seér nde né kɔɔ́ ma. Kènê, bí baá gi mé njéh tieè: Cúcuí Ŋagâ lé naâ ké te vulúu beè Càŋ suagâ; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né Njàgà Bagaà se lé naâ terreb kwa, bɔ́ se kwaá bí ŋgòr sâ tieè. Sâ ŋgweéh lɔ né mene bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ, bɔ́ lɔ naâ gwaán ye te bɔ́ ŋene kwa teèn mà.
60001013	Mɔ né mân, bí téné lòm cúcuí mé seé Càŋ. Bí dèn dene kɔ̂r, bí kwá njí gí ndèm ye loù mé Yeésò Kristò ndeè né cuû, wa bí nde né mé fùgò beè seèn kuú ma.
60001014	Bí ŋgwé sér á sòn Càŋ, bí té njèh mé feh biì faá léí toò nɔ bɔ́ cùr cú. Dé sâ lé naâ sâ bí née Càŋ kɔ́ ŋgwéeh ye.
60001015	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lé naá giì balé sɔm dɔɔ́ŋ, bí dèn lòm jolosé faá Càŋ nùà njèh nɔ.
60001016	Te mvù Càŋe bɔ́ toò nyagá taré né cí ndɔ, ye: Bí dèn lòm jolosé. Lòù sam, mè né Nùà joloò.»
60001017	Mɔ bí nde aá Càŋ dua, ŋgweéh bí né yeé bú Tele biì yilá mà. Né bɔ̀n. Jéjég juù felè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ tena yeé bú, à ju nùà kàn tena né mé seé seèn ndɔ. Mɔ né ménâ, sâ bí vèh lòm bú mé temé cén. Cu mé bí née ká lè wɔ́ŋe hên, bí dùlà bú dulà.
60001018	Bí né gi kɔɔ́, ye bí lɔ naá giì te cùr tòù bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ teèn. Yeésò Kristò lé bí teèn ŋge weéh naâ kɔɔ́, à lé bí teèn huar sɔɔ́m naâ mé keh tarê; bí né gi gèh keh sâ kɔɔ́, lɔ dèn ná ŋgwêh mé njèh wàn faá kàgàlɔ̀ŋ bɔ̂ goó nɔ, ndɔ́g lɔ cí ná ŋgwêh.
60001019	Lɔ naá seêr mé jéjég húɔ̂m Kristò nùà njèh. À dé seèn né faá mbieè sèmè mé beré déì yoòr sòrò nyì ŋgwéh, veên déì yoòr sam ndɔ.
60001020	Càŋ lɔ Kristò balé kwaá naâ sâ wɔ́ŋ née teèn sam ye. Te nde nde, yeé baá ká jomo mé cu nde aá gií hên, Càŋ nde ye bú bèsɔ́nè felè biì ŋené sɔm keéh, ye te à yili sɔm bí.
60001021	Bí temé cén yoòr Càŋ kwaá njií né mé bú, ye: Càŋ lé naâ bú te cio komo sɔm, ye Kristò né nùàr mé yilî. Te temé cén bɔ̂ ndèm biì dɔɔ́ŋ nde ye kènê yoòr Càŋ jɔgɔ́ le.
60001022	Bí senésé mân yuo gi né mé ceér gècên ŋgweê, ye te bí gwaán ŋagá bɔ̀ mbaábi mé temé cén. Sâ bí bɔ́gɔ́ lòm ká-re lètenè biì mé temé cén ménâ.
60001023	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bɔ́ bí ŋar seér cu aá dé feê. Tele biì né tètàgà, gèh seèn kú bèh. Gèh sâ né ŋgòr seèn, né ŋgòr ŋgulî mé dé seèn yieé den né cu dɔɔ́ŋ.
60001024	Né gi te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, ye: Nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né faá nyure nɔ. Dene nyàgàm bɔɔ̀n né faá mvue nyurè sâ ndɔ. Mɔ nyure baá ŋemá, mvue né yeé nyoló yuo.
60001025	Ter cu dɔɔ́ŋ le lom yeé ŋgòr Nùà Dueè.» Njàgà Bagaà mé bí né ŋgweé hên né cí.
60002001	Sâ kènê né mene gèh veên dé heè dɔɔ́ŋ, bí sɔ̀m gí bá be teèn: bí té nyeén túé cú, bí té leba nágá cú, bí té huer kú, bí té nùàr júé ndɔ.
60002002	Bí dèn sér á faá bɔ̀ huaán mbembɔgɔ̀ nɔ, bɔ́ sòn mé mbán ŋaâm dù bèh. Njèh cén, mbán dé biì né ŋgòr Càŋ, bí té sòn mé njéh dù nyì, te bí kula seér mé njéh, bí yili yuo.
60002003	Né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ye: Bí lé naá giì húɔ́m-temé Nùà Dueè ŋené ŋgweé!»
60002004	Mɔ né ménâ, bí ndê bílí dèn gí ká kwarè Nùà Dueè; taá dàn né bú. Bɔ̀ nùàr lé naâ bú ké jomo komo si njií, sâ beè Càŋ taá nùà njèh né seér bú, Càŋ lɔ naá giì bú ter balé kwaá.
60002005	Bí bílí ndé gî ká yoòr seèn, te bí ŋa gi bɔ̀ taá nùà njèh, bí me yila te gwà Càŋ dé koô, Cúcuí seèn cer beh teèn; te ké gwò sâ bí ŋa gi bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè, bí seé Càŋ bɔɔ́ lom mé temé cén, te temé nɔré bú lè mé bí felè Yeésò Kristò.
60002006	Te mvù Càŋe né gi mân nyagá den ndɔ, ye: Mè taá nùà njèh balé sɔm aá kèn, à né lom mé yilí beè mò kɔɔ́. Kènê mè nde né bú taá dàn te lɔɔ́ Siyɔ̂ŋ sio kwaá. Nuaá mé né temé cén yoòr seèn kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ lòù pɔ́ lè ndé ŋgwéh.»
60002007	Dé biì, taá bú sâ beè biì baá gi mé yilí. Lòù sam, temé biì dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr seèn. Beè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé temé teèn kwá njí ŋgwéh, môn sam. Bɔ́ mene ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh, mé njéh mene, Né taá mé bɔ̀ mé-gwà bɔ̀ lé naâ ké jomo komo si njií, taá dàn ŋa seér cu né kɔɔ́.»
60002008	Né beré déì te mvù Càŋe nyagá den ndɔ ye: Né taá cén-gulè bɔ̀ nùàr, kweéh dìèb bɔɔ̀n né cí.» Bɔ́ teèn cenné die kuú gi né mé dúágá-temé bɔɔ̀n. Sâ Càŋ lɔ toò baá gi mé kàgà-ndòn sâ lè ndɔ, ye bɔ́ nde né dé bɔɔ̀n faá bèh sâ cenné ma.
60002009	Dé biì, bú a, té cí dèn; lòù sam, bí dé biì né bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ. Bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè dé Nùà Dueè né bí. Càŋ bí hiín nyeén kwaá né ye bí baá bɔ̀ gèh nùàr nyî. À lɔ bí balé sɔɔ́m naâ, ye te bí nde bɔ̀ nùàr be seé nyî tueé, bí ye bɔ́ a, nyí lé bí te cibi ŋa sɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́, nyí weh kwaá njií bí bèh ŋagâ ma.
60002010	Léí toò bí lé bɔ̀ gèh nùàr Càŋ ná ŋgwêh, bí bɔ̀ gèh nùàr seèn ŋa né kènê. Bí lɔ kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, ye Càŋ né yeé bí jere kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Baá ye kènê, bí baá fùgò húɔ́m-temé seèn kuú.
60002011	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, ká te wɔ́ŋe bí ndeè né kìn, wa bí nde né wàn cer weh ndɔ. Mɔ né mân, sâ kúkùr biì bɔ̀ mbeí mò, njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr gwaán né kɔɔ́, bí té temé teèn njí. Lòù sam, bɔ̀ njií sâ lege ye te bɔ́ wula sɔm yɔ̀ŋ biì.
60002012	Dene biì ké lètenè bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́ a, dèn lòm dilísé. Mɔ bí né ménâ den, sâ bɔ́ né mene bí jueé, bɔ́ nde né seé bagaà biì ŋené, bɔ́ keí seér cu bí lòù, te loù mé Càŋ ndeè cuù teèn, bɔ́ seén bú.
60002013	Bí yoòr sâ né mé yilí Nùà Dueè, bí ŋgwé làrè sòn bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ. Bí ŋgwé lòm sòn mgbè dé koô faá cí nɔ, terreb dé koô né beè seèn.
60002014	À bɔ̀ ŋgɔ́mnà terreb haá yeé kɔɔ́, te bɔ́ nde ye bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ seé weh;
60002015	bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né njèh bɔɔ́ huɔɔ́m, bɔ́ seén nyegé bɔ́ ndɔ. Bí ŋgwé gí sòn bɔɔ̀n. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ ye te bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né lòù bɔɔ́ ndugó gɔ, sé yeé baá seé bagaà biì ŋené, te sie bɔ́ sòn.
60002016	Bí fèh kéh mé dene biì ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, bí baá mé feh biì ma. Njèh cén, mé feh biì bú sâ, né dé bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ, dèn ŋgwéh mé feh biì dé veên bɔɔ̂.
60002017	Bí léb làrè toò bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ. Bɔ̀ mbaábi mé né te ceér Yeésò Kristò dɔɔ́ŋ, bí gwàn gí bɔ́ mé temé cén, bí né Càŋ mé feh mene veéh, bí né sòn mgbè dé koô ŋgweé ndɔ.
60002018	Bí bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀, ŋgwé gí sòn bɔ̀ tele seê biì mé gùm mene. Bɔ̀ déì né mene temé huɔɔ́m, bɔ̀ déì mene temé húɔ́m ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bí ŋgwé njí sòn bɔɔ̀n kèì cén.
60002019	Lòù sam, nuaá mé né gèr mé sòn fuû ŋené dɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ à mé njéh veéh né Càŋ, sâ à bɔɔ́ né njèh bagaà.
60002020	Mɔ wò sé la gèr hèllè ŋene né mé yìè veên yeè nɔ, wò sé la bú yóló ná ŋgwêh wa? Neì sé la wò seén naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ wa? Mɔ bí gèr ŋene seér né mé seé bagaà, bí né mbaá yoló njií, sâ beè Càŋ né njèh bagaà.
60002021	À bí yilá njií naâ bèh cî. Lòù sam, Kristò mé feh seèn lé naâ mé gèr felè biì kwaré, te bí ŋene weh teèn, bí bele ménâ.
60002022	Sâ ndɔ́g, à lɔ bèh veên déì kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh ndɔ; ndɔ́g nyeén déì bú sònò yùò ŋgúŋgwéh.
60002023	Bɔ́ né mene bú mbaá selé weh, mé njéh mene, à lɔ sòn cú ná ŋgwêh. À né mene gèr ŋené, à lɔ sòn cú ná ŋgwêh ndɔ. À lé dɔɔ́ŋ kwaá lɔ giì naâ beè Càŋ, ye ju teèn tena yií nde né bú ma.
60002024	À mé feh seèn lé naâ veên beèh yoòr ŋguú kwaá, bɔ́ faga bú sòn beèh. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te béh den gi bɔ̀ komó te veéne, ye te béh làŋ den seér te seé didilî. Nyer Kristò lé bí taré sɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́.
60002025	Lòù sam, bí lé naá giì faá bɔ̀ sòrŋgaŋ mé né lòù sabé gɔ nɔ. Kènê bɔ́ bí bilí kwaá baá ká kwarè nùà njèh. Gó biì né bú.
60003001	Bí bɔ̀ véh ndɔ, bí ŋgwé gí sòn bɔ̀ si biì. Kɔ ŋgweéh bɔ̀ déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n Càŋ dùà bèh wa, mɔ bí né sòn bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé, bɔ́ nde né ménâ ŋené, bɔ́ kweéh seér temé. Gwaán cu sâ, bí té mene bɔ́ ŋgòr Càŋ lòù túé, bɔ́ nde gi né te dene biì ŋené keéh, ye bí né te ceér-e.
60003002	Lòù sam, bɔ́ nde né ŋené, ye bí né teèn bɔɔ́ yií, wa bí né bɔ́ veéh ma.
60003003	Bí té gwàn mé bí fɔɔ́n seér ceér dé yàgà huɔɔ̂m; né lom bɔ̀ njèh dé kèb cieè. Mè jue né feh lòù beéh gɔné kwaâ, yíyâr bègè tieè yiî, bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ nyàgàm yoòr su kwaá beleè ndɔ, mè jue né cí.
60003004	Bí yàgà húɔ́m sér kèb lè, te bú sâ ndeè lè bɔ̀ nùàr gí cú. Mɔ bí né dɔlé huɔɔ́m, bí né nɔɔ́ŋ den, bí nde né Càŋ yoòr mé gècên mene huɔɔ́m.
60003005	Léí toò bɔ̀ vèh déì lé naâ ménâ bɔɔ́, bɔ́ lé yàgà nyegé seér naâ mé ndèm yoòr Càŋ kwaá njiî, bɔ́ né sòn bɔ̀ si bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé.
60003006	Sâ né njií mé Sará lé bɔɔ́ naâ; à lé Abrahâm yilá naâ Nùà njèh”. Lé naâ mé tie ŋgweê. Ŋgweéh bɔ̀ ŋunà Sarâ kènê baá bí mà. Mɔ bí né bɔ̀ njèh teèn bɔɔ́ yií, veéh bí mé njeré déì sìè ŋgwéh, sâ bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn né bí.
60003007	Mé bí bɔ̀ siíb ndɔ, bí wèh kwá bɔ̀ veèh biì faá nùàr nɔ. Lòù sam, bí bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà beè Càŋ kwa nde né kèì cén. Nùà kàn a, kɔ́ɔ ye, dé vêh faá nyí nɔ táré wá ŋgwéh lòù. Mɔ bí né ménâ bɔɔ́, sâ njií mé bí né mé Càŋ dua njií, à nde né ŋgweé.
60003008	Bí dèn lòm mé sòn cên, bí né mé jere lètenè biì kɔɔ́ kuú, bí né lètenè biì faá bɔ̀ huaán mé lèì cên nɔ gwaán kuú ndɔ. Dé kàn a, té toò bɔ̀ mbeî lòù jélá sér; dé kân a, dɔ́lé sér toò bɔ̀ mbeî lòù ndɔ.
60003009	Mɔ nuaré déì né bí veên bɔɔ́, bí té veên mé veên cú. Né mene séb, bí té mé séb cú ndɔ. Bí dé biì cu sâ kúlú sér bɔ́ lòù. Lòù sam, Càŋ lé bí tétég yilá kuú naâ dé nùàr lòù kulû, te bí kwa keéh dèh teèn ndɔ.
60003010	Né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, ye: Nuaá mé né dene nɔrê mé bɔ̀ cieé nenɔrê yoòr seèn gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, sìè leba mé júéb, à sie leba mé nyeén ndɔ.
60003011	Bú a, nyénné veên, à bɔɔ́ seér bagaà. Bú a, fɔ́n kwà cú ceér mé dɔlê nde né bɔ̀ nùàr teèn kwa, à kela cí.
60003012	Lòù sam, njolo Nùà Dueè né seér yoòr bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀. Tie seèn né gi ŋgòr bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé ndɔ. Dé bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀, à njolo yoòr bɔɔ̀n kè njí bèh.»
60003013	Mɔ bí né léláŋ bɔ́-bagaà, sâ nuaré déì nde né bí veên bɔɔ́ wa?
60003014	Bí né mene gèr ŋené, mɔ né felè seé bagaà, bí té njeré déì nyàmè, bí té nuaré déì vèh, Càŋ nde né bí kulú.
60003015	Bí temé biì gùm dɔɔ́ŋ kwá njí lòm mé Yeésò Kristò, te Nùà Dueè teèn cer lom bú. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bí njèh bieé dɔɔ́ŋ, bí dèn lòm làŋ toò bɔɔ̀n, te bí se bɔ́ kwɔ̀m mé bí né ndèm mé Yeésò Kristò kwaá njií.
60003016	Mɔ bí baá bɔ́ se, bí sè njí bɔ́ meman, nenɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ. Njèh cén, bí té mé veên yoòr dèn. Mɔ bí né ménâ bɔɔ́, sâ bɔ́ jue kuú mene bí te ceér Yeésò Kristò naàn, nde né bɔ́ sònò cií le.
60003017	Mɔ Càŋ gwaán né ye bí gèr ŋéné sér mé seé bagaà, mè tueé bí, huɔm kela né cí mé gèr felè seé veên ŋenê.
60003018	Ŋgweéh Kristò mé feh seèn lɔ naâ felè biì kuú mà! À lé naâ mbei cén dé kèì cên kuú. Sâ nùà dilî faá bú nɔ sam ndɔ; mé njéh mene, à nde cio bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ kuú seér cu kɔɔ́, sâ dɔɔ́ŋ ye te nyí weh nyɔgɔ́ njií cuù bí ká yoòr Càŋ. Càŋ mé ŋgeér sam, bɔ́ yeé wula sɔm aá bú te yo húɔ́me, Càŋ nde bú haá seér yo dé Cúcuî.
60003019	À lɔ mé Cúcuí sâ nde bilí naâ ké dòù bèh cibì yoòr bɔ̀ càŋ mene, à né bɔ́ ŋgòr Càŋ se.
60003020	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lɔ naâ feh mé Càŋ taré. Lɔ naâ te nàm Noê. Sâ Càŋ né sèŋ kwaá, ye kɔ Noê fagá gi aá kɔm. Mɔ gi aá, à yili sɔm lom nùà téndelé, à né bɔ́ mé nòmò yili sɔm.
60003021	Nòmò sâ lɔ naâ cecemé nòmò Càŋ mé né béh kènê yili sɔm hên. Gèh nòmò Càŋ bú sâ dé seèn dé ŋgàŋ yoòr koù sam, béh bú bie njií yeé mé Càŋ, te à nyegé béh temé mé njéh. À né béh temé mé njéh nyegé ndɔ. Né mé njua Yeésò Kristò. À lé naâ te cio komo yuo,
60003022	à ŋaá nde ké te vulúu, à den nde te be gaâ Càŋe. Bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ terreb bɔ̀ ké ter ka vulúu dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn.
60004001	Béh lé naá giì ŋené, ye Yeésò Kristò lé naâ gèr mé yo nùàr yoòr ŋené. Mɔ né mân, sâ bí yí lòm njágá dòù mé gèr faá bú nɔ. Lòù sam, nuaá mé né gèr mé ŋgàŋ yoòr ŋené dɔɔ́ŋ, dé seèn veên yoòr seèn ŋgwé ndé cú.
60004002	Mɔ né mân, sâ duɔɔ̂m hên, nde wa loù mé cieé biì gi nde né teèn, bí dèn bá dene mé Càŋ gwaán nê. Njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr biì gwaán né kɔɔ́, bí té kèmà cú.
60004003	Veên biì kela baá mé dé jomò. Lòù sam, bí lɔ naâ veên faá bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́ nɔ bɔɔ́: bí lɔ naâ feh lɔgɔ́, njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr gwaán né kɔɔ́, bí lé naâ bɔɔ́, bí né wɔ́ŋ sela; njií mé nùàr sé la bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh, bí né cí bɔɔ́ seér, bí né lòù sela tugó seér. Cècàŋ né mene beè Càŋ njèh lòròmû, mé njéh mene bí lɔ naâ cí dua bilí gií. Wulu baá kèn.
60004004	Kènê, bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́ nde aá mé bí lòù hiím seér. Lòù sam, bɔ́ sé yeé bí lètenè bɔɔ̀n te tándabé denè hèllè ŋéné cú, bí ŋa toú sêb beè bɔɔ̀n.
60004005	Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde aá ju felè bɔ̀ làŋ bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ komô tená ndɔ. Loù sâ bɔ́ nde né toò juù njebá, bɔ́ salé kwaá seé bɔɔ̀n cie mé sòn bɔɔ̀n.
60004006	Kristò lɔ ké dòù yoòr bɔ̀ komô waà naâ dé cî, ye te nyí se bɔ̀ càŋ bɔɔ̀n Njàgà Bagaà. Lòù sam, cu mé bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lɔ naâ ká cie, ju lɔ naâ felè bɔɔ̀n tená, faá né yeé felè bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ nɔ. Kristò lɔ mé Njàgà Bagaà ké dòù se ndeè naâ, ye te bɔ́ kwa seér cúcuí, bɔ́ den faá Càŋ den nê nɔ.
60004007	Wɔ́ŋ nde aá gií, sâ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ceré baá ndɔ. Bí sìè yo, bí dèn bá dene kɔ̂r, te bí dua nyegé ye Càŋ.
60004008	Bí gwàn kú dèn lètenè biì cu dɔɔ́ŋ, njèh dueè né cí. Mɔ bí né lètenè biì mé temé cén gwaán kuú, sâ veên ŋgún nde né lètenè biì nyimé yuo gií.
60004009	Cu dɔɔ́ŋ hin gwà kìn a, dèn dèn lɔ biì lɔŋ; nùàr té déì lòù ndúgó sér.
60004010	Bí lètenè biì né gi mé gèh seé hihinê yoòr. Càŋ haá né nùà kàn ménâ kɔɔ́; bú a, sìè mé temé cén, à né bɔ̀ nùàr mé njéh gam.
60004011	Nuaá mé Càŋ ye seé dé seèn né ŋgòr Càŋ tueê, bú a, sè ŋgòr Càŋ. Mɔ seé nuaré déì né nùàr gaàm, bú a, gàm lòm mé temé Càŋ mene ndɔ. Bɔ̀ dé kàn a, bɔ́ gí ménâ, te bɔ̀ nùàr seén gi Càŋ felè Yeésò Kristò mé gùm mene. Nùà sùsùm né bú; terreb seèn né dé ndeèr. È môn!
60004012	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mɔ gèr né mene bí yoòr furú, bí té lòù hím sér, faá né njèh kèkènè nɔ.
60004013	Bí sàmè sér mé njéh dé samê, ye bí baá gèr faá Kristò nɔ ŋené. Te loù mé be terrèb seèn ndeè ŋené ŋagá teèn, vɔ́gɔ́-temé kibí sie bí beè.
60004014	Mɔ bɔ̀ nùàr bí selé né ye bí né bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ Kristò fí, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, samésé né bí. Lòù sam, bí bɔ̀ Cúcuí Càŋ né kɔɔ́, terreb dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn.
60004015	Càŋ a bɔ́ nuaré déì ŋene gèr lètenè biì mé yìè veên déì: yìè wúlá-nùàr, yìè yîb, wa né te ju nuaré déì mbaá lɔɔ́ yilâ wa, Càŋ a bɔ́ bí gwaán gèh gèr bú sâ.
60004016	Nuaá mé dé seèn gèr ŋene seér né mé yilí Kristò, bú a, té mé fegùlì kú gùm dɔɔ́ŋ, à vrà sér Càŋ mé njéh dé vraà. Lòù sam, à né yilí Kristò.
60004017	Kènê baá cu, bɔ́ nde aá ju tená. Bɔ́ ju tena lɔgɔ́ nde né te mbàgà Càŋe. Á, mɔ bɔ́ ju tena duɔɔ́m né mé béh mân, sâ ju dé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né Njàgà Bagaà Càŋ ŋgeén, den nde né naàn?
60004018	Sâ te mvù Càŋe né gi nyagá den, ye: Mɔ bɔ̀ didilí bɔ̀ lege né lòù, te bɔ́ nde ye yili yuo, sâ bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ dé bɔɔ̀n bɔɔ́ nde né naàn wa?»
60004019	Mɔ né mân, sâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gèr ŋene né mé yilí Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ a, kɔ́ lòm mé seé bagaà tetoò bɔɔ́ ndeê. Bɔ́ gùm bɔɔ̀n dɔɔ́ŋ ŋéh kwá gí yoòr Càŋ; à njèh dɔɔ́ŋ si giì naâ kɔɔ́. Ndéb seèn doó dìè kélá bèh.
60005001	Mè kènê tueé njií nde né mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ lètenè biì. Mè toò né taré nùà koô lètenè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ménâ ndɔ. Mè lé naá giì bɔ̀ dàm gèr Kristò mé njolo ŋené. Loù mé be terrèb Càŋ nde né teèn ŋené ŋagá, mè gà dé mò teèn lím ndé ŋgwéh. Mè né bí dua:
60005002	Kúkùr biì, bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ mé Càŋ haá kwaá né beè biì doô, bí kè nyégé lòm bɔ́ faá nùà njèh né bɔ̀ŋ mbieè seèn ke nyegé nɔ; bí dèn kɔ́r lòm teèn mé temé cén faá Càŋ né gwaán ndɔ. Càŋ a bɔ́ nuaré déì bɔɔ́ jelá seér seé lòù. Bú a, bɔ́ lòm seé faá seé né bieé nɔ, dèn ŋgwéh seé kàgàlɔ̀ŋ.
60005003	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né beè biì sâ, bí té gwàn mé bí tuú seér bɔ́ lòù. Dene biì a, húɔ́m sér toò bɔɔ̀n dé huɔɔ̂m, te bɔ́ si weh dene bagaà teèn.
60005004	Te loù mé Tele bɔ̀ mbieè ndeè cuù teèn, bí kwa gi tàm ŋgɔɔ̀g dé nyèmà mé nyèmà.
60005005	Mè kènê tueé nde né mé bɔ̀ mbò ndà ndɔ, bí ŋgwé tie. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nyèmà bɔɔ̀n né dé biì yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, bí vèh bɔ́ veèh. Mè kènê tueé njií nde aá mé bɔ̀ nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ, bí dèn yébbé kú lètenè biì lòù. Né te mvù Càŋe nyagá den, ye: Càŋ njèh nomo yeé nùà fù ŋgàŋ, à kulu seér nùà dɔlê.»
60005006	Sâ, bí dèn yébbé ndé giì ká beè Càŋ terrèb, te loù mé ye nyí nde né bí ter teèn sie sɔm, à sie sɔm bí mé be seèn.
60005007	Bɔ̀ njií mé né bí seé weh dɔɔ́ŋ, bí húáré kwá njí beè seèn, à bí ke nyegé né kɔɔ́.
60005008	Bí dèn kɔ́r lòù, bí né bèh dɔɔ́ŋ ke tená; Sátàn nùà bùnò né kwarè biì faá gélɔ̂g nɔ ŋgugó ŋuɔb gɔ, te nyí sie yieé cén déì lètenè biì.
60005009	Bí wèh bú seé, bí njébá lòm te ceér Càŋe tég, bí té jìlì. Ŋgweéh bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mbeí biì bèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé gèr ménâ kwaré mà.
60005010	Njua mé gèr hèllè dàb ndé ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ. Mɔ cu sâ kela baá, Càŋ húɔ́m-temê mé lé naâ bí te dene tètàgà beè seèn mé Kristò yilá kwaá, nde né bí nɔɔ́ŋ mé feh seèn vuaá kwaá, à haá bí terreb, te bí njebá nyegé ye tarésé.
60005011	Bú a, dèn dèn nùà terrèb dé nyèmà mé nyèmà ménâ ndɔ. È môn!
60005012	Mè né bí bieé. Mvù maànjé hên, Silâs nyagá kwaá né mè kɔɔ́, te mè nde ye bí temá njií. Beè mò, à né nùàr mò, mé né ceér Yeésò Kristò te be sâ bele. Mè mvù hên nyagá né ye te mè toó nyegé bí, bí kɔ nyegé bagasé ye, mé gècên mene, fùgò Càŋ mé bí né teèn sâ, né faá bí naá giì ŋgweé nɔ. Bí té teèn yùò nyì.
60005013	Bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ ká Babilɔ̂n mé Càŋ balé kwaá né faá bí nɔ, ye bíé kéh bí baga. Ŋuna mò Mârk ye bíé kéh bí ndɔ.
60005014	Bí bíé kú lètenè biì mé temé nùàr lè. Bí bɔ̀ ŋgwɔ́mé Kristò, dɔlê a, dèn mé bí dɔɔ́ŋ.
61001001	Né mè Simɔ̂ŋ Piêr; mè né nùà seê Yeésò Kristò, mè né mbɔ̀ŋ tebê seèn ndɔ. Mè né bí nyagá njií. Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ yoòr Kristò kwaá njií gi né temé cên. Dé biì né faá dé beèh nɔ yieé, njua mé Càŋ beèh Yeésò Kristò Yìlì-nùàr né Càŋ dilî.
61001002	Càŋ bɔ̂ Fehtoò beèh Yeésò a, kúlú bí. Dɔlê bɔɔ̀n a, yám sìè bí beè. Lòù sam, bí né bɔ́ kɔɔ́.
61001003	Càŋ mé terreb seèn lé béh haá giì naâ bɔ̀ njií mé nde né béh gam, te béh kwa yɔ̀ŋ, béh den mege nde yoòr seèn. À lé bɔɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́, te béh nde ye Kristò kɔɔ́. Né nuaá mé lé naâ béh te dene koô seèn yilá yií, ye te nyí feh keéh béh húɔ́m-temé nyî.
61001004	À lé naâ béh ndéb tieè kwaá kwaá, ye nyí bɔɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ njèh dudueèr mé né gi njèh dɔɔ́ŋ huɔɔ́m yɔgɔ́, ye te bí mvelé yuo beè wɔ̂ŋ, bí temé te bɔ̀ njèh nùàr jɔ́gɔ́ kwá cú, te bí lè den seér mé kèkènè dé nyî ma.
61001005	Mɔ né ménâ, sâ bí lègè ŋéí cú lòù. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, bí baá gi mé temé cén yoòr Yeésò Kristò; kènê bí gɔ̀ dìlì ŋéí cú lòù ndɔ. Bí felèbɔ̀ kɔ́ ŋéí cú Càŋ dé kɔɔ̂.
61001006	Mɔ bí kɔ gi aá, bí né yo teèn sie yií. Mɔ dé sâ gi aá, bí felèbɔ̀ kwá yí sèŋ, bí né yoòr Càŋ mege ndeé.
61001007	Mɔ bí mege nde gi aá yoòr Càŋ kèn, bí lètenè biì dèn lòm dene bɔ̀ dìm bɔ̂ bei. Mɔ bí den kɔ gi aá ménâ, bí felèbɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ sagá yií baá-re gwaân.
61001008	Mɔ yoòr biì yam den né bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀, sâ nde né bí terreb haá, te bí kɔ nyegé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò, bí den làŋ, te tàb yuo teèn.
61001009	Mɔ nuaré déì mé bɔ̀ njií hên yoòr sam, sâ tácugó bilí né bú, à nyen aá ye, Càŋ lé naâ nyí veên dé léí toò yoòr kulú sɔm.
61001010	Mɔ né mân, sâ belà, bí beè Càŋ dèn gí mé gùm mene. Ŋgweéh à lé bí yilá naâ dé cî mà. À lé naâ bí balé weh; bí mègè ŋéí cú yoòr seèn lòù. Mɔ bí né yoòr seèn tég mege ndeé, sâ bɔɔ́ mene naàn, bí dìè ndé ŋgwéh.
61001011	Càŋ nde lom né bí ké mbàm yoòr Yeésò Kristò gulu keéh. Fehtoò beèh mé Yìlì-nùàr né bú. Ké doó sâ baá bèh denè seèn dé nyèmà mé nyèmà.
61001012	Mè kɔ né ye bí né gi bɔ̀ njií hên kɔɔ́ nyegé, wa bí nɔɔ́ŋ njebá den né te gècên mé bí lé naâ ŋgweé doô ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, mè ye kɔ mè jilí den bí beè beè.
61001013	Mè ye, cu mé mè née mé njolo hên, kɔ mè bí jilí den beè beè, te bí den den làŋ. Beè mò huɔm kela né cí.
61001014	Lòù sam, ser toò hên mè nde aá mé yo dé wàn geé; Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò lé naá giì mè njolò ŋené feh.
61001015	Mè mé terreb mene dɔɔ́ŋ lege lom aá cí, te bí sie den be mé njéh jomo.
61001016	Cu mé béh lé ye bí a, Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò nde né mé terreb mene sumú cuû, béh lé mé feh faá dèbbè bɔ̀ nùàr nɔ túé ná ŋgwêh, béh lé sùsùm seèn ŋenè naâ mé njolo.
61001017	Cu mé à lé naâ sùsùm mé terreb beè Tele seèn Càŋ kwa, béh lé naá giì doó. Béh yeé ŋgweé, hueh déì ké sònò Càŋ Dueè Nùà terrèb lé naâ ŋgulí, ye: Hên né huaán yíé-temé nyî, temé nyî né lè mé bú nɔré.»
61001018	Loù sâ béh bɔ́ lé naâ ké felè tòr joloò, béh lé naâ hueh sâ mé tie ŋgweé.
61001019	Yeé bilí cu aá mé ŋgòr bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ mene, béh kɔ nyegé lom baá-re ye né môn. Mɔ bí ye te huɔm, bí félá njí tie teèn. Lòù sam, ŋgòr bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ né te cibi faá lâm nɔ baá den, tɔ́g kɔ cieé ŋaga baá kɔɔ́. Cu sâ cɔ́ ndeè né yuoô, à ba njeré sie bí temé beè.
61001020	Tétég bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ kɔ́ ye, ŋgòr sòn-Càŋ mé né gi te mvù nyagá den, nuaré déì bú mé lèì seèn sè kòmò bèh.
61001021	Lòù sam, bɔɔ́ mene naàn, ŋgòr sòn-Càŋ beè nùàr yùò bèh. Cúcuí Ŋagâ lé bɔ́ ceér feéh naâ kɔɔ́, ye te bɔ́ tueé keéh bɔ̀ nùàr njií mé yuo yeé sònò Càŋ.
61002001	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé ye bɔ́ né bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ sé wa, lɔ naâ toò lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr nabé yilá, bɔ́ goó su nyeén teèn. Bɔ̀ fèh-nyeén bɔ̀ nde cu né lètenè biì ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ́ nde né bí bɔ̀ ŋgòr nyenyenê feh, te mɔ̀gɔ̀ ŋellé mé njéh. Nùà fèh-njèh beèh Yeésò Kristò mé lé naâ bɔ́ yili sɔm, bɔ́ nde né bú ŋgɔɔ́n, bɔ́ yila nde seér te gèr-e, bɔ́ nyoló le teèn mé be bɔɔ̀n.
61002002	Nùàr ŋgún nde gi né bɔ́ te tándabé denè hèllè kem bele; te bɔ̀ nùàr tueé beéh ceér gècên.
61002003	Bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ hèllè sé yeé baá kàgàlɔ̀ŋ beè biì gwaán, bɔ́ yila bɔ̀ dèbbè mé feh munó fɔɔ̂n, bɔ́ né bí mé njéh njuaré. Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, ju bɔɔ̀n né ter taáb kwaá ndɔ; nuaá mé nde né bɔ́ seé weh lɔ́m cèr ŋgwéh, ye kɔ nyí nyoló sɔm aá bɔ́ kèn.
61002004	Mé bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ mene, Càŋ lé déì jomo kélá kéh ná ŋgwêh. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ veên kuú dɔɔ́ŋ, né gi kènê ké dòù bèh cibì tuar, bɔ́ né ju teèn kela den.
61002005	Mé nàm bɔ̀ jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ mene, Càŋ déì jomo kélá kéh ŋgwéh: à lɔ naâ wɔ́ŋ mé nòmò kum sɔm. Lé naâ felè bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀. À yili sɔm cegé Noê, nùà dilî, à yili sɔm mé nùà téhbeh ndɔ.
61002006	Bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ kokoô déì lé naâ teèn: yilí bɔɔ̀n lé naâ Sɔ́dɔ̀m bɔ̂ Gɔmɔ̂r: Càŋ lɔ bɔ́ tuar kum lɔɔ̀ naâ mé yìè veên bɔɔ̀n ndɔ. Ye te bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ dé jomò ŋene kwaá gi seé mé nyí nde né bɔ́ weh njolò.
61002007	À lɔ ké Sɔ́dɔ̀m yili sɔm cegé naâ Lɔ̂t, nùà dilî. Lòù sam, veên mé bɔ̀ nùàr lɔ naâ bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, temé lé naâ Lɔ̂t mé njéh lè yulá dé gècên.
61002008	Sâ cieé dé kàn mé cieé dé kân, mé bɔ́ lé naâ veên kuú sɔɔ́, bɔ́ né lom Lɔ̂t temé lè mé veên bɔɔ̀n hèllè bɔɔ́ yulá. Càŋ yeé ŋene à né dé seèn nùà dilî ménâ, à yili sɔm bú.
61002009	Beè Nùà Dueè né yeé môn, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né yoòr seèn mege ndeé dɔɔ́ŋ, ceér mé à nde gi né bɔ́ teèn yili sɔm, à né kɔɔ́, te bɔ́ dìè cú. À né gi lèh bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ kɔɔ́ ndɔ: à bɔ́ sie kwaá né beè, te loù ju tenâ, bɔ́ yila lè gèr-e.
61002010	Mè tueé bí, gèr nde né ŋueé. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔɔ́ né njií mé ŋgàŋ yoòr bɔɔ̀n gwaán nê, mé né bɔ̀ dudueèr bɔ̀ seb dɔɔ́ŋ, gèr tétán ŋueé kela nde né bɔ́. Bɔ̀ fèh-nyeén bɔ̀ mé mè la naâ tueé hèllè, mèŋàŋ ceré né beè bɔɔ̀n. Né mene bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né mé terreb ké te vulúu teèn, bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ hèllè né lom bɔ́ ŋaár sie, bɔ́ tɔbé bɔ́ séb.
61002011	Sâ bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ né gi bɔ̀ fèh-nyeén bɔ̀ sâ mé terreb yɔgɔ́ ndɔ. Mé njéh mene, bɔ́ bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ toò Nùà Dueè jɔ́gɔ́ njí bèh, bɔ́ bɔ́ sélé bèh ndɔ.
61002012	Dé bɔ̀ fèh-nyeén bɔ̀ hèllè, bɔ́ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ mbi gɔ né mé feh bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ né faá bɔ̀ nyam ké ya dueè mé bɔ́ nde né lòù sie ŋɔɔ́b nɔ; bɔ́ né mbaá selé mbi njií, bɔ́ ŋgwé kòmò bèh. Cio bɔɔ̀n né cu gèh dé sâ ndɔ: bɔ́ nde né mbaá faá bɔ̀ nyam ké ya dueè nɔ kuú mbi njií.
61002013	Gèr mé bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr feh doô, Càŋ bɔ́ sòn sâ gwɔm cu nde né mé núr gèr ndɔ. Bɔ́ vɔ́gɔ́-temé bɔɔ̀n kwa seér yeé mé veên, bɔ́ né mé njéh cie ŋagá le. Mɔ bɔ́ né doó, bí bɔ́ né yáb yieé bilí, mè tueé bí, né njèh fegùlì. Yo bɔ́ taré seér cu né mé nyeén bɔɔ̀n hèllè lòù.
61002014	Njolo bɔɔ̀n le lom né yoòr bɔ̀ véh nùàr. Bɔ́ né mene te núlu jelág sɔɔ́, bɔ́ hómó bèh. Nuaá mé bɔ́ ŋene, à te ceér Càŋe táré nyégé ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ bele weh bú, bɔ́ yií njií te veên. Cu dɔɔ́ŋ, temé bɔɔ̀n né lom te kàgàlɔ̀ŋe. Yeé baá ménâ, Càŋ ye, nyí bɔ́ duagá sɔm nde né mé gèr ndɔ.
61002015	Bɔ́ né ceér seèn kwaá lɔɔ́ gií, bɔ́ sabé bele seér ceér dé hiîn, bɔ́ né faá Balam ŋunà Bosôr nɔ bɔɔ́: sâ Balam lɔ te veéne jiím yilà naâ mé yìè kàgàlɔ̀ŋ.
61002016	Càŋ lɔ naâ bú nde: vuɔmndeè nde tueé bú sòn beè faá nùàr nɔ, ye te à geé mé ceér kùlù sâ.
61002017	Bɔ̀ fèh-nyeén bɔ̀ mé mè la naâ bí tueé hèllè né bɔ̀ bèlè-nùàr bɔ̀. Bɔ́ den né faá nduùn mé nòmò teèn sam nɔ. Bɔ́ den cu né faá vúlú nuù nɔ mé fu né mé njéh kobó jɔgɔ́ ndeé, nu teèn sam. Càŋ ye, kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ bɔ̀ mgbátág cibì nde né beè nyî kwaré ndɔ.
61002018	Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ cùr ŋgòr yie punó gɔ; bɔ́ ke né njií mé né bɔ̀ nùàr yoòr yilá, bɔ́ njebá yila teèn, te bɔ́ bele kwa bɔ̀ nùàr. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ macùr sâ mvelé yuo, sé yeé ŋgweé cu ménâ, bɔ́ die yila cu teèn.
61002019	Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr tueé ye bɔ́ a: mɔ bí den beè beèh, bí né mé feh biì ma. Á sâ, bɔ́ bɔ̀ njèh bɔ̀ hèllè toò né taré kwer veên ndɔ. Lòù sam, nùà kàn né kwer beè njií mé né felè seèn cer.
61002020	Mɔ nuaré déì naá giì mé feh seèn ŋené kɔɔ́, ye Yeésò Kristò Fehtoò beèh né Yìlì nùàr, mɔ à naâ te veéne mvelé yuo, à yila ndeè ká beè Yeésò, jomo sâ mɔ à den cuù, à nde cu te veên teré yilá, sâ veên seèn bú dé jomò hèllè nde né dé toò ŋaá yɔgɔ́, te weh bú seé.
61002021	Gèh dé mé nùàr nde gi né ceér dilî kwa, te à yuo kwaá lɔ cu ndéb Càŋ sâ, huɔm kela né mé à sé lɔ ŋéné kɔ́ ná ŋgwêh ye né ceér dé dilî.
61002022	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ tueé né ye, kàn déì tueé né gècên. Kàn sâ né tueé ye: Tíéb mé boór naâ sònò tieé sɔm, à baá cu nagá. Ŋguiáŋ mé bɔ́ naâ kènê kou sɔm, baá cu tuɔb teré ndɔ ma.»
61003001	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mè bí hên nyagá baá mvù mò dé jomò. Te bɔ̀ mvù mò fà dɔɔ́ŋ, mè ferré den né bɔ̀ njií mé bí lé naá giì ŋgweé. Mè ye te bí den beh làŋ, bí né bɔ́ munó nyegé.
61003002	Mè ye te ŋgòr mé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ lɔ naá giì léí toò tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, lè biì gí cú; te bɔ̀ ndéb mé Fehtoò beèh Yìlì nùàr lé tueé keéh naâ bí sònò bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê, lè biì gí cú ndɔ.
61003003	Bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ kɔ́ née bú hên ye: bí kɔ́ɔ ye, mɔ wɔ́ŋ nde aá gií, bɔ̀ nuaré déì ndeè né lètenè biì yuo kelâ, dé kàn nde né njií mé ŋaá né lè seèn bɔɔ́; bɔ́ nde né bí selé,
61003004	bɔ́ ye bí a: Ŋgweéh Kristò ye nyí baá cuû mà! Á, heèh wee? Ŋgweéh bèh lɔ mé bɔ̀ tele beèh lɔ kuú giì, njèh dɔɔ́ŋ née den ka faá wɔ́ŋ lɔ duɔɔ́m naâ mà.»
61003005	Sâ bɔ̀ hèllè bɔ̀ berɔ́ŋ lom né mé be bɔɔ̀n gwaán ŋagâ ye: lɔ baá dàb wa, Càŋ lɔ vulú mé tàbè sií naâ mé ŋgòr, à lɔ tàbè sií naâ mé nòmò ndɔ, wa jomo sâ à lɔ naâ tàbè bɔ̂ nòmò hihiné geé kwaá ma. Bɔ́ dé sâ mùnò ŋgwéh.
61003006	Sâ mé nòmò cên sâ Càŋ lɔ wɔ́ŋ dé cuûm kum sɔɔ́m naâ mé njéh. Nòmò dueè yeé baá naŋ, wɔ́ŋ dé léí toò hèllè dùà mbíb.
61003007	Vulú bɔ̂ tàbè dé jomò hên ter njebá den cu né mé ŋgòr cên sâ, te we ndeè ŋgie sɔm bɔ́ lòù. Càŋ ye, kwá bɔ́ den; loù mé nyí nde né ju bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ tená, nyí nde né bɔ́ tuar ŋgie njií, nyí nyoló sɔm bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ ndɔ.
61003008	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, beè Nùà Dueè, cieé cén né faá nyèmà kám nɔ, nyèmà kám né faá cieé cén ndɔ.
61003009	Mɔ Nùà Dueè ye nyí nde né njií sâ bɔɔ́, sâ à bú bɔɔ́ nde né ka nág ménâ. Bɔ̀ déì né munó ye, à wágá wá ndé ŋgwêh. Mè tueé bí, à ŋgágá ndé ŋgwéh, à bí yolo den né lòù. À gwàn bèh dé nuaré déì leér le, né mene neì. À gwaán seér né mé nùà kàn né feh seèn yueé fɔɔ́n, te à yili sɔm bú.
61003010	Mé cieé Nùà Dueè, Nùà Dueè kar waà nde né faá nùà yîb nɔ. Loù sâ, bèmè nde né to taré, vulú nde né nyueé leér, we nde né ké te vulúu die, njèh dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgie yuo, tàbè mé bɔ̀ njèh teèn dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né ŋgie yuo ndɔ.
61003011	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ Càŋ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ calé sɔm nde né faá bèh mân, sâ dene biì den nde né gèh dé heè wa? Bí kè nyégé bagasé, te bí den lom nyennésé, te ŋené yuo kelà yoòr biì, ye bí né yoòr Càŋ mege ndeé ma.
61003012	Bí njolo kè mé cieé Fehtoò beèh, bí né seé bɔɔ́, te à cuù ye. Loù sâ, vulú nde né tuar yilá ndeé, bɔ̀ njèh teèn dɔɔ́ŋ laga nde gi tuar.
61003013	Né faá Càŋ lɔ tueé kwaá naâ nɔ, ye te vulú dé feê mé tàbè dé feê yuo kela nyegê kɔɔ́, bɔ̀ njèh didilî cer teèn. Béh hên kela den né cí!
61003014	Sâ bɔ̀ nùàr mò, cu mé bí né cieé sâ teèn kela hên, bí lègè lòm faá bí lege aá nɔ, te bí ndeè yuo gi njolò Càŋ kɔ́bè sâ mé veên yoòr sam, cɔ̀ŋ die lètenè biì, bí bɔ̀ Càŋ.
61003015	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, sèŋ mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò né kwaá doô gam né kɔɔ́, te bí ndeè nde ye yili yuo. Pɔ̂l nùà yíé-temé beèh lé naá giì bí ménâ te bɔ̀ mvù seène nyagá njií ndɔ. Càŋ lé bú kɔ́gɔ̀n sâ haá naâ kɔɔ́.
61003016	Cu mé à né felè ŋgòr hên nyagá dɔɔ́ŋ à tueé gi né faá bèh mân. Te bɔ̀ mvù seèn mé à nyagá gi né kɔɔ́, bɔ̀ beré déì né lom taré dé gècên. Bɔ̀ cùr mé temé kuú sé yeé ŋgwé kòmò cú, bɔ́ lugó keéh njií kwɔ̀m bèh hiîn, bɔ́ ferré yií seér nyeén, faá bɔ́ bɔɔ́ yeé mé bɔ̀ beré déì te mvù Càŋe nɔ. Kwá-re nɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ, bɔ́ mé njéh tulu su né ju yoòr!
61003017	Dé biì bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bí baá gi mé njéh tieè, bí dèn á dene kɔ̂r, te veên bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ bí jìn cú, te bɔ́ bí te bèh denè biì kòrò sɔ̀m cú ndɔ.
61003018	Sâ bí bɔ́ lòm tég, te húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò yam sie bí beè, bí kɔ ŋeí cu bú dé kɔɔ̂. Yìlì nùàr né lom bú. Kùsèm, sùsùm seèn a, ká ndé wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, yuoô lan, nde tɔ́g dé nyèmà mé nyèmà. È môn!
62001001	Béh bí hên nyagá njií kuú né felè ŋgòr mé né yɔ̀ŋ haá. Mé wɔ́ŋ lɔ nde duɔɔ́m, sâ à lɔ dé seèn baá gi teèn. À lé naâ tieè beèh ŋgulí yilá, béh lé naâ bú ŋené ndɔ. Né ka môn jég, béh lé naá giì bú mé njolo ŋené, béh lé naâ bú mé be kema ndɔ.
62001002	Yɔ̀ŋ sâ yeé waà baá ká lètenè beèh, à ŋené ŋagá bèsɔ́nè, béh ŋene ye bú mé njolo. Béh hên jue den né bí cí. Né yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà mé lɔ naâ ké kwarè Tele seèn doô, à lé naâ njolò beèh ŋené yuo kelâ.
62001003	Njií mé béh lé naâ ŋené, mé béh lé naâ ŋgweé sâ, béh hên tueé keéh né bí cí, te béh bí te bilí gi teèn bècénè. Dé beèh, béh bɔ̀ Tele mé Ŋuna seèn Yeésò Kristò te bilí gi aá kèn. Béh ye te béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ te bilí gi ménâ ndɔ.
62001004	Béh bí mân nyagá kuú né ye te temé beèh die lè, béh samé gi mé gùm mene.
62001005	Béh hên tueé keéh né bí hueh Yeésò Kristò: wa Càŋ né lom ŋagásé tâŋ ma. À mé bèh cibì déì yoòr teèn sam gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
62001006	Mɔ béh tueé né ye, béh baá yoòr Càŋ teé ndeé, mé béh né te cibi gɔ den, sâ béh tueé né nyeén, seé beèh te ceér gècên sam.
62001007	Á, mɔ béh gɔ né bèh ŋagâ faá Càŋ nùà njèh né bèh ŋagâ nɔ, sâ tueé né ye béh bí né gi bècénè teé bilí; sâ tueé cu né ye, húɔ́m Ŋuna seèn Yeésò Kristò né béh veên yoòr yaga sɔm gií ndɔ.
62001008	Mɔ béh ye, béh mé veên déì yoòr sam, sâ béh bele den cu né feh beèh mé be beèh, béh mé gècên yoòr sam.
62001009	Nuaá mé né dé seèn bɔ̀ veên seèn cie lòù tueé sɔm seér, sâ Càŋ nde né bú bɔ̀ veên seèn dɔɔ́ŋ kulú sɔm gií, à sené nyegé bú ndɔ. Lòù sam, Càŋ né lom dilísé, à bɔɔ́ lom yeé jéjég faá à lé naâ tueé kwaá nɔ.
62001010	Mɔ béh ye béh bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ sam, sâ béh mé ŋgòr seèn lè sam, béh yoòr seèn Nùà njèh horó kwaá seér né nyeén.
62002001	Bɔ̀ huaán mò, mè bí mvù hên nyagá njií kuú né ye te bí veên bɔ́ cú. Ye mɔ lètenè biì nuaré déì né mene veên bɔɔ́, te à kɔ ye, béh né mé nùà gàm beèh ké beè Tele beèh teèn ma; né Yeésò Kristò nùà dilî.
62002002	À lé naâ feh seèn te cio mé yìè veên beèh semé njií, te Càŋ nde ye béh veên yoòr kulú sɔm. Léláŋ dé beèh mé huún gí lòm ŋgwéh, né dé bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
62002003	Mɔ béh né sòn Càŋ ŋgweé, béh nde né teèn ŋené kɔɔ́ ye béh né Càŋ kɔɔ́.
62002004	Mɔ nuaré déì ye nyí né Càŋ kɔɔ́, mé à sòn Càŋ jòlò ŋgwéh, sâ né nùà nyeên, à mé gècên yoòr sam.
62002005	Nuaá mé né dé seèn ŋgòr Càŋ jolo, gwaán seér né Càŋ mé gècên mene kɔɔ́. Béh ŋene kɔ yeé mé njéh ndɔ, ye béh né yoòr Càŋ nyɔgɔ́ ndeé.
62002006	Nuaá mé ye nyí nyɔgɔ́ den aá dé nyî yoòr Càŋ, sâ kɔ bú a, gɔ̀ lòm ká nág faá Yeésò lé gɔɔ́ naâ nɔ.
62002007	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, ŋgòr mé mè nyagá né hên njèh feê beè biì sam; né ŋgòr cuûm mé bí lé naá giì ké bèh duɔɔ̂m ŋgweé. Ŋgòr sâ bí lé naá giì bú gwaán ndɔ.
62002008	Ŋgòr sâ né mene dé cuûm, mé njéh mene né feésé. Mè bí hên nyagá né cí. Gècên seèn né yoòr Yeésò Kristò ŋené ŋagá; né lè dene biì ŋené yuo kelâ ménâ ndɔ. Lòù sam, cibí baá ŋellé yuo, ŋagâ baá seér kɔɔ́ baá; né ŋagâ nùà njèh.
62002009	Nuaá mé ye nyí né bèh ŋagâ, mé à né mbeí bunó dɔɔ́ŋ tueé né nyeén, à née den ka bèh cibì ye.
62002010	Nuaá mé né bɔ̀ mbaábɔn gwaán, né seér bèh ŋagâ kɔɔ́. Dé seèn, ndɔ̀gɔ̀ njií mé nùàr nde né teèn ceén die bú yoòr sam.
62002011	Dé nuaá mé né bɔ̀ mbaábɔn bunó, môn sam; à dé seèn né te cibi, à né teèn gɔ yɔŋ, cibí cib aá bú njolo, à lèmè kɔ́ cú.
62002012	Bɔ̀ huaán mò, Càŋ bí bɔ̀ veên biì fɔ sɔm gi aá kèn, né felè yilí Yeésò; mè bí hên nyagá kuú né dé cî.
62002013	Mé bí bɔ̀ tele mò ndɔ, ŋgweéh nuaá mé lɔ naá lɔgɔ̂ teèn, te wɔ́ŋ nde ye duɔɔ́m, bí né gi bú kɔɔ́ mà; mè bí hên nyagá njií né dé cî. Mé bí bɔ̀ ndà mene, bí lé naâ Sátàn taré yɔgɔ́; mè bí hên nyagá njií né dé cî ndɔ.
62002014	Né cu mé bí bɔ̀ huaán mò, bí né Càŋ Tele beèh kɔɔ́; mè bí nyagá njií né dé cî. Mé bí bɔ̀ tele mò ndɔ, ŋgweéh nuaá mé lɔ naá lɔgɔ̂ teèn, te wɔ́ŋ nde ye duɔɔ́m, bí né gi bú kɔɔ́ mà; mè bí nyagá njií né dé cî. Mé bí bɔ̀ ndà mene, bí né taré, bí né mé ŋgòr Càŋ lè, bí né Sátàn taré yɔgɔ́; mè bí nyagá kuú né dé cî.
62002015	Bí té wɔ́ŋ gwàn, bí ŋgɔ́n bílí mé tòmò njèh wɔ̂ŋ mene, wanɔɔ́ŋ nuaá mé né wɔ́ŋ gwaán, dé seèn Tele beèh Càŋ gwàn kòmò ndé ŋgwéh.
62002016	Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, bɔ̀ njèh wɔ̂ŋ né mé ceér hihiné: tuaá veên né bɔ̀ nùàr lè li den; bɔ́ njèh wɔ̂ŋ ŋéné téná bèh. Mɔ bɔ́ baá ŋgùlù wɔ̂ŋ yieé, bɔ́ né mé kàŋ lobo nyen le. Mè tueé bí, gèh dé sâ yuo yeé beè wɔ̂ŋ; ndɔ́g beè Tele beèh Càŋ yùò bèh.
62002017	Kwá-re nɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ; wɔ́ŋ hèllè baá gií, bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ̀ nùàr né gwaán sâ baá nyoló ndeé. Nuaá mé bɔɔ́ né faá Càŋ gwaán nê nɔ, tètàgà le lom nde né kɔɔ́.
62002018	Bɔ̀ huaán mò, waà baá kèn! Bí lé naá giì ŋgweé, ye mɔ wɔ́ŋ nde aá gií wa, nùà bùnò Kristò ndeè né cu sâ waâ ma. Kènê bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ Kristò baá lom cie faá cí nɔ bomó sue; béh baá mé njéh ŋené kɔɔ́, ye hên baá bèh cerê sâ ndɔ.
62002019	Mé gècên mene, bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé yuoó naâ ká lètenè beèh. Mé njéh mene bɔ́ lé dé beèh ná ŋgwêh. Mɔ bɔ́ sé lɔ né bɔ̀ dé beèh, béh bɔ́ sé née kɔɔ́ ye. Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi né te béh ŋene ŋagá teèn, ye bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ te bɔ̀ŋ beèh sam bɔ̀n.
62002020	Dé biì môn sam. Dé biì Kristò lé naâ bí Cúcuí Ŋagâ yoòr nyeén kwaá gií, bí lé naâ bú kwa; bí né gi bɔ̀ njèh dé gècên mé bú ŋené kɔɔ́.
62002021	Mɔ mè né mene bí mân nyagá, sâ túé ŋgwéh ye bí née gècên kɔ́ ŋgwéeh ye; né seér ye bí né gècên kɔɔ́ ma. Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ndɔ, ye ŋgòr gècên mé nyeén yoòr sam gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
62002022	Á sâ, nùà nyeên né neì? Sâ nùà nyeên né nuaá mé ye Yeésò Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ sam. Nùà bú sâ né nùà bùnò Kristò, à berɔ́ŋ bilí né Huaán mé Tele mene.
62002023	Né yeé môn, nuaá mé né Huaán berɔ́ŋ, berɔ́ŋ né mé Tele mene; mɔ à né Huaán gwaán, sâ à gwaán né mé Tele mene ndɔ.
62002024	Dé biì, bɔ̀ njií mé bí lé ŋgweé naâ ké bèh duɔɔ̂m hên, bí lèr kwá nyégé lè biì bagasé. Mɔ bɔ̀ njií mé bí lé ŋgweé naâ ké bèh duɔɔ̂m doô né gi lè biì te be sâ den den, sâ bí bɔ̀ Tele mé Huaán nyɔgɔ́ bilí né kɔɔ́.
62002025	Sâ ndéb mé Kristò lé kwa kwaá naâ béh tieè doô né yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà ndɔ.
62002026	Mè bí nyagá kuú né felè bɔ̀ɔ́ mé gwaán né bí beleè doô.
62002027	Dé biì, bí kɔ́ɔ ye Kristò bí Cúcuí seèn yoòr nyeén kwaá gi aá kèn. Nuaré déì a, té bí njeré déì mbaá fèh kú cú, Cúcuí seèn né gi bí njèh dɔɔ́ŋ feh den, à feh lom né bɔ̀ njèh gècên gècên ndɔ, à ŋgòr nyeên déì teèn fèh yí kéh bèh. Bí nyɔ̀gɔ̀ dèn gí yoòr Kristò, faá Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bí feh den nɔ.
62002028	Bɔ̀ huaán mò, bí bɔ̀ Kristò nyɔ̀gɔ̀ dèn lòù, te loù mé à ndeè cuù, béh njeré déì nyàmè cú, te fegùlì ndeè béh toò seèn sìè cú ndɔ.
62002029	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye Kristò né lom dilísé. Sâ bí kɔ́ nyégé-re bagasé ndɔ, ye nuaá mé né njèh teèn bɔɔ́ dilí yií dɔɔ́ŋ né ŋunà Càŋ ma.
62003001	Bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ ke ke gwaân mé Tele beèh Càŋ gwaán né béh kán ye! Ŋgweéh à béh yilá né bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn mà. Né bɔ̀n, béh né lom bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ. Bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ dé bɔɔ̀n béh ŋéné kɔ́ ŋgwéh; lòù sam, bɔ́ Tele beèh Càŋ nùà njèh kɔ́ ŋgwéh.
62003002	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bí kɔ́ɔ ye, béh baá bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ. Gèh dene mé né béh kela sâ née bèsɔ́nè ŋéné yùò kélá ŋgwéeh ye lòù. Mé njéh mene, béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye: mɔ Kristò ndeè ŋagá yuo kelà baá, béh bú ŋene nde né te be sâ, te béh den faá bú nɔ.
62003003	Sâ nuaá mé né ndèm yoòr Kristò mân kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, bú a, dèn lòm ŋagásé faá Kristò né ŋagásé ndɔ.
62003004	Nuaá mé né veên kema dɔɔ́ŋ sela né sóú. Lòù sam, veên né sóú selaà sâ.
62003005	Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye, Yeésò lé ká lè wɔ́ŋe nde kuú naâ bɔ̀ nùàr veên yoòr fɔ sɔɔ̀m, wanɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ̀gɔ̀ veên déì lé yoòr seèn ná ŋgwêh gùm dɔɔ́ŋ.
62003006	Sâ nuaá mé nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr seèn dɔɔ́ŋ, dé seèn veên kèmà ndé cú. Nuaá mé né dé seèn veên sela sɔɔ́, née Yeésò Kristò ŋéné ŋgwéeh ye, sâ à bú kɔ́ ŋgwéh ndɔ.
62003007	Kúkùr biì bɔ̀ huaán mò, bí té gwàn mé nuaré déì bele bí! Bí kɔ́ɔ ye, nuaá mé né njèh bɔɔ́ dilí dɔɔ́ŋ, baá gi dilísé faá Yeésò Kristò né dilísé nɔ.
62003008	Nuaá mé né dé seèn mé veên kema ndeé den dɔɔ́ŋ, né dé seèn nùà Sátàn. Lòù sam, Sátàn né yeé môn, à lé veên bɔɔ́ duɔɔ́m naâ ké bèh duɔɔ̂m ndɔ. Ŋunà Càŋ lé ká cie hên nde kuú naâ bɔ̀ seé Sátàn hèllè nyoló sɔm.
62003009	Nuaá mé né ŋunà Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, dé seèn veên sèlà ndé cú; dé seèn Càŋ baá Tele seèn kɔɔ́, à veên déì bɔ́ kòmò ndé cú, à dé seèn yoòr baá seér mé kèkènè dé Càŋ.
62003010	Mɔ nùàr baá ŋunà Càŋ, bɔ́ nde né bú ŋené kɔɔ́, bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ dé Sátàn ŋené kɔɔ́ ndɔ: bɔ̀ɔ́ mé njèh teèn bɔ́ dìlì yí ŋgwéh, mé bɔ̀ mbaábɔn gwàn ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, dé bɔɔ̀n bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ sam.
62003011	Bí lé naâ ŋgòr hên ké bèh duɔɔ̂m ŋgweé gií, ye béh gwàn kú lètenè beèh gwaàn.
62003012	Mɔ né mân, sâ béh té faá Kaîn nɔ dèn; né nùà Sátàn. À lé naâ dìm seèn wulá. À lé dìm wulà naâ mé ŋgei wee? Ŋgweéh sâ lé naâ mé dɔ̀gɔ̀tì seé bɔɔ̀n mà. Seé dé seèn lé naâ veénsé; seé dé dìm dilísé. À lé dìm wulà naâ mé njéh.
62003013	Bɔ̀ nùàr mò, mɔ wɔ́ŋ baá mene bí bunó, bí té lòù géí sér.
62003014	Béh dé beèh te cio sam cuú, béh baá seér te yɔ̀ŋe. Béh né gi ménâ kɔɔ́ nyegé; lòù sam, béh né bɔ̀ mbeí beèh mé temé cén gwaán. Nuaá mé mbeí mé temé cén gwàn ŋgwéh née dé seèn te cio ye.
62003015	Nuaá mé né mbeí lè sie kwaá dɔɔ́ŋ né nùà wúlá-nùàr. Bí né gi kɔɔ́ ye nùà wúlá-nùàr dé seèn mé yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà yoòr sam.
62003016	Dé Yeésò Kristò né hiín; à gwaán lom né dé seèn nùàr mé temé cén, à lé cio beèh hên ŋa weh kuú naâ dé cî, béh ceér nùàr gwaân ŋene kɔ né teèn sâ. Mɔ né mân, béh kè wèh teèn, te béh kuú felè bɔ̀ mbeí beèh ménâ ndɔ.
62003017	Wanɔɔ́ŋ hên mɔ nuaré déì né mé ŋgúlú beè, mbeí mé njéh sam, à mbeí jere kɔ́ ŋgwéh, sâ à né mé temé Càŋ lè wa?
62003018	Bɔ̀ huaán mò, béh bí té lòm nùàr mé léláŋ sòn mbaá gwàn nágá dèn, béh gwàn gí nùàr mé temé beèh mene, mé seé beèh mene dɔɔ́ŋ.
62003019	Mɔ béh né bɔ̀ mbeí beèh mân gwaán, béh nde né teèn ŋené kɔɔ́ ye béh né bɔ̀ huaán gècên, sâ temé beèh nde né lè toò Càŋ die ndɔ.
62003020	Á, mɔ càŋ né béh lè mé njeré déì tené, sâ mé njéh mene, béh ká toò Càŋ ndé ndé cû wa? Ŋgweéh Càŋ nùà njèh né temé beèh ŋené yɔgɔ́ mà. Mè tueé bí, njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né gi njolò Càŋ.
62003021	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mɔ càŋ béh lè téné ŋgwéh, sâ béh nde né njeré déì toò seèn nyamé wa?
62003022	Béh né bú njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bieé, à nde né béh haá, ye béh né ndéb nyî jolo, wa béh bɔɔ́ né njií mé né nyí yoòr huɔɔ́m ma.
62003023	Ndéb sâ né mân: Càŋ ye, kwá njí lòm temé cén yoòr Ŋuna nyî Yeésò Kristò, wa bí né lètenè biì gwaán kuú ndɔ ma, te den faá à lé naá giì tueé kwaá nɔ.
62003024	Nuaá mé né sòn Càŋ ménâ jolo dɔɔ́ŋ, dé seèn nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr Càŋ; sâ Càŋ né bú yoòr teèn ndɔ. Mɔ béh bɔ̀ Càŋ né kɔɔ́, béh ŋgweé kɔ né mé Cúcuí seèn yoòr beèh. Càŋ lé béh ménâ haá naâ kɔɔ́.
62004001	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mɔ nuaré déì waà, né njeré déì kwarè biì tueé den, wa nyí tueé né mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ, bí té mbaá gwàn njí, bí kwé sér bú lòù. Mɔ à bí tueé né mé terreb Cúcuí dé Càŋ, bí nde né teèn ŋené kɔɔ́. Wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ dé nyenyenê baá wɔ́ŋ beè ŋab sie.
62004002	Mɔ né Cúcuí dé Càŋ, bí nde né bú dé seèn ŋené kɔɔ́: nuaá mé né bèsɔ́nè tueé ŋagá, wa né gècên, Yeésò Kristò lé naâ nùàr ŋaá ma, nuaá mé né ménâ tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, tueé né mé Cúcuí dé Càŋ sâ.
62004003	Nuaá mé né dé seèn Yeésò lòù ŋgɔɔ́n seér dɔɔ́ŋ, mé Cúcuí dé Càŋ lè sam; lè seèn né seér cúcuí nùà bùnò Kristò. Bí lé naá giì ménâ ŋgweé, ye à baá ndeê. Hên baá bú sâ, kènê à baá giì ká te wɔ́ŋe.
62004004	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ huaán mò, bí baá gi dé biì bɔ̀ dé Càŋ; bí né bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ taré yɔgɔ́. Cúcuí Càŋ baá gi bí yoòr; taré kela né bú mé cúcuí bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ hèllè.
