62004005	Bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ dé nyenyenê sâ né dé bɔɔ̀n bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ bɔ̀; bɔ́ tueé né njií mé wɔ́ŋ gwaán nê, wɔ́ŋ sòn bɔɔ̀n ŋgweé né dé cî.
62004006	Dé beèh môn sam, béh né dé beèh bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ. Nuaá mé né Càŋ kɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi dé seèn sòn beèh ŋgweé. Nuaá mé ŋunà Càŋ sam né sòn beèh lòù ŋgeén seér. Béh nùà Cúcuí gècên mé nùà cúcuí dé nyeên ŋene kɔ yeé mé njéh sâ.
62004007	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, béh gwàn kú lètenè beèh gwaàn. Lòù sam, gwaân yuo yeé beè Càŋ. Nuaá mé né nùàr mé temé cén gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ né ŋunà Càŋ, sâ nùà sâ né Càŋ kɔɔ́ ndɔ.
62004008	Nuaá mé dé seèn nùàr gwàn ŋgwéh, Càŋ kɔ́ ŋgwéh. Lòù sam, gùm Càŋ nùà njèh né gwaân sâ kɔɔ́.
62004009	À né lom béh mé temé seèn mene gwaán; à lé naâ gɔndɔŋ Ŋuna seèn ká te wɔ́ŋe temá njiî, ye te béh kwa yɔ̀ŋ mé bú. À béh gwaân seèn bèsɔ́nè feh keéh né mé njéh.
62004010	Gwaân sâ túé ŋgwéh ye béh né Càŋ gwaán komo; Càŋ nùà njèh gwaán seér né béh kɔɔ́; à lé naâ Ŋuna seèn ká lè wɔ́ŋe felè beèh temá njiî, à semé bú felè beèh, te à kulu sɔm gi béh veên yoòr mé njéh.
62004011	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mɔ Càŋ né béh mân gwaán, sâ béh gwàn kú dèn lètenè beèh môn ndɔ.
62004012	Wanɔɔ́ŋ nuaá mé lé naâ Càŋ mé njolo ŋené teèn sam. Mé njéh mene, mɔ béh né lètenè beèh mân gwaán kuú, sâ à né lè beèh teèn; sâ gwaân seèn nde né yoòr beèh jegé yuo kelâ.
62004013	Càŋ né béh Cúcuí seèn haá. Béh ŋene kɔ yeé mé njéh, ye béh né yoòr Càŋ nyɔgɔ́ den; ye à nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr beèh ndɔ.
62004014	Béh lé naá giì mé njolo beèh ŋené, ye Càŋ Tele beèh lé naâ Ŋuna seèn ká te wɔ́ŋe temá njiî, te wɔ́ŋ yili yuo mé bú. Béh né gi nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ ménâ tueé bele.
62004015	Nuaá mé né bèsɔ́nè tueé ŋagá, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, Yeésò né Ŋunà Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr Càŋ; sâ Càŋ né yoòr seèn nyɔgɔ́ den ndɔ.
62004016	Gèh gwaân mé Càŋ né béh gwaán hên, béh né gi dé beèh yoòr beèh ŋgweé kɔɔ́, béh né lom temé teèn tég kwaá njií. Lòù sam, gùm Càŋ nùà njèh né gwaân sâ. Nuaá mé né mbeí cu dɔɔ́ŋ gwaán, nyɔgɔ́ den né yoòr Càŋ, sâ Càŋ né yoòr seèn nyɔgɔ́ den ndɔ.
62004017	Mɔ béh né mé gwaân lè deí, sâ loù téná-juù béh dé beèh njeré déì nyàmè ndé cú. Lòù sam, gèh dé mé Yeésò nê, béh né ká te wɔ́ŋe môn ndɔ.
62004018	Mɔ nùàr né mé gwaân lè, à njeré déì vèh ndé cú; gwaân mé né lè seèn doô nde né veéh kwɔgɔ́ sɔm. Lòù sam, mɔ veéh né nùàr sie, sâ ndòn seèn weh né bú seé kɔɔ́, ye bú a, wò nde né gèr ŋené ma. À sé yeé baá-re ménâ veéh, gwaân Càŋ mé né bú yoòr doô mbierré yuo ndɔ.
62004019	Dé beèh, gwaân Càŋ né gi béh lè. Lòù sam, à lé naá giì béh gwaán, te béh nde ye bú gwaán.
62004020	Mɔ nuaré déì ye nyí né Càŋ gwaán, mé à né mbeí seèn lòù bunó seér, sâ nùà sâ né lom nùà nyeên, wanɔɔ́ŋ à mbeí mé né njolò seèn gwàn kòmò ŋgwéh, sé tagá Càŋ mé à mé njolo ŋéné bèh wa?
62004021	Ndéb hên Yeésò Kristò tueé né mé sòn seèn ye: kɔ nuaá mé né Càŋ gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ, gwaán mbeí seèn ndɔ, sâ ye.
62005001	Nuaá mé né temé kwaá njií, ye Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ né Yeésò, dɔɔ́ŋ né ŋunà Càŋ. Sâ nuaá mé né Tele gwaán, nde né mé bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn mene gwaán bilí ndɔ.
62005002	Mɔ béh né Càŋ gwaán, mɔ béh né sóú seèn jolo, béh nde né teèn ŋené kɔɔ́, ye sâ béh né bɔ̀ ŋunà Càŋ gwaán.
62005003	Mɔ béh né Càŋ gwaán, sâ béh né sóú seèn jolo. Sóú sâ tétán yúlá ŋgwéh ndɔ.
62005004	Lòù sam, béh né bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn; nuaá mé né ŋunà Càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ, né yeé wɔ́ŋ yɔgɔ́. Béh wɔ́ŋ yɔgɔ́ né mé temé beèh yoòr Yeésò tég kwaá njiî.
62005005	Neì wɔ́ŋ yɔgɔ́ nde né kɔɔ́ wa? Mè tueé bí, gi cegé né nuaá mé né temé yoòr Yeésò kwaá njií, ye Ŋunà Càŋ né bú.
62005006	Yeésò Kristò nùà njèh lé naâ ká te wɔ́ŋe waâ; bɔ́ kou bú nòmò; à lé naâ kuú, húɔ́m seèn ber. Lé dé léláŋ nòmò ná cégé ŋgwêh, lé naâ mé nòmò bɔ̂ húɔ́m mene. Cúcuí Ŋagâ tueé né ménâ ndɔ, ye né lom gècên. Nùà gècên né cu Cúcuí sâ ndɔ.
62005007	Bɔ̀ njií mé né gi sòn Kristò tueé né tagár:
62005008	Cúcuí né ménâ tueé, nòmò bɔ̂ húɔ́m tueé cu né ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ̀ njèh tagár hên tueé gi né mé sòn cên dɔɔ́ŋ.
62005009	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye bɔ̀ nùàr né yeé béh njeré déì tueé, béh ŋgweé sòn bɔɔ̀n, sé tagá sòn dé Càŋ wa? Bí kékɔɔ̀ ye kela né sòn dé Càŋ mé dé bɔ̀ nùàr. Dé Càŋ, à tueé né felè Ŋuna seèn nùà njèh.
62005010	Sâ nuaá mé né temé cén yoòr Ŋunà Càŋ kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, nde né yoòr seèn ŋgweé kɔɔ́, ye né gècên. Nuaá mé temé yoòr Càŋ kwá njí ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, sie né Càŋ nyeén ndɔ; wanɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ nùà njèh né mene mé sòn seèn felè Ŋuna seèn tueé ŋagá, nùà hèllè seèn temé teèn kwá njí ŋgwéh nɔ.
62005011	Bèh hên tueé né sòn Yeésò sâ, ye Càŋ béh yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà haá baá kèn; wa yɔ̀ŋ sâ yuo yeé beè Ŋuna seèn ma.
62005012	Sâ nuaá mé né beè Ŋuna seèn dɔɔ́ŋ né mé yɔ̀ŋ sâ yoòr. Nuaá mé beè Ŋunà Càŋ dèn ŋgwéh, dé seèn mé yɔ̀ŋ sâ yoòr sam.
62005013	Bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi ndèm lè yilí Ŋunà Càŋ kwaá njií dɔɔ́ŋ, mè hên nyagá njií né mé bí, te bí kɔ nyegé ye bí baá mé yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà teèn ma.
62005014	Béh njeré déì toò Càŋ nyàmè cú. Béh né gi bagasé kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye mɔ béh né bú njeré déì te sòn seène dua yií wa, à nde né sòn beèh ŋgweé ma.
62005015	Mɔ béh né gi mân kɔɔ́ nyegé, ye à né yeé sòn beèh ŋgweé, sâ béh kɔ gi aá kèn ye béh kwa baá njií sâ ndɔ.
62005016	Mɔ nuaré déì ŋene mbeí sela baá veên mé nùàr te cio tùlù yí ŋgwéh, bú a, dùà lòm Càŋ felè mbeí hèllè tég; Càŋ nde né mbeí sâ yili sɔm. Njèh cén, kɔ né ka veên mé nùàr te cio tùlù yí ŋgwéh sâ ndɔ. Veên déì né teèn, né yeé nùàr te cio tulu yií. Mè túé ŋgwéh ye bí dùà Càŋ te gèh bú sâ.
62005017	Bɔ̀ seé vevenê né ŋgún; dɔɔ́ŋ né gi núlú. Njèh cén, bɔ̀ déì nùàr mé njéh kú ndé ŋgwéh.
62005018	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, mɔ nùàr né ŋunà Càŋ, à mé veên bɔ́ dèn ndé cú. Ŋunà Càŋ né bú cií nyegé, Sátàn bú dé seèn cór ndé ŋgwéh.
62005019	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, béh né dé beèh bɔ̀ dé Càŋ, wa wɔ́ŋ né dé seèn beè Sátàn.
62005020	Béh né gi kɔɔ́ ye, Ŋunà Càŋ lé naâ ká yoòr beèh waâ, à lé naâ béh feh komo lɔgɔ́, te béh ŋene kɔ Càŋ gècên mé njéh. Béh yoòr Càŋ gècên sâ nyɔgɔ́ den né mé Ŋuna seèn Yeésò Kristò. Càŋ dé gècên gi lom né bú; yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà né lom bú ndɔ.
62005021	Bɔ̀ huaán mò, bí gè lòm mé ceér cècàŋ nɔɔ́ŋ.
63001001	Né mè nùà koô gwà Càŋ nyagá né wò kɔɔ́. Mè né wò bieé dé vêh, mè né bɔ̀ ŋuna yeè bieé ndɔ. Càŋ lé balé sɔɔ́m naâ wò kɔɔ́; mè né wò mé gècên mene gwaán. Mè gí lòm ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ŋgòr gècên kɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi wò gwaán ndɔ.
63001002	Lòù sam, béh né mé ŋgòr gècên yoòr, ŋgòr gècên sâ le den nde né yoòr beèh dé ndeèr.
63001003	Béh bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ceér gècên bele, mé né lètenè beèh gwaán kuú dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ Tele beèh bɔ̂ Ŋuna seèn Yeésò Kristò nde né béh kulú, bɔ́ nde né béh jere kɔɔ́, bɔ́ nde né béh dɔlê haá ndɔ.
63001004	Lé naá loôm mè yoòr mé gècên mene nɔré huɔɔ́m. Lòù sam, mè lé naâ bɔ̀ huaán yeè déì te ceér gècên kwa, bɔ́ bele lom né faá Tele beèh né béh sɔgɔ́ nɔ.
63001005	Teèn sâ, mè né wò bɔŋ, dé vêh, béh gwàn kú dèn ká lètenè beèh gwaàn. Ndéb bú hên dé feê sam, né den ka ndéb mé béh bí lé naá giì ké bèh duɔɔ̂m ŋgweé doô, mè wò hên nyagá njií cu né cí.
63001006	Mɔ béh né lètenè beèh gwaán kuú, sâ béh né sòn seèn jolo. Càŋ lé naá giì ménâ soú kwaá, ye bí gwàn kú bèh lètenè biì gwaàn. Bí lé naá giì ké bèh duɔɔ̂m ŋgweé ndɔ.
63001007	Mè lòù túé ŋgwéh, bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ ŋab sie aá wɔ́ŋ beè; bɔ́ né lom berɔ́ŋ, ye Yeésò Kristò lé nùàr ŋá ná ŋgwêh. Mè tueé bí ndɔ, nuaá mé né mân tueé dɔɔ́ŋ né nùà nyeên, né nùà bùnò Kristò sâ.
63001008	Bí kɔ́gɔ́n lòm beè bɔɔ̀n dé gècên, te sàgà seê biì ndeè mbaá vù lè cú, bí ndeè bú kwa gi mé gùm mene.
63001009	Nuaá mé né ŋgòr felè Kristò ŋgeén, né seér dé hiîn sagá yií dɔɔ́ŋ, dé seèn beè Càŋ sam; beè Càŋ bɔ̂ Ŋuna seèn né seér nuaá mé né yeé ndéb Kristò jolo.
63001010	Mè tueé bí, mɔ nuaré déì waà ké yoòr biì, à ndéb Yeésò Kristò fèh ŋgwéh, bí té bú gwò yí kéh, bí lím bílí bú mé dé bieê mene dɔɔ́ŋ.
63001011	Lòù sam, nuaá mé né gèh bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ bieé, né gèh veên mé bɔ́ né bɔɔ́ sâ lòù seén. Sâ be seèn né teèn ndɔ.
63001012	Mè né lom mé ŋgòr lè ŋgún. Njèh cén, mè bí lòù nyàgà ndé ŋgwéh, mè gwaán kela né ké yoòr biì mé feh mò yɔŋ ndeê, te béh bí tueé kɔ mé sòn, béh samé gi mé gùm mene.
63001013	Bɔ̀ Ŋunà bei yeè mé Càŋ lé balé sɔɔ́m naâ hên ye bíé kéh wò.
64001001	Né mè nùà koô gwà Càŋ nyagá né wò kɔɔ́. Yíé-temé mò Gayûs, mè né wò bieé. Mè né wò mé gècên mene gwaán.
64001002	Mbeí mò, mè né lom gwaán ye njèh dɔɔ́ŋ a, yùò húɔ́m gí beè yeè lòù, wò té bán ndɔ. Dé ceér Càŋ beleè, mè né gi bagasé kɔɔ́ nyegé ye càŋ wò lè téné ndé ŋgwéh.
64001003	Mè né lom mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé felè yeè dé gècên. Lòù sam, bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ lé naâ waâ, bɔ́ keí huɔm wò toò mò, bɔ́ ye mè a, gècên yeè né yieé, wa wò né ceér gècên bele huɔɔ́m ma.
64001004	Mè túé kɔ́ cú mbeí mò, kènê bèh nɔ́ré-temé mò dɔɔ́ŋ baá lom bèh mé bɔ̀ huaán mò né gi ceér gècên teèn bele huɔɔ́m hên.
64001005	Mbeí mò, kɔ́ɔ ye mé nyí né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé gècên mene gam sâ, nyí bɔɔ́ yií né teèn ma. Wò né mé bɔ̀ dé kìn mene gam bilí ndɔ.
64001006	Bɔ́ né yeé ká te bɔ̀ŋ beèh waâ, bɔ́ né yilí yeè teèn keí huɔɔ́m, ye wò né lom bɔ́ gwaán dé gècên. Kúkùr yeè, gàm dèn ká bɔ́ mé temé Càŋ lè ménâ, te bɔ́ gɔ nde den mé gò bɔɔ̀n tetoò.
64001007	Bɔ́ lé yuoó baá gò kèn, ye bɔ́ nde aá bèh seé dé Kristò, bɔ́ gwàn bèh njeré déì beè bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́ bɔ̀ kemaà ndɔ.
64001008	Sâ kɔ béh gàm gèh bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ kɔɔ́, te béh bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ yií gi be te seé gècénè.
64001009	Mè lé naâ huaán mvù déì mân te bɔ̀ŋ biì nyagá njií. Njèh cén, Dìòteréfè mé gwaán né felè bɔɔ̀n deèn, né yeé ŋgòr mò doó si njií.
64001010	Bú a, kwá-re seèn nɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ, mè baá ndeê. Mɔ mè waà baá, bɔ̀ veên mé à lé bɔɔ́ giì naâ dɔɔ́ŋ, mè nde gi né cie salé sɔm; bɔ̀ ŋgòr jejelâ, mé bɔ̀ nyeén seèn yoòr beèh dɔɔ́ŋ, mè nde gi né loù sâ salé sɔm. Dé sâ gí cégé ŋgwéh; bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ mé waà né kìn ké sâ dɔɔ́ŋ, à bɔ́ gwàn bèh. Bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ bɔ̀ ye te bɔ́ sie nyegé mene bɔ́, à né bɔ́ yiín ndɔ. Né mene te bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀, à né bɔ́ teèn kwɔgɔ́ sɔm bele ndɔ.
64001011	Mbeí mò, té dé yeè gule bɔ̀ vevenê bɔ̀ bèlè, bèlè sér gule nùà bagaà. Nuaá mé né bagaà bɔɔ́, né ŋunà Càŋ kɔɔ́; nuaá mé né yeé dé seèn veên kema dɔɔ́ŋ née mé Càŋ njolò sam ye.
64001012	Dé Dèmeteriyû, nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ né seé seèn keí laré. Gècên né sòn seèn ménâ tueé; béh tueé taré né sòn seèn ménâ ndɔ. Wò né gi kɔɔ́ ye béh tueé yeé gècên; béh tueé né gècên sâ.
64001013	Mè né lom mé ŋgòr lè ŋgún mbaá; mé njéh mene mè wò lòù nyàgà ndé ŋgwéh.
64001014	Mè gwaán kela né ké yoòr yeè mé feh mò ndeê. Nde né toò hên, te bélɔ̀ tueé kɔ mé sòn; huɔm kela né cí.
64001015	Kùsèm, dèn mé dɔlê. Bɔ̀ mbeí yeè ye bíé kéh wò. Bíé kéh bɔ̀ mbeí beèh ké sâ cécéné cécéné dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
65001001	Né mè Jûde, nùà seê Yeésò Kristò; mè né dìm Jâk. Mè nyagá njií né mé bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé temé Càŋ né yoòr biì, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ Tele beèh né bí yilá, à né bí beè Yeésò Kristò kurú kwaá dɔɔ́ŋ.
65001002	Bú a, kɔ́ bí jere teèn; dɔlê mé gwaân seèn a, yám sìè bí beè.
65001003	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, mè lé tétég lege loóm naâ ye te mè nyagá njií bí mvù felè ceér mé béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né teèn yili yuo. Mé njéh mene, kɔ mè bí nyagá seér mvù dé hên, te toó nyegé bí toò, te bí lege njií ceér Càŋ ter. Né ceér dé kèì cên mé à lé naâ mé bɔ̀ dé seèn haá.
65001004	Wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ déì baá lètenè biì nabé yilá; fùgò Càŋ mé béh né dé lòù kuú den hên, bɔ́ né bú lòù feré seér, bɔ́ né ceér teèn kwa keéh, te bɔ́ teré yilá kɔ te núlu. Bɔ́ yeé baá ménâ bɔɔ́, bɔ́ né Yeésò Kristò gɔndɔŋ Nùà koô beèh cén mé njéh gè jomo yalé si njií. Sâ Nùà Dueè né lom bú ndɔ. Kwá-re nɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ mà, bɔ́ nde né gèr ŋené, dàb mé mvù Càŋ luɔm kwaá gi aá kèn, ye bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ nde né ju die.
65001005	Mè kɔ né ye bí né gi bagasé kɔɔ́ nyegé. Mé njéh mene, bí kwá mè kemá weh cu bí gèh dé mé Nùà Dueè lé yili sɔɔ́m naâ dàm bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà te tàbè Ejíptò hên ye. À lé naâ bɔ́ yili sɔm; mé njéh mene à yeé ŋene bɔ̀ déì temé yoòr seèn kwá njí ŋgwéh, à wula sɔm gi bɔ́.
65001006	Lé naá cuù mé bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ déì ménâ ndɔ; bɔ́ yeé baá mé feh bɔɔ̀n den, bɔ́ faá Càŋ lé tueé naâ nɔ dèn cú, Càŋ lé naâ mé bɔ́ ké kunduŋ te ndèndèŋ cibî mgbátág sie ndeé, à ferá lɔ bɔ́ te fɔ̀gɔ̀ lɔ̀ŋe. Wa hên bɔ́ bɔ́ née ka ké sâ jueé den ye. Càŋ ye, mɔ cieé ju tenâ ndeè waà baá, bɔ́ ju die ye dé tíndɔ̂g.
65001007	Lé naá cuù mé Sɔ́dɔ̀m bɔ̂ Gɔmɔ̂r mé bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ kukwarè ménâ ndɔ. Bɔ́ né be mé sár kwaá njií. Njií mé môn sam bèh, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ seér cí. Yeé yɔgɔ́ baá, ŋgweéh Càŋ lé naâ bɔ́ we tarê yoòr jege si, te nùàr kàn ŋgweé kwaá dé seèn tieè wa?
65001008	Mè tueé bí, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né lètenè biì nabé yilá hên, né ménâ bɔɔ́ ndɔ; bɔ́ né ndòn jurá se bele, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ nùàr te núlu mé njéh kulu su, bɔ́ né terreb dé Càŋ mé njéh seb, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ké ter ka vulúu séb teèn tɔbé yií ndɔ.
65001009	Sâ gèh njií bú séná, né mene Mikael cìlì Càŋ dé koô doô, lé ménâ bɔ́ ná ŋgwêh. Bɔ̂ Sátàn lé né mene tɔgɔ felè komó Músì nde, bɔ́ né kweé kuú, mé njéh mene Mikael lé gwàn ná ŋgwêh Sátàn ju yoòr luú njiî, à bú lòù séí ŋgwéh ndɔ, à tueé cegé ye bú a: Bî Càŋ jue nde né kɔɔ́.»
65001010	Dé bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀ hèllè môn sam. Njií mé bɔ́ ŋgwé kɔ́ ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né mbaá selé njií. Bɔ́ né faá bɔ̀ nyam ya dueè nɔ munó cur gɔ. Bɔ́ sé yeé baá ménâ fur gɔ, bɔ́ leér le keéh teèn.
65001011	Gèr bɔɔ̀n fî ndɔ! Bɔ́ bɔɔ̀n gèh ceér Kaîn sâ belé né dé keì? Bɔ́ bɔɔ̀n te kàgàlɔ̀ŋ faá Balam nɔ die sabé yila né dé keì ndɔ? Bɔ́ mbaá kú ŋgwéh, yìè né ka mé táré-feh bɔɔ̀n faá Korê nɔ.
65001012	Mɔ bɔ́ né lètenè biì teèn, loù kúmnjûg sâ bɔ̀ nùàr nde né felè bɔɔ̀n cenné dielé keéh. Bɔ́ fegùlì kwá bèh, bɔ́ kɔ cegé yeé dé bɔɔ̀n, bɔ́ dé nùàr táŋ bèh. Bɔ́ den né faá vúlú nuù nɔ mé fu né mé njéh kobó jɔgɔ́ ndeé, nu teèn sam. Bɔ́ den cu né faá toú ŋgiín ndɔ; né mene jàtenè, bɔ́ tàb wá bèh. Komó jaâr te mbeî fà mé jɔgɔb muró die gi aá cie kèn, ceré né bɔ́.
65001013	Bɔ́ den né faá leba nòmò koô furú ŋaáŋ yeé ké dùà nɔ. Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ seé fegùlì bɔɔ́ bele, te bɔ́ sé yeé yuo, cíciíb huar le. Bɔ́ den cu né faá mbentò sàr ndɔ. Bèh denè bɔɔ̀n dé kèì cên mé Càŋ kwaá né bɔ́, né lom ké kunduŋ te ndèndèŋ cibì mgbátág.
65001014	Né Hénɔ̀g, ndùté ndùtù Ádàm, huaán dé lèmè téhbeèh né bú, à lɔ naâ felè bɔɔ̀n ŋené, Càŋ lɔ ye bú a: Júée bɔ̀ nùàr a: Ŋgwé, Nùà Dueè ndeè né mé bɔ̀ cìlì seèn dé jojoloò kem waâ, bɔ́ nde lom né mgbɔ́ŋ mbaá,
65001015	te à weh sie ju felè nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ tenâ ma, te bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ mé lé naâ taáb mé bú lieé njií dɔɔ́ŋ yila gi beè mé jéré-temé bɔɔ̀n sâ. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá giì bú bɔ̀ ŋgòr jéré-temê yoòr tueé njií dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né gèr mé nyie fî yieé.»
65001016	Bɔ̀ nùà hên né yɔgɔ́ bɔ̀n; cu dɔɔ́ŋ temé bɔɔ̀n lè nɔ́ré bèh; sònò mbembaá ndugó gɔɔ̀ né seé bɔɔ̀n; bɔ́ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ ŋaáŋ gɔ né mé feh bɔɔ̀n; seé bɔɔ̀n né ŋgòr mèŋàŋ sònò tueé gɔɔ̀ faá bèh sâ ndɔ; bɔ́ gwagá yieé lom né mé tánágá, bɔ́ ŋueé mé leba.
65001017	Bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò lé naâ bí toò tueé kwaá doô, bí té nyèn.
65001018	Bɔ́ lé ye bí a: mɔ ndeè baá te nàm cèrè jomò wa, bɔ̀ nuaré déì ndeè né yuo kelâ, bɔ́ weh bí séb ma; wa bɔ́ nde né mé bɔ̀ njèh vevenê faá temé bɔɔ̀n gwaán nê nɔ, bɔɔ́ kuú ndɔ.
65001019	Mè tueé bí, yìè kèrrè lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr né bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀. Bɔ́ mé Cúcuí Càŋ yoòr sam, yoòr bɔɔ̀n tab lom né njèh wɔ̂ŋ.
65001020	Dé biì bɔ̀ mbeí mò, bí fágá feh, bí kwá yám njí lòm temé cén yoòr Yeésò, faá Càŋ né bí feh nɔ. Bí dùà lòm Càŋ mé terreb Cúcuí Ŋagâ mene dɔɔ́ŋ.
65001021	Càŋ né bí gwaán, bí mé dèn gí ka seèn nɔɔ́ŋ, bí né Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò meì bɔ̀ húɔ́m-temé bɔ̀ teèn gaán den, te à ndeè cuù, bí kwa yɔ̀ŋ tètàgà beè seèn.
65001022	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né beè Yeésò den ndɔré gɔ, bí kɔ́ bɔ́ jere teèn,
65001023	bí yìlì sɔ̀m sér bɔ́ lòù, bí né bɔ́ tuar gellé sɔm keéh. Bí kɔ́ cú bɔ̀ mbaábi déì jere toò faá bèh sâ ndɔ. Njèh cén, bí cíéŋ lòù, bí dùlà bílí mé bɔ̀ kurú cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n mene, wanɔɔ́ŋ dé sâ né seé ŋgàŋ yoòr.
65001024	Dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè Càŋ. À né mé terreb, à nde né bí cií te bí dìè cú. À nde né bí ké mbàm bèh sùsùm weh njií, te bí den lom toò seèn kɔ́bè sâ, bí samé kuú mé vɔ́gɔ́-temé beè seèn.
65001025	Béh sén bú seèn! Càŋ sùsùm gi lom né bú. À béh mé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò Kristò yili sɔm né kɔɔ́! Wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ a, vèh bílí gí mou terrèb seèn hên veèh. Nùà sùsùm gi cegé né bú; be terrèb seèn cie dé kèì cên ŋené le lom nde né kɔɔ́. Lɔ duɔɔ́m naâ mân, née den ka môn ye, nde den cu nde né kèì cén ménâ tɔ́g dé tueê sam. È môn!
66001001	Te mvù hên né gi dɔ̀gɔ̀tì njií mé Yeésò Kristò lé naâ cie ŋené sɔm keéh. Càŋ lé ye bú a, bɔ̀ njií mé nde giì né waâ dɔɔ́ŋ, ndé bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ seèn njolò ŋené feh kwaá ma. Yeé baá ménâ, Yeésò Kristò tema njií cìlì seèn déì ké yoòr Jâŋ nùà seê seèn ndɔ.
66001002	Jâŋ yeé ŋene gi aá, à se kwaá gi bɔ̀ nùàr njií sâ dɔɔ́ŋ tieè, ye bɔ́ a: Hên né ŋgòr Càŋ, njèh gècên mé Yeésò Kristò tueé naâ mé sòn seèn.
66001003	Bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé né sònò Càŋ yuo hên, nuaá mé né bú ké ter toò bɔ̀ nùàr jaŋé njií dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde né bú kulú. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ŋgweé, mé né faá tueé nê nɔ bɔɔ́, à kulu nde né bɔ́ ménâ ndɔ. Mè tueé bí, baá dìdì.
66001004	Né mè Jâŋ, mè nyagá njií né mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bɔ̀ŋ téhbeh te tàbè Asíà dɔɔ́ŋ. Càŋ a, kúlú bí, à haá bí dɔlê. À né léí jɔ̀gɔ̀, à né kènê, ké jomo yɔ́ŋgɔŋ né cu bú ndɔ. Bɔ̀ cúcuí téhbeh mé njebá yeé toò kɔgɔ seèn a, kúlú bí, bɔ́ haá bí dɔlê.
66001005	Yeésò Kristò a, kúlú bí, à haá bí dɔlê ndɔ. Sòn-Càŋ jéjêg né bú, à lé te cio komo yuo lɔgɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́. Nùà njèh né bú, felè bɔ̀ mgbè dɔɔ́ŋ né bú ndɔ. À né béh gwaán. Mé húɔ́m seèn, à lé naâ béh lè veên yili sɔm,
66001006	béh ŋa bɔ̀ huaán ké mbàm, te béh den bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè, béh bɔɔ́ seé Tele seèn Càŋ. Kùsèm be terrèb seèn a, sùmù yùò kélá dèn cie dé nyèmà mé nyèmà. È môn.
66001007	Bí kè njí ké ter te bègè kíê, ka suaga né bú. Bɔ̀ nùàr nde né bú dɔɔ́ŋ ŋené laré; bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ bú kwar mé gwaga sieé lɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né bú loù sâ mé njolo ŋené cuú. Dàm bɔ̀ nùàr ká doó dɔɔ́ŋ nde né loù sâ mé yúé jomo seèn saá kuú. Dé sâ nde né môn bɔɔ́. È môn.
66001008	Feh né mè; tií né mè ndɔ.» Né Càŋ ndeèr tueé né kɔɔ́. Sâ bí kɔ́ɔ ye, à né léí jɔ̀gɔ̀, à né kènê, ké jomo yɔ́ŋgɔŋ né cu bú ndɔ. Terreb dɔɔ́ŋ né gi beè seèn.
66001009	Né mè Jâŋ, bei biì. Béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ né gi yoòr Yeésò. Né mene gèr, né béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ. Ké mbàm né béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ. Béh bí dɔɔ́ŋ yolo bilí né kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Bɔ́ lé mè dé mò sieé naâ, sâ mè né ŋgòr Càŋ tueé, bɔ́ weh njií mè ké Pàtòmósè; ten tàbè sâ tené le né ké lètenè ndèndèŋ nòmò mân. Bɔ́ ye, mè lé ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: Yeésò né lom nùà gècên kɔɔ́ fí.
66001010	Yeé baá mé cieé dé Fehtoò beèh, Cúcuí Ŋagâ waà kema mè ndɔ. Mè yeé ŋgweé, ké jomo mò hueh déì baá teèn ŋgulí mbamé den faá tàŋ nɔ;
66001011	ye: Bɔ̀ njií mé wò né ŋené hên dɔɔ́ŋ, wèh mvù, nyàgà kwá gí teèn, wò tema njií mé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bɔ̀ŋ téhbeh dɔɔ́ŋ ma; bɔ̀ŋ dé ké Efêse, bɔ̀ŋ dé ké Smírnè, bɔ̀ŋ dé ké Pérgàm, bɔ̀ŋ dé ké Tiatîr, bɔ̀ŋ dé ké Sârdè, bɔ̀ŋ dé ké Filadelfî mé bɔ̀ŋ dé ké Laodísè.»
66001012	Mè yeé baá mân ŋgweé, mè bele seér, te mè ke njií nuaá mé né tueé den sâ. Mè ŋene njií tàndáŋ lâm téhbeh; bɔ́ me né mé goó.
66001013	Njeré déì né ké lètenè bɔɔ̀n faá nùàr nɔ. À né mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ suù dàbsé mân yoòr, à cam tena né ká te kàŋe mé kàndá goô mân ndɔ.
66001014	Yúlí feèh wula njeré lom né bú felè pób faá nyɔgɔ́r nɔ; njolo né lom bú lè bɔ gui faá bɔgɔ́ weè ndɔ.
66001015	Bɔ̀ gule né lom yɔ̂ŋ, faá tugó sieé né yí tuar nɔ. Hueh ŋgugó lom né bú beè faá vùvù nòmò koô ndɔ.
66001016	Be gaâ seèn weh sie né mbentò téhbeh. À nema kwaá né tàndɔ̀ŋ bòù sònò, kèb fà dɔɔ́ŋ nulásé túéŋ. Kuún seèn beéh tɔgɔ́m lom né dé tɔgɔ̂m faá lou suútenè nɔ.
66001017	Mè yeé ŋene aá bú ménâ, mè jɔgɔ die nde doó gulè seèn faá komó nɔ. À kema njií mè be gaâ yoòr, ye mè a: Té vèh! Feh né mè; tií né mè ndɔ.
66001018	Yɔ̀ŋ né beè mò. Mè lé naâ kuú, mè baá cu làŋ dé kèì cên, mè baá mé terreb felè cio mé ndugo bɔ̀ càŋ mene.»
66001019	Jomo sâ ye mè a: Nyàgà-re nyagà mà! Nyàgà gí ká bɔ̀ njií mé wò né ŋené hên: bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né kènê bɔɔ́, mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde cu né toò hên bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, nyènyagà.»
66001020	À den cuù ye mè a: Kwá mè se wò kwɔ̀m mbentò téhbeèh mé wò né ká te be gaâ mò ŋené hên; mè se cu wò dé bɔ̀ tàndáŋ lâm goô téhbeh doô ndɔ. Bɔ̀ mbentò téhbeh hên né bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ felè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bɔ̀ŋ téhbeh; bɔ̀ tàndáŋ lâm téhbeh hên né bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ bɔ̀ŋ téhbeh ndɔ.»
66002001	Nyàgà njí mé cìlì Càŋ dé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Efêse, júée bú a: Nuaá mé be gaâ seèn weh sie né mbentò téhbeh tueé né kɔɔ́; à né ké lètenè bɔ̀ tàndáŋ lâm goô téhbeèh yɔŋ den, ye:
66002002	Mè né seé yeè kɔɔ́ ma. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, wò né gèr mé seé ŋené, wò né yoló ndɔ. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, bɔ̀ jéré-temé bɔ̀ ceér beè yeè kwà bèh. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bɔ̀ nùàr bele gɔ, wa bɔ́ né mbɔ̀ŋ tebê dɔɔ́ŋ, wò né bɔ́ kweé nyegé, wò sie bɔ́ nyeén.
66002003	Wò né gèr felè mò yoló, temé yeè lè kú ŋgwéh.
66002004	Né gi môn dág. Njèh cén, wò mè faá ké bèh duɔɔ̂m nɔ gwàn nyégé cú.
66002005	Mè tueé wò, ŋéné kɔ́ cú bèh hèllè ŋenè, wò kweéh seér temé, wò bɔɔ́ cu faá léí toò nɔ. Mɔ sam, mè ndeè né yoòr yeè ŋaár waâ, mè ko sɔm tàndáŋ lâm yeè bèh denè seèn.
66002006	Mé njéh mene, wò bɔɔ́ cu née yeè baga ndɔ. Lòù sam, wò né seé bɔ̀ Nikolâ bɔ̀ berɔ́ŋ; mè berɔ́ŋ taré né toò ménâ ndɔ.
66002007	Ŋgòr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tueé den hên, nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé bú bagasé. Nuaá mé nde né veên taré yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, mè nde né bú ké mbar Càŋ yií keéh, à kaga yieé tàb toú yɔ̀ŋ.»
66002008	Nyàgà njí mé cìlì Càŋ dé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Smírnè, júée bú a: Nuaá mé feh né bú, tií né bú, tueé né kɔɔ́; à lé naâ kuú, à baá cu làŋ. Ye:
66002009	Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, wò né dàm gèr ŋené; mè né saám yeè kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Mè tueé wò, mé njéh mene, wò né seér nùà sèsàm. Ŋgòr jéré-temê mé bɔ̀ nùàr né felè yeè tueé dɔɔ́ŋ, mè né gi ŋgweé. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ ye bɔ́ né Jûf sé wa, sâ bɔ́ Jûf déì sam ndɔ, né lom bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Sátàn bɔ̀.
66002010	Mè tueé wò, té gèr mé wò nde cu né ŋené doô vèh nyì. Bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ nùàr biì déì gwà cibì domó yií, Sátàn nde né bí ceéh, bí nde né mé gèr kwaré; nde né dé cie yulà. Mé njéh mene, ŋgɔ́n lòm cio tég, wò den kɔ́bè sâ, mè nde né wò tàm ŋgɔ̂g sulí; tàm sâ né yɔ̀ŋ.
66002011	Ŋgòr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tueé den hên, nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé bú bagasé. Nuaá mé nde né veên taré yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, dé seèn núr cioò dé jomò ŋgwé ndé cú.»
66002012	Nyàgà njí mé cìlì Càŋ dé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Pérgàm, júée bú a: Nuaá mé né tueé hên né mé tàndɔ̀ŋ bòù sònò, kèb fà dɔɔ́ŋ nulásé túéŋ, ye:
66002013	Mè né bèh denè yeè kɔɔ́; wò né ké bèh mé kɔgɔ Sátàn né teèn. Mé njéh mene, wò temé kwaá njií lom né yoòr mò. Ké te lege Sátàn sâ, bɔ́ lé naá menè Antipas sòn mò jéjêg teèn wulá, wò lé temé yoòr mò sɔ̀m ná ŋgwêh.
66002014	Né gi môn dág. Njèh cén, bɔ̀ nuaré déì né ké beè yeè sâ teèn, bɔ́ né ŋgòr Balam ŋgweé. Sâ Balam lɔ naâ Balák ceér veên feh, te à kulu su bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà te veéne, bɔ́ né sèmè cècàŋ yieé, bɔ́ né yàgà ndeé ndɔ.
66002015	Wò né cu mé bɔ̀ nuaré déì teèn, bɔ́ né ŋgòr bɔ̀ Nikolâ bɔ̀ ŋgweé ndɔ.
66002016	Mɔ né mân, sâ kwéh sér cú dene yeè. Mɔ sam, mè ndeè né ké yoòr yeè ŋaár waâ, mè kɔré wula gi bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ mé bòù sònò mò hên. Ŋgágá ndé cú.
66002017	Ŋgòr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tueé den hên, nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé bú bagasé. Nuaá mé nde né veên taré yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, nde né yáb mé bɔ́ yilá né mánà” doô yieé; nuaré déì bèh sâ kɔ́ ŋgwéh. Mè haá kwaá nde né bú taá ndòn beè, mé yilí feê déì né teèn nyagá den. Nuaré déì yilí bú sâ ŋéné kɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh; gi lom né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né mé njéh beè.»
66002018	Nyàgà njí mé cìlì Càŋ dé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Tiatîr, júée bú a: Ŋgòr hên, Ŋunà Càŋ tueé né kɔɔ́. Nùà sâ, njolo bɔ gui lom né bú lè faá bɔgɔ́ weè nɔ, gule bɔ lom né yɔ̂ŋ, faá tugó sieé den né yí tuar ndɔ. À ye:
66002019	Mè né gi seé yeè kɔɔ́; wò né mé gwaân lè; wò né nùà gècên, wò né seé sie, wò né yoló ndɔ. Mè né kɔɔ́ ye, wò bɔɔ́ kela né seé kènê mé léí toò.
66002020	Wò bɔɔ́ gi né ménâ dág. Njèh cén, wò Jasebêl yín bèh dé keì? Ma sâ né yeé bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ mò bele, wa nyí né sòn-Càŋ sé wa. À né bɔ́ ceér veên feh, ye bɔ́ a, ndé yàgà mbaá, bɔ́ yíé sèmè cècàŋ ndɔ.
66002021	Mè né mene bú cieé kulá haá, te à kweéh seér teèn, à kɔ lom né yàgà seèn ndeê.
66002022	Mɔ né mân, mè nde né bɔ́ bɔ̀ yàgà seèn dɔɔ́ŋ gèr feh, à nde né dé seèn lè ndagáa keré le. Mɔ sam, kɔ bɔ́ kweéh seér temé, bɔ́ sɔm be teèn, sâ ye.
66002023	Mè nde cu né bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn wulá ceré ndɔ, te bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ŋene kɔ teèn ye, mè né mùnò nùàr mé temé nùàr ŋené gií ma. Nùà kàn kwa nde né sàgà beè mò mé gèh seé seèn.
66002024	Bí bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ déì ké Tiatîr sâ, dé biì be te ŋgòr sâ cór yí ŋgwéh. Bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ́ yilá né gùgò Sátàn hèllè, bí temé teèn kwá njí bèh ndɔ. Mè bí dé biì mbaá tágá kú ndé ŋgwéh;
66002025	kɔ né cegé dé hên: bí sìè dèn ká ŋgòr Càŋ tég faá bèh sâ nɔ; te mè ndeè cuù, mè kwa bí teèn.
66002026	Nuaá mé nde né veên taré yɔgɔ́, mé jolo komo nde né njií mé mè gwaán nê dɔɔ́ŋ, nde né terreb beè mò kwa. Mè haá nde né bú terreb felè nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ,
66002027	à feh nde né bɔ́ ceér mé cùgò lɔ̀ŋ, à nde né bɔ́ faá màr nɔ tieé. À nde né terreb beè mò kwa faá mè lé kwaá naâ terreb beè Tele mò nɔ.
66002028	À gɔ nde né mé cɔ́ beè.
66002029	Ŋgòr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tueé den hên, nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé bú bagasé.»
66003001	Nyàgà njí mé cìlì Càŋ dé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Sârdè, júée bú a: Ŋgòr hên yuo né sònò nuaá mé weh sie né cúcuí téhbeh mé mbentò téhbeh beè; ye: Mè né gi seé yeè kɔɔ́. Yilí yeé né toò bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgulí, ye wò né làŋ; kàmbér wò né seér komó.
66003002	Mɔ né mân, nyìmè dèn cú làŋ, wò taré be mé dé jomò ndɔ. Mɔ sam, nde gi né dɔɔ́ŋ kuú yuo. Mè ŋene, seé yeè ké beè Càŋ né gi gogobó mbaá.
66003003	Ŋgweéh wò lé naá giì ŋgòr Càŋ ŋgweé, wò gwaán ndɔ wa? Mùnò cú munò; wò kweéh seér temé, wò bɔɔ́ cí. Mɔ sam, mè kar waà nde né yoòr yeè lòù, nde né faá nùà yîb nɔ, wò cu sâ kɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh.
66003004	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ nuaré déì né lètenè biì ké Sârdè sâ teèn, jéré cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n kèmà bèh. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ nde né mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ ŋeŋagâ yoòr wulá njerré den; béh bɔ́ nde né bècénè gɔ, bɔ́ wulu né wulù.
66003005	Nuaá mé nde né veên taré yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ nde né mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ wulê ménâ beè mò su kuú. Mè yilí seèn te mvù yɔ̀ŋe fɔ̀ sɔ̀m ndé ŋgwéh. Mè nde né bú toò Tele mò mé bɔ̀ cìlì seèn mene gwaán weh.
66003006	Ŋgòr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tueé den hên, nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé bú bagasé.»
66003007	Nyàgà njí mé cìlì Càŋ dé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Filadelfî, júée bú a: Nùà joloò tueé né ŋgòr hên kɔɔ́, nùà gècên né bú, à né mé kî Mgbè Davîd beè, à gulu yeé kɔɔ́; mɔ à gulu baá, nùàr cóló cú; à colo yeé kɔɔ́; mɔ à colo baá, nùà gùlù bèh ndɔ. À ye:
66003008	Mè né gi seé yeè kɔɔ́; mè né kɔɔ́ ye, terreb yeè né lom ŋgɔ́b. Mé njéh mene, wò né sòn mò ŋgweé, wò né bɔ̀ nùàr yilí mò saán keéh. Kènê, hin baá toò yeè lɔŋ, mè gulu kwaá né wò, nuaré déì a, jɔ̀gɔ̀ kema ke ye.
66003009	Bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Sátàn bɔ̀, mè nde né bɔ́ seé weh; né lom bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀: bɔ́ ye bɔ̀ nùàr a, Jûf né bɔ́, sâ bɔ́ Jûf sam. Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, mè nde né bɔ́ seé weh, te bɔ́ nde ka biì cemmé. Bɔ́ nde né teèn kɔɔ́, ye mè né wò gwaán ma.
66003010	Lòù sam, wò né ŋgòr mò sie, wò né yoló ndɔ. Loù mé gèr nde né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ jilí laré, mè nde né wò dé yeè cií nyegé.
66003011	Wò ŋgweé gi aá kèn, kébbé nyégé bagasé, wò né teèn tég njebá taré. Mɔ sam, nuaré déì nde né tàm ŋgɔ̂g yeè luaga weh. Mè baá ndeê.
66003012	Nuaá mé nde né veên taré yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, mè nde né bú ké gwò Tele mò faá sòm nɔ sieé kwaá. Sâ baá bèh dene seèn dé kèì cên. Mè nde né bú yilí Càŋ Tele mò yoòr nyagá kwaá, mé yilí lɔɔ́ seèn, Jerusalem dé feê mene. Lɔɔ́ sâ suagà nde né ter beè Càŋ. Mè nde né yilí mò dé feê yoòr seèn nyagá kwaá ndɔ.
66003013	Ŋgòr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tueé den hên, nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé bú bagasé.»
66003014	Nyàgà njí mé cìlì Càŋ dé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ ké Laodísè, júée bú a: Nuaá mé né È môn” tueé né kɔɔ́. Sòn-Càŋ jéjêg né bú, nùà gècên né bú ndɔ. Bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lɔ naá giì si dɔɔ́ŋ, ndègè né bú. Ye, júée wò a:
66003015	Mè né gi seé yeè kɔɔ́. Wò dɔ́lé ŋgwéh, wò sálé ŋgwéh ndɔ. Wò kàn sam, kán sam. Mɔ wò sé la naâ cén ke sɔm, beè mò huɔm kela né cí.
66003016	Mɔ sam, kɔ́ɔ ye, nyí né ŋabésé, nyí salésé sam, nyí dɔlésé sam, mè nde né nyí tieé sɔm ma.
66003017	Wò ye, nyí né nùà sèsàm, wa njeré déì nyí sám ŋgwéh, nyí mé tuaá njeré déì sam ndɔ. Wò kɔ́ ŋgwéh ye nùà kújere faá nyí nɔ sam wa, ye nyí né luŋturu, nyí né tácugó, saám né nyí sòn doó sege, wò ménâ kɔ́ ŋgwéh wa?
66003018	Mè né wò bɔŋ, ndê goó dé jéjêg ká beè mò ŋge weh, te wò yam mé njéh. Ndê bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ dé wuwulê ká beè mò ŋge weh, te wò cií mèfà hèllè mé njéh, wò huar sɔm fegùlì yoòr beè bɔ̀ nùàr. Wò ndê lèh njolò ká beè mò ŋge weh, te wò deén beh njolò, wò ŋene nyegé njèh bagasé.
66003019	Mɔ mè né nùàr gwaán, mè bú pamé seér yeé lòù, mè feh bú gèr te à kekɔɔ̀. Á sâ, mɔ né mân, fágá lòm feh mé temé kweéh seêr tég, wò bele ceér mò.
66003020	Mè né tùtúlù hin gɔɔ́ den; nuaá mé né hueh mò ŋgweé, à gulu keéh mè dɔɔ́ŋ, mè nde né gwò seèn yilá, béh bú yieé bilí mé ŋgàb cên.
66003021	Mè tueé bí, nuaá mé nde né veên taré yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, mè nde né bú bèh denè te kɔgɔ mò haá. Né faá mè nɔ: mè lé veên taré yɔgɔ́ naâ, te mè nde ye bèh denè te kɔgɔ Tele mò kwa.
66003022	Ŋgòr mé Cúcuí Ŋagâ né mé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ tueé den hên, nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé bú bagasé.»
66004001	Jomo sâ vuú déì ŋené cu njolò mò, mè ŋene njií hin né ké te vulúu lɔŋ gulu den. Mè ŋgweé njií cu hueh nùà loù mé lé tueé mbamé deén naâ faá tàŋ doô, baá cu ménâ tueé, ye mè a: Ŋâ ká ter, mè feh kwaá wò bɔ̀ njií mé nde giì né waâ dɔɔ́ŋ njolò.»
66004002	Sòn mé bɔ́ jueè, sâ Cúcuí Ŋagâ waà kema mè ndɔ, mè ŋene njií kɔgɔ mgbè déì ké te vulúu, nuaré déì né teèn den den.
66004003	À huɔm ndellé lom né yàgà faá taá ndòn beéh den né te lou nɔ. Kwarè kɔgɔ̀ sâ dɔɔ́ŋ fií kaŋ yɔŋ né nyènyèmà, à né faá taá ndòn nɔ beéh ŋuerré den ndɔ.
66004004	Kwarè kɔgɔ mgbè sâ dɔɔ́ŋ kaŋ yɔŋ cu né bɔ̀ kɔgɔ déì, bɔ́ né ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà, mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ teèn ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà ndɔ. Bɔ́ su bele né cɔ̀gɔ̀ wuwulê mân. Bɔ́ né bele mé tàm kàgà fefelè, bɔ́ me né tàm sâ mé goó.
66004005	Mbàn né ké te kɔgɔ sâ be yuoô, nu né ké teèn gwaán tulú, bɔ̀ hueh né ké teèn ŋgulí ndɔ. Ké toò kɔgɔ̀ sâ bɔ́ mɔgɔ kwaá né kɔr teèn téhbeh. Sâ lé naâ bɔ̀ cúcuí Càŋ téhbeh doô.
66004006	Ké toò kɔgɔ̀ sâ, njeré déì lé naâ doó faá tàmbàŋ tuùb nɔ laga den. Né faá daregà mé taá ndòn nɔ wulá tɔgɔ́m den. Bɔ̀ njeré déì nèà né ké kwarè kɔgɔ̀ sâ njebá kaáŋ den; bɔ́ né mé njolo kèb toò mene, kèb jomò mene. Dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ né gi lèlàŋ.
66004007	Dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ felá né gélɔ̂g, dé jomò felá huaán nàgà, dé tagâr né mé feh ter faá feh nùàr nɔ. Dé nèà, felá né jìè mé né ter lɔɔ́ gɔ.
66004008	Bɔ́ nèà dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mé bà yoyoòr, dé kàn né mé njéh ténjén, dé kân né mé njéh ténjén. Bɔ́ né mé njolo yo dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ; kèb lè mé kèb cieè mene né gi njolo. Cíbíteèn mé suútenè mene, bɔ́ sòn dù bèh, bɔ́ né lom bené de sɔɔ́, ye: Càŋ Dueè Nùà terrèb jolo lom né dé tueê sam. À né léí jɔ̀gɔ̀, à né kènê, ké jomo yɔ́ŋgɔŋ né cu bú ndɔ.»
66004009	Bɔ̀ njèh lèlàŋ nèà doô ménâ seén den né Nùà ndeèr mé né ké te kɔgɔ, bɔ́ né bú keí, bɔ́ né bú vra den.
66004010	Mɔ bɔ́ baá ménâ seén, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà doô sue cemmé nde gi doó toò Nùà ndeèr mé né te kɔgɔ, bɔ́ né bú keí. Bɔ́ né bɔ̀ tàm kàgà toò kɔgɔ̀ komó su njií, bɔ́ né sònò de, ye:
66004011	Kùsèm, Càŋ beèh, Nùà Dueè, sùsùm mé terreb né wò sie huɔɔ́m, béh seén lom né wò Nùà dueè. Lòù sam, wò lɔ njèh dɔɔ́ŋ si giì naâ kɔɔ́. Lé naâ mé kàgà-ndòn yeè, te njèh dɔɔ́ŋ nde ye die.»
66005001	Mè ŋene njií bú ké te kɔgɔ; à né mvù mé be gaâ weh sie. Bɔ́ keéh kwaá né lòù, bɔ́ nyagá né kèb lè mé kèb cieè mene. Bɔ́ lieré kwaá né ŋgèh teèn bèh téhbeh.
66005002	Mè ŋene cu cìlì Càŋ dé koô, à né ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií, ye: Nuaá mé nde né mvù hên keh komo te à ke njií njolo teèn né neì wa?»
66005003	Á sâ, mɔ nuaré déì naâ he! Né mene ké ter, né mene ká doó, mé ké dòù mene, nuaá mé nde né mvù sâ keh komo te à ke njií njolo lè, teèn sam.
66005004	Nuaá mé nde né mvù sâ keh komo, te à ke njií njolo teèn yeé yùò kélá cû ménâ, mè si yúé.
66005005	Nùà koô déì lètenè bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ doô ye mè a: Té yúé, Gélɔ̂g né teèn, à né te gèh bɔ̀ Júdà; né ndùté ndùtù mgbè Davîd, à né dé seèn mé terreb, à né njèh dɔɔ́ŋ taré yɔgɔ́, à nde né bɔ̀ ndɔ ŋgèh téhbeh doô kellé sɔm gií, à komo ke lè.»
66005006	Mè ŋene njií baá-re Mbieè sèmè né ter lètenè kɔgɔ mgbè doô njebá den. Bɔ̀ njèh lèlàŋ nèà né ké teèn njebá kaáŋ den ndɔ. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà doô né kɔɔ́. Mbieè sèmè dé seèn den né faá bɔ́ wula gi aá bú nɔ. À né mé lúlí felè téhbeh, njolo téhbeh ndɔ. Bɔ̀ njolo sâ né bɔ̀ cúcuí Càŋ téhbeh. Càŋ né bɔ́ ká doó bèh dɔɔ́ŋ temá njiî.
66005007	Mbieè sèmè nde ser yí yoòr nùà te kɔgɔ doô, à weh bú mvù mé né te be gaâ doô beè.
66005008	À yeé weh gi aá, bɔ̀ njèh lèlàŋ nèà, mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà doô, sue cemmé nde gi doó toò seèn, dé kàn mé njáŋ beè, dé kân mé njáŋ beè. Bɔ́ né cu mé ŋgàb beè-beè, bɔ́ ŋgàb sâ me né mé goó, san né bele lè dedeí ndɔ. San sâ né sòn Càŋ duaà dé bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀.
66005009	Bɔ́ né bené feê sònò de den, ye: Wò wulu lom né nùà mvù hên kemaà kɔɔ́. Nùà mvù hên lè komo keè gi lom né wò. Lòù sam, bɔ́ lé naâ wò wulá, wò lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr lè veên yili sɔm, lé naâ mé húɔ́m yeè. Lé naâ nùàr mé gèh hihiné, ju hihiné mé tàbè hihiné ndɔ.
66005010	Wò lé bɔɔ́ naâ kɔɔ́, te bɔ́ nde ye bɔ̀ huaán ké mbàm ŋaá, bɔ́ den bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ seé Tele beèh Càŋ. Bɔ́ cer nde né felè bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ.»
66005011	Mè yeé ke, mè ŋene njií bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ ŋgún ké kwarè kɔgɔ̀. Bɔ́ kaŋ keéh né kɔgɔ bɔ́ bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà, mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà doô yí lètenè. Bɔ́ né lom kékám kékám, dé kulâ sam. Mè yeé ŋgweé,
66005012	bɔ́ né ké ter tueé njií, ye: Kùsèm Mbieè Sèmè mé lé naâ kuú. Nùà Dueè né cegé bú; à né lom nùà ŋgùrmò kɔɔ́. Kékɔŋ sie lom né bú; Nùà sùsùm hên nɔ. Kùsèm, nùàr a, kéí bú keì.»
66005013	Jomo sâ mè ŋgweé njií cu bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lé si giì naâ dɔɔ́ŋ baá bené de ndɔ; bɔ̀ dé ké te vulúu o, bɔ̀ dé ká te tàbè o, bɔ̀ dé ké dòù mé bɔ̀ ké dùà bɔ̀ mene dɔɔ́ŋ né gi de, ye: Kùsèm, béh hên keí yeé nuaá mé né te kɔgɔ bɔ̂ Mbieè Sèmè. Bɔ̀ dudueèr bɔ̀, bɔ̀ terrèb bɔ̀, bɔ̀ sùsùm bɔ̀ dé cu dɔɔ̂ŋ gi lom né bɔ́.»
66005014	Bɔ́ né de, bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà doô né gwaán, ye: Né môn!» Bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ doô né dé bɔɔ̀n doó sue cemmé ndeé, bɔ́ né bú keí.
66006001	Mè yeé ke, Mbieè Sèmè sie kɔ sɔm aá ndɔ ŋgèh déì lètenè bɔ̀ ndɔ ŋgèh téhbeh doô. Mè ŋgweé njií nùà cén déì lètenè bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà doô baá tueé, hueh ŋgugó lom né bú faá nu nɔ, ye: Ndê!»
66006002	Mè ŋene njií nyam tébágà wulésé mân baá ké teèn njebá den, nuaré déì né teèn ŋaá den, à né mé lìèm beè, bɔ́ sulí kwaá né bú tàm ŋgɔ̂g felè ndɔ. Nùà sâ lé naá giì feh jɔgɔ́; à nde cu né feh déì jɔgɔ́.
66006003	Jomo sâ Mbieè Sèmè sie kɔ sɔm cu ndɔ ŋgèh déì. Mè yeé ŋgweé, nùà cén déì lètenè bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà doô ye: Ndê!»
66006004	Mè ŋene njií cu nyam tébágà déì bèlèsé mân baá ndeê, à né mé nùàr ŋgètenè. Bɔ́ jege nùà sâ, ye bú a: Ndé dé seèn taáb ká te tabe bèh dɔɔ́ŋ kɔɔ́ si, te bɔ̀ nùàr wula kuú seér mé yo bɔɔ̀n ma. Bɔ́ haá kwaá bú tàndɔ̀ŋ bòù taâb beè ndɔ.
66006005	Jomo sâ Mbieè Sèmè sie kɔ sɔm cu ndɔ ŋgèh dé tagâr. Mè yeé ŋgweé, nùà cén déì lètenè bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà doô ye: Ndê!» Mè ŋene njií nyam tébágà déì yilísé mân né ké teèn mé nùàr ŋgètenè njebá den. Nùà sâ né dé seèn mé mòù beè.
66006006	Mè ŋgweé njií cu faá né hueh nùà cén déì ké lètenè bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà doô nɔ, né tueé den ye: Sàgà seê dé gùm cieê nde cegé né kó yolò cén; mɔ né ŋgwàgàm, nde né kó tagár. Té kómó bɔ̂ mbè dé bɔɔ̀n teèn kèmà kéh.»
66006007	Mbieè Sèmè sie kɔ sɔm cu ndɔ ŋgèh dé nèà. Mè ŋgweé njií nùà cén déì lètenè bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà doô ye: Ndê!»
66006008	Mè ŋene njií cu nyam tébágà déì filísé mân né mé nùàr ŋgètenè njebá den. Nùà sâ, yilí seèn né Cio; à né mé gùm ndugo bɔ̀ càŋ dɔɔ́ŋ jomo. Bɔ́ jege bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀, ye bɔ́ a: Bí ndé kɔ̀b gè bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ bèh nèà, bí wula sɔm kɔ̀b cén teèn. Bí wúlá bɔ̀ nuaré déì mé njèh salê; bɔ̀ déì mé cùè, bɔ̀ déì mé beén, te bɔ̀ déì nyam yaà sie wula bɔ́ kɔɔ́.»
66006009	Mbieè Sèmè sie kɔ ser cu ndɔ ŋgèh dé tîn. Mè ŋene njií bɔ̀ càŋ ké ka kɔɔ̀. Né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naá giì kuú, bɔ́ lé bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ wula giì naâ lòù, ye bɔ́ lɔ naâ ŋgòr Càŋ tueé fí; wa bɔ́ lɔ njebá taré loóm naâ teèn, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: ŋgòr gècên né lom cí fí ndɔ.
66006010	Bɔ̀ càŋ mé lé naâ ké ka kɔɔ̀ sâ né ké ter bieé njií den ye: Nùà Dueè, Nùà joloò mé Nùà gècên, wò ndeè ju felè bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ tueé nde né heèh wa? Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ béh wulá, wò cio beèh mé bɔ́ bie nde né heèh ndɔ wa?»
66006011	Bɔ́ su kwaá bele baá-re bɔ̀ càŋ sâ cɔ̀gɔ̀ wuwulê mân yoòr, bɔ́ ye bɔ́ a: Bí jɔ̀gɔ̀ kwáa môn ye, bɔ́ née bɔ̀ mbeé seê biì wúlá gí ŋgwéeh ye. Kɔ bɔ́ wula gi aá bɔ́ faá bí nɔ, te wulu ye.»
66006012	Jomo sâ Mbieè Sèmè sie kɔ ser cu ndɔ ŋgèh dé ténjên. Mè yeé ŋgweé, tàbè baá jilí taré; lou baá seér cu yilísé faá cɔ̀gɔ̀ gùlù dé yilî nɔ. Weéh gùm dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ seér cu aá dé seèn faá húɔ́m nɔ.
66006013	Bɔ̀ mbentò né lom ká doó sue suagâ. Né faá fu tarê we su yeé bɔ̀ tàb kekɔɔ̀ŋ nɔ.
66006014	Vulú né faá yùè nɔ keéh ndeé, né nyue leér yuo. Bɔ̀ tòr bɔ́ bɔ̀ ten tàbè mé tená le bele yeé lètenè ndèndèŋ nòmò dɔɔ́ŋ vu gi be mé bèh denè bɔɔ̀n.
66006015	Jomo sâ bɔ̀ nùàr fɔɔ́n doò: bɔ̀ mgbè o, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ kwaá-taâb o, bɔ̀ sèsàm bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ terrèb bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, né mene kwer, né mene bɔ̀ lòù bɔ̀, dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mbaá dula kem njií. Bɔ̀ déì nde lè gbàŋe faár yilá, bɔ̀ déì nde ké te tòre lètenè kweêh dula ŋaá, te bɔ́ leér den teèn.
66006016	Bɔ́ ye kweéh mé tòr a: Ŋèmè sù sér béh yoòr kɔɔ́; bí lèr béh leèr, te nuaá mé né ké te kɔgɔ kíê béh ŋéné kéh cú; te yúlá-temé Mbieè Sèmè ká yoòr beèh jèrè wá cû.
66006017	Né cieé yúlá-temé bɔɔ̀n waà né kɔɔ́, baá bɔ́ fulu ŋaá. Ndɔ́g nuaré déì ter yìlì lè ndé ŋgwéh.»
66007001	Jomo sâ mè ŋene njií bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ déì nèà, bɔ́ né ké te bɔ̀ gou wɔ́ŋe nèà dɔɔ́ŋ njebá den, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ fu nèà sie yiín lɔɔ́, te bɔ̀ fu hèllè tàbè bɔ̂ nòmò mé toú dé kàn kóbó kèmà cú.
66007002	Sâ bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ doô lé naá giì mé terreb beè, te bɔ́ bɔɔ́ beéh tàbè mé nòmò mé njéh. Mè ŋene njií cu cìlì Càŋ déì baá kèb bà yuoô, à né mé mágá Càŋ làŋ beè, à né mé bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ nèà doô lɔgɔ́ njií, ye bɔ́ a:
66007003	Bí tée tàbè bɔ̂ nòmò mé bɔ̀ toú bɔ́ béh ye; kɔ béh tuaán laré gi aá bɔ̀ seê bɔ̀ Càŋ mágá toò kuûn, sâ ye.»
66007004	Jomo sâ bɔ́ kulá feh keéh baá-re mè dàm bɔ̀ɔ́ mé baá gi mé mágá Càŋ toò kuûn sâ ndɔ, bɔ́ lé naâ kám yuií mé kám yulà nèà cùɔ̀b nèà; dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá giì bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà.
66007005	Te gèh Júdà, bɔ́ tuaán kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; te gèh Rúbèn, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; gèh Gàd, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà;
66007006	gèh Asêr, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; gèh Naftalî, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; gèh Manasê, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà;
66007007	gèh Simeɔ̂ŋ, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; gèh Levî, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; gèh Isakâr, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà;
66007008	gèh Jebulɔ̂ŋ, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; gèh Josêf, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà; mé gèh Benjamên, kám yulà cùɔ̀b fà ndɔ.
66007009	Jomo sâ mè yeé ke, mè ŋene njií cu cìlì nùàr né mbaá yaám ndeé, dé kulâ sam. Lò nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá giì teèn, mé bèh hihiné, gèh hihiné, ju hihiné ndɔ. Bɔ́ né ké toò kɔgɔ Càŋ bɔ̂ Mbieè Sèmè njebá den, bɔ́ né mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ wuwulê yoòr, mé ŋgéh-teêr beè beè ndɔ.
66007010	Bɔ́ né ké ter gɔgɔ́ njií, ye: Càŋ Tele beèh ké te kɔgɔ bɔ̂ Mbieè Sèmè béh mân yili sɔm né kɔɔ́.»
66007011	Sâ dàm bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ baá gi ké kwarè kɔgɔ̀ kaáŋ den ndɔ, bɔ́ né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà lètenè kaáŋ keéh. Bɔ́ né toò kɔgɔ̀ cemmé sulí ndeé, bɔ́ né Càŋ keí,
66007012	bɔ́ ye: Né bɔ̀n! Nùà Sùsùm né Tele beèh Càŋ, Nùà dueè. Terreb mé kékɔŋ né gi beè seèn. Béh vrà bú vraà, béh vèh dèn bú. Kùsèm terreb Càŋ a, sùmù yùò kélà cie dé kèì cên.»
66007013	Jomo sâ nuaré déì deên ké lètenè bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ doô, ye mè a: Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né cɔ̀gɔ̀ wuwulê su hên né bɔ̀ neì wa, bɔ́ yuoô he ndɔ wa?»
66007014	Mè ye bú a: Kɔ kela né wò, dé koô.» À tueé baá-re ye mè a: Né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ lè mambin gèr cèrè jomò kelá ma. Wa bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé naâ cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n lè húɔ́m Mbieè Sèmè yaga. Bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n baá gi wuwulê.
66007015	Bɔ́ ké toò Càŋ den né dé cî. Bɔ́ né seé seèn ké gwà Càŋ cíbí mé lou mene bɔɔ́ sɔɔ́.
66007016	Cùè mé nyúá bɔ́ sìè ŋgwé ndé cú; lou mé njeré déì bɔ́ lì ŋgwé ndé cú ndɔ.
66007017	Mbieè Sèmè né ké lètenè kɔgɔ̀, à ke nyegé né bɔ́ kɔɔ́, à nde né bɔ́ lè nduùn nòmò yɔ̀ŋe njií. Càŋ nde né bɔ́ yímé njolò fɔ sɔm ndɔ.»
66008001	Te Mbieè Sèmè yeé nde sie kɔ sɔm ndɔ ŋgèh dé téhbeèh doô, njèh dɔɔ́ŋ maáb tené le gi ké ter. Nde nde, wa gùm kwèh yɔ̀ŋ loù njèh dɔɔ́ŋ né nɔɔ́ŋ.
66008002	Jomo sâ mè yeé ke, bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeh né ké toò Càŋ njebá den; bɔ́ haá kwaá né bɔ́ tàŋ téhbeh beè.
66008003	Cìlì Càŋ déì wa cuù, à né mé tàndáŋ beè, tàndáŋ sâ bɔ́ me né mé goó. À nde ké kwarè kɔɔ̀ njebá ndeé. Bɔ́ kela bú san lè tàndâŋ ŋgún, bɔ́ bilí kwaá, ye te à hualé bilí mé dàmè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀, à né ké felè kɔɔ̀ mé Càŋ ŋgie haá njií. Bɔ́ kɔ sâ me né mé goó; né ké toò kɔgɔ̀ den den.
66008004	Ju weè saàn mé dàmè bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ né beè cìlì Càŋ yuo, né yoòr Càŋ lulí ndeé.
66008005	Jomo sâ cìlì Càŋ ŋuaán sɔm we hèllè felè kɔɔ̀, à kwaá njií lè tàndâŋ deí, à tum si njiî ká doó. Mbàn né die, nu né gwaán, bɔ̀ hueh né ŋgulí, tàbè jilí lom mé gècên mene.
66008006	Jomo sâ bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeh mé tàŋ beè beè doô njebá nyegé mé tàŋ bɔɔ̀n.
66008007	Cìlì Càŋ dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ yi si tàŋ: boó mé we mé húɔ́m mene bomo suagà ká doó, ŋgie sɔm kɔ̀b tàbè cén, kɔ̀b fà le. Kɔ̀b bɔ̀ toû cén ŋgie yuo, kɔ̀b fà le. Bɔ̀ nyure dedɔɔ̂ ŋgie yuo gi ménâ ndɔ.
66008008	Cìlì Càŋ dé jomò yi cu tàŋ dé seèn: kèkènè tàŋɔ̀r tòr déì léláŋ weè mân, komo tum suagà, die yila dùà; kɔ̀b ndèndèŋ nòmò cén ŋa húɔ́m, kɔ̀b fà le.
66008009	Dàm bɔ̀ njií mé yɔŋ yeé dùà dɔɔ́ŋ, kɔ̀b cén kuú gi, kɔ̀b fà le. Kɔ̀b cén bɔ̀ bàtô dùà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋerré yuo, kɔ̀b fà le.
66008010	Cìlì Càŋ dé tagâr yi cu tàŋ dé seèn: mè ŋene tàtù mbentò déì komo suagà ké ter léláŋ weè faá boó kɔɔ̀r nɔ, die yila dùà nòmò mé bɔ̀ nduùn mene; kɔ̀b cécéné veé yuo.
66008011	Yilí mbentò sâ né nó. Nòmò kɔ̀b cén jelá yuo, kɔ̀b fà le. Bɔ̀ nùàr kókoó mbaá ŋueé kuú gi mé njéh; sâ jelá yɔgɔ́ baá.
66008012	Cìlì Càŋ dé nèà yi cu tàŋ dé seèn. Lou kɔ̀b cén yili, kɔ̀b fà le. Weéh kɔ̀b cén yili, kɔ̀b fà le. Bɔ̀ mbentò dɔɔ́ŋ, kɔ̀b cén yilí yuo, kɔ̀b fà le. Lou cib sɔɔ́ gùm kɔ̀b cieê cén, kɔ̀b fà le. Weéh cib ŋaga kɔ̀b cibî cén ménâ ndɔ.
66008013	Mè yeé ke cu, jìè baá tɔ́g ké ka vulúu lɔɔ́ yɔŋ, à né ké ter keí njií, ye: Gèr-e! Gèr-e! Bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ dé tagâr nde aá tàŋ dé bɔɔ̀n tuagá. Mambin gèr nde né bɔ̀ nùàr ká doó kwa.»
66009001	Cìlì Càŋ dé tîn yi cu tàŋ dé seèn. Mè ŋene tàtù mbentò déì ká doó, à lé die suagà naâ ter, bɔ́ né bú kî lege ŋgɔbè beè haá kwaá.
66009002	Mbentò doô komo lege ŋgɔbè sâ ndɔ. Ju weè kulu yuo kela teèn, ka yilí ŋaá ter lég, cib sɔm lou; ter dɔɔ́ŋ yili yuo mé ju weè lege ŋgɔbè hèllè.
66009003	Kètàr né ké teèn bomó yuo den, né ká doó sue suagâ, bɔ́ né bèh dɔɔ́ŋ kwaár ndeé; bɔ́ né bɔ́ gèh terreb bɔ̀ taŋtàŋ jege haá, bɔ́ ye bɔ́ a:
66009004	Bí té nyure mé toú kèmà. Bí ndé lòm yoòr bɔ̀ nùàr. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé mágá Càŋ toò kuûn sam, bí bɔ́ júé lòm kɔɔ́.»
66009005	Bɔ́ ye bɔ́ a: Bí té bɔ̀ nùàr lòù wúlá, bí témá sɔ́ bɔ́ seé yoòr weéh tîn, bɔ́ nde né mé gèr kwaré.» Bàŋ kètàr yulá nde né ka bɔ́ nág faá dé taŋtàŋ gèr nɔ.
66009006	Bɔ́ yilá fɔɔ́n nde né cio mé njéh gùm weéh tîn dɔɔ́ŋ, cio bɔ́ sòn kòmò ndé ŋgwéh. Bɔ́ gwaán nde né mene kuû, cio nde né bɔ́ ŋgɔɔ́n, te bɔ́ kekɔɔ̀.
66009007	Bɔ̀ kètàr sâ den né faá bɔ̀ nyam tébágà mé bɔ́ kaga kwaá né dé gò taâb nɔ: bɔ̀ njeré déì né bele bɔ́ felè faá tàm ŋgɔ̂g mé bɔ́ me né mé goó nɔ. Toò sieè bɔɔ̀n den bele né faá dé nùàr nɔ.
66009008	Yúlí feèh né faá dé bɔ̀ vêh ndɔ; nyie den bele né bɔ́ sònò faá nyie gélɔ̂g.
66009009	Te kàŋ bɔɔ̀n den né faá cɔ̀gɔ̀ lɔ̀ŋ nɔ. Bèmè bà bɔɔ̀n ŋgulí felá né bèmè bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ màtúâ taâb mé bɔ̀ nyam tébágà né bèh taâb tulu njií.
66009010	Njòr né bele bɔ́ te ŋgere faá dé taŋtàŋ gèr nɔ. Terreb mé bɔ́ feh keéh nde né bɔ̀ nùàr gèr mé njéh weéh tîn doô né gi bɔ́ ké te ŋgere sâ.
66009011	Mgbè bɔɔ̀n né Sátàn. Bèh denè seèn né lè lege ŋgɔbè hèllè. Yilí seèn né Ŋéllé-nùàr. Mé ju hebreêh né Àbadôn; mé ju greêk né Apoliɔ̂ŋ ndɔ.
66009012	Hên née gèr dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ ye; bɔ̀ fà bɔ̀ déì baá cuù ndeê.
66009013	Jomo sâ cìlì Càŋ dé ténjên yi cu tàŋ dé seèn. Mè ŋgweé njií ké te kɔ toò Càŋ hueh déì né ŋgulí den. Bɔ́ kɔ sâ me né mé goó. Hueh sâ né ké te gou seèn nèà dɔɔ́ŋ ŋgulí den.
66009014	À tueé njií mé cìlì Càŋ dé ténjên mé tàŋ baá toò seèn doô, ye bú a: Bɔ̀ cìlì nèà mé bɔ́ lé naâ bɔ́ ké kwarè nòmò Efrátè coló kwaá doô, sè yì bɔ́.»
66009015	Bɔ́ se yi bɔ́ nèà dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ. Sâ bɔ́ lé naá giì bɔ́ nyegé kwaá, lé naâ dé cu sâ, dé cieé sâ, dé weéh sâ mé dé nyèmà sâ ndɔ, bɔ́ ye te bɔ́ nde bɔ̀ nùàr kɔ̀b tagár geé, bɔ́ wula sɔm kɔ̀b cén.
66009016	Bɔ́ kulá feh mè bɔ̀ sɔ́jì mé lé naâ nyam tébágà ŋaá ndɔ: dɔɔ́ŋ bɔ́ lé naâ kám yuií fà.
66009017	Bɔ́ lé naâ njolò mò ŋené yuo kelà; bɔ́ lé beè naâ bele mé kɔ̀ bèbèlè faá we nɔ, faá nòmò vulû nɔ, faá nyùm nàgàkèn nɔ. Bɔ̀ nyam tébágà bɔɔ̀n né bele mé feh faá gélɔ̂g ndɔ. We mé ju mé nyùm nàgàkèn lé naâ bɔ́ sònò bomó yuo den.
66009018	Bɔ̀ njèh gèr tagár mé lé naâ sònò bɔ̀ nyam tébágà bomo yuo sâ, lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr kɔ̀b cén wulá sɔm, kɔ̀b fà le. Lé naâ we mé ju mé nyùm nàgàkèn.
66009019	Bɔ̀ nyam tébágà dé bɔɔ̀n lé naâ mé terreb bèh fa: déì lé naâ ké sònò, déì ké te ŋgere. Bɔ̀ ŋgere bɔɔ̀n lé naâ faá sàb nɔ, feh lé naâ teèn; bɔ́ lé bɔ̀ nùàr veên bɔɔ́ deén naâ mé njéh.
66009020	Mé njéh mene, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ ter le, mé bɔ̀ gèr hèllè lé bɔ́ wúlá ná ŋgwêh, lé naâ ménâ taŋ den, bɔ́ temé kwéh sér ŋgwéh, bɔ́ kɔ lom né cècàŋ feh hihiné duaà: bɔ́ né tándulu dua, bɔ́ né ŋgùlàmúr mé feh hihiné dua; bɔ́ bɔ̀ déì me né mé goó, bɔ̀ déì mé lɔ̀ŋ; bɔ̀ déì mé taá, bɔ̀ déì toú. Bɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ né gi mùmúr mbaá, bɔ́ ŋéné bèh, bɔ́ ŋgwé bèh, bɔ́ gɔ̀ bèh ndɔ.
66009021	Bɔ́ yeé temé kwéh sér cú ménâ, bɔ́ kɔ lom baá-re feh wulâ ndɔ, bɔ́ né lɔb yuo; bɔ́ né yàgà bɔɔ́ tobó gɔ; yíb ceré né bɔ́ ndɔ.
66010001	Jomo sâ mè ŋene njií cu cìlì Càŋ terrèb déì baá cuù ké te bègè kaá suagâ; à né mé kou nyènyèmà felè; toò sieè seèn ba lom né faá lou nɔ; bɔ̀ gule ba né faá leba weè ndɔ.
66010002	À komo sie né mvù beè. Mvù sâ né lom maànjé mân. À gule gaâ dobo kwaá né felè ndèndèŋ nòmò, gule ŋgoù te bàŋ tàbè.
66010003	À né ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií faá gélɔ̂g geba né kɔɔ́. À yeé huné aá, nu gwaán mbei téhbeh, faá nùàr tueé né kɔɔ́ nɔ.
66010004	Mè yeé nde aá ter nyagá kwaá, hueh déì den cuù ké te vulúu, ye mè a: Té lòù nyàgà, ŋgwé lèr kwá lòm bɔ̀ nu téhbeh sâ lè yeè nɔɔ́ŋ ménâ.»
66010005	Mè yeé ke, cìlì Càŋ mé gule déì né felè ndèndèŋ nòmò, déì felè bàŋ tàbè doô sɔm njií aá be gaâ ké te vulúu,
66010006	à jege Càŋ ndeèr, nùà mé lɔ sií naâ vulú mé bɔ̀ njèh teèn mene, tàbè mé bɔ̀ njií teèn mene, nòmò koô mé bɔ̀ njèh teèn mene dɔɔ́ŋ, à jege ye: Waà baá kèn.
66010007	Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, mɔ cìlì Càŋ dé téhbeèh baá tàŋ dé seèn tuagá, bɔ̀ njií mé Càŋ lé naâ lòù nyegé leér kwaá dɔɔ́ŋ, nde né loù sâ mboón, te yuo faá à lé tueé kwaá naâ mé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ mé bɔ́ né seé seèn bɔɔ́ nɔ.»
66010008	Jomo sâ hueh mé lé ŋgulí deén naâ ké te vulúu doô den cuù ye mè a: Ndé wèh mvù mé bɔ́ komo kwaá né lɔŋ ké beè cìlì Càŋ doô weèh; à njebá den né felè nòmò, kèb déì felè tàbè mân.»
66010009	À yeé tueé gi aá, mè nde ké teèn ndɔ, mè ye cìlì Càŋ a: Há mè mvù dé maàn beè yeè sâ teèn.» Ye mè a: Wèh yíé njí mvù hên sònò. À né sònò nɔré, né faá nyuií nɔ. Njèh cén, ké lè à nde né lòù jelá seér.»
66010010	Mè weh bú mvù sâ beè, mè yieé ndɔ, nɔré ka mè sònò faá nyuií sâ; mè yeé mena sɔm aá, wa ké lè mò, jelá yuo.
66010011	Bɔ́ ye mè a: Ndé cú sòn-Càŋ tueé; wò tueé nde né felè dàm nùàr mé lò hihiné, ju hihiné, mé mgbè hihiné ma.
66011001	Bɔ́ weh gor, bɔ́ haá mè beè faá cùgò nɔ, bɔ́ ye mè a: Wùò ter, ndé mè gwà Càŋ koô mé kɔ mene meè; kùlà gí bɔ̀ dùà-Càŋ bɔ̀ ké gwò dɔɔ́ŋ ndɔ.
66011002	Kwá lɔ́ caá kèb cieè dé seèn ménâ, té bú mè, né beè bɔ̀ Càŋ-kɔ́ bɔ̀, bɔ́ nde né lɔɔ́ joloò gulè doró keéh, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ nde né teèn weéh yulà nèà cùɔ̀b fà.
66011003	Te cu sâ mè nde né bɔ̀ sòn mò fà tema njií, te bɔ́ tueé den sòn mò ké lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr. Bɔ́ yií nde né wè, bɔ́ bɔɔ́ nde né ké sâ weéh yulà nèà cùɔ̀b fà. Bɔ̀ weéh yulà nèà cùɔ̀b fà né cieé kám mé yuií fà mé yulà ténjén.»
66011004	Bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ fà doô né bɔ̀ toú fà mé feí yeé kómó; bɔ́ né bɔ̀ lâm tàndáŋ fà mé den yeé toò Nùà tàbè doô ndɔ.
66011005	Nuaá mé né bɔ́ mé veên munó dɔɔ́ŋ, we ndeè né sònò bɔɔ̀n bomó yuo kelâ, ŋgie sɔm bú. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde né bɔ́ mé veên coór kema dɔɔ́ŋ, kuú gi nde né ménâ ndɔ.
66011006	Bɔ́ né mé terreb nu ŋgaáŋ lɔɔ̂, te bɔ́ tueé den sòn-Càŋ. Bɔ́ né cu mé terreb nòmò kweéh seêr, te ŋa húɔ́m. Mɔ bɔ́ gwaán né wɔ́ŋ gèr dé kàn feh keêh, cu mé bɔ́ gwaán nê dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ né gi mé terreb dé ménâ bɔɔ̂ teèn.
66011007	Bɔ́ tueé den nde né ka sòn-Càŋ ménâ. Mɔ gi aá, nyam veên yuo kelà nde né te lege ŋgɔbè doô, ŋar sie bɔ́, à nde né bɔ́ yɔgɔ́, à nde né bɔ́ wulá sɔm ndɔ.
66011008	Bɔ̀ komó bɔɔ̀n dielé le nde né cie te kpɔŋe lè lɔɔ́ koô. Né lɔɔ́ mé bɔ́ lé faga wulà naâ Fehtoò beèh teèn doô. Bɔ́ né lɔɔ́ sâ yilí Sɔ́dɔ̀m mé Ejíptò yoòr yilá kwaá.
66011009	Dàm nùàr mé gèh hihiné, ju hihiné, lò hihiné dɔɔ́ŋ, nde gi né komó bɔɔ̀n cie ŋené sɔɔ́; nde né cieé tagár mé kwèh. Bɔ̀ nùàr gwàn ndé ŋgwéh mé nuaré déì furú nyegé bɔ́.
66011010	Bɔ̀ nùàr ká doó samé seér nde né mé cio bɔ̀ nùà fà hên dé samê; bɔ́ nde né sagá; bɔ̀ nùàr nde né mé kùrmò felè cio bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ fà hên yieé kuú, ye bɔ̀ fà bɔ̀ hên naâ bɔ́ gèr feh keéh fí.
66011011	Komó bɔ̀ nùà fà hên lé cie bɔɔ́ naâ cieé tagár mé kwèh. Jomo sâ, Càŋ lé naá cuù bɔ́ cúcuí lè fulu yií, bɔ́ njebá cu ter. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé lé naâ ŋené, veéh lé naâ bɔ́ njèh bɔɔ́.
66011012	Jomo sâ hueh tarê déì yilá bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ fà hên ké te vulúu, ye bɔ́ a: Bí ŋâ kán!» Bɔ́ ka ŋaá yuo ké te vulúu lètenè bègè ndɔ. Lé naâ njolò bɔ̀ bùnò bɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n hèllè.
66011013	Cu sâ tàbè lé naâ jilí taré; lɔɔ́ kèb déì lugo su doó. Te gwà yulà dɔɔ́ŋ, cén lé naâ lugo die. Nùàr kám téhbeh kuú teèn. Veéh lé naâ bɔ̀ jomo bɔ̀ lè yilá, te bɔ́ nde ye Càŋ Nùà vulû seén.
66011014	Hên baá ye gèr dé mbelèm fà; dé tagâr baá cuù hên ndeê.
66011015	Jomo sâ cìlì Càŋ dé téhbeèh yi cu tàŋ dé seèn: bɔ̀ hueh déì tetarê mân né ké te vulúu ŋgulí, ye: Mbàm Nùà Dueè bɔ̂ Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ baá kènê wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ beè kaá sie. À teèn cer den nde né dé nyèmà mé nyèmà.»
66011016	À yeé tueé gi aá mân, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà mé né gi ké toò Càŋ te kɔgɔ bɔɔ̀ne dɔɔ́ŋ cemmé sulí nde gi doó, bɔ́ né Càŋ keí, bɔ́ ye:
66011017	Môn, Càŋ Dueè Nùà terrèb, wò né léí jɔ̀gɔ̀, wò né kènê ndɔ. Béh né wò vra mé kènê be terrèb yeè baá ter. Kènê mbàm yeè wɔ́ŋ beè ka sie né kɔɔ́.
66011018	Cècàgà, lò nùàr hihiné lé ŋaáŋ baá wò yoòr kela. Kènê baá cu yúlá-temê; wò nde aá ju felè bɔ̀ komô tená. Bɔ̀ sòn yeè mé né seé yeè bɔɔ́, nde né sàgà kwa. Bɔ̀ nùàr yeè mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né wò veéh dɔɔ́ŋ, huaán maàn mé kàm bɔ̀ mene, nde né sàgà kwa laré. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né yeé wɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ beéh dɔɔ́ŋ nde né nyoló yuo.»
66011019	Bɔ́ yeé tueé gi aá mân, gwà Càŋ koô ké te vulúu gulu lɔgɔ́ ndɔ, mbèŋ ŋgɔ̀ŋ ŋené yuo kela ké gwò, mbàn né die, nu né gwaán, bɔ̀ hueh né ŋgulí, tàbè né jilí taré, boó sue lom mé gècên mene.
66012001	Jomo sâ cìè déì ŋené yuo kelà ké te vulúu: lé naâ ma déì, lou né bú faá cɔ̀gɔ̀ nɔ vuɔb keéh; à né weéh gulè dobo kwaá; felè seèn né mbentò yulà cùɔ̀b fà, né tàm kàgà seèn.
66012002	À né mé lèì, nyer né bú nemá, à né mé gèr keéŋ den.
66012003	Jomo sâ cìè déì ŋené yuo kela cuù ké te vulúu ndɔ; lé naâ mèmàm bèlèsé mân mé feh felè téhbeh, lulí teèn yulà; feh dé kàn né mé tàm kàgà felè.
66012004	Ŋgere ké jomo né bɔ̀ mbentò ké te vulúu komó sɔm; né ká doó su njiî. Kɔ̀b cén sue suagà, kɔ̀b fà le. Mèmàm hèllè né toò ma nyeèr doô njebá den, ye te huaán yuo kelà, nyí dɔm yieé sɔm.
66012005	Nde nde, ma doô ŋar ndɔ, à ŋar kwa huaán dé siîb. Huaán sâ nde né lò nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ seé weh. Nde né mé cùgò lɔ̀ŋ. À yeé ŋar aá bú, bɔ́ weh njií huaán sâ ké toò Càŋ te kɔgɔ seèn.
66012006	Meí dula nde dé seèn ké ya dueè. Càŋ lé naâ bú bèh sâ nyegé kwaá, te bɔ́ koó den bú teèn. À bɔɔ́ ké sâ cieé kám mé yuií fà, mé yulà ténjén.
66012007	Yeé baá ménâ, taáb kɔ die ké te vulúu ndɔ: Mikael bɔ́ bɔ̀ cìlì seèn kaga taáb mé mèmàm bɔ́ bɔ̀ cìlì dé seèn. Bɔ́ bɔ́ kwaá njií taáb doó. Mikael bɔ́ bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ ŋar yila bɔ́ yoòr,
66012008	bɔ́ yɔgɔ́ bɔ́, bɔ́ kwɔgɔ sɔm bɔ̀ mèmàm hèllè, bɔ́ sɔm bèh denè bɔɔ̀n ndɔ.
66012009	Bɔ́ lu si keêh mèmàm doô ká doó. Né cu ka bú kuúm sàb cên sâ; bú táhòrò; yilí seèn déì né cu Sátàn, à dàm nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ bele gi né kɔɔ́. Bɔ́ lé ká doó si keéh naâ bú mé bɔ̀ cìlì seèn hèllè mene.
66012010	Jomo sâ mè ŋgweé njií hueh taré déì né ké te vulúu mbamé den, ye: Hên, Càŋ sɔm keéh né be terrèb seèn. Mbàm seèn baá wɔ́ŋ beè kaá sie; à béh yili sɔm aá kèn. Kènê, ŋgɔ́g Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ ŋgulí yuo kela baá cie. Cècàgà, bɔ́ nùà súî hèllè lu sɔm aá kèn. Suútenè mé cíbíteèn mene, à lé naá loôm bɔ̀ mbeí beèh ké toò Càŋ yoòr njoró.
66012011	Kènê bɔ̀ mbeí beèh bú doó jɔgɔ si aá kèn. Bɔ́ bú yɔgɔ́ né mé terreb húɔ́m Mbieè Sèmè. Njua mé bɔ́ lé naâ cio ŋgɔɔ́n, bɔ́ te ŋgòr Càŋe njebá taré lom tég, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: lár, hên né lom ŋgòr gècên kɔɔ́.
66012012	Né bɔ̀n! Vulú a, sèsamè! Bí bɔ̀ teèn bɔ̀ a, sàmè gí ménâ ndɔ.» Jomo sâ hueh doô den cuù, ye tàbè bɔ̂ nòmò a: Gèr-e, gèr waà baá kèn, bɔ́ táhòrò lu si njií aá ké yoòr biì, à né mé yúlá-temé furú gɔ. Cu seèn nde aá gií, ŋaáŋ gɔ né bú cí.»
66012013	Mèmàm doô yeé ke, bɔ́ bú ká doó lu si njií aá ménâ, temé ŋaâ bú ndɔ; à ŋar bele keéh ma vùlù hèllè jomo dé ŋaâr.
66012014	Bɔ́ haá ma doô bà fà, né faá bà jìè nɔ, te à lɔ nde mé njéh ké ya dueè bèh denè seèn. Bɔ́ nde né bú ké teèn nyèmà tagár mé kwèh koó den, te sàb doô bú fɔ́n kwà cú.
66012015	Sàb hèllè yeé ŋene aá ménâ, à fam sɔm keêh nòmò sònò faá gùm nòmò koô nɔ, né ma doô jomo pieém bele, te sie bú.
66012016	Tàbè yeé ŋene aá ménâ, tàbè gam ma doô ndɔ, tàbè ŋueé ŋemá sɔm nòmò hèllè, njíêr.
66012017	Furú yɔgɔ́ cu mèmàm mé ma doô, à ŋar nde seér mé taáb ké jomo yoòr bɔ̀ ŋuna seèn, ye te nyí wula sɔm gi bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né sòn Càŋ mé ŋgòr Yeésò ŋgweé dɔɔ́ŋ.
66012018	Mèmàm hèllè nde baá-re ké sòn nòmò ménâ njebá den.
66013001	Jomo sâ, mè yeé ke, nyam déì baá yí lètenè ndèndèŋ nòmò yuo kelâ; à né mé feh felè téhbeh, lulí né teèn yulà; lulí dé kàn né mé tàm kàgà felè; feh dé kân né mé yilí séb-Càŋ yoòr nyagá den.
66013002	Nyam sâ den né faá ŋgùì nɔ; gule né faá gule séseè mân, sòn né faá sòn gélɔ̂g ndɔ. Mèmàm weh kɔgɔ seèn, haá njií mé nyam doô, haá bú terreb, jege haá njií gi bú seé seèn ndɔ.
66013003	Nyam doô né mé bàŋ felè, den né faá bɔ́ lé ye bɔ́ nde aá bú feh cén déì kɔ wulá sɔm nɔ. Njèh cén, nyer hèllè te gi cu aá kèn. Né bɔ̀ nùàr mé njéh hiím yɔgɔ́. Wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ kem bele gi nyam doô ndɔ.
66013004	Bɔ̀ nùàr yeé ŋene mèmàm haá baá nyam doô terreb ménâ, bɔ́ yila mèmàm keî, bɔ́ né nyam doô keí ndɔ; bɔ́ ye: Neì den né faá nyam hên kɔɔ́ wa? Nuaré déì nde né bú mé taáb lieé yɔgɔ́ ndɔ wa?»
66013005	Jomo sâ nyam hèllè kwa ceér, à né ŋgòr gàgà sònò tueé toró, à né Càŋ teèn seb keéh. À bɔɔ́ sɔɔ́ méménâ weéh yulà nèà cùɔ̀b fà;
66013006	à né Càŋ selé, à né yilí Càŋ tueé beéh, à né bèh denè Càŋ tueé beéh. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ké te vulúu, à né yilí bɔɔ̀n ménâ tueé beéh ndɔ.
66013007	À kwa terreb, te bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ lie taáb, à taré yɔgɔ́ bɔ́. À kwa cu terreb te à den felè bɔ̀ nùàr mé gèh hihiné, lò hihiné mé ju hihiné ndɔ.
66013008	Bɔ̀ nùàr dua laré bú wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ. Sâ tueé né ye, Mbieè Sèmè mé lé naâ kuú, né mé mvù yɔ̀ŋ beè. Bèh lɔ mé wɔ́ŋ lɔ duɔɔ́m naâ, yilí bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ teèn nyàgà yílá ŋgwéh.
66013009	Nuaá mé né tie ŋgweé, bú a, ŋgwé nyégé ŋgòr hên bagasé!
66013010	Mɔ nùàr yoòr né mé húɔ́m gwà cibì yilâ, sâ à nde né ménâ yilá. Mɔ bɔ́ bú teé wula nde né lòù, sâ yoòr seèn né cí. Mɔ né mân, sâ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔ̀ a, yíyolò, bɔ́ temé tég kwá njí lòm yoòr Càŋ.
66013011	Jomo sâ mè yeé ke, nyam déì komo yuo kelà baá dòù. À né mé lulí felè fà; né faá lulí huaán sòrŋgaàŋ nɔ. À né sònò faá mèmàm nɔ tueé den.
66013012	Terreb seèn né cu faá terreb nyam dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ ndɔ. Njolò mbeî doó sâ à duɔɔ́m seé seèn bɔɔ̂. À né bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ baá, ye bɔ́ a: bɔ́ dùà gí nyam dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ mé lɔ̀rè nyeèr yoòr doô ma.
66013013	À né dé seèn bɔ̀ njèh kèkènè hihiné bɔɔ́ bele; à ŋaga sɔm keêh we déì ké te vulúu, dar suagà, cor ká doó njolò bɔ̀ nùàr.
66013014	À yeé kwa baá ceér ménâ, njolò mbeî doó sâ à yila bɔ̀ nùàr mé terreb sâ beleè, ye bɔ́ a: Nyam dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ mé bɔ́ lé ye bɔ́ nde aá kɔ wulá, à kú ŋgwéh doô, bí mé kwá ŋgùlàmúr, te den faá bú nɔ, bí né bú dua.»
66013015	Nyam dé jomò doô yeé tueé gi aá ménâ, bɔ́ haá bú terreb ndɔ, à fulu yií ŋgùlàmúr doô cúcuí lè, te à kwa yɔ̀ŋ, à tueé sòn, ye te bɔ́ wula sɔm gi bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nyí dùà ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ.
66013016	À duɔɔ́m baá-re bɔ̀ nùàr baá beleè: à né bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ huaán tetɔɔ̂r baá, à né bɔ̀ lilieê bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ saám bɔ̀ baá, à né bɔ̀ kwer mé bɔ̀ lòù bɔ̀ baá ndɔ, bɔ́ né bɔ́ mágá yoòr tɔré kwaá bele, mɔ te be gaâ sam, né toò kuûn.
66013017	Kɔ nùà kàn né mé mágá sâ yoòr, te à ŋge ye njèh, à go ye njèh ndɔ. Mágá sâ lé naâ sòn yilí nyam sâ. Mágá hèllè lé naâ cuù kwɔ̀m yilí seèn ndɔ.
66013018	Bɔ̀ nùàr a, dèn mé lo, bɔ́ munó nyegé bagasé. Nùà loò nde né dɔ̀gɔ̀tì mágá nyam hèllè munó komo. Né ndègè yilí nùàr; né yuií ténjén mé yulà ténjén cùɔ̀b ténjén.
66014001	Jomo sâ mè yeé ke, Mbieè Sèmè baá ké te tòr Siyɔ̂ŋ njebá den; à né mé bɔ̀ nùàr kám yuií mé kám yulà nèà cùɔ̀b nèà beè. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ né gi dé bɔɔ̀n mé yilí seèn toò kuûn nyagá den, bɔ́ né gi mé yilí Tele seèn toò kuûn nyagá den ndɔ.
66014002	Mè yeé ŋgweé, hueh déì baá ké te vulúu faá nòmò vùvù nɔ ŋgulí, né faá nu nɔ gwaán tulú. Hueh sâ ŋgulí lom né faá hueh njâŋ nɔ.
66014003	Bɔ̀ kám bɔ̀ hèllè né ké toò kɔgɔ̀ njebá den, bɔ́ né ké toò bɔ̀ njèh lèlàŋ nèà mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ doô; bɔ́ né bené feê sònò de den; bené sâ lé de kɔ cegé naâ bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lé naâ ká lè wɔ́ŋe ŋaá weh doô. Né bɔ̀ kám yuií bɔ̀, mé kám yulà nèà cùɔ̀b nèà sâ.
66014004	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé naâ dé bɔɔ̀n yo bɔɔ̀n jolo nyegé, bɔ́ lé bɔ̀ véh kèmà ná ŋgwêh, bɔ́ né lom dé bɔɔ̀n jomo Mbieè Sèmè, à nde mene he, bɔ́ bɔ́ né kɔɔ́. Sâ né bɔ̀ toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀. Càŋ lé ká doó lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr ŋa weéh naâ bɔ́, te bɔ́ den beè seèn, beè Mbieè Sèmè ndɔ.
66014005	Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ mé nyeén lè sam, bɔ́ mé veên déì yoòr sam ndɔ.
66014006	Mè yeé ke, cìlì Càŋ déì baá tɔ́g ké ka vulû lɔɔ́ yɔŋ, à ndeè naâ bɔ̀ nùàr Njàgà Bagaà dé ndeèr tueé weh. Lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr mé gèh hihiné, lò hihiné mé ju hihiné ndɔ.
66014007	Cìlì Càŋ doô né ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií, ye bɔ̀ nùàr a: Bí vèh Càŋ veèh, bí sén njí bú ké ter. Cu seèn waà baá. Kènê ju nde aá felè bɔ̀ nùàr tená. Bí kéí bú keì. Vulú bɔ̂ tàbè mé nòmò mene dɔɔ́ŋ lɔ si giì naâ bú.»
66014008	Cìlì Càŋ dé jomò njege bele cu dé toò ndɔ; à né sònò tueé gɔ ye: Gi aá, gi aá kèn. Tàŋɔ̀r Babilɔ̂n doó mvúɔ́b. À lé bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ sela feéh naâ sár.»
66014009	Te mè yeé ke, cìlì Càŋ déì baá cu bɔ̀ dé fà doô jomo njegé bele, à né ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií, ye: Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé dua yeé nyam mé naâ ké dùà doô nde né gèr ŋené, bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ŋgùlàmúr seèn dua, mé né gi mé mágá seèn yoòr, né mene beè, né mene toò kuûn dɔɔ́ŋ
66014010	nde gi né mé mbè fúrú-temé Càŋ ŋueé kuú, te bɔ́ kekɔɔ̀. Bɔ́ nde né tuar te we tarê yilá ndeé, bɔ́ nde né gèr mé we nyùm nàgàkèn fî ŋené. Bɔ́ gèr ŋene nde né toò bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ mé Mbieè Sèmè.
66014011	Ju weè mé né bɔ́ ŋgie den sâ, nde né ter dé kèì cên faár yilí ŋaá den. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né nyam hèllè dua, mé né ŋgùlàmúr seèn dua, mé né gi mé mágá seèn yoòr dɔɔ́ŋ nde né gèr ŋené. Cíbí mé lou mene bɔ́ dù ndé ŋgwéh.»
66014012	Sâ bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ a, yóló dé bɔɔ̀n yolò. Lòù sam, bɔ́ ŋgweé né dé bɔɔ̀n sòn Càŋ, bɔ́ temé kwaá njií né yoòr Yeésò ndɔ.
66014013	Yeé gi aá, mè ŋgweé njií hueh déì ké te vulúu ye mè a: Nyàgà bɔ̀ njií hên nyagaà. Ye mè a, nyàgà ye: Duɔɔ̂m lan nde ké toò, bɔ̀ nùàr mé kuú né mé yilí Fehtoò beèh lè, Càŋ nde né bɔ́ kulú.» Hueh doô yeé tueé gi aá, Cúcuí Ŋagâ gwaán, ye: Nyea, né môn, à nde né bɔ́ kulú. Kènê gèr sam cuú, bɔ́ dù bá dé duù; tàb seé bɔɔ̀n baá cie.»
66014014	Jomo sâ mè ke njií njeré déì faá nùàr nɔ, né ké te vúlú nuù wulésé mân ŋené den, à né mé tàm ŋgɔ̂g felè, bɔ́ tàm sâ me né mé goó; à né cu mé bòù nulásé mân beè ndɔ.
66014015	Mè yeé ke, cìlì Càŋ déì yuo kelà baá ké gwà Càŋ koô, à né ké ter lɔgɔ́ njií, ye nùà ké te vúlú nuù doô a: Sìè nyégé bòù sieè; baá cu, yab baá bɔlé, baá dé hobô.»
66014016	À yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, à kura yií keêh bòù seèn hèllè ká doó ndɔ. Tètèì sam tàbè mvúâr!
66014017	Jomo sâ cìlì Càŋ déì yuo kela cuù ké gwà Càŋ koô ké te vulúu, à né mé bòù déì beè ndɔ.
66014018	Mè ŋene cìlì Càŋ déì yuo kela cuù baá, à la naâ dé seèn ké toò kɔɔ̀; seé seèn né mé we. Dé sâ né ké ter lɔgɔ njií, ye nùà bòù doô a: Kènê tàb toû ké te wɔ́ŋe te gi aá kèn. Wèh bòù yeè, ndé bɔ́ mvurú bele.
66014019	Cìlì Càŋ doô yeé ŋgweé aá ménâ, à weh bòù seèn ndɔ, à kura yií keêh ká doó, à mvurú bilí tàb toû ká doó dɔɔ́ŋ, à ŋuaán su njií ké te vua njùŋ Càŋe.
66014020	Vua sâ né ké jomo lɔɔ̂ mân, bɔ́ doró den baá-re teèn. Bɔ́ yeé baá doró, húɔ́m yuo seér teèn kɔɔ́, né faá gùm nòmò koô nɔ kwaár ndeé. Húɔ́m doô kwar sɔm gùm kílòmétà yuií tagár, lé naâ yilá ndɔ. Mɔ nyam tébágàr yila teèn, ŋgɔ̀gɔ̀ jiím, feh le lom cie kɔɔ́.
66015001	Jomo sâ mè ŋene njií kèkènè njeré déì ké te vulúu, hiím yɔgɔ́ mè. Lé naâ bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeh; bɔ́ beè né mé njèh ndùàn téhbeh ndɔ. Càŋ bɔ̀ nùàr gèr feh ceré nde né mé njéh.
66015002	Mè ŋene njií cu njeré déì, né faá tàmbàŋ tuùb nɔ, né faá daregà ndɔ, né mé we mene laga den. Bɔ̀ nùàr né ké kwarè ndèndèŋ tuùb sâ njebá den. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé naâ nyam doô bɔ̂ ŋgùlàmúr seèn taré yɔgɔ́, bɔ́ lé naâ nyam mé yilí seèn né seér dé kulâ hèllè taré yɔgɔ́ ndɔ. Bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ sâ lé naá giì mé njáŋ beè-beè; Càŋ lé haá naâ bɔ́ njáŋ sâ kɔɔ́.
66015003	Bɔ́ né bené de, né bené Músì nùà seê Càŋ mé bené Mbieè Sèmè, bɔ́ né de ye: Càŋ ndeèr Nùà terrèb, seé yeè né tàŋɔ̀r kela, né nɔré ndɔ. Nùà Dueè felè dàm lò nùàr né cegé wò. Ceér yeè dɔɔ́ŋ né gi teèn dilí yilá, wò né nùà gècên.
66015004	Nuaá mé wò sén ndé ŋgwéh né neì wa? Neì wò sùmù ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ wa? Lòù sam, nùà joloò gi lom né wò. Lò nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ndeè né waá giî, bɔ́ cemmé toò yeè, bɔ́ né wò keí bilí. Lòù sam, seé yeè baá bèsɔ́nè ŋené ŋagá.»
66015005	Jomo sâ, mè ke cu, gwà Càŋ koô gulu baá ké te vulúu, gwà cɔ̀gɔ̀ mé Càŋ ŋené yuo kelà yeé teèn né ké gwò ŋené den.
66015006	Bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeh doô yuo kelà ké gwò ndɔ, bɔ́ beè née mé bɔ̀ njèh ndùàn téhbeh doô ye. Cɔ̀gɔ̀ wula njerré lom né bɔ́ yoòr pób, bɔ́ cam tená bele né mé kàndá goô.
66015007	Njèh làŋ cén déì lètenè bɔ̀ nèà bɔ̀ doô, weh ŋgàb njùŋ téhbeh, haá kwaá bele bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeh doô beè-beè. Fúrú-temé Càŋ Ndeèr né bele lè dedeí. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ ŋgàb sâ me bele né mé goó.
66015008	Bɔ́ yeé baá mé njéh beè beè, sùsùm Càŋ mé terrèb Càŋ ŋené yuo kelà ndɔ, jeré yuú gwà Càŋ mé ju, né bɔ̀ nùàr dé gwò yilâ faáŋ yɔgɔ́. Kɔ seé bɔ̀ njèh ndùàn téhbeh beè bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ doô mboón aá, sâ ye.
66016001	Jomo sâ mè ŋgweé njií hueh déì baá ké gwà Càŋ koô lɔgɔ́, ye bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeh doô a: Bɔ̀ ŋgàb njùŋ Càŋ téhbeh dɔɔ́ŋ, bí ndé sù njí ké te wɔ́ŋe.»
66016002	Cìlì Càŋ dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ njege yuo, nde su njií ŋgàb dé seèn. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé dua yeé ŋgùlàmúr doô, nyer yulásé mân ŋar yila bɔ́ yoòr. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né mé mágá nyaàm doô yoòr dɔɔ́ŋ ŋene kuú gi mé gèr njùŋ sâ.
66016003	Cìlì Càŋ dé jomò su njií ŋgàb dé seèn dùà te ndèndèŋ nòmò. Nòmò ŋa húɔ́m, né faá húɔ́m komô nɔ; njèh dùà dɔɔ́ŋ kuú gi.
66016004	Cìlì Càŋ dé tagâr nde ŋgàb dé seèn dùà su njií ndɔ: bɔ̀ nòmò kokoô mé bɔ̀ nduùn mene ŋa gi húɔ́m.
66016005	Mè yeé ŋgweé, cìlì Càŋ déì baá tueé. Dé sâ, seé seèn né yeé mé nòmò. À ye Càŋ a: Môn Càŋ Dueè, wò né lom Nùà dilî kɔɔ́. Wò né léí jɔ̀gɔ̀, wò né kènê ndɔ. Nùà gècên né wò. Wò ju hên tena yií né teèn.
66016006	Bɔ̀ nùà hên né gi bɔ̀ wúlá-nùàr bɔ̀. Dàm húɔ̂m bɔ̀ sòn yeè bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ nùàr yeè dɔɔ́ŋ, lɔ berré giì beè bɔ̀ nùà hên, wò bɔ́ húɔ́m hên kura yií né teèn.»
66016007	Hueh déì den cuù ké te kɔ, ye: Môn Càŋ Dueè Nùà terrèb, wò ju tena yií yeé teèn.»
66016008	Jomo sâ cìlì Càŋ dé nèà su njií ŋgàb dé seèn ké te lou; lou kwa terreb faá we nɔ, te à fií bɔ̀ nùàr.
66016009	À yila bɔ́ fiî ndɔ. Yeé baá bɔ́ seé weh, bɔ́ duagá seér cu lòù, bɔ́ lɔɔ̀ temé kweéh seêr. Càŋ mé terreb felè bɔ̀ njèh gèr sâ né beè seèn, bɔ́ seb seér cu bú lòù. Yeé baá ménâ, bɔ́ bú sén cú ndɔ.
66016010	Cìlì Càŋ dé tîn su njií ŋgàb dé seèn te kɔgɔ nyam doô; cibí die te lò seèn, yili mban lɔ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn ménâ, gèr kwaá njií bɔ́ be yoòr. Bɔ́ né leba mé nyie yieé,
66016011	nyer yulásé mân né bɔ́ yoòr ŋaár yilá. Bɔ́ lɔɔ̀ dene bɔɔ̀n kweéh seêr, bɔ́ seb seér cu Càŋ Nùà vulû lòù.
66016012	Cìlì Càŋ dé ténjên nde su njií ŋgàb dé seèn te nòmò koô mé bɔ́ yilá né Efrátè doô. Nòmò hèllè ŋemá yuo, te bɔ̀ mgbè mé yuo ndeè né kèb bà sela kela sa.
66016013	Mè yeé ke, bɔ̀ tándulu déì tagár yuo kelà baá kèn, bɔ́ den bele né faá kùlà nɔ. Déì yuo kelà sònò mèmàm, déì sònò nyam doô, déì sònò nùà ndòn hèllè.
66016014	Seé bɔ̀ tándulu sâ né táhunó lètenè bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ yɔŋ gɔɔ̀, bɔ́ né bɔ́ yilá bilí gɔ, te loù mé Càŋ terrèb nde né ju tená, bɔ́ bɔ́ kwaá njií taáb doó.
66016015	Jue mè Yeésò, mè nab waà nde né faá yíb nɔ. Samésé nde né nuaá mé né làŋ mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ yoòr. À dé seèn toò bɔ̀ nùàr loù sâ, luŋturu gɔ̀ ndé ŋgwéh.»
66016016	Bɔ̀ tándulu doô né ka mé bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè bilí ndeé, bɔ́ nde bilí kwaá bɔ́ ké Harmagedɔ̂ŋ; né yilí bèh sâ te ju hebreêh.
66016017	Jomo sâ cìlì Càŋ dé téhbeèh su njií ŋgàb dé seèn ké ter mbaá. À yeé su sɔm aá, mè ŋgweé njií hueh déì baá ké gwà Càŋ koô te kɔgɔ Càŋ ŋgulí taré, ye: Bɔɔ́ baá kèn! Bɔɔ́ baá kèn!»
66016018	Yeé baá ménâ tueé den, mbàn die, nu gwaán, bɔ̀ hueh né ŋgulí, tàbè jilí taré, dé tueê sam. Bèh lɔɔ́ mé naâ-naà mé Càŋ lɔ meè nùàr, gèh tàbè jilí tarê bú sâ lɔ née teèn sam ye.
66016019	Tàbè kerré geé kwaá Babilɔ̂n bèh tagár; bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ kokoô ká lè wɔ́ŋe dɔɔ́ŋ ŋemmé tɔbé yuo gi ndɔ. Càŋ yeé nde munó njií dé Babilɔ̂n mân, temé ŋaâ bú, à kura njií gi bú ŋgàb njùŋ lè.
66016020	Gùm ten tàbè dé kàn mé né lètenè nòmò dɔɔ́ŋ kum le dùà; nùàr tòr mé njéh ŋéné cú ndɔ.
66016021	Bɔ̀ mege boô faá gùm nyèn nɔ né ké ter komó suagâ, né bɔ̀ nùàr seé weh. Bɔ́ yila cu Càŋ mé njéh lòù selé seêr, sâ bɔgɔ́ yɔgɔ́ baá!
66017001	Lètenè bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeèh mé lé naâ mé bɔ̀ ŋgàb téhbeh beè doô, cén déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n waà ye mè a: Ndê mè feh kwaá wò njolò. Né gèr mé nde né meì bɔ̀ sɔrmbeè kwa; mè jue né tàyàm lɔɔ̂ mé bɔ́ me kwaá né ké te làrè nòmò doô.
66017002	À bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ jin gi né kɔɔ́, bɔ́ bɔ́ tobó kuú gi aá kèn. Kènê, bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ sela tobó nde gi aá mé njéh ménâ ndɔ.»
66017003	Yeé baá ménâ, Cúcuí Ŋagâ waà kema mè ndɔ, cìlì Càŋ doô weh njií mè ké ya dueè. Wa ké teèn, mè ŋene njií ma déì, à né ké ŋgètenè nyam déì bèlèsé mân ŋaá den. Nyam sâ né mé feh felè téhbeh, lulí né teèn yulà. Bɔ́ nyagá lamé kwaá né nyam hèllè bɔ̀ yilí séb-Càŋ yo dɔɔ́ŋ.
66017004	Ma doô dé seèn yoòr lé naâ mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ bèlè jùm mé bèlè yɔ̂ŋ mân. À né mé lɔ̀ŋ bèlè tieè; à né mé taá ndòn mé gɔ̀m feh hihiné yoòr deí; à weh sie né ŋgàb déì mé be gaâ, bɔ́ ŋgàb sâ me né mé goó. Lè ŋgàb hèllè né lom ndândaà bɔ̀ njèh fefɔɔ̀. Bɔ̀ njèh fefɔɔ̀ sâ né njègè yàgà yɔŋ tobó gɔɔ̀ seèn hèllè.
66017005	Yilí déì né ma hèllè toò kuûn nyagá den; bɔ́ nyagá gugó né Tàŋɔ̀r Babilɔ̂n meì bɔ̀ sɔrmbeè, ye né ŋgum veên bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ.
66017006	Mè yeé ke njií, ma hèllè baá mé húɔ́m bɔ̀ nùàr Yeésò sela den, né húɔ́m bɔ̀ sòn Yeésò bɔ̀ mé bɔ́ lé wula giì naâ felè Yeésò doô. Geí seér mè lòù.
66017007	Cìlì Càŋ doô ye mè a: Té mbaá hím kú; mè nde né wò kwɔ̀m ma kíê se. Nyam seèn mé feh téhbeh mé lulí teèn yulà doô, mè nde né wò kwɔ̀m seèn se ndɔ. Kwɔ̀m sâ lé leér deén naâ bèh nábe.
66017008	Nyam mé wò né ŋené kíê cemá sam cuú, wanɔɔ́ŋ léí toò à lé naá giì cemásé. Mé njéh mene, à nde cuù né te lege ŋgɔbè doô komo yuo kelâ, te Càŋ bú wula calé sɔm cu ye dé kèì cên. Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé Càŋ lɔ yilí bɔɔ̀n te mvù yɔ̀ŋe ké bèh duɔɔ̂m nyàgà kwá ná ŋgwêh dɔɔ́ŋ, nde né nyam hên ŋené, bɔ́ geí gi. Lòù sam, nyam doô teèn sam cuú lòù, wanɔɔ́ŋ léí toò à lé naá giì cemásé, toò hên à nde cuù né yuo kelâ.»
66017009	À den cuù ye mè a: Kɔ bɔ̀ nùàr den lom mé lo, sâ ye; wanɔɔ́ŋ bɔ̀ ŋgòr hên né taré. Mè tueé wò, wò né feh téhbeh felè nyam doô ŋené, né bɔ̀ tòr téhbeh mé ma doô den yeé teèn; né cu bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè hihiné téhbeh ndɔ.
66017010	Bɔ̀ tîn bɔ̀ déì die yuo aá teèn. Cén déì né kènê te kɔgɔ. Mbeí bɔɔ̀n dé téhbeèh doô, cu seèn née wá ŋgwéeh ye. Mɔ ndeè waà baá, à ndeè te mgbè sâ cèr dè ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ.
66017011	Nyam doô mé feh seèn mgbè dé téndelê hên cer nde né kɔɔ́, à cemá sam cuú lòù, wanɔɔ́ŋ à lé naá giì cemásé. Mgbè hèllè né lètenè bɔ̀ téhbeh bɔ̀ doô ndɔ, à nde cuù né komo yuo kelâ, te Càŋ wula calé sɔm cu ye bú dé kèì cên.»
66017012	À den cuù ye mè a: Kè, bɔ̀ lulí seèn yulà mé wò la naâ ŋené doô, né bɔ̀ mgbè hihiné yulà ndɔ; bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ née dé bɔɔ̀n cèr dùɔ̀m ŋgwéeh ye. Càŋ nde né bɔ́ bɔ̀ nyam doô dɔɔ́ŋ terreb haá gií; njèh cén, bɔ́ cer weh cegé nde né mgbè yɔ̀ŋ loù cén ndɔ́g.
66017013	Bɔ́ yulà dɔɔ́ŋ baá gi mé sòn cên; bɔ́ terreb bɔɔ̀n haá njií gi aá mé nyam doô, te à mgbè cer kɔɔ́.
66017014	Bɔ́ nde né taáb mé Mbieè Sèmè kaga njií. Mbieè Sèmè nde né bɔ́ yɔgɔ́ ndɔ. Lòù sam, Mgbè bɔ̀ mgbè né lom bú. Nùà Dueè felè bɔ̀ dudueèr bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ gi lom né bú ndɔ. Bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn né kɔɔ́, à lé bɔ́ balé sɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́, à weh kwaá bɔ́ beè seèn. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ né dé bɔɔ̀n kɔ́bè sâ.»
66017015	Cìlì Càŋ doô den cuù, ye mè a: Ŋgweéh nòmò mé sɔrmbe hèllè la naâ teèn doô, wò la naâ ŋené wa? Né dàm bɔ̀ nùàr mé lò hihiné, mé ju hihiné ndɔ.»
66017016	Ye mè a: Ŋgweéh wò naâ bɔ̀ lulí yulà mé nyam doô mene ŋené ndɔ wa? Bɔ́ nde né meì bɔ̀ sɔrmbeè doô seé weh; bɔ́ nde né bú bunó, bɔ́ huaré kwaá bú luŋturu, te bɔ́ yieé ŋaré sɔm ye bú, bɔ́ nde né dé jomò ŋgie calé sɔm ndɔ.
