66017017	Sâ dɔɔ́ŋ Càŋ ye te bɔ̀ lulí yulà bɔ́ bɔ̀ nyam doô saga sòn, bɔ́ terreb bɔɔ̀n haá njií mé nyam doô, te à cer mgbè mé njéh; sâ Càŋ ye te mboón faá nyí gwaán nê, faá nyí lé naâ tueé kwaá ndɔ.»
66017018	Cìlì Càŋ doô den cuù, ye mè a: Ma mé wò la ŋenè naâ doô, né tàŋɔ̀r lɔɔ́ koô; bɔ̀ mgbè ká lè wɔ́ŋe dɔɔ́ŋ né gi ka seèn.»
66018001	Jomo sâ, mè yeé ke, cìlì Càŋ déì baá cuù ké te vulúu suagâ. Dé sâ bɔ́ jege haá né bú terreb duesé mân beè; njènjàn seèn ba ŋagá sie né wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ beè.
66018002	Dé sâ lɔgɔ́ njií ké ter, ye: Mvúɔ́b, tàŋɔ̀r Babilɔ̂n doó mvúɔ̂b! À baá kènê mvùr bɔ̀ tándulù, à baá gbàŋ bɔ̀ càŋ vevenê, mé bɔ̀ non vevenê feh hihiné ndɔ. Doó sâ baá kènê mbàn bɔ̀ ŋgùgò, bɔ́ bɔ̀ jùkuùm.
66018003	À lé selá baá kela, à lò nùàr dɔɔ́ŋ sela feh gi né sár. Dàm bɔ̀ mgbè wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ jin weh gi aá beè seèn, bɔ́ bɔ́ né tobó. Bɔ̀ toón bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ŋa keéh gi aá bɔ̀ lilieê bɔ̀ mé njéh.»
66018004	Mè yeé ŋgweé, hueh déì baá cu ké te vulúu ŋgulí, ye: Bí cú yo, bɔ̀ nùàr mò, bí yùò lɔ sâ yuoò. Mɔ sam, bɔ́ nde né bí mé veên jin; bí nde né gèr teèn ŋené keéh.
66018005	Bí yùò yoòr bɔɔ̀n yuoò. Veên bɔɔ̀n yɔgɔ́ baá, naŋ kwa baá Càŋ ké te vulúu, à baá mé njèh bɔɔ̀n lè.
66018006	Bí wèh lɔɔ́ sâ seé, faá à lé naâ bí seé weh nɔ. Bí bá kúrá njí gí bú ŋgàb mbè fà lè, te taré yɔgɔ́ dé seèn cén mé à lé haá naâ bí doô.
66018007	Sòn sèsàm mé púnò seèn bí kúrá lòm bú gèr yulásé mân, ye nyí né mgbè mé feh nyî sé wa? Nyí nùà kû sam; ye ndɔ́g cio nyí njeré déì bɔ́ ndé ŋgwéh ndɔ sé wa?
66018008	Kwá nɔɔ́ŋ, dùkàŋ baá ndeê: beén mé cio bɔ́ bɔ̀ cùè nde né bú bomó kwa; dɔɔ́ŋ nde né mé cieé cên. We nde né bɔ̀ dé jomò ŋgie nagá sɔm ndɔ. Lòù sam, Càŋ Dueè bú mé ju sie né kɔɔ́. Nùà terrèb né bú.»
66018009	Bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè mé lé bɔɔ́ tobó gɔɔ́ naâ yàgà mé bú wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ faá né njèh ndà nɔ, nde gi né ju weè seèn loù sâ ŋené njií, bɔ́ nde né mé kwɔ̀m loù sâ yueé bieé kuú ndɔ.
66018010	Bɔ́ nde né bèh ndɔ́ŋ-ndɔ̀ŋ mé veéh njebá den, te gèr hèllè bɔ́ teèn kwà kéh cú, bɔ́ keí den teèn, ye: Gèr-e, Babilɔ̂ne gèr-e! Tàyàm Babilɔ̂n, meì bɔ̀ lɔɔ́ koô, baá doó mvúɔ́b; dɔɔ́ŋ né te yɔ̀ŋ loù cén-e.»
66018011	Bɔ̀ toón bɔ̀ wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ yueé kuú gi nde né mé mbà seèn loù sâ ndɔ, ye: Bɔ̀ neì béh goó beè ŋge weh nde cu né kɔɔ́?
66018012	Bɔ̀ lɔ̀ŋ o, bɔ̀ taá ndòn o, bɔ̀ gɔ̀m o, bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ nyàgàm o, bɔ̀ dé nyényɔ́gɔ̀r o, bɔ̀ dé nùnùgò o, bɔ̀ dé luluarê o, dɔɔ́ŋ neì béh beè ŋge weh cu nde né kɔɔ́ wa? Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé nde cu né bɔ̀ toú múmû feh hihiné ŋge bele teèn sam cuú. Bɔ̀ njií mé bɔ́ bɔɔ́ bele né mé nyie tɔ̀n o, mé toú gècên o, mé lɔ̀ŋ bèlè o, mé taá ndòn o, dɔɔ́ŋ nuaá mé nde né béh beè ŋge weh teèn sam cuú.
66018013	Né mene bɔ̀ soó, bɔ̀ sìbì, bɔ̀ kómó-múmû feh hihiné mé bɔ̀ san, nùàr ŋgè ndé cú. Bɔ̀ mbè, bɔ̀ kómó, bɔ̀ nyùm, bɔ̀ yolo, bɔ̀ nàgà, bɔ̀ mbieè, bɔ̀ nyam tébágàr, bɔ̀ pûs, mé bɔ̀ kwer, neì beè beèh ŋge cu nde né kɔɔ́ wa? Te nùàr mé gùm mene ŋge cu nde né neì ndɔ wa?»
66018014	Bɔ̀ toón bɔ̀ hèllè né mé tàŋɔ̀r lɔɔ̂ séná yueé bieé njií den, ye bú a: Wò vu aá be, hên bɔ̀ njií mé wò lé naá giì gwaán dɔɔ́ŋ mvûŋ; hên dàm bɔ̀ njèh yeè mé yila lom yeé wò yoòr hèllè dɔɔ́ŋ kùmjèg! Kènê bɔ́ baá njolò yeè nyúér dé ndɔ̂g.»
66018015	Bɔ̀ toón bɔ̀ mé yili gi yeé mé lɔɔ́ sâ dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né bèh ndɔ́ŋ-ndɔ̀ŋ mé veéh njebá den, te gèr hèllè bɔ́ teèn kwà kéh cú; bɔ́ né mé mbà seèn yueé kuú,
66018016	ye: Gèr-e! Bí kè njèh gèr kán, tàyàm lɔɔ́ hên kum yuo aá, lɔɔ́ hèllè nyegé kuú aá mé yàgà dé lòù. Sâ, bɔ̀ cɔ̀gɔ̀ nyàgàm baá gi yoòr nyɔgɔ́r den; lɔ̀ŋ yàgà tie deí, bɔ́ me gi né mé goó ndɔ, sâ bɔ̀ taá ndòn mé gɔ̀m baá gi yoòr lané den.
66018017	Mé njéh mene, dɔɔ́ŋ lé naá cegê te yɔ̀ŋ loù cén-tà-cén ŋgie yuo.» Bɔ̀ fár-bàtô bɔ̀, mé bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ teèn mene, bɔ̀ yílá-bàtô bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ɔ́ mé yili yeé mé nòmò dɔɔ́ŋ, lé naá giì bèh ndɔ́ŋ-ndɔ̀ŋ njebá den,
66018018	bɔ́ né ju weè seèn ŋené njií, bɔ́ né keéŋ den, ye: Bí kè njí tàyàm lɔɔ̂ faá cí nɔ, baá doó mvúɔ́b!»
66018019	Bɔ́ né ménâ tueé, bɔ́ né fùfú felè ŋuaán su, bɔ́ né mé mbà seèn yueé kuú, kéŋ né silí, ye: Tàyàm lɔɔ́ hên ŋene kuú mé gèr! Bí kè njèh gèr kán, tàyàm lɔɔ̂ mé yili sɔm yeé dàm bɔ̀ bàtô bɔ̀ kɔɔ́ hên, kum yuo aá te yɔ̀ŋ loù cén faá njèh mbaâ nɔ.»
66018020	Môn! Vulú, sàmè sér dé yeè mé kùmjèg hèllè lòù; bí bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ sàmè ŋáŋ sér dé samê. Bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê a, sàmè gí ménâ ndɔ. Càŋ bie sɔm aá bɔ́ bíéb sòn veên mé bɔ́ lé bɔɔ́ naâ bí doô.
66018021	Yeé baá ménâ, cìlì Càŋ terrèb déì jɔgɔ wellê tàgèrà taá déì faá nyèn nɔ, à si tulu njií dùà te ndèndèŋ nòmò, à né sònò tueé, ye: Kùmjèg. Bɔ́ tàyàm Babilɔ̂n ŋéné ndé cú ndɔ́g, bɔ́ tɔb ba njií nde né bú doó mé terreb ka mân nág!
66018022	Dàm bɔ̀ njáŋ bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ dè-bené bɔ̀ ké Babilɔ̂n ŋgíb; dàm bɔ̀ túágá-tɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ túágá-tàŋ bɔ̀ ŋgíb ndɔ. Nùà seê déì ké teèn ŋéné yùò ndé cû; bɔ́ hueh nyèn ké teèn ŋgwé ndé cú;
66018023	mugɔ́ lâm déì ké teèn bá ndé cú; ndɔ́g bɔ́ hueh fuaân ké teèn ŋgwé ndé cú. Lòù sam, bɔ̀ toón bɔ̀ yeè sâ lé ye, bɔ́ né kela sé wa? Wò né-re táhunó yeè sâ bɔɔ́ bele, wò né bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ bele gɔ.
66018024	Babilɔ̂n gèr hên ŋene yií né teèn: dàm húɔ́m bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ o, bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀ o, dàm húɔ̂m bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ́ lé naá giì wulá dɔɔ́ŋ né gi lè Babilɔ̂n, kɔ̀cɔ̀!»
66019001	Jomo sâ mè ŋgweé njií hueh tarê déì ké te vulúu, né faá hueh cìlì nùàr nɔ tuɔm den, ye: Bí sén Càŋ seèn! Bèh yili yuoò né beè seèn, Nùà sùsùm né bú, be terrèb seèn baá ter.
66019002	À né yeé ju teèn tená yií, à meì bɔ̀ sɔrmbeè hên mé ju sie yií né teèn. Ma hèllè lé wɔ́ŋ te yàgà yɔŋe nagá yií naâ kɔɔ́. À lé bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ Càŋ wula giì naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Càŋ bú gèr feh keéh né dé cî.»
66019003	Bɔ́ den cuù ye: Bí sén Càŋ seèn! Kùsàn kwaré baá felè tàyàm lɔɔ́ hèllè kèn; ju weè seèn baá ter dé kèì cên faár yilí ŋaá.»
66019004	Bɔ́ yeé tueé gi aá, bɔ̀ kokoô bɔ̀ ndètoón cùɔ̀b nèà, mé bɔ̀ lèlàŋ bɔ̀ nèà doô sue cemmé nde gi doó, bɔ́ né Càŋ ké te kɔgɔ keí, bɔ́ ye: Môn, kùsèm Càŋ Dueè!»
66019005	Mè yeé ŋgweé, hueh déì baá ké te kɔgɔ ŋgulí, ye: Bí sén Càŋ beèh seèn! Bí bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ seèn mé né sòn seèn ŋgweé, kàm bɔ̀ o, huaán tetɔɔ̂r o, bí sén bú seèn.»
66019006	Jomo sâ mè ŋgweé njií cu hueh déì né faá hueh cìlì nùàr nɔ tuɔm den; né faá nòmò vùvù nɔ ŋgulí, né cu faá nu nɔ gwaán ndɔ. Ké teèn né tuɔm den, ye: Bí sén Càŋ seèn! Né Càŋ dueè Nùà terrèb. Mbàm seèn baá bèsɔ́nè ŋené yuo kelâ.
66019007	Béh sèsamè, béh dòbò tàbè dobò, béh né bú mbaàn haá. Kùrmò Mbieè Sèmè baá dé yieê, Fù nyegé gi aá yàgà.
66019008	Bɔ́ ye bú a, sù kwá cɔ̀gɔ̀ nyɔ́gɔ̀r yoòr, né bɔrésé mân, ŋagásé mân ndɔ.» Cɔ̀gɔ̀ ŋagâ sâ né kàn; à me njií né mé seé didilî bɔ̀ Càŋ bɔ̀.
66019009	Cìlì Càŋ ye mè a: Wèh mvù, nyàgà kwá teèn ye: Samésé né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé bɔ́ lé naá giì bɔ́ yilá, te bɔ́ yieé kùrmò Mbieè Sèmè.» À den cuù, ye mè a: Bɔ̀ ŋgòr hên né lom bɔ̀ jéjég ŋgòr mé naá giì sònò Càŋ.»
66019010	Mè jɔgɔ die nde ka seèn, ye te mè keí bú. À deên ndɔ, ye mè a: Té môn bɔ́! Mè né lom nùà seê Càŋ faá bí bɔ̀ mbeí yeè nɔ. Ŋgweéh bí né gi mé sòn Yeésò lè mà. Dùà lòm Càŋ!» Ŋgòr gècên mé Yeésò né cie ŋené kwaá dɔɔ́ŋ haá yeé bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ terreb lè seé bɔɔ̀n kɔɔ́.
66019011	Jomo sâ, mè yeé ke, vulú gulu lɔgɔ́ baá, nyam tébágàr déì wulésé mân né ké teèn mé nùàr ŋgètenè ŋené den. Yilí nùàr sâ né Nùà jéjêg mé Nùà gècên; à ju tena yií né teèn, à taáb lie yií né teèn ndɔ.
66019012	Njolo bɔ gui lom né bú lè faá bɔgɔ́ weè nɔ; à né mé bɔ̀ tàm ŋgɔ̂g felè gur den. À né mé yilí déì yoòr nyagá den, nuaré déì yilí sâ ŋgwé kòmò ŋgwéh, kɔ cegé né bú.
66019013	À né mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ déì léláŋ húɔ̂m mân yoòr. Bɔ́ nùà sâ yilá né Ŋgòr Càŋ.
66019014	À né mé bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ taáb bɔ̀ dé ké te vulúu jomo, bɔ́ ŋaá den bele né te nyam tébágà wuwulê mân, bɔ́ né gi mé cɔ̀gɔ̀ nyɔ́gɔ̀r wuwulê mân yoòr ndɔ, né lom ŋagásé tâŋ.
66019015	À sònò nema sie né tàndɔ̀ŋ bòù déì ŋobósé mân, à nde né lò dé kàn mé njéh doó hobó su; à nde né lò dé kân seé mé cùgò lɔ̀ŋ weh; à nde doró den bɔ́ ké te vua mé njùŋ Càŋ terrèb né teèn doô.
66019016	Bɔ́ nyagá kwaá né bú yilí déì te cɔ̀gɔ, déì te ŋgeêh, ye: Mgbè bɔ̀ mgbè né lom bú. Nùà dueè felè bɔ̀ dudueèr bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ gi lom né bú ndɔ.»
66019017	Mè yeé ke cu, cìlì Càŋ déì baá ké te lou njebá den, à né bɔ̀ non ké te vulúu dɔɔ́ŋ mé hueh tarê yilá bilí, ye bɔ́ a: Bí bílí ndé gî kùrmò Càŋ yieé ma.
66019018	Bí ndê núɔ́gɔ́ yieé. Né núɔ́gɔ́ bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè mé bɔ̀ kwaá-taâb; núɔ́gɔ́ bɔ̀ sɔ́jì, bɔ̀ nyam tébágàr mé bɔ̀ ŋá-nyam bɔ̀; né núɔ́gɔ́ nùàr dɔɔ̂ŋ: núɔ́gɔ́ bɔ̀ kweèr, núɔ́gɔ́ bɔ̀ lòù bɔ̀, núɔ́gɔ́ kàm bɔ̀ mé huaán maàn mene, bí ndê bɔ́ seé weh.»
66019019	Mè yeé ke, nyam veên doô bɔ́ bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ wɔŋ gi aá sòn, bɔ́ bilí gi aá bɔ̀ sɔ́jì bɔɔ̀n, te bɔ́ lie taáb mé nùà nyam tébágàr doô bɔ́ bɔ̀ nùàr seèn.
66019020	Bɔ̀ hên bɔ̀ sie nyam veên hèllè. Nùà ndòn mé bɔɔ́ bele yeé táhunó toò nyam doô, bɔ́ sie bilí mé bú mene. À lé bɔ̀ nùàr bele deén naâ mé táhunó hèllè, bɔ́ né bɔ́ mágá nyam doô yoòr tɔré kwaá, ye bɔ́ a, dùà ŋgùlàmúr nyam hèllè. Bɔ́ yeé sie aá nyam doô bɔ̂ nùà ndòn hèllè, bɔ́ si njií bɔ́ te ndèndèŋ weè, lèlàŋ ménâ. Lé naâ we nyùm nàgàkèn.
66019021	Nùà nyam tébágàr doô kɔré wula gi bɔ̀ taáb bɔ̀ nyam hèllè ndɔ. Lé naâ mé tàndɔ̀ŋ bòù sònò seèn doô. Loù sâ non dɔɔ́ŋ fulu gi núɔ́gɔ́.
66020001	Mè yeé ke, cìlì Càŋ déì baá cuù ké te vulúu suagâ, à né mé kî lege ŋgɔbè beè, à né cu mé tàkpèg yuií lɔ̀ŋ mân beè ndɔ.
66020002	À waà, à cab sie mèmàm doô, né cu ka bú kuúm sàb hèllè, sâ tueé né ye, né táhòrò, yilí seèn déì né cu Sátàn ndɔ. Cìlì Càŋ yeé sie aá bú, à kaga kwaá bú te yuií lɔ̀ŋe, te à bɔɔ́ teèn nyèmà kám,
66020003	à nde bú te lege ŋgɔbè jɔgɔ si njií ndɔ, à kibí, à ferá lɔ bú teèn, à lier nyegé, te mèmàm hèllè tena le dòù, te à lò nùàr bèlè kwà cú, kɔ baá nyèmà kám, bɔ́ se yi weh cu ye bú.
66020004	Jomo sâ mè ŋene njií bɔ̀ kɔgɔ: nùàr né bele teteèn. Bɔ́ lé naâ bɔ́ terreb ju tenâ haá. Mè ŋene njií càŋ bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ ndɔ. Né càŋ bɔ̀ nuaá mé bɔ́ lé naâ bɔ́ feh kɔré sɔm, ye bɔ́ lé naâ sòn Yeésò tueé, bɔ́ lé naâ bɔ̀ nùàr ŋgòr Càŋ se fí. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé dé bɔɔ̀n nyam doô dùà ná ŋgwêh, bɔ́ ŋgùlàmúr seèn dùà ŋgwéh ndɔ. Mágá nyam hèllè lé bɔ́ yoòr ná ŋgwêh, né mene toò kuûn, né mene beè, lé bɔ́ yoòr ná ŋgwêh. Bɔ̀ sâ bɔ̀ lé naá cuù yɔ̀ŋ kwa; bɔ́ bɔ̀ Yeésò bɔɔ́ te kɔgɔ dɔɔ́ŋ nyèmà kám.
66020005	Hên né bèh dòù komo yuoò dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀. Bɔ̀ komó déì dòù kòmò yùò ndé ŋgwéh, kɔ baá cu nyèmà kám, sâ ye.
66020006	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né gi lètenè bɔ̀ toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔ̀ sâ teèn dɔɔ́ŋ nde né samésé den, bɔ́ ŋa bɔ̀ dé Càŋ. Cio dé jomò terreb felè bɔɔ̀n kwà ndé cú. Bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ ŋgàŋ sèmè den, bɔ́ den ŋgàŋ Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ ndɔ, bɔ́ bɔ̀ Nùà Cɔ̀ŋ nde né te kɔgɔ dé nyèmà kâm cer den.
66020007	Mɔ nyèmà kám sâ kelà baá, bɔ́ nde cu né Sátàn ké dòù se yi,
66020008	à nde cu né bɔ̀ nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ bele gɔ. Sâ tueé né ye, à nde né lò Gɔ̂g bɔ̂ Magɔ̂g yilá bilí, te bɔ́ kaga njií taáb mé Càŋ. Nùàr né teèn; bɔ́ maga lom né faá mbésebé nòmò koô nɔ,
66020009	bɔ́ né bèh dɔɔ́ŋ tɔɔ́m yuoô, bɔ́ né mbàn bɔ̀ nùàr Càŋ beè kaáŋ sie, bɔ́ kaŋ bilí mé lɔɔ́ yíé-temê Càŋ mene. Mé njéh mene, we ndeè né ké te vulúu suagâ, ŋgie ceré sɔm bɔ́.
66020010	Sátàn nuaá mé bele yeé bɔ̀ nùàr, bɔ́ nde né bú loù sâ te ndèndèŋ weè si njií; né we nyùm nàgàkèn. Bèh sâ bɔ́ lé nyam doô bɔ̂ nùà ndòn hèllè si njií naâ teèn ndɔ. Bɔ́ ké tuar sâ tegé den nde né cibí mé lou mene, dé nyèmà mé nyèmà.
66020011	Jomo sâ mè ŋene njií tà-gàg kɔgɔ̀ déì wulésé mân, nùàr né ké teèn den den. Tàbè bɔ̂ vulú nyue leér yuo bú toò ndɔ, bɔ́ fà dɔɔ́ŋ vu gi be mé bèh denè bɔɔ̀n.
66020012	Mè yeé ke cu, bɔ̀ nùàr mé lé naá giì kuú, baá gi ké toò kɔgɔ̀ njebá den. Lé naâ bɔ̀ dé kokoô mé bɔ̀ dé tetɔɔ̂r mene. Mè yeé ke, bɔ́ baá bɔ̀ mvù lelɔŋ komó kwaá. Bɔ́ sie komo mvù déì, dé sâ né mvù yɔ̀ŋ. Bɔ́ duɔɔ́m ju felè nùà kàn tueê, bɔ́ né felè nùà kân faá bɔ́ lé naâ nyagá kwaá nɔ tená, bɔ́ ju tena lom jéjég faá seé nùà kàn tueé nê nɔ.
66020013	Nòmò koô né mé bɔ̀ komó dé beè seèn jɔgɔ́ ndeê, cio bɔ̂ ndugo bɔ̀ càŋ né mé bɔ̀ komó dé beè bɔɔ̀n jɔgɔ́ ndeê ndɔ. Ju né felè nùà kàn faá seé seèn tueé nê nɔ, tená.
66020014	Bɔ́ vulú su njií cio bɔ̂ ndugo bɔ̀ càŋ ké tuar te ndèndèŋ weè ndɔ. Bèh sâ né bèh cio dé jomò kuû.
66020015	Bɔ̀ɔ́ mé yilí bɔɔ̀n lè mvù yɔ̀ŋe nyàgà dèn ŋgwéh dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ vulú su njií gi bɔ́ ké teèn ménâ ndɔ.
66021001	Jomo sâ mè ŋene njií vulú feê, mé tàbè feê ndɔ. Sâ vulú dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ mé tàbè dé toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ lé dé bɔɔ̀n nyue nde aá kèn. Ndèndèŋ nòmò teèn sam cuú ndɔ.
66021002	Mè ŋene njií lɔɔ́ déì ŋagásé mân; né Jerusalem dé feê ŋené yuo kelà né ké te vulúu beè Càŋ kɔɔ́; né ká doó suagâ. Càŋ nyegé lom né bú yàgà faá fù nde né yoòr siì nɔ.
66021003	Mè yeé ŋgweé, hueh tarê déì baá ké te kɔgɔ ŋgulí den, ye: Kènê, bèh denè Càŋ baá ké lètenè bɔ̀ nùàr! Bɔ́ bɔ́ den nde aá kɔɔ́, bɔ́ baá bɔ̀ nùàr seèn, Càŋ bɔɔ̀n né lom bú.
66021004	Bú nùà njèh nde né bɔ́ yímé njolò fɔ; bɔ́ kú ndé cú; yúé gi aá, mbà gi aá, cio teèn sam nde cuú, gèr gi aá ndɔ. Bɔ̀ njèh dé cucuûm gi aá dé jomò.»
66021005	Nuaá mé né ké te kɔgɔ doô tueé njií ndɔ ye: Kènê, mè njèh dɔɔ́ŋ bɔɔ́ gi nde aá dé fefeê.» Jomo sâ, ye mè a: Nyàgà kwá bɔ̀ ŋgòr hên te mvùu, né lom bɔ̀ jéjég ŋgòr mé né gi môn.»
66021006	À den cuù, ye mè a: Gi aá kèn! Feh né mè, tií né mè ndɔ; Bei wɔ̂ŋ né mè, Cèrè-mbáŋ né mè ndɔ. Nuaá né mé nyúá, mè nde né bú nòmò ŋueê ké te nduùn yɔ̀ŋe haá, mè bú haá nde né dé lòù.
66021007	Nuaá mé né veên taré yɔgɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ, nde né gà bú sâ beè mò kwa; mè den nde né Càŋ seèn, à ŋa ŋuna mò ndɔ.
66021008	Dé bɔ̀ déì môn sam; mè jue né mé bɔ̀ veéh bɔ̀, bɔ̀ gogobô bɔ̀, bɔ̀ dudulî bɔ̀, bɔ̀ wúlá-nùàr bɔ̀, bɔ̀ yɔ̀ŋ tóbó gɔ̀ yàgà bɔ̀, bɔ̀ táhunó bɔ̀, bɔ̀ dùà cècàŋ bɔ̀, mé bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ nde gi né mé gèr ŋené kuú; bɔ́ silí njií nde né bɔ́ ké tuar te ndèndèŋ weè. We sâ né we nyùm nàgàkèn. Bèh sâ né bèh cio dé jomò kuû.»
66021009	Lètenè bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ téhbeèh mé lé naâ mé bɔ̀ ŋgàb gèr téhbeh dé jomò beè doô, cén déì lètenè bɔɔ̀n ndeè ye mè a: Ndê, mè feh keéh wò Fù Mbieè Sèmè njolò.»
66021010	Cúcuí Ŋagâ waà kema mè ndɔ. Cìlì Càŋ doô jɔgɔ ŋaá mé mè ké te ndɔ́ŋ tòr déì dàbsé mân. Wa ké teèn, à feh keéh mè lɔɔ́ koô déì, né lom ŋagásé tâŋ; lé naâ Jerusalem mé né ké ter beè Càŋ, à lé ká doó suaga deén naâ kɔɔ́;
66021011	teèn né lom léláŋ sùsùm Càŋ; né faá taá ndòn nɔ beéh den.
66021012	Bɔ̀gɔ̀ kulasé mân né lɔɔ́ sâ beè kaáŋ sie. Hin né teèn yulà cùɔ̀b fà; bɔ̀ cìlì Càŋ yulà cùɔ̀b fà né teèn njebá tená bele. Yilí gèh bɔ̀ huaán Iserálà yulà cùɔ̀b fà dɔɔ́ŋ né gi te hin sâ nyagá kwaá bele.
66021013	Kèb lɔɔ̂ dé kàn lé naâ mé hin teèn tagár: kèb fenê tagár, kèb túnò tagár, kèb bà tagár, kèb nyiìb tagár ndɔ.
66021014	Maàŋ bɔ̀gɔ̀ né felè taá yulà cùɔ̀b fà njebá den. Yilí bɔ̀ mbɔ̀ŋ tebê Mbieè Sèmè yulà cùɔ̀b fà dɔɔ́ŋ né felèbɔ̀ nyagá den ndɔ.
66021015	Cìlì Càŋ mé naâ mé mè tueé njií doô lé naâ mé mòù beè, te à me lɔɔ́ mé njéh, à me bɔ̀ hin mé bɔ̀gɔ̀ mé njéh ndɔ.
66021016	Lɔɔ́ sâ lé naâ gou-gou mân, hàm bɔ̂ dàb né gi kèì cén. Cìlì Càŋ doô duɔɔ̂m lɔɔ́ mé cùgò seèn meè: lɔɔ́ sâ lé naâ kílòmétà kám fà mé yuií fà; hàm ménâ, dàb ménâ, dàb teèr ménâ ndɔ.
66021017	Cìlì Càŋ duɔɔ́m cu bɔ̀gɔ̀ ménâ meè: dàb teèr lé naâ métà yulà téhbeh cùɔ̀b fà. Dé sâ lé naâ mòù mé bɔ̀ nùàr me yeé njèh mé njéh.
66021018	Bɔ́ lé bɔ̀gɔ̀ sâ meè naâ mé gèh taá déì mân, yilí taá sâ né jâspè; bɔ́ lɔɔ́ dé seèn me né mé ndândaà goô, ŋagásé mân faá daregà nɔ.
66021019	Bɔ́ nyagá gɔné kwaá né maàŋ bɔ̀gɔ̀ taá nyàgàm yoòr feh hihiné: taá toò jɔ̀gɔ̀ lé naâ jâspè, jomo bele né sàfîr, dé tagâr né àgátà, dé nèà emarôdè,
66021020	dé tîn né onîke, dé ténjên né sarduan, dé téhbeèh né kerisalítè, dé téndelê né berîl, dé tárènèà né topásè, dé yulà né kerisoprásè, dé yulà cùɔ̀b cên né tùrkwásè, dé yulà cùɔ̀b fà né ametistè.
66021021	Bɔ̀ hin yulà cùɔ̀b fà doô, bɔ́ dé kàn bɔɔ́ né mé taá huɔɔ́msé mân. Bɔ́ ceér lètenè lɔɔ̂ me né mé goó ndɔ, ndândaà goô ŋenésé mân.
66021022	Teèn lɔ sâ mè gwà Càŋ ŋéné ŋgwéh. Gwà Càŋ dé seèn né seér Càŋ Dueè Nùà terrèb bɔ̂ Mbieè Sèmè.
66021023	Lɔɔ́ sâ dé seèn mé lou bɔ̂ weéh táŋ ŋgwéh, sùsùm Càŋ teèn ba njerré den né kɔɔ́. Lâm teèn né Mbieè Sèmè ndɔ.
66021024	Nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ nde né mé njéh gɔ ŋené. Bɔ̀ mgbèémgbè wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ nde né ŋgúlú bɔɔ̀n ké teèn bilí njií gií.
66021025	Bɔ̀ hin bɔ̀gɔ̀ dɔɔ́ŋ nde gi né lelɔŋ sɔɔ́ den, bɔ́ bɔ́ cóló nyì ndé ŋgwéh; lòù sam, ké sâ cibí teèn sam.
66021026	Bɔ́ nde né bɔ̀ njèh ŋguŋgulî, mé bɔ̀ njèh teterrèb wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ ké lɔ sâ bilí njií gií.
66021027	Njèh cén, njèh jérè déì lɔ sâ yílá nyì ndé ŋgwéh, ndɔ́g bɔ̀ dudulî bɔ̀ mé bɔ̀ nyeén bɔ̀ teèn yílá nyì ndé ŋgwéh. Ké teèn yila cegé nde né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé yilí bɔɔ̀n baá gi te mvù yɔ̀ŋe nyagá den; mvù sâ né beè Mbieè Sèmè.
66022001	Cìlì Càŋ feh keéh cu mè nòmò koô déì mân, né ké te kɔgɔ Càŋ bɔ̂ Mbieè Sèmè kwaré yuo den, né nòmò yɔ̀ŋ. Nòmò sâ wulá njerré lom né faá taá ndòn nɔ.
66022002	Né lelɔ lètenè kpɔŋ ceêr kwaár bele den. Toú yɔ̀ŋ né sòn nòmò kèb kân mé kèb yágà mene yaám den, wa yeé tàb mbei yulà cùɔ̀b fà te nyèmà cén-e; né te weéh dé kàne mbei cén waá. Yùè seèn né lèh mé né nùàr wɔ́ŋ dɔɔ́ŋ taré sɔm.
66022003	Ké sâ njií mé né beè Càŋ duagásé dɔɔ́ŋ teèn yílá ndé ŋgwéh. Kɔgɔ Càŋ bɔ̂ Mbieè Sèmè teèn den nde né kɔɔ́, bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ seèn nde né bú cu dɔɔ́ŋ die den.
66022004	Bɔ́ nde né kuún seèn ŋené; yilí seèn nde né bɔ́ toò kuûn nyagá den.
66022005	Ké teèn cibí sam nde cuú, bɔ́ mé ŋagâ lâm bɔ̂ ŋagâ loù táŋ ndé cú ndɔ; Càŋ Dueè baá gi ké teèn ŋagá den. Bɔ́ mgbè ké sâ cer den nde aá dé nyèmà mé nyèmà.
66022006	Cìlì Càŋ den cuù, ye mè a: Bɔ̀ ŋgòr hên né gi bɔ̀ jéjég ŋgòr mé né gi môn. Càŋ Dueè lé haá naâ bɔ̀ sòn-Càŋ bɔ̀ Cúcuí kɔɔ́, à lé tema njií naâ cìlì seèn kɔɔ́ ndɔ, ye bú a: Ndé fèh kwá bɔ̀ seé bɔ̀ nyî bɔ̀ njií mé nde gi né bɔɔ́ dɔɔ́ŋ njolò ma.»
66022007	Jue mè Yeésò, mè baá ndeê! Bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé lé naá giì sònò Càŋ yuo, mé né gi lè mvù hên nyagá den, nuaá mé né faá tueé nê nɔ gɔ dɔɔ́ŋ, samésé né bú.»
66022008	Né mè Jâŋ, mè lé bɔ̀ njií hên mé njolo ŋene giì naâ kɔɔ́, mè lé bɔ́ mé tie ŋgweé giì naâ kɔɔ́ ndɔ. Mè yeé ŋene gi aá, mè ŋgweé gi aá, mè jɔgɔ die nde doó ka cìlì Càŋ mé né mè feh doô, ye te mè keí bú.
66022009	À deên ndɔ, ye mè a: Té môn bɔ́! Mè né lom nùà seê Càŋ faá bí bɔ̀ mbeí yeè sòn-Càŋ nɔ. Mè né faá bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né ŋgòr lè mvù hên tég sie dɔɔ́ŋ. Dùà lòm Càŋ!»
66022010	À den cuù, ye mè a: Bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé lé naá giì sònò Càŋ yuo, mé né gi te mvù hên nyagá den dɔɔ́ŋ, té bɔ́ dé yeè mé huún kwá lòm. Mè tueé wò, baá gi hên.
66022011	Nùà veên a, bɔ́ ndé cú mé veên toò. Nùà dulî a, dùlì ndé cú toò ménâ ndɔ. Nùà húɔ́m-temê a, húɔ́m ndé sèr mé njéh toò. Nuaá mé né kɔ́bè sâ a, ŋágá ndé sèr cú toò ménâ ndɔ.»
66022012	Jue mè Yeésò, mè baá ndeê! Mè wa ndeè né mé sàgà nùà kàn beè, mè nùà kân gwɔm nde né faá seé seèn tueé nê nɔ.
66022013	Feh né mè, tií né mè ndɔ; Bei wɔ̂ŋ né mè, Cèrè-mbáŋ né mè ndɔ; mè lé duɔɔ́m naâ kɔɔ́, mè ceré cu nde né kɔɔ́.»
66022014	Samésé né bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né cɔ̀gɔ̀ bɔɔ̀n yaga nyegé, te bɔ́ ké lɔ yila kela lè hine, bɔ́ kwa ceér, bɔ́ yieé tàb toú yɔ̀ŋ.
66022015	Ké jomo bâŋ sue le nde né bɔ̀ dudulî bɔ̀, bɔ̀ táhunó bɔ̀, bɔ̀ yɔ̀ŋ tóbó gɔ̀ yàgà bɔ̀, bɔ̀ wúlá-feh bɔ̀, bɔ̀ dùà ŋgùlàmúr bɔ̀, mé dàm bɔ̀ nyeên bɔ̀ mene dɔɔ́ŋ.
66022016	Né mè Yeésò tema njií né bí cìlì mò kɔɔ́, mè ye bú a, ndé gí bɔ̀ŋ bɔ̀ nùàr mò dɔɔ́ŋ ménâ tueé kwaá. Jéjég ndùté ndùtù mgbè Davîd né mè. Cɔ́ toò cieê né mè ndɔ.»
66022017	Cúcuí Ŋagâ bɔ̂ Fù ye: Ndê!» Nuaá mé né felá, bú a, júée: Ndê!» ndɔ! Nuaá né mé nyúá nòmò, bú a, ndê! Nuaá mé gwaán né nòmò yɔ̀ŋ ŋueê, bú a, ndê, à weh dé lòù.
66022018	Né mè Jâŋ. Bɔ̀ ŋgòr mé lé naá giì sònò Càŋ yuo, mé né gi te mvù hên nyagá den dɔɔ́ŋ, bí bɔ̀ɔ́ mé né bɔ́ ŋgweé, mè tétég tie hên sio né bí, ye bí a, nuaá mé sagá yií njeré déì teèn, dàm bɔ̀ njèh ndùàn mé bɔ́ tueé kwaá né te mvù hên dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde gi né bú yoòr bomó su.
66022019	Nuaá mé né seér njolo déì keh sɔm dɔɔ́ŋ, Càŋ nde né bú te gà tàb toú yɔ̀ŋ ménâ sɔm, à mé bèh denè te lɔɔ́ joloò sam nde cuú ndɔ. Kùr tàb toû mé lɔɔ́ joloò sâ né gi te mvù hên nyagá den.
66022020	Nùà jéjêg felè njèh dɔɔ̂ŋ né bèsɔ́nè tueé, ye: Né bɔ̀n, mè baá ndeê!» Môn Fehtoò beèh Yeésò, ndê!
66022021	Húɔ́m-temé Fehtoò beèh Yeésò a, ká sìè gí bɔ̀ nùàr beè dɔɔ́ŋ.
